tsa/ spyang sha dang bsres chang la gdab// zla ba dus kyi sbyor ba bshad// rgas ba'i khrag dang nya bya'i sha// nyung ba mar khu zer mo klad// rkang mangs 'degs pa'i lus dang sbyar// rten drug pho ba'i sbyor bar

bshad// skyer chu 'om bu thar nur chang// lum shing dud pa thar nu chang// phye mar btags la sbas la mnan// rul nas sran chan slum dang bsre// sngags bzlas zos na nye bar bshad// me tog bcud blangs bung

ba'i sha/ ma thon 'bu dang sbrang ma'i chang// spyang dug rtsa ba kyi lce ba// bsres la ra yi khrag gis sbru// drod bcud dang sbyar sprad na 'joms// sbyor ba bcu bdun gcig mthar ldan// mo rigs 'pho ba'i sbyor bar

bshad// chu rlangs rdo dreg nya rul sha/ ra dang phag khrag sngo sna tshogs// rdo rje'i chu dang mar khu chang// ba yi drod dang kyi tsha sram// bag phye mar khu drod dang bsre// yul dang sprad na 'joms par bshad// yam shing

dud pa bong ldad chang// zhun mar snying po mar khu tsha// sha su sa khu ba mar khu bra bo'i phye// drod dang sbyar na sbyor ba'i mchog/ rgyal blon stobs chen 'joms par bshad// g+hU b+hI d+ha la'aha na b+hU'i tsI/ shU krA b+haM zhun tsa
ra'i don/ ti tsa sbyar bas thams cad 'joms// drag po brda yis 'joms par bshad// rdo khrag shing khrag sa yi dbugs// srin chad 'brug rgyugs glog gi rjes// khram thod bcug la 'gram 'og sba// mkhar de
'pho dang 'jigs par bshad// bdud rtsi mngar dang 'o ma chang// khyi sha dang bsres drod la gtad// bsgrub pa'i yan lag gnyis brgya gcig/ sbyor ba du ma las kyi gnad// de yi sbyor ba dpag med

las// thugs kyi 'phreng ba'i thig le bcud// dbu ru dbyangs kyi dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu bzhis steng du brgyan// der rjes mdzes pa'i thig le can// der yang lnga pa'i mtha' mas gnan// de 'og drug pa'i
dang po la// der rjes sgra yi dang po'o// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og tu sbyar// steng du lnga pa'i mtha' mas mdzes// de 'og gsum pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs yig lnga pas 'og nas brgyan// de 'og

drug pa'i gsum pa la// steng du lnga pa'i mtha' mas brgyan// der rjes gnyis pa'i dang pos mdzes// de 'og u sha'i dang po la// lnga pa'i mtha' mas steng du brgyan// de 'og gsum pa'i dang po bzhag/ rjes su
gsum pa'i mtha' ma'o// de 'og lnga pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa btags// de 'og drug pa'i dang po'o// de 'og gsum pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng du brgyan// de 'og

sgra yi dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu bzhis steng du brgyan// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og tu 'brel// de 'og drug pa'i dang po la// lnga pa'i mtha' mas steng du gnan// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la// 'og tu lnga
pa'i gsum pas 'brel// gsum pa'i gsum pas yang dag ldan// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i 'phreng ba 'dis// sbyor ba nyis brgya stong nyid 'grub// las 'di brtsams na the tshom med// thabs mchog ldan pa'i sbyor

bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sbyor ba'i thun mong gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis me skyogs chu skyogs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// thugs kyi 'phreng ba dang

sbyar la// me shel drod la 'ug me bdug/ stag bya'i sha dang pu shud snying// dur khrod sol chen rgya shug spre// sha snying bsres la sgo ngar rdzas// bdun stong sbyor ba stan la bstim// sha ba'i rdzas la 'gul tog

bya// nyi ma'i drod bsdu sbyor ba bstim// nya gsum gung la sgo nga 'phang// sngags kyi sbyor ba brgyad dang bdun// grong khyer chen po me yis 'jig// bcu nas nyi shu gsum gyi bar// rabs chad thod par chu shel

bcug/ gzhan yang gnyan rar dmigs gu'i chu// nya sbrul sha dang bya so khrag thod par blugs shing sbyor ba dril// de yi sbyor ba rgyas bstan pa// rgyu rkyen 'dren pa dbyangs dang sgra// dang por dbyangs yig de nyid

la// o yis steng brgyan lnga bas mtha' mdzes u sha'i 'og/ sbyor bas snying po yon tan rdzogs// drug pa'i gsum pas lnga pa'i mtha' mas mdzes// gnyis su bos la drug dang po// lnga pa'i mtha' ma sgra dang

po// drug pa'i gnyis pa drug pa'i gsum pa sbyar// de la u btags mtshams su sbyar// snying po sdud pa gsum dang sbyar// nyin mtshan khri khri rdzas la dbab// nyi shu bdun nas gnam stong du// gsum spangs lnga

pa'i gsum pa la// b+h+ya ma hA yis 'og nas brgyan// steng nas o brgyan khri tsho bzhi// thon na ston zla ra ba'i stong// tho rangs sbyor ba gsum gyis 'phang// gang dmigs rten la skyin thang 'bebs// drag po'i yan
lag ma lus rdzogs// de mo'i lus la zhing lpags bsgrubs// srin bya'i sgo ngar sha dang khrag/ brdzangs la de mo'i skye ru gdags// khrag gi klong du bya gzhag la// 'phang ba bor la sbyor ba

zlog/ bdun 'bum me chu snying po blang// rtags dang sbyar la rten la dbab// rtsa ba'i las la spobs pa bya// bam gyi 'gul tog de mo 'phang// me rlung skyin thang las kyi 'khrug/ byi la'i gsob shun phung sa chu// rgya

sri shing la mi mthun gzugs// sen gang mos pa'i khrag gis bris// bdud dang lnga ru sbyor ba dril// dbu ru yon tan rdzogs pa'i 'bru// drug pa'i lnga pa'i mtha' ma gnyis// drug pa'i gsum pa// sgra yi dang po
gsum pas ug/ lnga pa'i mtha' ma o steng brgyan// lnga pa'i mtha' ma bsnan la bod// sgra yi dang po u sha'i gnyis pas 'og/ rgyan la steng la e yis mdzes// drug pa'i gsum pa gsum pa'i dang por
sbyar// gsum pa'i bzhi pa'i lag tu u// drug pa'i gnyis pa ri yis brgyan// u sha'i mtha' ma u sha'i gsum pas gnan// lnga pa'i dang po o steng brgyan// de la lnga pa'i gsum pas gnan// gong mas bsdus

la 'og mas dbab// tha chung bzhi yi nya la sbyar// stobs chen dregs pa srin mo yi// brgya bcu gnyis dang rten la sbyar// dus tshod sbyor ba'i gnad la dbab// 'gram rtsa them 'og mal lam bras// sbas la sbyor
ba gsum gyis dbab// chags pa'i snying po gsum dang ldan// las kyi mtha' ru dgu skor gnan// mchog gi las dang gcig tu sbyar// gri thod khrag gsum nA ga yul// bcug thun gsum snying po bstim// stong
gcig khri bzhi brgya phrag gsum// zla ba dgun dang dpyid ston sbyar// khrag thod gsur gsum mtha' ru sreg/ bsdu dril dbab pa 'bras bu 'joms// gzir ba gsum dang ming dang sbyar// mgo spangs drug pa'i

dang po rlung// sgra yi dang po u sha'i gnyis pas ug/ steng du es brgyan rlung steng o// gsum pa'i mtha' ma dang po o dang ldan// sdud pa gcig dang ming du gzir la gzir// gsum spangs lnga pa'i dang po
gnyis// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og tu brgyan// steng du o gnyis lnga pa'i mtha' mas mdzes// steng du es brgyan rlung steng o// gsum pa'i mtha' ma dang po o dang ldan// sdud pa gcig la ming du sbyar la
gzir// gsum spangs lnga pa'i dang po gnyis// mtshams su gnyis sbyar dril gnad mchog/ kun ldan mtha' ru u sha'i dang po gnyis// drug pa'i gsum pa gnyis gnan la// gsum pa'i mtha' ma dang po'i
gsum pa nye// u sha'i gsum pa dang po'i mtha' mas ug/ las rgyan sgra yi dang po'i mtha' mas gnan// gzir ba gsum pa'i mtha' gnyis gnan// lnga pa'i dang po os steng brgyan// de la lnga pa'i gsum pas
gnan// gnyan ra gdug par gnan sreg gzir// dbab pa sbyor ba 'joms par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sbyor ba gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis dbang gi gleng gzhi 'di bshad do// rdo rje srin po'i sbyor ba la// 'khor lo rten gyi byin rlabs mchog/ rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo legs bsgoms na// ye shes 'khor lo byin gyis brlabs// lha yi 'khor
lo legs thob nas// las kyi 'khor los phrag brgyad bskor// brgyad gnyis bcu drug 'khor lor sbyor// byin brlabs 'khor los bdag dbang bskur// dbang gi gnas su bstan pa'i phyir// 'khor lo dbang

phyug mi 'gyur brtan// rin chen thod pa'i bum pa ru// ye shes chu dang bcu phyed snum// rigs dang khyad par las bskyed la// rtsa ba las dang sid+d+hi bzlas// bzlas pa'i mtshan ma rnyed pa dang// bdag dang slob ma

dbang bskur la// dngos grub bcud kyi bum pa blang// nus pa skyed phyir pan tsi'i dbang// nyi shu rdzas kyi rnam pa gcig/ rgyan dang drag po'i dur khrod kyi// sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan la// rigs dang ldan
pa'i dbang phyug gis// rgyal ba'i gdung tshob rnams la sbyin// las la thog med phan pa'i dbang// dregs pa pho mos las kyi dbang// bskur zhing bde ba'i lam la gzud// gsang ba gzungs ma'i phyag rgya
blang// rigs dang dngos grub kun sbyar la// yab yum mnyes pa'i byin rlabs las// rten gyi 'khor lo drug bsgyur la// thabs dang bcas pas rgyan sbyangs la// bde chen 'khyil ba'i byang chub bcud// gnyis
med bde ba'i sgra dang 'byin// thogs med grub pa'i dbang du bshad// yum gyi pad+mor bde phab la// shes rab gnas mchog dam pa yi// ye shes bskyed pa'i dbang bskur bya// b+ha ga gsang ba'i gzhal yas
su// rig pa'i bde ba'i sems bskul la// si ri'i lam sbyangs pad+mar 'khyil// rig pa rgyan gyi byin rlabs blang// rig pa'i 'khor lo rang dbang bskur// ye shes 'khor lo thob par bshad// thams cad ma
'dres mnyam rdzogs pa'i// mnyam nyid bde ba chen po yis// sku gsum 'bras bu lhun rdzogs dbang// sgyu ma snang stong ye shes sku// ma bskur bskur med rgyu 'bras 'das// thams cad bde ba chen por

rdzogs// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// rig pa rang dbang byin rlabs mchog/ chos nyid rdzogs pa'i dbang du bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// dbang yongs rdzogs rtsa ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thun mong dang khyad par gyi dbang 'di bshad do// chos sku byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid las// 'jam dpal mi gnas zung du med pa'i sku// mi gnas khro bo ya
man ta ka dang// gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya rab bstan pa// bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig 'di lta ste// sngags pa kun gyi dam tshig srog/ byang chub bde ba'i gzugs yin pas// srog ldan dam
pas 'di srungs bya// sbyor ba sngags kyi 'khor lo la// ma yengs bsam gtan ting 'dzin bstan// gsang ba'i lam min gzhan mi 'gro// ri pa'i brda min phyag mi btsal// sbyor ba las kyi rgyun zhugs

na// gtam mi bya zhing sha chen bza'// g.yang gzhi stag lpags ro ras bgo/ dur khrod rgyan dang 'phreng ba bgrang// dung rnga gling bu rdza rnga dang// rak+ta bdud rtsi spyug glu blang// smug chen smug chung don dang
gsur// sngags kyi 'khor lo rtag tu bskor// me rlung las kyi 'khor lo blta// mtshon cha sku mdog sna tshogs gnag/ 'dzab rdzogs dgongs pa gsang bar drang// bsrung ba sngags kyi 'khor lo bca'// bsam
gtan sems kyi 'khor lo blta// shes rab gsang ba'i 'khor lor 'jug/ thabs kyi 'khor lo bde ba spro// byang chub 'khor lo sa bon drang// bde ba'i 'khor lo b+ha gar bskyil// shugs kyi 'khor lo dbugs
las dbyung// 'phro 'du'i 'khor los kun sbyang bsgrub// brgyud pa'i 'khor los bsreg sbyang bgrod// sangs rgyas 'khor los stong phrag 'byung// 'khor lo'i dam tshig srog ltar bzung// de las yon tan byin
rlabs 'byung// chu chen 'brug na sngon mi bzlog/ yul gsad ro la blo yis blang// yugs sa rabs chad nag po dang// mu za'i bam chen rtag tu blang// don dang ka ba sbas la bcar// mon gyi tsit+ta ban+d+ha

sems// rjen shun dbang po sngon du blang// ro la rtag tu byams shing rten// dpa' bo don khrag mtshon ldan 'tshal// khyi dom rta snying dur khrod shing// rtsub mo rdo sol lus la brten// sangs rgyas mchod rgyun bla ma
bzung// sngon du 'gro bas bag bcas bsdam// byang chub lcam dral rgyun mi gcad// ya man ta ka rtag tu bsgom// ya tshogs chu bo rgyun mi gcod// lam du zhugs rnams mngon par sbyar// snying rje phan sems
brtson pas sbyin// dkon mchog bla ma'i rgyal srid bca'// bstan pa rin chen gter la bsdu// snying po ngad dang shugs kyis drang// mtshan ldan gzungs ma byin rlabs bzung// bkra shis phyag rgya'i gzungs

ma spyad// sems kyi me tog bde ba blang// byang chub sa bon gzhan mi spro// gsang ba'i don du smra mi bya// dam ma 'dres sogs gsang mi bsgrags// mkha' 'gro gzhan tshogs byams shing gdung// dbang po rno la

ting 'dzin bstan// phyag rgya gsal la nyams rtogs ldan// dam tshig sngags kyi 'phreng ba bzung// thun mong dam tshig bsrung bar bshad// khyad par dam tshig bsrung ba ni// spyi dang lhag pa'i dam tshig
gnyis// spyi yi dam tshig bcu gnyis gcig/ gcan gzan rgyal po gsad pa min// za ma tog gi kha mi dbye// gangs kyi zhun chu btung mi bya// snod ngan bdud rtsi bcud mi blug/ nor bu rin chen

rgyan mi dpog/ rin po che'i lha bran mi bsrel// rdo rje gtams pa'i rdzong mi gshig/ byang chub sa bon bsreg mi bya// rdo rje ra ba'i dbang mi gshig/ phyag rgya chen po'i rgyan mi dgrol// mun pa gsal ba'i sgron mi

gsad// rdo rje chu ba'o bka' mi bcag/ 'byung ba lnga yi dngas mi bsdu// gzhan la rang gi sngags med zug pa mi gdon// sngags kyi dug mda' khong nas mi gdon// rin po che'i rgya sa mi gshig/ sgyu ma'i phung

po'i ri mi bsnyil// bya rgod dkar po'i gshog pa mi bcag bya khyung sder mos rgya mtsho'i gting mi dkrug rang gi zhe sdang lam mi dgag sgyu ma snang ba'i sgron mi gsad// gsang dam phyag rgya'i brda mi dgrol// rin
po che yi sgron mi gsad// phyi yi dam tshig bsrung bar bshad// lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam pa lnga// dang du blangs shing gdams par bshad// 'dun pa gsum gyi bstan pa brtag/ yin pa bzhi yis lhag par
brtag/ lta ba bzhi yis nyams stobs ldan// dbang bskur gnyis kyis gtan mi dgrol// gsang ba gsum gyi rang dbang bsdu// lhag pa'i dam tshig lnga ru bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// dam tshig
gzungs kyi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnad dgu gzer gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sbyor ba sngags kyi 'khor lo mtshon// gnad dgu thabs ldan gcod dang
'bigs// gsang gsum las kyi mtha' ru bca'// srog rten gzer bzhi'i thebs la blangs// bdag nyid kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// ma lus 'dus pa'i khro gnyer can// 'dus pa bzhi yi sbyor ba
can// gsang ba'i sgron ma brda yis brdeg/ dbang can dregs pa dmod pa'i bdag/ myos byed pho mo'i lus la gzud// 'dus pa'i thig le yid kyis bzung// lus kyi ri bo khro gnyer la// lhun po ri rab brtan

ltar brjid// khros pa'i yis kyis kun bzlog nas// rang gnas phyag rgya chen po yi// lus la ye shes 'khor lo bcas// khro bo 'khor lo nyi ma brtan// gtum chen rngam brjid rdo rje 'bar// ya ma kun 'dus rin

chen yum// kun 'dus rin chen sgo yi sgo// longs spyod mgrin pa bde lam gnas// bde chen rin chen rgya mdud oM// skyed rtsa dgu 'am gsang gnas su// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bde ba lnga// khrag 'thung yab yum
gzi brjid 'bar// spyi bo gser gyi sgo gnyis dang// dgu mdud 'dus pa'i khung bu dang// thugs ka lag pa g.yas g.yon dang// gsang sgo rkang pa g.yas g.yon gnyis// smin mtshams lhag pa rdo rje'i
brda// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar bcas pa'i// khro rgyal kun gyi thig ler bya// dbu la khrag 'thung dbu rgyan lnga// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcu dang gcig/ khro

rgyal kun bdag khrag 'thung rje// gshin rje mkha' 'gro yi dwags bdag/ sha za srin po gying srog bdag/ 'das dang ma 'das kun gyi yab// zhing bcu sdig can kun sgrol mtshon// khro chung sprul pa gzer ltar
'khrug/ tshangs pa kun khyab nyi ma can// nyi ma gsang lam 'od stong 'bar// stong gsum gang ba'i 'khor lo 'bar// dgu 'dus sdig pa gnas nas 'pho// rten drug gnas sbyangs ya tshogs sdud// rtsa lam srog

dang rlung gis 'byed// byin rlabs bstan pa'i mtshon chas srun// phyag rgya chen po'i sems dang ldan// thun mong sems dpa' khyad par can// rtsa bzhi 'byung lnga gnad dgu dbab// drag pos 'phangs la sngags

dgu gzer// rgyu rkyen 'joms pa'i nyi shu bdun// las gsum sbyor pa dgu nyid dgu/ spyi gcod mtshon cha spu gri me// bdag la 'joms pa gyen la gzud// gzhan gyi sbyor ba rim bzlog bya// sbyor ba sngags kyi

rim pa bzlog 'phreng ba sngags kyi rim pa bzlog phyag rgya mtshon cha'i rgyal po bzlog sku yi cha lugs rgyas pa bzlog thugs kyi snying po thig le bzlog 'khor lo rgyal po rim pa bzlog rin chen sngags kyi gnad
dgu bsdebs// bla gnas rten gyi yul dgu la// sbyor ba gzer gyi sngags dgu dbab// sgo dgu dbye dang tshul dgu'i brtag/ gzer dgu gdab pa'i rim dgu bzlog/ sbyor ba gsum yin bzlog pa'i
gnad// 'khor lo 'bar na sngags kyi gnad// 'pho zhing g.yo ba med pa'i gnad// sbyor ba'i rim pa las kyi gnad// skabs 'dzin chu srin rdo rje'i gnad// rim bsdus gcod pa dar ldan gnad// sbyor ba
gsum gyi gnad dgu sdebs// nyungs kar rgyal po snying gzer gnad// nyungs nag stobs ldan klong gzer gnad// ske tshe nyen slong lus sbrid gnad// mi khrag myos pa lhad pa'i gnad// rta khrag 'byed pa sems
g.yang gnad// khyikhrag gdug pas dbugs sdud gnad// spyan dug mtsho chen rtsad gcod gnad// rag dug me 'bar sreg pa'i gnad// dug rgod khrag skyed tshad pa'i gnad// gnad dgu 'dus pas rten 'joms
gnad// bla gnas rten dgu'i brda gzugs dgu// rkyen dgus bskul la rta dgu 'phang// sgo dgu phye la rten dgu dbab// rdo rje sngags bsdus tsit+ta'i gnad// sku yi sngags bsdus klad pa'i gnad// thugs ka'i
gzer sngags zhe sdang gnad// yon tan rdzogs pa longs spyod gnad// gsung gi dri med 'dod chags gnad// las rdzogs gsang ba rgyud gcod gnod// las kyis sreg pa dgu 'dus gnad// gshin rje'i
bdud nyid gti mug gcod pa'i gnad// skye med rdo rje rtsa dbugs gcod pa'i gnad// rim pa'i du ma sbyor ba'i mchog/ gnad gsum bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin// sngags kyi dbal dang 'bar ba'i
'od// phyogs dang mthun par sreg byed de// gong mas 'phen cing 'og mas gcod// de bzhin rim pa kun ldan nas// drag po'i spogs pa'i skabs dang sbyar// las dang 'dren pa'i skabs dang gnyis// gzhan

yang 'khor la spogs pa dang// dgu skor drag po spogs pa'i las// skabs kyis las kyi 'byed par sbyar// stag mo mche sbyar rdo rje rme// seng ge kha thab gnam lcags sdebs// stobs chen drag po'i sbyor tshul

can// rdo rje srin po me yi sngags// spogs pa'i skabs su drag po sbyor// drag po sngags kyi 'khor lo nyid// rtsa bar bcas pa'i lo ma can// snying po gcig las yan lag rdzogs// sbyor ba bye ba phrag yas
pa// bsdus pas stong gnyis bcu drug gcig/ gsum dang bzhi lnga drug bdun brgyad// dgu dang bcu dang bcu gcig gnyis// rtsa ba gcig la bdun cu gnyis// 'phen pa'i drag sngags dum mar 'gyur// sbyor ba

byed na dpag tu med// bdun brgya nyi shu las kyi skabs// las kyi rgyal po 'khrul 'khor yin// ya bag sha yi sbyor ba ste// las ni du ma rtsa ba gcig/ 'dus pas mtshon kha me lce yi// dril ba'i sngags kyi 'phreng

ba gcig/ brjod pas des par mi 'jog gcod// 'phreng ba sngags kyi sbyor ba nyid// 'phen pa'i snying po dngas ma rlung// 'phangs pas sman dri 'du ba'i thog/ drag po ma hA'i 'bru nyid kyis// dril ba'i bde ba'i
klong nas 'byed// 'gugs pa'i sngags kyi skye bo yis// rten gsum sbyor bas dmigs pa 'gugs// lus srog dbang po shes rgyud 'brel// bla dang sprul pa yang sprul 'gugs// yul dbang bsten gsum sgo ru
dbye// dbus dang mtshams kyi 'bub gnas su// dri ma'i lus la srog bsdus la// mu tra dang bcas gzir la gsad// mchog gi las dang gnyis su bya// spro ba gsum dang thim pa gnyis// 'jug pa gnyis kyis
rten dgu 'joms// rgyu bzhi las kyi rnam grangs gsum// tshul gsum dmigs pa 'byed cing 'joms// phyag rgya chen po brtan pa sbyin// bgrod pa gsum gyi lam dang sprad// gnad thabs kyi sbyor bar
bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// gsang ba gnad kyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten dang ling ga'i yul 'di bshad do// sbyor ba'i rten la las dbab pa// las

chen mchog gi dbye ba ste// sbyor ba kun gyi yul du brtag/ de yis dngos dang sbyor ba ni// thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyis// bsgrub byed dmigs dang bcas pa'i yul// bdag gi 'khor lo mthu bcug la// lha yi
'khor lo legs thob nas// byin rlabs 'khor los mthu brtan la// ye shes 'khor los byin gyis rlob// yul la 'jug pa'i sems brtags la/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum du brtag/ phyi rgyud yul

la dmigs pa ni// thugs kyi 'phreng ba sbyor ba khri// ming dang bcas la phyag rgyas dgug bkra mi shis pa'i thod pa ru// mtshon cha'am rus pa'i thur ma yis// rgyu rkyen drug blangs dbang po gzir// re ba zhabs ma
'khor nag dril// dbang po bsdams la zil gyis gnan// zhag gsum gzir la ling ga bca'// snying kha dpral be byang khram gdags// bcu gnyis sor gzugs dbang po thod// lag pa snying kha rid la
gnag/ dug chu tsha ba khrag gis bsku// sngags kyis gzir zhing be chen bca'// 'khor lo dbus dang mtshams dag tu// 'dod pa'i gzugs dgu dang ling ga bzhag/ ming gi dang pos bskul la bskyed// las kyi
pho nya yang yang rbad// bskul tshig dang bcas shes pa dgug kun me dud pas lha dang dbye// bdag gi dbang bsdu gzhan dbang dbrog/ ling ga'i gnas su dbang po bsdu// sngags dang mtshon cha'i thims la

blang// sngags kyi sbyor ba dkrug cing gsad// ling ga dang bcas 'khor lo dril// byang du bcug la dbang po gzir// thod par bcug la mtshon cha bskyed// spyi brteg stobs kyis gnan pa bya// bla sems mtshon
dang chags pa'i brten// phyi yi ling ga mtshon par bshad// de bzhin nang gi ling ga ni// dud 'gro'i lus la dbang po la// gnas lngar byang khram mtshon skud gdags// rkyen lnga sngags bcas dbang por

brtag/ tsit+ta'i dkyil du srog bsdus la// 'pho ba gsum gyi rten dang bcas// sngags kyi 'od dang zer 'phros pas// drag po'i gnas su gan rkyal gzhag/ sngags dang pho nyas bla bkug la// lha dang phye la drag

sngags dkrug/ gzugs la mtshon brdeg dbang po 'pho// yan lag bcas la bstab par bya// tsit+ta phyung la gnan pa bya// rgyu rkyen dgongs pa snga ma bzhin// rten 'brel 'pho ba ming dang bcas// nang gi ling ga

rten par bshad// de bzhin gsang ba'i ling ga ni// bdag nyid chen po dbang sgyur ni// rgyu ni bcud kyi dwangs ma bdun// rkyen ni 'du 'phrod g.yo dang bskyod// 'bras bu las dang grub pa'i gzugs// dbang po
srog gzungs rang gis 'brel// gdug pa rang bcas gsad pa'i rten// de la yul gyi dmigs pa bca'// rtsa sgo sbubs dang bcas pa ru// 'byung ba dngas ma'i snying po gnas// rtsa sbubs bzhi la drags po'i

sngags// mdud pa gcod pa'i spu gris brgyan// drag sngags 'od zer nang nas 'phro// 'phen pa dbugs kyi sngags kyis 'phang// shes rgyud rtsa sgo srog rgyun gcod// 'byung ba bslang dang de bzhin dkrug/ rtsa
gcad shes pa gcig tu bsdu// dngas snyigs phye la rten dang 'brel// thod pa snying po ming bcas bri// sngags kyi 'od zer bskul zhing spro// 'byung bzhi bcu drug bcu gnyis brgyad// bzhi gnyis

dbus kyi pho brang nas// yul dang shes pa spro ba yi// rang dang shes pa bskul zhing dgug/ bdud dang gshin rje'i ki kaM tshogs// rang dam snying pos rang la bsdus// mchod pa stabs la rag+ta brlab// spyug glu
blangs la dung khrag sbreng// nyes legs dbang gzugs gdung ba blang// dun ting ka yi sngags brjod la// dmigs pa'i yul la gshin rje rbad// sbyor ba'i sngags dang gshin rje yis// gsang lam sgo dgu
gnas phye la// dbang po dgu yi rten phyung la// zhing bcu sdig can dmigs pa'i yul// dbang po rnam shes bkrag mdangs bsdu// sngags pa rgyal blon stobs can// lus la gdug pa'i srog bsdus la// bdud sgo
gsang ba'i lam nas zhugs// gdug pa sgra yi 'khor lo brtag rtsa gsum dbus kyi srog shing la// g.yas na chags pa las kyi 'bru// g.yon na sdud pa srog gi rten// dbus na ming gi dbang po gnas// rtsa bzhi

dwangs ma'i sbubs bzhi na// rang gshed krI krA lta bzhi 'bar// mdud pa bzhi la gcod pa yi// spu gri mtshon cha'i rgyal po'o// si ra brgyad dbus srin mo'o// gcod dang gnon pa'i mtshon cha'o// rtsa bran sbubs

dang nang khrol la// yab yum bdud srin stobs dpag med// 'degs dang slan gyi rtsa sgo ru// sa dang chu yi snying po bstan// 'degs bskyod drod kyi rtsa sgo ru// me dang rlung gi snying po brtag/ srog sgo tsit+ta'i rtsa mo

la// tsha grang las kyis 'joms pa'o// de dag gsang ba'i ling gar bshad// gsang ba lte ba snying mgrin dang// sha khrag rus khrag dbus rus pa// klad pa gser gyi sgo dgu na// ra tsa khrag sbal lcags sdig

pa// nri dang ra ga ya ma ha// snying po bskyod dang drod yar la// chags dang rten las khrag tu gzhu// bkug la srog bsdu snying khar gzhug/ khrag sbal bzhu la rgyu bzhi bstim// me mar gsad la mgrin par

bsdu// sbyor ba bzhi bzhi bcu drug dkrug/ dwangs ma thig le ya la bsdu// tshangs pa gser gyi sgo nas dbyung/ thun mong sems dpa'i phyag rgyar bskyed/ yid la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab/ phyag rgya chen po'i
brten pa sbyin/ thig la byang chub bde lam bgrod/ dman pa'i lus la gnad gzer dbab// kun 'dus sdigs pa'i khams dang sbyar// shes pa bral na stod cing khyer// gnad dgu mi gnad 'joms sdud

yin// gnas rab 'byongs pa'i thabs dang sbyar// bdud srin sha za ki kaM bkye// pho brang thod khar bcug la gdab// brnag pa kun gyi snying po bsdu// sku gsung thugs kyi lto bar gzhug/ mi g.yo chos nyid phyag
rgyas gzir// brda gzugs mtshan ma'i brten la bstim// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang// ma mo bdud mo srin mor bcas// sha za gnod sbyin ki kaM gi/ 'khor lo rdo rje srin po'i bdag/ ma

lus rten gyi rgyu la gnas// khyams khang dur khrod mtsho gling du// spu gri bar dang mtshan mo la// pho mos las kyi sbyor ba rten// rten la rang gnas rgyud la tshang// g+hu ya rak+Sha ya ma'i klong/ b+h+yaM ha baM dza/ stAM krA
sI rA d+ya log gamana' drA gatshas/ yul gyi dmigs pa rten la sbyar// bde ba'i gnas dang sprad pa yi// yul dang rten la rgyas par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// yul la brtag pa'i le'u
ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i don bshad do// 'jam dpal yeshes sems dpa'i ya// rang nyid chos sku byang chub sems// ma g.yos bde chen thig le'u

sku// sku gcig mi g.yo cir yang snang// khyab gsal bde chen 'gyur med ngang// sna tshogs ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// lhun grub phyag rgya cir yang gsal// thabs kyis 'dul ba'i 'gro don mdzad// zug rngu mi mnga'

cir yang dgongs// mtshan dang dpe byad tshad las 'das// rig pa'i rgyal po longs spyod rdzogs// 'khro 'du sbyor len sprul pa'i sku// nang rgyud dag pa'i sku ru bshad// byang chub bde ba chos kyi sku// pad+ma bde spro

longs spyod sku// sna tshogs sgyu ma sprul pa'i sku// phyi rgyud dag pa'i sku ru bshad// rtse 'dus thig le chos kyi sku// si ra gang gsal longs spyod sku// snang srid 'khor lo rim drug spros// thabs rigs don byas sprul

pa'i sku// slar 'dus thig le bde chen sku// gnyis su med pa byang chub sku// ro mnyam mi gshig rdo rje'i sku// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya'i sku// thams cad yongs rdzogs khyab gsal sku// gsang ba thabs kyi
sku ru bshad// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa nas// bde ba'i rgyal po sngon shar kyang// dge bcu ma yengs rgyun mo gcad// thabs kyi rgyal po 'di bshad do// dus gsum mnyam nyid brdal ba yi// rig pa'i rgyal
po byang chub sems// snang srid chos rnams kun gyi gzhi// sna tshogs ngos gzung med par bshad// rgyu med 'bras bu lhun gyis grub// chags sdang la sogs lam gyi brgyan// sems las ma byung sangs rgyas
gtso// ye shes myu gu dbus mtha' rdzogs// lung med man ngag yang gsang mchog/ khyab gsal dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs yin// thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs// g.yo

ba med pa'i rgyas thebs na// sangs rgyas kun pas bgres pa'o// lta ba mnyam rdzogs 'gyur med bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// chos nyid gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par gyi thun gyis gsad pa 'di bshad do// khro bo rgyal po dregs pa yi// sku las sprul te sbyor ba ston// dur khrod sa la khru gang ba'i// dkyil 'khor nag po thod

'phreng dang// dur khrod rgyan dang me ri bya// dbus su ya las bskyod pa yi// gshin rje nag po bdud kyi gzugs// zhal gsum phyag drug ma he ro// yum dang bdud mo 'khyud pa'i tshul// mon pa'i thod par don
khrag dang// lug nag ra ro don khrag blugs// brnag pa'i gzugs dang ming yang gzhug srog bskul thun dbab las gzhan dbab// snying po'i sbyor ba ngang gis drang// yon tan rdzogs pa dbu ru

bzhag/ dbyangs kyi dang po nye ba ru// sgra yi dang po las can la// 'og nas drug pa'i gsum pas 'brel// steng nas o yis brgyan pa'o// drug pa'i dang po lnga pa'i mtha' ma nye// gsum pa'i gsum pa os steng
brgyan// lnga pa'i mtha' ma e dang ldan// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka u sha'i gsum pa drug pa'i gsum pa yang dag 'brel// de la os brgyan dang po'i gsum pa nye// lnga pa'i mtha' ma drug pa'i gsum pa
dang// drug pa'i dang po drug pa'i gsum pa la// lnga pa'i gsum pas 'og nas brgyan// bzhi pa'i gsum pas yang dag 'brel// gnyis su bos la gsum pa yi// gnyis pas 'og nas u yis brgyan// de la

gsum pa'i mas 'brel// 'og tu lnga pa'i gsum pa la// 'bya ma ha yis brgyan pa'o// bskul tshig dang bcas brten la dbab// rngam tshig lus bskyod drag tu brab// ri rgyal rbab chen dril ba bzhin// smod pa'i

rgyal po 'di bshad do// gsung gi sprul pa dregs pa'i las// thun gyi dbang po lus 'joms pa// dur khrod gdug pa'i dben gnas su// grog mkhar sa dmar ba yi lci// ro sreg sa la khru do rtsig/ khrag dang dug

gi chag chag gdab// thal chen re ga dbus mthing nag/ thod pa dgu 'phreng sgo 'khor lo// dkyil 'khor dmar nag khrag mtsho can// gtor ma sha chen gsur dang khrag/ mi rta ra khrag dug nyungs kar// thod tshal
blugs la thun du dbab// gri thod nang du ling ga gzhug/ gug rgyal chus bkru rab gnas bya// thun dbab lus bskyod gsur chen btang// dbus su khro bo'i sku bskyed la// ya las zhal gcig phyag gnyis

pa// sku mdog dmar po khrag gis brgyan// g.yon na sngo nag 'jig tshul 'khyud// rngam tshig ldan pa'i thugs ka nas// 'od zer 'phro 'du nyi ma'i tshul// de yi 'phreng ba 'di lta ste// yon tan rdzogs pa dbu ru
bzhag/ drug pa'i dngos po lnga pa'i mtha' mas sbyar// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la// sgra yi dang po gsum pas gnan// u sha'i gnyis pa lnga pa'i mthar// o steng gsum pa'i mtha' bas
gnan// rjes su gsum pa'i dang po'o// lnga pa'i gsum pa lnga pa'i mtha' steng mdzes// drug pa'i gsum pa li steng drug pa'i mtha' ma gzhan// gsum pa'i dang po drug pa'i gsum pas
ug// dgra yi dang po gsum pas 'brel// de 'og lnga pa'i mtha' ma la// gsum pa'i mtha' mas 'og nas brgyan// lnga pa'i gsum pas ming dang 'brel// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa brten// rjes su gsum
pa'i gnyis pa la// us brgyan gsum pa'i mtha' mas brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la// lnga pa'i dang po gsum pas gnan// drug pa'i gsum pa sgra yi dang po'i gsum pas gnan// 'og tu u sha'i dang
po'o// de 'og gong bzhin bod pa 'o// lnga pa'i mtha' ma o yis brgyan// sgra yi dang po gnyis pa dang// drug pa'i gnyis pas brkyang pa'o// de 'og gsum pa'i gnyis pa la// us mdzes gsum pa'i mtha' mas
mnan// drug pa'i gsum pa lnga pa'i gsum pas 'brel// de la gsum pa'i gsum pas mnan// de 'og lnga pa'i gsum pa gnyis// steng du o o 'og tu b+h+ya ma hA yis mdzes// gsum gi 'phreng ba bcud dril
nas// drag po'i thun dbab lam du gzhug/ bskul tshig dang bcas mtha' ru sbyar// thon nas bdag bsrun gzhan dbang 'phrog/ mngag pa gsung gi las su bshad// gab pa thugs kyi drag po'i thun// g.yul
bkye sa la maN+Dal bya// dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma bzhag/ ba ling bcud kyi gzhal yas su// ya las gshin rje nag po'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yum dang bcad// g.yas pa dung chen thod khrag

g.yon// glang chen stag dang dur khrod sbrul// thugs khar nyi zla'i snying po sngags// bsnyen pa sa ya 'phro 'du thim// gshin rje ma mo dbang bsdus la// gtor ma nang du 'gying bag rngam// me 'bar du ba 'gyur

ldeg khol// rtags dang sbyar la ba ling bsngo// bsdu ba gsum gyi brtan pa bya// de nas brnag pa'i rten dang rdzas// gri khrag khyi khrag rta nag khrag/ sna tshogs dug dang nyungs kar gyis// nad dang mtshon cha'i char du
'bebs// sna tshogs sha za mi mthun zugs// gtor ma thun dbab brnag pa'i khams// rgyud la lan dang dal du 'bebs// mi mthun myos dang dbang po 'chal// smyo 'bog mdze shu rims su 'bebs// drag tu

bskul zhing yul la rbad// dmigs pa'i rtsa dang srog rgyun gcod// bla dang bag chags bkug cing 'tshang// shes rgyun dran pa myos shing skyems// thon nas rlangs 'phro gtor ma 'phang// dur khrod mchod khang lha
rten gnas// skra bcings chas 'god gsur dud btang// gling bu bus la spyug pa bod// de yi sbyor ba thugs kyi bcud// dbu ru yon tan rtogs pa gzhag/ de 'og u sha'i mtha' ma la// 'og tu drug pa'i gsum
pa 'brel// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng ru brgyan// de 'og u sha'i gsum pa la// gsum pa'i dang po 'og tu 'brel// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng du brgyan// drug pa'i dang po lnga pa'i mtha' mas
te// rjes su drug pa'i gsum pa la// gnyis pa'i mtha' mas 'og tu 'brel// steng du is brgyan nga yis gnan// de 'og gsum pa'i mtha' ma la// 'og tu us brgyan mtha' mas gnan// 'og tu gnyis pa'i

bzhi pa gnyis// mtshams su 'dod pa'i ming dang sbyar// spu gri gong dang mthun par sbyar// srog la rbad rbad thun b+h+yo zhes// dbab dang 'phang ba'i sbyor ba ni// chu bo rlung chen 'bab pa dang// ri rgyal rbab chen

'dril ba dang// gser gyi gu thog brgyab pa ltar// dmigs pa'i yul dang dbang po 'joms// lus la shes pa'i dwangs snyigs 'byed// mgo dang tsit+ta phung po 'gas// snying khrag klad khrag drangs shing za// myos
pa srog dang 'bral bas na// thabs kyi rgyal po mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sbyor ba thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drod rtags 'di bshad
do// bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa'i skabs rnams su// drod rtags phyi nang gsang ba gsum// de bzhin bsnyen bsgrub yan lag gsum// kun 'grub rtsa ba gcig dang bcas// rtags kyi rim pa 'di lta ste// dang por
ltas kyi so pa ni// bdag nyid phyag rgya 'bar ba dang// chos sku'i 'od zer gsal ba drang// rang sems mi g.yo nyams dang ldan// 'od 'bar sku yi thon pa dang// nyams stobs ldan zhing dbang po
gsal// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnams// snga na med pa'i rnam pa myong// nyon mongs shes pa yul la 'bar// rang dbang med par 'tshig cing rdeg/ 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu 'tshig sngags rnams gsal

zhing 'bar zhing 'drel// blo ni mi g.yo don bzhin 'joms// lce lkog tsha la g.ya' ba dang// dpral ba'i dkyil nas kha yi rtsa// 'brum bu phra mos khengs pa dang// lus la 'du ba'i nad med cing/ kha zas ro dang

bde ba myong// rdul dang thims thibs shes par rags/ khong khro dregs shing dbang po rno// lus la drod dang g.yo ba'i rlung// skad cig sngags dang 'od la 'bar// bde ba'i dum bu snying las lte// bsnyen pa drod

kyi rtags su bshad// 'od dang du ba rlung sgra 'brug/ thog dang ser ba bu yug 'tshub// 'khor lo 'gyur dang thod pa 'char// ro dom 'chol dang me 'bar lteb// rgod dang glung dang spyugs pa 'bod// sgrub khang

g.yo zhing 'tsheg la 'gyur// yams dang dal gyi bu yug rlog/ bya dang gcan gzan 'thab cing 'khor// sku dang phyag rgya mngon du gsal// rten pa'i rdzas la si d+hi 'bebs// sgrub pa drod kyi rtags su bshad/
khams gsum bdag po ma lus pa// phyag 'tshal bskor zhing mchod pa dang// bdag gis 'jig rten dbang sdud dang/ khams gsum byo bzlog byed pa dang// gcan gzan bdag sgo srun pa

dang// nyi zla 'gag tu 'char ba dang// mi 'bying chu la 'gro ba dang// mtshon cha zas su za ba dang// me yi 'khor lo bskyed pa dang// rgya mtsho chen po spyil ba dang// rgyal blon pha ma slob dpon dang// khyi dang
gcan gzan mang po kun// byis pa'i sems can rigs mi mthun// de dag mngag pa'am pho nyar 'khol// dngos mi mthun pa'i srog chags rnams// rang rang cha byad 'dzin pa yis// ji bzhin de bzhin gzugs

ston pa// dngos dang sprul pa'i pho nya ste// gzhan yang go chas lus brgyan dang// dmag dpon byed dang dgra dgug dang// mtshon cha lag na 'bar ba dang// gru dang glang po zhon pa dang// gdugs dang rgyal
mtshan sgra sgrogs dang// rin chen 'dogs dang rdo rje gsor// rjes su mthun par bskul ba dang// nyams dang rtag bar sten pa rnams// drod rtags las la sbyor bar bshad// g.yag dang sha ba ri dwags
kun// ma lus dngos dang mi mthun gzugs// spa byed 'dogs dang gsod pa dang// sha la longs spyod 'dod la rol// g.yul 'gyed mtshon rdeg grong khyer bshig/ dngos su za zhing rol pa rnams// gsad pa

mchog gi drod rtags bshad// bya spre khyi phag glang lug sbrul// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rgyal// rA dza ya ma skabs dang sbyar// bsnyen dang nye bar bsgrub pa dang// sbyor dang rtags kyi dmigs rtags la// phyi
nang gsang dang gnad bor bas// srog dbrog gzir dang shi sa yi// bla dang sprul dang yang sprul la// skabs dang sbyar nas 'jug pa ni// drod rtags gtan la dbab par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud
las// rtags kyi la'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshin rje gshed kyi sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo bstod pa'i yon tan 'di bshad do// e ma ho/ chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang
bzhin las// ma g.yos thugs rje chen po bsam mi khyab// ma skyes skye med chos dbyings dag pa la// skye ba'i cho 'khrul sras mchog gshin rje gshed// 'gag med bde klong thugs rje'i thabs kyis rol// mi

g.yo nyams rdzogs sprul sku bsam mi khyab// che ba'i yon tan mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// yon tan kun gyis rdzogs pa'i sku la 'dud// e ma ho/ che ba'i yonatan kun la khyab pa dang// ngang gis khro bar bstan
pa 'di lta bu// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral nas smin pa'i mchog/ rin chen pad+ma rgya mtsho lhun ltar brjid// gnyis med 'dus pa'i sras mchog gshin rje gshed// skye dang bcas pa'i gzugs bsgral mtshon dpag
dka'// thugs kyi sprul pa khams gsum nyi ma'i 'od// bde ba chen po mnyam pa'i sku la 'dud// e ma ho/ dang po nyid nas gsang ba kun shes nas// rig pa gsum ldan ga pa dgu yi
gnas// sbyor ba gsum gyis yang dag bsdus nas 'phen// bla med 'chog la don gnyis bsdus nas len// nam mkha' rin chen 'bar byed cing// dus gsum 'jig rten mnyam pa'i sku// ma lus bstan pa'i

snying po don// stong phrag bdun dang brgya phrag lnga// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po mchog la 'dud// e ma ho/ phyogs bcu kun nas 'dus pa yi// ye shes rgyal po thig le 'di// gsang chen rmad du byung ba 'di// rgyu

'bras las la zhen pa la// 'phrul gyi snying po rno dpal mtshon// kam pa'i spu gri so le ma// rdo rje be con sdigs mdzub chu// bzhi dang yang bzhi rdzogs la 'dud// e ma ho/ 'gro ba las kyi myos pa yis// rgyu drug
'khor ba'i sems can rnams// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa yi// ma skyes gdod nas rnam par dag/ ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i bcud// thams cad ma lus chos kyi dbyings// don dam spros pa kun las
'das// ye shes rgyal po rdzogs la 'dud// e ma ho/ phyogs bcu dus gsum snang srid kun gyi gzhi// skye med g.yo 'gul bde dang sdug/ bcu dang bzhi sogs sdig pa can// las dang shugs kyis 'khyams ba'i
'byung dang rten dbang bzhi// lnga dang drug brgyad gnyis bsdus nas// sdud pa ma la gcod pa yi// gsang bcud len pa'i mchog la 'dud// e ma ho/ dug gsum e yi pho brang du/ khams gsum mchog gi las

bsdus nas// srid gsum gnad kyis gdung ba yi// 'gro ba las kyis mi khom pa// phung po rdo rje rtsa dwangs ma// snyigs ma'i 'dod lha mnyes mchog skong// ma yengs goms pa'i las dang sprad// las kyi rgyal po

rdo rje 'dud// e ma ho/ 'gug pa 'gug dang bkug nas 'gugs// sgrol zhing sgrol la sgrol mchog bsgral// sbyong zhing sbyong la gnas sbyang sbyong// grol nas sbyangs pas gnam thob rdzogs// oM gyi ye shes las

byung bas// sku dang rigs dang ye shes rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung ba// don dang rang gi mtshan nyid rdzogs// ma yi ye shes las byung ba// sgrol sbyor sdud dang phyag rgya rdzogs// me yi ye shes las byung

ba// bde ba sdud ba'i yon tan rdzogs// ta yi ye shes las byung ba// thugs rjes sgrol ba'i chags pa rdzogs// k+She yi ye shes las byung ba// snang dang bskyod pa'i 'phrin las rdzogs// ra yi ye shes las byung
ba// sreg dang smin pa'i drod dbang rdzogs// tsa yi ye shes las byung ba/ khams gsum gsal ba'i nyi ma rdzogs// sa yi ye shes las byung ba// dri la thogs med dbang po rdzogs// lto yi ye shes las byung
ba// dwangs ma sdud pa'i yon tan rdzogs// ru yi ye shes las byung ba// ro rnams rgyas dang gsal ba rdzogs// na yi ye shes las byung ba// stobs chen drag pos 'joms pa rdzogs// yo yi ye shes

las byung ba// sku dang cha byad dregs pa rdzogs// na yi ye shes las byung ba// dus gsum mi g.yo mnyam pa rdzogs// ra yi ye shes las byung ba// tshor ba dri yis 'joms pa rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung

ba// ro mchog 'dod ldan bde ba rdzogs// tsa yi ye shes las byung ba// spyan dang ldan pa'i gsal ba rdzogs// na yi ye shes las byung ba// sgra dang lnga pa'i dbang po rdzogs// hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba// sdud pa

dbyings su thim pa rdzogs// dza yi ye shes las byung ba// 'gugs shing rang dbang 'dren pa rdzogs// phaT kyi ye shes byung ba// mngag pa las kyi pho nya rdzogs// sngags kyi yon tan bsam dpag dka'// 'dren

pa las kyi sbyor 'phreng gcig nus pa phye na du mar 'dren// yon tan du ma e ka thogs// rgyal po 'bru thus gser gyi las 'bru// yon tan rdzogs pas seng ge 'dren// sbyor ba khra spyang kyo pa ta// 'phreng sngags

rin chen ming bcas yul// dbang sdud phyag rgya stobs dbang 'phrogs// rten pa'i snying po chong chen brda// me rlung mtha' gcod spu gri sba// mda' thogs 'khor lo ral gri zer// stobs chen sa gzhi ri rab

brtag/ 'byung ba'i rdo rje las sna tshogs// sha za srin po las dbang sdud// sngags kyi 'phreng ba brjod ming bca'// 'byed pa'i tshul gsum las mtha' rdzogs// sbyor ba'i stobs chen dpag tu med// phyi rgyud
gzugs brnyan 'khor lo la// rgyu rkyen thabs kyi yon tan rdzogs// rtsa rgyud nang gi 'khor lo la// dwangs la 'dus pa'i yon tan rdzogs// gsang ba dbyings kyi 'khor lo la// lam dang thabs kyi yon tan
rdzogs// lhun gyis grub pa'i 'khor lo la// snod bcud 'jig rten 'byung ba rdzogs// rten 'brel srid pa'i 'khor lo la/ khams dang skye mched dbang po rdzogs// dkar dmar brda yi 'khor lo la// dbang dang
byin rlabs sbyong bgrod rdzogs// sman pa yul gyi 'khor lo la// rno sbal sngags dang mtshon cha rdzogs// ru sbal gdug pa'i 'khor lo la// ma lus gso 'joms yon tan rdzogs// mnan pa thod pa'i 'khor lo

la// snying po bsdus don rab tu rdzogs// rkyen dang thabs kyi 'khor lo la// 'brel ba gsum gyi yon tan rdzogs// yon tan rin chen rgya mtshor bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// 'khor lo chen po la
bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis las kyi shan pas gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dang por mos pa'i sa phyogs su// dur khrod rgyan dang zhing bshams la// dpa'
bo don snying khrag dang sha/ sha chen gtor ma dud chen gsur// gshin rje sku dang thod pa'i gzugs// stegs bu gru bzhi dbus drag po// 'brub khung rtsang dang rgyu rkyen drug/ bcas la sku yi bsnyen pa
'bum// thon nas las kyi bsnyen pa bya// sa ya'i grangs la dgug pa 'bum// zhing lpags gdan la khro bo'i sku// rgyan dang byin rlabs dbang bskur bstan// mchod bstod la sogs gsang sngags dang// las kyi

ya ma 'bum sde yang// gshed po lto 'phyang sku la bsdu// gtso dang gshed po 'du pa yang// tsit+ta'i gsang ba'i zla dkyil nas// ya ma hU~M las khro bar bya// rin po che yi steng sgo nas// gsang lam pa thag rtsa brgyud
pas// bcu bdun snying po 'od du 'phro// dus gsum gshin rje thugs khar thim// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan las// slar 'dus sgo gsum bag chags sbyangs// bde gshegs sku dang gnyis med brtan// sku

dang ye shes gong bur bstan// grangs kyi tshad ma thon pa dang// ya dang ma las rno dang myur// lcags kyu lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// srog gcod gshin rje lto 'phyang dang// ma mo gtum mo thal mdog ma// 'bum sde
'khor dang bcas pa rnams// nus pa lus dang bcas pa yi// tsit+ta'i snying po dwangs ma dkrug/ khro bo'i dbang du bka' nyan 'dus// thod pa'i gzugs brnyan rten la bstim// lus kyi dbang po gnag la

rtsub// lto 'phyang mgrin pa yangs la rngam// yan lag rags la gdug pas brgyan// zhal gcig mche ba gtsigs shing bzhed/ kham nag ral pa thod sprul brgyan// mcho ma kha chu rak+ta dug/ g.yas g.yon me rlung

'khrug pa yi// rtsibs stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo rnams// thugs khar gdug pa'i rims nad bskyed// sku la g.yang gzhi thod sbrul stag/ gtum mo smug nag dug hrul gyon// thod sbrul gyen du skra brdzes ma// phyag na

'khor lo ba dan bsnams// dug gi rlangs pa nad kyi sprin// mtsho 'khrug pho mo'i dbus na 'gying// yab yum phyag rgya gsal bar bsgom// phyi nang drod dang ldan pas na/ sbyor ba drug po'i las la 'jug/ gang

rung thod pa kha sbyor la// steng 'og thod pa 'khor lo bri// dang por gtsang mas thod pa bkru// skams la sme ba lnga yis byug/ rten drug rdzas kyi thang pa bya// tsha ba gsum dang dug chus gnan// de'ang gcod pa'i

'khor lo ni// gnag tsha gdug pa'i khrag dang dug/ g.yas pa'i mchog chen thur mas bri// yang na gsad pa'i smyug mas bri// rang gi dbang pos sbyor ba bsdam// dang po mu khyud gsum du bskor// lte bar gru
gsum oM dang ya// khyud dang po 'khrul mig brgyad// phyogs bzhi'i dang por 'jug pa ma// gnas gsum rnal mar ra tsa bdun// mtshams su gru gsum nri dang ming// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcuganyis la// g.yas
phyogs rnal ma'i bskor phyogs su// ting rmugs kha rag shrI de ma ra ma ya rbad// yab yum snying po sbyor ba ni// bsad cing mnan pa mtha' yis bod// phyi rim bcu drug yang logs la// 'khor lo rgya
gram ral gri bsnol// mtshon chen dbus na gsad pa dang// gnon bar sbyor ba'i sngags rnams gnas// 'bum tsho bzhi ru gsad la sbyar// thod mkhar rten sbyor khro tsho gcig/ rko ba stong ste gnon pa
brgya// 'khor lo bar du sten pa'i ming// gro ga dag la khrag gis bri// gsod pa bar du kha sbyar bca'// 'og ma g.yon bskor sngags rnams bzlog/ ming rus thod pa dar gyis gril// dbye dgug gsad pa'i

sbyor ba bya// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i lus gcig la// yan lag 'dod pa bzhin du brdeb// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs ye shes rngam pa las sngags 'di bton to// oM ya ma rA dza dun ti

rmugs kha rag shrI de ma dum ra ma ya hU~M dzA dzA/ oM ya ma rA dza dun ti rmugs kha rag shrI ma dum ra ya rbad/ u mu ka nI A kar+sha ya hU~M dzA dzA/ a mu ka srog mA ra ya rbad/ oM a mu ka srog stam pa ya nan/ dang po'i sbyor

ba'i gzhan du gnas/ 'khrul 'khor sbyor bas gsad pa ste/ ya yum 'dus pa'i pho brang na// bskul ba'i gshed kyi snying po dbyung// mtshon cha'i rgyal po gcod pa'i mda'// bcu bdun sngags kyi lus po la// 'bru
lnga gcod pa me dang 'dra// mtshams su a mu ka la bsdu// ting 'dzin stobs kyis gzhu bdungs la// sbyor ba gsum gyi gnad kyis 'phen// 'bru lnga 'dod pa'i stobs kyis gnan// gnan pa'i sa ni gnyan

bo'am// bka' rten rab gnas ro khang du// khru do khra bo stobs kyis gnan// dur khrod g.yam pa gru bzhi la// rgya gram 'khor lo ri rab bri// nam mkha'i phyogs nas 'khor lo gnas// pho brang ri rab 'byung ba'i
stobs// las kyi rdo rje dang bcas bskyed// bar du brgya stong khri yis g.yo// gsad pa mchog la sbyar bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// las kyi gshin rje nag po yab yum gyis gzer te gtad
pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshin rje de'i yang 'khor bdud gsod byed nag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dur khrod dben pa'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal dug dang khrag gis

byug/ lug gam mon pa yang na rta// gri ru gsad pa'i snying sbram la// rgya shog sngags kyi sbyor bas dril// phyi rim bzlas pa'i snying pos bri// sngon po'am mthing nag dur khrod dar// snying gi sbyor ba tshas byas
la// mtshon sna lnga yi dra bar gzhug/ g.yag ru dang bcas dbus su gzhag g.yas su gshin rje'i gtor ma ste// bdud kyi gtor ma gru gsum la// nag po'i snying snas brgyan pa g.yon// rgya shug dang bsres
gsur chen gtang// rang lus gshin rje'i skur bsgoms la// sngon du 'gro ba 'bum du bzlas// thon nas bdud sgrub byed dus su// maN+Dal nub tu drag po'i nas// khru gang brkos la skyer tsher

bstan// dur khrod sol bas nag por byug/ 'og tu dung chen gling bzhi la// rdzas kyi sbyor ba gong bzhin byug steng du khram gyi thod pa la// rdzas kyi sbyor ba de bzhin las// nag po tshogs pa'i khrag gis

byug/ dbus su rdo rje rgya gram la// lte ba drag po e yi gnas// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// steng la ri rab mtha' mar ldan// 'og gi mtha' mar drag pa'i gnas// gru gsum lnga la ming rus bri// 'og

ma'i phyi ru me rlung 'bru// steng ma'i phyi ru nan zhes bskor// dri ma drug gi ling ka la// ra khrag ming yang ldan par gzhug/ 'khor lo thod pa'i bar du gzhug kha sbyar nang nas thun rdzas brab// steng du bdud kyi

gzugs brnyan gzhag/ de la sku bskyed nag la khros// snum la rab tu 'tsher bag che// spyi bcings 'od nag thod du bcings// g.yas su spu gri khram shing g.yon// 'od gnag gos dang 'ja' tshon brgyan// rlung

nag tshub ma'i steng na gnas// yum dang srin mo'i bu mo ni// dmar nag mchi ma khrag tu 'dzag/ g.yas pa gri gug g.yon pa snying// khra sprad lto ba sbyar bar gnas// tsit+ta gnyis la snying po gnas// bzlas pas

bskul bas bka' bzhin nyan// lci 'thibs rul la khro na rtags// than nas sgra sgrub sbyor ba bya// dug dang nyungs kar ske tshe yis// thun brab 'khor lo'i mtshon cha bskyon// gong bzhin khri tsho bzhi bzlas
la// mtha' ru dmigs pa'i mkha' rim ni// mu ma bcud kyi dkyil du gnan// sgra sgrub rgyun gyi dmigs pa ni// bdag lus 'od kyi gong bu las// bzlas pas gzas pa'i spyi bo nas// gnam lcags zhun ma'i

gser btab nas// myos shing khrag ru skyug par byed// bskul bas bdud kyi sngags spros nas// gzas pa'i tsit+ta gnam sgo phye// mtshon cha'i thog dang lce phab nas// srog dang snying gi rtsa sgrog bcad// dran pa mi
gsal shes pa 'pho// shes pa yi ge gnyis la thim// ang ku sha zhes gnas su dgug/ pra be sha yis lha dang dbye// A kar+sha yis rten la bstim// rag ga hU~M gis khrag tu bzhu// srog la rbad kyi sbyor bas
bsad// hU~M/ ston pa gshin rje bdag la bstim// bkrag dang gzi mdangs 'phrog la gso// nri dang ling ka 'khor los gcod// gsad pa'i sbyor bas smra gcad la// rtsa ba bzhi la yan lag brgyad// sbyor ba

skabs dang ldan pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsad pa'i sngags 'di bton to// hU~M ru thuM dun baM rag shwa ma la baM ril dza/ srog ni dun rbad/ 'khor lo mtshon cha bcu gnyis lus/ mtshams su 'dod pa'i
a mu ka/ rgya gram gnon pa'i spu gri bzhi// hU~M ni srog nan dbang po stam pa ya phrol khug e nan/ lus dang mtshams su 'dod pa sbyar/ rten gyi snying khar phur pa gdab// rten dang byang khram bcings

la gzhug/ thod pa dar dang re bas gril// dur khrod gling du sa sros gtad// bdud dang gshin rje'i pho brang gdab// gsang ba'i las kyi mtshon chas bcod// gsod byed pho mo'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me

long gi rgyud las// bdud nag po srog gcod pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kha stong nag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ngam gling brag dang sa phug tu// stegs bu gru bzhi pho brang

gdab// steng du gru gsum chag gang brtsigs// gzhi ma ser po de steng dmar// gru gsum nag po'i thod pas bskor// zur gsum rtsang gi rtse mo snying// zhing gi bla re zhing chung 'phen// sbrul dang thod tshal keng

rus brgyan// sha chen dang bcas gtor ma bsham// lho yi phyogs su gshin rje la// dug dang rme khrag sna tshogs 'bru// sbyar ba'i gtor ma ma mo la// gru bzhir rak+ta'i ban d+ha bzhi// steng gi sa gzhi zlum po la// rme

khrag yug mi bsad pa'i khrag/ nyungs kar ske tshe tsha ba'i rdzas// thal chen dug dang lcags phye rnams// thod tshal gsum du blug la bskor// bal tshon sna lngas thun kha bcad// gru gsum dbus su thod pa ya// mon

nam mtshon ngan gling mangs su// dmigs pa'i ling ga byang khram bcas// sngon dmar bsdams la thod par gzhug/ khrag gis bkang la tshon sna lngas/ kha nas rgya gram dag tu bcungs/ steng du mdzes pa'i lcang lo

ru// snying dang bdud rtsi na chung khrag dar gyis kha bcad ma mo bstan// ma mo bos la mchod pa btab// khri tshe lha bsnyen dgongs pa bya// lcang lo mdzes pa'i pho brang du// ro yi gdan la sa bon ma// bskyed pa'i

gsang sngags 'di brjod la// ru traM baM ma ma kha rag dun ting b+h+yo// bskul ba'i rkyen gyis sku bskyed la// smug nag 'gying ma mo lpags gon// sbrul dang thod pas dkris shing brgyan// ral pa nag po za ru

khrag/ spyan mig gru gsum mchi ma dug/ zhal dang mche ba spu gri so// snyan cha sbrul la shangs nas rlung// ba spu chu la smin ma me/ kha dang snying kha ste gsang nas// nad do cog gi rlangs pa 'pho// rngam pa'i sgra ni b+h+yo

dang rbad// sha chen khrag la rol cing za// thugs kar zla ba rdo rje ma// bzlas par bya ba'i 'bru yis bskor// khro bo'i sngags dang 'phro 'du bya// mun nag mtsho yi dkyil nas dgug/ bsnyen pa'i grangs ni sa ya

bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa 'di bton to// oM ma ma snying khrag rtsa la mug mug dun dun b+h+yo dza dza/ rdzas la bos la gzugs la bstim// las kyi ma mo srin mo'i
tshogs// sha za mo dang gnod sbyin mo// klu mo dri za mo yis bskor// gtso la phyag byed snying po dbul/// bsnyen pa'i rtags de rab tu bshad// rbad pa 'bum du sbyor ba bya// dam rdzas gtor ma kha che

la// khrag brlab 'o dod ma mo bod// brnag pa'i rus dang rus la rbad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las rbad pa'i sngags 'di bton to// ma ma rtsa srog snying la breng breng// sham sham dgra

bo'i srog la dun rmugs b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ nag mo 'khor dang bcas pa yis// dmigs pa'i lus phung gshig nas kyang// tsit+ta phyung zhing lo ma stobs// de tshe gsad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// yang na dmag gi ru mtshon

'phyar// las la tshud pa'i rtags su bshad// dam rdzas ban d+ha shar phyogs su// gzhag la thod par thun rdzas brab// dmigs pa dag dang ma mo'i tshogs// mtshon chas gtubs shing khrag gis bran// rdzas rnams
mtshon cha'i char du dbab// ma mo brnag pa byad du tshud// mtha' ru srog gcad tsit+ta 'byin// ma la brnag pa'i byang khram btab// thun gyi rdzas rnams bsres la brab// khrag la rlangs 'phros gzugs
la thim// dmigs pa'i snying du bu ga gnas// nang gi rtsa bcad khrag tu mdzag/ gsang sngags khri tsho bdun du bzlas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las gsad pa'i sngags 'di bton to// ma

ma snying la dun rmugs// dgra bo'i srog myogs rbad// rang dang ma mo'i sbyor ba las// ma mo zla mtshan rgyu dus su/// bsnyen pa'i dgongs pa ldan par bya// khri tsho bdun gyis las la sbyar// brdeg cing 'phang ba'i
sngags 'di bzlas// gsad pa'i mgo dang mjug gi zor// thun mtsham drag tu khrag la bstim// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las thun sngags gsang ba 'di bton to// ma ma snying rtsa dun

mugs// srog la breng breng shag thun b+h+yo// thon nas ling ga gtor ma btab// thun khrag thod par zor du 'phang// nam phyed gung chung sa sros la// dbang gzugs thun lam lus bskyod 'phang// lus la khro bo'i

sngags kyis bsrung// ma mo'i klad dkyil ste gsang snying// khrag mda' thun gyi lpag chen brdeg/ thun sngags sbyor bas gsad par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ kha tong nag po thun gyi le'u ste sum cu
gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nag mo'i zhal gyi bsgrub pa 'di bshad do// gsang ba'i gsang bcud sbyor ba'i mchog/ gsang bcud dngos grub rin po che// 'jig rten thun mong phan pa'i
bcud// mtshon cha'i rgyal po khrag gzer dbal// nag mo len byed srin mos gsod// sbyor bas gsad pa'i mchog tu bshad// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// gnyan ra gdug pa'i dben gnas su// dur khrod sa la
stags bu khrag gis byug paM skud bsangs la sngags kyis thig gdab brtsam// gru gsum zla kham thod pa'i 'phreng ba zlum// rgya gram dbus kyi snying po drag po gnas bzhi ldan// thod skam 'phreng bas

mdzes pa'i gru chad sgo// rdo rje me ri tshon sna gsum dang ldan// zhing gi bla re 'phan phran rus pa khrag/ dar nag g.yang gzhi yol dang mthing nag gur// sna tshogs g.yang gzhi klubs pa gru bzhi rgyan du

dgram// mtshon ldan lcang lor snying gsum lnga dang gzugs// zhing ras dbang bskur ldan pa'i pho brang dbus// dpa' bo'i don dang snying khrag ban d+ha shar// ku ku na chung don khrag ban d+ha lho// tsa ra shel nag don

khrag can dang nub// khyi nag snying dang nag khrag can dang byang// gzugs la rab gnas ldan pa rten du dgram// ma dang rag mo bzhi las sku ru bskyed// gtor ma dang bcas mchod pa'i yo byad bsog/ khyad par

dbang po lnga dang ne le su tra'i sha/ 'bru sna shing thog bag zan dang bcas la// drag po'i gtor ma snying gis brgyan pa lnga// rak+ta gsur dang byang shar gru chad ldan// thod pa khrag sna byang khram brnag pa'i

gzugs// bskul ba'i snying pos brab pa'i sbyor ba drug/ gdab pa'i rdzas lnga sbyor ba'i mtshams su 'pho// dbang po lnga la gzer gdab drag tu bskul// gru bzhi ban d+ha rgya gram phur pa khrag/ mtha' mthun

rdzas thos pa'i ling ka dbus// bskul ba'i snying po 'dod pa'i mtshams su sbyar// lha yi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// bdag gi rang bzhin ya ma'i sku// zla bar 'bru gnyis sngags kyis brgyan// rten la 'bru gcig

zla bar bcas// 'phen len sbyor ba 'phro zhing thim// gnyis kyi sku la rang dbang bsdu// gtso bo mchod la khrag la bod// ma mo mchod bstod dam tshig dbog/ ba su thugs kha'i rtsa mal spro// drod dang rtags la

phab la bsdu// thon nas dgra sgrub khrag la thim// dam rdzas snying sna dbus su sogs// dbus kyi ban d+ha steng du gzhag/ 'og tu drag po'i thod pa gzhug gzugs brnyan 'phos la phur pa dgod// rgya gram ban d+ha

khrag dang ldan// gru chad bzhi la gzhag la brab// mtshan mo dang por rbad la dgug/ dbus kyi drag po rten la bstim// gung dang nyin mo thun du dbab// drag tu bskul zhing dbang du bsdu// khrag khrol rlangs pa

'phro na 'phang// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi mchog 'di rnams bton to// oM tad+ya thA rag mo trag rag+sha ma hi srog la dza dza/ trag rag sha ma hi dun b+h+yo/ re ma ti dgra bo'i

snying la thum ri li li b+h+yo/ trag rag sha ma ti dun mugs dgra bo thum ri li li dza srog mA ra ya rbad rbad/ trag rag sha snying khrag rtsa rbad rbad baM ril thun b+h+yo/ bdag dngos ya ma ka la ya'i// phyag rgya chen po rab
gsal bya// snying po bskul la lha mo dgug/ dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal bskyed// ma mo dbang bsdu brnag pa dbab// mA ra ya yis myos shing dpral// srin mo tshogs bcas gtod cing za// dgra
bo'i lus srog bsdus shing 'brel// rnam smin sbyang phyir bskang gso bya// mdos dang mkha' lding shel nag rgyus// ma mo rang dam gtang rag gso// sre'u la sogs gso ba kun// mdos dang mkha' lding bdud

rtsis mchod// tshogs dang gtor ma dus drug bsngo// sbyor ba rnal ma'i mchog tu bshad// ma mo'i dbang du bdag song na// rkyen dang cho 'phrul la slar log na// maN+Dal gru gsum sba gam bshan// mthing nag

dmar po mtha' ma ser// rtsang dang snying sna ldan pa la// bag zan ma mo chag gang gzugs// ral pa che ba nag mo la// snying khar gru gsum mtheb gang bru// ma dang srog gi snying gi gzhug/ steng du ban d+ha snying sna
gzhag/ mdos dang rak+ta maN+Dal brgyan// rak+ta brlab cing ma mo bod// gzugs la phab la ma mo gzir// dam dbog mna' chu bdud rtsis gso// srog dbrog gzi mdangs bskyed la rbad// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las drag po'i gsang sngags 'di bton to// ya ma rag mo trag rag+sha// ma ma hri hri dza dza/ shrI ya ma a pa ye dun hril/ ma ma trig nan srog gzir/ ya ma rag mo ma ma sa ma ya

tsit+ta ho/ ma ma trag rag+sha/ nag mo srog dun dun breng breng khams rmugs ma ma hU~M dza dza/ trag rag+sha mu tra snying phyur baM ril/ srog tig breng shag rtsa srog dbugs khyer kha tham rbad/ khyad par gsad pa'i sbyor ba
yis// ma mo rang dam gzir zhing rbad// snying kha'i sngags gdon ming byang gzhug/ mtha' ru gzugs te byang shar dgram// dam rdzas bkram la rtag tu mchod// gzugs la brab la dgra la rbad// brnag pa'i

gzugs phung me ru 'bar// srin mo gcod cing sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// nag mo zhal gyi thun sgrub kyi le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcu gnyis kyis bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba 'di
bshad do// gsang ba'i gsang bcud 'di la ste// las kyi rgyal po 'khrul 'khor 'di// gsang ba'i lam chen bcu gnyis bsdus// gsang sngags brda yi phyag rgyas dgrol// 'brug byed tsit+ta'i sbyor ba
dang// 'joms pa'i 'khor lo mtshon cha can// snying po gsum gyis bdud pa'i mchog/ bcu gnyis tshul gyis rim pas dbye// brgyad dang drug gnyis rten bcas pa'i// sbyor ba 'phen pas ya la spro// snying po
bsdus pas ma yi thog/ bde bas spros pa'i gnas su bstim// rag+sha ya ma'i baM klong nas// gsang ba'i bdag pos 'dod pa'i ming// bskyed pa las kyi rgyal po yis// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rgyas par
mdzad// thabs kyi rgyal po stong nyid drug/ bcu dang ldan pa'i las gsungs pa// gsal bas rig pa'i sgrol ma'o// de yi rim pa las kyi mchod chen kyang// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra de la// drag

po las kyi mthar bya na// dus ni rang byung rtsol ba la// bskul ba bzhi dang sbyor ba gsum// yul la dmigs pa'i bsnyen sgrub mthar// dngos grub sid d+hi gsum mthar sbyar// bdag dbang bstim dang sbyor ba

brtsam// tsakra su r+yas ya ma'i dkar// ma hA gu h+ya man tra'i bstan// phyi nang 'khor lo gsang ba'i 'dus// rgyu dang rkyen dang sgra dang las// bca' ba'i thabs de lnga ru bshad// yul la phyi nang gsang ba

gsum// dbang po dod pa'i ngo bo dang// rgyu dang bcas dang sgra dang las// don lngas mtshon pa brnag pa'i las// de bzhin gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyu/ ngo bo sgra dang drang dang dkrug/ las dang gdags pa mtha'

ru sbyar// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du gsungs// de bzhin su r+ya gsum dang lnga// sgra dang ngo bo gnas dang las// rgyu yi tshul te nyi ma bshad// gshin rje phyi nang gsang ba gsum// ya ma gsum 'dus thugs kyi

bdag rang gi ngo bo rgyu dang sgra// las dang gnas dang gsod pa'i tshul// de yis gshin rje'i grong khyer du// 'gro ba bkug cing khrid nas 'chang// srid gsum 'jug sa ya ma'i gnas// byin brlabs 'byung phyir
ting 'dzin gtso// ya ma ra yi d+ha sgras 'joms// pho mo'i mtshan nyid g.yas dang g.yon// 'gro ba'i mchod sbyin sbyor bas gcod// sngon 'gro 'od dang gsal me tshig/ gsang rgyud brda yis bshad pa'i
lung// bsnyen bsgrub las mthar spogs dang sbyar// lus ni nyon mongs spyad pa las// dngos grub mchog dang 'jig rten nye// dus ni lo'am zla ba 'am// de skabs lo phyed dag tu bya// bka' thub gsum dang

ldan gyur na// dus kyi bsnyen pa rnam grangs te// sngon du 'gro dang las la sbyor// ya ma dgug dang mtshan ma gsum// dus tshod nges par 'grub par bshad// de bzhin grangs kyi bsnyen pa dang// bye ba'am khri stong

brgya'i grangs// 'di dag tu ni grangs kyi dbye// bsnyen pa las sbyar gsad pa dang// thod pa bca' dang gnan pa'i skabs// na ya grangs kyi tshad mar bshad// 'od sgra du ba bzhad pa rnams// de yi rnam pa bshad

pa lta// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa chen po rnams// bsgrub pa dngos kyi skabs dang sbyar// dgongs pa'i don chen gang la yang// bsnyen na dngos grub rnam gsum thob// de ma yin na

dngos mi 'grub//// drag po las kyi mtha' bya na// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo rab// dngos grub thob baM bsnyen pa rdzogs// 'khor lo me dang gnan la sbyor// de ma yin na rang la ldog ma la ya dang dgu 'dus
rtse// dur khrod chu gling gnyan ra'i shing// bde gnas mchog tu ya ma'i klong// nag po dug gi snying po dang// yi ge 'bru shag grong khyer na// mun nag 'dra ba'i gshed po yi// de yi lto ba dag na
gnas// srid pa gsum yang de na gnas// de phyir srid gsum 'jug par bshad// 'khor ba thog ma tha ma med// 'jam dpal dpal gyi sbyor ba yis// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed cing// srid pa'i dra ba

'joms pa po// bcu pa'i sbyor ba'ang rgyu yi tshul// ting 'dzin sbyor ba rkyen du bstan// thabs ldan spyi rgyug bar bar sbyar// shing rta 'am chu yi 'khor lo bzhin// rgyu dang rkyen gyi sbyor bas 'khor// g.yon bskor

'og nas gcod pa ni// chu yi 'khor lo dag dang 'dra// g.yas bskor steng nas gcod pa ni// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo dag dang 'dra// de yi rkyen gyis lte ba 'khor// lte ba'i stobs kyis rtsibs dag 'khor// gcod
pas mtshon cha'i rgyal po'o// bgrod pa gsum gyi gdeng ldan pa'i// lha yi rnal 'byor thob pa yis// drag po gsad pa nyid la sbyar// de man bskal pa med pa yis// lha ni gnad la dbab pa dang// ro langs
srid pa'i lto dkrugs dang// rim bzlog sngags kyi gnad dgu bsdeb// mtha' ru spyi brdeg gam 'greng hol// ye shes rdo rje 'khyud pa yi// lcags sogs las kyi mtha' ru sbyar// thod par rabs chad nag

po'am// ngag dig klan klen bkra mi shis// mu za mdze can yugs mo phag mdzo rtol ra tsa dred thod pa// sngo dmar mkhar nag sum bsgril skra// chu dar zhabs ma re thums gzhug lha khang mchod rten ri khang

mu// dur khrod gnyan sa go mal them// lam srang khang srul cher snod sar// snying po ri rab dang bcas pa'i// ya ma sku gsung thugs kyi ltor// dmigs pa gang yin legs par gzhug/ phyag rgya stobs dang zil

gyis mnan// sbyor ba sngags kyi rim pa ni// yi ge slang dang gzer bzhi gdab// lha bskyed mnga' dbul 'khor lo gso// mtshon cha ngar blud byin gyis brlab// bsrung dang dbye ba'i las la sogs// ting 'dzin

rgyal po rkyen gyis 'grub// the tshom le lo g.yeng ba yis// sbyor ba brtsams na don mi 'grub// 'khor lo ldog pa'i rgyu bshad pa// lhag chad rnal 'byor nor dang 'bres// re ga thig 'byor dri ma gos// rgyu rkyen
'byor men ldog par bshad// de bzhin khyam pa'i rkyen bstan pa// gsang sngags nan chungs 'dzab ma rdzogs// bsnyen pa'i bka' bsgo las gnyer chung// las tshogs yan lag gtad spogs nyams// las mi
byed de 'khor lo khyams// bsnyen bsgrub dkyil 'khor la brten nas// gsad pa'i 'khor los gsad byas na// gnan pa'i sbyor bas nan tan bskyed// des kyang dmigs pa gcod par byed// des kyang gcad
bya ma chod na// las dang sbyor ba'i spogs pa bya// gsang sngags mtha' rdzogs gnyan por gnan// sbyor ba des kyang ma chod na// ro langs nag po'i sbyor bas dkrug/ rang las skyes pa'i sems
bton la// dmar nag yul la 'khor lo bca'// thabs dang shes rab lto bar gzhug/ 'gros stabs brgyad kyis dkrug cing sbyar// mtha' ru drag po'i hom gyis mnan// rtags rnams byung yang ma bton
na// dmigs pa bzad kyang rtag tu 'khor// mi mnyam mgo log re mig nor// lta ba'i sbyor ba bzhi ma bzlog/ gnad dgu ma yengs gnyen po g.yengs// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo sbyor ba bzhi// rdo rje rgyal po sbyor
dang bcas// yang dag gab pa'i 'khor lo min// sbyor ba rgyu yi brda gzugs can// bde ba gcig gi lam dang ldan// thabs mchog gsum la 'di sbyar yin// 'di man sbyor ba nyams par 'gyur// thabs ldan

sbyor ba'i mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sgrub pa'i gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// ya ma ka
la'i las dmigs la// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yis// dbang dang 'brel ba'i rim pa la// sngon 'gro rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// sbyor ba kun la 'di bshad do// gshin rje nag po sgrub 'dod pas// lho yi
phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// shin tu dben pa'i dur khrod dam// brag dang sa phug dag tu ni// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// phyi rim zla kham dmar po bzhi// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu ldan pa bri// skam
rlon thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang// sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan pa la// rdo rje dang ni me ri 'bar// dbus kyi gru gsum mthing nag la// 'jigs pa'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// sku yi gzugs brnyan dgod par
byed// g.yas su sgeg mo ral gcig ma// g.yon du za byed pe ta li// yab yum sku mthun 'khril ba bskyed// mdun du ya ma rA dzA yang// sku mdog sngon po 'jigs tshul can// thugs ka dag na gnas pa

bskyed// spyi bo lkog mar phyag rgya'i gzugs// dmar nag yul dang bcas pa'o/// zla kham dmar po mdzes pa la// kri tra ta bzhi yab yum bcas// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du bskyed// bla 'gugs pho nya bcu po
yang// 'khor lo bcu yi rtsibs dag la// rdzogs pa'i tshul du gzugs brnyan dgod// rtsibs chen bdud po de bzhin gnas// sgo bzhir bse mo de bzhin dgod// des ni gzugs brnyan dgod pa yin// yang
na snying po yig 'bru la// khrag 'thung 'khor bcas skur bskyed do// de ltar dkyil 'khor bshams nas ni// gtor ma gsum dang a dkar bcas// rgyan dang ldan par dgram par bya// yod byad thams cad
yongs rdzogs dang// sngags pa chas gos nag po gon// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// skur bskyed rgyan dang ldan pa yi// khro bo sngags kyis mtshams bcad de// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rims

gyis bsgoms// khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// spyan drangs mchod dang bstod pa dang// bshags pa dag ni gzhung bzhi bya// bsnyen pa'i drod dang lung thob nas// gtor ma btang la dkyil 'khor

bsdu// dur khrod dpa' dang bcas pa yi// shun chen gos dang thod pa la// tshogs par sbyar ba'i snag tsha yis// kang ka'i sgro'am bya rog sgros// dgra yi rkang rjes chu phud dang// bong bu'i bdud rtsi mchil snabs

dang// ba yi lci ba sa dmar dang// mkhar dkongs rnams la 'bag ru bya// phyi rol ra yi khrag gis byug ri sho dang ni gro ga la// de yi rus dang ming bris la// gshin rje yab yum 'og tu gzhug/ tshon gyi skud
pas bcings nas su// mtshan ngan ban d+ha kha sbyor du// bcug la bud med yugs sa mo'i// skra yi thag pas bcings la gzhag/ gtor ma la sogs gzhung bzhin bsham// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi 'chad// de

nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyis// khro bo rgyal po gshin rje gshed// snying po sngags kyi yum dang bcas// rtsa ba khrag 'thung rdzogs par bskyed// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs la// gnyis su med par stim

par bya// bstod cing mchod pa phul nas ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'phrin las bcol// mar zhag bgrangs pa'i tshes brgyad de// nyi shu gsum nas drug tu ste// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ste// ya ma ta ka'i bsnyen pa

bya// dgongs dang tho rangs gtor ma gtang// nyi shu bdun nam gnam stong du// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ni// gsad pa las kyi sbyor ba bsdeb// bdag nyid khro bo'i skur bsgoms te// sprul pa gzhan tshogs las

la dgye// lho phyogs kha bltas mdun du ni// hom khung gru gsum rtse mo lho// chag gang thur du brkos pa la// ri mo bsregs pa'i sol ba yis// kha dog nag po dag tu bya// de yi nang du ban d+ha gzhug/ de yi steng
nas thod pa dgab// bar du gcod pa'i 'khor lo bca'// dmigs pa'i bsgrub bya gnas su gzhag/ gshin rje dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// khro bo zhabs ni g.yon pa yis// rdo rje'i phur pa rtse gcig

par// bsgoms te gshin rje'i snying khar gnan// dgug cing dbang du bsdu ba yi// snying po sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni// nyin mtshan phye la mtshan mo bzlas// gshin rje nag po 'khor dang bcas// rang dbang med

par dbang du 'gyur// ji lta bcol ba'i las kyang byed// snying po sngags kyi bar bar du// khro bo'i bstod pa gtang bar bya// rak+ta bstabs te mchod pa 'bul// gshin rje'i las la btsud nas ni// dgra bo myur du
gsad pa'i phyir// ban d+ha'i dkyil 'khor thog tu gzhag/ bcol ba'i las kyi sngags bzhi ni// nyin mtshan phye la nyin mo bzlas// sngags kyi bzlas brjod bar bar du// rdza rnga brdungs te gshin rje

bod// rak+ta sbrengs te mchod pa bstab// 'khur ba bus te spyugs glu blangs// dun ting ka yi sngags brjod la// dgra bo de la gshin rje rbad// phur pa btab la ral gris gtub// dug lnga gcod dang bstabs pa

bya// gtor ma btang la lha rnams bsdu// tshes gcig tu ni brtsis pa yi// nyin mtshan gnyis kyi mtshams su ni// gnan pa las kyi sbyor ba bya// steng la snying po 'og tu ming/ kha sbyar gcod pa'i 'khor lo'i
bar// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza yi// mchog gi phur pa sor gsum la// gnan cing gzir ba'i sngags bzlas la// rdo rje phur pa rtse gcig par// bsgoms te ling ga'i snying khar gdab// gshin rje yab yum lto
ru gzhug/ mtshan ngan ban d+har bcu gnas su// snga ma bzhin du thag pas bcings// gnan pa'i ban d+ha de nyid la// ri rab bang rim gsum pa na// snying po lam dang bcas pa bri// gnyan ra la sogs gdugs
par gnan// las kyi gnas smin sbyang ba'i phyir// bskang gso cho ga rgya cher bya// thod pa drag po kun gyis bskyod// ma grub spogs pa bzlog pa bskor// 'khor lo hom 'brel drag pos gcad// ye shes 'khor

lor phyag rgya bsrung// dkyil 'khor kun gyi rtsa bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las drag po'i

sbyin sreg 'di bshad do// mchog gi sbyor ba las gsungs pa// sa gzhi nag po dug chus bran// khru gang gru bzhi'i stegs bu la// khrag dang dug gi byi dor bya// hom khung gru gsum kha khyer gsum// nyi shu rtsa drug

bcu gnyis tshad// rtsang dang thod pa rdo rjes bskor// gru chad sgo bzhi dur khrod brgyan// phyi rim mi rdo rje ri ldan// gru gsum dbus su rgya gram la// phyag mtshan tri shul rtse gsum dgod// sna tshogs sme ba'i rdzas

kyis byug/ mchod pa'i rdzas rnams nag por dgram// dug shing bse shing tsher ma can// rtse mo zur gsum nyi shu gcig/ sbams la khrag bsku ming byang gdags// 'khar nag bcings la dbus su gzugs// bag phye dug

phye ri lu brgya// ming byang re dang ldan par bya// sha chen mar khu til mar khu// tshil sna ling kha bsreg rdzas ldan// nyungs kar nyungs nag til shang tshe// rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye thal// khrag sna dug sna thun

gyi rdzas// zhun chen nim pa bong bu'i chu// bya tshil phag sha dri chen skra// dri chu rus pa bla sha mar// bsres la ri lu lha yi grangs// gzugs dang ming yang gong ma bzhin// lha bskyed rtsa ba'i khrag 'thung bsgom// me lha
gsos la spyan drangs mchod// bsreg rdzas phul la bstod pa bya// pho nyas bkug la ling ga gtub// bstab pa'i tshul gyis ri lu dbul// khrag dang mar khu dug chus bran// sngags bzlas gsang
ba'i 'phreng ba gdon// dbu ru yon tan rdzogs pa gzhag/ de 'og u sha'i mtha' ma la// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas 'brel// dbyangs kyi gum pas steng du brgyan// de 'og u sha'i gsum pa la// gsum pa'i

dang pos 'og tu 'brel// dbyangs yig bzhi pas steng du brgyan// lnga pa'i gsum pas bdun pa'i mtha' mar 'brel// dbyangs kyi brgyad pas steng du brgyan// sgra yi dang po drug pa'i gsum par 'brel// steng du
dbyangs yig bdun pas brgyan// gsum pa'i dang po gsum pa'i mtha' gnyis te// sdud pa'i snying po gnyis dang ldan// skrod pa'i nag po yi ge gsum// thugs kyi 'phreng ba bsreg pa'i lus// kun gyi dbu ru

lus te khri// drag po'i dus su sbyor ba'i gnad// de yi 'phreng ba 'di lta ste// dang po u sha'i gsum pas bstan// drug pa'i dang po lnga pa'i gsum par 'brel// gsum pa'i mtha' ma u sha'i gnyis dang nye// der

yang drug pa'i dang po bsnan// u sha'i gsum pa gsum pa'i dang por 'brel// thig le'i steng du lnga pa'i mtha' mas brgyan// lnga pa'i gnyis pa rlung gi snying por nye// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ spu gris
gcod pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'bru dgus gcod pa'i gong ma bzhin// bsreg pa'i 'bru bcu rkyen dang ldan// drag po dur khrod gtsug mer spar// thal ba la sogs gnan la zor// 'phang ba 'bru gsum gnad pa
drug/ de yi las kyi mtha' ru rdzogs// drag po bsregs pa'i sbyor bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe bsgrub pa 'di bshad do// 'jam dpal thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rigs dang bcas pa'i ga'u

la// steng du sku yi bcu bdun la// tshe yi 'bru drug 'dod pa'i gsum// nyi shu rtsa dgu'i yig 'bru gang// dmar ya dngas pa'i snag tshas bris// 'og mar tshe yi rten lnga bcud// rang 'byung 'chi med snum dang 'bru/

kha sbyar 'bru lngas rgyas gdab dril// gzhal yas khang gdan dang lha rnams bskyed// spyan drangs la sogs pU dzas mchod// tshe yi bsnyen pa khri tsho brgyad// nyin mtshan thun gsum mchod bstod bzlas// tshe yi snying

po gnas nas drang// 'od 'bar dri dang dud rlangs sku// thob nas tshe yi ga bur bstim// dngos grub bdud rtsi dbang bskur la// snying pos bskul zhing sbyor bas bstim// phyag rgya chen po brtan par sbyin// bkra
shis tshe yis glu dbyangs brjod// 'jam dpal tshe yi bsgrub par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kha 'chings kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// yang dag don bor log
lta spyod// bka' yi bstan pa bsrung ba dang// lha yi nus pa ya ma byin// srin po sde brgyad ma mo'i yams// mu stegs sngags byad mdze rigs thogs// sbrul gdug ser ba gcan gzan klu// dus

min 'chad pa gsul 'gyed dgra// lto bzlog yang snying bka' bzlog 'ching// dus min 'byung ba nang 'khrugs dang// lta log phyag rgya'i stobs zhan na// 'khor lo chags lugs phyag mtshan thun// phyag rgya rgyan

cha 'dug stangs bzlog/ gnod byed thar bskyal dug mnga' dbyung// mkha' 'gro gzan dbab rang gshed bskor// de yi sbyor ba'i 'phreng ba ni// dbu ru yon tan rdzogs pa gzhag/ sgra yi dang po gnyis pa'i dang

por nye// dbyangs kyi dang po e dang ldan// gsum pa'i dang po lnga pa'i gnyis par nye// drug pa'i mtha' mar u sha'i gsum par nye// gsum pa'i dang por drug pa'i gsum par 'brel// lnga pa'i gsum pa gnyis
pa'i gsum par nye// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas 'brel// lnga pa'i mtha' ma drug pa'i gsum dang po// lnga pa'i gnyis pa e stengs rgyan// gsum pa'i dang po lnga pa'i mtha' ma gnyis// 'og ma us brgyan u
sha'i mtha' ma bsnan// sgra yi dang po'i gnyis pa'i steng bdud brgyan// drug pa'i gsum pa gnyis pa'i dang por 'brel// lnga drug bar gyi khyung 'phyang bstan// gsum pa'i dang po drug pa'i gsum par
'brel// gnyis pa'i gsum pa drug pa'i mtha' mar nye// skrod pa'i nag po bsnan pas yang dag brtan// gdug pa'i kha'am gcan gzan kha// bzlas pas nus pa'i stobs rnams 'ching// rang gi phyag rgya bstan

pa yang yang bskyed// sngags pa'i 'og gam ya ma'i lto bar gnan// gdug pa'i kha 'chings lto log sbyar bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po kha 'chings kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// de yi sbyor ba

'di lta ste// khyad par rdo rje gsang ba yi// snying po 'khrul gyi sbyor bas bcings// rdo rje srin po gshin rje bdud// ma mo dregs pa gnod byed kun// lo dgra rims gshed 'byung ba 'khrugs// gcan gzan gdug

pa srog chags 'ching// dang por skye med rdzogs par bstan// de 'og nam mkha' chos 'byung las// rlung sdud dges byed skar ma'i 'bru// las kyi mthu sdud chu yi rgyun// gshin rje ma mo srog mdangs ma// thams
cad snying gzer rang dbang sdud/ kha 'ching stobs gnon snying po gnan// drag po sngags kyis kha 'chings shing// rdzas kyi sbyor ba tshogs pa dang// mtshan ma rtags kyis phebs pa yi// lus la gsal ba'i

rgyas thebs na// dus gsum rgyun du kha 'chings yin// 'di ni drag po'i sbyor ba bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pho mo dbang po 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ni rang chen po'i sogs pa la// khro bdag
chen po'i sku bris la// shes rab phyag rgyas mchod dbang bskur// khro gcig sbyor ba gnyis su bya// sa gsum pho mo dod pa'i gzugs// sor brgyad bcu gnyis pho mos dod// dbang po dang bcas
'dod pa'i ming// sku yi ltor gzhug gdug pas bcings// dkar dmar sngo ba'i chas kyis dril// ga'u bcug la drag sngags bzlas// bdun khri thon nas khri yis sba// go mal them srang bla gnas sar// srod

dang tho rangs nyin mtshan phyed// pho mos 'dod pa'i yul dang sprad// nyi zla gang 'dod bsdebs la sbyar// sems phyi dri ma dkar nag bca'// 'dod pa sngags kyi 'phreng ba ni// he ka du na ra ma dzA ya sarba ni dun tri

pa ha nan phaT/ ya du ka he ru na dza ma ra wa sha trun ni dza bung nan/ nyi ma pa sangs mig dmar phur// rgyal smad smal po smin drug khrums// tshes gsum bdun dgu bco brgyad stong// pho mos 'dod pa'i sbyor ba
nye// ma yi g.yas g.yon sngas dang 'phongs// gcog bu spyi gtsug gnam par bstan// lus can dbang po 'pho ba ni// phyag rgya gsang ba'i bdag dbang bsdu// tshe dbang 'dod pa'i ming nas bod// gzugs

khams ma yi lus la gzud// thabs rnams ldan dang mi ldan las// bya ba kun 'grub thabs kyis mchog/ pho mo 'dod pa 'pho bar 'gyur// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// mchog gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu
rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bdug rang la bskor ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// drag po stobs dang dbang dbrog pa'i// sbyor ba'i rgyal po rang dbang 'joms// gnad dgus thabs
mchog ldan par byed// gsang ba'i gsang ba sngags kyi gnad// rdo rje srin po sbyor ba'i gnad// lto zlog srid pa rang 'joms gnad// rang bdud mtshon cha bzlog pa'i gnad// dregs pa dbang chen dgug pa'i
gnad// stobs kyi bdag pos gzir ba'i gnad// gzhan sngags rkyen gyis bskul ba'i gnad// phyag rgya rang dbang dbrog pa'i gnad// mkha' 'gro gzan la dbab pa'i gnad// gnad dgus mi nag 'joms

sdud yin// sbyor ba'i sngon 'gro rten gsum dang// sa gsum tsha ba dri chu khrag/ sbyar la 'phul gyi 'khor lo bca'// yugs sa pho mo'i zhabs ma la// rme ba lnga yi thang pa bya// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khrul 'khor
bca'// snying po bcu bdun skabs kyi pho// dam rdzas bcu bdun rten dang sngags/// 'pho dang sbyor ba skabs kyi 'gyur// mtshon cha byin brlabs ngar blus gso// gshin rje nang gi bdud bskor na/ kha gnon

gshed kyi sbyor ba sdebs// dbang sdud spu gri bzhi ltor sbyar// dbus su gzir la ya la bsdu// rang gnad bzlog la dbus nyid gsad// ya nas drangs la a mu ka/ spu gri mtha' ru ya la bskyal// rnal mar sbyor
ba nyi ma bzhis// gshin rje'i rgyal pos sngags pa 'joms// yang dag 'pho ba nam mkha'i khongs// mtha' ru gam 'greng dgu bskor gnan// gshin rje'i rang gshed bskor bar bshad// ma

mo thams cad ma la ba bskor// ya yi gnas su ma bzhag la// de bzhin ma yi gnas su yang// rgya tshil bung bu gtor ma rdzas// bcu bdun 'khyil ba sbrul gyis 'gros// ma nas grangs la sgo bzhir 'jug/ nyi ma
bzhi la 'pho ba bzhi// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ spu gri dang bcas ma la bstim// ma dang shes pa nam mkha'i khongs// mtha' ru drag po hol gyis gnan// thun gyi 'khor lo bskul zhing gso// rims dal
yams kyi char du 'bebs// ma mo rang gshed bskor bar bshad// bdud kyi sbyor ba slar bskor na// ya yi gnas su da 'phos la// da de ya la dbang po 'pho// da nas gtor la nyi ma bzhir// lus srog dbang
po 'joms shing 'pho// mtshan mo dril la rbad cing dgug dbye ba dang bcas gzugs la bstim/ gnan pa rdo rje'i lcags dang sbyar// da dang shes pa mi g.yo brtan// bdud kyi rang gshed bskor bar
bshad// srin po sbyor bas rang 'joms na// ya dang ra de go rjes 'pho// ra nas mgo drangs bar la bskyal// bcu bdun dril la sgo bzhir 'jug/ mtshan mo rbad dang dgug pa dang// dbye ba spu gri skabs su

gdags// sbyor ba bzhi brgya mtshan gsum sdebs// nyi ma bzhi yis gsad dang 'pho// a mu ka dang spu gri sbyar// ra dang shes pa 'byung ba bsdu// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbyings su 'phang// gnan pa stobs kyi bdag

pos bya// srin po'i rang gshed bskor bar bshad// btsan gyi sbyor ba rang 'joms ni// tsa dang ya ru go brjes la// tsa nas sbyor ba bzhi ru drangs// mtshan mo dril ba nyin mo gtor// sgo bzhi la sogs gong ma

bzhin// gnan pa po tshul de bzhin bya// btsan gyi rang gshed bskor bar bshad// de bzhin sbyor ba kun la sdeb// the rang k+Sha ya nam mkha'i khongs// zhi khro oM dang ya la sbyar// phur pa mkhan la ta dang ya// bcu
bdun pa gnyis lto sdebs la// rgyal ba kun gyi thig ler gzhug/ phu bdag ru dang de bzhin ya// rigs 'dzin yo da ya la sbyar// srog dang mdangs 'phros gnas la sbyar// rgyal blon slungs can ni dang
ya// slungs rta khams kyi ka pa bcag/ gzir gsum drug gnyis gsad pa'i las// bsdeb pa bcu gnyis mtha' ru bskyal// bdud mo me dang de bzhin la// mu stegs do dang ya la sbyar// sa bdag sa dang de

bzhin ya// gnyan dang klu la nA ga sbyar// gri thod btsan la rma gri sbyor// nal thod lha rten rnol thog sbyar// phag thod dmar mchog gdug pa'i sar// mdze dang lhog pa phol la sbyar// khram thod gnyan la smyo 'bog
sbyar/ kha sbyor bka' rten rims dal sbyar// spyang khu thod chen zhabs ma blang// the rang sum mdo rgya gram sar// pho log gzer thabs lkugs dang g.yang// sbyor ba gcig gi rkyen bzhi slong// bcu

gnyis tshul gyi rkyen drug 'joms// de dag rdo rje gsang ba yi// sbyor ba kun gyi mchog tu sngags// las kyi rgyal po rdo rje yi// ma hA gnad mda'i sbyor tshul bstan// rten drug pho mo lto sbyor lus// pho tshul gsum
gyis las mthar sbyar// rang nyid phyag rgya bdag po'i lus// stobs chen dregs pa'i sku gsal bya// ye shes khro bo 'khor lor bcas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od stong 'bar// brjid pa'i sku la bstan pa
bskyed// khro bo sngags kyis bka' thub bsrung// thun mong sgrub pa'i bca' bzhi brtsam// khyad par sku dang sngags kyis gzir// ye shes nyi ma'i 'khor lo brlab// gzer bzhi gdab pa'i sngags bzhir

bsgyur// sku gsung thugs kyi lto bar gzhug/ khyad par drag po'i gnad dgu yin// rang gshed bskor ba'i 'khor lor bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// rang bsdud rang la bskor ba'i le'u ste so drug
