pa'o//// de nas ya ma ro langs kyis// rdo rje 'chang la gus btud nas// spyi bo zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// bka' yi bstan pa rgyas pa'i phyir// rtsa ba'i sbyor ba bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas 'khor la gzigs te/ gshin rje gshed rtsa ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// 'khor lo rgyal po mtshon chen 'di// dkon mchog rgyal po'i sku dgra

la// rim pa lnga dang ldan pa yi// gshed bdag chen po'i 'khrul 'khor bskor// sbyor ba'i rgyal po 'bru bsdebs la// kam pa ral gri spu grir bcas// me chu stobs dang rlung gis 'pho// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta
ste// bsgrub pa las kyi bsnyen pa ni// e du na yi srin gnas bzhin// shri man dza 'brel bsdebs la// mgo gcig nag po dbus nas gzung// rlung me chu sa nam mkha' gdab// mu khyud gnyis po'i sgo nas

bzung// me dang lto 'phye sna dang chu// lce dang rna ba lus dang dus// me dang rlung dang lta byed dus// rnal mar rjes su bskor bas ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sngags sbyor yin// dbus nas mtha' ma bdun pa'i

par// rims nad rims kyi mgo drangs te// yon tan rdzogs pa rgyal ba'i 'bru// kun gyi dbu ru ldan par bzhag rlung dang me dang me lta byed// sna dang chu dang de bzhin sgra// nyi ma dang po'i drag sngags bdun// de

bzhin me gnyis lta byed sna// chu dang sgra dang de bzhin rlung// gsum pa me dang lta byed sna// chu dang sgra dang rlung dang me// bzhi pa lta byed sna dang chu// me dang sgra dang me dang rlung// lnga pa sna dang chu dang sgra// rlung dang

me gnyis lta byed brtag drug pa chu sgra rlung dang me// me dang lta byed de bzhin sna// bdun pa sgra dang rlung med gnyis// de bzhin lta byed sna dang chu// nyi ma dang po drag sngags bdun// gnyis pa nye

ba'i sbyor ba dang// gsum pa gnad kyi sbyor ba dang// bzhi pa rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsad pa drag po'i sngags su bshad// de bzhin dbus kyi klong bu mig/ 'brur 'gro 'gro mangs 'gro stabs kyis// drag
po gshed kyi mtshod chas gcod// rin chen yi ge gser gyi 'bru// dril bas ngar blud ur mo'i thog/ bsdebs pas rgyal po las rtog 'grub// de yi sbyor ba rgyas bshad pa// rlung dang me sgra reg bya

gnan// gnyis pa rlung sgra de bzhin reg/ de bzhin nam mkha' me la sbyar// gsum pa rlung dang nam mkha' me// de bzhin sgra dang reg byar sbyar// bzhi pa rlung dang reg bya gnam// de bzhin me dang sgra ru

bsdeb// nyi ma bzhi yis 'joms pa'i las// mtshan mo nam mkha' reg bya sgra// me rlung dril bas nub dang po// gnyis pa reg bya nam mkha' sgra// me dang rlung gi de bzhin thog/ gsum pa sgra dang nam mkha'
reg/ me rlung sbyar ba gong ma bzhin// bzhi pa me dang nam mkha' reg/ sgra dang rlung gi las rnams rdzogs// dbus kyi stag chen 'jug rum gyis// gshed bzhi gsad pa'i sbyor ba bshad// sbyor ba'i yan lag

drag po ni// dus kyi sbyor ba bzhi pa ste// sgrub pa gnad la phebs pa la// rin chen rgyal po gser gyi 'bru// sbyor ba drag po thabs kyis sdebs// dril bas 'khor lo mtshon chen tshul// brgyab pas ya thog bdud
kyi las// rin chen stobs kyis ngar blud pas// bde ba'i stobs kyis 'phangs gyur na// su zhig gang yang 'joms par byed// drag po ngar blud stobs kyi 'bru// stag mo mchong ba'i stobs tshul gyis// bsdebs

pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// seng ge kha thab mche sbyar ba'i// drag po'i 'bru btus 'khor lo'i sngags// chu srin rgyal mtshan brdabs pa bzhin// gzung zhing brgyab pas mi 'chor byed// drag po'i rdo rje mo yi
sngags// bskor ba'i 'khor lo de bzhin te// phyogs nas phyogs te phyogs bzhir dril// mtshams nas mtshams te theg gzugs su// rims kyis de bzhin bskor ba ste// thog mar dbus nas thog drangs

te// rlung dang me ru nye bar sbyar// de nas thad kar phyogs gcig te// 'joms byed rdo rje lcags su sbyar// de nas rim pas g.yon phyogs te// rin po che yi yi ge bzung// de nas de bzhin phyogs su ste// spor
ba mi yi gsal byed blang// de nas thad ka'i phyi rim phyogs// las kyis sprod pa'i rlung du sbyar// de nas thad ka'i phyogs mchongs te// las kyis sdud pa'i yi ge blang// de bzhin rim pas g.yon phyogs
kyi// 'degs pa'i snying po yi ge sbyar// de nas de bzhin phyogs su ste// ya ma las kyi snying po blang// de bzhin thad ka'i mtshams su ste// sdud pa nag po'a'i snying por sbyar// de nas de bzhin thad
logs la// ho ban srog yin las gnyis bzung// de 'og de bzhin rim pa las// the mo las kyi snying po bzung// rim pa de bzhin phyogs 'gro las// rtsa ba sdud pa'i yig 'bru sbyar// de 'og de bzhin thad

logs la// gan tsi ti ngan yig 'bru sbyar// de nas nag po'i yig 'bru nyid// rgyal mtshan 'dzugs pa'i yi ge bzung// de 'og kun gyi bskul ba yi// 'dzin pa spros pa'i yi ge blang// der rjes de bzhin tshul

can las// ho ban drag po'i snying por sbyar// de yi dang po'i sbyor bar byed// gnyis pa nye bar sbyor ba dang// gsum pa gnad kyi sbyor ba dang// bzhi pa rdzogs chen sbyor ba yis// 'phen sdud 'khor phyogs de
bzhin te// de ni rnal ma'i sbyor ba ste// stag mchongs drag po'i 'khor lor bshad// de bzhin g.yas su bgrod pa ni// dbus su ta la 'gro stabs kyis// mgo gcig rims kyis 'phen par sbyar// rdo rje gsang

ba kun po'i sngags// drag po sbyor ba'i rim pa yin// stag gi mchongs pa'i sbyor stabs nyid// rim pa gzhan yang mchog nyid de// gsang ba rdo rje sngags kyi tshig/ gsang ba rgyud kyi bcud len la// thar pa'i thar
pa ma lus 'joms// bka' yi gsang ba 'khor lo 'bru// nag po 'bru thus bdud kyi tshig/ drag po bsdus pa sbyor ba'i mchog/ yan lag ldan pas ma lus bskyed// b+hi la'i khong 'dus khong dregs can// 'di yi
sbyor ba'ang sngar bzhin te// dbus nas thog drangs phyogs dang phyogs// mtshams la sogs pa thad tshul rims// snga ma de bzhin rjes 'jug ste// thad logs stag gi mchod pa dril// de nyid rim pa bzhin du

ni// phyir la de bzhin bskor bya ste// 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba'ang g.yas su dril// sbyor ba'i rgyal po stag mchongs 'di// de nyid rim pa 'di lta ste// b+h+ya ran b+ha b+hi b+h+yaM ya ka pra pa r+Shi dang ni a k+Sha dang/ b+h+ra ni dang ni

d+ha na ha/ ag ni dang ni rna dang gaa ne sbyar/ de bzhin b+hu ra dang ru dang/ tsan khrU dang ni g+ha n+ta ni/ rims kyis dzi ta hu ru pa ste/ de bzhin thad dkar dmar n+ha sahar sbyar/ de nas tsit+ta ma bu ste/ de dag de bzhin

rim sbyar te// rdo rje srin po'i sbyor ba yin// de bzhin lhag ma'i sbyor ba yang// rin chen gser gyi yig 'bru la// rdo rje srin po'i yig 'brus bskor// drag po rgod kyi yig 'brus btu// mthun pa'i stobs sbyar
tshig gi lam// drag po'i sbyor bas gnad dgu byed// rim pa snga ma de bzhin te// g.yas logs rta lam nag po 'gros// nag po 'bru gcig thog 'gro ste// dbus kyi 'bru bzhi rim pa yis// 'bru 'gro mgo
mangs stobs kyis brdeg/ phyag na rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor 'di// gnod sbyin srin po'i 'khor lo yin// drag sngags gsum gnyis gsum dang ldan// spu gri 'khor lo rim sbyar te// skabs kyi sbyor ba

bstan par bya// btab pa'i thig gis 'joms byed pa// rten drug gnas nas gdon pa'i phyir// thog ma'i 'bru gnyis dor byas te// 'bru drug sbyor ba bzhi ru bya// gnad lngas sgo lnga gzhom pa'i phyir// 'bru lnga

'bru bzhi'i sbyor bzhi bya// rtsa gsum gnad dang rten bzhi gsum// 'joms byed drag po'i yig 'bru gsum// bde byed tshangs pa'i gnas nas 'debs// sbyor ba gsum gyi rtsa bar bshad// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa

las// yon tan rdzogs pa rgyal ba'i 'bru// kun gyi thog mar sbyar la drang// me dang lta byed sna dang chu// sgra dang de bzhin rlung du sbyar// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ nyi ma dang po'i sbyor ba yin// gnyis pa chu

lce rna ba lus// reg bya rlung la 'dod pa sbyar// gsum pa lus dang dus dri ro// nam mkha' rlung la 'dod pa'i ming// bzhi pa ro yid gzugs dang dri// de bzhin me dang rlung du sbyar// 'dod pa'i mtha' ru dgu

bskor gnan// tshogs drug dgag pa'i 'khor lor bshad// rten lnga 'bru lngas 'joms pa ni// dang po lta byed sna dang chu// de bzhin sgra dang ro la sbyar// gnyis pa lce dang rna ba lus// de bzhin reg bya rlung la

sbyar// gsum pa gzugs dang dri dang ro// de bzhin nam mkha'i rlung la sbyar// bzhi pa yid gzugs dri dang me// rlung dang a mu ka ru sbyar// phung po lnga yi rten bcom nas// bde ba'i gnas dang sbyar bar

bya// dug gsum sbyor ba gzhom pa'i las// dang po dri dang me dang ro// gnyis pa chu dang sgra dang rlung// gsum pa lus dang reg bya ro// bzhi pa ro dang nam mkha' rlung// 'dod pa'i ming dang spu gri sbyar// dug

gsum gzhom pa'i 'khor lor bshad// rgyu bzhi rtags kyi sbyor ba ni// dri dang mi dang rlung dang dri// yid dang me dang rlung dang gzugs// rlung dang me dang dri dang ro// me dang rlung dang dri dang me// sbyor ba bzhi yi
las rdzogs pas// bya phag khyi sbrul bla rtags 'joms// drag po stobs kyi 'khor lor bshad// dang po'i las la shis pas te// phyogs bzhi mtha' nas dbus la sbyar// drag po dgu yi gnan pa bya// 'phen pa

med pa'i rdo rjer gsungs// rgyu ba med pa'i 'khor lo yin// 'dzin byed ma lus 'ching ba po// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba ste// rim pa rnal ma'i 'bru bsdebs pas// drag po mchog gi las 'grub yin// ma ra ya

ni gsad pa'i mchog 'phrul mig lnga'am bcu bdun la// dang por rgyu bzhi'i 'khor lor bsdeb// bslang dang dkrugs dang bsdu ba'i las// rten las shes pa 'pho ba ste// dang po rlung me sgra reg bya// nam mkha'i
rgyal po 'dod par sbyar// gnyis pa rlung sgra reg bya gnam// me la gang 'dod a mu ka/ gsum pa rlung dang reg bya gnam// me dang sgra la 'dod pa sbyar// bzhi pa rlung dang nam mkha' me// de bzhin

sgra dang reg bya sbyar// 'byung ba khams kyi nad bzhi yis// khrag rlung bad kan mkhris pa slong// rgyu bzhi rtsa ba'i 'khor lor bshad// gnyis pa rgyu bzhi dkrug pa ni// me dang nam mkha' reg bya sgra// sgra dang nam

mkha' reg bya me// reg bya nam mkha' me dang sgra// nam mkha' me dang reg bya sgra// drag po spu gri bzhi sbyar na// rgya bzhi dkrugs la khams bzhi dbab// rgyu bzhi dkrugs pa'i 'khor lor bshad// brtan pa bzhi

yi dwangs ma bstim pa ni// sna dang rna ba me dang dri// 'dod pa spu gri chu la skyel// gnyis pa chu dang reg bya sgra// lce dang 'dod pa me la bstim// gsum pa me dang nam mkha' yid// lta byed spu gri rlung la

bstim// bzhi pa rlung dang dri dang lus// dus dang spu gri nam mkhar bstim// dwangs ma bsdus la nam mkha'i khongs// skye med bde ba'i lam dang sprad// mchog gi sbyor ba'i 'khor lor bshad// sbyor ba las kyi
stobs zhan na/ kha gnon stobs kyis 'khor lo bskor// ye shes ya ma'i phyag rgya bstan// dam tshig 'khor lo bstan par bzung// lha yi 'khor lo legs thob nas// ye shes 'khor los byin gyis brlab// de yi

rim pa rgyas bshad pa// phyi rim kha gnon gsum pa ni// 'bru bsdebs 'phreng ba'i sbyor ba ste// rim pa du ma nus pa yin// phyi nang bar dang ldan pa yi// de dag so so dang po'i sgra// 'phreng ba sku yi sbyor ba ste// de

nyid 'phreng ba rim pa bzhin// bskod pa ji bzhin sbyar ba ni// rgyal blon sha za gang yang rung// dkar po'i phyogs la sdang ba rnams// myur la bskrad cing med par 'gyur// rengs pa la sogs kun kyang byed// a

kro te ka ha na ma tha ya man ta ka b+han dza hU~M phaT/ rkyen dang ldan na sbyor ba'i mchog de dag kun gyi kha gnon yin/ de bzhin dang po'i phyogs nyid nas// mtha' ma de nyid thug gi bar// re re bor zhing gsum par
bsdebs// bcu bdun rdzogs pas mchog gi las// a ha kro na te ma ka ta ya ban man dza ta ka hU~M dza dza/ nyi ma shar ba'i stobs bzhin du// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gnyis por gsum
pa nas// re re bor zhing gsum par bsdebs// bcu bdun rdzogs pas mchog gi las// te man ha ta hU~M kro ya ka ma dza ya ka ta na ban phaT dza// srog bdud gshin rje stobs chen rnams// ma lus bsnyen pa'i
mchog yin te// rgya mtsho rlabs bzhin shugs kyis drang// dang po'i mtha' ma gnyis gnyis dor// de bzhin rdzogs par bsdebs bya la// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub rnams// ma lus 'gugs par byed pa
ste// dbang du bya ba mchog tu bsngags// te ban da dza ta man ya kro ma ka ta na ta na phaT/ hU~M oM/ de yi rim pa tshul rnams kyis// skabs dang sbyar bas ma lus 'gugs// pho nya mgyogs byed

bsngags shing 'brel// khyad par sbyor ba dgug pa'i mchog/ khyad par sku yi 'phreng ba yis// ku pa ta yi rim bzhin du// gsad pa'i sbyor ba nyi ma bzhis/// sku yi rtsa ba mchog bsdus yin// lus cig sbyor ba

bzhi ru bsdeb// ma te ta na/ ya ka ban ni/ man dza hU~M phaT/ kro d+ha kA ya/ rno dpal spu gri bzhi dang ldan// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ sbyor ba'i bdag po kun bdag nyid// khro bo bcu dang srog bdud
bzhi// mchog gi mchog nyid yab yum bcas// ma lus 'khor bcas 'dzin pa ste// bsdus pa gcig gi sbyor ba yan// sbyor ba'i stobs dang rkyen brel na// drag po'i 'khor lo rim bzlog bya// mchog tu las

byed 'jug byed de// gzhom pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin// spogs pa'i skabs su sbyor ba ste// rnal ma'i sbyor ba'ang stobs kyis 'grub// de dag 'phen pa'i sbyor bas 'grub pa'i las// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang
po nas// gnyis gnyis bor zhing bzhir bar bsdebs// kro ma ka ru ni/ ma lus dbang du bsdu ba'i mchog/ gsum gsum bor nas bzhi bar bsdeb// ma te ta la pa/ rten gcig rgyud las dbye ba'i mchog/ de bzhin
bzhi bor lnga bar bsdeb// a ka bag ni// thams cad myos par byed pa'i mchog/ bzhi pa dor nas drug par bsdeb/ sha ni ru pa hU~M phaT/ bkug pa ra byed pa mchog gi las/ 'gro dang dbus dang mtha'
bcas la// ma lus rdzogs par bsdeb pa ni// las drag 'dzin pa'i dmigs yin te// yan lag mchog gi sbyor ba las// rim pa bzhinadu byed pa'o// gzhan yang thugs kyi sbyor ba'o// rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po

nas// gnyis par gsum dang bcu pa bsdeb// b+hi na hU~M phaT/ bskrad pa'i sbyor ba kun la shis// dang por bor la gnyis pa dang// bzhi pa drug pa brgyad pa bsdeb// sti kri a na/ dbye zhing smyo ba'i las la

shis// dang po lnga pa bdun par bsdeb// skrod pa'i yi ge dag dang ldan// hri ta na phaT/ 'bog cing dbang po 'chal la shis// de bzhin gcig bor gnyis blangs la// bcu phyed sbyor bas gsad la sbyar// sti kri
a na phaT// gsad pa mchog la shes pa'o// yan lag brgyad dang rtsa ba gsum// bsnyen dang nye bar bsnyen pa gnyis// mchog gi sbyor ba bcu gsum ni// ma lus nye bar sgrub pa yin// 'di dag sbyor ba dam pa

ste// nam mkha'i dngos ltar kun khyab cing// rgya mcho'i 'jing ltar bsam dpag dka'// nyi ma'i 'od ltar yongs gsal te// chen po bzhi ltar kun smin byed// rin po che bzhin gang 'dod 'byung// thog mar rgyu
rkyen ldan pa yi// 'bru btus sbyor ba'i 'phreng ba nyid// yon tan ma lus rdzogs pa ste// gzhan ni phyogs dang phyogs la rten// sbyor ba kun kyi sngon 'gro'i mchog/ ma lus 'grub pa'i mchog tu
bshad// bzhi pa spu gri'i 'khor lo ni// gcod cing sreg pa kaM pa las// thim zhing gnon pas sa gzhi bzhin// sdud cing 'joms pas kur pa sha/ 'byed cing 'gugs pas kyo pa ta// 'di ni chu srin mche ba

ltar// 'dzin pa'i stong par mi byed pas// drag po me yi sbyor ba yin// de yi rim pa rgyas par bshad// phyi rim sbyor ba'i 'khor lo nyid// brgyad gnyis bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'bru// rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po
nas// rnal ma'i tshul du rjes su bskor// phyogs kyi dang po nas bzung ste// de nyid thug pa'i rim pa ni// ma lus dril ba'i 'phreng ba gcig/ a mu ka yi ming bcas pa'i// 'bras bu 'joms dang longs spyod

dang// gzhom pa'i yan lag kun// hri sti pra ma mur tsa rag+ta tsa ra mA ra ma ra ya a mu ka ni sha ra ru ni rbad ya hU~M phaT/ de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// rim pa kun la thog drangs te// a g+ha yu dang 'dra ba
yin// de 'og gsum la sogs pa yin// re mig bcu yi 'bru bcu ni// 'khor lo dam pa'i so dang dkyugs// bcun dang brgyan dang sngags dang 'dra// skabs kyi 'gyur zhing 'phel ba yin// hri sti pra ma mur tsa

rak+ta rbad/ 'gugs pa kun gyi mchog tu bshad// gzhan yang rim pa 'di lta ste// thog mar phyogs kyi 'bru gnyis la// gsum pa lnga pa bdun pa rnams// rim par sbyar zhing de bzhin bsdeb// pra mur rag tsa ma

ma tsa ta ra ra ya a mu ka ni sha ku ru ni rbad/ bcu yi bar du rdzogs par sbyar// dbang po lnga ni 'joms byed de// mchog tu skyes pa bu mo yi// dbang po gnyis pa 'joms byed de// lkugs shing si'u ta ru

bshad// de bzhin rim pas gnyis gnyis dor// bzhi pa rim pas sbyar bya ste// 'bru bcu ma lus dril ba ni// cha byad sbyor ba ma lus pa'i// pra tsa ra mur tsam ma rag ra ma ni sha ga ru ni rbad ya/ dbye dang

dkrugs pa'i las su bshad// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// bzung ste gnyis dor 'bru bcu'i rims// pra ma mur tsa rak+ta tsa ra mA ra ya a mu kaM rbad/ dbang po chal dang 'bog par bshad// de bzhin rim pa

de nyid las// gsum gsum bor nas rim par bsdeb// ma ra tsa rak+ta ya ra ma a mu ka ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/ bskrad pa'i sbyor ba kun la shis// de bzhin bzhi bzhi dor bya ste// de ltar rdzogs par bsdeb pa

yin// ma ta tsa ma tsa rak+ta mur ya a mu ka ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/ smyo ba'i las la shis par bshad// drag po rtsa ba'i sbyor ba las// gsad pa nyid la shis pa ni// ha la nag po tsa ma ri// rko ba'i sbyor ba ji bzhin
du// bag dang ldan pas sbyar bar bya'o// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba yi// gdags pa'i rim pa 'di lta ste// phyogs kyi dang po'i 'bru gnyis dang// de bzhin gsum pa bzhi pa rnams// rim

bsdebs de blangs de dor bya'o// mtha' ma'i 'bru brgyad rim pa ru// rjes su thim par sbyar ba ste// hri sti pra ma ya ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya// de dag dang po'i rim par bshad// de bzhin thog ma'i 'bru gnyis

dang// gnyis dor lnga pa drug pa gnyis// der rjes mtha' ma'i 'bru dgu gdags// hri sti mur ra tsa ya ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/ de ni sbyor ba gnyis par bshad// de ltar thog ma'i 'bru gnyis dang// bdun brgyad

dgu dang bcu pa'i rims// mtha' ma'i 'bru brgyad de bzhin bsdeb// hri sti rak+ta tsa ra ya ni sha ku ru ni rbad yA/ de dag sbyor ba gsum par bshad// thog ma'i 'bru gnyis de rjes su// tha ma'i 'bru gcig 'bru sbya

ra ba// hri sti ma ra ya ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/ sbyor ba'i rim pa bzhi pa ste// gsad pa nyid la brjod pa yin// dus mtshams sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan// rno ba spu gra'i so bzhin te// gcod pa mtshon chen 'khor lo
ltar// gang yin de nyid de bral 'gyur// gang dag ldan pa de thogs med// 'di dag gsad la sngags par bshad// gzhan yang rim par byed pa ste// thog ma'i 'bru gnyis bzhi pa dang// drug bdun brgyad dgu

bcu pa dang// bcu gcig de bzhin bcu gnyis te// de bzhin bcu gsum par bsdebs pa// hri sti mu rak+ta tsa ra ma ra ya a mu ka ni sha ku ru ni dza dza/ mtha' rten skabs dang ldan par sbyar// dgug pa'i las la

shis par bshad// de dag spu gri'i 'khor lo ste// 'bigs dang gcod par byed pa yi// rdo rje 'khor lo spu gri yin// de dag rtsa ba'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// rtsa ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste
sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// yan lag mchog dang sbyor ba las// bcu drug gnyis dang dril 'phreng ngacig/ sbyor ba skabs dang ldan pa
yin// sbyor ba'i yan lag ldan pa ni// 'phrul mig ag sha mu la rnams// 'khor lo sbyor ba'i rim pa gnyis// phyogs kyi dang po nas gzung ste// rim par rnal mar rjes su bskor// dbus kyi 'bru gcig thog

mar sbyar// rjes su phyi rim gsum gsum blang// der rjes nang gi 'bru rer bsdebs// de bzhin rim par sbyar ba ni// lo thog gzhom la shis pa ste// skyed shing rtsi thog 'bras bu 'joms// bag dang ldan pas

shes par bya// de nyid sbyor ba rgyas bstan pa// rlung me gzugs dang yid du sbyar// de rje nam mkha' ro dri dus// reg bya lus dang sna ba lce// sgra dang chu sna mig tu sbyar// las kyi bye brag sbyor ba yis// las rnams

de bzhin byed pa yin// phroM phro shar shar hril phroM drug spu gri skabs kyis bzhi 'bum sbyar// chu dril sngon 'gro'i sbyor bar bshad// 'phang zhing dbab pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'byung ba'i stobs kyis dkrug pa

ste// mchong chen rin chen gser gyi 'bru// nye bar gzung ba 'di lta ste// rlung dang sa dang sgra reg bya// nam mkha' yid gzugs dang po'i rlung// mtha' ma gnyis la sbyar bya ste// de dag de bzhin rims sbyar

ba// de ni bdag dbang bsdu ba ste// spu gri'i sbyor ba skabs kyis gdags// b+h+yo phroM shar hril srog gzir hur thums/ ha la yam phog rim pa'i cho ga yul dang sbyar// dbab pa drag po'i sbyor bar bshad// gzhan

yang rims kyis shes bya ste// yan lag sbyor ba sngon 'gro bas// rdo rje me yi 'khor los bya// shis pa'i 'bru rnams skabs kyis bsdeb// rlung sgra reg bya nam mkha' sa// lce dang me dang lta byed rlung// 'bru
bsdebs sbyar la 'dod pa'i ming// spu gri skabs kyis shes par bya// rim pas rjes su gzung ba ni// rgyal po 'am blon po gdug pa can// nag po gdug pa'i sems 'chang kun// tho bal 'phar ma'i yul dag

tu// bskrad pa mchog gi sbyor ba bshad// de bzhin rim pa gzhan yang sbyar// drag po'i stobs kyi 'bru bsdebs pa// rlung dang reg bya nam mkha' sa// sgra dang lce dang de bzhin sna// rim pas de bzhin sbyar ba

ni// de yis myos shing 'bog par bshad// gzhan yang thabs kyi 'bru bsdeb pa// b+hi ka ya 'phreng 'byed pa ni// stobs kyi 'phreng ba 'di dag yin// rlung dang nam mkha' sa dang sgra// reg bya dus dang dri rnams
te// thog ma'i rlung ni mthar gyis te// rim pa de bzhin sbyar byas la// sdang byed gnod byed ma lus pa// mi mthun phyogs dang thams cad kun// las kyi dbye ba ma lus kun// rang la rang yang 'joms par
byed// sha za mgo bzhi gdong lce gnyis// sbrul chen gdug pa'i 'khor lo yis// stobs kyi bdag po thams cad dang// rigs can rgyud gcig gnyis su 'byed// dbye ba mchog gi las su bshad// gzhan yang

stobs kyi 'bru bsdeb pa// rlung dang nam mkha' ro yid gzugs// me dang lta byed sna dang chu// sgra dang de bzhin thog ma'i rlung// rim pa ji bzhin nyid sbyar ba// dregs pa'i lha dang gdug pa'i gdon// ma mthun

stobs can gzir bar bshad// de bzhin las kyi rim pa ni// stobs dpag med pa'i 'bru brdebs pa// rlung dang sgra dang chu dang me// rna ba lus dang dus dang dri// ro dang nam mkha' de bzhin rlung// rim pa

bzhin du stobs sbyar ba// gsal po'ang lkugs pa'i mchog tu bshad// khyab ho ha yi rim par bsdeb// ha mu gnon pa'i b+he ga ta// shri ra man dza b+he la ba// de yi g+ha tsa sbyor ba ma// rlung dang sa me lta byed sna// chu

sgra de bzhin thog ma'i rlung// smyo zhing dbang po 'chal bar bshad// de bzhin gyen pa'i shing ltar te// b+he ga ta yi so ma gling// b+h+ya mya ha'i sah+yo b+hu ta// de rim sbyar ba 'di lta ste// rlung dang reg bya

lus dang dus// dri dang ro dang yid dang gzugs// me dang sa dang thog ma'i rlung// 'don pa'i ming dang spu gri bsdeb// g.yo ba med cing rengs par bshad// rim pa de bzhin las kun gyis// mchog tu sbyor ba

'di bsngags pa'o// dbus nas 'bru bcu dang po'i sa// me dang lta byed nam mkha' dri// ro dang rna ba lce dang sna// thog mtha' rlung gis 'phul gyin sdud// spu gri sbyor ba skabs dang sbyar// 'dod pa'i rten la

mtshon cha bca'// rim pa de yi las bsdebs pas// bya ba so sor bsgrub par byed// rkyen dang sbyor ba gzhan la'ang 'jug/ sbyor ba'i mchog dang dam pa yin// de dag bzlog pa'i dam pa yin// mi rgyu g.yo ba
med pa dang// 'jug med bzlog pa med pa'i las// mchog tu gsang ba'i gzhi yin te// rnal 'byor bde la gnas pa yin// sprad nag la te de med 'ching// sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'grub par 'gyur// stobs

med las kyis gnyis ka 'ching// 'ching med grol ba'i stobs kyis bya'o// 'di dag yan lag sbyor ba ste// drug gnyis las kyi skabs su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// yan lag gi sbyor ba'i le'u
ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po spogs pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gal te sbyor dang rkyen bral nas// ma khugs sbyor ba'i stobs med pas// ye shes bsnyen pa'i dkyil

'khor nyid// sbyor ba stobs kyis dgug bya ste// rten la ye shes rab gnas bya// bdag gi rang bzhin stobs bskyed nas// sbyor dang sngags bzlas drag por bya// de dag sbyar la ma grub na// spyi bsdus bar gyi rtsa

ba yin/ kha gnon 'khor lo sgyur byas te// bzlog sngags drag po gnad la bor// spyis bsdus par gcig snying po yin/ kha gnon las la 'jug byed de// rjes su mthun pa de bzhin bya// lhag ma'i sbyor ba sngar

bzhin te// rnal ma'i rjes su mthun par bya// 'di yang drag po'i sbyor ba ste// gnan pa'i rdo rje lcags kyis te// de dag stobs kyi gnan pa yin/ kha gnon stobs kyis spogs pa yin// rdo rje rnon pos bsdams

par bya'o// 'khor lo rdo rje brgya phrag gcig/ lnga brgya las kyi sbyor ba yin// 'brel ba rdo rje 'phreng bas 'dzin// rten 'brel stobs kyi rig pas sbyor// bya ba'i don chen kun 'grub pa// rin chen rgyal mtshan

ltar byed pa// rin chen 'khor lo mtsho chen 'di// 'khor lo dbang phyug mi 'gyur na// thog mar dam tshig dbang bskur nas// dam tshig 'khor los thog tu dbab/ kha gnon rin chen 'phreng ba nyid// rdo rje rnon
po'i spogs pa yin// rig pa'i rgyal po 'phreng bas gnan// gzhan yang zegs ma'i las byed na// rdo rje snying po rin chen 'bru// lnga bdun snying po bcu dang gnyis// bcu bdun snying po 'khor

lo'am// gcig dang nyi shu sum cu gnyis// dril nas drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi// 'khor lo'i sbyor ba gang byed kyang// ye shes dam tshig gsal byas la// lha yi 'khor lo legs thob nas// snying po thig le kun bsdus

la// 'khor lo yig 'bru'ang thig ler bya// ye shes snying po'ang nyid du gzhug/ drag po'i sbyor ba bzlog nas ni// las gsum sbyor ba shes par bya// rig pa klong gi nam nas 'phang// yang na 'khor lo mgo dgu
nyid// rdo rje rnon po rgya mdud bya// gnan pa rdo rje lcags dang bsdebs// spyi brdeg stobs kyis gnan par bya// rim pa ji bzhin bzlog pa ste// gnad gsum bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin// sngags kyi gnan dang
'bar ba'i 'od// phyogs dang mthun par sre byed de// gong ma'i 'phel zhing 'og mas gcod// 'khor lo 'bar na sngags kyi gnad// gang yin ji bzhin rim pa las// gcig dor gnyis dang gsum de

bzhin// rim pa gzhan la 'jug byed pa// 'pho zhing g.yo ba med pa'i gnad// sbyor bzhi sbyor ba brkyang ba dang// rnal mas khugs bar ma gyur cing// sbyor ba'i rim pa las kyi gnad// mthar dang thog mar ma

yin cing// stobs ldan brda dang ldan pa la// rI mo g+ha khya b+ha saho t+ho mA ta// ya ma kA lI bde klong brdal// b+h+ya rA pA yI nA b+hu sti// rA mA dzA ri g+hu rnam khrag/ sbyor ba dam pa'i las 'di ni// skabs 'dzin chu srin rdo
rje'i gnad// 'dus pa'i ye shes thig ler ldan/// thig le bde bas gang zhing 'bar// las kyi thig le dpag med las// stobs ldan rgyu ba med par gsal// mtshon cha'i rgyal po ngar bcas 'di// rin chen
bde bas gang zhing 'bar// las kyi thig le dpag med las// stobs ldan rgyu ba med par gsal// mtshon cha'i rgyal po ngar bcas 'di// rin chen yig 'bru snying por ldan// skad cig sngags dang 'od stong
'bar// g.yo med phyogs mtshams dbang bsdus pas// ma lus pa la mthun par thim// stobs ldan nag po 'bru gcig yin// rims 'dus gcod par ngar ldan gnang// ya bag sha yi sbyor tshul gyis// g+hu li

ya ma'i bde klong du// snying po rdo rje gsor ba'i gnad// de nyid nges par 'jug byed pa'i// las rnams sbyor bar smin pa ni// ma 'gyur las kyi rdo rje'i gnad// de bzhin rim pa kun ldan nas// drag por spogs
pa'i cho ga ste// bzlog sngags drag pos spogs pa ni// dang por rlung sa me dang gzugs// rnam shes ro dang nam mkha' dri// 'jug pa'i yan lag rim pa bzhin// skabs dang bcas nas dbus su sbyar// rim pa
dang por sbyor ba ste// de bzhin gnyis pa'ang rjes su 'jug/ rlung dang nam mkha' ro dang dri// dus mtshams lus dang reg bya dang// yan lag skabs kyis de bzhin sbyar// gsum pa rlung dang reg

bya lus// rna ba lce dang chu sgrar sbyar// stobs ldan dpag tu med par bya// bzhi pa'ang 'di ltar de bzhin te// rlung dang sgra dang chu dang ni// sna dang mig me sa ru bsdeb// yan lag lhag ma snga ma bzhin// skabs

dang rjes su mthun par sbyar// 'di dag sbyar ba gsang ba ste// sbal mgo khrag mig srin mo yi// sngun mo chu srin kun 'gro ma// 'gros kyi sbyor bas 'di dang bshad// sh+shi k+sha shri pan tsa yi// 'gros kyis de ltar rim
bzlog pa// drag po drag sngags bdun pa ste// las kyi sbyor bas gcod pa yi// mchong chen dregs pas 'joms par bshad// de bzhin 'khyil pa sprul sngags kyang// chu srin ka yi la yi 'gros// rims nad

rims kyis dril byas te// spogs pa drag po'o ro khugs yin// drag sngags bcu bdun dril 'phreng cig/ rgyu ba med pa'i las su byed// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rlung sa nam mkha' reg bya dang// sgra dang me

gzugs rnam shes ro// de bzhin dri dang dus mtshams lus// rna ba lce dang sna chu mig/ drag po'i 'khor lo'i gnad 'gugs yin// spogs pa'i sbyor ba dus mtshams bzhi// drag po dril ba'i 'phreng ba ste// ru

khugs chen po'i sbyor bar bshad// de bzhin bzlog sngags drag po yang// 'brur 'gro mgo mangs 'bru ded pa'i// drag sngags bzhi dang lnga pa'am// sbyor ba ma lus rdzogs bya ste// skabs kyis las kyi byed par
sbyar// dang po rlung dang nam mkha' me// de bzhin sgra dang reg byar bsdeb// gnyis pa chu sna lta byed me// gsum pa dus dang lus sna lce// bzhi pa gzugs byed ro dang dri// drag po gsad pa'i mchog tu

bshad// seng ge mche sbyar stag mo'i 'gros// stobs chen drag po'i sbyor tshul can// 'bru mthus rdo rje me yi sngags// spogs pa'i skabs su drag por sbyar// drag po'i sngags kyi 'khor lo nyid// stag mchongs sbyor

ba 'phreng ba me// rlung nas bzung nas gzugs la bskal// yid dang de bzhin me la bzung// sgra dang de bzhin ro la bskal// dus dang reg bya skabs kyis bzung// nam mkha' lus dang rna ba me// lta byed lce

dang chu snar sbyar// yan lag sbyor ba bzhi sbyor na// stag mchongs drag po gsang pa bshad// gsum dang bzhi pa lnga dang drug/ skabs dang bcas pa drag po'i spogs// dang po rlung dang nam mkha' rlung// gnyis pa

rlung dang reg bya lus// gsum pa rlung sgra de bzhin chu// bzhi pa rlung me de bzhin dri// yan lag skabs dang ldan pa ni// dug gsum spogs pa drag por bshad// de bzhin rtags las spogs pa'i las// dang po
me dang dri rlung me// gnyis pa rlung dri me dang rlung// gsum pa yid rlung me dang yid// bzhi pa dri rlung me dang dri// yan lag sbyar ba skabs su bsdeb// rtags bzhi chags dang skabs su bsdeb// drag

po drod la spogs par bshad// phung po lnga yi rten 'brel la// sngags bzlog drag po spogs pa ni// dang po rlung dang me dang dri// dus dang yid du bsdebs la bsdeb// gnyis pa rlung dang nam mkha' ro// dri dang de

bzhin dus su bsdeb// gsum pa rlung dang reg bya lus// rna ba de bzhin lce dang bsdeb// bzhi pa rlung dang sgra dang chu// sna dang lta byed yan lag bsdeb// phung po lnga yi rtsa ba gcod// 'bru lngas gcod pa 'khor

lor bshad// tshogs drug dang po rten drug la// shes pa 'jug pa'i sgo dgag na// dang po rlung me dri dang gzugs// yid dang dang po rlung dang bsdeb// gnyis pa rlung dang nam mkha' ro// dri dang lus dang lus su

bsdeb// gsum pa rlung dang reg bya lus// rna ba lce dang chu ru bsdeb// bzhi pa rlung sgra chu dang sna// lta byed dri dang yan lag bsdeg dbang po drug gi sgo dgag nas// 'bru drug sbyor ba 'joms par bshad// de
bzhin sbyor ba gzhan dang spogs// bdun dang dgu dang bcu dang gcig/ rtsa thig bcu bdun la sogs pa// 'phen pa'i drag sngags du mar 'gyur// sbyor ba phyi nang dpag tu med// las kyi rgyal po'i 'phrul
'khor yin// zegs ma kha gnon dpag tu med// gnan pa rdo rje lcags kyis te// 'khor lo gzhung dang ldan pa la// drag po 'bru gcig 'phen pa'i tshul// 'bur bzhi khung gi 'byung sa ste// lcags chen 'bar
ba'i dpal nyid kyis// khyab bdag ye shes me gzugs can// 'gyur bas stobs chen bdag po'i tshul// dgu bskor drag po rdo rje lcags// 'od 'phro 'bar bas khyab pa yi// spyi brdeg stobs dang ldan pa

ni// thabs ldan bag chags sbyor ba yis// ta lA kri sna tsA mA rI/ g+hu pi rA tsA ma ha hA yA/ k+k+ru k+kA ra yah+yaM ti b+b+hu krA/ bka' yi sman dang grub pa'i bcud// rten dang bcas pa'i drag po'i las// nyams stobs ldan na
las gsum sbyar// tsit+ta'i bde klong du// las kyi rgyal pos byin brlab dbab// rig pa klong gi lam nas 'phang// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i gnas la 'phangs// rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas nas 'don// yang na 'khor
lo mgo dgu nyid// 'jug pa'i sbyor ba 'phrul gsad min// sgo rten 'bru gzugs sngags kyis 'joms// 'bru gnyis stobs dang bag chags smin// dwangs ma bzhi bsdus nam mkha'i klong// snying pos srog dang
bcas pas bsdus// thod khar bcud la thig le bstim// skabs kyi drag por spogs la bzlog/ bdag nyid kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// ma lus 'dus pa'i khro gnyer can// 'dus pa bzhi yi sbyor
ba can// 'dus pa'i thig le yid kyis bzung// thig le bde ba'i gnas nas bskul// de nyid skyed rtsa rgyud gsum gcod// bde ba'i thig le rang gnas gsal// lus kyi lhun po ltar brtan
brjid// thig le nyi ma'i 'od stong 'bar// 'phro 'du'i stobs ni khyab gsal bcas// khros pa'i yid kyis kun bzlog nas// lus la ye shes 'khor lo bca'// gtum rngom 'bar ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur// sbyor ba

kun gyi go bzlog nas// gnad dgu nyi ma'i bstan bzhir bsdu// bdag skyob srun dang gzhan skyob sreg sa yi rten pa'i snying por sdud// ngar 'dzin zhe sdang dregs pa 'joms// lus kyi ri bo rten dang 'brel// chu

yi snying po dbang gsum sdud// sngon pa'i bag chags rtsa ba bskyed// che ba'i nga rgyal rmugs pa 'joms// lus kyi rten 'brel dbang po gshig me yi nyams stobs smin cing rgyas// yul la myos pa'i 'dod chags
'joms// drod kyi rtsa gcad ljon shing skyems// rlung gis srid pa'i rten 'brel bskyed// phrag dog gzhan dbang rkam chags bcom// yul las g.yo ba'i tshogs drug bkag/ dwangs ma khyab gsal gzung 'dzin
'brel// me mar gsad la rlung la bsdu// skye med chos 'byung thig ler gzhug/ thig le mi 'gyur gsal bar brtag/ gnas kyi thig le bde bas gang// bde ba'i lus la 'pho ba gzhug/ phyag rgya gsal ba'i ye
shes bskyed// drag po gnad dgu bzlog pa brdeg/ mi 'gyur g.yo med rang gsal bgrod// drag po mi 'gyur mchog tu bshad// gzhan yang de bzhin zegs ma'i las// 'phros pa'i yis kyis sbyor ba
bstan// rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid can// khro rgyal yum mchog 'bar bcas 'khyil// gshin rje mkha' 'gro bdud srin po// ma mo bdud mo yi dwags bdag 'das dang ma 'das kun gyi yab// khro chu nyi ma stong
dpag dka'// las rnams g.yo ba med par 'grub// spyi gcod me dbal 'khor lo dang// mu la rtsa ba'i 'khor lo gnyis// de bzhin rnal ma'i sbyor ba rnams// ma lus rim par bzlog par bya// 'khor lo spyi la

bskor nas ni// sbyor ba sngags kyi rim bzlog cing// 'phreng ba sngags kyi rim bzlog nas// thugs kyi snying po 'khor lo rnams// rim pa ji bzhin bzlog pa ste// gnad gsum bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin// sngags
kyi dbal dang 'bar ba'i 'od// phyogs dang mthun par sreg byed da// gong mas 'phen zhing 'og mas gcod// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo sreg pa'i las// sbyor ba bzhi yi yan lag can// rnal ma'i stobs zhan drag

pos spogs// sbyor ba kun bzlog las kyi mchog/ mtshams su bya ba'i don chen yin// stobs chen phyag rgya 'od 'bar gsal// dam tshig gsum gyis srog bzung bya// rdo rje rgyal po'i bzlas pa ste// chu srin gre
bar tshus pa ltar// zin pa mi gtong thams cad 'joms// mi 'gyur rdo rje srin po'i las// bsdu ba bzhi yi sbyor ba can// rgyu rkyen rtsa ba thig ler 'joms// ye shes bde ba'i khams dang sprad// rgyu
drug gnas gsum las kha grol// chos sku bde ba'i stobs dang ldan// bag chags mi rgyu rkyen bral gsal// snying po ma lus ngang la rdzogs// yon tan dpag med rin po che// srog ldan kun 'dus snying po
'dus// rno dbal mtshon cha'i rgyal por bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sbyor ba spogs pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs ma'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// g.yo
med grol bas chags pa yi// pho mo gnyis su gsungs pa ste// 'khrul 'khor rim pa lto dkrug pa// brgyad gnyis de bzhin gcig yin te// sbyor ba'i bye brag las kyis 'byed// phan tshun gnad kyi lto dkrugs
pa// yab yum gnyis su 'du ba ste// las kyi mchog tu phan pa yin// 'di de mi zad hol gyi las// bdud nag 'bur gyi 'khor lo 'am// ha la nag po'i sbrul 'dzin bzhin// stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po
yis// seng ge'i 'du shes nyer bzhag ste// bag dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba bya// bdud 'gyur rig pa'i pho brang las// bka' yi 'khor lo stobs chen gyis// pho mos bdud kyi gnad dkrug pa// ma lus las chen
'grub byed de// sbyor ba kun gyi rgyal por bshad// ro langs nag mo'i lto dkrug pa// bdud mo mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i mchog/ las rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// gsang chen bde ba'i lam sbyangs pa// thams cad
bde ba'i thig ler bsdu// rig pa klong gi gnas nas sprad// yul btags sbyor ba'i ming blangs la// tshangs pa'i gnas su rten la bstim// sna tshogs las kyi rim sbyar ba// 'bar ba rten gyi mtshon cha
la// dbang bskur byin rlabs 'od zer dbab// 'bru rnams gsos la rang bzhin bskyed// sbyor ba'i rgyal po ming dang sbyar// bdag pos dbang chen bstan par bskyed// rdo rje bkra shis dbang bskur

nas// mtshon ma'i rgyal po rang blud bya// myos pa'i khrag dang dug chu bran// dug shing rus chen me la bdug drag bzlog gyen gyi las la gzung// dkrug cing phral la rten du dbab// bsdu ba'i 'bru la sbyor ba
dbab// yul dang rten gyi dmigs pa dbral// ye shes rigs pa'i nyi ma la// srog dbugs 'brel ba'i 'khor lo bca'// rlung dang me la dgos pa bsdu// 'bru drug kun gyi 'bru ru sbyar// rin chen 'bru rnams
sbyor ba'i lus// 'dod pa'i a mu ka dang sprad// 'bru gnyis spu gri rnal ma bzhin// 'bru brgyad gcod pa kun gyi mthar// yab yum 'dus pas mi 'jigs gcod// 'jogs pa bde lam rgyan bskyed pa'o// rten
'brel lte ba'i 'khor lo la// rgyu rkyen thabs kyi sbyor bar bsdeb// lam chen rgyun gyi nyi ma bzhi// bskor bas de 'bral rtsa srog gcod// khrag dang bag chags rtsa ma skyems// longs spyod bde ba'i
'khor lo la// dbugs lam dgag pa'i sbyor ba bsdeb// lam chen rgyun gyi nyi ma bzhi// bskor bas srid pa'i rgyun lam gcod// bag chags khrag dang bcas pa sreg bde chen klad pa'i 'khor lo la// myos par

byed pa'i sbyor bas bsdeb// tshangs pa kun khyab nyi ma bzhi// bskor bas tshangs pa'i sgo gnyis 'byed// rtsa dang srog dbugs bcad nas bskyed// gsang ba drod kyi 'khor lo la// 'du 'phro sbyor ba las bsdebs
la// dbang po gnyis 'dzin nyi ma bzhi// skye ba'i rgyun gcod bag chags skyems// de dag yan lag 'khor lo yin// 'dod pa kun gyi don chen 'grub// 'bras bu smin par byed pa yin// thabs kyis grol ba'i

'khor lor bshad// yon tan las dang sku 'khor gyi// rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// thog ma'i sbyor ba dang po ste// rtsa ba'i sa bon yi ge gnyis// me dbal ming gi 'khor lo la// rig pa ming gi yi ge
bzhi// 'dus pas sbyor ba bdud kyi ming// rnal mas bskor ba'i phyogs kyis sbyar// mchog gi yi ge 'bru lngar ldan// kun gyi thog mar sbyar bya sta// phyir la dbus nas bskor byas nas// me dbal yab kyi

'khor lo bzhin// rnal ma bzlog pa'i rim pa yis// ming gi 'jug la gdags bya ste// rjes su mthun par bzhi sbyar na// bya ba kun gyi sngon 'gro ste// sbyor ba kun gyi rtsa ba yin// mtha' rten las kyi skabs kyis

'jug/ oM ya ma rag mo ma ma ma me ta k+she duM snying raM thun ro gsham gzer badzrA dzi man a mu ka pra ma ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ nyi ma dang po sbyor ba yin/ ra ni tsa ya drag ta snying kha rag sha i ta rag trab+ha rag

rdubs se a mu ka mur tsa ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ oM ya ma rag mo ma ma ra ni yo n+ta ro shwi swa tsa lI rag mugs mo a mu ka rak+ta tsa ra ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ oM ya ma ra mo ma ma ru to/ sa tsa e tsid+he

dramahA ro ka dza sh+na ya maha' Ung yama' ti a mu ka ma ra ya ya ma de b+h+yo ru rbad ya/ de dag rtsa ba'i sbyor ba ste/ sngon du 'gro ba'i las su bstan// mtshan mo rnal mar dril la brdeg sbyor ba kun gyi rtsa bar bshad/ de

bzhin k+sham k+sha shi ban tsa'i/ 'gros kyis 'bru ded bdun pa'i sngags/ rjes su mthun pa'i de bzhin bsdeb/ ya k+she ta me ma ra ni dun man trag rag shaa'aM pe ta li rag mo e ka dza ti/ k+she ta me ma ra ni tsa shaM rUn

mAn trag rag shaa'aM/ pe ta la rig mo e ka dza ti druM/ ta me ma ra ni tsa ya dran mAn trag rag shaa'aM/ pe ta li rag mo dza e ka dza ti d+hi shahaM/ me ma k+she ra ni yo na man trag rag shaa'aM pe ta li rag mo e ka dza ti

d+huM shahaM d+hun man/ ma k+she ta ru to sa tsa trag rag ahaaM pe ta li rag mo e ka dza ti duM shaM hUn man pa tsa ra ni tsa ya k+she ya rag shahaM pe ta li rag me e ka dza ti duM shaM dun man rag ra ni tsa ya k+she ya ma

shahamaM pe ta la rag mo e ka dza ti shaM dun man trag rag de dag nyi ma dang po'i las// sku yi snying po ji bzhin du// mu khyud lnga pa'i nyi ma gnyis// nyi ma gsum la mu khyud drug/ bzhi'ang nang ma'i lto nas
bsdeb// yab kyi drag sngags snga ma bzhin// bdun pa bdun bskor sgo bzhis 'jug 'khyil ba sbrul dang ru sbal dang// chu srin ki la'i 'gros// 'brur 'gro mgo mangs stag mo'i 'gros// 'bru bdun nyi ma bzhi

la sogs// kun gyi sbyor ba mgo dang mtha'// 'bru drug 'bru brgyad snga ma bzhin// yab kyi spu gri rnal ma bzhin// 'dod pa'i a mu ka dang bsdeb// drag po lto dkrug bdun par bshad// rnal ma'i sbyor ba 'di lta
ste// thog mar de bzhin drug pa'i ming// drangs pa de bzhin kun la bya// mtha' rten 'jug pa'i sngags nyid ni// drag po ma hA ya nyid la// spu gri 'khor lo 'dam pa bzhi// dgod pa'i 'phreng ba ji bzhin
sbyar// lus dang yan lag kun bsdebs la// 'phen pa'i 'bru brgyad mtha' ru sbyar// yi ge sngar bzhin bzlog bskor na// sbyor bas gsod pa ma lus pa// 'jug po nye bar btags pa yin// dbus kyi sbyor ba

rkyang par bsdeb// oM ya ma rag mo ma ma ya k+she ma me ta ra ni tsa ya ra ni yo na ru to sa tsa a mu ka pra ma ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ 'bru drug 'bru brgyad snga ma bzhin/ d+hUM shaha'u d+hun man trag rag shaaM pe ta la'i

rag mo e ka dza ti a mu ka mur tsa ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ snying ro shan tsi ta rag ta rngubs ro tsa rmugs rmugs tsi ro shaM spyaM a mu ka rag ta tsa ra ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ raM thun gzer badzra snying kha

rag hri shrI saha'u rag shaku d+d+ra yamya dalhu ud a mu ka ma ra ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ drag po gnad kyi phan pa ste// rnal ma'i 'byor pa rkyang pa bzhi// gsad pa'i las kun so sor bsgrub// brnag pa kun gyi

mchog tu bshad// phyi nang dbus mtha'i rim pa ni// drag por dril zhing las bsdebs pa// bdud mo gshin rje'i sbyor ba ste// khro mo rnams kyi snying po yin// de yi sbyor ba dpag med las// mkha' 'gro drag mo'i

sbyor ba ste// gnad bzlog drag po'i rim pa yis// rengs dang 'gugs pa ma lus byed// las gsang gnyis dang kun rdzogs yin// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// ta b+hi ta yi 'gros kyis bsdeb// 'khor lo 'phreng ba

dril ba'i las// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// re mig drug gnyis de bzhin gcig/ rim pas 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba gcig/ mu khyud lta bur dril la brdeg thog ma'i sbyor ba sngar bzhin bsdeb// yab kyi 'bru

bzhin mthun bar bsdeb// mkha' 'gro'i 'bru la gshin rje gdags// dang por mu khyud drug pa nas// 'bru bzhi ro la ra~M` dang bsdeb// ra~M` thun gzer badzra snying kha rag hrI shwi p+hu rag shakaha ra ni tsa ya/

du~M` sha~M` dun ma na trag rag shaa~M`pe ta li rag mo ra ni yo na/ snying ro shan tsi ta rag ta rngubs ro sa rmugs mugs ru to sa tsa/ d+h+we dala' yamyaha ud tsaM ro sh+naM yam e ka dza ti ma k+she ta me/ de bzhin yum gyis dkrug pa
ste// pho mo las kyi lto dkrug yin// mkha' 'gros gsad pa'i mchog tu bshad// bkan bzlog sbyor ba'i 'khor lo nyid// thog mar dbus nas bdud kyi las// 'bru drug dang por de bzhin drang// yab kyi 'bru

gsum rdo rje'i phyogs// mkha' 'gro phyogs kyi 'bru drug bsdeb// ral gri mtshams su 'bru drug blang// rtsa la bsdus pa'i thig ler gzhug/ spu gri'i sbyor ba snga ma bzhin/ dang po ma ra ni duM shahaM ra~M` snying raM/ snying

raM thun gzer dzA/ tsi shan dun man tsa/ gnyis pa k+she nas 'bru drug bya// de bzhin pad+ma'i mtshams nas bsdeb// ni las bsdus la thig ler gzhug/ k+she ya ra rag+ta rag snying kha rag hrI/ rngubs ta pe shaahaM ni/ de

bzhin ta nas pad+ma'i phyogs// de bzhin rin chen mtshams nas dril// ru la bsdus la thig ler gzhug/ ta la yo ni tsa ro shI sahu rag k+sha rmugs mugs rag mo ru/ bzhi pa me nas rin chen phyogs// de bzhin rdo

rje mtshams su dril// tsa la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ me sa to e ka tsi ro d+hA dralaha yam ud sh+ni yam dza ti tsa/ mgo bzhis 'bur 'gros gdong lce bzhi// de bzhin sbal 'gros phyogs mtshams dril// yang
gsang mchog gi sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// mkha' 'gro 'bar ma dbyings sdus ma// snying po dam dang drag po'i srog/ yon tan las kyi rims dang gsum// gcig gis phyogs nas dril

pa ste// sbyor ba 'phral nas sbyor bsdebs na// ma lus las na byed pa yin// de dag sbyor ba rkyang pa yi// re re bcu drug phral bsdebs na// thog ma'i 'bru drug mtha' yig brgyad// gcig las phye ba'i sbyor ba

ste// rkyang ba'i sbyor ba 'bru gsum bsdebs// 'dod pa'i las re 'brub pa yin// yan lag 'khor lo'i mtha' dad 'di// phyi nang bar gyi 'phreng ba nyid// sbyor ba phye na du mar 'gyur// drug bcu'i 'bru nyid re re
la// de las gzhan yang byin brlabs te// gsum gsum dor nas gcig blangs te// gsum dor gcig blang rdzogs par bsdeb// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// tsi shan ta rag rag trag ta man/ rngubs rag ro

ling/ tsa ta/ rmugs pe/ sahu tra/ mug dza/ tsi ka ro A+e/ shan mo/ de ba da ra la/ ya dun snying sham/ ro dun shan+ti/ ma ga su/ a sha ha ma/ su pa ra/ de dag sbyor ba phra ba ste// thog mar mtha' ma snga ma
bzhin// dpal gyi ma mo bde byed ma// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi 'joms par byed// gang brtsams las kun 'grub par bshad// de bzhin gsum dor gcig blangs bsdeb// gnas skabs nyid du

rgyas par brjod// de bzhin stobs dang ldan pa'i 'bru// sbyor ba dam pa 'di lta ste// phyogs bzhir so sor dril sbyar la// sdom dang rkyang pa'i bye brag gis// gnyis gnyis dag tu dbye ba ste// me dbal 'khor

lo'i sbyor ba bzhi// brnal ma bzlog pa'i rim pa ste// 'bru brgyad dbus kyi ya dang dgu// 'phen cing sdud pa'i 'khor lo yin// 'bru drug 'bru brgyad snga ma bzhin// rdo rje phyogs nas dang po bsdebs// 'dod

pa'i ming dang spu grir bsdeb// sbyor ba dang po 'di lta ste// ma ra duM snying ri run rA+o/ shahaM ni ya/ gnyis pa ral gri'i phyogs su ste/ de bzhin 'phen sdud 'khor lo'i tshul/ k+she ya trag ta snying kha rag ra ya/ gsum pa

pad+ma'i phyogs su bsdeb/ ta yo ta ro shwi sahu tsa li/ na ya bzhi pa rin chen phyogs su bsdeb/ me to e tsa d+he dralhA ro ka sa ya/ phyogs kyi sbyor ba nyi ma bzhis// mchog gi sbyor ba ma lus 'grub// mtshams bzhi sbyor

bas snga ma bzhin// rdo rje ral gri'i mtshams su bsdeb// tsa dun shAn gzer badzra tsi man ya// gnyis pa ral gri pad+ma yi// mtshams su 'phen sdud sbyor ba bsdeb// ni shahaAM ta rag d+h+ril rngubs pe ya// gsum pa

pad+ma rin chen gyi// mtshams su sbyor ba 'phen sdud bsdeb// ru rag rmugs rag shaka mug ma mo ya// bzhi pa rin chen rdo rje'i mtshams// ho pan srog yin rdzogs par bsdeb// tsa dzA sh+naM yamyaM ud yam ti

ya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo nub mo bzhir// sbyor ba btud la bsdeb gyur na// khyad par drag po'i las su bshad// gzhan yang sbyor ba'i rgyal po ni// thog mar 'bru drug mi sbyin te// der rjes me dbal 'khor lo

yang// phab kyi rnal ma'i sbyor ba bzhi// mtha' ma bzlog la de la bsdeb// 'dod pa spu gri snga ma bzhin// de bzhin gzhan yang sbyar ba ste// dang po'i yab dang phyi rol phyogs// re mig bdun bdun bsdebs par
bya// phyi rol mtha' nas bskor phyogs su// rim pas re mig bzhi bzhi bzung// de bzhin 'og dang yang 'og gsum// snga ma bzhin te phyogs mthun bsdeb// rin chen phyogs nas mgo drangs te// rdo rje mtshams

su bskyal bar bya// ya ma me k+she trahA dralhA yamah+ya// gnyis pa ral gri'i phyogs nas bzung// ra tsa sa to snying kha rag gsum pa rdo rje'i phyogs nas bzung// ru na yo ni raM thun gzer// bzhi pa pad+ma'i phyogs nas

bzung// ra ya ra tsa ni shi su rag de yi sngags pa rgyal blon 'joms/ ma me ta k+she tsi ro shan/ ra tsa sa to ta rag ta/ ru na yo ni snying ro shan/ ra ya tsa ni ro rmugs/ ma me ta k+she e ka dzA/ ra tsa sa to trag rag shaAM/
ru na yo ni d+huM sh+taM d+huM/ ra ya tsa ni ta li rag sbyor ba'i yan lag de dag gis// nyan thos mu stegs 'joms par byed// sbyor ba mchog gi mchog tu bshad// gzhan yang sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// thad

tshugs phyogs kyi sbyor ba bzhi// re mig dgu dgu mtshams su yang// de ltar re mig bcu pa rnams// drag po'i phyogs kyis 'joms par byed// mgo drangs phyogs nas phyogs dril// thog mtha'i sbyor ba snga ma

bzhin// de rims tshul bzhin rjes mthun sbyar// de bzhin phyi rims mtha' phyogs su// de ltar go rims bzhin du bsdeb// ral gri'i phyogs nas mgo brtsams te// rin chen phyogs su bskyal bar bya// snying ta

rag ya k+she ya sa ka ro dralhA// gnyis pa de de ji bzhin du// pad+ma'i phyogs nas mgo drangs la// rdo rje'i phyogs su bskyal bar bya// re mig grangs kyang snga ma bzhin// shwi ro ta ya yo ta ya ni shaM ro thun// gsum pa

rin chen phyogs nyid nas// ral gri'i phyogs su de bzhin bskyal// d+he tsi e to me ya ra rag rag kha// bzhi pa rdo rje'i phyogs nas drangs// pad+ma'i phyogs su bskyal la bsdeb// raM snying hU~M ra ma ya na li tsa

sahu// phyogs kyi sbyor ba brgya ba ste// thad tshugs nyi ma bzhi bsdeb pas// rjes dang yul spangs 'joms par byed// de bzhin mtshams bzhi'i thad tshugs ni// re mig ya dang brgyad bsdeb la// thog mtha' 'bru

drug 'bru brgyad bsdeb// ral gri'i mtshams nas mgo drangs te// rdo rje'i mtshams su dril la bsdeb// rag ta shahaa ni ya ti yamya yud// gnyis pa gzer nas k+sha la bskyal// gzan shan dun tsa ya ma mo mugs

shakA// gsum pa rin chen pad+ma'i mtshams// yamah+ya sh+naM dza tsa ma pe rngubs d+hi// bzhi pa pad+ma'i mtshams nas drang// ral gri'i mtshams su bskyal la bsdeb// rag rmugs rag ru ya man tsi badzra// mtshams bzhi'i
sbyor ba thad tshugs kyis// dmangs dang rigs ngan 'joms par bshad// gzhan yang gdul bya ma lus pa// dbang po bcu dang bdun bzlog pa// drag po'i yan lag bcu drug 'joms// rdo rje'i phyogs nas

mgo drangs te// mtha' nas dbus su dril la bsdeg/ dang po phyogs nas nye bar bzung// rdo rje ral gri'i mtshams su bsdeb// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa ni// dang po'i sbyor ba drag po yis/// dbugs kyi sbyor ba
'joms par byed// ya la bsdus la thig ler gzhug/ raM snying dum ra ma ya/ gnyis pas de bzhin ngag snyan dang// rna ba'i rnam shes 'phrog cing 'joms// na la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ sahu tsa li na/

gsum pa dran rtog chags pa yi// yid kyi 'du shes ma lus gcod// ma la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ d+he tsi e to myo/ bzhi pas mdangs kyi dbang po dang// shes pa gnyis 'dzin go 'byed gcod// k+she la bsdu
zhing thig ler gzhug/ snying ta trag ya k+she/ rten pa'i sa yi snying po 'joms// srog shing gsum gyi ba gcod// ta la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ shwi ro ta yo ta/ lus srog gzungs bcud phral

nas// lus kyi rnam shes 'joms par byed// ni la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ thuMn ri sha ni/ de dag sna tshogs 'gyur byed cing// don gyi dbang po nyams par byed// sa la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ dralhA ro ka
sa// mig gi rnam shes bkrag mdangs 'joms// gzer sh+naMn dun tsa/ tsa la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ lce yi rnam shes bkrag mdangs 'joms// ya la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ badzra tsi man ya/ rtsa yi

rnam shes zhen chags 'joms// ni la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ rak+ta shaAM ni/ rten pa lus kyi dbang po dang// phung po lnga yi rtsa ba gcod// ta la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ hri rngubs pe ma ta/ lce dang dbang po

gsal bcom nas// mi 'dod ro ni sna tshogs bsgyur// ru la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ ra ga rmugs rag ru/ chags sdang lnga yi rtsa ba dang// sgra rnams mi gsal ldib cing 'joms// me la bsdu zhing thig ler

gzhug/ shaka rmugs mo mo me/ de bzhin mig gi rnam shes dang// yul la 'dzin pa'i dbang po 'joms// rtsa la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ yamya sh+na dzA tsa/ de bzhin drod kyi dbang po dang// dwangs ma skyed pa'i sa
bon 'joms// ma la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ Ud yam ti ma/ 'di dag drag po'i yan lag ste// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba min// thabs kyi sbyor ba dam par bshad// gzhan yang drag po'i yan lag

nyid// brgyad gnyis de bzhin shes bya ste// bzhi pa lnga yi rim pa bsdeb// phyogs kyi dang po rdo rje yi// rin chen mtshams nas mgo drangs te// dang po phyogs nas mgo drangs la// rin chen mtshams nas go

bzlog la// mgo dang mtha' rten snga ma bzhin// shaM du ti dzA shi yamyaM snying ro// rin chen phyogs nas pad+ma'i mtshams// de bzhin nyi ma bzhi ru brdeb// ka ye mo rag rmugs mug sa tsi ro// ti la pe shaM ta rngubs ro
tsa// rag trag man dun shan tsi ta rag/ de dag sbyor ba rnal ma yin// gsad pa'i las la spogs par bshad// ma lus dngos po 'joms byed de// drag po mchog gi sbyor ba yin// sngags kyi sbyor ba du ma
rnams// so so'i rim pa phral byas la// bya ba'i 'dod pas so so bsgrub// khyad par lnga bdun sbyor ba cig/ rim pa sna tshogs las kyis gnad// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi srog dbang sgyur// bdud mo dregs pa'i

las dbang 'phrog/ srin mo ma mo ya ma mo// sha za kye kam mi mthun lus// rdo rje srin po sha za'i tshogs// sahu khrag rgya mdud ya ma'i klong// ah+yaM rab+h+yaM b+habya smyI haha' stiha' kashra/ n+ha g+ha b+ha dkih+yA gdab/ de yis
ma lus 'joms byed de// sbyor ba'i rgyal po mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long rgyud las// ro langs nag mo stong bskor rtsa ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
yan lag gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan yang drag po'i yan lag ni// ri mig rim par bskor min par// thad kar bcal te tha dad dbyung// 'di la sbyor ba'i rim pa brgyad// phyogs bzhi sbyor ba yig 'bru

bcu// mtshams kyi sbyor ba 'bru bdun dgu// dbus kyi drag po 'bru gcig nyid// kun gyi mtha' ru nges sbyar te// 'bru gcig sbyor ba brgyad du 'gyur// ya bag sha yi sbyor ba yis// phyogs mtshams 'dra ba nyid

du bshad// de yi sbyor ba brgyad yin te// 'grub par nges te the tshom med// de dag rim pa 'di lta ste// phyogs kyi dang po mtha' de nas// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi ngos kyi mtha'// drag po'i las kyi 'du ba ste// dbang du

sdud pa'i sbyor ba'i mchog/ raM snying hU~M ra ma na yi tsa 'a sahu ya snying kha dza ra ang ku sha dza/ thog mar 'bru drug sngar bzhin te// mtha' ma dbang gi snying po sbyin// las la sbyar ba'i mtha' can gdags// lhun po rgyu

bzhi dbang 'gyur na// shes ldan rnams la smos ci dgos// dbang du bya ba sbyor ba'i mchog/ de nas rang bzhin phyogs bskor te// pad+ma'i phyogs nas rdo rjer bskyal// shri ro ta yota ni shahi rathuMn ya a mu ka pra ni
ha sta hU~M phaT/ thad khar rim par bsdebs pa yis// gsal po'ang lkugs par byed pa yin// pad+mar dbang phyug bde ba yang// lkugs par byed pa'i mchog 'gyur na// srog chags rnams la smos ci

dgos// gsum pa de bzhin sbyar ba ni// ral gri'i phyogs kyi dang po nas// rin chen phyogs su 'bru bcu bsdeb/ kha rag rag ra me tog a tsi d+h+we ya/ hu lu rma ya hU~M pra bi sha phaT/ dbye ba'i rim pa mchog yin

te// 'bru drug thog mar de bzhin sbyin// mtha' yas dbye ba'i spu grir gdags// sbyor ba rkyen dang ldan gyur na// rgyud gcig shes pa'ang gnyis su 'byed// rgyud gnyis dbye ba'i mchog tu bshad// rin chen

mchog gi dang po nas// ral gri'i phyogs su bzhi pa bsdeb// dralA ro ka sa k+she ya trag ta snying ya a mu ka dza li ya ma pra bi na ya hU~M phaT/ gyen pa'i shing ltar srog ldan kun// rengs par byed pa'i mchog tu

bshad// mtshams bzhi sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// rdo rje ral gri'i dang po'i mtshams// mgo drangs rin chen mtshams su bsdeb// gzer shan du tsa mo mo mugs shakA ma a mu ka thibs mo ma myogs yar ma hU~M phaT/

'bogs bar byed pa'i las su bshad// gnyis pa rin chen pad+ma'i mtshams// mgo drangs ral gri'i mtshams su bskyal// rag rmugs rag ru man dzi badzra ya mun kraM du myogs hU~M phaT/ rmugs par byed pa'i las
su bshad// gsum pa'i ral gri'i mtshams nas bzung// rdo rje'i mtshams su nye bar bsdeb// rag+ta shahaAM ni ti yam ud ya a mu ka go ma gi sahi ha hor hU~M phaT/ myos shing brlabs pa'i las su

bshad// bzhi pa rin chen mtshams nas bzung// pad+ma'i mtshams su brtsi bar bya// amah+ya sh+ni dza tsa pe rngubs hri ya a mu ka dzu na li b+ha hub ta hU~M phaT/ 'ching bar byed pa'i dam par bshad// phyogs mtshams

brgyad kyi sbyor ba yis// go rims bzhin du las re bsgrub// gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di ma bshad// yan lag brgyad kyi las dmigs te// che ba'i mchog tu gcig tu'o// gzhan yang drag po'i sbyor ba nyid// brgyad

du de bzhin shes bya ste// bzhi pa lnga pa'i rim bsdebs la// phyogs kyi dang po rdo rje yi// dang po'i phyogs kyi 'bru brgyad nyid// dbus kyi ya la sbyor ba dril// sbal 'gros mthun par rim pa bzhin// phyi rim

mtha' nas dbus su dril// re mig dgu dgu ya dang bcu// ru sbal 'gros kyi drag por bsdeb// dang por sbyor ba rdo rje'i phyogs// mgo drangs dbus su thug par bsdeb// thog mar 'bru drug snga ma bzhin// las

dang mthun par mtha' mar ldan// raM thun snying ro dum shwaM ra ni ya/ a mu ka ha ho ta ra yah+yaM yamyaM hri hU~M phaT/ smyo bar byed pa'i las su bshad// gnyis pa ral gri'i phyogs nas brtsi// rnal mar ma yin sbal 'gros

tshul// snying kha ta rag trag rag sha ra ya a mu ka dzA lan ga hu staM nan/ tsi dzi dz+wal 'bar ba'i nad// sbrul nag pho mo'i lto ru gzhug/ nyam nga'i nad ni gtang ba'i mchog/ gsum pa pad+ma'i phyogs nas bsdib// shri

sahu ro tsa ta li yo na ya a mu ka srog nan hur thums/ gzir ba'i las kyi thams cad do// bzhi pa rin chen phyogs nas brdeb// dwe dralha tsi ro e ka sa to ya a mu ka khrag rngubs dza ya hU~M phaT/ yul khams dbang

po bkru ba'i mchog/ rdo rje ral gri'i mtshams su bsdeb// gzer badzra shinaci dun man tsa ya a mu ku mu thum ro myags/ yams dal rims kyi sbyor bar bshad// gnyis pa ral gri pad+ma'i mtshams// rag dahahi ta

rngubs shaaM pe ni ya a mu ka staM ba ya hu nan/ thams cad gnan pa'i mchog tu bshad// gsum pa pad+ma rin chen mtshams// rag shakraM rmugs mugs rag mo ru ya sarba du nan a pa ra hU~M phaT/ bdag dang 'khor

yug bsrung ba'i mchog/ bzhi pa rin chen rdo rje'i mtshams// yamya mUd sh+naM yam mu la du ri yaM ti hU~M phaT/ gso ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// de bzhin drag po'i sbyor ba nyid// brgyad gnyis de bzhin shes

par bya// bzhi pa lnga pa'i rim bsdebs la// phyogs kyi dang po rdo rje yis// rin chen mtshams nas mgo drangs te// dang po phyogs kyi 'bru brgyad nyin// lnga pa'i dang po bzhi yi mtha' mas sbyar// snying yamya sh+naM ro tsi
mugs rmugs rtsa dum// dus kyi sbyor ba nyi ma bzhir// gong ma ji bzhin drug gnyis sbyar// thog mar 'bru drug mtha' mar 'bru brgyad de// a mu ka zhes 'dod pa'i mtshams su sbyar// zhing dang skyed
shing sman dang rtsi sman sogs// ma lus 'joms pa'i mchog tu bshad// de bzhin rigs kyi ma lus kun la sbyar// lnga pa'i gnyis pa bzhi pa'i gsum par sbyar// ya ti gnas dang rten yul 'joms par

bshad// de bzhin rjes su 'jug pa ste// lnga pa'i gsum pa bzhi pa'i gnyis par sbyar// sh+naM draha'uM/ srog dang ldan min longs spyod kun// 'dod pa'i snying po ma lus 'joms par bshad// sngar bzhin sbyor ba bzhi

pa yang// lnga pa'i mtha' ma bzhi pa'i dang por sbyar// yamA dun/ rta dang glang po bzhon pa 'joms// de yi sbyor ba rnam kun la// thog mtha' 'bru drug 'bru brgyad de// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ sbyor ba

bzhi bzhi bcu gnyis te// rngubs ta rak+ta ta tsi shan ro snying dum// nyi zla dus kyi sbyor ba 'joms par byed// de bzhin gnyis pa'i rimapa ni// lnga pa'i gnyis pa bzhi pa'i gsum pa sbyar// ta rak+ta ta tsi shan ro

snying ti/ kyi dang longs spyod srog chag 'joms par bshad// de bzhin gsum pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rak+ta tsi shan ro snying yamA sh+nAM sh+nA/ gzhan gyi stobs dpung 'joms par bshad// bzhi pa'i mtha' ma'i sbyor

ba ni// yamyaM sh+naM ro tsi mugs rmugs tsa ro dum/ rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams 'joms// de bzhin rin chen phyogs nas drangs// thog mar 'bru drug 'bru brgyad sbyar// tsa mugs rmugs tsa ro rngubs ta rag
mo// bsod nams rgyun dang skye rgyun 'joms par bshad// de bzhin gnyis pa'i sbyor ba ni// mugs rmugs tsa rngubs ta rag mo// gzhan gyi gnod byed 'joms par bshad// de bzhin gsum pa'i sbyor ba

ni// yamA sh+nA ro tsi mugs rmugs tsa ro dum// gcan gzan gdug pa'i kha rnams bcings par bshad// de bzhin bzhi pa'i sbyor ba ni// rak+ta tsi shan ro snying yamA sh+nAM dum// yul khams 'khrug cing 'joms par

bshad// ma lus 'joms par byed pa ni// sbyor ba de rims de dag gis// go rims ji bzhin sbyor ba ni// rim pa'i sngags dang sbyor ba'i rkyen// 'khor lo rten dang 'brel ba'i mthu// rgyu dang rkyen du stobs
bsdebs pa// yan lag drag po'i sbyor ba ste// rten 'brel bcu gnyis stobs kyis 'joms// ma ra ya ni mchog men pa'o// rim pa gnyis kyis 'grub par bshad// gzhan yang mchog gi sbyor ba ni// phyi rim
mtha' nas nang logs su// de dag rtsa ba'i las bshad pa// bya ba kun gyi gtso bor gyur// 'brel ba'i rten stobs sbyor ldan pas// de dag rim pas 'di ltar sbyar// re mig rim pas bskor min par// yab
dang bzhi pa'i mu khyud bsdebs// phyogs mtshams bsdebs pas 'bru dgu 'joms// re mig dgu dgu ya nas drangs// ye shes nyi ma'i dkyil du bca'// thog mar 'bru drug de bzhin sbyin// mtha'
ma las kyi mtha' can gdags// rdo rje phyogs de de mtshams dril// ya mar du sh+nam dun man tsa ni ya// sarba dri hur nan rbad// bgegs rnams gzir zhing gzhom pa'i mchog/ gnyis pa ya nas ral gri'i
phyogs// mtshams dang bsdebs la gsang sngags bsdebs/ ya k+she ya trag rag shahaaM pe ni ya sa na ga hur thums rbur nan thul rbad/ gdug pa gzir zhing gzhom pa'i mchog/ gsum pa dbus nas pad+ma'i

phyogs// mtshams dang bsdebs la spu gri gdags// ya ta yo ta li tag mo ru ya phraM shar dud phroM ni pa dang shar shar phob/ lo ka 'pho zhing lo thog 'joms// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsang ba yin// bzhi pa dbus nas

rin chen gyi// phyogs mtshams bsdebs la bsrung ba bya// ya me to e ka dza ti ya sarba sha trUM stam pa ya hU~M phaT// lo thog 'bras bus bsrung ba'i mchog/ yan lag kun gyi sbyor ba bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi

rgyud las// ro langs nag mo yan lag gi sbyor ba'i dbye ba'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas ngan gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// 'gyur ba stobs kyi sbyor ba ni// rdzas dang gnas

khang la sogs bsgyur// sbyor ba bsgyur bas ma lus 'joms// thod pa dur ma kha phye la// spre dang byi la'i spu dang nya// mi snyan skad 'byin bya sha spu// thod par brdzangs la sbyor ba bsdebs// yab yum rtsa ba'i sbyor
ba bsdebs// zhag grangs lnga 'am bdun na gnan// mkhar gyi g.yas 'gram spus gang sba// thod pa 'phar dang mkhar de 'jig/ sog po gdong nag cha lugs bsgyur/ khang thog 'tsheg dang 'od sgra 'byin// du ba

'khyil dang thod pa smra// sems can mi mthun mngon du ston// gzhan yang sbyor ba'i las bshad pa// rgya bo mig bzhi'i thod pa ru// sna tshogs bya yi sha dang spu// brdzangs la rgya 'gram khru gang gzhug/ steng du stag

tshil rdo bas gnan// srin bya 'ug pa sgra 'byin 'thag kha skeg bstod cing mchu 'jing za// khra dang ro skeg bshad 'gros ldang// gong sreg mkhar la skad 'byin 'chags// dur bya de mo sder mo 'dzing// mkhar la

chags shing 'phrin lon byed// sram thod nya sprul sram sdig pa// gnyen chu dgu sbyar dang dug/ bag phyes gzugs byas mdze thod gzhug/ mal bres shul du thod pa sba// klu yi cho 'phrul lnga gnyis byung// gnas khang
mi mthun klu yis gang// zhag dang zla bas gzugs rnams 'gyur// tsha ba lnga dang drod sbyar la// gsang sngags bzhi bcu'i bcu pa gsum// sbyor ba gsum gsum dbyungs sbyar na// mi la sogs pa'i mi rigs
la// drod pa phye bo kha med rngubs// rgyas pa dbang po ma dor phyed// dbang po lhag ma'i dmus long shor// 'gyur ba bcu dang yang dag ldan// zas la sngags bzlas zos gyur na// sems la mya ngan

g.yeng dang 'phyongs// smra dang dbang po 'chal dang nyams// mi thub sgul zhing zhus srid rdebs// bcu yis lus sems sgyur bar byed// sngags rengs 'gyur ba'i las re 'grub// spre dang sram gyi thod pa ru// mi
mthun rdzas kyis rnam par dgang// sngags kyi sbyor ba khri dang stong// bzlas la gang 'dod yul la dbab// sbrul sram wa spre nya sbal bya// ri dgas gzugs bzhi tshub ma me// rim pas mkhar la 'dzeg dang

bskor// 'bru brgyad sbyor ba bcu yis dbab// mi mthun gzugs bcu sgyur bar byed// tsha ba gsum dang bcud kyi 'bru// sbyar la sngags gdab bcud la sbal// thod chen dang ni rme thod sbyar// gang 'dod brgyad

bsdebs sbyar byas na// shing dang srog chags rdo dang rus// sgo nga klad dum sha dang khrag/ mi mthun sngo na'am thar pa shul// bcud la bsgyur ba'i las bcu dbab/ khams chen lnga yi glang thod la// tshon sna lnga yis

gzugs bris la// gsang sngags 'bru brgyad bsdebs la sbyar// thog mar 'bru drug de bzhin sbyor// mtshams su gang 'dod a mu ka/ mtha' ma spu gri 'bru bzhi bsdeb// smra dang ldeg dang 'phar zhing 'bod// 'od
dang gzugs ston bla thod 'thab// rus pa'i lus la mgo skam mthong// bsgyur na ru dgod bcu gnyis 'gyur// thog mtha' bzhi la sbyar byas la// grangs phyed re mig brgyad du bsdebs// sgo bzhir sbyor ba
gnyis gnyis bsdeb// g.yas g.yon mtshams kyis bsdebs la brtsi// de dor rim gyis rdzogs bsdebs nas// gcig las 'dren pa'i bye brag rnams// sbyor ba kun la brtsi ba yin// hor rta chu srin d+he'u

las// sbyor ba stobs kyis bsgyur te 'jug/ rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po nas// rin chen mtshams kyi dbus su bsdebs// yab kyi 'bru gsum thog mthar te// drag po'i 'bru las drang ba yin// ma ra duM snying ri mug

ud yamA ti tu ling has phob// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// ral gri'i mtshams su bsdebs la dril// nI shahaM ro thun gzer shan dun tsa a mu ka du ling phas phob/ ral gri'i phyogs bskor snga ma bzhin// k+she

ya trag ta snying ba badzra tsi man/ ra rag rag rag kha rag ta shaaha ni/ de bzhin pad+ma'i phyogs su bsdeb// ta yo ta ro shwi r+hi rubs pa// ni la tsa stu rag rmugs rag tu// mtha' ma rin chen phyogs su bsdeb// me to

e tsi d+h+wi kashahA mugs mo// sa ka ro dralA yamA shamA dz+wa tsa// rdzas dang gnad khang la sogs bsgyur// ltas ngan brgya rtsa gnyis kyi las// thog mtha' rang rkyen snying por ldan// sbyor ba bsgyur nas ma lus
'grub// dang por 'bru drug mtha' mar bzhi// mtshams su gang 'dod a mu ka/ sngags kyi dbal dang sbyor ba'i rkyen// sbyor ba bsdebs na las gang 'grub// 'gyur ba las kyi mchog tu

bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// ltas ngan brgya bcu rtsa gnyis dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po'i sbyor ba 'di nyid spogs pa 'di bshad do// ma khugs

sbyor ba'i rkyen med la// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i drag po yi// tsit+ta sbal pa'i 'khor lo bskor// drag pa'i 'khor lo dbang sgyur la// dug shing rme ba'i dud pas bdug/ myos pa'i khrag dang dug chus bran// dam

rdzas rten rdzas rgyan rdzas dgram// mchod rdzas rol rdzas rag+ta bstab// gsur chen dud pa rus pas bsreg/ 'khor lo ling gabyang khram bca'// thod pa khrag sna thun rdzas brag/ lha yi stobs gzhug bdag dbang
bstim// lus la ye shes 'khor lo bca'// phyag rgya chen po'i rten pa bskyed// dam tshig 'khor lo gsal la byas// ye shes 'khor los byin gyis brlabs// lha yi 'khor los rang dbang bsdu// dam tshig 'khor
los thog tu dbab// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// spyan drangs yab kyi 'od zer mdangs// ye shes rig pa'i dkyil 'khor dgug/ phyag rgya brda yis dbang du bya// mkha' 'gro las can dam la bsdu// las kyi srin

mos mthu'ang gzhug/ rtsa ba'i 'bru lnga bcu gnyis sbyar// oM ya ma me ta k+she/ ra tsa sa to ru na yo/ ni ra ya tsa ni/ yang logs thugs sku gsung mthar sbyar/ mgo dang mtha' rten yang dag ldan// sngon 'gro sbyor ba'i
gsad la min// ma khugs sbyor ba'i stobs med na// spyan drangs mtshan ma gsum gyi dgug/ ye shes phab la dam tshig bstim// bcu bdun mtha' ru mtshan ma gsum// brtags la sbyor ba lngab kyis

dgug/ yang dag dgug pa'i stobs zhan na// mu la thugs dang mtshan ma gsum// sbyar la ya ma ang ku sha/ stong brjod phyag rgya'i mthu dang ldan// ma khugs sbyor ba'i stobs zhan na// ma nas drangs la ud la
bskyal// sha dza dun gyis ya la bstim// khugs kyang las la ma tshud na// drug brgyad yangs la g.yas bskor du// thugs sku gsum la bcu bdun g.yas// 'khor lo rgya log dbus su dril// khugs chen gnad
kyi sbyor bas dgug/ khugs dang las byed bdag 'khu na// bzhi bzhi lnga lnga'i yig 'bru la// mtha' nas dbus su gnyis gnyis dril// mgo spangs mtha' rten gzir gsum bsdeb// bdag gi dbang du ma mo

bsdu// gang yang las la 'bral med na// sbyor ba drag po'i btsan thabs kyis// ma mo gzir la shi sa bstan// khyad par las la ma tshud na// srog dbrog ma mo'i dam tshig bstan// bdag dbang stobs bsdu sbyor
ba brgyad// gsad pa ma yin sbyor ba mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i sems bstan la// bdag gi mi mthun phyogs dbang bsdu// mi 'jigs seng ge lta bus bya// mtha' ru drag po las la sbyar// las kyi

sbyor ba'i stobs zhan na// sku yi 'khor lo rgya log bsgyur// spu gri 'bru brgyad snga ma bzhin// gsung thugs 'khor la bkan bzlog bsdeg/ rtsa ba'i sa bon rlung dang por// sbyor ba'i mtshams su a mu ka/ de bzhin
gzhan yang rims kyis te// bdun pa bdun bskor bzlog la spogs// sgo bzhir sbyor ba bdun bdun bsdeb// dbus nas go bzlog dum nas ti// mtshams bzhi'i sbyor ba mtshan mo ste// bzlog sngags drag
pos gnad la dbab// drag po bdun gyi spogs pa yin// phyag rgya brgyan dang 'dug stangs bzlog/ 'khyil ba sbrul dang 'gros stabs kyis// re mig bcu gnyis nyi ma bzhi// yab kyi 'bru bzhi mtha' ru
bsdebs// mgo dang mtha' rten snga ma bzhin// dang po ral gri'i phyogs nas bsdeb// gnyis pa rdo rje mtshams su bsdeb// rin chen pad+ma go rims bzhin// thams cad mi mthun mthun rnams brdeb// de yi rim
pa mi mthun gzugs// bcu bdun mtha' nas bzlog la bsdeb// ta lang 'gros bzhis bsnol mar bsdeb// re mig gcig por gcig blangs pas// yig 'bru bcu drug bcu drug bsdeb// dbus nas mgo
drangs thob thang brtsi// 'dod pa'i mtshams su a mu ka/ sha za mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba ni// dbang sdud srin mo'i las yin te// kye kam las kyi 'khor lo bca'// mkha' 'gro 'bar ma'i bcud la dril// mtha'
nas dbus su ya la bsdu// dang po rin chen mtshams nas drang// 'bru gsum mtha' ru yab kyis bsdeb// rin chen pad+ma phyogs mtshams te// ral gri'i phyogs mtshams rdo rje'i mtha'// sems kyi rtsa ba bcud
bsdus nas// sa yi khams bsdus chu la thim// chu khams bsdus la grod la bstim// me yi khams bsdus rlung la thim// rlung dbugs rgyun chad nam mkhar bsdu// bsdus nas thig le 'bru gnyis la// steng 'og me

chu gsad cing 'pho// de bzhi thad tshugs sbyor ba brgyad// snga ma de bzhin rim bzlog bsdeb// re mig grangs dang snga ma bzhin// mtha' nas dbus su spogs pa ste// dmar nag gnyis kyis sbyor ba bsdeb// sbal
'gros lta bur dbus su dril// rgyu yi dwangs ma dbyings su bsdu// bde ba'i lam nas 'dod pa'i mkha'// tshangs pa'i gnas su 'od zer spro// tshe gnas bzlog 'khor ya la bsdu// dbus kyi ya la shes pa
bstim// de bzhin sbyor ba kun shes na// drag po gnad kyi spogs pa yin// gzhan du 'ching 'gyur don med 'gyur// srog dang bral ba nyid yin te// drag po 'phrul gyi 'khor lo las// drag po'i 'khor lo
bzlog pa yin// sbyor ba mchog gi las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// drag po spogs pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thog bdag bsgrub pa'i

sbyor ba 'di bshad do// skyin thang 'phrul gyi sbyor ba las// maN+Dal sa yi dkyil 'khor la// don gnyis sgrub pa 'di lta ste// gnas ni ri gsum rtse mo 'am// brag nag chu mdo dur khrod sa// dbyen gnas chen por

tshogs bsags la// tsha gsum chu dang thod pa gsum// phyi mtshams gcad la bar mtshams gnan// lha yi bsnyen pa bye ba yis// ma mo dbang du bsdus la bsnyen// maN+Dal gru bzhi mdzes pa la// khrag sna gsum
gyis chag chag gdab// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par gdab// dbus na thig skor gsum du bskor// dbus su gru gsum nag por bya// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram ldan// yang logs 'khor lo rtsibs drug bya// skam

rlon thod 'phreng thams cad ldan// gru chad bzhi dang khyams kyis bskor// sgo bzhi rta babs mdzes pas brgyan// 'dod yon nor bu chun 'phyang dar// zhing bcu rgyu ma thod pas spras// zhing gi bla re de bzhin

'phen// rdo rje dang ni me rir ldan// chos kyi pho brang drag po la// me long nang du gser dngul nas// bya rgod snying dang nal bu'i snying// gnam lcags khro chu thig gi me// sprul dang snying sna 'o ma zhag/ zla kham

gsum la khrag sna dang// nyungs kar lcags phye thal chen dug/ dung bu khrag dang thod tshal bzhag gru chad bzhi la dgod pa ni// dpal gyi gtor ma ma mo'i rdzas// rak+ta bdud rtsi ldan byas la// dbus su lcags

phur ya ma'i skur// yab yum rgyan dang bcas pa ru// hU~M dang ma la rdzogs par sgom// rgya gram mdzes pa'i gzhi la yang// lcags phur bzhi las skur bskyed pa// ma las gnam sman thog bdag bzhi// smug nag

ser nag dmar nag ljang// sku stod 'brug gi grag pa la// g.yu yi dril bu sbrul gyis brgyan// sku smad stag dang dar nag la// srin mo'i thod pa er kas brgyan// g.yas pa thod 'phreng ban d+ha g.yon// zhing rkyang

gdan la rdzogs par bskyed// rdo rje rgya gram mtshams bzhi la// e maM laM haM 'bru bzhi la// seng ldeng phur pa dbang chen bskur// zhing lpags stag sham thod sbrul brgyan// g.yas na zhing chung ban d+ha g.yon// de

bzhin zhing rkyang gdan la bskyed// phyi yi 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// phyogs bzhir skyer phur bzhi bkod la// ma ra tsi sha 'bru bzhi las// mgo brnyan gdong mo bzhi yi sku// ber nag g.yang gzhi thod sbrul

brgyan// g.yas pa zor pa ban d+ha g.yon// mtshams gnyis 'khor lo'i rtse mo la// ya dang hU~M las sku bskyed pa// khyab 'jug dbang phyug dregs pa bskyed// lha rnams sde brgyad phyogs mtshams gnas// gong nas
'dus pa'i tshul du bsgom// bskyed pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// nag mo bdun b+h+yo brgya rtsa gcig de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// spyan drangs bstim la mchod par dbul// khro bo
gshin rje'i bstod ra btang// khro bo'i thugs kar hU~M gsal bya// rgyal chen gdan las gsang sngags spro// dkyil 'khor ba la nyi dkyil na// ma dang bcas pa'i sngags gsal btab// 'dzab bzlas phyogs
bcur 'od spro dgug/ ma mo 'khor gyi tshogs bcas dgug/ rang dam rang gi snying pos dgug/ phyag 'tshal dkyil 'khor lha la bstim// gtso la srog snying dngos grub dbul// rak+ta rlabs la mchod pa

dbul// snying po spel la 'dzab la 'jug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las srog gi snying po 'di bton no// oM gan d+ha pa sti ga na pu ti sarba big+ha nan pa ma hU~M dza dza/ khri tsho re yin mchod

bstod brlabs// dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum// dkyil 'khor dbus su me 'bar dang// rdzas rnams zhu zhing 'chad na rab// ma mo mdangs dang sku ston dang// phyag 'tshal bkur sti byed na 'bring// sgrub
khang g.yo 'gul khrag khol na// ma mo dbang du bsdus la rbad// gtor ma btang la dam rdzas mchod// drag po gsad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// rab 'bring rtags dang drod thob nas// dbus kyi gru gsum sbag mar

brtsig mthing nag rtsang dang snying snas brgyan// thod pa'i ling gas ming rus brnag/ zhag bdun rbad cing drag pos bskul// rak+ta brlabs la gling bus 'bud// khri khri 'bad la bla dang dbral// bdag dang ma mo

dmag 'dren na// gsang sngags brgya brgya thun la dbab// pho nya bskul la gzir sngags bzlas// bla dang 'brel na phur pa gdab// skya rings rta la zor skyon 'phang// thod pa dur khrod gling du gnan// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di dag bton to// a pa phye sha ru lu ru lu nag mo srog la dun dun ma ma hU~M dza/ ma ma da mun b+h+yo/ yag mo yag mo sod/ thor ma ma rmugs rgyob/

yag+sha nag mo snying la rgyob/ rag mo b+h+yo/ badzra ka ru na rbad/ snying khrag tshal pa rbad/ rngubs rtsi ta la rbad/ myogs mugs rbad/ snying khrag kha la rbad/ tshal bu se na sin du rbad// srog la hur thums ya ya rbad// b+ha ru

rag+sha srog la nan// gsad pa'i las ni lnga dang ldan// gsad pa thun gyi las su bshad// gzhan yang thog ser dbab pa'i las// dong bu khrag sna thod pa mda'// 'bum bzhi khri yis byin brlabs 'phang// nya
stong dgu gsum bcu gcig brgyad// bzhi gnyis las mthar rta zor bskyon// gsang sngags sbyor ba'ang gnyis su bsdeb// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bton

no// oM ma hA tsan+Da pa ta ta na ta ka dzA la dzA la raM raM/ rag sha rag+sha baM/ he dan ra ya phroM phroM/ pa sa ra na hril hril/ a pa sha ya dun dun/ dza ti khu raM b+h+yo/ b+h+yo phroM shar sing krol ma rag raM shar b+h+yo phroM/ 'di

dag sbyor ba dam ste/ las kyi rgyal po kun bsdus yin// ya bag sha yi sbyor bsdus nas// de ba ra tsa'i mkha' dang sbyar// nA ga 'gu lin da la sba// rten gsum yul gyi lus la bsdeg/ sbyor ba'i dam pa mchog tu

bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// skyin thang thun gyi le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gdug pa can gyi srog dril ba 'di bshad do// lha 'dre'i rgyun srang ngam lha khang

du// dkyil 'khor phung shul sa la bya// dug chu khrag gis chag chag gdab// chos kyi pho brang zlum por bya// rtsibs bzhi mu khyud thod pa sbrul// gru chad bzhi dang ldan pa la// dam rdzas snying sna bzhi la rten// ka li

sho na tsa ra spu ra'i don// ka li ka pha thom nag tu// rgyal chen sa yi gdan la dgram// rtsibs la mda' bzhi dar dang dkor// stag gzig gser dngul ldan pa sta// gru chad b+ha li khru re dbus// dkar dmar

nag gsum dkor chas brgyan// zla kham mthing nag rtse mo khrag/ thun rdzas thod pa lcags phur bzhi// byang shar gru gsum ma ra ni// steng na khwa rgod g.yag rnga shun// dpal gyi gtor ma rak+ta phyi// rgyan dang mchod
pa rdzogs bshams la// dkyil 'khor pa yi lha ru bsgom// rgyal chen sa yi dkyil 'khor du// bdag nyid yo dam gsal bsgom la// shar du li byin dkar po rta// za 'og stag gzig zangs gri

mda'// khra dang spyang khu 'grim zhing 'khrol// lho ru dge bsnyen gying chen ljang// za 'og rin chen seng ge zhon// rdo rje rgyal mtshan gcan gzan 'grol// nub tu yab bdud snya la gnag/ zhun khrag thod pa rta nag
zhon// blon po bdun dang pho nya 'grol// byang du btsan dmar dar dkar rta// bse khrab bse mdung mda' dmar sdog/ byang dang byang sman btsan 'phreng 'grol// da tsa dza ra a tri las/ bskyed la bka' nod

rtsibs la bzhag/ 'bru sna shing thog chang dang mngar// rgya chos dkar cha 'bras kyis mchod// lha 'dzab khri la srog snying bod// rang dbang med par dbang du bsdu// grub pa'i rtags ni rnam pa gsum// bya dang

gcan gzan gtod cing za// 'gro phyir 'grol zhing bdag sgo srung// phyi yi rtags de nang du bsdu// rgyal blon ban d+he skya shar kun// bkur sti phyag dang las byed na// me 'bar drod skye nyams stobs che// gsad

rtags mthong na sbyor ba brtsams// steng bzhi bskul zhing rbad sngags bzlas// bla dang sprul pa khugs par bsam// 'brub khung gzugs la thun gyis brab// khugs pa'i rtags ni dud 'gro'am// bya dang ri dwags
gsod cing sha// dmag dpon byed sgra 'gugs na// gsang sngags dril la gzugs la brdeg shes pa 'phel ba'i drod rtags ni// nyams dang 'chal dang thibs dang lkugs// mtshan brdeg g.yul

'gyed mkhar 'bebs na// ru thom nang du rten gzugs bsdu// ru thom kha gcad dar gyis gril// rgya gram mun pa'i bcud la gnan// yi dam lha yi stobs dang sbyor// sngags kyi sbyor ba bzhin du bsdeb// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las dmod sngags drag po 'di bton to// oM dang khrag tu mun/ tsa shu la ha ti dzA/ hri dzA gri ba ra baM hU~M/ badzra sA du ra baM hU~M dza dza/ du kri ra tsa gri ba bi ta ya sarba du sta

ni pa ri b+h+yo/ myogs rbad/ rmugs thibs/ har hur thun rbad/ srog breng shag thun rbad/ ku ma ra tsa srog la shag rbad/ dgra bo thum ril/ zhung khyer srog la shag rbad/ srog khyer hab dang du nan/ ra tsa phye shag khra
nan tsa shu la nan/ hur thums srog gzir nan/ bya ba kun gyi sngon 'gro ba/ bdag dngos snying po nyi shar 'od// phyogs bcu zhing khams bde bas gang// slar 'dus bzhi snying gcig tu dril// bka' nod ci
bcol las rnams byed// mtshon cha thogs nas dmigs pa gsod// sgrol ging bzhi yis khyer zhing bstod// dbang po 'chal nas yan lag gcod/ khong gshags nang khrol bton nas za// don khrag 'thung zhing

bla tshe 'chang// srid pa gsum phung spu gri rno// gsod byed drag po'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// srog bzhi dril nas bsad pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis srog bzhi dril nas lo thog gzhom pa 'di bshad do// sa phug lha khang yul btsan sar// maN+Dal khrag sna gsum gyis byug/ khyi spyang mi yi thod pa la// gar 'bebs yul gyi ming bris la// sha khrag skam po'i
gtor mas dgang// maN+Dal gru chad bzhi la dgod// dong bu thod can 'brong chen rwa// gla dang bcas pa bzhi bshams la// khrag snas bkang la dbab sngags gzhug/ maN+Dal logs bzhi brten bshams

la// g.yas ngur bdud bskyed thod chen gying// spyang thod rgyal po glang ru btsan// bsnyen pa dang bcas chu dril bstim// grub pa'i rtags ni srin la gzung// shing 'dra bar nub nas bsring// byang nas khams

nag skyo skya lho/ kham nag dud kha shar nas 'phung// bka' 'dren lug dang bya yi tshogs// grub pa'i rtags de dbab pa brtsam// lha rten klu gnyan brag btsan la// thod pa gsum gyi rta ma zhug/ yul mthong rtse nas
zor gyis dbab// 'khyag pa'i ro rgod drag po 'bab// gsang ba'i sbyor ba snang snang min// sbyor ba btud na mngon du 'byung// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la dril zhing dbab pa'i
gsang sngags 'di bton no// oM du phrag tu mun phroM dza/ tsa shu la ha ste phroM dza/ hri dza 'gri pa ra ba hU~M phroM dzA/ badzra sa du ra ba hU~M phroM dzA dzA/ a mu ka phroM phroM

shar shar yaM yaM 'ur kham thog thog hril hril kha har shar shar b+h+yo/ mdzes pa'i rgyan dang bsdebs gyur na// bdud btsan gying rgyal srog dril bas// chu rgod ri ltar btibs pa yin// 'bras bu 'joms pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud

las// srog bzhi dril la dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khrag thun gyi sbyor ba 'di rgyas par bshad do// gnyan ra gdug pa'i bde gnas su// dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi

la// dbus su mthing nag zla kham gsum// rtsibs bzhi thod pa rkam rlon 'phreng// sgo bzhi gru chad 'dod yon khyams// dur khrod sbrul dang chu srin brgyan// gtor ma gsur dang snying gsum rdzas// mchod pa la
sogs bsnyen pa 'bum// mthing nag dbus su mon thod gzugs// ming rus dri ma brnag pa'i khams// nag gsum khrag dang yugs sa bsnol// khrol bu dug gi chu yis bkru// ya ma rag sha khams rbad
las// sha za ki kaM mon gyi gzugs/ khams gsum gang bas khyab par bsam// brgyad nas dbu gzugs bcu drug gdon// nyi shu gnyis nas stong gi bar// zhag dgu thun sgrub srog la rbad// bcu bcu grangs

gzung khrag la bstim// sha za pho mo rngam pa kun// zhal nas sngags zlos rlangs pa 'phro// gdug pa'i mtshon chas brnag pa 'joms// phyag brnyan drod 'phros ar+ya bskul// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi// rgyu yi

tshul gyi pho nya rbad// me mar gsad phyir khrag thun dbab// drod dbang gzhom phyir chu khams dkrug/ dug gsum gzhom phyir gnad gsum bsdeg/ rgyu gnyis gsad pa'i shes pa dbral// phung po khams dang dbang
po yul// 'joms byed gdug pa'i drag sngags brdeg/ 'ja' tshon me tog lha yi rtags/ khol lam lud na 'phang ba'i drod// rnyog gam 'phro na khugs pa'i rtags// rngam tshig nyon mongs yul la 'bar// gsad

pa drag po'i drod yin pas// bskul zhing bstim la lam du gzhug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi thugs las thun sngags 'di bton to// ya ma rag shaM baM ri li li khrag la mu sha tsit+ta hur thum rag sha tsit+ta

baM srog la thun b+h+yo/ sngags pa chas bzlos thig le gdab// dpang gzugs lam dbye spyi bcings 'phang// khrag thun drag po'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// khrag thun gyi le'u ste zhe bdun
pa'o///// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyungs kar thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// maN+Dal dbus su gtor ma rdzas// ya ma'i skur bsgoms bsnyen pa 'bum// gru gsum rtsang bcas thod par
