gzugs// lho ru bris sku g.yang gzhi 'phan// byang nub gri thod nyungs kar thun// khrag dang dug bskus sha za'i gzugs// spyang mo rngum pa pho nya bla// khyi dom rgyug pa sprul pa drod// khyung khra dur bya

klad khrag srog/ bdud dang mon pa shan pa len// sbrul nag gdug 'gro blo snying rtsa// sha za'i tshogs rnams rngam zhing rol// khri tsho dgu ru bla la rten// dril zhing nyungs kar spog la 'phar// de byung gzugs ya

brdeb cing brab// bdud dang mon gyi pho nya mngag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las thun sngags 'di bton to// shrI ya ma rag sha dun mugs rtsa la yaM yaM srog la 'dun b+h+yo/ stag bya'i rgod ngar
nyungs kar blug/ rgyud med gzhu yis dgra la 'phang// drag po 'joms pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// nyungs kar thun sgrub pa'i le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis dug thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// spyang dug ra dug nim pa dug/ bong nga thar nu re lcag pa// 'om mo byang pa skye khrag dug/ gri bo'i thod pa sbyar la brnag/ ling ka ming yang thod par gzhug/ 'thom

nag gsum gyi kha la brdeg/ mthing nag yol ba zhing lpags gur// gshin rje'i sku bsgoms bsnyen pa 'bum// bdud dang sha za mon pa bskul// thun sngags brgya rgya thod par brdeg/ shan pa'i tshogs rnams thun
khrag rlob// thun brdeg dgra la dug zor 'phen// thun sngags brgya yis shan pa bskul// thun la rlangs pa 'phro na 'phang// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las thun sngags 'di bton

no// ya ma kha la da rod tsa la baM ril tsa ma ri ha la snying khrag hur baM srog la thun b+h+yo/ gsang sngags 'chad la dril la brdeg/ 'od byung me 'bar khol nas 'phang// mda' yis lam dbye thod pa 'phang// 'thom
chen gsum gyis ra zor 'phang// gsur chen gtang la sha za bskul// sbyor ba drug gi mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// dug thun gyi le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis mda' thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ri sogs dben pa'i dur khrod du// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rgyan dang ldan// dbus su gru gsum zla kham bzhi// phyi rim rtsibs bcu sgo bzhi me// dur khrod rgyan dang gtor

ma rdzas// dbus su zhing bsnol ma he'i gdan// gshin rje nag po rab 'jigs sku// sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa// dur khrod chos sku me ri klong// 'khor lo kha T+wAM be con g.yas// zhing chung dgra sta thod pa

g.yon// sngo nag gtum mo g.yon nas 'khyud// zla kham gsang ba'i drod 'dzin bzhi// thod pa thon khrag rlob cing 'phen// zhing chung sbrul nag sku la gsol// rtsibs la bdud po mi zan bcu// sgo bzhi bse yi skyes
bu bzhi// bse khrab bse rmog thod sbrul brgyan// g.yon pa bse gzhu dug mda' g.yas// bse yi rngam khri 'brug la zhon// dug mda' ltas ngan sgro bzhis bsgron// dkyil 'khor dbus su rgya gram
bzhag/ 'og tu ling ka ming byang brnag lha bskyed spyan drangs mchod mthar dbul// mda' bzhi 'gul 'gul thun brdeg bskul// khrag gis bran la dug ngar blud// nya gsum drag po'i tshes la 'phang// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la thun sngags 'di bton to// ya man ta ka dun mugs/ ya ma rA tsa tsit+ta rbad/ kha la yag mo yag sha ma ra dun ni dza rbad/ dun sni baM/ hur hur ling ling thuM thuM hri
shag thun b+h+yo/ gsang sngags sbyor ba'i rgyal po yis// rtsa rgyud dbugs lam gcod cing 'joms// rab tu brnag pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// mda' thun gyi le'u ste lnga bcu
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phur thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// yid mthun dben pa'i dur khrod du// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi la// gru gsum rtsibs gzhi rtsibs bcur ldan// dbus su
yab yum gri lcags 'gying// rtsibs bzhir gshed bdag mchog chen bzhi// yang logs gdug pa'i mngag 'phur bcu// khyams la las kyi gdab phur khri// mu ran kha khyer ke sing rtsang// sgo bzhir sgo ma'i

mgyogs phur dgod// zhing rkyang re'am gru gsum la// rdzas kyi phur pa lha ru bskyed// spyan drangs mchod pa byin gyis brlab// sngags kyis dbang bskur phyag rgya bstan// gtso la khri khri 'khor la stong// rdzas la me
'bar drod thob na// byang nub 'brub gnas gtsang bcas bca'// thod pa ling ka byang khram brnag/ pho nya bsngags la dbang po dgug/ rten gyi gzugs la sbyor ba dbab// gnas lnga yan lag drod la
brdeg/ lhag ma byin brlabs mchod pa bsngo// dug lnga'i mchod ma/ ye shes lha yi gnas la dgod// dbang bskur byin brlabs brtan pa bskyed// lhag ma rjen shun ro khang gnan// drag po thun gyi sbyor ba
yis// btab ba'i kun rlag gdon mi za// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs las thun sngags 'di bton to// ya man ta ka srog la hur thum rbad/ ya ma me ta k+she srog la gzer thum rbad/ ra tsa sa to ka pa

ling myogs rbad/ ra na yo na tsit+ta khaM rbad/ ra ya tsa ni tsa la breng shag rbad/ ma ma snying thun rag mo raM thun ru lu ru lu ki la ya srog la thun rbad/ brnag pa'i rgyal po sngags kyi thun// don gnyis kun thar bstab pa
bya// bkrag dang gzi mdangs shes pa bsdu/ 'joms thog chen gzer// drag po'i phur thun gsang bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// phur thun gyi le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsang thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dur khrod rme ba'i rdzas la sogs la// phungs gsum gyi stegs bu la// dbus su gru gsum 'thom nag gzhug/ nang du rig po'i tsit+ta

la// byang bu dmar nag gnyis bres la// dgra bo pho rgyud mo rgyud gzhug/ dur khrod ras la sngags bris la// rog po'i tsit+ta'i phyi nas dril// ra dang bcas pa dar gyis dgab// gtor ma brnag pa'i steng du
bca'// khrag dang dam rdzas gsur gyis bskor// khrag gsum thun brdeg 'bru gsum brab// phye gsum dug gsum de bzhin bstim// thun brdeg snying gshog rtsa yang gcod// gsad pa'i drod dang dngas ma

'brel// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las thun sngags 'di bton to// ya ma kha la rag sha da rod yaM yaM thun/ ya ma rmugs ni rmugs sni tsit+ta shag ya ma kha la ma ting shaM shaM rtsa la rbad/

bal thun snying thun myags srog la thun b+h+yo/ rnam shes brgyad dang dwangs ma bzhi// dbang po bkrag mdangs tshangs pa'i rtsa// gcod cing 'joms par byed pa'i sngags// gsang ba thun gyi rgyal po 'di// rang dbang
'dus nas rang zor 'phang// brnag pa'i yul mkhar gzugs la brdeg/ dpang gzugs 'o dod bden pa brjod// gsang thun sngags kyi rgyal por bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// gsang thun gyi
le'u ste nga gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdong drug pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sa gzhi brnag la rtsub pa yi// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// brag dang sa phug gnyan sa ru// dkyil

'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod rlon bskor// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// thod skam 'phreng ba rak+ta 'dzag gru chad sgo bzhi zhing brgyad 'degs/ tshangs pa'i gdung la zhing chung

ldan// nyi zla la sogs rin chen mdzes// dbus ru tra pho mo bsnol// ma he nyi zla'i gdan la hU~M// yan lag sbyor bas ya ma'i sku// nag po rngam khro brjid pa la// zhal drug g.yas dkar g.yon dmar te// 'og

ma'i g.yas ser g.yon pa sngo// dbus mthing 'og ma'i dud kha rngam// spyan gsum mche gtsigs ag tshom ser// thod pa he ru sbrul gyis brgyan// phyag mtshan bcu gnyis sbom la rags// 'khor lo ral gri kha T+wAM
mda'// dgra sta dbyug tho g.yas bar bsnams// ban d+ha tri shul lcags kyu gzhu// zhags pa zhing chung g.yon na bsnams// zhabs brgyad brkyang bskum dor thabs tshul// rigs bzhi brgyan pa lhu tshig

gnyan// glang chen stag lpags g.yang gzhi blugs// bdud srin mgo gcad do shal spras// g.yon na sgeg mo sgo nag gtum// tri shul ban d+ha 'khyud nas stob// thugs kar ya ma rA tsa yang// sku mdog sngon po
sbrul gyis brgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug sha khrag za// g.yas pa 'khor lo be con zhing// g.yon pa zhags pa dgra sta snying// sprul pa'i thugs khar nyi ma hU~M// yab yum thabs dang shes rab

las// srog gi tri ta bzhi gnas// rtsibs bzhi zhing bsnol ma he'i gdan// phyi rim 'khor lo bcu gnyis la// zhing brkyang ma he'i gdan steng na// kong tshe gsod byed lha mchog dmar// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
bzhir gnas// tel pa phya sangs dmigs pa glang// shar lho la sogs mtshams bzhi gnas// nag po nag 'joms steng 'og gnas// khram thogs rtsis 'debs rtsibs gnyis la// thams cad yum rnams
g.yon nas 'khyud// sgo bzhir be con lcags kyu dang// tho ba ral gri thogs pa bzhi// khro mo gtum khro rgyal chen bcas// lhun po bzhi dang bcas pa dgod// dam tshig dkyil 'khor brtan byas la// ye shes

dkyil 'khor phab la bstim// bya ba'i rim pa kun rdzogs nas// lha yi bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// thon nas gang 'dod las la sbyar// 'khor lo sbyin sreg thun gyi mthar// thod pa 'khor lo brnag pa gnan// tshe

dang 'dod pa'i sid+hi blang// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bton// oM shrI many+dzu a kro te ka ya man ta ka pe la rig+sha man hU~M dza dza/ ya ma rak+ta du raM tsit+ta thun mA ra
ya rbad/ srog la nan/ 'khor lo sbyor ba brgya phrag gcig bsdus pas rtsa ba bcud dang gcig sbyor ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ zhal drug pa'i le'u ste nga gsum
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gsum pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dug gsum sbyor ba gzhom pa'i phyir// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// shin tu dben pa'i dur khrod dam// phug dang sa

phug dben pa ru// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla kham bzhi dang ldan pa bri// thod 'phreng me ri phyi ru 'bar// lho yi phyogs kyi zla kham la// 'jigs pa'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// sku yi gzugs
brnyan bzhugs su gsol// g.yas su sgeg mo ral gcig ma// g.yon du za byed pe ta li// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi zla kham la// sku yi gzugs brnyan dgod par bya// yang na snying po yig 'bru las// sku yi

gzugs brnyan bzhugs su gsol// yang na snying po yig 'bru las// skur bskyed de ni bsgom par bya// byang gi phyogs kyi zla kham ste// snying po yi ge bris pa las// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza yis// skur bsgoms
mchog phur sor gsum gzugs// gshin rje yab yum lto ba ru// 'tshogs par sbyar ba'i ya thags kyis// kang ka'i sgro'am bya rog sgros// yi btags kyi ni gos la bri// 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba sngar bzhin
las// dgra yi rkang rjes la sogs pa// ling ga sor brgyad tsog pur bzhag ri sho dang ni gro ga la// de yi rus dang ming bris la// snying kha dag tu glan te bzhag/ gshin rje yab yum bar du

gzhug/ tshon gyi skud pas bcings nas su// mtshan ngan ban d+ha kha sbyar du// bcug la bud med yugs sa mo'i// skra yi thag pas bcings par bya// mthing nag gru gsum steng du gzhag/ gtor ma gsum dang arga
bcas// byas te dkyil 'khor 'gram du bzhag gsur chen dud pa gtang bar bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor bcas nas ni// sngags pa chas gos nag po gon// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// khro bo sngags kyis
mtshams bcad la// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom// khrag 'thung yab yum bskyed nas ni// spyan drangs mchod dang bstod pa bya// bshags pa dag ni gzhung bzhin bya// ma shar bgrangs pa'i tshes

brgyad de// nyi shu gsum nas drug tu ni// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ni// ya man ta ka'i bsnyen pa bya// dgongs dang tho rangs gtor ma gtang// nyi shu bdun nas gnam stong du// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ste// gsad

pa yi ni las bya ste// bdag nyid khro bo'i skur bsgoms la// lho ru kha bltas mdun du ni// ha khung gru gsum rtse mo lhor// chag gang thur du brkos pa la// ming rus bsregs pa'i sol ba yis/ kha dog nag po dag

tu bya// de yi nang du ban d+ha gzhug/ gshin rje dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// khro bo zhabs ni g.yon pa ni// rdo rje phur pa rtse gcig par// bsgoms te gshin rje'i snying khar gnan// dgug cing dbang du bsdu ba

yi// snying po sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni// nyin mtshan phye la mtshan mo bzlas// gshin rje nag po 'khor dang bcas// rang dbang med par dbang du 'du// ji ltar bcol ba'i las kyang byed// snying po sngags kyi
bar bar du// khro bo'i bstod ra gtang bar bya// rag ta bstabs te mchod pa 'bul// gshin rje las la btsud nas ni// dgra bo myur du gsad pa'i phyir// ban d+ha dkyil 'khor thog tu bzhag/ bcol ba'i las

kyi sngags bzhi ni// nyin mtshan phye la mtshan mo bzlas// sngags kyi bzlas brjod bar bar du// rdza rnga brdungs te gshin rje bod// rak+ta bsgreng ste mchod pa btab// 'khur ba bus te spyugs pa blang// dung ting ka

yi sngags brjod la// dgra bo de la gshin rje rbad// tshes gcig tu ni brtsis pa yi// nyin mtshan gnyis kyi mtshams su ni// gnan pa yi ni cho ga bya// lha klu gdug pa'i 'dugs dang// ro yi khong du song nas
ni// gnan pa'i ban d+ha de nyid la// ri rab bang rim gsum pa dang// snying po lam dang bcas pa bri// snying po sngags dang ri rab bskyed// ri rab kyi ni 'og tu gzhug/ steng du lha yi pho brang gdab//
'jigs byed ya ma rA dza yi// mchog gi phur pa sor gsum pa// gnan pa'i sngags ni stong bzlas la// rdo rje phur pa brtse gcig tu// bsgoms te ling ka'i snying khar btab// gshin rje yab yum lto
bar gzhug/ mtshan ngan ban d+har bcug nas ni// snga ma bzhin du thag pas bcings// ro yi khung bur sbas te bzhag gshin rje nag po'i lag tu gtad// ya man ta ka'i sngags kyis gzir// gdon mi za bar

gsod par byed// las kyi gnas smin sbyang ba'i phyir// bskang gso'i cho ga rgya cher bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di dag bton no// oM shrI many+dzu a kro

te ka ya nam ta ka de bI kro d+hI shwI yag+sha dza dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti sa ma ya stom ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M dza dza/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha pan dza hU~M/ ya ma snying sha sha dzA dzA dun yam snying ru pa sha ya ma A kar+sha ya hU~M

dza dza/ oM hri Sh+ti bi kri tA na a mu ka sha trun nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma me ta k+she a ka pra ma ya rbad ya rA dza sa to a mu ka rak+ta ra tsa ya rbad ya/ ru na yo ni a mu ka mur dza yA rbad ya/ ra ya tsa ni a mu ka mA ra ya rbad ya/

oM shrI many+dzu che ge mo ka la rU pa stam pa ni hU~M phaT/ hU~M ya man ta kri ta badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M/ stam pa ya nan nan/ gsad pa mchog gi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// zhal gsum pa'i le'u ste nga
bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gcig pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan yang zhal gcig sgrub pa ni// dur khrod chen po'am gnyan ra ru// gtor ma bdud rtsi sha chen snying// mchod pa

rak+ta dur khrod rgyan// bshams la zhing bsnol ma he'i gdan// hU~M las khro bo gshin rje'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ spyan gsum dbu skra sbrul gyis bcings// stod nas me 'bar glang chen

gyon// smad nas khrag 'dzag stag lpags sbrul// bdud dang ma mo mgo bos brgyan// mu stegs snying 'phreng do shal byas// snyan cha mgur chu gdub sor kun// rigs bzhi sbrul gyi brgyan pa'o// g.yon na mi zad

gtum khro ma// mthing nag zhing gi gos zu can// thod pa rin chen sbrul gyis brgyan// g.yas pa kha T+wAM tri shul 'khyud// g.yon pa be con thod khrag yab la bstob// thugs ka'i sa bon hU~M dang ma// sngags dang ldan

pa mdun du bskyed// sngags pa ya nan ta kar bsgom// sngags kyis spyan drangs mchod la bstod// rak+ta sbrengs la mchod pa dbul// mdzo rtol spre'u'i thod pa ru// brnag pa'i ling ka ming rus gzhug/ mkhar nag

skud pas thod par bsdam// rme ma 'am bsnol ma'i zhabs mas gril// mthing nag gru gsum nang du gzhug/ snol khrag gri khrag yugs sa'i khrag/ rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye gsum// nyungs kar skye tshe bra
bo'i thun// phur pa ral gri brnag pa'i mtshon// thun bzhi'i sbyor bas brab cing gsad// nya gsum mtha' ru klu la gtad// drag po thun gyis bzlas brjod dang// nyin mo gtor ma nub mo
dril// gshin rje nag po'i lag tu gtad// dregs pa mtsho 'khrugs stobs kyis gnan// drag po sngags kyis gzir la bca'// lha yi pho brang brtan par brtab// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku

gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di dag bton to// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka pe ta li hU~M dza dza/ ya man ta ka ma ma hri sti srog la ling thun/ ling thun rbad/ ma ma kro d+ha tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ ka li rag

mo tsit+ta phrig phrig shaM ni rbad/ ya ma me sa ma ya srog la thum thum nyal nyal rbad/ ya man ta ka ma ma hri ti che ge mo'i srog la gzir nan/ mchog tu sngags pa'i rgyal blon 'joms// thun bzhi las kyi sbyor bar
bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// zhal gcig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshed bzhi'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gsad bcu rtsa ba'i man ngag mchog/ de yi

sbyor ba 'di lta ste// ri nag 'ja' tshon chu gling du// dkyil 'khor dug gi chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum rtsibs bzhi ldan// thod 'phreng gru chad rgyan rnams mdzes// sgo bzhi mtsho gling dur khrod
'dud// gnas kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'jigs pa'o// dbus na yi btags ma he'i gdan// snying sna don khrag thod par bcas// ya man ta ka rdzogs par bskyed// rang 'dod yan lag 'khyud pa'i yum// gtso

dang gnyis med 'khyud pa las// rtsibs bzhi gdan la kri kra bzhi// gcer bu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// thod skam dbu rgyan gdengs ka sbrul// thod rlon do shal rigs bzhi'i brgyan// phyag g.yas zhing chung
'khor lo g.yon// smug nag ser nag dmar nag ljang// yum yang yab la 'khyud nas stobs// tsit+ta ban d+ha g.yas dang g.yon// rdzogs pa'i tshul du gdan la dgod// spyan drangs mchod dang rag ta
btab// bsnyen pa'i drod rtags gcer bu 'bum// gdug pa'i sngags bzlas mtshon cha brdeg gsad pa'i ro la za yin rol// 'od sgra mthong nas 'khor lo bskor// gshed kyi sbyor ba bcu gnyis gcig 'og
nas bshad pa'i sbyor ba bsdeb// las kyi mtha' btul gnyan la gtad// sngags kyi sbyor ba gsum du brdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di bton

no// oM ya ma me ta k+sha hU~M dza dza/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gshed bzhi'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nga drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal zhi ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sa gzhi snum
la 'jam pa'i phyogs// skyed mos tshal dang bde gnas su// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi spos dang ldan// chos kyi pho brang zlum por bya// nor bu'i 'phreng ba zlum por bskor// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad

mdzes// dra ba dra phyed 'dod yon spras// rin chen chun 'phyang dril bus brgyan// rdo rje me 'od bum pas mdzes// rin chen me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// phyi khyams sems dpa'i gdan dang ldan// sgo bzhi rgyan dang
ka pas 'degs// ba dan dril bu yid 'ong bskyod// gtor ma mchod rdzas lcang lo rten// bkra shis rdzas dang bdud rtsis dgang// dkar dmar dar dang hU~M rgyas gdab// gtso bo'i mdun du gzhag par bya// lha

yi gzhal yas mdzes par bshad// chos kyi pho brang seng ge'i gdan// pad+ma'i gdan la hU~M las bskyed// sku mdog dkar ser gzhon nu'i tshul// rin chen dbu rgyan snyan cha brgyan// mgur chu tshangs skud do shal
can// sems dpa'i skyil krung dbus nas 'gying// zhal bzhad tshems bzang smin mtshams 'brel// dbu skra lcang lo mthon mthing kha// phyag gi 'khor lo rab tu mdzes// 'gying bag 'khril ldem gzhon tshul
can// g.yas pa ral gri po ti g.yon// thugs kha'i sa bon dang ldan pa'o// 'dab brgyad pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// sems dpa'i rin chen chos dang las// rigs lnga'i dbu

rgyan do shal mdzes// phyag mtshan ming gis mtshon pa'o// mtshams bzhir lA s+ya mA le dang// glu gar lha mo bzhi dang ldan// gra bzhir dbyangs nas mchod ldan ma// tsar tsi ka dang phag mo bzhi// dkar 'jam rgyan

ldan bum pa thogs// gtso la phyogs shing gzhom tshul ldan// khyams la sems dpa' bcu drug ldan// sgo bzhir rdo rje be con dang// ral gri gtun shing thogs pa yis// gtum mo ro langs yag sha hri// rdo rje
gsod byed byang du dgod// spyan drangs mchod mthar dbang bskur brlab// sngags pas thun bzhir bzlas pa bya// sngags kyi bar bar mchod dang bstod// gang 'dod dngos grub 'phrin las bcol// skye med
gnas nas snying po bskul// sngags bzlas spros la khams gsum sbyang// mtha' ru zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dbul// sngags pas bkrus la dngos grub blang// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs

las sngags 'di bton to// oM shri many+dzu ma hA shAn+ti ku ru hU~M dza dza// thab khung pho brang dkar la zlum// bsregs shing bsreg rdzas de bzhin sbyar// gsang chen sngags bcus mchod pa dbul// dngos grub gang

'dod thob par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ 'jam dpal zhi ba'i le'u ste nga bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thar byed 'byung ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dang po'i sbyor ba 'di lta
ste// gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba las// thar byed 'byung ba'i 'phrin las 'di// myos dang mgo 'khor brlams pa dang// yid 'khrug khrag tu skyug par byed// sgrub pa'i mthar byed drug tu
bshad// ya ma thar byed sbyor ba ni// yi btags gos la thang ba bya// thig bzhi btab las sum brtsegs bskor// 'khrul mig brgyad dang bcu gnyis dang// mtha' ma bcu drug ldan par bya// bcu bdun sngags
kyis mdzes byas la// bcu drug dbyangs kyis legs par bskor// hri sti sngags dang lto sbyor la// ya ma rA dza'i tshogs bkug la// byin brlabs bstan pa'i ngar dang ldan// gsang mdzod bzhi dang 'bub gnas
su// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu bkug la bzhag/ bdag nyid gshin rje thar byed sku// yum dang bcas pa bsgom byas la// phyogs bcu'i ya ma thams cad kun// ma lus rngam mam dregs pa'i tshul// bzlas pa'i snying
po ma nor bar// sgra dang 'du byed rab spangs te// rab tu sdang mig sdang sems bcas// g.yeng dang bcas pa'i sems spangs la// nyin mtshan rgyun du dka' thub brtan// bar bar bskur zhing las gnyer

gtad// bcol ba'i las kyis sngags bzhi yang// nyin mo bzlas shing pho nya rbad// hri sti mtshan mo rbad cing dgug/ rigs kyi rgyal pos brgyan byas la// dbang sdud drag po'i las dang sbyar// mi dmigs gtso

bo'i sngags rgyas gzir// sgrol dang mthar phyin gnas la dgod// khro bos rigs kyi ting 'dzin brgyun// sgyu ma'i dbang bskur ting 'dzin rten// go 'phang bla med sbyor bas bgrod// rjes su brten cing cho 'phrul

ldan// thugs rjes zhe sdang gnas su sgrol// shes rab sbyor bas 'dod chags sgrol// ye shes sgrol mas gti mug sgrol// yon tan bde bas nga rgyal sgrol// gtang snyoms lhag pas phrag dog sgrol// me dang 'od
dang sbrang bu'i tshul// me lce drod kyis sbrang rtsi ltar// bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po dang// log pa'i sems 'chad dgra dang bgegs// shes rab thabs kyis gzir nas sgrol// tha dad sbyor ba'i 'brel ba

yis// yid 'khrug khrag skyug sgrol ba mchog/ ral gri thog mtha' spu gri'i sngags// gnas dang gnad pa ma yin rten// nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal srog rgyu dang rgyu min bag chags bla// bsgral nas thar

pa'i gnas su sgrol// de la drag po'i stobs dang ldan// las dang bya ba'i rtsol ba rnams// nyams kyi drod dang ldan par sbyar// mi 'am phag gi mgo bo la// gi haM rgya skyegs khrag gis bris// rgya gram ri rab gru
gsum la// 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags dang// gang yang dmigs pa spel byas la// rak+ta dug gi chu yis bran// dgra dang mu stegs gnod byed kun// bdud dang srin po ma lus rnams// gzir zhing
mnan pa drag tu bya// mi mthun phyogs su 'dul byed 'du// skur bsgoms thams cad bsgral zhing brnag kha sbyor thod pa sngar bzhin bca'// zhe sdang gtum khro'i phyogs su gnan// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di dag bton to// hri Sh+ti pi kri tA na na hU~M che ge mo sha trun nA sha ya mA ra ya rbad/ ya sogs bcu bdun snga ma bzhin/ hri Sh+ti tA na na b+hi a ti nan hU~M che

ge mo sha truM nA sha ya staM b+ha ya nan/ bya ba kun rdzogs ya ma'i las// mthar byed 'byung ba dang por bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// gshin rje mthar byed kyi le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis log 'dren thar byed kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas btsal ba// bdud dang srin mo rngam pa'i tshogs// mu stegs dgra dang dmigs pa'i gdon// gdul phyir log

'dren thar byed bsgrub// 'phrin las rgyal po 'khrul 'khor bca'// 'khor lo snga ma bzhin bris ya// 'khor lo dbus kyi lte ba la// bdud rnams bsngags pa'i snying pos bskor// shar du dri za'i snying po bri// lho

ru grul bum de bzhin bri// nub tu klu yi snying po bri// byang du gnod sbyin rgyud grol gnas// du na big+h+nan/ rak+sha kra hU~M/ tir rgya ka ta tsa/ nA ga hri ta nan/ da pa ra hU~M yaM/ gsang mdzod bzhi yi mun khang du// srog

dgug dbye dang gsad gzir bzhi// snying po mda' dang bcas pa dgod// ni dza A kar+sha ya/ ni ba spu phaT/ nri mA ra ya rbad/ nri srog la big+h+nan/ thod pa rlon pa bris byas la// mu khyud thod pa'i 'phreng bas
gtams// phyi rol sbrul gyis yongs su bskor// rnam par tshe ba'i gzugs byas la// khyi spyang dar ma'i thod par ldan// yang na kham pa'i ga 'ur bca'// dar ram skud pa dmar pos bcings// gru gsum dbus

su bzhag par bya// rtse gcig phyag rgya'i skur bsgoms la// gtum mo mi zad mi ro za// g.yas pa ral gri lcags kyu g.yon// gnod sbyin lpags pa'i thod pas rgyan// rlung ngam yid kyi rta la zhon// gzhon nu nor
bus brgyan pa'i yul// bcas la zhag gsum drag por bzlas// bgegs dang log 'dren dbang du 'du// gzhan yang de bzhin khro zhing rngam// dkar dmar ser dang smug ljang nag/ so so'i cha lugs rngam pa'i
gzugs// mgon po gshin rje nag po yis// bgegs dang log 'dren gzir zhing rbod// rngam pa'i zhal du za yin rol// nyin zhag gsum gyis bzlas pa rdzogs// yang nas yang du gzir zhing gnan// lan
grangs stong rtsa gcig tu brdeg gtad pa gong gsum rgya gram sar// ma yengs brtson 'grus brgya stong mthar// bde ba med pa'i gzugs rnams gnan// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku

gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// du na b+hi na nan/ rak+shaM kra hU~M/ tir rgya ka ta dza/ nA ga hri da nan/ da pa ra hU~M yaM ni mA ra ya rbad/ sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan par gdags/ rgyal mtshan me long gi
rgyud las/ log 'dren mthar byed kyi le'u ste nga dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mthar byed kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// zhing ras rgyu la 'khor lo bca'// mu khyud gsum bskor thig
bzhi gdab// 'khrul dmigs brgya dang bcu gnyis gdab// mtha' ma bcu drug gcod pa'i gnas// ya ste tsa ba la las skyed// me la srog ste ta la sdud// g.yo byed k+she la khyab par gsal// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo

klong bu mig ra ste srog byed tsa la sdud// sa te skyed pa to te smin// ru yis 'phul zhing na la 'bebs// yo la g.yo med ni la srog/ ra ste spor byed ya yis bskyod// tsa de dbang byed ni la thim// gshed bdag
'khor los gcod cing 'bigs// mtha' ma drag po spu grir ldan/ kha sbyar ming rus thod par ldan// mthing nag dbus su brnag pa gzhug/ rang nyid gnod sbyin mthar byed sku// yab yum yan lag rdzogs par
bsgom// gnyis med byang chub sems spros pas// yum gyi pad+mar 'khyil zhing 'dril// 'phros pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchod// bdag dang bcas pa'i gzugs bsgral nas// slar 'dus yum dang bcas la

myos// gdug pa 'dul phyir 'od zer spros// khro bo chen po'i dgra ston pa// las kyi mthar byed 'phrin las bskul// sdang byed gnod sbyin mthar byed ltar// bar chad med par spro zhing dgug/ de dag zil gyis

gnon cing 'joms// de yis dngos dang sku yi mdangs// nag po chen po gnod sbyin 'khol// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// thod pa sbrul mgo'i dbu rgyan can// phyag g.yas zhing chung ban d+ha g.yon// spyan
gsum mche gtsigs brkyang bskum bzhugs// mi mthun bgegs dang sdang ba'i dgra// ma lus 'phrin las mchog gis 'joms// dregs pa khyo shug gdan la 'dug/ zhing chen g.yang gzhis brgyan byas

nas// glang chen stag dang thod sbrul brgyan// 'dren pa'i stobs kyis 'gugs shing 'ching// las kyi rgyal pos sgrol gyin stobs// 'gro ba'i shes pa ri pa dbyings la dgod// zhe sdang thugs 'chang khro bo'i rgyal
pos gnan// gdug par gyur pa'i sa ru thod mkhar gdab// nga rgyal la sogs dug gsum lto bar 'chang// ye shes ngang las thams cad rdzogs par byed// rtag tu gsod cing gnan pa'i snying po bzlas// de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bton to// oM hri Sh+ti bi kri tA na na tsa ya ra ma ta hU~M phaT/ ba yu yaM khaM me dra hri sti a mu ka mA ra ya rbad/ 'khor lo bskor zhing gsang
sngags bzlas// gsang sngags mi bul mi drag par// bzlas na yig 'khrug myos shing gsod// rab tu brgyal nas thal bar 'jig/ gnan pa gdug pa'i sa ru bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud
las// gnod sbyin mthar byed kyi le'u ste drug cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi btags mthar byed kyi sbyor ba bshad do// mthar byed 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi dbus su pho brang

brtsam// me thab e yi phyogs can la// bang rim sum brtsegs kha khyer can// ngos la mi yi 'phreng ba gdags/ kha khyer rdo rje ra ba la// mu ran thod pa'i 'phreng ba ste// bsregs shing ming rus shing dang sbam// me

la kha dog shin tu gnag/ rid pa zhugs gling bgrang 'phreng bsnams// mthar byed be con thod pa thogs// tshul bzhin spyan drangs mchod dang bstod// gang ltar 'dod pa'i 'phrin las bcol// sbyin sreg mchod

rdzas brnag pa'i gzugs// dug dang lam tshwa thar nu khrag/ skye tshe sbrang rtsi nyungs nag tshil// gu gul nag po lcags phye rus// bdag nyid lnga yi skur bsgoms la// mchod pa gsang sngags brgya yis dbul// phyag
rgya zil gnan mtshon chas gtub// dkyil 'khor bskor gin gsang sngags bzlas// mar khu chen po gsum gyis dbul// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bton

to// oM hri sti par kha na raM raM laM khaM a mu ka raM mA ya hU~M phaT/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ yi btags mthar byed kyi le'u ste re gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu mthar byed kyi sbyor ba
'di bshad do// srin po klu dbang kun bsdus nas// mthar byed 'byung ba'i 'phrin las brtsams// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pho brang zlum// zla kham bzhi dang ldan pa la// dkar nag sbrul dang thod pas
brgyan// dbus su ya ste shar du ta// yo ni lho la ru ni nub// byang du ra dgod zla kham steng// bdag nyid 'ching byed byad kyi sku// dbu gsum phyag drug dkar dmar gnag/ ba spu gsal zhing lcags kyu

g.yas// chu gri ka ta rgya gram g.yon// glang chen stag sham zhing chung brgyan// dur khrod klu dbang rgyan mchog ldan// ma lus sku la sogs pa la// gdug pa 'dul ba'i glu 'di blang// mi shigs rdo rje gar gyi
bdag/ rdo rje gsang ba gshin rje yi// 'phrin las rgyal po grub pa'i las// mtshan ma gsum gyis byin rlabs la// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis// nam mkha' dang ni 'od kyi lus// phaT ces brjod
las bskul zhing 'pho// 'jig rten khams rnams 'od kyis 'gengs// ye shes me yis sreg cing sbyong// stong zhing gang zhing 'od 'phros nas// shes rab ye shes me bo che// kun gyi bag chags sbyong bar
byed// nam mkha' nyid las 'od zer 'byung// sngags kyi 'od zer 'phro zhing 'du// sems las byung ba'i nam mkha' sreg/ 'phrin las gdon mi za bar 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bstan to// oM ma hA nA ga ya ni smig ta bur be ya ra ne dza che ge mo'i srog la mA ra ya rbad/ gsang sngags spel na 'phrin las mchog/ mthar byed 'byung ba'i gnan
par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// klu mthar byed kyi le'u ste re gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag mo'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dang po shin tu dben pa yi// brag

dang dur khrod sa phug tu// sa gzhi gnag la rtsub pa la// khru gang mda' gang legs par bsham// dbus su gru gsum nag po la// rtsibs bzhi sprul gyi chun pos rgyan// sgo bzhi thod pa dril bu bzhi// gtor ma sha

chen dug sna 'bru// me tog khrag sna dug chu chang// bshams la lcang lo lnga dang ldan// dbus su bdud rtsi pad+ma'i khrag/ gsur dang mchod pa dur khrod brgyan// bshams la mthing nag gur gyi gdab// rtsibs

bzhir ban d+ha bya rgod snying// gser dang sbrul gyi phye ma dang// ser ba phyi nang chu yis dgang// thog thag bzhi yi rdzas su bsham// dbus su ro langs nag mo'i sku// 'gying bag rngam tshig nu ma 'bur// yan lag

rags la tshigs mig zlum// spyan gsum khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag zhal gdangs mche gtsigs dug rlangs 'phro// g.yas pa brtse gsum ban d+ha g.yon// sku la zhing lpags sbrul gyis mdzes// thod pa rdo rje rgya gram
gtams// zhabs gnyis ma stang nyi ma'i steng// rtsibs la dregs pa'i thog bdag bzhi// ma la sku bskyed ral pa can// smug nag 'jigs pa'i zhing lpags gsol// dbu la gser dang mu tig brgyan// g.yas

pa ral gri ban d+ha g.yon// sbrul dang thod rlon kun la mdzes// dri za klu 'bum klu dbang dang// gnod sbyin gdan ya rim bzhin dgod// sgo bzhir khro bo khrag gis dgang// bsnyen pa'i drod dang rtags phab

la// ba su'i sbru su ma la gdags// gri lcags gzar bus rme khrag brlab// gsur dang rgya shug dud pas bdug phyag 'tshal bskor ba byed na bsdu// rgyang lam sbyo ba byed na dbye// khro tshig me rlung phyag rgyas
gzir// cha lugs mi sdug gnag na brab// mi shi sa ltas log shis gzir// dkar mo mdzes na bzhad na blang// 'o byed sbyor ba byed rab// sbyor ba mdangs kyi mchod pa dbul// pho brang dbus su dam rdzas

bsdu// g.yog mo bzhi la phyag rgya bstan// bran mo'i tshul du las la bsngags// rgyal ba'i bka' nod yun du srun// gsang ba bcud kyis drod blangs la// ma mo srin mo sha za mo// pho nya mo dang las byed ma// kun
gyi snying po gsang sngags brdeg/ ling ka thod pa ming rus la// nyungs kar thal bas dong du brab// thun sngags sbyor bas rims nad 'bebs// gsang sngags sbyor ba gsum du sbyar// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bton to// oM rag mo te kun snying kha rag ma breng breng/ tsa dun hrI dza/ rag mo tsa la baM ril srog la hur thums/ tsit+ta he he ma d+ga la b+h+yo/

ma ma snying kha rag mo dgra la thun rbad/ rag mo rag sha tsit+ta la rbad/ khug thang tsa rbad/ ru lu khaM myags srog la rbad/ bod pa me 'bar drod la brtag rbad pa bla dang bkrag mdangs dbye/ gsad pa mngon byung
mtshon brdeg ltar/ b+h+yo yis btab la drag tu 'phang/ lus dang yul dbang 'phrog cing gsod/ g.yo med spogs pa med par bshad/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ ro langs nag mo sgrub pa'i le'u ste re
gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs dmar po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// brag dang chu gling mchog gi sar// sa sna gsum la stegs bu bya// khrag sna gsum gyi chag chag gdab// dbus

su zla kham kha sprod bri// thod pa dgu yi 'phreng bas bskor// phyi rol rgya gram rtse mo bzhi// rigs dang mthun pa'i kha dog la// mu ran thod pa gong ma bzhin// gru chad sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan// dbus su zhing bsnol

nyi ma'i gdan// sha las ro langs dmar po'i sku// gtum khro mo bzad khrag gi klong// sku stod zhing lpags g.yang gzhi la// thod pa rdo rje rgya gram rgyan// sku smad dred sham dril bus brgyan// snying gi 'phreng ba do

shal tshul// rin chen dbu rgyan sbrus mgos gdengs// g.yas pa 'khor lo ban d+ha g.yon// rgya gram zhing rkyang zla ba'i gdan// mkha' 'gro mgo brnyan bzhi yi sku// smug nag ser nag dmar nag ljang// g.yang

gzhi thod sbrul sbrul pa'i mgo/ g.yas pa gri khug g.yon ban d+ha// brgya yis bos la khri yis bsdu// gsang sngags sbyor ba snga ma bzhin// thod pa'i phyi rol gsang sngags ldan// nang du ming rus khrag dang dug
gsang sngags bzlas shing rag tas mchod// grub nas rbad la thun gyis brab// srod gcod shan pas las gnyer gtad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di dag

bton to// oM rag mo ma hi badzra snying kha rag ma srog la rngubs rngubs dza/ rag mo snying rtsa shon baM ril li b+h+yo/ tsit+ta gshogs rak+sha khaM rbad srog la thun yaM sho na thun mugs nri rbad/ phyi nang gsang ba'i drod la
brtag/ snga ma bzhin du las kun brdeg/ thod mda' khrag gi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// ro langs dmar mo'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// lha mo
nag mo'i gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan yang lha mo nag mo yi// gsang ba sngags kyi sgrub pa yang// ri gsum rtse dang chu gling mdor// nag po gsang ba'i dmod pa yang// maN+Dal

khru gang chag chag gdab// gru bzhi mdzes pa ro dang bcas// dbus su gru gsum zod pas bskor// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// thod pa'i 'phreng ba dag dang ldan// gru chad mtsho gling bzhi dang bcas// sgo bzhi dur
khrod zhing gis sbras// mchod pa'i rgyan dang dra bas mdzes// gnas kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan// gtor ma rag ta mchod pa'i rdzas// bdud rtsi gling bu gsur chen spos// bse khab dung sgo g.yu bad

brgyan// dar dang ba dan zhing chung 'chang// de mo bzhi dang snying 'phreng bskor// steng du lho mo dre nag zhon// nad dang mtshon sprin thod pa sbrul// dur khrod chas dang nor bus brgyan// mdung dang ban d+ha thogs nas

rngam// sbrul nag ral pa rgya gram sbrul// nyi ma g.yang gzhi do shal can// re lde khro chu rin po che// bse mkhar dbus kyi steng nas 'gying// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir ni// srin mo gsod par byed pa

bzhi// seng ge stag chen glang chen 'brug zhon nas g.yang gzhi thod sbrul brgyan// g.yon pa thun gyi thod pa thogs// g.yas pa kun gyi tsit+ta 'dod// ban d+ha re dang bcas pa'o// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod

par bya// mdun du ban d+ha lcang lo ru// snying gsum 'bras bu dbang po lnga// bdud rtsi dang bcas rten pa'i rdzas// rgya gram bzhi la ban d+ha re// snying khrag dang bcas dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor sgo yi nang 'khor

du// mi nag bcu gsum dar dang ldan// 'brang rgyas shal nag zla kham bya// bshos bu nag po bzhi yis bskor// tha ma yol dang steng nas gur// zhing chung bzhi dang bla res brgyan// lha dang rdzas rnams rdzogs

par dgod// dkyil 'khor lho nub 'brub khung du// mtshan ngan ban d+ha ling ka ming// bcug la thun gyi rdzas kyis skor// phur pa khrag sna nyungs kar dug/ tsha ba'i rgyal po bskus la dgram// brnag pa rten gyi sbyor

ba'o// sngags pa gshin rje nag por bsgom// thugs kar snying po sngags dang bcas// gtso bo'i thugs kar zla ba la// bzlas pa'i sngags rnams 'od du 'phro// ba spu gser gyi sbu gu nas// 'od 'phros ma bskul
phyogs mtshams gang// mchog gsum bsdus nas spyan drangs mchod// rak+ta sbrengs la gdung bas bod// rdzas la brten te dngos grub dbab// dkyil 'khor dbus su nag mo'i sku// khro gnyer 'jigs ma bzhad

cing 'ong// me yi phung po spor zhing thor// khrag dang rgya mtsho bskyil zhing rlob// rgyal ba'i bka' nod rab tu blta// 'o byed rgyan byed sbyor ba ston// glu gar dmag 'dren 'bring du bstan// lci thibs 'od sgra sgrub
khang 'tsheg rgyal ba'i grub rtags mtha' mar bshad// 'dod pa mthong na drag po brtsam// ban d+ha dbus sam gru chad 'phro// rgya gram bzhi la lcags phur dgod// gru gsum dbus su lha mo'i
gzugs// phab la snying khar ming rus gzhug zhag bdun rbad sngags gtor chung re// drag tu bskul zhing lha dang dpral// srin mo bzhi la las gnyer gtad// zhag gsum gsang sngags thun gyis brab// phur pa
btab la mtshon chas gtub// lha mo nag mo'i tshogs la btab// dgra la ban d+ha zor du 'phang// ling ka ming rus thod par gzhug thod pa dur khrod gtan la gnan// mdos dang gtor ma byang shar

gtang// dkyil 'khor phyags la zor du brdeg de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang ba'i sngags 'di bton to// oM tad+ya thA/ rag mo trag rag sha ma hi srog la dza dza/ ma ma rag mo

ka ling srog dun dun dza/ trag rag sha ma hi srog la breng breng thum ri li li b+h+yo/ trag rag sha ma hi dun b+h+yo re ma ti/ dgra bo'i srog la hur hur thum thum mA ra ya rbad/ gsang sngags sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// ri lu'i
nang du ming rus gzhug ri lu'i zhing ras sngags kyis dril// phag mo'i lto bar bcug la gnan// gzugs de 'gul khug 'og tu gnan// brgya phrag bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba'i brda de rdzogs par
btul// ra ba bzhi la mdos kyis bskang// tha chung bzhi la zor gyis bskul// nag mo dug mda' gsang ba 'di// spu gri dug gi nags tshal la// mdzes pas kun gcod mi 'chor byed// dug sbrul nag po'i sbyor
ba bzhin// 'dzin pa mi gtong khong dug skems// sbyor ba'i ro bzhin bdun brgyud du// dbang po lnga dang bcas pa skyems// dug mda' lha mo gsang ba'i dug/ mtshon cha dug me spu gri dug/ dug gi dug 'joms
sbyor ba mchog/ bsdus pas mchog gi snying por bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ lha mo gsang ba dug mda'i le'u ste re lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad
do// gsod byed bdud kyi las 'di yang// dur khrod me ri 'bar ba yi// gyel pa'i shing dang brag nag spungs// dgon pa chen po gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bya// dbus su gru gsum zhing

bsnol gdan// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la// zhing rkyang gtum pas bcas pa'i gdan// sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan pa la// rdo rje dang ni me rir ldan// gtor ma gnyis dang rag ta gsur// mchod pa'i rdzas dang
dam rdzas dgram// khyi dom ka li ta dang lug dom snying bshams la g.yag rur gzhug dbus su gshin rje nag po sku// yum dang bcas pa rdzogs par bsgom// rtsibs la lcags phur bcu las bskyed// dang la
bdud kyi rgyal po bcu// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag/ sku la zhing chen thod pa sbrul// dbu skra spyi bcings sbrul gyis bsdams// ral gri zhags pa g.yas dang g.yon// rang rang yum dang

'gu ba'i mdangs// g.yas pa tsit+ta ban d+ha g.yon// sgo bzhir bdud kyi pho nya bzhi// gcer bu mi thod do shal can// tshe 'phrog srog len bla la rku// bkrag mdangs phral nas gtso la stob// lcags kyus drangs
shing tsit+ta g.yon// bdud kyi sprul pa gcer bu 'bum// zhags pas gzung nas khram la 'debs// bkug cing bstim la rak+ta bstab// dur khrod mi yi sog pa la// ming rus bris la g.yag rung gzhug/ mtshon gyi
skud pas kha bcad cing// zhing lpags dril las 'og ru gzhug/ dug gi thun brdeg gzugs la brdeg/ bsgo bzhi bskul la shes pa dpral// nam gyi 'jing la ra zor 'phang// g.yag ru dur khrod ro khang

du// bdud kyi khram la btab la gnan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bton to// oM ya ma dun dun kha la yal yal/ dam dam ha ba ta kri hU~M dza dza/ kri yaM dun

kring bla tsa la thuM thuM b+h+yo tsa la nyal srog la rbad/ sgo dgu sngags kyi 'od kyis dgang// lcags kyi sdig pa rtsa la 'jug/ rtsa gcad khrag skems blo snying 'dral// bdud bsgrub sbyor ba'i las su bshad// rgya mtshan me
long gi rgyud las// bdud nag po'i le'u ste re drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmu bdud kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rA dza ka la'i sbyor ba ni/ nyams dga' dben pa'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal

mda' gang khrag gis byug/ dbus su dam rdzas bsnyen pa'i snying// dung chen bkra shis zhal bu ru// snying gsum mthing nag hU~M gis rgya// dpal gyi gtor ma rak+ta phyi// nag po zur gsum bshos bu la// thod pa

ling ka ming byang mthun// phur pa khrag sna mtshams su bzhag sngo sna khrag sna thod pa rten// rgyu zhags sbu gu snying po rta// rta 'brug don gnyis gang bsgrub bcibs// sku mdog nag po zhal gcig pa// dbu skra sprin

nag gseb na klong// g.yas pa gri gug ban d+ha g.yon// sku la g.yang gzhi sbrul gyis brgyan// chu yi snying po 'dril zhing pen// yum ni sngo nag spyan gsum khrag/ tsit+ta stob cing ban d+has mchod// bsnyen pas bos
la khrag gis bsad// dregs pa 'khor bcas dbang du bsdu// bdag gi snying po spros la bsdu// ba spu gser gyi sbu gur drang// rang dbang med par bkug cing bstim// dri las byung ba'i gzugs la dbab// dam
rdzas brten pa'i mchod pa bstab// drod dang ldan na drag po brtsam// pho nya bskul la shes pa dpral// sbyor ba bsdus la lha dang dbye// gzugs la phab la phyag rgyas gzir// thun gyis brab la phur pas
gdab// thod pa dang bcas dgra la 'phang// rta gzer sbyor ba las kyis dbye// gdug par 'os pa'i lag tu gtad// sbyor ba bris la thod pa bca'// chu dril drod rtags zor dang gzir// khrag

dang sngo sna thabs kyis rdzas// chu mig gnyan la bskul zhing dbug/ dus dang nye ba'i mtshams su sbyar// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bsdeb// spogs pa gsum gyi las dang sbyar// 'bras bu gnyis kyi rtsa ba
gcod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di ston to// oM mun mun mun thibs thibs thibs/ thum ril thum ril hU~M dza/ de nan thum ril rtsa thang dun rmugs srog la

hur kha b+h+yo/ mu sti srog la myogs rbad/ hU~M raM dun dun gzir nan/ hU~M ya nA nan gzir phob/ du na mun kri ya phroM phroM/ hU~M shar shar phroM phroM/ hril b+h+yo// ya ma ye u nan sa ma ya srog la dun mugs/ khaM yaM yaM raM raM hu
gzir shar shar 'phob/ mun mun mun thibs thibs thibs/ thuM ril srog breng breng dun dun mun thibs thum ril dza dza/ don gnyis mtha' ru srog phrogs la/ las kyi rgyal pos las kun byed/ sbyor bas don
gnyis 'grub par bshad/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ rA dza ka'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// srog gcod shan pa'i bdud rnams
la// las gnyer gtad pa'i 'khor lo ni// dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i sar// gtor ma snying sna rak+ta bshams// 'brub khung ling ka ming rus khams// thod par bcug la re bas gril// gsad pa las kyi

mtshon cha ni// chu dar zhing ras rgya shog la// dur khrod rdzas kyi thang pa bya// dug chu tsha ba khrag gis byug/ ni ra chen pos skya gcad la// khro ba thugs kyi gsang sngags bzlas// 'thoms pa bdud kyi srog snying

drang// nya gsum mtha' ru 'khor lo bris// mu khyud bzhi dang ldan par bskor// dbus su drag po'i spu gri'i mkhar// gnyis par 'khrul mig lnga gnyis ldan// mtha' ma rdo rje rgya gram bcu// de la dgod cing gnas

pa ni// dbus su ming gi dang po ni// bod pa'i brda yi 'bru gnyis gnas// rtsibs bcu drag po bdud kyi sngags// rtsa rgyud gcod pa'i 'bru rnams dgod// rdo rje rgya gram rwa bcu la// gcod cing gnon pa'i spu gri

dgod// mtshams dang 'khor lo'i mu ran la// ming rus khams dang ldan par bri// gsod byed pho mos lto sbyor la// sngo dmar sbrul gyis bsdams la brgyan// thod pa'i steng du rtsang gis brdeg/ dug shing me la
bsdugs la bran// sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa dang// 'thoms pa bdud kyi drag sngags bzlas// lha dang mtshon char byin gyis brlabs// brgyad dam bcu ru sbyor pa dkrug/ sngags pa gshin rje'i skur bsgoms
la// snying po bskul zhing 'od spros pas// bdud kyi pho nyas dmigs pa dgug/ bkrag mdangs dang po nri dang bla// rang dbang med par dbang du sdud// dud pa gsum dang ba bi sha/ lha dang phye la
gzugs la dbab// 'khor lo gdugs la sbyor ba gzhom// srog gcod bdud kyi 'khor lo bskor// mtshon cha'i rgyal pos dmigs pa gcod// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// ya yi 'phangs la ma yis bsdu// ru dang
drag tu bod pa'i thun// ling gis srog len myogs kyis dkrug/ dun gnyis bar du ling gis gsod// rmugs kyis myogs nas ti yis gnan// srog ces dmigs pa'i yul la gcod// rtsa zhes rang dbang

dbugs dang 'brel// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ yan lag sbyor ba bzhi ru brdeg/ dza yis srog dang rang dbang dgug/ pra be sha yis lha dang dbye// mA ra ya rbad gcod cing skyems// stam pa ya nan mtha'
ru sbyar// ma yengs brtan pas bzlas na bcud// 'bru gnyis dwangs snyigs tshul du dbye// brnag pa thon nas klu la gtad// sbyor ba drag po'i lam du gzhug de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku
gsung thugs las drag sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ya ma ru thums srog ling myogs// dun dun rmugs ti srog ling// ling srog ti rmugs dun dun myogs ling thum ru ma ya/ ya thum myogs ling dun ti ro

ling mugs/ du ma srog mA ra ya rbad dza/ pra be sha phaT/ stam pa ya nan/ mtshon cha'i drag sngags rnal ma yis// lus dang yan lag gcod par byed// bzlog sngags drag po nang khrol dang// gsang ba lte ba klad
mgrin 'dzoms// khyad par drag sngags lto dkrugs pas// rang dbang med par shan pa'i tshogs// 'byung ba bzhi dang rgyu bzhi gcod// dngas ma bsdus nas mkha' la phen// bag chags nas kyis rtsa ba
bskyed// spobs pa med par khrag bskams nas// mtshon cha sngags kyis dbang du sdud// bdud dang srog gcod shan par bsko// 'gyur ba med pa'i las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// bdud
nag po'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste re brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyab 'jug zla ba nag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ri sogs dben pa'i dur khrod du// khyab 'jug bsgrub pa'i gnas

btsal la// gtor ma sha chen ba lang snying// 'brug dang seng ge don khrag sha/ dug dang chu rgod gnam lcags thun// khyung dang rma bya 'ug pa'i sha/ gri thod mon pa tsa lo'i mgo/ brnag par bya ba'i gzugs dang

bcas// zhing chen drag po 'khor lo'i rgyu// sngags pa gshin rje nag po'i rgyu// bsgom la spyan drang mchod pa dbul// 'bum tshe lnga ru lha bsnyen bya// khri yis gshin rje dbang du bsdu// rang dbang med par dbang du
'gyur// dregs pa bsnyen pa sa yang 'bum// thon nas gsad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// dug gi khu bas 'khrul 'khor bri// dus dang gza' skar stod la bsnyen// mar gyi ngo ya 'khor lo bskor// dbus
nas thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// mu khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// mu khyud gnyis pa thig bzhis gnan// gsum par de bzhin thig brgyad gdab// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug la// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyis

gang bar gnas// mtha' ma rlung gi rgya gram ldan// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// rim pa ji bzhin bsnyen dang sgrub// las kyi rim pa bkod pa bzhin// dug dang khrag gi gnag tshas bris// oM dang ya ni pho brang

dbus// lte ba 'phen sdud gtso bor bzhag mu khyud dang po'i 'khor lo la// drag po stobs kyi snying po bzhi// ru thuM baM dang ra zhes dgod// ma yis bskyed la ling zhes dbang// tsan tra hring zhes rang dbang
dgug/ ma ma yum gyi dbang po 'phrog/ ka dang li yis brnag pa rdzogs// srog ces drangs la ling zhes 'phrul// dza yis rang dbang med par dgug srog ni gzas pa'i tsit+ta 'dren// la yis bkar la thun gyis
brdeg/ las kyi rgyal po b+h+yo yi mngag/ dmigs pa'i yul la rbad pa ste// lus dang phung po bla 'gugs pa'o// srog ni dwangs ma bdun po dang// rtsa sgo 'dzin pa'i dbugs rgyun la// ma lus bsdus nas sreg
cing thim// ma dang ra li don gnyis 'grub// ya yis phul nas dwangs snyigs 'byed// rbad pa'i stobs kyis srog rgyun gcod// rim pa ji bzhin gsad pa'i mchog/ srog ces rgyu bzhi 'dzin cing 'chang// gtam
gyis 'gyur ba med par sdems// ba yis khrag dang mun pa bskyed// ya las rdo rje rgya gram gyis// rlung gis deng nas stobs kyis gnon// nan zhes las kyis brnag pa gzhug las kyi rgyal pos gnan par
bshad// a mu ka dang ya las bskyal// bcu drug pa yis spu gri yis// dug gsum rtsa ba gcod cing 'joms// drag po sngags kyi gnad gsum gyis// drag po'i stobs kyis dbang du sdud// oM dun kri 'bru sbyar

na// pho mos dregs pa 'khor dang bcas// lag cha dang bcas dbang du 'gyur// nye ba'i rkyen dang rten drug sdud// 'khrul 'khor pho mo'i bar du gzhug/ snying po dang bcas thod pa bca'// drag po stobs kyis

'phen cing sdud// rno dbal drag po'i mtshon cha yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di ston to// oM dun tri ru thuM baM ra ma li tsan+ta s+t+ri ma ma ka li srog liM dza/ srog la thun b+h+yo
mA ra ya rbad/ stam ba ya nan/ gcig la du ma'i las rdzogs pas// khyab 'jug 'khor lo lto sbyor la// sngon dmar rgya gram thod pa bca'// gdug pa'i gnyan la stobs la gtad// nyi zla dus kyi sbyor bas
'joms// rten gcig sbyor ba gnyis su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// zla ba nag po'i 'khor lo lto sbyor gyi le'u ste re dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po li

byin gyi gsang ba spu gri'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lha yi khang pa gnyan dang dpen// bde gnas gsum du maN+Dal bsham// gtor ma sha khrag mchod pa dbul// ya ma ta ka'i bsnyen pa bya// rdo rje thod pa mtshan ldan

du// sha chen rak+ta dpa' bo snying// dkar gsum sha khrag tsit+ta'i shun// pad+ma rag ta bdud rtsi mngar// shing thog klu sman sna tshogs blugs// zhing ras kha bcad dbus su bzhag/ de la rten cing bsnyen pa

bya// sngags pa gshin rje'i skur bsgoms la// gtsang ma'i ras la rgyal po'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yum dang bcas// sku la zhing chen rgya gram 'brug/ thod pa rin po che yis brgyan// sku smad dril bu sbrul
dang rngam// g.yas pa 'gying mkhar don snying g.yon// ngang pa gser mdongs phyibs dang ldan// snying khar snying po nyi ma'i sngags// bsgoms la bka' nyan mdun du gnas// tri tshe la sogs bzhi dang
bcas// shel mkhar dar gur nang du bsgom// dam rdzas bsnyen pa sha khrag mchod// rak+tas bstabs la gtor ma gtang// a mu ka yi ling ga la// ming rus dang bcas 'khor lo'i bar// yang ling ga 'bru
gsum dbab// sngags kyi 'khor lo dam rdzas te// pho nyas bkug la thun gyis brab// brun gsum rdo gsum bcu par brdeg/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo brgyangs la bskor// ka li sho na ci t+ta la// dmigs pa kun

rdzogs sngags dang rten// bris la tsi t+ta'i phyi dang nang// dril zhing bcug la lcags thun brdeg/ drag sngags ling ga'i gnas su brdeg/ snying dang bcas te zor du 'phang// thod pa rgya gram 'khor lo gnan// rgya tshe

ru ring mdangs kyis bskang// gsang mdos sku mkhar lnga dang gcig kha dog so so dar dang gzugs// gying gi mchod pa gsang bshos dgu/ nyi zla kyi sbyang skyes pa mo// bya dang rgyu gnyis rta dang nya// bcu gsum

lnga gnyis gcig gi bskor// pho nya re yi snying kha ru// gru gsum re la snying kha ru// gru gsum re la ming rus re// bcas la gsad pa'i mtshon gyis brdeg/ mkhar de brnag pa'i phyogs su gdab// nam mkha' 'od

kyi lto ru gzhug/ rten 'brel srod pa'i rtsibs la bskyon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang ba spu gri'i sngags 'di bton to// oM dri tsi pa la a shug me swA hA/ dri sha ma ma ga rtsa sha

ma bri sha ma tsa hA swA hA/ oM khri sna ra ma tri rag mo ru lu dri sha b+h+yo/ bri sha ma hA rA tsa trig sho trig sho tsu ru thuM thuM ling gug tsa ra ling tsit+ta shag rbad/ rag mo rag mo khrag 'dzag ma snying kha la thums srog la s+b+ho ni dzA 'drim

rbad/ dri tsa ma le dri tsa ma le srog la thum rbad/ tsi shu ling ling thum rbad/ tsin yang tsin yang thuM ling rbad/ shu na tri yaM snying la thun rbad/ ba tsa le hur hur tsit+ta rbad/ dri tsa la me dri tsa la me thum

rbad/ thuM rbad/ tsin yang tsin yang thuM snying rbad bu nan dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ ra tsa ma hA rbad ril trag shig ling rbad/ tsit+ta ling snying tshal pa ling dri chuM ling rag mo rbad/ dgra bo dun ling kI la ya rbad/ srog
la thuM thuM ril ril rbad/ drag sngags brgyad kyi bkar la brdeg/ drod dang srog gi mdangs gcad nas// nyi ma'i gung la gsod par byed// dril las rbad cing mun la brdeg/ gdab pa'i sngags kyis phur pa

brdeg/ bskul zhing sgra skad drag tu yul la rbad// rgyal ba'i sku yang 'jig par nges// srog chags kun la gang brtsams 'grub// sbyor ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// li byin
gsang ba'i spu gri'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gying gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lha 'dre rgyu ba'i dben gnas su// maN+Dal dbus su gtor ma khrag/ shar du dmigs pa'i
gzugs bris la// sku mdog sngon po sbrul ris can// g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu thogs// g.yon pas don snying spar gyis 'debs// seng ge dkar po chibs su chibs// na bza' za 'og sngo khra la// le brgan dmar

po'i cha ga can// sbrul dang rin po che yis brgyan// snying po sbrul gnyis thugs khar bsten// tsa ra'i dbang po shun la brten// 'bru lnga'i bcud dang sha khrag la// khru gang dar dang me long 'bru// rgyal mtshan gsum

dang tsa ra'i snying// bla rdo snying po 'ug sgong bca'// ling ga ming rus sbyang thod brnag/ ri lu nyungs kar dug chu thun// sha sna bdud rtsi rgya shug bsreg/ thod chen dang bcas 'khor lo bca'// 'khor lo mtshon cha

ming rus bri// mu khyud rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum 'khrul mig brgyad// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug bca'// phyi rim rtsibs chen nyi shu ldan// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su 'khrul mig

brgyad po la// gsad pa rtsa ba'i 'bru dgu dgod// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la// gzir ba'i sngags dgod gzugs la brdeg/ tha ma'i rtsibs chen nyi shu la// rbad pa'i 'bru dang a mu ka/ gsad pa'i spu gri
'bru lnga dang// de bzhin gnan pa'i 'bru gsum dgod/ kha sbyar bar snang bteg la brtsam// khrag sna gsum gyis gzugs la brab// sngags kyi snying dbrog thugs khar bsdu// rbad pa'i sngags kyis shes pa
dgug/ gzugs la phab la lha dang dbye// phyag rgyas gzir la phur bas gdab// drag tu bskul ba'i sgra skad brjod// zor thun mtha' ru thod pa bca'// lha khang mgon po'i 'og tu gnan// bsnyen pa sa ya rbad
pa 'bum// dril ba bdun khri 'phang ba stong// gzir ba khri gsum rbad pa gcig/ gnan dang spogs pa khri gcig mtha'// gcun pa brgya las bcu yis gso// stong gis gzir la drag tu rbad// shi
sa rang gnad 'khor lo dgug/ bzlog pa brgya yis gnas su 'phangs// sngags kyi rgyal pos bsrung ba bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bstan to// oM badzra sa ma ya ra

ya baM srog la dza dza/ badzra sA du ra baM ni srog la b+h+yo/ badzra sA du dri myags tsit+ta thuM ril dgra ba'i srog mA ra ya rbad/ badzra sA du tri yaM khaM rag sha snying phyung tsa la thun srog gzir dgra bo stam pa ya nan/ badzra sA du sa ma

ya na rag tsit+ta nan/ sngags rnams me rlung skyin thang dug/ las kyis shan pa mngag cing rbad// dug tu bskul la mna' dam gzir// shan pa srog gi sbyor ba bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lo thog

gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lha srin gdug pa'i dben gnas su// gtum chen drag po'i bsnyen pa 'bum// thod pa rgyan dang shul rgyal mtshan// khrag dang dug dang brun lnga bsngo// ri lu bdun gsum brnag

pa bsham// gtor ma gsang bshos dkor cha 'chang// rgya shug tshil dang shul rgyal mtshan// khrag dang dug dang brun lnga bsngo// ri lu bdun gsum brnag pa bsham// gtor ma gsang bshos dkor cha 'chang// rgya

shug tshil dang spos bsregs la// brnag pa'i yul dang ming sogs bri// sbyor ba gzhom pa thog par gzhug/ gshin rje thugs kha'i sa bon spro// A kar ma hA he ru ka ljang nag rgya gram lcags kyu bsnams/ badzra

karma Ta ki dza/ bskul kha gying chen bkug la gnan// sku mdog sngon po ngur smrig gon// 'ja' dang glog gis dbu la brgyan// rdo rje thod pa 'khrug cing 'thor// snying kar sa bon 'bru gnyis ldan// sa ya drug

'brum bsnyen pa 'dra// nam mkha' sprin dang du ba 'ja'// 'brug sgra tshub ma khug sna 'thibs// g.yul 'gyed dmag 'dren rtsi thog nyag/ mtshan rtags ldan nas thugs dam bskang// chu 'dril 'bum phrag brgya yi

bar// nyungs kar brgya bar khrag la bstim// rta gsum tha chungs yul du bskyal// khri bcu gcun zhing drag tu dbab// ma phebs sbyor ba'i stobs gzhan na// lha klung gdug pa gzir zhing gcun// ya ma sngags

zlos 'bum khri sdeb// gnad gsum bar du chu 'dril brdeb// khrag dang dug chu phur pas gdab// stobs chen drag po'i nga rgyal bstan/ khang pa gsum gyi sa yis brab// nye ba'i sbyor ba drag tu dbab// de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las lo thog gzhom pa'i sngags 'di ston to// oM badzra sA du ma ya hril hril ra baM hU~M dza dza/ badzra sa twas sa ma ya hrel hril phroM phroM ya tri phroM/ badzra ga ra ba phroM/ badzra

ga ra pa phroM/ badzra sing kri phroM/ badzra sa twa sa ma ya hri la shar phroM b+h+yo/ tri du ya ya nan hril shar/ nA ga tri loM nan/ tri ya nA ga gzir phroM/ sha la sha ltar phra shar ya nan phrob/ gdug pa'i gzugs la
gzir zhing dbab/ shun brdab thod pas sgrol gying bsdigs/ shan pa gying gi sbyor bar bshad/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gsad pa gying gi le'u ste don gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan

'das kyis gzir thabs btsan gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// brag dmar srin phug tsha go can// gong gsum rgyun drang dben pa ru// ya ma sku yi bsnyen pa 'bum// las kyi bsnyen pa sa ya brtsam// maN+Dal gri khrag

dug gis byug/ chos kyi pho brang drag po'i gnas// zla khaM thod 'phreng de bzhin zlum// phyi rim rtsibs bzhi rdo rjes bskor// gru chad khrag mtsho sgo bzhi brgyan// gtor ma thun rdzas mchod pa dgram// dbus su dregs
pa ya ma'i sku// yum dang bcas pa hU~M las bskyed// zla kham gsum la nam gru ma// khrag thogs thun 'bebs ma las bskyed// rtsibs bzhi shan pa gsod byed btsan// gcer pu spyi bcings ral gri

zhags// dmar skya mgyogs byed dza las bskyed// sgo bzhir ltas ngan sgro bzhi mda'// khrag sna dug chus bskus la gzugs// bshos bu chang dang shing thog mngar// thugs dam bskang ba'i rten du bsham// ling

ga ming rus sbyang thod dang// 'brub khung gnas su ma ra brnag/ tshes dang zla ba nag po brdam// zhag grangs dus tshod ngan pa gzung// drod rtags phyi nang gsang bar gzung// dar sbyangs g.yul 'gyed dmag
dpon byed// 'brug sgra 'od dang skar mda' 'byung// mtshon brdeg sing gcod nang ging rtags// khro tshig lus bskyod rngam zhing gtum// yul la 'bar na gsang bar gzung/// shan pa bskul la dmigs pa
dgug brnag pa'i rten la bstim la brag/ phye gsum brun gsum 'bru gsum brdeg mda' yi lam dpye zor du 'phang// brnag pa'i gzugs la gzir zhing brab// rten la mda' dang phur thun brdeg/ mtha'
ru thod pa ling ga dril// gong gsum btsan gyi rgyun sar gnan// gtor ma dang bcas ri rtser gtang// bdun nam lnga ru bskyed la bsgrub// rme gri gzer thabs rims su 'bebs// brnag pa kun gyi mchog tu

bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to/// oM 'gri ba dzi tri shu li bi tring gying ka ra ya dza dza/ gying kar ya 'gri ba da ri thur ril sne man sbe man kha long ka

hring b+h+yo/ 'gri ni hra sha mA ra ya dza/ tsa shu be le tsit+ta thu ril rbad/ shi te bi ri dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ nri sti sta srog la gzir nan/ bsnyen pa drod thob shan pa rbad/ bla khugs nyams lon brab cing gsad/ zor 'phang
mtha' ru gnan pa bya/ bskang so'i cho ga rgya cher bya/ gzir thabs btsan gyi sbyor bar bshad/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ shan pa btsan gyi le'u ste don gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das kyis klu la gtad pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// 'khor lo'i sngags kyi mtha' sdud du// gdug pa'i lus dang khams la gtad// rigs ni nges dang ma nges gnyis// nges pa rigs bzhi dman pa

lnga/ kha 'khor drug dang gdol ba gcig/ rgyal rigs ser bkra shar bltas sa// rje rigs lhor lta dkar khra me// bram ze dmarakhra nub lta chu// dmangs rigs ljang sngo byang ltas rlung// 'jug pa'i nad dang
gdug pa'i dug/ rgyal rigs mgo nad rims nad bskyed// rje rigs lag g.yas tsha ba bskyed// bram ze rkang g.yon khrag chu bskyed// dmangs rigs rkang g.yas zha drum g.yon// gdom pa rkang g.yon snag pa'i

nad// ba su rigs drug rtsa nas 'jug/ tsha ba dmu chu phol 'bras g.yo// sman dang phye bo rlung sgor 'jug/ mdze rlung khrag bskyed tsha grang 'khrug/ rkang gcig bu ga rtsa gnyis 'jug/ gzhogs skems subs pa nas
kyis rgyu// gel ba sa dang sreg la 'jug/ lci thibs skom nad glang po gtong// 'thoms pa tshig mgo zha drum skyems// mgo mangs kha zas ro la 'jug/ le yi dbang po ro la 'brel// gdug pa chen po snying la

'jug/ smyo 'bog 'chal mdze sdug bsngal myong// sa yams rje shul rdzi la 'jug/ nang khrol lnga la mdze nad skyed// lto 'phye rtsa bzhi sbus las 'jug/ bad kan khrag rlung mkhris nad mdze// skyo dub sems g.yang

'chal dang 'thibs// sha rus g.yang ba'i rtags lnga 'byung// klu bdud chu srin lgangs dang 'thib// glang thabs grum dang pho srin nad// ma mos rims nad snyoms dal sdong// rgyal pos smyo 'bog 'chal dang
sdong// btsan gyi gzir nad dri dang sdong// the brang blo bur hur thums sdong// nad bdag 'jug dang ltas su bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nad de dag gdon pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sngags
dang 'khor lo bsregs pa'i las// 'jug pa'i rjes gcod sngags kyis gdon// mgo la sogs pa'i gdug pa la// dril btor 'khor lo lto sbyor bsdeb// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsum gyis gdon// mgo la shi phrad
nyin dang mtshan// lto bsdebs gtor ba'i sbyor bas gdon// lag g.yas zhugs la snying gzer dgu// de bzhin g.yon pa nyi shu gcig/ rkang pa g.yas la bdun pa ste// g.yon pa gdug pa lto dkrugs
gdon// bu ga dgu la bcu gcig pa// rtsa brgyad zhugs nas 'bru brgyad shis// dbugs dang rdzi la bcu gcig gtor// rjen shul zhugs na gnyis gnyis bsdeb// drod la zhugs na lnga tsho brdeb// rlung rta zhugs
na gnyis por tri// rtsa lam bcu gcig bor la 'phang// sa me rtsa la sum sdebs dkrug/ rtsa bzh-i gdug pas 'byung ba'i nad// dkugs na phyag rgya chen pos gdon// tshigs mgo bdun la dgug

bdun bsdeb/ kha zas zhugs la shing phrad bsdeb// tsit+ta zhugs la phyag rgya dkrug/ klu bdud klu srin bdun pa dkrug ru me 'bru dgu'i sbyor ba bsdeb// ma mo la sogs rims dal gcod// rtsa dri 'bru dgu'i sbyor
ba yis// smyo 'bog la sogs 'dzems pa'i mchog/ dza yi 'bru bcu dkrugs bsdebs pas// gzer dang gri yi sbyor ba gdon// ro nri bcu yi 'bru bsdebs pas// blo bur nad dang mdze yams gdon// mchog
dang snying po'i man tra las// dmar len sngags kyi snying las gzung// kun 'joms rtags rnams brten men pa'o// 'khor lo thod pa rdzas kyis bdug/ phag thod sbyor ba steng dang 'og/ bcu gcig yang gsang
mchog tu bstan// dmar len thun min sngags kyi snying// gdug pa nad kyi dbye bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ rigs dang nad dbye ba'i le'u ste don gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom

ldan 'das kyis sdig pa chen po'i lus kyi tshad brtag pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// stobs chen ya ma myos byed mo// sgrol gying drag po nus pa rdzas// drag po mtha' ru klu la gtad// mi mthun klu la rigs bzhi
drug/ rgyal rigs lhor lta rje rigs shar// bram ze nub lta dmangs rims byang// dkar la chu 'khrags sngo la dal// rtsa dmar 'phung dmar ljang dmar mgyogs// thung mongs rigs kyi dbye bar bshad// gzhan
yang rigs min brtag pa'i rigs// 'khyil dang lkugs dang mgo mangs gcig/ chu mig shar 'bab klu mgo nub// de bzhin nub 'bab gan rkyal shar// byang du 'bab na klu mgo lho// lhor 'bab byang du mgo

zug pa'o// lus ni 'breng la dud 'gro'i mgo/ gnas pa'i rgya khyon las kyi tshad// bcu gnyis khru tshad ldabs kyis spags// spyi bo nas mar mgo khru do// skye la sor brgyad snying ske'i bar// khru gang snying la sor bcu

gnyis// snying kha dag gnas lte ba'i bar// khru do sor brgyad dag gi tshad// lte ba'i sor bzhi lte gsang bar// khru do pas te chu yi tshad// gsang ba khru gang bla de bzhin// sor brgyad bcu gnyis dag gis

'phags// rje ngar khru do sor brgyad tshad// rkang pa'i dpangs su rtse sor brgyad// spyi gtsug rkang mthil bcu gnyis rdzogs// las kyi dmigs dang gtad pa'i sa// rigs dang shi sa'i rgyud du brtsal// mgo khyim

khru gang rgya// bcu gnyis sor gyi tshad du gnan// sngags pa stobs kyis sbyor ba bsdeb// sa bdag btsan po gtad par shis// las kyi rlung gi mtha' ru skyel// ra sgong khru gang rtse khru do// rje dang yul srungs dag
la shis// gsad dang 'pho ba'i las su sbyar// ra khrag khru gang sor bzhi ldan// lha bon rigs man dag la shis// mig gnyis khu re mdzub gang gnan// rigs rgyud 'phel ba'i slungs la

shis// sna la 'khor yug khru gang du// kag khams gnan na smyo 'bog shis// rna ba khru gang sor bzhi la// 'u khams gnan na gang brtsams shis/ kha la khru gang sor brgyad du// ji khams gdengs dang che bar

gnan// dri dang g.yeng ba'i nad kyis 'joms// skye la sor brgyad bshang khams gnan// mdze dang phol 'bras yams la shis// snying dang ske bar khru gang tshad// snying khar bcu gnyis sor gyi sar// ku khams
gnan pas gsad pa'i mchog/ lag sor nang du sor bcu gnyis// bran dang shan pa rigs ngan gnan// skye brgyud bcad pa'i las su shis// byang khog khru gang pho rgyud gnan// gri dang lkugs pa'i las su
shis// de bzhin lte bar mo rgyud gnan// rgyud du ma ning dbang po gnyis// ltas ngan dag gi las su shis// gsang bar chags pa'i gzhi bsdus la// sbyor ba kun bzlog thams cad 'joms// rabs chad pho

mos ka sbyar gnan// lto dang rkang par rigs ngan dang// shan pa smad 'tshong btso blag mkhan// mdzo rtol dre'u yi thod par bcug zha drum mdze dang yams nga'i nad// rme thog brtol gyi las la shos// dbye dgug
la sogs las kyi rims// sdig pa chen po'i las la sbyar// de yis spogs pa med par bshad// gzhan yang mgo gcig phyogs bzhir brtag/ rigs su mi dbye stobs kyis sbyar// sngags kyi tshad ma tho ba na
'grub// lcags dang rdo yi 'khor lo la// khrag dang dug gi 'khor lo bri// steng gi phyogs su sbyor bas gnan// sa yam gru gsum nag por brtag gang rung gcig tu pus gang rko// thod pa pho mo go mi

bzlog/ bzlog na sngags pa rang dbang sdud// las kyi rgyal po'i stobs kyis sbyar// klu nad sdig pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ klu nag sdig pa'i tshad brtag pa'i le'u ste don bzhi
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khrol bu brtag pa'i sbyor ba 'dis bshad do// mgo mangs phyogs kyi gdug pa la// mgo dang rkang lag dgu lnga gsum// gnas pas chu lnga'i 'od dang

brtag/ dmar la 'dril zhing mang la mdzad// snyoms la rgyun du 'bab na mig/ nyi lcib subs la bring bu 'degs// gsher la mi 'dzeg nya mig sna// brag shing rtsa la glan na ldud// bri ma dmar la shing tsa sbo// bya
dang 'khar sgongs srin chen chags// g.yas g.yon stud pa kha ru brtag/ gnam 'greng skyes shing de nyid thim// rjen shun med par gsal bar brtag/ mi mngon gsol dang mtshan ltar 'dzag/ yang na mgo gcig
zha lag dgu// yang na chu bran mang dus thim// lte ba dag tu rnam par sbyar// mig la sogs pa'i chu lnga la/ khams chen lnga dang sbyar ba'i gnan// mig la bu khams dur ma bla// 'thom nag g.yas

pa'i rtse mor gnan// sna la ji khams rabs chad kyi// thod pa kha sbyar khyu mchog gnan/ kha la kag khams mon thod gnan/ kha mes bla rus steng du gnan// lte ba bshang khams dag dig gi/ thod pa 'dzo mo phur
pas gnan// gsang bar kung khams mdze gri yi// thod pa rnol ma'i dor rtas gnan// yang na mdze shu phol 'bras mig/ smyo 'bog g.yang dang 'chal la sna// rna bar myos sing 'thibs dang lkugs// yams nad

rims dal lte bar sbyar// skye rgyud gcod la gsang ba'i gnad// dbang chen dregs pa'i stobs dang sbyar// yang na pho rgyud mig la sbyar// pha mes rna ba mig cha sna// mo rgyud lte bar gsang bar lta// bsrub pa kun
bral stobs kyis bya// rgyus chen zhabs ma re bas gril// sbyor ba lnga yis rim pas gcad// rdo rje rgya gram brtsegs mas mnan// don yod grub pa'i pho brang gdab// ri rab 'khor lo brtsegs mas

gnan// gdug pa'i chu lnga brtag par bya// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ khrol bu las kyi dmigs pa brtag pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rus sbal khra bo'i sbyor ba

'di bshad do// 'khyil dang lkugs pa rus sbal gnas// de la gtad pa'i rim pa ni// lo dang khams su nye bar sbyar// dbang chen dregs pa rgyu dang gshed// rlung rta srog lus tshe gnas khrus// shis pas srog

gcod rus sbal lus// gshed bdag chen po'i sbyor bas gnan// ya nga nad kyi dal dang rims// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// yan lag lnga dang dbang po brgyad// nang khrol smad lnga tshigs mgo brgyad// lus kyi
bang mdzod bcu drug bzhi// gnan gzor pho brang 'og dang bar// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig dmigs brtags la// rus sbal khra bo'i gsang mdzod gshed// tha chungs bzhi la shar du lta// 'bring po bzhi la lho phyogs

su// ra ba bzhi la nub phyogs su// nur dang stod la byang du lta// dus bzhi rtag tu ka bub gnas// nyi phyed nam gung gan rkyal gnas// lo gshed bstad pa'i sbyor pa ni// 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya bstan pa yin/ kha
ru sbrul gtad ra g.yas 'brug/ lag g.yas yos bu mchan g.yas stag/ rkang g.yas glang gtad gsang g.yas phag/ gsong g.yon byi ba rkang g.yon gyi// lto g.yon bya ste mchan khung sprel// lag g.yon lug

gtad ra g.yon rta// gshed bdag lag tu gtad pa ni// byi phag ya ma rA dza la// bya spre myos byed 'bar ba'o// rta sbrul ar+ya dmar po la// glang lug khyi 'bru tshar dgu'i lag/ 'du ba'i nad gzhi bskyed cing
gcod// lo gshed gcod pa'i sbyor bar bshad// ru sbal gsang mdzod phyogs bzhi la/ khams chen lnga yi srog lus sbyar// 'og phyogs byi kha tsha ba gtad// mjug mar 'u ste chu yi khams// g.yas

su kag ni shing gi khams// g.yon du bshang lte lcags kyi khams// yan lag kung ste gtad pa'i khams// 'byung ba lnga la sbyor ba brtsam// bdag po bzhi la gshed mar bsko// ru sbal srog slungs gsang mdzod

'chang/ khams chen phyogs kyi sbyor ba bshad// mig la rgyal po rna ba rje// kha ru sngags pa ra la dmangs// lha rnal bon po sgroms su lha// yul srungs snying kha blon po ste// 'gran zla stobs kyis gcod pa'i
las// rnam shes dbang po'i sbyor bar bshad// snying la gsad pa glo la smyo// mchin pas 'bog 'thibs rgyu bas rims// mkhan mas lha dang dbye ba'i las// thod pa drag po nam mkha'i stobs// gang 'grub las

la thogs pa med// nang khrol sbyor ba'i mchog tu bshad// 'chi ba'i bar du gsad par bya// skye ba rengs dang lkugs dang sbyar// sogs pa gnis la gri dang thog/ byang khog dbang du bsdu ba'i las// rdzing la
brnol dang de bzhin rme// rgyu zhabs rims dal snyom bu'i las// gsad par skye rgyud gcod dang 'phro// chu shul gnan na las kun 'grub// mdze can thod par sbyor ba bsdu// rus mgo bdun la gtad pa'i

las// mdze can dmar gcod thod pa ru// drag po'i sbyor ba kun bsdus la// gnan na ya ma'i las la shis// gtad pa kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// ru spal khro ba'i le'u ste don
drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// klu 'phye bo la gtad pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// lkugs pa 'phye bo gnas pa'i sa/ kha dog sngo nag 'thibs la smug/ de la gnas pa 'di lta ste// mi
lus glang mgo bgrod pa'i mjug/ lag pa me rlung 'byung ba 'khrug/ rwa dang sder mo mtshon chas gcod// sogs dang ba spu rno dbal me// rna ba'i grong khyer klu brgyas gtams// lta zhing rdzi la bsnams pa

'dzin// de la gtad pa'i rim pa ni/ kha dang rna ba sna dang mig rwa dang lag pa byang khog mgo/ snying dang lte ba rgyu ma'i mdzod// lnga gnyis gcig la gtad pa ste// rim pa ji bzhin stobs kyis sbyar// sngags pa
gtsang po blon po rje// bon po mu stegs yul bsrungs dmang// rigs ngan nyan thos bsrungs pa'i lha// ji bzhin de bzhin sbyar ba ni// mdze can dman gcod thod pa ru// gang sgrub mtha' ru las 'di

brtsam// 'khor lo dang bcas tshas dang ldan// sa ya gru gsum khru gang rko// thod khar la sogs pho brang gdab// mdze yams dbab pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ klu 'phye ba la gtad
pa'i le'u ste don bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i las thor bu 'di bshad do// gang rung las kyi mtha' sdud la// sbyor pa kun smin gtad pa btsam// mchog tu ma ra

ya nga'i las// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// mdze can dmar gcod thod pa ru// las kyi 'khor lo thod pa bca'// zhing ras rgyu la rim bzhin bskor// dbus su drag po sbrul gyis bskor// dbus dang mtshams kyi

'bub gnas su// ming rus dug dang khrag gis bri// bcu drug ya tshogs bcu bdun dgod// bdud dang rlung dang lho sbyor dgod// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug mdzes// yang logs rtsibs chen nyi shur bya// sdud

pa'i snying po mchog sdud dgod// gdug pa'i gseb tu spu gri dgod// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su bya// rlung dang ya ma'i lto ru bri// sngags dang dril gtor nyin mtshan bsdeb// brgya brgya mtshon chas bsnol

mar bcad// klu dang gshin rjes bkug cing gcod// tshe srog dbang po bstod cing 'chang// nyi ma bzhi dang mtshan mo bzhis// las kyi rgyal pos lto sbyar brtsam// sngags kyi mtshon cha drag tu bzlas// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi mtshon cha 'di bton to// ya ma me ta k+She/ rA dza sa twa/ ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni/ bra ma mur rak+ta tsa ra ma ra ya ni/ sha ku ru ni rbad la/ nA ga pu ta ya/ sa na hri da yA/ hug

rmugs ti dz+wa/ myags thuM u ta nan/ srog la ni yaM shag la rbad/ las 'di mtha' ru rdzogs pa na// sha khrag drod dang dbral ba'i phyir// klu dang gshin rje dkrug cing rbad// phyogs mtshams brgyad la brgya brgya dkrug/ las kyi
mtha' ru kha bskang yin// 'khor lo thod pa mun pas dril// gdug pa rang gis byad du gzhug/ gang rung gdug pa'i sa ru gnan/ klu dang ya ma nyid la gtad// pho brang ri rab 'byung bar bskyed// brnag pa'i

rgyal po'i las 'di la// shu ta ya ma'i bde klong du// dbang po kun 'dus kha la 'phang// b+ha sa ka la'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// 'khor lo lte sbyor gdug pa kha 'thams kyi le'u ste don
brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu sbrul nag por sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan yang gnan pa'i sbyor ba ni sngags kyi mtshan ma thob pa dang/ dur khrod dar dang mnyel ma'i gos// phur pas

brgyangs la rmo ba byug/ tsha ba gsum dang dug chus bsku// pad+ma rak+tas 'khor lo bri// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe brgyad// phyi rim 'khor lo bcu gnyis rtsibs// yang logs bcu drug rtsibs dang ldan// dbus

su sbrul gyi ra bas bskor// gshed bzhi gnas su thod pa sbrul// gsang mdzod ru sbal lto bar ming// bcu gnyis rgya gram sbrul dang me// bcu drug mtshon cha rgya gram sbrul// sbyor ba na ga nri rmur nan// 'khor lo
gdug pa'i lus kyi gseb// bsgrub bya'i ming rus nri rbad dgod// gshed bzhi sngags kyi sbyor ba dang// gdug pa klu yi sngags su bsdeb// nyin mtshan gsang sngags dril gtor brdeg/ gcod

pa'i spu gri rnal mas gcod// gdug pa bsdigs bcing las la mngag ya ma nA ga ma ra nri// ha mu ji la'i sbyor tshul yin// mdze can nag po'i thod pa ru// mu zi nag po'i blang rkang gzhug/ pho mo gang yin steng

'og dbye// yang na thod pa nyams dang sbyar// steng du nan tu drag pa'i sngags// 'og mar dmigs pa'i rus dang ming// khrag gis bris la dug mes bdug/ thod pa mdze can khrag gis bsku// sbrul nag pho mo'i
lpags shun du// 'khor lo dril la dmigs pa gzhug dug chu tsha ba khrag nad kyis// sbrul nag pho mo'i lus la bsku// mkhar nag sngo dmar mtshon gyis gril// sbrul nag thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dar gyis
g.yogs la rgya yis dril// mdze can pho mos zhabs mas dril// las kyi mtha' ru thod mkhar gdab// gang 'dod dmigs pa'i ming dang sbyar// gnyan ra gdug pa'i dkyil du gnan// dmod sngags gang rung

stong gis sba// stong phyir gzir la brgya yis bcag/ klu chen ya ma'i pho brang gdab// steng du ri rab 'khor lo bskyed// rdo rje rgya gram stobs kyis gnan// steng du lha yi pho brang gdab// phyogs bzhir phyi 'gros
bdun bdun bya// phyogs phur sor bzhi ba re gdab// dbugs ma shor bar rkyang 'gros bskor// mtshams bzhi rdo nag rtags sur gtad// lam du zhugs ya rgya gram gcad// chu shul dag gam ri rtser

'gro// zhag bdun bar du slar mi 'gro// mkha' lding dang bcas drag sngags gzir// klu la phyag rgya bstan zhing bsdigs// phyag rgya lus dbang sngags 'khor srung// ma lus sbyor ba'i mchog tu bshad// rgyal
mtshan me long gi rgyud las// klu sbrul nag po stobs kyi gnan pa'i le'u ste don dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i lto sbyor 'di bshad do// gzhan yang gtad pa'i rim pa ni// gnyan

ra gdug pa'i gzugs blangs la// sngags kyi rgyal pos byin gyis brlab// rus chen thur mas sbal ba bshu// sha khrag sngags kyi byin bskyed la// phyag rgyas nA ga'i dbang po dgug/ gsob shun sngags kyis bus

la brgyangs// rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal bsgom// thod pa dag dig bkra mi shis// gnyis pa gnyan pa'i 'khor lo bri// steng du ri rab rgya gram oM// 'og mar gru gsum ma ra sbrul// me rlung las kyi snying po
gzugs// bris la dug dang dri mas bdug/ rur khrod ras la ming rus bris// rta nag bsnol khrag phyi nang byug/ ming byang bris la gnas su bzhag/ drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba bsdeg/ mchog tu na dang ya la
bstim// snga ma ji bzhin dril gtor dkrug/ sbyor ba thon nas thod mkhar bca'// sbal pa'i sha khrag skams la bsreg/ thal ba ming rus ri lu bya// ri lu sbal pa'i gsob tu gzhug/ sngags kyi sbyor
bas thod pas bca'// dug chu bskul la dar gyis gril// lcags kyi phag pa'i lto bar gzhug/ sna tshogs khrag gis thig le bya// phag pa thod pa'i ga'ur bca'// thod pa mun pa sbrul gyis bsdam// zhag
gsum thun bzhir thod pa gso// sa sros bar du gnan la gtad// gnyan ra gdug pa'i pho brang du// brgya yis bskos la bcu yis gzhug/ brgya yis bskyed la de nyid bcag/ bsrung ba sngar bzhin sbyor ba
bca'// dpang gzugs gdug pa'i lag tu gtad// klu yi lto sbyor sngags kyis dkrug/ mdze rims drag po yams su 'bebs// nA ga gdug pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// klu nag lto
sbyor gyi le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdze rims drag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan yang gtad pa'i sbyor ba 'di// stobs chen drag pos gzir pa'i lus// rang nyid phyag

rgya bstan bsgoms la// mchog phur ya ma ra dzar bskyed// byin gyis brlab cing sbyor ba dkrug mdzo tol phag pa'i thod pa la/ mdze can khrag gis gdug pa bri// mdze can dmar gcod thod pa la// gug rgyal ma

yi chu yis bsang// don yod grub pa'i stobs kyis bkru// re thum bcug la drag pos breb// de nas rgya shog mdzub gang la// rme ba lnga dang drug gis byug/ sbrul dang sbal pa'i khrag gis byug/ rus chen sa dkar

cong zis bsku// brtag pa kun gyi ming rus bri// mdze mo gnyis kyi thabs su gzhug/ de nyid mi nyen tshas kyis gril// gri lcags sbubs su dmigs pa gzhug/ thod pa'i nang du sbyor ba bca'// mchog phur ya ma

rA dza ru// bsgoms la stong bzlas gzer du gdab/ kha bcad thod pa'i bcud la bsdu// sngags kyi sbyor ba thon nas brtsom// gang bsgrub 'khor lo kha sbyar la// phyi rim dar dang re thugs gzhug/ sbyor ba'i khrag
dang 'bru gsum brab// gshin rje yang yum lto bar gzhug/ klu'i kha 'am mig la gtad// ya ma rA dza'i lag tu gtad// gshin rje rgyal po stobs kyi gnan// drag po gdug pa'i dmod pa por// ral gri dbyug tho
'khrigs pas bsdigs// klu rnams dkrugs la phyag rgya bsdam// gsang sngags smod pa'i mtshon chas gdab// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs bsdus la// lha yi pho brang bstan par bya// zhing bcu bsdigs pa'i stobs
bsdus la// thod pa snying po bcug la bstim// khro bo tshogs kyis sngags bsdus la// gang dmigs bsgrub bya'i khams dang dbral// bdag gi dbang po zhing ras dril// khyung gi dmod sngags drag pos
gzir// stong gsum nyi ma'i bcud bsdus la// dbang po gnas bzhir gzir zhing 'joms// sha za srin po'i sbyor ba 'di// gdug pa klu yi stobs dang sbyar// gtad pa'i las su shis par
bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// ya ma rA dza mdze can gyi le'u ste gya gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtad khram las kyi mtha' sdud 'di bshad do// gzhan yang gtad pa'i sbyor ba
'di// gnod byed pho mo'i sbyor ba kun// thod can nang du gzugs dang ming// khrag gis bris la zhabs mas gril// bka' rten dkyil 'khor sngags pa bog/ gang rung phyag rgyas zil gyis gnan// srung ba'i lha
yis srog skyob na// lta bdun lnga bzhi gang dmigs kyi// gzugs dang ming rnams khrag gis bri// gdug pa'i sngags kyis mtha' ma bskor// du ba brgyad kyis bdun cing brab// khyu mchog rme yi zhabs mas

gril// dur khrod ro khang 'og tu gnan// lo khengs skeg dang slungs dar nas// gcad bya mngon du ma khugs na// lo la gshed bsko khams la gcad// skye chen bdud kyi rlung rta gshig/ de yi sbyor ba 'di lta

ste// rang lo gcad bya dbus su bri// lo yi gshed bzhi mtha' mar bri// ya ma da rong kham shag rbad// gshed bzhing kha nas 'byung bar bri// sngags kyi thun dbab zhabs mas gril// khyi phag dar ma'i thod par
gzhug/ dmigs pa gang yin mu la gnas/ khams chen nang gi gcod pa ni// dmigs pa gang yin ming dang rus/ khams de bris la bla rus gzhug/ gcod pa'i gshed du khams nyid bsko// chu gshed sa de shing
gshed me// me gshed chu ste shing gshed lcags// lcags gshed me ste sa gshed rlung// sa tshogs brgyad de phag rus gnan// gang yin dgra lnga thod par gzhug/ gang dmigs ngur mchad nang du gnan// keg
dgra lo zla zhag za ma// gang bab dus su thod zor bsreg/ 'khor lo gnan pa dag dang bsdeb// gang dmigs rlung rtas srog bskyabs nas// ming rus lo khams sbyor ba kun// khyi phag dar ma'i thod par
gzhug/ ya ma srog la khams shig dang// ma drag srungs la yam shod bri// dur mchad rten gyi 'gram la gnan// bdag nyid kun bdag ya ma'i sku// sgo dgu rten gsum srog slungs bshigs// gtad pa kun gyi

dgongs par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// gtad khram mtha' sdud kyi le'u ste gya gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bsrung pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan
