yang bsrung pa'i sbyor ba 'di// rim pa lnga dang ldan pa ste// sngon du lhog na phyag rgyas bsrung// chos sku bde ba chen po las// cho 'phrul zil gnod lhun gyis grub// yan lag rdzogs pa'i thugs ka nas// sprul
pa'i 'od zer nyi ma'i zer// rtsol med shar bas gdug pas gzir// sbyor ba'i rdzas ni ldog pa na// phyag rgya rang bzhin lhun grub bstan// khri tsho sngags kyi 'khor lo dang// thod pa'i ming rus
dbang bskur brlab// dug chu myos pa'i khrag gis byug/ tshil gsum brun gsum dud pas bdug/ de yis gdug pa zhe gcod gzir// thugs phrad rtsol bas ldog pa na// phyag rgya brtan pa gsal byas
la// gdug pa'i nus pa stong gis gzir// dbang po lnga la phur pa gdab// thod pa stobs kyis 'og tu gzir// de yis gdug pa zhag bdun brgyal// sangs nas rjes med rten la gcod// sbyor ba'i rgyal po de
med na// gal te rjes nas ldog pa na// lha yi skur bsgoms byin rlabs bstan// stobs kyi lha bsnyen dbang du bsdu// lus la mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bca'// tshogs mchod gtor ma rgyun mi bcad// bsnyen pa chu

rgyun mtha' ru gso// gzir ba gsum dang rten la brab// rta gsur btang la rdo nag sba// khro bo bsrung ba'i mtshon cha bskyed// klu rgyal phyag rgyas zil gyis gnan// khro bo'i sngags kyis las rnams gtad// tshe

srog dbang po bsdus las brab// rten dang dbye ba yang yang bya// thod 'khor thog tu zor thun dbab// raka ta brlab cing gdung ba brnag 'khur ba bus la sbyugs glu blang// gshin rje bos la dgra la rbad// dun
ting sngags dang gzir gsum brab// gzhan gyi go bzlog dbang po bsdam// lus dang yan lag bag chags dril// dud pa gsumadang sngags kyis dbyug/ 'byung ba lnga yis dwangs ma gzung// pho brang dbus su
rten la mchod// 'khor la sngags bsrung sbyor bas bsrung// longs spyod bde lam sngags kyis brgyan// tsham ngam drag po'i sbyor ba bzlog/ srid gsum tshe dbang lus la bsdu// de yis lus dbang 'khor rnams

brtan// phyis bzlog sbyor ba bzlog pa ni// phag thod nang du ming rus khams// dmigs pa yod med kun bcug la// thod pa dug chu khrag gis byug/ rme khrag dri khrag brnol khrag brdeg khyi phag sbyang khu'i brun
tshil bdug/ drag po'i stobs dang gang sgrub sngags// brgya par dkrugs la khri bar brdeg/ thod mkhar rten du yang gnan brtsam// gtad pa'i klu la phyag rgya bsdigs// phyis 'byung sbyor ba bsrung bar

bsad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ phyag rgya chen po srung ba'i le'u ste gya gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la// dbangaphyug chen pos mtshan ma sgyu rtsal gyi sbyor ba rgyas par mdzod ces

gsol ba btab bo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba'i don 'di rgyas par bshad do// dang po brnal ma'i las la 'jug bsnyen pa'i tshad ma thob pa dang// nye ba'i snying po dngos grub blang// thon nas
bsgrub pa dngos la 'jug/ lam ma grub na bsnyen pa yi// 'khor lo rgya log bsgyur ba bca'// gsad pa'i sbyor ba stag mo'i tshul// nad kyi sbyor ba zlog la bskor// mtha' ru gal 'greng hol gyis

gnan// las kyi sbyor ba ma grub na// lo langs nag mo'i sbyor ba brtsam// bsnyan pa rgya log mtha' nas bsgyur// 'khor lo rdzas la byin rlabs bskyed// sngags kyi rang bzhin bstan pa sbyin// ngo bo mi 'gyur sgyu
ma'i sku// phyag rgya bstan pa'i dngos brtags la// 'bru rnams gsol la dbang bskur brlab// ye shes dam tshig gnyis med bste// myos pa'i rdzas la dud bas bdug/ mtha' nas dbus su sbyor ba dkrug sbu gri
ming bcas dbus su dril// mtshams su yan lag sbyor ba brtsam// rnal 'byor skal ba mi ldan pas// las brtsam 'bras bu mi 'byung na// bsgrub pa thod mkhar rten la bca'// gzer gsum mtha' ru sbyor ba
sbobs// de ma grub na 'khor lo 'pho// de brtsams don med thod mkhar 'pho// gshed bdag las kyi 'khor lo bca'// mthu bril gsad pa'i 'khor lo bca'// mtha' ru mchog sdug gnan pa bya// 'bras bu

mngon du ngar rnams dbyung// srod dang tho rangs yul la sprad// las ma grub na mtha' ru brtsam// gsang ba'i sbyor ba dbye bar bya// lnga brgya'i mtha' ru bskang gso'i las// gang yang brtsams la dngos med

na// rdzas kyi nus pa sngags kyis bskyed// yang gsang sbyor ba rang la brag/ thun mong spyad na bstan pa 'jig 'di la bag ldan thabs gsang na// las kyi gcong chen drag po yis// sbyor ba me rlung skyin thang

mtsho// gsang ba'i gnas su gang gsang spyod// de yi rim pa gsang ba bi// ston zla gsum la dbugs bral ba'i// mgyogs byed rkyang gi mtshan pa la// sbyor ba rten gyi gnas bcas la// bsnyur bu'i snying la khu

le bya// 'tsho byed rgyal po'i sum cha la// tsha ba gsum dang bsres la btags// drod kyi rgyal po dmar nag la// sum gnyis tshad du sgar la bsrog/ drod kyi rkyen bzhi gcig dang sbyar// dbyar dpyid tha chung brgyad

gsum la// dmigs pa'i rten dang 'phrad pa na// nyi shu bco lngas rkyen blangs nas// zla ba gsum na sbyor ba smin// 'bras bu bzhi yi ngo la smin// rang yang bag med spyad pa min// gzhan yang dpyid zla tha chungs

kyi// sra ba gzhung nag nang cha bru// bdun nam lnga ru drod la bca'// 'tsho byed ga bur sum cha la// ha la nag po sum gnyis bsres// nya drod btags la skabs la brtag/ zla ba'i stod la snum la rten// zhag

grangs lnga 'am bdun na ldang// lo gsang tshes pa'i dbyar zla la// 'bras bu nus pa phyi ru 'byin// rang yang gdug pa'i lus su bsam// gzhan yang gsod byed bya yi khrag/ mkhar sgong srin can srad chung rtsa// tsha
chus bran la lam gyi 'og/ bdun nam dgu btsas sngo yi drod// dgun zla gang rung stod la sprad// ston zla gang rung dus la 'byin// zhag grangs bcu bdun dag na ldang// las 'di snang snang bya ba

min// gzhan yang 'khyag pa dar dus kyi// thar nu srang chung re lcag pa'i// rtsa ba ma gnad gsum blangs la// 'khyags pa mi nyen nyi mas skam// dpyid zla tha chungs tsha dang brtag/ zho gnyis srang gi khu les

bsgar// tshang ngam yang na nad gyi khrag/ bsras la yul dang nya la sprad// bcu'am yang na nyi shu na// mkhris pa dar ba'i tshul du ldang// lo phyed yang na lo dus na// rtsa sbubs mkhris pas rgyas nas 'byin// bka'

bor spyad na nyams mi 'grub// gzhan yang chud khu'i rdo reg dang// mu gzi gnas pa'i me reg dang// sbrul gyi sha rus sos kha bse// zhag bdun gyi ni drod la sba// bton nas phabs dang khu les bsgar// sbyor

ba bzhi gsum bzhi la phab// lo dus bar du dud khang ngam// yang na bu ma'i mal du bca'// dus kyi zla ba stod la sbrad// chang ngam yang na sha rul tsha// sbyar bas zla phyed yang na gcig/ bad kan skyang sgangs ldang
ba'i tshul// zla ba bdun nam yang na bcu// dus las mi 'da' mngon du 'byin// sngon du bka' la don med na// las 'di bya yis gzhan du nyams// gzhan yang me tog rgyas pa yi// ra khrag zhun tshil mar khu
bsre// mchin pa dang sbyar chang yor tsa// dgu na bton la nyi mas gdungs// lo phyed chang dang sbyor la gnan// dgun min gang min stod la sbrad// lo yi dus su tsha ba skyed// lo gcig zla ba gnyis na

'byin// dbang po rno la brtson par bya// gzhan yang bra bo sngo zhar sbrang// sran ma tsha dang mar du bsrul// dgra bcom pa bas kyis man nal bslang// sbyor ba gsum skabs brtags la brtsa// slum gyi sbubs su

zhag grangs lnga// de nas ga bur bzhi cha bsre// gang rung snang snang gcig la brten// ston zla gsum gyi stod la sprad// lo dus zla ba'i stod nyid la// tsha grang 'dar bu lus sbrid nas// bdun nam zhag grangs bcu

bzhi na// rkyen dang drag tu ldan pas 'byin// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ mtshan ma sgyu rtsal gyi sbyor ba lo dus na 'pho ba'i le'u ste gya bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dus tshod zla ba'i

dus su 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// gzhan yang mtshan ma'i sbyor ba ni// dmar nag ha la chen po dang// ga bur la sogs bsil ba'i dug phyed ma'i thog tu nyungs 'bru'i tshad// nag po nyid dang lga bsres

btag dus med gang ru cig la sprad// zhag grangs gsum na nang khrol dang// mgrin pa'i rtsa la sbyor ba 'du// zla ba phyed nas rkyen langs nas// 'og ma'i zla ba'i dus na 'pho// dri ma che ba'i shing du sbyar// drag
po nyid kyi sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang lto ba'i phung ba 'pho// dbyar zla ra ba'i me tog bcud// nag po dag la blangs pa'i sha/ tsha ba gsum dang bag zan gyis// phyi dang yang log tshas byas

la// bdun nam lnga du drod la bca'// nyi ma ma yin drod la bskam// btags la blon pa'i sha la rten// 'khyag pa med pa'i drod la sprad// zhag grangs bdun na khong du sbo/ kha nas lbu skyug yi ga 'ching// zla ba
gsum mam ngo bzhi na// mi gsal 'thibs shing rten las 'pho// dam par ma zung bka' las 'da'// bung ba khong 'joms sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang drag pa'i rim pa ni// sos ka'i bung ba drod blangs
la// zer mo khrag dang klad pas bca'// chang ngam sha btsos rlangs bas gnan// ston zla 'bring po'i bung ba la// 'bras bu gsum dang hong len btag ra yi 'o ma ka ras gnan// zla ba phyed na ston la
bskam// 'bras bu gsum gyi bcus la sbyar// nam mam nyi ma dros la sprad// zla ba'i dus na lce rtsa skam// ro la bcud med lus po sprid// dkar skyur kha zad 'dod pa bskyed// zla bo gnyis sam gsum du

'dzin// bzhi yi ngo la brten la 'pho// 'chol bar spyad na dam tshig nyams// dogs pa med pa'i sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang lu ma'i mi 'bab chu// rdo dreg rtsa rtse me tog skyags// tsha pa gsum dang shing rul

bsre// rtsi thog rgyas pa'i khrag 'dzin bsre// zhag dgu btsas la zla phyed skam// nyi ma ma yin dus pa la// zla ba'i stod la blangs pa'i rten// brtags la dmigs pa'i rten dang sprad// nyi shu gcig gam gnyis na

slong// dus kyi zla ba gsum na 'pho// dkon mchog mchod dang dam tshig gso// 'gyur ba med pa'isbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang skyer ba'i chu bskus la// mngar dang so bya'i sha khrag bsre// chu dgu sbos pa'i tsha

dang sbyar// bong ldang rtsa ba bsres la brtag/ shing shun gla rtsi snum dang sbyar/ kha zas 'dod pa gang la 'ang// 'dod pa yod pas nye bar sprad// zla ba'i dus na sgang zhing sdo// rlung nad lta bur zla dus gnas// dus

tshod zla ba'i gnyis gnas 'pho// rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor brtag dus kyi sbyor ba nye bar bshad/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ mtshan ma sgyu rtsal gyi sbyor ba las zla ba'i dus na 'pho ba'i le'u ste gya lnga
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dus tshod nye bar 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// gzhan yang sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// drag po til gyi 'bru tsam dang// nya dang sbyang mkhris bskams la

bsre// drag po drod kyi rkyen dang sbyar// nyi mas spros la sga yis bdug/ rten dang sprad na gsum na ldang// nyi shu gsum nan lnga la 'pho// 'gyur ba med pa'i sems nyid brtag/ gzhan yang glang po'i mchin
pa'am// gcan gzan gdug pa'i mchin khrag la// yung ba ldum shing rwa tsha bsreg/ tsha ba gang rung brten dang sbyar// zhag drangs nyi shu gsum na 'pho// ya ma ka li mun tra stom// gzhan yang rtsi thog

rgyas pa yi// khrag dang sbyang tsher me tog go/ snying po rkyang gi rkang sungs gsum// bsres la nang rod bgrangs la sprad// zhag grangs bco lnga dag na 'pho// brtson 'grus pa sam gtan rig pa bskyed// gzhan yang

me tog sna tshogs la// bong ldad rtsa ba bsres la skam// chang gis bran cing ston kha btsa'// zhag grangs bdun na bton la btag/ drod gsub sha dang sbyar la sprad// bcu 'am zhag grangs dgu na 'pho// chos sku

bde ba'i nyams dang sbyar// gzhan yang ba spu smin ma yi// 'bras bu lga dang bsres la brtag/ khyi lce'i rtsa ba brtags la sbyar// 'bru mar til mar dag la brten// zhag grangs du ma mdun na smra// ngag gi dbang
po mi gsal 'chi// tho rangs nyi ma'i rtan las 'pho// thams cad thugs rje chen pos gzung// gzhan yang bcud rgyas sngo sna tshogs// chang gis bran la kyi tshang gnan// bcu gsum mtha' ru bskams la

brtag/ sha btsos btsags la rdzas rnams blugs// rten dang phrad nas brgyad gsum na// 'khru dang bshal te nyams chung 'pho// rag sha ya ma'i klong du bstan// gzhan yang sbyor ba'i dus bstan pa// sha yi dngas

ma drod ldan la// chang gis sbangs la zhag bdun sba// bdun nam dgu la rten la 'pho// de dag sbyor ba dam pa ste// zhag grangs dus kyi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long rgyud las mtshan ma sgyu rtsal gyi sbyor
ba dus nye bar 'pho ba'i le'u ste gya drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyan pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// gangs chu g.ya' chu'i 'o ma la// 'bras bu gsum dang ga bur bsre// brtags la gong

ma'i chu la sbyar// lnga 'am bdun du gnan sprod na// zhag grangs zhugs pa'i sbyor ba 'pho// gzhan yang skyer chu 'o ma'i chu// grang bskus byas la ga bur bsre// zla bar zhugs pa'i sbyor ba 'pho// gzhan yang seng

phrom mtshe rtsa bsku// skye tshe dang sbyar yang yang gnan// lo dus 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 'joms// ye shes rig pa'i gnas dang sprad// gzhan yang rin chen dri chu gsal ba'i mdangs// dwangs snyigs phye la skar chu

sbyar// thun dgu yul dang nyar bar sbyar// sbyor ba sna tshogs las kun 'joms// drag po sngags kyi brda dang sbyar// de dag thun mong stobs can de// lnga bdun zhag gi mchod pa dang// sngon du gnyen po bcu pa
na// nye bar 'joms pa'i gnyen por bshad// gzhan yang mngar zhing kha ba dang// 'bras bu nag po smin pa dang// sha bu bsregs la gsil dang rtag/ stong pa gsum gyis dus su sprad// ha la drag po nye bar
'joms// brtan pa rig pa'i klong nas 'phang// gzhan yang hor len me tog ser// sreg cing g.yeng ba'i 'khor lo bca'// rtsibs ni mtshon cha bcu gnyis la// lte bar dmigs pa'i ming rus
yul// rtsibs la gang 'dod bzlas pa'i sngags// rtsibs mchan yi ri phaTa? kyis bskor// gzugs la brnol khrag sme bas bsku/ kha na mche ba bsnol mar bsham// g.yas na phyag shing rlung g.yab gson// skra

dang sma ra rtsub la li// ba sbu smin ma rno la gshor// sha mdangs gnag la gnyer ma gyong// skye dang lag pa ring la 'phra// 'og nas chu klung 'khrug cing skyom// lus la lcags kyi zhun khrab gsol// sog po gdong

rings gdug pa'i lus// 'khor ba srung byed nag pos bya// phung sri pho mo 'bum gyis bskor// rten gyi gzugs la bod kyin bstim// snying po sngags kyi sbyor ba gsum// bod skad g.yang ba'i sbyor bas bya// lus
dang gzugs de 'dar ba dang// gzugs de 'phar ram ldog na 'grub// 'bru gsum yan lag 'dod pa yis// dmigs pa'i yul la 'bum du bzlas// nam gyi phyed dang gung yol na// g.yas bkram 'og tu khru
gang sba// steng du stobs kyis 'khor los gnan// dur khrod ras la thugs kyis sngags// rtsibs bzhi dbus dang ldan par dgod// ga 'u 'am ni thod par gnan// rten gyi gzugs de so btang la// sngags dang

ldan pa'i sbyor bas bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags 'di bton to// ya ma rag+sha dun dunadri ma sha baM// dri dza che gar mo la phaT b+h+yo yengs khrol// stobs can nag po yul khams kyi// gnod byed gdug
pa'i mkhar dang 'brel// phyag rgya chen pos stobs kyis bkol// khyad par stobs kyi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// gdug byed nag pos mkhar dang bral ba'i le'u ste dgu bcu

pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang thabs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dkon mchog smod pa'i sku dgra la// sprul pa'i sbyor pa 'di lta ste// sprel dang byi la khyi sbrul bya// wa sram sbu dang khrag

bsrel la// rme thod khram thod sram thod khram// yang na pha mes bla thod rab// de med phyi ba'i thod pa ru// phung sa gsum la mi shis rdzas// blugs la bal tshon sna lngas dkri// sre nag gsum du 'bru sna
gsum// g.yas g.yon khrag sna dbus su 'bru// steng du rdzas kyi phung po gnyis// g.yas g.yon gnyis su phyi ba'i mgo/ steng nas dar nag gur bkab la// 'bum tsho bdun du gsang sngags bzlas// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags 'di bton to// ya ma kha la ma ra ti// druM ru shag druM shi phaT// thon nas byi ba phug ron la// brnol khrag bskus la sbyor ba 'phang// sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams gsum du
bcad// phug ron byi ba thod par sbyar// nya gsum skya rengs lam du gzhug/ nam mkha' bar snang sa la sbyar// gsang sngags khri gnyis sbyor la dbab// ru yaM ti sham ti shag b+h+yo nag rbad// dus

kyi dbye ba gsum du sbyar// ra ba gang rung stod la bsgrub// tha chungs gang rung smad la bca'// tha chungs stod kyi nam smad gzhug/ gza' skrar sbyor ba'ang gsum du dbye// rgyal dang smal po mgo la sgrub// lag
sor dbyug pa gang rung bca'// sta pa shan pa gnyis la gzhug/ gza' yi rgyal po gnyis la bsgrub// blon po rkos mkhan gnyis la bca'// las byed shan pa gnyis la gzhug/ dus dang bza' dang gcig la
sbyar// sbyor ba stobs kyi las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long rgyud las// gsad pa'i sbyor ba gnas dang bral ba'i le'u ste go gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po'i sbyor ba 'di

bshad do// dur khrod mi sogs thod chen la// rma ba lnga dang ldan par bya// ma ra ba yi gzugs bris la// mgo la ming bris bla la rus// snying khar mA ra ya thum rbad// lus dang sen men sog thur rbad// bkod la

dug chu tsha ba dku// dmigs dang gos dang rdzas kyis dril// sogs ba thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ gsang sngags 'bum cho bdun du stim// tsha ba gsum gyi thun gyis brab// thon na dmigs pa'i dur khar sba// khri
yis gzir la brgya yis gnan// sngags kyi spu gri gsum du sbyar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di ston to// hri da ya ba ti ya sa ma ya sa ma ya sen men srog

la thun mA ra ya rbad/ tsit+ta pri pri sha sha ya gzir thum/ stam pa ya nan/ tha chungs gang rung mar ngo la// ya man ta ka'i sbyor ba brtsam// gsad pa las kyi gnad du bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sbyor
ba drag po'i le'u ste go gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdze yams drag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ya ma las kyi las brtsams pa// yugs sa mo 'am brnol mo'i zhabs ma

la// dbus su dmigs pa'i gzugs rnams bri// mtha' mar lo gshed bzhi dang sbrul// bris la sbyor ba'i rdzas kyis byug/ nad khrag brnol khrag phag khrag dug/ tsha ba gsum dang rme ba lnga// brnag pa'i gzugs
la ming rus bri// gshed bzhi'i ru gsad pa'i sngags// sbrul gyi gseb tu gnan pa'i sngags// bris la rdzas de khar nag gril// khyu mchog rwa yi nang du gzhug/ 'bum tsho dgu ru gsang sngags bzlas// zangs

lcags rdo yi thun gyis brab// thon nas gdug pa'i gnyan la gtad// sbyor ba lo yi dus na smin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bton to// ka ba du ru
ma ya me dza la kra ti mA ra ya thum ril hur yarba/ ni dza la ya gzir nan// drag tu khri khris las gnyer gtad// mdze yams drag po'i las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// mdze gril

gsad pa'i le'u ste go gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lo thog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dur stag seng ge'i thod pa la// brnol dang rme khrag thig le bya// yul gyi sa chu sngo sna'i
ming// shing la bris la thod par bzhag/ sngags kyi sbyor ba tshad mas gzung// thon nas dmigs pa'i yul dbus sba// gsang sngags bstim la rta thog brdeg/ 'bras bu lo thog thabs kyis 'joms// dgu dang

bcu gcig nya dang bzhi// bcu dgu nyi shu dgu la brtsam// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags 'di bton to// ya ma ra dza phroM ma hi rdubs drag b+h+yo seng khrol drag chems nA ga tri ling gzir nan/
hur thums ta phroM phroM shar shar tog chems b+h+yo/ yam gtum po'i skur bsgoms la// lan grangs gsum mam lnga ru brtsam// 'bras bu lo thog 'joms par byed// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// lo thog
'joms pa'i le'u ste go bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dbang phyug chen po yis gsol ba btab bo// bsregs pa'i me yis sbyor ba dang// 'khor lo las thor bu bsdebs pa'i sbyor ba dang// ro langs gsang

ba'i sbyor ba bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin sreg gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sngon du bsnyen pa'i drod thob nas/ khams gsum zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// sa phyogs snum la
gzhol ba ru// stegs bu gru bzhi 'thas pa la// 'o ma sman gyi chag chag gdab// dbus su me thab zlum po la// steng 'og mdzub re brkos la rtsig/ dbus su las kyi rdo rje bri/ kha khyer dkar po rdo rjes

gtams// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad mdzes// sgo dang gru chad rdo rje me// bum pa bzhi dang ldan par bri// 'o ma can gyi shing dag la// ldum bu mdzub re brgya rtsa brgyad// lo ma me tog shing thog 'bras// mngar dang
snum 'khur mchod pa bsham// hom shing zlum pos thab bkang la// gshin rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas// pad+ma'i lte bar me lha bskyed// 'dab brgyad mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad// steng ru 'jam dpal de bzhin
gshegs// kun kyang sku mdog dkar la 'jam// gzhon tshul ldan pa'i lhar bsams la// bkra shis gzungs mas me spar bas// lha dang me lha spyan drangs bstim// mchod pa lnga dang bsreg rdzas dbul// gsang
sngags sbyor ba bcu yis dbul// bstod dang 'dod pa'i las rnams bsgo// lan grangs dus gsum bcu bdun dbul// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbul ba'i gsang sngags 'di bton to// oM many+dzu shri ba tsa

de ro ya ma che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ag ne tib bya swA hA/ dz+wa la raM che ge mo shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ bkra shis 'phel zhing zhi ba'i mchog/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod blang// me lha rten pa zhi bar

bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sbyin sreg zhi ba'i le'u ste go lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// nyams dga' dben pa'i skyed mos tshal// mdzes

par dben pa'i sa phyogs su// gser ram rin chen sna lnga la// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya// dbus su khru gang chag gang dbangs// gru bzhi kha khyer sor bzhi sor// nang du 'khor lo rtsigs bzhi la// lte

bar pho brang gru bzhi ser// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la/ kha khyer pad+ma 'dab brgyad mdzes// bskor ba sgo bzhi pad+ma bzhi// rdo rje dang ni me ris bskor// yaM shing khru gang gru bzhi ser// brgya rtsa brgyad dang bdud

rtsi spang// shing thog 'bras bu 'bru yi chan// la phug snum khur mar dang zho// mchod pa lnga dang bsang gtor bsham// ya man ta ka'i sbyor ba yis// hoM shing dag la spel pa'i sngags// rin po che dang me tog

dgram// nor dang rig rgyud dbang thang srog/ gang 'dod bris la dbus su gdags// pho brang dbus su ta ma'i sku// rtsibs bzhi gshed bzhi phyogs skyong phyi// sgo ma mchod pa'i lga mo mdzes// kun kyang ser po

rin chen brgyan// 'khor lo rin chen snye ma phyag/ 'gying bag rgyas pa'i snying po bzlas// spyan drangs mchod mthar sreg rdzas dbul// gsang sngags bcu bculha de la// phul la gang 'dod rgyas par bsgo// bstod

dang las rim spyi dang sbyar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyidakyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// oM a kro te kA ya mAn ta ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M ya ra na phaT/ puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ag na ti bya dzA la spa

ra na phaT puSh+tiM ku ru phaT/ sku yis sngags bzlas yan lag rgyas// lus dang yan lag gang 'dod brtsam// thal ba ming bcas ga bur tsa// rin chen 'bras bu snying po bcud// skyed mos tshal dang ljon par
gnan// thams cad rgyas pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las thams cad rgyas pa'i le'u ste go drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dkyil

'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// rak+ta tsan dan chag chag gdab// thab khung zla kham dmar po la/ kha khyer mtho gang lcags kyus bskor// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la// pad+ma'i lte bar rdo rje bri// mtshams su pa

shaM ku ru bri// gar 'dod dmigs pa bar dang 'og hom shing yam shing tsan dan dang// seng ldeng rgya skyegs rak+tas bsku// rgun 'brum me tog go la mngar// mar nag pad+ma rak+ta mtshal// sha sna mchod pa'i yo byad
bsham// ya mAn ta ka'i sbyor ba yis dbus su gshin rje'i rtsibs la bdud// gru chad 'gugs byed sgo ma sgom// spyan drang mchod la me sbar dbul// gang 'dod dbang bsdu 'phrin las bcol// sku
'khor dmar la lcags kyus dgugs// sngags kyi 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gugs// me lha mdun brtag mchod cing bstab// gsang sngags bcu yis brgya ru dbul// gang 'dod dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bton to// oM hriH Sh+ti bi kri ta na na ba shaM ku ru hU~M dza dza kha hi/ hri ti ag ne ti bya dz+wa la raM pa shaM ku ru dza ho kha hi/ gang dmigs
lus dang yan lag kun// rang dbang 'dus nas gang 'dod sgrub// zangs dang bse yi ga 'u ru// thal ba ming yang bcug la gnan// gang 'dod 'gugs pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud
las// thams cad dbang du bya ba'i le'u ste go bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dur khrod gdug pa'i dben gnas su// phung shul gsum gyi sa blangs

la// stegs bu dug chu khrag gis bran// dbus su me thab drag po la/ kha khyer gsum dang ldan par brtsig/ rgya sol dag gis nag por byug kha khyer thod pa me ra'i rtsang// dbus su brnag pa'i ling ka la// phyi

rim rtsibs bzhi bcu gnyis bri// sgo dang gru chad thod pas brgyan// rdo rje ra ba me ris bskor// gzugs la hom shing tsher ma can// zur gsum nag po dug can gzugs// steng du ya mAn ta ka sgom// rtsibs la

gshed bzhi phyogs skyong bcu// gtso bo'i bka' bstod me lha bdud// sgo ma 'khor skyong rdzogs par bsgom// phyi nang mchod sogs gtor ma phud// sha chen sha sna khrag sna dug/ mar khu til 'bras so ba shang// skye

tshe nyungs nag dug shing dbul// spyan drangs la sogs spyi dang sbyar// gsad pa'i sbyor ba stong du bya// gsod pa'i 'khor lo stong du bca'// zhing ras rgyu la rma bas byug/ thig bzhi btab pas rim bzhin

bskor// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug dang// mtha' ma nyi shu 'khrum mig bya// dbus dang phyogs kyi rtsibs bzhi la// 'khrul sngags drag po lnga dang ldan// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// drag sngags bcu
gnyis me dbal gshed// yang logs khang pa bcu drug tu// bsreg pa me yi snying po dgod// mtha' ma rtsibs chen nyi shu la// gcod cing gnan pa'i spu gri dgod// 'khor lo dug shing me la bdug/ myos pa'i
khrag dang dug chus bran// rabs chad thod pa kha sbyor du// gsad pa'i 'khor lo kha sbyor gzhug/ bar snang sreg pa'i rten du bca'// nyin mo mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor// mtshan mo dgug cing thun gsum
bsreg/ 'khor lo me dang sdebs pa yis// drag po mchog gi sbyor ba 'grub// thon nas thod pa gnyan la gtad// 'khor lo me thab bsgyer cing brtsam// brnag pa stobs chen lus srog dbral// de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bton to// ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ hriSh+ta aM ku sha dzA la raM thun dz+wa la raM ag+ne hri dza/ hriSh+ti bra ma mur tsa rak+ta

tsa ra mA ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya naM/ dang po dbus nas thog drangs la// rnal ma nyi ma bzhi ru bskor// spogs pa bcu bdun bzlog pa bzhi// gnad la bor nas dkrugs la gsad// las rnams kun gyi sbyor ba'i
mchog/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// drag po lto sdebs kyi le'u ste go brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo mthun sdebs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dur khrod gnyan ra gdug pa

ru// sbyor ba drag po'i las la 'jug/ dur khrod gnas nas rgyu blangs la// sbyor ba rdzas kyi thang la bya// 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// thig bzhi dbus nas rgya gram gdab// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe
brgyad// dbus kyi 'khrul mig glong bu yin// phyi rim thig bzhi gnan la gdab// bcu gnyis gshed kyi khang pa yin// yang logs bcu drug thig brgyad bsnan// gcod pa'i mtshon cha'i khang pa yin// mtha' ma

'khrul mig nyi shu bzhi// bskyod pa thun gyi khang pa yin// drag po 'khrul mig lnga bcu bdun// bka' bzlog drag po'i mtshon cha yin// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus kyi 'khrul mig lnga po la// 'phen pa rtsa

ba'i 'bru lnga dgo/ phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// rA tsa la sogs bcu gnyis dgod// yang logs bcu drug khang pa ru// gcod pa spu gri'i sngags rnams dgod// tha ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// bskyod pa thun gyi
sngags rnams dgod// 'khor lo mtshon cha me dbal sngags// dal rims 'byung pa dkrug cing gsod// dkrugs la sngags rnams me rlung dgod// bkod pa ji bzhin nyin mo gtor// mtshan mo thun sngags dril

la dbab// rims nad tsa sbubs me ltar mched// 'khor lo rgyal po srog rtsa gcod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di ston to// ya ta me k+she ma/ ra sa to tsa/ ru ni yo na/ ra

ni yo na/ ra ni tsa ya/ hriSh+ti a mu ka pra ma ni sha ku ru ni thum shag rbad/ ma ma kha la rag mo thun b+h+yo/ badzra snying kha rag ma tsit+ta thun rbad/ mugs ti rag rngubs srog la thun shag rbad/ mtha' ru 'khor lo thod pa
bca'// dred mo ral pa gnyigs pa yis// khrag gis bskus la zhabs mas gril// gting bdud mun pa'i gling du gnas// 'khor lo thun sdeb sbyor bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo byad
stems kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dur khrod rgyu la thang ba bya// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gsang mdzod khang pa brgyad// yang logs rgya gram rlung ri'i sngags// phyi rim phyogs kyi

khang pa bzhi// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus dang phyogs bzhir rtsa ba'i 'bru// gsang mdzod mtshams bzhir ming dang rus// rgya gram spu gri'i lo khams bar/ khang pa bzhi la smyo dang 'bog/ rengs dang

lkugs pa'i sngags rnams dgod// 'khor lo yab yum lto bar bri// dug chu rme khrag smyo 'bog khrag/ bskus la sbyang khu'i thod par gzhug/ gsang sngags nyin mtshan brgyad du sdeb// rtsa ba'i sngags la bzhi ru
dkrug/ mtshan mo byad kyi spu gri gdags// nyin mo dbang po 'chal ba'i sngags// mtha' ru gong gsum g.yeng sar gnan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ya

ma me ta k+she/ ya me ta k+she ma/ ya ta k+she ma me/ ya k+she ma me ta/ ma me ta k+She ya/ me ta k+She ma ya/ ta k+She me ma ma ya/ k+She ma me ta ya/ ya k+She ta me ma/ ya ta me ma/ ya ta ma me k+She/ ya me k+She ta ma/ ya ma k+She ma/ ya ta me/ ya

ma k+She ya me ta/ hri sta ha na/ hri ta na phaT/ sha ni ru pa hU~M phaT/ ya bag ni/ ma ta tsa ma tsa rag mur tsa ya a mu ka ni sha ka ru ni rbad ya pra ma mur tsa rak+ta tsa ra ya a mu ka rbad/ pra ma mur tsa rak+ta tsa ra ya a mu ka thuM

ril rbad/ tsa ma pra ya mur a mu ka hri da ya hU~M phaT/ de dag sbyor ba dam pa ste// thabs kyi rgyal po 'phrul gyi bcud// 'khor lo byad stems gsang bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo shod
sdebs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// zhing ras sam ni rgya shog la// rdzas dang sbyor bas legs byug la// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus nas phyogs bzhir thig bzi gdab// 'khrul mig brgyad dang

bcu drug brtag/ phyi rim nyi shu gnyis su bya// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni/ kha nga pa lnga ru dgod pa ni// ya me ta k+She ma rnams dgod// de yi phyi rim bcu drug la// sngags kyi rgyal po hri Sh+ti dang// dgra bo mA ra ya

rbad dgod// phyi yi nyi shu rtsa gnyis la// dkar nag shod kyi snying po dgod/ kha sbyor bcas la du bas bdug/ rme thod khram thod nang du gzhug/ thod pa ling ga ming rus kun// re thums 'khar nag dong du

gzhug/ dong kar sle nag zhing lbags gdang// rde'u dkar nag rgya mtsho gnyis// dug lnga blud la lpags khud spung// bar du brnag pa'i ming rus gzhug/ gshin rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas// zhing lpags gon la
sha chen mur// spyugs glu glang gin shod r+d+wa bgrang// 'khor lo brgya bar shod sngags bcu// sbyor ba gsum du lto sdebs la// dkar pos lta dgug nag pos gsad// yang na nyin mtshan brnol mar brdeg/ ya
tshogs hri sti brgya brgya yis// dmigs pa'i brnag pa rnol mar bcad// 'khor lo thod pa bdug cing bran// mtshan mo shod rde dkar nag 'grem// bcu yis dkar po bgrang cing bkug/ nag po
brgya pa gzugs la brab// dbang gzugs 'o dod cho nges gdab// thod pa shod nag gnyan la gtad// dkar po lus bsrung stobs dang sbyar// sngags kyi sbyor ba tshad mas gzung// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ya me ta k+She ma dgra bo mA ra ya rbad ya/ hri Sh+ti bi kri ta nan hU~M phaT/ dgra bo mA ta ya rbad ya/ ya ma kha la da ros hril myags thum ril tsit+ta hur yaM dza dza/
dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ skabs dang sbyar na mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan 'khor lo'i rgyud las// 'khor lo sbyor sdebs gsang ba'i le'u ste go dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag
mo las mkha' 'gro brtsegs pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// drag po'i las la stobs med na// yang dag bde ba'i gnas mchog tu// rdo rje zegs ma'i las mchog brtsam// phyag rgya chen po'i brten thob nas// nye
ba'i bsnyen pa tshad mas bzung// las kyi 'khor lo stong phrag bskor// ro langs nag mo'i sbyor ba brdeb// ro ras rme bas legs byugs la// phan tshun thig drug legs btab la// ru thig gnyis te re mig

skyong// mu khyud rim pa lnga ru bskor// dbus su drag po'i 'khor lo brgyad// gcod pa yum gyi spu gris mdzes// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// yab kyi drag sngags 'bru lngas gang// mtshams bzhir gsad pa'i spu gris
mdzes// sku gsung thugs kyi bcu drugal// mkha' 'gro gsod byed snying po dgod// yang logs sku yi bcu drug la// mkha' 'gro gtum ma'i snying po dgod// mtha' ma 'akrul mig bcu drug la// gsod byed nag
mo'i snying po dgod// 'khor lo sbyor ba'i sngags kyis gang// 'bar zhing bod 'bar khro zhing sdud// gcod pa'i skam chags sreg cing gnon// chags pa bde byed grol ba'i lam// sngags rnams rin chen 'od

'bar gsal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las 'khor lo dgod pa'i sngags 'di bton to// ya ma me tA k+She/ pra ma ya rbad/ mur tsa ya rbad/ rak+ta tsa ra ya rbad/ mA ra ya rbad/ snying re

sh+Ya ma duM tsit+ta ta ra ga ra rdubs ro tsa rmugs mugs kha rag hri/ raM thun gzer badzra snying kha la rag sha hri sha hI su drag rag sha baM/ drag rag sha snying ra rag ma rag mo hi dun rmugs tsit+ta sha ya ma

de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ de dag sngags kyi sbyor ba ste// bcu gnyis brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dang po 'phen pa'i rlung nas drang// gshed kyi 'bru bzhi dkrugs la bskor// rdo rje phyogs nas rin chen mtshams// yab yum 'bru dgus lto
dkrug yin// nyi ma dang po las kun byed// ya ma ta k+She me snying ri shan duM// gnyis pa rin chen phyogs nas brtsams/// pad+ma'i mtshams su 'bru dgus sbyor// ya ta k+She ma me tsi t+ta rag ta// gsum

pa pad+ma'i phyogs 'gro ste// las kyi mtshams su de bzhin bskyal// ya k+She ma me ta/ rdubs ro tsa rmugs/ bzhi pa las phyogs rdo rje'i mtshams// 'bru dgu rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yin// mkha' 'gro 'bar bas dbyings

sdud yin// rtsa ba'i sbyor ba mchog tu bshad// de bzhin mtshams bzhi'i sbyor ba yang// 'khrul mig brgyad brgyad bsnol mar bsdeb// rdo rje phyogs nas sngar bzhin rtsi// raM drag rag thun gzer sha snying badzra/

snying kha rag la ma rag rag sha mo ma hri shiha hi dun su/ drag mugs tsit+ta rag+sha ta shag baM/ mtshan mo brdeg pa ba rnag pa'i mchog/ rtsa ba'i sbyor ba dang por bshad// gzhan yang thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// phyogs kyi

dang po gnyis par dril// dang por yab kyi 'bru gnyis blang// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ spu gri spags pa rim bzhin sbyar// phyogs bzhi sbyor ba nyi ma bzhi// mtshan mo mtshams kyi de bzhin bsdebs// ya

ma snying raM drag rag thun ro// ya ta tsit+ta snying ka rag ta// ya k+she rdubs sha mo ma hri ro// la me mug tsi rag kha// 'dod pa'i spu gri snga ma bzhin// mtshams bzhi'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'phen pa'i ya nas 'khrul mig

drug/ rdo rje rin chen mtshams nas brdeb// ya shan gzer ma sning badzra rum// ya rag la ma rag rag ta/ ya tsa shrI hrI dun su rmugs/ ya rag sha ta shag baM hril/ mtshan mo 'phen zhing dbang po 'joms// rig pa

stobs kyi sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang thad tshugs drag po'i las// phyogs ngan phyogs de phyogs bzhir dril// rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po nas// ral gri'i phyogs su rdzogs par brdeb// drag raM snying ma ya k+She ro hi

ma// mo sha rngubs k+She ma ma ro thun rag kha snying tsat+ti ya me kha rag tsi// rmugs drag rmugs me ya ta kha rag/ nyin bzhir spu gri snga ma bzhin// mtshams bzhi'i thad tshugs mtshan mo bzhir// rdo rje mtshams nas

rdzogs par bsdeb// sha gzer shan ya rmugs su dun// hiha shiha rtsa ya dum badzra snying// ma la rag ya hril ba shag/ ta shag rag ya rag rag mtshams kyi 'bru bdun sbyor ba bzhis// mtshan mo dril zhing bkug
nas 'joms// mkha' 'gro drag mo brtsegs pa yi// las mchog sbyor ba rgyal por bshad// dbus nas mgo gcig gdong lce lnga// sngags 'phros spal 'gros lta bu yi// phyogs dang mtshams su nye bar brtsi// rdo

rje phyogs nas rin chen gyis// phyogs la nyi ma bzhi yi las// 'bru bdun sbyor bas 'joms pa yin// ya ma snying ro thun raM drag rag/ ya ma shan dum badzra gzer sha snying// ya ta tsit+ta kha snying kha rag ya ta rag ta
rag ya ma rag 'dod pa'i smu gri sngar bzhin sbyar// rten bzhi dbang po nyi mas 'joms// de bzhin mtshan mo 'joms pa'i las// sbal 'gros bskor phyogs rim par bsdeb// ya k+She rngubs ro hri sha
mo ma/ ya k+She rtsa rmugs su shiha ha dun/ ya me rmugs kha rag rmugs ci/ ya ma rag hril bam sha ta shag phyogs mtshams sbyor ba bsdebs pa yi// drag po'i gnad dgu 'joms par bshad// drag po 'bru gcig

'phen pa'i stobs// gshed bzhi dril la yum la 'phro// yab kyi 'bru lnga bcu gnyis brdeb// 'khyil ba sprul gyi 'gros stabs kyis// nyi ma bzhi bsdebs rgyal blon 'joms// ya ma mo kaShe ta/ snying ro shan dum

tsat+ti rdubs/ ro rtsa rmugs/ ya me k+She ta ma rmugs/ kha rag hril raM thun gzer badzra snying kha la rag ya k+She ta ma me/ sha hri shaa sU rag rag shom baM drag rag sha snying/ ya ta ma mo k+She kha rag ma rag mo ma hi dun
rmugs tsit+ta shag thabs rnams dril ba'i sbyor ba yis// rgyal po blon po stobs can 'joms// sbyar ba kun ldan mchog gi mchog/ thabs gsang bag bcas sbyor bas bya// gzhan du gnyis ka 'chang bar
'gyur// srid gsum las kyi lto dkrugs yin// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// mkha' 'gro brtsegs pa'i le'u ste brgya tham pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag mo tsit+ta gsang ba'i
sbyor ba 'di dag go/ gzhan yang zes ma'i sbyor ba ni// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos sbogs pa'i las// phyogs mtshams kun nas srog bsdus la// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor bca'// zhing lpags rgya shog

rag ta zhun// mi dbang spu ra sU tra don// sho na'i tsit+tas legs byugs la// rim pa lnga dang ldan pas bskor// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// gcod pa spu gri'i 'khor lo yin// gnyis pa rdo rje'i rgya gram
la// phyogs bzhi'i rwa la thig lngar drang// 'khrul mig bzhi bzhi bcu drug ldan// gshed bdag las kyi 'khor lo yin// gsum pa 'khrul mig bcu gnyis pa// kun khyab sku yi 'khor lo yin// bzhi ba de bzhin
bcu gnyis ni// 'od 'bar thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// mtha' ma lnga yi mu khyud ni// gsal ba gsum gyi 'khor lo yin// de dag gsod byed nag mo yi// tsit+ta gsang ba'i 'khor lo yin// de la gnas pa'i rim

pa ni// dbus na rtsa ba'i sa bon ya// 'phen pa drag po'i 'bru gcig yin// phyogs mtshams drag po'i 'khrul mig la// gcod pa spu gri 'bru brgyad dgod// phyi rim rlung ri rgya gram la// me dbal mig 'bru bcu

drug dgod// rlung ri mtshams kyi khang pa bzhir// yab kyi spu gri sde bzhi dgod// gsum pa bcu gnyis khang pa ru// sku yi snying po rdzogs par dgod// bzhi pa lnga par thugs dang gsung// bcu gnyis gsal zhing
'phro ba yis// srog ldan snying po mdzes par dgod// sngags kyi 'od 'bar spu gri'i khang// de yis las rnams kun byed yin// mchog tu gsang ba'i sbyor ba ni// yab yum gnyis su 'du ba

ste// rang gnad phram dang lkugs pas 'joms// dkrug pa'i sbyor ba gsum dang ldan// pho yi sbyor ba me dang 'dra// mo yi sbyor ba chu yi khams// pho mo gnyis 'dus rlung gi tshul// srid gsum lto ba dkrugs pa
yin// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa ni// dril dang gtor bsdebs gnas gsum 'joms/ khams gsum las kyi srog 'joms yin// thad tshugs stag gi mchongs par dril// gsang ba rdo rje kun po yin// bsad pa'i

sbyor ba dril ba'i las// nag mo lto dkrug mchog tu mngag/ dang por sbrul gyi sngags bzhin spro// yab kyi 'bru lnga yum gyi brgyad// spu gri lto sdebs thabs kyis gcod// nyi ma dang po'i sbyor ba yin// gnyis pa

gnad kyi sbyor ba dang// gsum pa thabs kyi sbyor ba ste// bzhi pa rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba rnams// yab kyi 'bru bzhi sngar bzhin sbyor// ya ma me ta k+She/ snying kha rag rag mo dun ti tsi a mu ka pra ma ya srog la

rmugs thum/ kham yengs shag rbad/ ra tsa sa to ta hur thums dza drag rag sha kha/ ru ma yo ni mu tra rag mo kha la hring sha ra ya tsa ni rag mo snying tsa thang thang ka mu le rtsa la thums/ thun mongs stobs kyi sbyor ba
ste// dmangs dang rigs ngan kun 'joms yin// yum gyi 'bru dgu mtha' nas dril// yab kyi 'bru bzi ya la bsdu// 'dod pa'i spu gri sngar bzhin sbyar// rdo rje phyogs nas gsum gi sngags// nyi ma bzhi dang

ldan pa yin// rag mo snying rtsa thang thang mu la nu ma ma ya/ rtsa la thums drag rag sha dra k+she ra tsa sa/ rag mo kha la sring shag snying ka rag to ru na yo/ rag mo dun ting tsit+ta hur thum dza ni ra ya dza/ yum gyi thabs kyi lto

dkrugs pas// rje dang yul srungs 'joms pa yin// gzhan yang yum gyi 'bru dgu la// 'dod pa spu gri thun bsdebs pa// las kyi rgyal po rab 'joms yin// snying kha rag mo dud ting tsit+ta/ hur thums dza drag

rag sha kha mu tra/ rag mo kha la hring shag rag mo snying/ tsa thang thang ka mu le rtsa la thuM/ ro langs nag mo gzir thags kyis// btsad po nyan thos 'joms pa yin// de bzhin dbus nas phyogs bzhi ru// stag gis

mchongs pa dris 'gugs pa// gsang ba kun po nyi ma bzhi// rig pa stobs kyis phen par sbyar// ya ma ru ra tsa rtsa snying ti hu ra rag drag kha la rag kha rtsa rtsa/ ya ra ya me na dza dun thuM rag kha rag thum thang/ ya ru

me tsa ra dun dza rag ta sha la rtsa shag snying rtsa/ ya ya tsa ra kha la mo la kha la/ de dag stobs kyi 'khor lo ste// sngags pa stobs can 'joms pa yi// gzhan yang bslog sngags drag po yi// las kyi rgyal po spogs

pa ni// 'bru drug 'bru bzi ya yis 'phen// 'dod pa'i spu gri'i mtshams su sbyar// ya ta me snying drag rag thums rag sha dza ni ma/ ya dza ya thums hril rtsa la hur ra ni/ yan yo ta kha le mu rtsi ro to/

ya sa tsa dun ta thang thang mu mo to ru/ las ma grub na spogs pa dang// 'khor lo lto dkrugs gnad la dbab// sbyor ldan bde ba'i lam la 'apangs// tshangs pa 'jog po'i gnas su brdeg/ gsang chen thabs kyi
sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ ro langs nag mo tsit+ta gsang ba'i le'u ste brgya gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag mo gsang ba thugs ka'i sbyor ba 'di bshad
do// sbyor ba drag po'i thus ka ru// nag mo'i 'khor lo thun bsdebs bca'// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod rgyu la thang pas byug/ rim pa gsum dang ldan par bskor// dbus su thig bzhi rgya
gram la// dbus kyi pho brang phen pa'i ya// 'phrul mig brgyad pa spu gri'i mtshon// gnyis par phan tshun thig gsum gsum// rgya gram nyid du legs btab la// ru thig gnyis btab bcu drug mig/ nag mo
gsod byed mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gsang ba'i yig 'bru bcu drugadagod// tha ma 'phrul mig drug tu gdab// skyed pa thun sngags drag po dgod// drag po 'khor lo thun bsdebs pas// rngam tshig gsang ba kun

'joms yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bton to// ya dun shaM dun man tsit+ta rag ta 5 thun zer/ snying tsa ro myags ut+ma ma tsit+ta kha la rag sha thun b+h+yo/

ma ma dum bu duM bu tshal pa tshal pa ha na ha na thun b+h+yo/ ma ma har yaM ling rbad thun b+h+yo/ ma ma a bran brag ni mi sha ling thun b+h+yo/ ma ma thuM thuM rub rub tsit+ta yaM shag thun b+h+yo/ ma ma kha la rag mo tsal breng shag thun b+h+yo/

sbyor ba brgya brgya thun sngags bcu// nyin mo gtor la mtshan mo dril// rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po nas// rin chen mtshams su 'bru bzhi brdeb// mgo la 'bru gcig drag pos 'phen// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu

ka/ mtha' ru spu gri 'bru brgyad gcod// nyi ma dang po'i sbyor ba yin// spu gri 'dod pa kun la brdeb// gnyis pa rin chen phyogs nas drang// pad+ma'i mtshams su nye bar bskyal// mgo dang mtha' rten snga ma

bzhin// ya tsit+ta rak+ta/ gsum pa pad+ma'i phyogs nas drang// ral gri'i phyogs su rdzogs par brdeb// ya raM thun zer snying/ rdzogs pa ral gri'i phyogs nyid nas// rdo rje'i phyogs su rdzogs par bsdeb// ya za ro
myags ud/ nyi ma re la khri tsho res// drag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo bskor// mtshams su thun sngags bcu bcu gtor// mtshan ma thun dang 'khor lo'i las// brgya brgya dril la bsnol mar bcad// las ma grub
na 'khor lo spogs// thun drug dril la gzugs la brab// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// mtha' nas bzlog la 'bru bzhi sdeb// mgo dang mtha' rten snga ma bzhin// 'dod pa'i 'bru gsum mtshams su

sbyar// ya ud mug ro tsa/ nyi ma dang pos rten 'brel 'joms// sa yi snying po chu la thim// yang snying gzer thum ram/ gnyis pas sman gyi gzugs la gcod// chu yi snying po me la bstim// ya ta rak+ta tsi/ gsum

pas drod kyi rtsa gzugs gcod// me yi snying po rlung la bstim// ya man dun shan duM/ bzhi pa bskyod pa'i rtsa gzugs gcod// rlung gi snying po thig ler gzhug/ thig le skye med bde ba'i klong// yang dag khyab pa'i

dbyings su rdzogs// phya rgya chen po'i bstan pa yin// bag chags snyings ma mtshon chas gtems// thod pa dang bcas klu la gtad// ro langs na mo'i thugs khar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// ro
langs nag mo gsang ba thus kha'i le'u ste brgya gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// las kyi gshin rjai ma khugs sam// las mi byed cing ldog pa na// ro
langs drag po'i sbyor ba bcas// dngos grub gang 'dod tsam pa na// baM chen rten la 'dod pa blang// sngon du rnal 'byor bde ba yis// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa na// dpa' rtul ldan pa'i grogs dag
dang// snying po gsang ba'i gzungs ma yis// lha yi sbyor ba gsum rten la// dur khrod gnas nas bam chen blang// khro 'gying stabs kyis gar bzlog la// bsrung ba kun dang bgegs rnams bskrad// sngags kyi
chu yis khrus byas la// maN+Dal bdud rtsis chag chag gdab// yi btags phal chen dkyil 'khor bri// rgyan dang dam rdzas gtor ma dgram// mchod pa'i yo byad ldan par bsham// pho brang dbus su bam bzhag

la// bum pas bkrus la sngags kyis sbyang// de nas lha yi bsnyen pa bya// baM gyi phung po 'byung ba khams// khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// de bzhin tsit+ta'i pho brang du// yab yum 'khor bcas

rdzogs par bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs// sku yi bsnyen pa'i dngos grub blang// tshogs dang mchod pa khrus dang ldan// drod rtags thon na 'dod pa blang// lus bskyod pa na rgyal sa thog/ yan

lag 'gul na las la sbyar// sgo rnams g.yon gsang sngags 'grub// sgra 'byin skad dang tshogs de bzhin// lha dang 'phar na las rnams 'grub// dug rlangs 'pho na ma mo 'grub// dri bsrung 'od 'byung shan pa
'grub// dri bsung ldan na 'og min bgrod// phyag 'tshal thal sbyor ya ma'i 'khor// thugs khar 'od spros sangs rgyas sar// khas bub ngu 'bod mi shis ltas// bsnyen pa lngab kyis drag pos gzir// de byung
dkyil 'khor lho phyogs su// gru gsum rtsegs ma'i me thab bca'// drag po'i yam shing gtsub med spor// tsit+ta bton la shugs bra brtag/ thod pa mdzes ldan bum pas sbyang// dbang po lnga dang

bcas pa bca'// bkra shis 'dod pa'i dam rdzas gnag/ shun chen mkha' lding gling bu rkang// dkyil 'khor rdzas kyi rgyan dam yin// sha khrag dngas ma gtor ma dbul// lhag ma rkang dang rjen shul la// drag

po'i mchod pa rgyun du bya// lan grangs brgya'am nyi shu gcig/ tha na lan gsum sbyin sreg bya// dkyil 'khor gsumagyi lha la mchod// ma lha dang bcas bdag la bsdu// las kyi gshin rje gzir zhing bsdigs//

dbang du bsdus la pho nyar mngag/ las kyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo bca'// bam gyi gos sam lpags shun la// gcod pa sngags kyi 'khor lo bca'// mu khyud pho brang bzhi ru bskor// dbus su rtsibs bzhi rtsa ba'i

sngags// phyi rim rlung gi rgya gram la// me dbal ming gi snying por ldan// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la// lto dkrug sngags kyi spu gri gnas// 'phen pa ya la gcod pa gshed// sdud pa ma la shan pa gying// srid
pa las kyi lto dkrugs nas// brnag pa kun gyi dwangs snyigs 'byed// mtshon cha'i brdeg thabs rnam pa gsum// rnal ma bzlog dang lto dkrugs kyis// mtshon cha'i rgyal po yul dbang gcod// de dag zad mthar

yang dag sbyar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ya ma me ta k+she/ ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ hri Sh+ti ya shag nri duM srog chod ro lid gzir nan/ kham shag

rbad/ dang po 'bru ded rnal ma yi// nyi ma bzhi yis thams cad gcod// ya ma me ta k+She a mu ka hri sti ya shag sbyar/ spu gri 'dod pa mthun par sbyar// lus dbang myos shing mgo la bskor// nyi ma dang po'i las su

mngag/ ra tsa sa to/ de bzhin spu gri rdzogs sbyar ba// gsang lam mgrim pa'i rtsa la bskor// nyi ma gnyis pa las su mngag/ ru na yo ni tsit+ta lan/ srog gi rtsa la 'khor bskor// dwangs snyigs brkam chags rten
'brel gcod// nyi ma gsum pa'i las su mngags// ra ya tsa ni/ 'dod pa'i spu gri snga ma bzhin// mthun pa'i kun la bsdebs pa yis// srid pa chags byed lte bar bskor// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las su
mngags// mtshan mo rnal mar dril bsdebs la// spu gri gong bzhin sbyar ba yis// skyed rgyud gcod byed gsang bar bskor// rnal mas gsad pa'i sbyor bar bshad// ma grub spogs na bzlog la bskor// ya k+she

ta me ma/ spu gri rnal mas sngar bzhin sbyar// brtan pa sa yi dwangs ma sdud// si rag cad nas rak+ta skyems// ni tsa ya ra/ zhen pa sa yi rtsa gcad nas// 'degs dang bskyod pa'i dngas ma sdud// ni yo na ru/ zhen
chags me yi rtsa gcad nas// smin byed drod kyi dwangs ma sdud// to sa tsa ra/ zhen pa rlung gi rtsa gcad nas// g.yengs dang bskyod pa'i dwangs ma sdud// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung// nam mkha'
dbyings kyi khongs su 'jug/ rten 'brel skye med dbyings su dag bzlog sngags drag po'i sbyor bar bshad// las mi byed dang rtags log na// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer dkrug/ gshed po yab yum lto ba

dkrug/ de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// ya ma ra yo ni/ khams dang dbang po dkrugs nas bskul// ya ma to sa tsa/ skye med 'byung ba dkrugs shing bskul// ya ta yo tsa ru/ phung po rnam shes dkrugs shing bskul// ya
k+she ni ra ya/ srog dbugs bkrag mdangs dkrugs shing bskul// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ spu gri'i sbyor bas sngar bzhin bsdebs// srog zungs gcad nas dwangs snyigs 'brel// las kyi rgyal po'i
brnag par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ ro langs nag po'i le'u ste brgya gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// na ring chen po'i lpags

shun la// shal nag cang shes ka ling dang// ku ku ka li'i rak+ta byug/ dbus nas mu khyud gsum du bskor// dbus nas thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// dbus kyi kha rgyud le tshe dgu// phyi dang yang logs thig brgyad
gnan// 'khrul mig bcu drug bcu drug ldan// 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus nas 'phel ba'i sa bon ya// drag po gnas brgyad spu gri dgod// gnyis pa'i 'phrul mig bcu drug la// 'khrug byed bdud
mo'i 'bru rnams dgod// yang logs de bzhin bcu drug la// 'thoms pa bdud kyi 'bru rnams dgod// sngags kyis bskul zhing 'khor los gcad// snang srid srog dang las la dbang// pho mo lto sbyor las nyid

dkrug/ de yis ma lus 'joms par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ya du baM te ma hed/ ru thu kha la shag da rod sho kyi kyi baM ti/ du mun/ drag rag sha

ka li rag mo srog thig tsat+ti ba ril srog la yaM shag thuM rol rtsa rbad/ pho mo nyin mtshan bsnol mar brdeg/ mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ spu gri 'bru brgyad mthun par sbyar// kun 'joms bdud kyi 'khor lor
bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// bdud kyi 'khor lo kha sbyor gyi le'u ste brgya bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi thun bsgrub 'di bshad do// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta
ste// gzhan yang rig gsum gdug pa'i sar// stegs bu gru bzhi khrag gis byug/ dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma la// mchod pa dam rdzas ldan par bzhag/ nub tu bdud kyi gtor ma la// sho na cang shes ku ku
dang// mkha' lding ka yis rgyan la bzhag/ byang du bdud mo srog gcod kyis// dug sna khrag sna'i gtor ma gzhag/ lho nub 'brub khung mthing nag la// rtsang dang snying nas brgyan pa ru// ling ga
ming byang g.yag ru gzhag/ mtha' ma thun gyi rdzas kyis bskor// las rim sbyor ba rtags kyis gzung// ya man ta ka'i bsnyen pa bya// las kyi rgyal po bdud sgrub btsal// gshin rje'i thugs kha'i sa bon
bskul// bdud po yab yum 'khor dang bcas sngags kyis bkug la dbang du bsdu/ thon nas thun sngags bzlas shing brab// mtha' ru zor gyis bdud rnams sngags// brnag pa'i khams la bdud du

dbab// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ru thum kha yal dun ting srog la shag rbad/ ma ma tsit+ta breng shag hur thuM srog la thuM rbad/ rag sha rbad tsit+ta thums/ ba ti kha

long yaM/ hri da khas da nan thun b+h+yo/ hed ma hed hed b+h+yo/ du muM rbad/ khaM tig hur nan/ hab tang srog tig nan/ du ya tsa rag mo srog la thun rbad b+h+yo/ yab yum khri khri 'khor la brgya/ bcu bcu rten la rdzas kyis
brab/ 'thom nag khri yi lam du gzhug rA zor brnag pa'i sbyor ba 'di/ pho mo bdud kyi gnad dkrug yin/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ bdud kyi thun bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgya lnga pa'o//// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sa phyogs gnyan la rtsub pa'i sar// bdud bcad sa dang grog mkhar la// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam par brtag/ dbus su

gru gsum nag por bya// zla kham thod pa'i ra bas btams// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// de bzhin sbrul gyi ra bas bskor// yang logs 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la// rdo rje rkyang pa'i ra bas bskor// gru chad

khyams dang sgo bzhi bya// mtha' ma rdo rje'i me ris gtams// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su bdud kyi rgyal po dang// bdud mo mi zan snying rkun gnyis// dregs pa'i gdan la 'khyud par bsgom// rtsibs
bzhir bdud mo bla rkun dang// tshe phrog gzer 'debs dbugs sdud bsgoms// rtsibs bcur bdud po mi zan bcu// rngam tshig dregs pa'i tshul du dgod// gru chad khrag mtsho thod pas mdzes// sgo bzhir ltas
ngan shan pa bzhi// gcer bu sder chen srog gcod bsgom// khyams la sprulapa bdun tshe bdun// rang rang las ngo len cing rngam// dmigs pa'i rgyud la gcod cing rol// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa
dang// spyan drangs mchod sogs bsnyen pa brtsam// drod rtags thon nas las la bsngags// bsnyen pa'i tshad ma thon par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las bsnyen pa'i sngags 'di bton
to// oM rag sha 'bas ti ka ru thums kha yal du mun ma tsit+ta hring hrim dza/ nyin mtshan gsum stong dag la sbyangs// gtso la bstod cing mchod pa 'bul// bdud la mchod btab rak+ta rlab// 'dod
pa'i las kyang gsum du byar// shan pa las kyi rgyal por bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// bdud kyi rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgya drug pa'o//// rgyud bar pa rdzogs so//// de nas
dbang phyug chen po yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gshin rje'i sbrul pa mon pho mo'i sbyor ba phye ste bshad du gsol zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mon pho mo la sogs pa'i smod

sngags phyi nang gsum du phye nas bshad do// ri gsum rtse dang brag nag spungs// 'ja' tshon spungs dang lho phyogs su/ kha bstas dben pa'i dur khrod du// bdud chad sa dag rgya gram ro// phung sa gsum la maN+Dal

bya// gru bzhi khru gang khrag gis byug/ tshangs pa'i thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// phrur thig la sogs cha chen brgyad// phyogs bzhi dag tu lags btab la// phyi nang rim pa gnyis gnyis bskor// tshon gsum kha dog

so sor phye// dbus su gru gsum nag po las// zla kham gsum la thod rlon bskor// 'khor lo rtsibs bdun nag po la// the ba dmar po bdun du bri/ de yang thod 'phreng skam dang ldan// gru chad khrag mtsho sgo bzhi

ldan// nor bu rin chen thod pa bzhi// zhing gi ka ba tshangs pa'i gdung// ru thal ka gdan chu srin dbyibs// dur khrod mkha' 'gro 'dod yin mdzes// zhing chung 'phan dang nyi zlas brgyan// de la gnas pa'i rim

pa ni// dbus su zhing bsnol chu glang gdan// hU~M las zhal gsum phyag drug pa// glang chen zhing lpags stag lpags sbrul// thod pa me ri dur khrod brgyan// lha klu ma mo mgo gcad nas// ya mAn+ta ka'i dbu gsum

brgyan// be con ral gri dgra sta g.yas// tri shul sdigs mdzub rgyu zhags g.yon// sku mdog nag po me ris brgyan// zhabs bzhi gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// g.yon na bdud mo gshin rje yum// zhing rkyang

mdzo mi'i gdan la 'khyud// sbrul nag thul ba thod pa zhing// rin po che yi chun 'phyang brgyan// g.yas pa khraM shing gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa nan kyi rkyal ba rdebs// gli snying nang khrol tha zhing bstab// g.yas su

sgeg mo ral gcig ma// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis rngam// g.yas pa spu gri srog rtsa gcod// g.yon pa tsit+ta khraM baM bsnams// khrag gi ral pa mu tig rgyan// spyan gsum nyi zla 'tshub nag 'khyil// baM chen
gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// thugs mchog ya ma rA dza'i sku// sngo nag gtum khro yan lag rags// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mi ro gsol// g.yas na be con dug sdong g.yon// sku la yab bdud g.yang gzhi
'brum// dbu la bdud kyi thod pa sbrul sbul// dbu skra yan lag stan cha sbrul// zhal gdangs mche ba zla tshes gtsigs// bdud dang mu stegs 'brug gi gdan// ye shes thugs kyi sa bon

las// sbrul pa ya dang ma spros pas// mon pa bdun dang mon mo bdun// zla kham rtsibs dang ze bar dgod// sgo bzhir mon pa nag po bzhi// sprul dang thod pa zhing chung brgyan// sha khrag za zhing rkan sgra
brdebs// zhal nas gdug pa'i sngags bzlos shing// thams cad be con ral gri thogs// dmigs pa'i dgra bo rdul du rlogs// yang sbrul 'bum phrag bla la rgyug bsnyen pa lha yi dkyil 'khor bshad// sgrub

pa'i dkyil 'khor zla kham bdun// snying po sngags la khrag 'thung bskyed// me rlung 'khor los 'gugs shing 'ching// bla dang sprul ba tshe bkrag 'chang// sgrub pa drod kyi dkyil 'khor bshad// drag po'i dkyil

'khor gru gsum bdun// ling ga phur pa thun dang sngags// mtshon tsha nad dang bu yug glog/ srog gcod nang khrol glo snying za// gdug pa'i sngags dang mtshon cha brdeg/ sku mdog sngo nag me dang 'dra// sha rus

khrag la gtod cing za// 'phrin las gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad// gtor ma gsum dang rag+ta gsur// zhing rgyan mchod pa snying sna dgram/ bdud bcad sa dang rdo phye khrag/ skyin thang shwa shul tsha ba dug mon
dang rus sbal thod pa bca'// ming rus khams bcas ma ra ni// byang nub 'brub khung nang du brnag/ khrag gsum phe gsum 'bru gsum thun// lho nub la sogs de bzhin bskor// khrag thun dkyil 'khor rdzogs
par bsgom// thugs kha'i sa bon bskul zhing bzlas// drod gsum bar du bzlas pa yis// tshad mar brten pa byas la bsten// thon nas drag po'i sbyor ba brtsam// gcod pa sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// ro

ras zhing lpags khru re la// rdzas kyi thang ba legs byugs la// nyi shu drug la ldan pas bri// don khrag gsum dang dug chu yis// mu khyud rim pa bzhi ru bskor// thig bzhi btab pa'i le'u tshe dgu// dbus su rtsa

ba'i 'khrul mig lnga// phyi rim mtshon cha'i rtsibs chen bdun// yang legs 'khrul mig bcu gnyis ldan// mtha' ma chu yi khang khyud zlum/ kha sbyor bcas la yi ge dgod// 'bru bzhi dbus kyi khang pa ru// rtsa ba'i
yi ge 'bru lnga dgod// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bdun la// drag sngags bdun pa pho mo dang// dgos pa gnas mthun lto sbyar dgod// yang logs 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// mi dbal sngags 'bru bcu gnyis
dgod// mtha' ma'i mu khyud zlum po la// gdug pa'i thun sngags rdzogs par bskor// pho skor g.yas la mo skor g.yon// ngar bcas dbus su bar snang 'degs// zhag bdun nyin mtshan pho mos brdeg nyi ma
bzhi yis las gnyer gtad// sgo bzhi'i sngags kyis shes pa dprog gdug pa'i drag sngags lam du gzhug phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bzlas// las kyi mtha' ru mnan pa bya// drag po mtshon cha'i

'khor lo bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las phyi nang gsang ba'i sngags 'di ston to// oM shri many+dzu kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka la ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza Ti dza dza/ ya mAn ta ka mon ta nag po

rag sha dgra bo ni rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka mon ta snying la lto ru dgra bo ni baM ril rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka mon ta Ar+ya rag sha dgra bo ni baM ril rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka mon ta drag shig dgra bo ni baM ril rbad ya/ ya

mAn ta ka rag sha mon ta nag po dgra bo ni thuM rmugs bla rtsal rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka mon ta ka nag po dgra bo na srog rtsa rmugs ti rbad ya/ mon ta rag mo snying la to ru ma ma thun rbad/ mon ta khrag la rmugs ti rag

sha thun rbad/ mon ta ru thums/ ma ra ya za srog ni ma ma thun rbad/ mon ta dun mug tsit+ta la thun rbad/ mon ta raM thun ma ma rag sha thuM rbad/ mon ta thu ma bla rtsa la rbad/ mon ta yag mo baM ril kha long thun rbad/ ya

mAn ta ka ra ga sha snying la baM ril rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka ar+ya rag shig rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka rag sha thun rmugs rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka srog la dun rmugs rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka snying la ling thum rag sha ni rbad ya/
ya mAn+ta ka mon+ta ru thums rbad ya/ ya mAn ta khaM thums ni rdza rbad ya/ ma ma mugs ti srog la rbad/ ma ma bla rtsa khug srog la rbad/ ma ma thuM r-il srog la rbad/ ma ma rngubs tsit+ta la rbad/

ma ma dun mugs srog la rbad/ ma ma khrag la thum ril srog la rbad/ ma ma rag sha ni dza srog la rbad/ mon ta snying la dun baM ril rbad/ mon ta srog rtsa ling yi rbad/ mon ta rmugs ti rtsa thang rbad/ mon ta shig shig tsit+ta rbad/ mon ta ra g+sha baM

ril sogs la ya rba/ mon ta khams shag du mun tsa la rbad/ mun ta hur long ro myags rbad/ ma ma rag sha mugs ti srog la rbad/ ma ma thum rmugs shaM du na srog la rbad/ ma ma tsit+ta gzer thum srog la rbad ma ma

drag shig ro thum srog la rbad/ ma ma dun rmugs khyer b+h+yo srog la rbad/ ma ma kha rag dun ting yaM yaM srog la rbad/ ma ma tsit+ta breng shag tshal pa srog la rbad/ gsang sngags phyi yi smod pa yis// bskul zhing drag tu
bzlas gyur na// 'od zer nag pos stong khams khyab// sha za bdud dang mon gyi tshogs// be con ral gri tho ba thogs// rbad na brnag pa'i rten yul las// bla dang sprul pa bkug cing 'chang// lus dang yan

lag gcod cing bra// gsang mdzod drag po'i gnas su 'chang// gtum pa sku yi lto ru gzhug/ ri nag gyen po'i shing la gtad// gsod pa phyi yi sngags su bshad// de bzhin drag po nang gi sngags// pho mo nyin
mtshan bsnol ma yis// bzlas pas 'od zer dmar nag 'phro// las kyi ya ma mon dang bdud// shan pa'i tshogs dang pho nya'i tshogs// sna tshogs lus dang mtshon cha yis// gzas pa'i phung po rnam
shes 'gugs// tshe srog 'chang zhing dngas snyigs 'byed// sha za khrag 'thung rus la gtod cing rol// dmigs pa'i gnas su 'chang zhing gsod// 'bar ba gsung gi lto ru gzhug/ dur khrod mon pa'i gling du
gnan// smod pa nang gi sngags su bshad// gsang ba thabs dang shes rab las// gnyis med rol pa'i byin brlabs las// 'od zer gdug rtsub 'phros pa las// bdud dang mon pa mon mo'i tshogs// sprul pa
yang sprul mon pa bzhi// ya ma rag mo rag sha'i tshogs// sku mdog nag po 'tsher bag can// gdugs pas drag sngags 'brug ltar zlos// thog dang spu gri ral gri sbab// thog thog 'ur 'ur chem chem

brdeg/ dwangs ma bzhi dang rtsa gsum gcod// bkrag dang gzi mdangs phral zhing 'chang// glo snying za zhing don khrag 'thung// ye shes 'od dang las kyi mes// lus dang bag chags khong khrag sreg/ lha dang bsrung
ba bdud du 'bebs// mtshon cha 'bar ba'i rtsibs la bskyon// mi g.yo thugs kyi lto ru 'chang// gdug pa klu dang gnyan la gtad// khyams kang gnas las mi 'chor te// gdug pa'i sngags rnams gsang bar

bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las drag po thun gyi sngags 'di bton to// ma ma rtsa la mu sha thun b+h+yo// ma ma sha sha ling ling srog la thun b+h+yo// ma ma dug sni baM ril srog

la thun b+h+yo// ma ma tsit+ta du ru ma ru la srog la thun b+h+yo// ma ma kha lo nri dza srog la thun b+h+yo// ma ma khrag la 'ub ling nri da srog la thun b+h+yo// ma ma rag sa mug khyer nri dza srog la thun b+h+yo// ma ma ha la ha la ye yaM tsit+ta breng shug thun b+h+yo// ma ma sha sha shu shu rtsa thang rtsa thang
breng shag thun b+h+yo// ma ma tang tang kring kring khrag la breng shag thun b+h+yo// ma ma mugs mugs shaM shaM srog ni breng shag thun b+h+yo// ma ma dza dza snying khyer phyung phyung breng

shag thun b+h+yo// ma ma trag trag thung thung breng shag thun b+h+yo// ma ma gzir nan nri srog breng shag thun b+h+yo// yang sprul mon mo bcu bzhi yang// lag na dug thun khrag zor brdeg smos pa'i thun sngags nad dal
'bebs// myos shing dran pa brlabs nas gsod// dong du brdeg cing srog len byed// dus gsum kun tu 'joms pa'i sngags// dug mda' thun gyi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// mon
pa thugs kyi brnag pa'i le'u ste brgya bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi rjes gcod sbyin sreg gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lha khang dur khrod skyed mos tshal// yid mthun bde ba'i gnas
dag tu// stegs bu gru bzhi mthas pa la// spos chu bdud rtsi 'o ma dug/ chag chag btab la dkyil 'khor bri// dbus su 'phrin las gang bsgrub bca'// thab khung gru bzhi zla kham zlum// hom shing

dbyibs dang gong ma bzhin// bsreg shing mar dang bu ram khrag dbye ba gsum dang spyi yi rdzas// gla ba shing kun 'o ma sbrang// 'bras chen shing thog me tog spos// mchod rdzas rgyan dang ldan par dgram/ kha khyer
rdo rje me ri phyi// hom shing gtso bo yab yum 'khor// gtso bo'i bka' nod me lha ser// bsnyen pa sa ya las rims rdzogs// dmar ser dkar pa'i skur bsgoms la// drag sngags phyi nang gsang ba gsum// smod

sngags bdun pa gang bsgrub la// rbad spongs shan+tiM puSh+tiM pa shang sbyar// sngags mtshan bcu bcus rdzas re dbul// gang bsgrub gnas su thal 'jim sba// zhi rgyas dbang gi sbyor bar bshad// don gnyis dreg po'i

sbyor ba la// gru gsum khru gang chag gang la// kha khyer so bzhi dmar dang ser// dbus su rdo rje rgya gram bri/ kha khyer rtsang dang thod pas bskor// zla kham gsum la gzugs dang ming// phyi rim thod pa'i 'phreng bas

zlum// yang logs 'khor lo rtsibs bdun nag khor yug thod pa rdzas dang me// rgyu rten drug dang dri ma la// don gnyis gang 'dod ling ga ming// rgya gram steng du gan rkyal gzhag/ hom shing zur gsum sor bcu

gnyis// dug chu bskus la snying khar gzugs// 'khor lo drag po sngags kyis dgang// de yi phyi rim 'khor yug la// thod pa bcu ru sreg rdzas dgram// dug sna bag phye'i ril bu ming// lha yi grangs tshad bcu

byas dgram// sha chen rta sbrul nya sbyang sha/ gri brnol yug sa nag gsum khrag/ nim pa thar nur dur rgod chu// 'o ma sbyang dug ba spu'i chu// til nag nyungs kar sran ma tse// rdo phye lcags phye zangs kyi phye// chang dang

mar nag gru mo brgyan// khyi phag spyang khu bya tshil zhu// thod pa tshal re khor yug bzhag/ rang nyid gshin rje nag po'i sku// ye shes 'khor lo bcas pa bsgom// bsreg shing ya las gshin rje'i sku// yab yum yan
lag rdzogs par bskyed// g.yas su bdud nag yab yum bskyed// g.yon du me lha dmar ser bskyed// rtsibs la sprul pa yang sprul phyir// bskyed la spyan drangs mchod bstod bya// drag po sngags kyi bzlas pa
'bum// bsnyen pa khri dang ldan par bya// mtha' ru zhag gsum sreg pa'i las// lan dgu'i sbyor ba 'di ltar bya// pho nyas bkug la gzugs la bstim// phur pa btab la mtshon chas gtub// shan pa bskul la
drag tu bzlas// bcu bcu'i mtha' ru bsreg rdzas dbul// bskul las gzugs rnams bstab ba bya// 'og tu thod pa'i ling ga gzhug/ bar du hom shing rten gzugs bca'// steng du gcod pa'i 'khor lo
bca'// khrag dang dug chus ngar blud bran// mtha' ru thod pa 'khor lo bca'// zhe sdang gdug pa'i klu la gtad// thal ba sreg rdzas steng du dgag/ sbyor ba las kyi mtha' sdud 'di// drag po'i
don gnyis rdzogs par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// 'khor lo hom sprel gyi le'u ste brgya brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mon pho mo dgra la gshed bskor ba 'di bshad

do// hU~M thugs mchog ya ma rA dza khye'u chung sngo// thugs ni nam mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs// gos su nam mkha'i khams kun gon// zas su de ni klu za zhing// skom du dam nyams khrag la 'thung// thugs la gser
gyi 'khor lo bskor// ma 'phangs par yang 'jig rten bkrag/ phyag g.yas gser gyi be con gyis// dam nyams dgra bo rdul du rlog/ phyag g.yon dug gi sdong pau thogs// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying yang

'byin// chibs su 'brug mo ral chen chibs/ kha nas glog dmar khyugs se khyugs// g.yu yi mchod rten khri 'phang dgu// khye'u chung sngon po de na gnas// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// khye'u chung thugs kyi sprul
pa las// bka' nyan mon pa nag po bdun// mon pa nag po byi la zhon// mgyogs pa rlung gis bskyod du med// byi la zhon nas dur khrod rgyu// zhal nas me 'bar dgra snying sreg/ spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu lu

lu// phyag g.yas dug gi be con thogs// gang la dmigs pa brdul du rlog dri ni mon dug chi li li// skad ni mi go ldab ma ldib// brda ni mi 'phrod lho pal mon// dam tshig nyams pa sgrol zhing spyon// mon pa

nag po stag la gzhon// ral gri rdebs shing nags la rgyug dam nyams dug gsum gtan nas 'phen// zhal nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag/ spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu lu lu// dri ni mon dug chi li li// skad ni mi go

ldab ma ldib// brda ni mi 'phrod lho bal mon// dam tshig nyams pa sgrol zhing spyon// mon pa nag po 'brug la zhon// glog dmar thogs nas dgra la 'phen// phyag g.yas ye shes ral gri yis// dam nyams srog

rtsa gtan nas len// zhal nas me 'bar dug gsum sreg/ spyan nas khro chu'i mchi ma 'dzag/ dam tshig nyams pa sgrol la spyon// mon pa nag po sprul la zhon// dug sdong thogs nas sman la gdo// phyag g.yas be
con nag po thogs// dam nyams dgra bo thal bar rlog/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag dgra snying rngubs// mig ni bse 'od lams se lams// dam tshig nyams pa sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po chu la zhon// phyag
g.yas dug gi be con thogs// phyag g.yon chu srin zhags pa 'phen// dgra bo dug gsum gtan nas len// dam tshig nyams pa bsgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po rlung la zhon// phyag g.yas be con nag
po thogs// phyag g.yon lcags mda' dgra la 'phen// dam nyams dgra bo srog rtsa gcod// zhal nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag/ spyan ni nyi ma'i 'od bas 'tsher// dam tshig nyams pa sgrol las

shog/ mon pa nag po khyung la zhon// phyag g.yas ye shes ral gri yis// dam nyams dgra bo'i mgo lus gshog/ g.yon pa zhags pa dgra la 'phen// zhal nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu

lu lu// dus kyi snyigs ma byung ba la// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol// mon mo nag mo shel mig ma// gser gyi rna cha khrag la la// mthing gi ral pa sha ra ra// khrag gi zar bu phru lu lu// dug gi kha rlangs phyu ru

ru// phyag na dug gi phur bu 'dril// zhal nas khrag gi skyugs pa 'thor// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon mo nag mo snying 'byin ma// gnas ni srid pa gsum na gnas// dgongs pa par snang

khams na mdzad// pho nya rgya mtsho'i gting nas 'gyed// sku la zhing lpags thod pas brgyan// dbu la thod sbrul gyi gdengs ka gsol// g.yas na rdo rje khro bo rnams// g.yon pa nad kyi rkyal ba thogs// bstan pa

srung bar zhal 'ches ma// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog mon mo nag mo gser mig ma// sbrul nag ral ba shigs se shigs// phyag na gser gyi phur bu 'dril// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol

las shog/ mon mo nag mo g.yu mig ma// gser gyi lan phran sha ra ra// gse yi rna cha khra la la// g.yon na bse yi phur pa 'dril// zal nas khrag gi skyugs pa 'thor// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las

shog/ mon mo nag mo mchong mig ma// khrag gi ral pa sha ra ra// byi ru'i rna cha khra la la// phyag na byi ru'i phur pa 'dril// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon mo nag mo zangs mig ma// khrag gi ral

ba sha ra ra// zangs kyi rna cha khra la la// phyag na zangs kyi phur pa 'dril// zhal nas nad kyi rlangs par 'phro// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon mo nag mo 'ug mig ma// mthing gi ral pa sha ra

ra// mthing gi cod pan pu ru ru// zhag gi rba rlabs chi li li// khrag mda' khrag phur dgra la 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog khye'u chung thugs kyi sprul pa ni// bla rkun khyo mo nag mo

bdun// khyi mo nag mo gser mig ma// bar snang rgyu zhing dgra snying 'byin// dgra bo bla dang khrol las shog/ khyi mo nag mo g.yu mig ma// bar snang rgyu zhing lha rnams bskul// dgra bo bla dang phrol las shog khyi mo

nag mo mchong mig ma// sa gzhi rgyu zhing klu rnams bskul// dgra bo bla dang phrol las shog/ khyi mo nag mo zang mig ma// dur khrod rgyu zhing dgra srog gcod// dgra bo bla dang phrol las shog/ khyi mo nag mo mkhar

mig ma// chu gzhung zhon nas chu srin bskul// dgra bo bla dang phrol las shog khyi mo nag mo dung mig ma// dam tshig srung zhing rdzu 'phrul 'gyed// rgyal ba'i bka' dam bla ma rku// dgra bo bla dang phrol

la shog/ khyi mo nag mo lcags mig ma// bang ni bar snang glog bas mgyogs// yid ni chu bo'i gzhung bas ring// 'dzam bu'i gling la mnga' mdzad ma// dgra bo bla dang phrol la shog/ khye'u chung thugs kyi yang sprul

ni// dgra bo'i srag gcod mon pa bzhi// nyi ma shar gyi mon pa ni// dung gi mon pa gtum 'bag can// gnod sbyin snying phrog sprul par 'gyed// sku ni zhe sdang gtum khro che// khrag dang zhag gi thig le can// zhe sdang

sbrul gyis dbu zhabs brgyan// spyan gsum bzlog pas me stag 'phro// mche ba gtsigs pas dri za 'dar// phyag na ralagri lcags kyu bsnams// snying las drongs las srog la chod// sha khrag gsol zhing rkan sgra

rdebs// ha ha hi hi rgod bag can// rngam sgra phyogs bcur 'u ru ru// khyod ni srog len shar gyi bdud// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog nyi ma lho yi mon pa ni// gser gyi mon pa gtum bag can// grul
bum srog gcod sprul pa 'gyed// sku ni ser nag 'bar ba la// khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan// thod rlon sbrul gyis dbu la brgyan// zhal chen bgrang bas me stag 'phro// phyag na ral gri lcags kyu

bsnams// snying nas 'dren cing srog rtsa gcod// ha ha bzhad cing snying khrag 'thung// 'dul zhing gsod pa'i mthu bo che// khyod ni bdud gcod lho yi bdud// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol la shog nyi ma nub kyi
mon pa ni// zangs kyi mon pa gtum bag can// klu bdud srog gcod sbrul pa 'gyed// sku ni dmar nag 'jigs pa la// thod sbrul gtams pa'i dbu rgyan can// khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan// zhal

gdangs mche gtsigs tsha tsha 'phro// ha ha bzhad cing rkang rus 'cha'// phyag na ral gri lcags kyu bsnams// snying nas 'dren cing srog rtsa gcod// sgra bo sgrol zhing gdon rnams 'dul// gsod byed gshin rje'i

sprul pa mon// rkan sgra brdabs pas tsha tsha 'phro// ha ha bzhad cing don snying 'byin// klu bdud 'bum sde brgyal zhing skrag khyod ni gsod byed nub kyi bdud// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol la shog/ nyi ma byung gi
mon pa ni// dug gi mon pa gtum bag can// thod sbrul gtams pa'i dbu rgyan can// sku la g.yang gzhi 'bum gyis klubs// phyag na ral gri lcags kyu bsnams// snying nas drongs la srog rtsa chod// gnod byed

dgra bo rdul du rlogs// gnod sbyin srog gcod sbrul pa 'gyed// sha khrag gsol la rkan sgra bsdebs// ha ha bzhad cing sa bdag 'dul// khyod ni srog gcod byang gi bdud// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol la
shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thun gyi mon mo srog dmar len ma bskul ba 'di bshad do// khye'u chung sngon po'i thugs kyi yang sprul ni// shar gyi mon mo dre slag can// zangs phye lcags phye ru

sbal khrag/ ru sbal thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du bcug cing ga ru bud// mdze g.yan gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// mdze g.yan gtong ba'i dus la bab// khrag mda' dug thun

snying zor rgyab// bla dang tshe srog phrol las shog lho yi mon mo dom slag can// bong nga skye tshe dom gyi thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bus// dmu chu gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam

nyams la// khra mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// dmu chu thong zhig dgra la b+h+yo// nub kyi mon mo glang slag can// mtshal chen rkya skyegs ba glang khrag ba glang thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha

ru bud// mkhris nad gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// mkhris nad thong la tshe srog bsdus// byang gi mon mo sbyang slag gcan// rims dang mkhris pa

sbyang dug khrag/ sbyang mo'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// rlung nad gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zer rgyob// rlung nad thong la tshe

srog bsdus// shar lho'i mon mo stag slag can// bcos dang bse zho stag mo'i khrag/ stag gi thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// rgyu gzer gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam

nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zer rgyob// rgyu gzer thong la bla tshe khug/ lho nub mon mo spre slag can// thal nur dug chu spre 'u'i khrag/ spre 'u'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// bal

nad gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// bal nad thong la bla tshe khug/ nub byang mon mo g.yag slag can// 'ol mo skyer bu 'brong bu'i khrag/ 'brong

bu'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// 'phol 'bras gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// 'phol 'bras thong la tshe srog

bsdus// byang shar mon mo dred slag can// go ro thal chen khyi khrag dug/ spre 'u'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// skrangs nad gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams

la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// skrangs nad thong la tshe srog phrol// steng gi mon mo 'brug slag can// ser rgya thal chen seng ge'i khrag/ seng ge'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru
bud// gnam lcags 'bebs shing chad pa gcod// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// thog zer thog la tshe srog phrol// gangs kyi mon mo se slag can// dug

rgod mon khrag ba glang mchin// mon pa'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// sdang ba'i dam nyams dgra bo la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// dgra bo'i rlung rta rmang du phob// chu yi

mon mo srin slag can// rgya rus nya mkhris dug khrag cha// chu srid thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du bcug cing kha ru bud// 'brum nag gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda'

dug thun snying zor rgyob// 'brum nag thong la tshe srog phrol// dur khrod mon mo zhing slag can// rwa dug dug rgod mi yi khrag nyams pa'i thod par sbyar byas nas/ dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// smyo 'bog gtong

ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// smyo 'bog thong la rnam shes phrol// brag gi mon mo 'ug slag can// do ba dbyig dug 'ug pa'i khrag/ dri bo'i thod par

sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// pho lhog gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// krag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// pho lhog thong la tshe srog phrol// gsang ba'i mon mo sbrul

slag can// dug sna bal nyungs sbrul nag khrag/ la mo'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// mdze nag gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dam nyams dgra bo la// khrag mda' dug thun snying

zor rgyob// mdze nad thong la tshe srog phrog/ gab pa'i mon mo phag slag can/ nyungs nag bya ba phag khrag dug/ phag pa'i thod pa sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// mkhris nad gtong ba'i mthu mo

che// sdang ba'i dam nyams dgra bo la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// mkhris nad thong la rnam shes phrol// la la khrag gi bu yug rlog/ la la rkang mgyogs bla dang 'brol// la la skya ring rlung la zhon// la

la thabs kyis slu 'brid gsod// la la gling 'debs khyo mo 'gyed// la la bla kun khyung chen 'gyed// la la srog gcod sbrul nag 'gyed// la la tshe sdud rus sbal 'gyed// la la srog gcod bdud dang sdong// la

la gong gsum btsan dang 'grim// la la khong nas tsit+ta 'byin// la la srog gcad shan pa 'gyed// kun kyang srog rtsa dmar le nas// bla dang tshe srog phral nas 'chang// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las
shog/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sprul pa'i tshogs la gshed bskor ba'i le'u ste brgya dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags bdun pa'i rtsa ba'i srog dmar len gyi ngan
sngags 'di bshad do// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// rtags 'gor las rnams mi byed na// srog gcod rgyal po gsang ba yi// gsang ba sngags kyi rno dbal mtshon// dmar len srog gi spu gri
'di// lnga bcu gcig gis las mchog bsdus// shan pa gtso byas snying po 'dris// gsad pa'i sngags su yang dag sngags// sbyor ba'i rgyal po dmar len brtsam// dur khrod gnyan ra'i dben gnas su// phung sa

gsum la maN+Dal bya// dbus su brnag pa'i 'brub gnas brnag/ gru gsum rtsang bcas phur pa khrag/ thod pa bla byad khrag sna dug/ mthing nag dar dgab dam rdzas snying// bla khrag gtor ma sha chen gsur// sho

na ka li brnag pa'i rten// snying kha lte ba gsang ba mgo/ skye dang kha ru byang nag dmar// khyim re gro ga ri sho ras// bris la tshon skud dang bcas gdags// 'brub khung rtsa ru 'gying phung gdags// 'jigs byed ya
ma'i skur bsgoms la// smod pa sngags kyi gsang thun dbab// zhag bdun dug dang nyungs kar brdeg/ de nas sho na brnag par brtag rgyu de 'gyel las yan lag bzhi// tshon skud btags la phung bzhi

brgyang// dgongs 'dzab drod dgug rgyu la bstim// nyin zhag mtshan phrugs rngam tshig bzlas// rtsang phur grod dang rtsa la brdeg/ rang nyid bdud kyi shan par sgom// mtshon cha rgya yis ngar blud na// phyogs bzhir
btab la drag tu bskul// sbram por brnag pa'i phyogs su 'phang// lan gsum sgrims la shug pra brtag/ bra ngan drag mo'i sngags kyis bzlog/ tsit+ta bton la phyogs bzhir bstabs// thod par bcug la
gsangs thun dbab// rgyu yi sha khrag dwangs mas bskang// tshogs dang gtor mas gzhan tshogs mchod// dmar chen sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las dmar

len sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bton to// ga pA nA ling srog la hur thum rbad// tsit+ta ro myags srog la ling ni shag rbad// ro ling kham tsa na bshag rbad// tsa pa ku ling ni shag rbad// ru tsa thum dza ni srog la shag
rbad/ ru thuM yaM shig ni shag rbad/ khaM khaM hur shaM baM ni shag rbad/ bdud gsum bzlas la bdun gcig brdeg/ zhag gsum rol la gcig gis 'phang// mgo dang bcas pa mnan pa bya// byang khram dang bcas

gzir zhing brab// rgyu lu rdzing dang mdzod phugs lam// gang rung tsit+ta bcug la bca'// mgo dang bcas pa shun gyis ril// rgyang lam dbus yul brten la gnan// dmar len brgya gsum gcig dang sbyar// khri
yi thun dbab brgya yis 'phang// mgo dang lto sbyor rgyun du gtong// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gab par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi srog dbrog pa dang gzir ba 'di bshad do// srog gcod pho mos
gang sgrub kyang// ma lus lta log ldog dang 'khru// nyam chung brlabs shing rmugs thibs 'chal// ro med 'dod bral drod dang lci// rtags med cho 'phrul mang na brtsam// dur khrod dben pa'i bde
gnas su// gru gsum spags ma kha khyer gsum// phyi nang chag gang dbus mtho gang// dmar ser dkar ba rtsang phur me// mthing nag dbus su mon dang bdud// gru chad gtor ma dam rdzas khrag/ drag po'am ya
ma'i bzlas pa 'bum// drag sngags gang sgrub khri yis dgug/ 'khor bcas pos la stong gis gzir// stobs kyi sngags dang phur pas bsdigs// btsan thabs drag po'i gzir bar bshad// yang na gang sgrub

gzugs byas la// snying khar gru gsum snying po sngags// bris la dong du gan rkyal bsnyal// lha sgrub byas la rang srog dbrog/ gru gsum gzugs la phab la bstim// rngam pa'i nga ros dbang du bsdu/ sngags rgod
khri bzlas phur pa gdab/ rang gzir khri bzlas gzi mdangs dbral/ bdud la sogs pa dar zhing 'phyag kha ru rak+ta mna' chu blud/ gzugs de sngags pa'i zhabs 'og gzhug/ kun gyi tshe srog bdag po
