bskul// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bar// phyag 'tshal las byed dngos grub ster// drod thob gsos la bdud rtsi bskyed// snying kha'i sngags gdon gnan pa gzhug/ gang sgrub drag sngags bzlas shing
bskul// ling ga rgyu la phur pas brdeg/ thun zor mtha' ru gzugs de gnan// dgu 'am bcu gcig gnan pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las srog 'phrog pa dang gzir pa

spu gri'i mtha' sgyur gyi sngags rnams bton to// ya ma ro ga mu sha rtsa myags mon ta phur tir/ tsit+ta rmugs gzer/ thum srog breng breng/ tsit+ta dun dun hri shag hur thums shag shag dza dza/ ro sha ya mu ka ma phu tir ru

tsit+ta sha la gzir srog la hur thums ro myags gzir nan/ shag rbad ri shag hur rbad/ shag thun b+h+yo/ shag nan shag raM shAn tiM ku ru swA hA/ shag raM puSh+tiM ku ru phaT/ shag raM ba shang ku ru hri dza/ shag hri wa nga gzir
rbad nan/ gsad srog thun zer gnan pa drag zhi rgyas dbang ste mi yi sngags/ thun zer las gzir bzhi gnyis rdzogs/ drag sngags bdun pa'i mtha' brgyad bshad/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ dmar
len sngags kyi le'u ste brgya bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// gdug pa gnas pa'i dben gnas su// klu chen brgyad la gtor ma bsngo// las gnyer

gtad la mtshams dang sbyar// ro ras dbag chen khru gang la// gdug pa'i khrag dang dug chus bsku// mi khyud zum po lnga ru bskor// dbus su drag po'i gsang mdzod bzhi// sbrul nag pho mo ra bas bskor// gnyis
pa 'khrul mig drag po brgyad// gsum par bcu drug drag po gnas// bzhi par mtshon cha rtsibs bcu gnyis// mtha' ma sna tshogs gdugs pa'i gzugs// kha sbyar tshad mnyam legs bcas

las// sngags rnams dgod pa'i rim pa ni// gru gsum bzhi la ming yang gzugs// 'khrul 'khor brgyad la drag po'i sngags// nang sa pa ra nA ga pu ta dgod// drag po'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// nA ga dri ta ya

hri da ya phu ti myags myogs khaM thun ra li dgod/ mtshon cha'i rtse mo bcu gnyis la// dgra bo'i srog la thun myags// rtsa gcod tsit+ta shag ya ma shig rbad// nA ga sa sbur rtsa nan// sbyor ba gnyis kyi spu gri

dgod// sbrul dang rus sbal phag dang stag/ bya dang khyi spyang mgo brnyan la// lta 'phye rus kyi rwa bar bya/ kha sbyor dug dang nya yi mkhris// gdug pa sna tshogs khrag gis byug khasbyor dril la rus sbal ltor// gnan

pa'i sbyor ba thod chen bca'// sngags dang nyin mtshan phye la brdeg brgyad dang bcu drug skabs kyis blang// 'dod pa'i rtsa srog spu gris gcod// phyag rgya chen po'i brten pa bskyed// 'bru brgyad dril la bcu drug

gtor// nyin mtshan ya ma'i las bzhir sbyar// sgrol gying 'khrul 'khor steng du bca'// nA ga'i 'khrul 'khor 'og tu bca'// sprul pa kha sbyor rno dpal mtshon// rang rang phral dang gnyis dril bca'// me tog

dril lasasmyo mdze phral// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bton to// nang sa pa ra na nA ga su ta dgra bo srog la thum myags/ rtsa chod tsit+ta shag yaM shag
shig rbad/ nA ba kri ta ya hri da ya phu ti myags myogs kham thun ra li/ brgyad dam bcu gnyis 'khor lo bskor// rdzogs nas sngags dril gnan pa gdags// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka// thod pa 'khrul
'khor sbyor ba dril// sa sros gdug pa nyid la gtad// klu chen brgyad kyi pho brang gdab// klu la las bcol rgya yis gnan// gdug pa klu yi sbyor bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrol gying srog

gcod rgyal po'i drag sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// shin tu dben pa'i bde gnas su// stegs bu khrag dang dug gis byug/ snying na drug dang bshos bu rdzas// ba ling ta dang pU dza bsham// shog bu rme ba

dang bcas pa// mu khyud gsum bskor thig bzhi gdab// dbus su gru gsum brnag pa bri// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug drag po'i sngags// mtha' ma'i 'phrul mig nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// drag po'i spu gro rdzogs
par gnas// drag sngags 'khor lo lugs dang lugs min gnyis// bcas la dug chu rten du byug rgyal po bdud mo'i lto bar bca'/ kha sbyor gri thod spyang thod gzhug/ byang shar gru gsum dong du gzhug/ de
bzhin brnag pa'i ling ga gzhug/ sngags pa ya ma'i skur bsgoms la// gying rnams rbad cing drag sngags brdeg/ bcu bcu thun dbab 'brub khung brab// drag sngags rnal ma bzlog dang
dkrug/ sprul pa rbad la shes pa dgug/ 'khrul 'khor sngags bzlas sgrol gying bskul// phyag rgyas dbang sdud mtshon chas brdeg/ dngos dang bsrung pa gnyen byung rab// 'dab chags dud 'gro bsad na

'bring// rmi lam spyod yul 'gyur na mtha'// mngon khugs shes pa 'bar dang tshig/ me chu 'khrug lhud 'gyur ldeg 'phar// skye shing nags tshal bcad na mchog/ drod thob gnan pa'i sbyor ba bya// srog bdag
sgrol gying shan pa bsko// drag sngags smod pa gsum du brdeg/ rnal ma phyi yi gzugs phung yul la brdeg/ myong shing rlabs nas lus srog yan lag 'jig/ yab yum 'khor bcas sha khrag drod las

rol// 'khor lo'i thod pa rgya gram gong gsum gnan// drag sngags rtsa ba go bzlog spu gri rnal// nang dang thun gyis lus bral mgo dang tsit+ta gshog bu ga dgu nas khrag 'dzag thung gin myos/ bsgral nas sha rus
gzugs phung dur khrod 'chad par gnan/ gsang bar thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// srog bdag rang gzir gsad pa mchog gi las// drag sngags dkrugs la rkang pa gnyis su brdeg sgrol gying rnams
kyis rtsa gcad tsit+ta 'don/ srog dang dbang po dwangs ma ston nas kyang// shes pa bsdus la gdug pa'i gnyan la gtad// srog bdag shan pa drag po'i sbyor bar bshad//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las drag sngags 'di bton to// a shu rtsa ba gri na pa la dri ling dun du khri shag ru dri/ dgra bo'i srog la li dza khaM myogs ru shag rtsa rbad thum ling khyer b+h+yo/ nri khug srog hur long rbad kham

mugs yengs tsit+ta shag rbad dri ru shag khram dun dun ling dri la pa na gri na pa tsa shu a/ a shu gri na dri liM dun dun dgra bo'i srog ni dza liM liM thun mugs khyer b+h+yo/ khram shag pa tsa pa la 'du tri dgra bo'i srog khaM

myogs tsit+ta shag ni/ khug ru khaM rtsa rbad srog hur longs yengs rbad/ klu dang rgyal po lto sbyar na/ mdze rigs rme lkugs yams su 'bebs/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ drag sngags lto sbyor gyi le'u ste brgya

bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba 'di phye ste rgyas par bshad do/ phaT raM he raM dz+wa la raM khaM rag sha raM/ e yaM raM rwa laM suM keng b+huM/ oM AH hU~M/ ya ma

hU~M/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka hU~M phaT/ oM aHhU~M/ oM pe ta li rag sha yag sha hU~M/ drig drig ser ser khu lu mu lu hU~M phaT/ oM AMHhU~M/ kA ya wA ka badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ bud d+ha ku lan/ badzra ku lan/ ku lan/

pad+ma ku lam/ karma ku lan/ hU~M ha ha he he ho/ hU~M pa sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya staM/ ra ha ho haM/ ra ga ya mi/ ya ma ra mA ya/ ya me to ya/ ra ya tsa ni ya k+she tsa ya/ hri gu ru dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ ya ma rag sha ya hU~M

phaT/ e hri sti ya hU~M phaT/ de pa hri sha ya hU~M phaT/ da ra ya ma hU~M phaT/ Ar+ya rag sha ya hU~M phaT/ hri ka ta ya hU~M phaT/ a mi pany+tsa ya hU~M phaT/ hri sti sta ma ya hU~M phaT/ hri pa ma ma hA ya hU~M phaT/ de nas yang bcom ldan

'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las spyan drang ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bsnyen pa'i gsang sngags rnams phye ste ston to/ hri stis sa ma ya hU~M dza dza/ oM shri many+dzu a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ya ma ra tsa ma ma e ka dza Ti de

bI kro d+hi shwa ra ya ga sha dza dza/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M dza dza/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ e ka dza Ti ya man ta ka b+hi sa ra b+hi sa ra swA hA/ e ka dza Ti ya man+ta ka rag+sha sa ma ya swA hA/ e ka dza Ti d+hU

ba prid ya ya swA hA/ ti bya sreg ma la da re ye puSh+ba swA hA/ ti bya sha ta shad dad dI pe swA hA =rag tsi ti sha dad gra ha gan+d+te swA hA/ sarba a mi bya ba da ri ye swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta pra ti dza khA hi/ mu dra dz+nyA na pu dza sa ma ya

swA hA/ ma sa rak+ta tsit+ta san tsa pa ri ye swA hA/ g+hu ha rak+ta/ gu h+ya bo d+hi tsit+ta pU dza swA hA/ ma hA ba liMta khA hi/ shrI many+dzu ya mAn+ta ka hri sti ka la ru ba kA ya a la la ho/ sha ra laM ga tsa me/ e sa hU~M/ pe sa hU~M/ shrI sarba rU pa kA

ya hU~M/ shrI sarba pa ti a ra li hU~M/ shrI sarba du ba du hU~M/ shrI sarba b+ha ling ta hU~M/ shrI sarba pi te/ ya na hU~M/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M dza dza/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka kA la rU pa ni/ sha ku ru ni ni

ni sha ku ru ni/ hU~M dza dza/ oM hri Sh+ti bi kri ta na na hU~M dza dza pe ta li rag sha/ oM ya ma me ta k+she ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni hU~M dza dza/ oM ya me ta k+she hU~M dza dza/ oM ya ma rag mo ma ma rag mo snying kha rag duM shaM snying ro thuM

raM ya ma b+h+yo hU~M dza dza/ oM ma ma e ka dza Ti trag rag sha li rag sha man+ta dza dza/ rag mo ta kuM ma ma dun du shaM de ma b+h+yo dza/ kha rag hring shri de ma b+h+yo dza dza/ oM ya du dri mun sen dun he tsa hU~M dza dza/ kA ya badzra wA ka tsit+ta sa

ma ya hU~M dza dza/ ya ma snying sha sha dza dza dun b+h+yo/ ya ma snying ru ba sha/ ya ma A kar+Sha ya hU~M dza dza/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags du ma phye ste bton to/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ma ra

tsa sa to me ya ya ma/ ra tsa sa to me tsa sa to me ya ma ra/ sa to me ya ma rA tsa/ to me ya ma rA tsa sa/ me ya ma rA tsa sa to/ ya me to ru na yo ta/ me to ru na na yo ta ya/ to ru na yo ta ya me/ ru na yo ta ya ma me to/ na yo

ya ya me to ru/ sa nA ga sny-ing gzir rtsa la rbad/ sa nag snying gzer u nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer e nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la dun dun shag rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta ru thums rbad/ rigs
bzhi rgyud la zhan pa dang// ba so kha 'khor gdug pa kun// bskam chags dbang gis dug zhus pa// drag po sngags kyi dug 'byin 'joms// gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa yis// yang gsang

'khrul gyi 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir snying gzer dgu'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// snying po 'phrul gyi man ngag bcud// gsang chen rtsa ba dril pa'i las// drag
po mngon phyur sbyor ba'i mchog snying gzer gdug pas thams cad 'joms// shi phrad sngags kyi 'khor lo yis// bdag skyob gzhan bsrungs gdug pa 'joms// ma mo bdud mo rgyal po btsan// klu gnyan sa

bdag the rang tri// ma lus 'joms byed dgod kyi sngags// b+hi la'i kheng 'dul khong dregs can// 'bar ba nag po e ma'i klong// yang gsang mchog gi sbyor bar bshad// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod

zhing ras ro ras la// mu khyud dang ldan rus sbal ltor// dug khrag snag tshar sbyar la bri// dbus su gru gsum zla kham gsum// phyi rol 'khrul mig thod par bzhi// de 'og lcags mkhar bar rim brgyad// yang
logs gnas pa'i rtsa sbubs dgu// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug 'obs// srid pa rus sbal lto ba ru// drag po sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// de la dgod pa'i gnas pa ni// dbus na gdug pa'i snying po

ming// zla kham ma mo rgyal po btsan// the brang gshin ngog snying po ming// 'khrul mig bzhi la gnas pa ni// 'dren pa stobs kyis 'bru bzhu dgod// phyi rim lcags mkhar brgyad po la// dregs pa stobs kyi 'bru

brgyad dgod// yang logs rtsa sbubs dgu po la// snying po gsum mthar sbu gri dgu// 'bru rnams rdzogs pa'i tshul du dgod// phyi rim mtshon cha bcu drug la// shi phrad kun 'joms snying po dgod// gnyis bcas

dug khrag tsha ba bsku/ kha sbyar sngo dmar mthing nag gril// 'khrul mig mtshon cha me dbal sngags/ zlos shing 'byin pas shugs kyi mchog/ gcod cing 'bigs pas spu gri'i mtshon// sreg cing g.yeng bas me chu

rlung// sdud cing 'chang bas skyo ba'i mkhar// gzir zhing gnon pas thog ser sa// rtsa bar bcas pa'i mtshon lo ma// bdag skyob gzhan bsrungs go cha'i mchog/ las dang sbyor ba gcod pa'i mtshon// 'bar ba

nag po zhe sdang mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal po dug ngar bcas// 'bar ba dug gi du ma bur sdud// bdud nag rag sha ya ma'i klong// de yi pho brang thod pa'i gnas// ngur ma'i phyi ru rus sbal gzugs// mchod rten

rin chen mtshon cha'i spu// tshangs pa'i bu ga rgya gram e// 'khrul 'khor dang bcas re bas gril// hom khung dang bcas stong stong bzlas// gsal ba khyad par stobs kyi lha// rdzas dang lta sbyor ba sdeb// bdun pa
mchog dang yin pa brtag nya stong sbyor ba drag po brtsam// thun mong bsrung ba'i sbyor ba brgyad// mngon zhugs sbyor ba drag po nyid// drag po thog chen snying gzer mchog/ gser gyi dgu thog gnam

lcags sba// ri rgyal lca ba chen spu gri'i me// yang gsang mchog gi sbyor ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las snying gzer dgu'i spu gri bton to// sa nA ga ma trag snying gzer rbad/ sa
nA ga du me snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga tsa tri snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga k+sha tri snying gzer thum tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ snying gzer spur nan rbad/ dragazer rbad/ sa nA ga dug phyung snying

gzer rbad/ sa nA ga kham shag snyig gzer rbad/ sa nA ga sning gzer srog tig rbas/ sa nA ga snying gzer thuM ril rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sarba u nan kham shag ga po med dbal gcod pa'i mtshon/ gdug pa'i tsit+ta yo ta ya me to ru

na ta ya me to ru na yo/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+she/ ta yo ni ra ya k+she ya/ yo ni ra ya k+she ya ta/ ni ra yak+she ya ta yo/ ra ya k+she ya ta yo ni/ ya k+she ya ta yo na re/ k+she ya ta yo ni ra ya/ yak+she ya tsa ni/ ra ma ya/ ya tsa ni ra ma ya

k+she/ tsa ni ra ma la k+she ya/ ni ra ma ya k+she ya tsa/ ra ma ya k+she ya tsa ni/ ma ya k+she ya tsa na ra/ ya ma me ta k+she rA tsa sa to ru na ra ya tsa ni/ ya ma me ta k+she/ ya me ta k+she ma/ ya ta k+she ma me/ ya k+she ma me ta/ ya mo me ta k+she ra tsa

sa to ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni/ ya me ta k+she ma to ru na yo ni ra ya tsa na ri ya tsa ni ra sa/ ya ta khye ma me yo ni ra ya tsa ni ra tsa sa to ru na/ ya k+she ma me ta ya tsa ni ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni ra/ ya ma ta k+she me/ to ya yo ta ni tsa

sa ru na ni ra tsa/ ya me k+she ma ta/ ra yo ya to/ tsa ru ni sa tsa na ni ma/ ya ta ma me k+she to ya ra yo ni sa ra ru/ tsa na ni la/ ya k+she me ta ma yo ra to ya sa ra tsa na ru na tsa ya/ ra tsa sa to me ya/ to ru na yo ta ya/ yo ni ra

ya k+she ya/ ya tsa ni ma ya/ tsa sa to me ya/ ru na yo ta ya/ ni ra ya k+she ya/ tsa ni ra ma ya/ ra ma ya/ to me ya/ yo ta ya/ ya k+she ya/ ya ma ya ra/ tsa ma la tsa/ ya ma ra ya/ ma ya ra ma/ ya ra ni dza k+she ya ra ni tsa yo na ru

me to sa tsa ya/ ru tra phroM dung phroM shud ti phroM dkar phroM ya ma phroM ya/ ma hur shar shar phob/ ya ma me ta k+she tsa ni la/ ya tse ti hi hU~M ka ya ma me ta k+she ma ra tsa ya/ ya ta k+she ma me ru na ya/ ya k+she ma me ta ni ra ya/ ya k+she ya

tsa ni ra tsa sa to me ya/ ya me to ra na yo na ra ya k+she ya/ ya ma ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshed bzhi'i sbyor ba'i sngags 'di bton to/ ya ma me ta k+she

srog la ya dun b+h+yo/ ya ma me ta k+she/ ya me ta k+she ma/ ya ta k+she ma me/ ya k+she ma me ta/ ya ma k+she ta me/ ya k+she ta me ma/ ya ta k+she ma me/ ya me ma k+she ta/ ma me ta k+she ma/ me ta k+she ma ya/ ta k+she ma me ya/ k+she ma me ta

ya/ k+she ta me ma ya/ ta me ma k+she ya/ me ta k+she ma ya/ ma k+she ta me ya/ ya ma me la/ ya me ta ya/ ya ta k+she la/ ya k+she ma ya/ ya ma ta/ me ya k+she/ ta ya ma/ k+she ma me/ ya ta k+she me ma/ ya ta ma me k+she/ ya me

k+she ma ta/ ya k+she me ma ta/ ya k+she ma me ta/ ya ta me ma k+she/ ya me ma k+she ta/ ya ma k+she ta me/ ya ma me la/ me ya ta ya/ ta ya k+she ya/ k+she ma ya/ ma me ta k+she ya/ me ta k+she ma ya/ ta k+she ma me ya/ k+she ma me ta ya/ ya ma ta ya/

me ya k+she ya/ ta ya ma ya/ k+she ya me ya/ ya ma me ya ma/ ya me ta k+sha ya ma/ ya ta k+she ya ta/ ya k+she ma ya k+she/ ya k+she me ma ta/ ya ma sa ma ya/ hU~M gzir nan/ ya ma phaT/ ya me phaT/ ya ta phaT/ ya k+she phaT/ k+she ya hU~M dza/

ma ya hU~M dza/ ta ya hU~M dza/ me ya hU~M dza/ ya tsa ya rbad ya ma ya rbad/ ya ra ya rbad/ ya na ya rbad/ ya ni ya a mu kaM ya rbad ya/ ya ma sa na ga tsa rbad/ sbur nan/ e dun ya ma nA ga snying gzer/ na ga dun tiM phroM/ shar

shar drag tu phob/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po'i sngags kyi rtsa ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs las 'thon to/ e ka ya ma he ka gri ma he kaM tsa dur he thar ka snying bi sma bu ta dz+wa raM dza khaM g+ha d+ha rang ra ga saM pra ma

khrag sam b+he ta kus sma tal yam hri sang thi ba dun/ rag sha thum/ sag ru tsa kring hab tang rmugs dri li nA ga rbad/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi spu gro 'di bton to/ hri ti

pra ma ya/ hri ti mur tsa ya/ hri ti rag ta tsa ra ya/ hri sti ma ra ya/ a mu kaM/ ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/ ka pa ye stam b+ha ya nan/ ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ hri sti ya du ni/ badzra te dza

srog la thun rbad/ hri sti kri ta b+hu ta srog la thun rbad/ hri sti ka la badzra da na gzer thun rbad/ hrid sti rad na gar+b+ha srog la 'di thun rbad/ hri sti pad ma ta kri ta tri myags thum rbad/ hri sti karma rag sha srog la thun rbad/ hri sti ra ga badzra dun ri tsit+ta rbad/

hri sti ya ma srog ling thuM rtsa breng thun rbad/ hri sti gri na badzra tsa kra ra srog yaM thun rbad/ hri sti te tsa badzra u nan hri mA ra ya thums rbad/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa thams cad las la rbad pa'i sngags 'di

bton to/ shri many+dzu ya mAn ta ka ka liM b+h+yo/ be ta li rag mo snying la dun ti b+h+yo/ ma ma e ka dza ti rag sha srog la dun tang b+h+yo/ e ka he dun dun ya ma tsa srog snying la dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma ra za hri kri ta sog la dun ti b+h+yo/

yar+ya rag sha mon ta ru thums tsit+ta dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma hri sti kri ta mon ta ya ga sha rag mo srog la dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma b+hi na ya mon ta snying ka rag ma rtsal dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma rag sha hri phri baM mon ta rag mo snying rtsa ya ma

dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma kri ta ya baM mon ta khrag la mu sha ma dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ru thum tsit+ta mun yag mo rag mo srog la dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma hri krin ta/ rag sham hi brag la mu sha dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma ra li kro d+ha mun ma ma hed hed

dgra bo'i srog la dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma ra dun dza baM ka li mun rag mo kha lo rtsa la dun taM b+h+yo/ ya ma karma sha truM rtsa thun mun ma ma rtsa la thang thang din ti b+h+yo/ ya ma kha la hri myags mun rag mo ru ta rtsal dun

ti b+h+yo/ ya ma ru ba thang thang mun ma ma ha ba shaM srog la dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma sha baM hri sti mun rag mi snying rtsa dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma b+his ma rtsa myogs mun rag mo tsit+ta breng breng dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma khrag la rmugs tsit+ta mun rag

mo rag mo a pa da ra srog la dun ti b+h+yo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las mchog gi thun sngags 'di bton to// ya mAn ta ka hri ti ka la rU pa ya ma ra tsa hri hring thuM ril rtsa rbad/ srog

ling thun b+h+yo/ badzra kro d+ha ya man ta krid hri sti kA ya rU pa ya shaM srog nan khyer b+h+yo/ rtsa chod myags myogs srog la dun rbad/ ya ma ra tsa mon ta nag mo a pa ye/ ka pa ye du ru ye bya tsa ye mu ka ye srog la dun mugs

rtsal myogs rbad/ hri sti ya man ta ka tsit+ta breng sham kA ya la rU pa a ne a ne u ne u ne/ du ne du ne ya ne ma sha srog la thuM ril rbad/ hri hur sti yaM b+hi kraM ya nan klad pa la ha re ha re mu phub yam shig bya tsa ye du ru

ye mu sha srog shag shag thun rbad/ ya ma ra tsa shaM to na rin baM ru to yo me kha sa k+she pa tsa khas srog la ling thuM tsa la thuM rbad/ rag mo ru thuM ka rag shri de ma b+h+yo/ yaM yaM thuM thuM tsit+ta thuM myags rtsa rbad/ rag mo rtsa rtsa raM thun

snying ro shaM duM myags tsit+ta phrig phrig srog la thun rbad/ dun shaM snying ka rag ma ru lu ru lu rig mo te tsa khrag la mu sha ma srog thun rbad/ badzra snying kha la yed yed bra ma khrag ting ting hur hur long bam thun myogs rtsa

nan rbad/ da mun ha sbyaM du sti rag sha ya tsa thuM thuM ra dri ru shag gying ka ra shu la man baM ti mang du ru dgra bo ro myags thun b+h+yo/ 'ur ba tsit+ta baM zi lo ki nan dri ling dri ling ku dri ku dri drir dri tsa mun tri srog thug thug ya

rbad/ snying khrag rtsa nan ra ya ma ni thuM thuM b+h+yo/ de ltar gsang sngags sbyor ba yang// don gnyid sbyor ba brnag pa'i las// 'khor lo thun sngags bsregs pa'i sngags// rtsa ba bsnyen bsgrub sngon 'gro'i
mchog/ gzir ba la sogs bdag gzhan srun// thun mongs sngags ni du mar bshad// bcu drug rtsa ba gcig gis bsdus// drag po kun 'byung mchog gi sngags// bde ba bgrod cing smrin par byed// don gnyis
mngon du 'grub pa'i sngags// drug cu gnyis las kun 'byung yin// 'di na bgrod cing smin pa'i sngags// thun mong gsang sngags drug tu bsdeb// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang// gshin rje gshed dang
g.yas su bsdeb// bdud kyi khram de de bzhun bsdeb// ma mo khrag skyug thun dang bsdeb// rims nad sbyor ba brgyad dang bsdeb// dal dang smyo 'bog hom dang bsdeb// lo tog 'joms pa zor du
bsdeb// bsnol thog bu yug ya mar bsdeb// rmi gri ya ma bdud dang bsdeb// chu klung hur thums g.yeng ba'i las// sngags rgod ya ma lto sbyor bsdeb// smyo 'bog gzer thabs ra tsar
bsdeb// mdze yams phol 'bras gang 'dod la// nA ga gdug pa drag po yi// 'khor dang yab yum gsum du bsdeb// khyad par gsum du sngags pas bsdeb// mtshon cha'i rgyal po gsum du bsdeb// brnal ma

bzlog dang lto dkrugs yin// 'phen sdud dbye gcod mnan pa lnga// drag po'i las te sbyor ba'i mchog kun 'byung sngags kyi rgyal por bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gsang sngags 'byung ba'i le'u ste
brgya bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang sa'i lha mo brtan mas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo// kye ho bcom ldan 'gro ba'i mgon// khro bo 'byung ba'i gleng gzhi dang// drag po sngags kyi dug
mda' la// smod pas bsad gso dbab pa dang// drag sngags las kyi rnam grangs dang// smod pa smin pa 'bras bu dag/ thabs kyi rim pas rgyas pa dang// shugs kyi 'gro ba'i thabs dang rim// gshin rje
gshed kyis las grangs tshad// mtshon cha'i rgyal po'i dbye ba dang// sngags dang ni ma bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i yon tan mngon du bshad

do// 'phrul gying snying po'i gsang rgyud 'dir// gshin rje grangs dang las dbang tshad// ngo bo yon tan gnas dag rgyan// 'khor lo la sogs 'dir bshad do// gshin rje'i don lnga de bzhin lnga// rang bzhin ye

shes sgrub byed sprul// lhun grub las kyi ya mar bshad// rang bzhin gshin rje'i ngo bor sems// lhun grub gshin rje 'byung ba lnga// sprul pa'i gshin rje ting 'dzin sngags// sgrub byed gshin rje lho phyogs

gnas// rig pa'i rgyal po gshin rje yi// de don rgyas pa 'di lta ste// rang bzhin chos sku spros dang bral// snang srid chos rnams 'byung ba'i gzhi// ma byung ma skyes skye med las// nam mkha'i dpe ltar sna tshogs

snang// byang chub sems te ngo bo'i gshis// mi 'gyur rang bzhin spros med las// cho 'phrul gzugs brnyan lta bu'i sku// nyon mongs snang byed ye shes sku// brkam chags lnga yi 'din pa 'joms// rang snang len

spong med pa'i rje// sdug bsngal 'byung byed rig pa'i ngang// rnam rtog zhen chags gnyis med sgral// dug lnga'i nad dang brtsol ba'i sman// thugs rje byang chub dbyings su bsgral// las can ldan pa'i gshed du

bshad// dag dang ma dag thams cad kyi// gzhi rten rtsa ba byang chub sems// rang bzhin chos sku'i gshin rjer bshad// 'byung ba lnga dang sna tshogs chos// chen po lnga yi ngang las rdzogs// lhun mnyam gshin dang
ldan par bshad// chen po lnga las grub pa na// yul las skur gsal mnyam par gnas/ kha dog dbyibs las gsal ba'i sku// gzung 'dzin las 'joms dag pa'i rje// khro bo stobs kyi ngo bo

yis// ngar 'dzin 'khor ba'i zhen par gcod// dwangs ma 'bras bu phyag rgya'i sku// gshin rje'i rgyal po rA dza yas// 'dzin pa sa yi zhen pa 'joms// dwangs ma 'bras bu phyag rgya'i sku// drod kyi dwangs ma myos byed

kyis// sreg byed tsha ba'i zhen pa 'joms// sdud par byed pa'i phyag rgya las// 'phags pa'i rgyal po chags pa'i sku// dwangs ma chu yi zhen pa 'joms// bskyod pa'i g.yeng ba'i dwangs ma las// ral tshar dgu yi

phyag rgya yin// bskyod pa rlung gi zhen pa 'joms// 'bras bu dwangs ma lnga rtogs pas// zhen pa 'joms pas gshed du bshad// dwangs ma lnga yi lus nyid las// phyi nang gzung 'dzin chos dang sems// spong len
med pa'i rdzogs pa yi// lhun gyis grub pa'i gshin rjer bshad// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na// stobs chen 'dzin pa 'gyur ba'i sku// zhi bas 'gro 'dul thabs bsam yas// mi shig thugs kyi pho brang
nas// las dang 'bras bu 'byung ba bzhi// ngo bo 'gyur ba med par bshad// shugs kyi phyag rgya gar bsgyur bas// dbu gsum rngam pa'i zhal gdangs nas/ khams gsum bag chags zil gyis gnon// pha rol
phyin drug las drug las// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba yis// rgyu drug 'khor ba zil gyis gnod// rgyan cha 'dug stangs rngam pa yis// dbang can kun 'dul las kyi 'khor// snyig po dwangs ma gtso la
'bul// dregs pa kun gyi rje ru bshad// dbang bcas rdam pa'i pho mo yis// 'khor ba gdungs pa'i zhen pa 'joms// ye nas skye med chos nyid las// rig pa gsum gyi don rtogs pa// mi 'gyur bas na

gshin rjer bshad// sprul pa'i gshin rje rnam pa gsum// ngo bo nyid kyi sprul pa dang// khro bo dgongs rgyud sprul pa dang// dgongs pa drod kyi sprul pa'o// ngo bo chos sku'i byin rlabs las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul
'jam pa'i dbyangs// zhi ba'i sku la rngam pa'i thugs// rgyas pa'i phyag g.yon g.yas pas 'joms// lam dang thabs kyis bya ba rdzogs// sems dpa'i sprul pa 'khor ba'i rje// ral gri glegs bam 'khor ba

yi// las dang nyon mongs bag chags 'joms// thugs rje 'joms byed zhi ba'i gshed// dgongs rgyud sprul pa'i rdo rje 'chang// gsang ba sprul pa'i 'khrul 'khor du// snying po nges pa'i byin rlabs sdud// las
dang sbyor ba du ma'i gzhi// rigs dang rigs min 'khor rnams la// drag pos 'joms pa'i sbyor ba bstan// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med rje// sha za ki kaM srin po klu// dkor srung byad gtems gying dang
gza'/ gshin rje'am ma mo pho nya yis// srog dbugs 'brel cing dbang po 'pho// snyigs ma gsum sdud dbang po 'joms// gshed bdag chen po'i las su bshad// rnam lnga drod kyi byin bskyed
la// 'bru gnyis btags la brdas bskul bstim// rtog pa gnas 'gyur bskyed pa'i gzhi// snying po gnyis bskul thugs mtshan bskyed// gang dmigs phyag rgya chen por gsal// rang lus phung po skye mched
kyi// gnas lnga byin ldan 'khor gyi rje// rtsa ba'i bdud bzhi gnas su 'joms// log par brtags pa go bzlog bshed// sprul pa gsum gyi gshin rjer bshad// sgrub byed gshin rje khams gsum bdag/ srid

pa gsum gyis gzhi rten 'chang// nyon mongs bag chags sog cing smin// ma la ya yi zhing khams na// lto 'phye mgrin pa yangs la gnag/ lus dang yan lag tshigs mig zlum// lto na skye shi na dang 'pho// kun
gyi srog la dbang sgyur rje// dwangs mas bskyed la snying pos dgug/ bsnyen bsgrub mtha' ru srog bskul na// gang dmigs yul dang dbang po 'joms// las dbang sgrub byed gshin rjer bshad// don grub
gshin rje bzhi ru bshad// thun 'bebs stobs chen gshin rje dang// 'khor los gcod byed gshin rje dang// mtha' sdud sbyor ba'i gshin rje dang// dregs pa stobs kyi gshin rje'o// thun drug sbyor ba'i las
byed pa// sha za las kyi gshin rje rnams// khyad par lnga yi thun 'bebs pa// sprul pa 'joms pa'i gshin rjer bshad// thugs kyi 'khor los gcod pa ni// rang rgyud gnas pa'i gshin rje bshad// lus kyi
'khor los gcod pa ni// rang las zad pa'i dbang btsan nas// lha cig skyes pa'i gshin rjer bshad// phyag mtshan 'khor los gcod pa ni// sngon byas rang gi gnas smin la// rgyu rkyen stobs kyi bdag po

ste// dman pa 'khrul pa'i gshin rjer bshad// rdzas kyi 'khor los gcod pa ni// yi dwags rgyal po'i stobs can la// srog snying pos la rdzas la brten// gtor ma dam rdzas rak+tas bskul// srog sdud las kyi

gshin rjer bshad// mtshan ma sbyor bas gcod pa ni// dmigs pa'i rgyu la sngags kyi rkyen// rgyu rkyen 'brel ba grub pa ni// mtha' sdud gsang ba'i rdo rjer bshad// dbang sdud sngags kyi gcod pa ni// 'byung ba
bzhi yi rngam 'og na// sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyor ba yis// stobs kyi bdag pos bsnyen bsgrub la// ka bcings bka' bzlog gshig gzir la// mtha' ru dbye ba drug cu mnan// de yis las kyi mtha' sdud pa// tshe
srog sdud pa'i gshin rjer bshad// bcu gsum rgyan gyi yig 'bru la// mtha' ru zhi rgyas bsreg ldan pa// bdag gzhan ltas logs go cha brgyan// rang nams stobs kyi gshin rjer bshad// sngags rgod gab
pas gcod pa ni// snang srid srog dbugs dbang po 'chang// las la sbyor ba myur brtsams na// lus can dmigs pa gang byas nus// bdag srun gzhan gshigs las dbang gcod// mtha' ru

gdug pa gnyan bsreg gnan// kun gyi stobs dang rang dbang sdud// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag po ste// lhun gyis grub pa'i gshin rjer bshad// rno dbal sngags kyi gcod pa ni// las kyi shan pa pho mo kun// srog
snying dril nas mtshon char bsdeb// btsan thabs gzir zhing don gnyis 'grub// mgo dgur stobs kyis lus srog 'brel// 'chi bdag rgyal po gling khams 'khor// srog gcod las kyi gshin rjer

bshad// smod ba drag pos gcod pa ni// gdug pa'i sngags la rno dpal mtshon// kun gyi snying po tshe srog bdag/ khyams khang gsang mdzod lto ba ru// kun gyi bkrag mdangs sdud cing 'chang// khyad par sbyor ba
gshig cing gcod// gdug pa gzing zhing dug gsum sreg/ thun mong khyad par gnyis kyis gsod// mtha' ru phag mo khog yan gnan// phyag rgya chen po zil gnon gyis// rang byung stobs chen gshin rjer
bshad// don gyi gshin rje gsum du bshad// skye 'gag med pa'i gshin rje dang// mtshan dpe ldan pa'i gshin rje dang// sna tshogs 'gyur pa'i gshin rje 'o// ma bcos mnyam nyid dag pa la// 'phra ba'i bag
chags 'byung ba yang// thig le bde ba'i ngang du rdzogs// sna tshogs snang la ngos gzung med// chos kyi sku yi gshin rjer bshad// 'jam dpal khro bo gzhal med dpag las 'das// nang gi rtsa lam dag pas

'gro don mtha' ru spyod// mtshan dang dpe byad yon tan dpag tu med// phyi yi rgyan rnams dur khrod gdug pa'i chas// phyag mtshan la sogs nus pas 'gro ba'i rmongs pa sel// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i gshin rje

bshad// sprul pa gsum du gshed bzhi phyogs skyong bcu// 'gro ba 'dul phyir khro bo sha za'i lus// cho 'phrul mngon phyung 'jigs pa'i cha lugs ston// sprul pa sku yi gshin rje gshed du bshad// gshin rje gshed

kyi rtsa ba gnyis su bshad// 'khor ba sgyu ma lta bu'i gshin rje dang// ye shes sgyu ma lta bu'i gshin rje'o// dmigs pa'i lus la bstan pa'i byin bskyed pa// nyi ma'i snying po dag las 'od 'byung ltar// bstan pa'i
phyag rgya gsal ba'i thugs kha nas// dmigs pa'i lus la ye shes rgyun gyi dbang bskur nas// dmigs pa med pa'i sku ru gsal// nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho ltar// dag pa'i ngang las mtshan ma 'byung ba

ni// sprin dang khu rlangs rlabs dang 'khyags pa bzhin// ye shes snang med brjod las 'das pa la// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i chos rnams 'byung 'dra yang// rgyu rkyen 'das na gnyen pos bcos mi dgos// 'dzin pa
ma grol gzing ba'i yul la zhen// yul sems gnyis 'dzin bag chags stug pa'i gzhi// las kyi 'bras bu 'khor ba'i gshin rjer bshad// lung gi rgyal po 'khrul gyi bshad pa 'dir// 'khor ba
sgyu ma rtags na snang med dbu mar gsal// gzung dang 'dzin pa ye shes gnyug mar grol// chags sdang las dang spyad pas bgrod pa med par phyin// rang lus brtan pa rnyed pas ye shes yin pa skyes// gnyis
med ye shes rol par gsal// ye shes sgyu ma lta bu'i gshin rjer bshad// don dam gshin rje rtsa ba gcig tu bshad// mi 'gyur rig pa byang chub snying po'i bka'// rang sems rtsal dang ldab pas ye nas
gshin// ting 'dzin drod ldan yus sems kun gyi rje// gzung 'dzin chos skur bsgral bas ngang gis 'joms pa'i gshed// kun 'byung rig pa'i ye shes bsam yas kyang// thig le chen po gcig gi ngang du

rdzogs// rtsa ba byang chub sem kyi gshin rjer bshad// 'joms byed rtsa ba bgrod pa'i rgyud las gnas// snying kha la brten 'bru gnyis sdud dang sog rang gi shes pa 'pho ba don gyis gshin// rkyen gyi sngags kyis
'byung ba'i khams dkrugs nas// shes pa'i sgrib byed las dbang drag po'i rje// dwangs ma bzhi yi rtsa ba nam mkha'i khongs su bsdus// bag chags rten pa'i rtsa bcad 'bru gcig snyigs ma bsregs// lus

sems 'brel ba rang rgyud 'pho ba'i gshed/// brnag pa rang la gnas pa'i gshin rjer bshad// ya ma lag na rdo rje yis// gshin rje'i rnam grangs dbye bar bshad// gshin rje phyi nang gsang ba gsum// 'byung
ba bzhi yi rngam 'og nas// las kyi gshin rje tshe srog sdud// thod mkhar gnas kyi gshed po bzhis// 'du ba bzhi yi las dbang sdud// bcu gnyis 'obs srun phyogs skyong gis// yul gyi dmigs pa dbang du
sdud// lcags mkhar bcu drug sha za'i 'khor// phung po rten dang bcas nas 'gugs// sngags kyi dbang du ming la 'bebs// phyi yi gshin rje'i las su bshad// gling bar mun khang khyams nas ni// yi dwags
rgyal po 'chi bdag gnas// srog bskul rbad na dbang po 'phrog za byed bdud po khram thogs bcas// dmigs pa'i gzas pa khram la 'debs// bdud mo bcus ni myos par byed// 'khor gyi bdud dang sha za
rnams// rang rang lag chas gsod par byed// za byed gshin rje'i las su bshad// dur khrod dbus kyi pho brang nas// thod rus gtams pa'i gzhal yas kang// mthing nag me 'od gdan stengs na// gsod byed

ya ma'i lto 'changs kyis// rten 'brel srid pa'i bla tshe 'chang// myos byed srin po dregs pa bcus// phung po lnga nang 'byung ba yi// rten gyi bla dang sprul pas 'gugs// srin mo rlung gi shugs can bcus// lan
lag lnga yis chags par 'brel// 'khor gyi ki kang pho mo yis// bdun rgyud rtsa ba gcod cing 'joms// gsod byed gshin rje'i las su bshad// gru gsum e yi pho brang nas// skye rgyun gcod pa'i

shin rje yis// skye ba dbang gi rtsa sgo gcod// dud 'gro mtsho yi dregs pa dgugs// dbang po dgu yi sgo yang 'gegs// mtshon 'khrugs rgyal po brgyad po yis// shes pa brgyad kyi rtsa sgo 'gegs// 'khrugs par

byed pa'i ma mo bzhis// lha bzhi 'byed cing rten la sdud// thar byed mon dang gshin rje'i 'khor// myos byed 'pho ba'i las su bshad// ma la ya yi 'jig rten la// dbang byed khro bo gshin rje yis// srid gsum

shes rgyud lto bar 'chang// ya ma'i 'khor dang ma mo yis// mngags na thogs pa med par 'gugs// gshin rje drug khri drug stong dang// ma mo khri phrag drug cu yis// klu dang gnod sbyin pho mo 'khol// dam rdzas

srog dbugs rgyu la brten// tshul gsum ya ma lus la rbad// rje bran grogs ltar shes par bya// lta spyod nyams ldan grogs kyi tshul// dam rdzas rgyu dang drod la brten// rten gsum pa yi yul la dmigs// gang
'dod rang lus rje ltar zhugs// mi yongs stobs ldan brtul zhugs drag/ byin rlabs dbang ldan rnal 'byor ba// gdeng gsum mchog gi sbyor bas 'joms// bran g.yog 'khor skyong las kun byed// de min
brtsams nas gzhan dbang sdud// phyi yi gshin rje'i las su bshad// nang gi gshin rje si ra'i mtshan// 'khor lo chos sku'i dbus nyid na// sbyor ba gsum gyi rgyal po gnas// rnam pa yi ge'i gzugs brnyan

la// byin brlab rang bzhin phyag rgya'i gzugs// dbus na gshin rje nyid kyi sku// ya yi sa bon 'phen pa'i 'bru// sbro bsdu yan lag lnga dang ldan// snying po thig le'i lto ba ru// dri ma la brten dbang po

'chang// thod mkhar gling bzhi 'bru bzhi yis// yan lag sbyor ba bcu gnyis kyis// rgyu bzhi dkrugs nas nad bzhi slong// ling ga dag la shes pa 'pho// bla chen bzhi dang bcas pa gzugs// gshed po bzhi yi
lto bar 'chang// phyi yi bcu gnyis spu gri mkhar// rten pa'i rA dza la sogs pa// phyogs bcu'i bdag po mgon po bcu// 'gugs byed pho nya gsod pa'i gying// bla yi sprul pa bcu gnyis 'gugs// mi g.yo

gsung gi lto bar 'chang// bcu drug lcags mkhar ye shes kyi// gsung thugs sku yi snying pa yis// las kyi ya ma mig yo brten// nyi shu spu gri'i mtshon cha yis// bla gnas ling ga'i rten gshig nas// bla rtags
sprul pa yang sprul 'joms// dmar nag gdug pa'i 'bru rnams las// mkha' 'gro brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// mi 'gyur spogs pa'i las rnams byed// dregs pa'i 'bru rnams de bzhin gnas// byin
brlabs dbang bskur gdugs bran na// 'khor lo'i sbyor ba brgyad brgya byed// nang gi gshin rje'i las su bshad// gsang ba gnas pa'i gshin rje ni// zhing bcu kun sgrol shes rgyud la// tsit+ta

dbus kyi rtsa sbubs nas// gdug pa'i yi ge dmar nag ya// g.yas g.yon rtsa la ra dang ma// 'dab ma bzhi la snying po bzhi// rtsa bran 'bru brgyad mdud pa bzhi// rtsa go spor byed khrag dang rlung// 'brel chen bzhi

la rdzogs pa ru// gcod pa'i 'bru dgu bzhi ru bsnol// ra tsa sa to 'bru brgyad kyis// shes pa brgyad kyi rtsa gcad nas// 'bru \u0f84bzhis rtsa yi sgo yang gcod// ma la brgyad dam drug bsdus nas// ma de chags pa'i
ya la thim// khrag dang nri yi rnam pa yis// lus dang rtsa sbubs khams gsum gang// dbus dang g.yon gyi 'bru gnyis las// me rlung 'khrungs pas rgyu bzhi bslad// 'bru dgus rtsad bcad gcig gis

bsregs// dwangs ma rlung gi sa bon las// bsdus na gshin rje'i sku ru bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bstan pa sbyin// snyigs ma phung po'i rjen shul rnams// mchod par byin brlabs nges par bsngo// las dbang rang
gis lus sems 'brel// las kyi rgyal pos gsad pa'i mchog/ gsad pa gshin rje'i las su bshad// phyi nang gshin rje'i gtso 'khor gyis// yan lag sbyor ba du ma byed// gsang ba'i gshin rje smyo 'bod
dang// rengs dang lkugs pas rmongs par byed// las ni rtsa ba yan lag 'byin// sbyor ba kun gyi bdag po yin// gsang bar sbyar nas las kun nye// gshin rje'i dam par 'di gzung bya// bde ba rang nyams

phyag rgyar bstan// gshin rje gshed kyi las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// gshin rje gshed kyi las dang rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang sa'i lha mos
bcom ldan 'das la// las kyi gshin rje bkol ba dang// rgyal po ma mo bkol ba dang// srog bdag pho mo bkol ba dang// de dag gzing zhing shi sa dang// srog dbrog ru khugs ji ltar bgyi// bcom ldan
'das kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa pho mo thams cad bkol ba'i sbyor ba 'di rgyas par bshad dpa// las kyi ya mas gsad pa yi// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo
'di lta ste// gsang bar bya ba'i gshed skor ni// bri dang dgod pa'i thabs bshad pa// 'jam dpal thugs kyi snying khu las// gru gsum dbyibs las thig rkang lnga// lte ba phyogs med gsang

mdzod gsum// dbus su ya bzhag rdo rja bzhi// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las rdzogs// rtse mo gcod pa'i mtshon cha bzhi// mtshon cha de yi rtse mo la// ya me ta k+she yig 'bru bzhi// der bzhag gshed bzhi'i
gnas su 'dod// gsang mdzod gsum la bsgrub bya yi// snying po ming dang rus kams gnas// gsang mdzod mun khang gnan pa yi// ma ra ya sogs spu gri'i gnas// mtshon cha'i gseb tu ming
dang rus// gnam lcags 'obs chen bcu gnyis yin// me rlung spu gri ral gri'i mkhar// de yis gcod cing gnon par byed// mtshon cha'i rgyal po gnyis bcas la// dug khrag myos pa rdzas kyi ngar// byin dbab
lha bskyed ting nge 'dzin ngar// las sngags mthu dril sngags kyi sngar// blud cing dug shing me la bdug/ 'khor lo 'od 'bar sngags kyi gnas// bsgrub bya ma lcags 'bar// der bzhag bla sems chags pa'i
gnas// ya ma ra tsa tshar dgu gnyis// gtad pa'i las su gcig pas na// des na gsang mdzod gcig tu 'dod/ khang khyud gsum la bsrung ba 'obs// gnam lcags thod mkhar bcu ba ru// thugs kyi snying
po spyi rgyug dgod// rtag tu bzlas shing bskul mi bgos/ khang khyud bzhi pa mtshon cha'i mkhar// rdo rje rgya gram bcu gnyis la// lte bar gcod cing gnobakug la lto bar gzhug yang na gnas pa sems kyi

lta// bsrung ba'i lha phral rang la 'pho// lha de dag gi go char gyur// bdag zlos go cha'i lha yang zlos// gsang ba gshed kyi yi ge bskul// rgyud bzhi gnad kyis 'byung bzhi bslang// rgyu bzhi dkrugs pas rtsa bzhi

gcod// sa chu me rlung mkha' la bsdu// hU~M dang bcas pas mkha' la 'phang// nri dang snyigs ma'i 'khor lo bcas// las kyi ya ma lto bar 'pho// thod par bsdus la gnan pa bya// bla rtags mtshan mar gzugs

byung na// dug gsum la sogs skabs kyis brdeg// phyi nang gsang ba dgu ru sbyar// steng du rdo rje rgya gram dang// gshed kyi yi ge bcu ru bri// gnyis gnyis bar du bsgrub bya gzhug/ 'khor lo la sogs thod par

dril// klu gnas sdig pa'i lus la gtad// dril gtor nyin mtshan skabs kyis sbyar// nyi shar bya rgod khra sbu gri// dgu thog ri rgyal sa gzhi sbyar// drug 'bum sum 'bum gcig 'bum dang// stong tsho gcig dang

brgya ru sbyar//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di phye ste ston to// oM ya ma me ta k+she hU~M dza dza// oM kA ya badzra wA ka tsit+ta dza dza/ ya ma me ta k+she dgra bo'i snying la ya b+h+yo/

nri A kar+Sha ya hU~M dza dza/ ya ma me ta k+she ka ba ye che ge pra ma ya rbad ya/ ma me ta k+she ya ka ba ye/ che ge mo ra tsa ya rbad ya/ ya ta k+she ma me ka pa ye che ge mo rak+ta tsit+ta ya rbad ya/ ya k+she ma me ta ka pa ye che ge mo mA ra ya

rbad/ hri sti pra ma mur dza ra ga tsa ra ma ra ya ni sha ku ru ni ku ru ni rbad ya/ sa ma ya hU~M gzir nan/ stam b+ha ya nan/ de ltar sngags kyi sbyor ba yang// bcu gnyis gcig tu sbyor ba dbye// gsad pa gshed kyi 'khor
lor bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshed kyi sbyor bas lo tog gzhom pa 'di bshad do// dur khrod dben pa'i gnan ra ru// maN+Dal mda' gang khrag gis byug tshon sna gsum gyi dkyil

'khor bri// dbus su gru gsum zla kham dmar// thod 'phreng mthing nag pho brang brtag phyi rim rtsibs bzhi sbrul gyis bskor// gru chad sgo bzhi gling dang mthun// rgyan rnams mdzes byas phur pa dgod// smug chen
smug chung dung chen dbus// zhing chen zhing chung rgyu zhags te// sha chen keng rus gsur dang khrag/ gtor ma la sogs dam rdzas dgram// bdag nyid gshin rje'i skur bsgoms la// gzhal yas gdan dang lha

rnams brtag spyan drangs la sogs mchod bstod mthar// thugs kyi snying pos phyogs bcur spro// snying dang hU~M la nus pa bsdu// zhing khams khro chung thog ser gyis// gang bar bsams la sa la gdon// ye shes
lha bsnyen las dbang bsdu// dregs pa bcud cing chu dril bstim// 'phro 'du nyi ma'i zer lta bus// phyi nang gsang ba'i drod rtags 'byung// dur khrod gnas nas dpa' bo yis// gos su bcas pa'i rgyu blangs

la// sme ba lnga dang ni rang sus// thab ba byas la kha dog byug/ mchog phran skra dang ldan pa'i pir// khrag dang rgya skyegs dug chu yis// 'khrul 'khor rim pa lnga ru bskor// dbus su zla kham rgya gram bzhi// rlung ri

rgya gram sdud cing 'phul// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu gnyis ldan// skyin dang las kyi sdud cing dril// mu khyud gsum pa'i lcags mkhar ni// ba mig bcu drug drag po'i stobs// dbang drag stobs kyis 'bras bu
'joms// yang log mu khyud khor yug la// gdug pa'i gzugs brnyan gzir ba brten// thogs pa med par 'joms pa'i mchog/ de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su yang bzhag sdud cing 'phen// rgya gram

bzhi yi rtse mo la// ma me ta k+she snying po mchog kun gyi rtsa ba yon tan 'phel// rlung ri rgya gram rtse mo las// shar gyi lugs mkhar mig gsum du// ma las snying po gsum 'phros pas// ya dang ma dang phrom dang

gsum// shar du me tog 'bras bu 'joms// rlung ri rgya gram rtse mo la// chu ri lho yi khang ba ru// me las yi ge gsum 'phros pas// ru dang ta dang phrom dang gsum// bang mig gsum pa'i 'od zer gyis// lho ru

me tog 'bras bu 'joms// rlung ri rgya gram rtse mo la// chu ri nub kyi khang pa ru// ta las yi ge gsum 'phros pas// dud dang dkar dang phrom dang gsum// lcags mkhar gsum gyi 'od 'phros pas// nub kyi me

tog 'bras bu 'joms// rlung gi rgya gram byang phyogs nas// chu ri byang gi khang pa ru// k+she las yi ge gsum 'phros pas// shu dang ti dang phrom dang gsum// lcags mkhar gsum pa'i 'od 'phros pas// byang gi lo
tog 'bras bu 'joms// gshed bzhi'i mthu dril dbang du sdud// sgo bzhi'i mjug la 'bru gsum btags// dril gtor khri tsho drug tu bzlas// rnal mas 'byor bas khrag la bstim// phyi rim khang

rgyud gsum pa yi// shar gyi khang mig bzhi pa ru// dbab sngags 'bru bzhis drag 'phros pas// yang dag ma dang phrom dang shar// de bzhin lho ru bzhi 'phros pas// rag dang dud dang shar dang phrom// de bzhin

nub tu bzhi 'phros pas// khrag dang la dang mu dang sha/ de bzhin byang du bzhi 'phros pas// ma dang hril dang dza dang b+h+yo// 'phen pa'i sngags kyi 'phreng ba yis// chu rgod gang dmigs gnas su 'bebs// k+She nas
go bzlog ya la dril// mtshams su gang dmigs yul gyi ming// mtha' ru bcu drug gab pa'i 'bru// rtag tu dril pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i las su bshad// yang logs mu khyud bzhi pa
la// gzir pa drag po'i yig 'bru gnas// gzir ba kun gyi mtha' ru sbyar// mtshon cha 'khrul 'khor kha sbyar la// thod pa sbyor ba kun gzhoms bri// 'khor lo thod pa dbus su bzhag/ thun rdzas sngags bcas
khrag la bstim// rdzas kyi 'khrul 'khor bar snang brdeg/ las kyi mtha' ru dbab pa brtsam// dus tshod nges par gtan gzung dbab// ma phebs sbyor ba'i stobs zhan na// lcags phur ya man ta kar

bsgom// sngags rnams bkod la rten la gzir// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gzir pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi rgyal po 'di phye ste bton to// oM ya ma me ta k+she sa ma ya dza

hri ta ya ma phroM phroM hril dza dza/ ya ma me ta k+Sha ya ma phroM/ ru tra phroM/ dud dkar khroM/ shu ti khro/ ma me ta k+Sha ya/ ya ma phroM/ me ta k+Sha ma yA/ ru tra phroM/ ta k+Sha ma me ya/ dud dkar phroM/ k+She ta ma me ya/ shu ti phroM/ k+She ta ma me ya/

ya ma phroM sha ra/ rag dud shar phroM/ khrag la mu sha mi hril shar b+h+yo/ ya k+Sha ta me ma nA ga tsit+ta thuM/ gzir shar shar hril nA ga du sta hril phob/ sngags kyi sbyor ba lo tog 'joms/ 'bras bu 'joms pa'i 'khor lor
bshad/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po li byin har gyi sbyor ba 'du rgyas par bshad do/ ri sogs dben pa'i gnas mchog tu/ maN+Dal khrag gi byi dor bya/ mdos dang gtor
ma lug la brten/ mda' dang za 'og rin chen 'bru/ gsang bshos lug snying shing thog 'chang/ ling ga thod pa ming rus thun/ dar dang rin chen lug la gdags// bod rbad gsad pa skabs dang sbyar// maN+Dal
dbus su gtor ma bshos// mtha' ma bshos bu brgyad kyis bskor// ya ma'i skur bsgoms sngags spros dgug/ sgrol gying brgyad dang bcas par dmigs// bka' bsgo dam 'bogs las gnyer gtad// 'od
'dril gzugs ston phyag byed blta// gtor ma dang bcas bshos bu btang// gtor chung lug dang tsa ras brgyan// srod dang tho rangs rgyun du btang// ling ga thod pa dong du gzhug/ rbad sngags
brgya brgya gsad sngags khri// thun brdeg bkug la thod par bral// rdzas kyi ga 'ur gsad thar bca'// yul la rbad cing bla kun mngag/ mtha' ru zor dal 'phangs pas 'joms// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags rnams phye ste ston to// oM rA tsa srog la hing rag mo snying rtsa rbad/ srog la dza ti dun dun badzra sa tri shu la gri pa tsa pa la a shu me hU~M dza dza/ srog la me tri shu la pa ta rwa tsa cha tsa me rag

sha dgra la b+h+yo/ ra tsa srog la myogs/ rag mo snying rtsa ni la rbad/ a shu rtsa ri snying khrag rngubs/ ru mun ro la yi yi rbad/ tri liM rbad tsit+ta rbad/ yag sha gri thuM ri la rbad ro myags rtsa la thum ling tri ta ma rA ya rbad/

dril gtor sngags kyi sbyor bar gnyis/ rno dbal ka sbyor srog gi spu gri lta bu sbyor ba 'di/ li ba ni las la mngag par bshad/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud mo dam ma la sgrol gying bzhi dang srin mor
bcas pa'i sbyor ba 'di rgyas par bshad do// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod la sogs dben gnas su// man+Dal gru bzhi khrag gis byug/ chos kyi pho brang zlum po la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhis rab tu

mdzes// phyi nang skam rlon thod pas bskor// sgo bzhi gru chang rgyan dang ldan// rgyal chen sa yi pho brang du// mthun pa'i rdzas ni rab tu grags// spu ra ma ti rak+ta snying// li li spu tra ma sa snying// ku ku rak+ta su pan

dag lcang lo mthing nag ldan par dgram// gling bu keng rus mtha' mar dgram// pho brang zhing bcu rgyal mtshan bzhi// de dag bkram la bsnyen pa bya// dbus su lha mo'i rten bzhag la// dug mtsho'i nang nas

'gying bag can// be drod zhon nas gtso la lta// rtsibs bzhi bur ba srin mo bzhis// sgo bzhir phyi yi sgrol gying bzhi// mda' bzhi dar gyis brgyan la gzug/ gshin rje'i rgyal po'i skur bsgoms la// snying pos

bskul bas dbus nyid du// lha mo'i thugs kar sUr+ya la// ma dang bcas pa'i srog snying bsam// bar ma chad pa srog nas drangs// srin mo bzhi dang sgrol gying bzhi// pho brang 'khor du 'bum sde lhags// dngos
grub rnam gsum 'bebs shing ston// des ni mtshan ma rnam gsum 'byung// rab dang 'bring dang mtha' mar 'byung// nag mo khro gnyer ral gcig ma// bzhin mi sdug pa sba thabs byed// dkyil 'khor dbus su

me 'bar dang// rlung tshul mthong dang ser ba 'byung// des ni ci 'dod las rnams 'grub// mtshan ma de dag mthong nas kyang// dkyil 'khor rdzas kyi mchod pa pa bya// 'dod pa dag ni 'byung gyur na// drag po
las kyi sbyor ba brtsam// dbus su gru gsum sbag mar rtsig/ gru chad bzhi dang ldan par bya// rtsa dang rgya sol de bzhin ldan// gru gsum sbag ma'i nang logs su// ma ra ni ya ling ga brnag 'ba'

hu nyungs kar thod tshal shar// lhum shing thal ba nyungs nag lho// dug dang rme khrag lan tshwa byang// tsha tsha gnam lding gung la brdeg/ de nas bdag nyid lus bsgyur te// ha nag po mi bsrun ma// mig gsum gdong

dang khrag gis bsku// tri shUl ban dmar phyag na bsnams// mche ba gtsigs shing srog snying 'dren// rdzas la bsngags la gzugs la bsdeg srin mo bzhi dang sgrol ging bzhi// dmigs pa'i rtsa dang srog bcad

nas// sha la stod cing khrag la 'thung// drag tu bskul gyin dgra la rbad// spogs na 'khor lo'i gnan pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bton to// badzra karma ra ga

sha du tri hri hri dza dza/ dgra bo'i srog la ling ling thum thum b+h+yo/ ha la ha la yam yam khams sum mugs/ snying baM/ khaM ha raM baM/ ru tra/ trag thums/ ra tri khaM/ dgra bo'i srog mA ra ya rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thun

mugs rbad b+h+yo/ stam b+ha ya nan/ trag shig hal yam/ dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ rag mo ka lo baM ril dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ rag mo rag sha breng shag dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ rag mo trag

sha thums dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ rag mo rtsa thang srog la breng/ dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ thibs kam shag dun dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ hri ba tsa shul yaM dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ du tri badzra baM

ril dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ ra tri khaM tsit+ta shag dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo sngags dang ldan// steng la gzer sngags 'og la dril/ kha sbyar bar du brnag pa gzhug/ thod pa dang

bcas gnan pa bya// las rnams kun gyi mchog tu bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrol gying dmar po las la bsngags pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lha 'dre che la dben pa'i sar// khyi dmar ra dmar bya

dmar snying// ske tshe nyungs kar nyungs nag dang// zangs lcags rdo yi phye ma thun// dri ma drug gi ling ga dang// phur pa bshos bu mda' dmar dar// bshams la sngags spro sgrol gying dgug/ dmar po bsre khrab
bsre rmog gon// tsit+ta zangs gyi lag na thogs// bka' gnod phyag byed dgra la rbad// 'brub khung bkug las thun gyis brab// bsad la thod pa ling ga gnan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku

gsung thugs las sngags 'di phye ste bton to// oM ging kA ra ag sha gri ba gying mo snying kha rag tro tra tro ta ni/ pa tra pa tra/ shu la shu la/ 'da' sha gri ba ma rA ya hU~M dza/ tri ti tri ti/ dor dor shaM shaM rtsa la yaM/ sang sang

tri da dum b+h+yo ya/ tri tri ling rbad/ ra tri rbad/ tri du rbad/ yu tri yu tri rbad/ dun tri shag tri dgra bo'i srog la yaM rbad/ zla gcig bdud dang dgu ru sbyar// srog bdag spu gri'i sbyor bar bshad// de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo thams cad gzir zing srog dbrog pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dngos grub 'dod pa las brtsams dang// 'bras bu med dang cho 'phrul mang// snying mi dga' zhing 'khor du skyon

byung na// las kyi mtha' 'am bar bar sbyor ba brtsam// de yang gsum de ma mo nyams pa na// rang bzhin btsan thabs drag po gzir dang gsum// dang po phyag rgya chen po ya ma'i sku// nag po 'jigs tshul dur

khrod chas dang ldan// lcags kyu phur pa thogs pa'i sprul pa yis// ma mo bkug la snying kha mgrin pa ru// gzung zhing gzir la bsnyen pa stong dang bcas// gnyis pa ma mo gzugs byas la// snying khar snying po
mtha' ma sngags kyis bskor// stong bzlas gshin rje'i phur pas gzir zhing bsdigs// ma mo'i mdangs phrogs bka' nan 'dar zhing phyag/ bsgro ba las kyi gnyer gtad bcol// drag po las kyi mtha' ru
gzir ba ni// dur khrod shin tu dben pa'i bde gnas su// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum brtsegs me ri can// bar khyams zlum pi gru chad bcas// ne le'i rgyan dang dam rdzas gtor ma bsham// mthing gur le

brgan dmar po'i yol// gru gsum dbus su lcags phur ya mar bskyed// sku yi sngags bri rtse mor dza phaT nan// byang shar rtse mor ma mo dur khrod bri// snying khar ma dang rang gi bsnyen pas bskor// de yi mtha'
mar sku yi bcu bdun pas// rtse mo gnyis la brnag pa'i gzugs dang thun// sngon du bkug la gzugs dang ma la bstim// gnyis pas gzir zhing lcags phur ya mas bsdigs// gsum pas bkrag mdangs
'phro ba'i dbang du bsdu// bzhi pas gsol la dam tshig mna' chu blud// gtor ma rag ta bdud rtsi btab cing mchod// srog dbrog dbyig bskyed thun brdeg ling ga gtub// zor dal mtha' ru sbyin sreg mnan

pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di bton to// ya ma e kram ka pa ye du ru ye ra ga sha rag mo ma srog la dza dza/ gzir nan thu ma ril/ ya ma rag sha du ru ye bya tsha ye a pa ye ka pa ye

bri da ye ma ma srog la dun dun dza gzing nan/ shi a kroM ya ma ya ma ma srog la breng breng/ dza ma mo srog la trig nan rbad/ ya ma sa ma ya trag rag sha kha raM dun na pu tsa kha kha'i/ ma ma rag mo srog la rmugs te kha raM

sha ru thums tsit+ta breng breng shag shag dza/ ma mo las kyi mthar sdud 'di// sbyor ba mchog gi rgyal po ni// sbyor ba gzhan tshogs rgyas pa kun// rang rang bsgrub pa'i las gzhung btsan// las kyi mchong chen drag po
'di// nag po stobs kyi sbyor ba yin// ma mo mi ldog gsang ba yi// sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gshin rje'i 'khor gnod sbyin dregs pa can thams cad
gzir zhing srog rang dbang med par dbrog pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// khro bo'i dka' thub ldan pa yis// rtsub 'gyur bde ba'i rgyud gnas su// maN+Dal mda' gang khrag gis byug/ dbus su gru gsum sum

brtsegs la/ kha khyer dang po rtsang gis bskor// bar ma 'gying phur gsum dang ldan// tha ma zor thun rdzas kyis bskor// dpal gtor lho ru thun rdzas bya// sa mar mkhar sgongs pung shul sa// sa sbyin bsres la

gang byed gzugs// mdzub gang dbang po dod pa yi// snying khar gru gsum sor gcog 'bru// gro ga 'am ni shog bu la// gang bsgrub snying po 'bru re bri// mtha' ma bsnyen pa'i sngags kyis bskor// dril la snying

kha'i dong du gzhug/ steng du bshos bu mtho gang bzhag/ dam rdzas la sogs dkor chas bskor// gsur dang rak+ta mchod pa bsham// bdag nyid gshin rje'i skur bsgoms la// lha yi bsnyen pa khri 'bum bya// gang

bsgrub srog drang snying kar bstim// dbang du bsdus la phyag rgyas gnan// gzugs la phab la drag tu gzir// 'gying 'phur khro bo'i skur bsgoms la// dril zhing bsdigs la snying kar brdeg/ mdangs dang phral
la 'dar bar bsam// sngags pa'i 'og nas bka' nod cing// ci bgyi las kyi dmigs ston smra// rang dbang med par srog phrogs la// khro bo'i thugs kar bkrag mdangs bsdu// de nas snying kha'i sngags
bton la// bdud rtsi btigs la bsnyen pa gso// snying khar gnag pa'i ming yang gzhug/ gzugs de bslang la dgra la bstan// nyin mtshan rbad dang gsad pa'i las// zhag grangs dgu yis rdzogs par bya// de

nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di phya ste bton to// ya ma sa ma ya ru tsa da na di thums tri sha pi ra srog la dun dun hU~M dza dza/ ya ma ka li a pa ye a ne u ne thum ling a mu ka srog

gzir trig nan ru thuM/ oM a kro d+hi ti sa ma ya ya ma ye a mu ka du gram sarba tsit+ta breng shag srog la dun dun thum ril dza dza/ gang sgrub las kyi dmigs dang sbyar// dregs pa gzir pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal

mtshan me long gi rgyud las// rno dbal kha sbyor gsang ba don gyi le'u ste brgya bcu bzhi pa'o//// yang bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mos zhus pa/ ye shes lha dang las byed kun// snying po srog bsdus dmod
pa la// drag po'i sbyor bas gsad pa dang// gso ba'i las dang snying gzer gyis// klu gnyan sa bdag ji ltar gzir// drag po mngon byung rgyas par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po dmod pa rgyas
par bshad do// nyams dga' dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dpa' brtul sngags kyi dmod pa bor// shog bu gru bzhi mtho gang la// thig skor bzhi dang ldan par bskor// gru gsum bla sems ming dang

rus// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// rtsa ba'i snying po me rlung skyin dang gnas// de yi phyi rim mu khyud zlum po la// sgrub pa gzhan gyis rbad dag gsad pa'i sngags// yang logs 'khrul mig lcags 'khor

bcu gnyis la// ral gri rdo rje rgya gram bsnol mar gnas// ral gri gsod pa'i spu gri rgya gram gnon pas mdzes// de nyid ru sbal khra bo'i lto bar bri/ kha sbyor bcas la dug dang khrag gis byug mtshon cha'i

mtshams dang zla kham gru gsum la// brnag pa'i ming rus mA ra ya rbad bri// sngon dmar dang bcas thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ pho thod nang du ma ra ya rbad bri// thod pa'i 'og mar brnag pa'i ming rus bri// rtsang
bcas gru gsum kha khyer sum brtsegs gzhug/ tshe bdag bsgoms la ye shes 'khor lo bca'// zhag gsum drag sngags dmod pa rngam tshig ldan par bzlas// bar bar drag tu bskul zhing brnag pa'i rgyud la
rbad// de nas nyin gcig thod pa gzir zhing bca'// 'khor lo ru sbal phag mo'i thod par bca'// dar dang re ba skud pas thod pa bsdam// klu gzir gdug pa'i gnyan la thod khar gdab// dmar thag chod

nas nam phyed tshun chad du// tshes gcig bdag dang bcu ru dus su gnan// sa chu 'byung ba bzhi yi lto gshags la// khru do brkos la thod par de bzhin gnan// steng du 'byung ba bzhi dang ri rab pho brang

bskyed// sngags bzlas dpang gzugs phyag rgya'i brjid kyis mnan// zla brgyad lom nas ru tra brlag pa bzhin// nya stong dag na dmod pas drag tu gsad// drag sngags dmod pa rtsa ba'i sbyor ba 'di// zhi khro

gshin rje phur pa ma mo dang// bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po the rang btsan// gnod sbyin srin po lha mi dud 'gro sri// klu gnyan sa bdag dkor spungs grum bum gyi// las dang srog gi snying po bcud du bsdus nas
dril// shes rab rtsal dang btul zhugs ldan pas sbyad// blo chung rtog pas rang 'ching mnar med myong// lha srin kun gyis mthu dril drag por bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lo tog gzhom pa'i

sbyor ba 'di rgyas par bshad do// dur khrod ras sam shog bu gru bzhi la// dbus su ru sbal khong stong dbyibs dang zlum por bri// yan lag lnga dang mjug ma lto ba nas// gcod pa drag po'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu

gnyis// byung bar bris la rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// srog bzhi gnad kyi 'bru dang chu dril dbab par dgod// sbal pa'i lto ba'i dbus su yul gyi ming dang ser ba
phob ces bri// byang khog stod du gza' yi gzir sngags bri// mjug mar yul lha de bzhin gzir sngags bri// lto ba g.yas su ma mo'i gzir sngags bri// lto ba g.yon du sa bdag klu gnyan

gyi// rang gnad gzir la dbab pa'i drag sngags bri// mtshon cha dug dang khrag gi ngar blud la// sbal pa pho mo'i sbyor ba thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dgun zla gsum gyi nya stong nyin zhag phrugs re bzlas// dpyid zla

gsum la zhag gsum chu dril bzlas// dbyar zla gsum la rten bzhi legs bcas la// thod pa dung phur khrag dang dug chu blugs// nya dang stong la nyin zhag lnga ru bzlas// tha chungs stong la rta ma rten la gzhug/ rtse
skad dbus dang kha 'dren tshul// zor thab du ba drag pos gzir// tshig gsum brun gsum sbyor ba'i rdzas// drag sngags lus la srog bzhis gzir// gza' dang ma mo lha btsan dang// sa bdag klu gnyan gzir
la dbab// drag po thog ser 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba drag pos gsad pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// yang dag gsang ba'i sbyor ba ni// sems nyid dben pa'i bde
gnas sam// dur khrod gnyan ra gdug pa ru// dur khrod dar ram zhing ras la// mu khyud bdun dang ldan pas bskor// dbus su grub gsum drag po la// gzas pa pho mo'i ming rus bri// zla kham gsum la srung

ba'i lha// mtshon cha 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// 'dren pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dgod// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// khro bo'i stobs kyi 'bru gcig dang// tshe srog sdud pa'i snying po gcig khong khrag 'brel

ba'i 'bru lnga la// rlung gi snying po ldan par dgos// phyi rim mu khyud bzhi pa la// rigs bzhi sbrul gyis chun 'khor bya// gseb tu gnan pa'i spu gri dgod// lnga pa thod pa'i 'phreng ba la// 'phen pa thun gyi spu gri

dgod// drug pa sreg pa'i me ri la// gsod cing gcod pa'i spu gri dgod// de dag tshe srog 'chang ba yi// ru sbal lton gnad pa'o// srod gsum lto bar 'chang cing gsad// tshe srogs bdag po'i lto ba na// mi

'gyur gnas pa sngon du bca'// thod pa rgya gram me ri'i 'og/ sbyor ba gzhan tshogs snga ma bzhin// dregs pa stobs kyi sbyor bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas pa'i 'khor lo 'di rgyas par
bshad do// bsam gtan sems kyi 'khor lo 'di// tshe bdag thugs kar gsod byed gnas// de thugs rdo rje 'chang chen po// dregs pa de thugs srid pa'i mdzod// ru sbal mi zan rtsa bzhi la// sbubs na khong

khrag 'brel pa'i 'bru// nang gi mdud pa 'dren pa'i stobs// phyi yi mdud pa spru gri mtshon// rtsa bran brgyad la bsrung ba'i mchog steng sgor snying la 'og sgor dun// chos nyid khrag ces yon tan ra// ye shes na ste
rang rgyud rtsa// chos nyid rtsa mdun e gnas yin// de bzhin yon tan bka' 'bru// ye shes ya las rang rgyud ma// bzhi brgya rtsa mdud bzhi po la// gsad pa mchog gi spu gri gnas// phyi yi rtsi bran
brgyad po la// gzir gshig byad grol zhen pa bzlog dug dbyung gsang lam drag por gzir// snying gzer dag dang spu gri brgyad// nang gi mtshams bzhi srog bzhi gzir// lo thog 'joms pa'i spu gri
gnas// gsang mdzod dbus na kun gyis srog/ snying po 'bru re bkrag mdangs 'chang// srog shing dmar nag ya yi stobs// me chu rlung gis 'gugs shing 'byed// 'du ba'i nad smin sreg cing gcod// rnal

mas gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo la// nyams dga' dur khrod dben gnas su// dur khrod rdzas sam shog bu la// sme ba dang ldan 'khrul 'khor bre// mu khyud bzhi bskor gru gsum dbus// phyi

rim rtsibs bzhi srog las bsdus// rngam pa'i 'bru dang bdud kyi 'bru// 'bru bzhi bkod pa mtshon cha'i mkhar// de yi phyi rim rtsibs brgyad la// ming gi snying po 'bru gnyis dang// khong khrag 'brel ba'i 'bru drug
dgod// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu bzhi la// ming bcas spu gris gsod cing gnon// gzhan gzir gsang ba'i 'bru bcu bzhi// dgod pa gnas mthun lto sbyor dgod// phyir rim rigs bzhi sbrul gyis bskor// de

bzhin ru sbal lto ru bri// rgyu rten rdzas dang sbyar la bsku// sbyor ba gzhan tshogs snga ma bzhin// rnal mas gsad pa'i sbyor bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lto dkrugs spogs pa'i sbyor ba 'di
bshad do// dpa' bo rnel gri'i gos dag la// rim pa bzhi dang ldan par bskor// dbus su gru gsum brnag pa'i gzugs// 'khrum mig bzhi la e dang dun// he dang ka te 'bru bzhi dgod// yang logs 'khrul

mig brgyad po la// khrag snying rtsa ma ya da ra// mtshon cha'i rtse mo bcu gnyis la// gcod cing gnon pa de bzhin dgod// sbrul bzhi de bzhin ru sbal ltor// nyin mo g.yas nas drag sngags bzlog/ nub mo de
bzhin g.yon nas bzlog bar khyams gling bar ming rus gzugs// brnag pa kun 'jom drag po'i las// lto dkrugs sbobs pa'i 'khor lor bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khrul 'khor de dag

gi thod pa bca' ba 'di bshad do// thabs dang shes rab thod pa la// steng du rdo rje rgya gram dang// ri rab ru sbal me ri bri// snying po 'bru bdun nan gyis bskor// thabs kyi thod pa stobs dpag med// 'og ma

gru gsum bzhi dang sbrul// rigs bzhi'i tshul du ske bsnol bsdam/ kha khyer gdug pa chen pos bcings// ling ka ming rus khams dang ris// pha mes la sogs lo slungs bri// snying po raM yaM laM gyis bskor// dug
chu tsha ba myos pa'i khrag/ bskus la 'khrul 'khor bar du gzhug tshas chas sbyor ba snga ma bzhin// drag po las kyi gsad pa yis// sbyor ba kun la sbyor bar 'os// gnan pa thod pa'i 'khor lor

bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las rtsa ba drag po'i sngags 'di bton to// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya// dgra bo'-i srog la myogs mA ra rbad// dgra bo'i srog stam pa ya

nan// dgra bo'i srog la dun b+h+yo// ma hA de ba sa nA ga phroM phroM shar shar hril drag tu phob// ma ma kha la rag sha rag mo shar gzir nan phob ya// ra hu la bi bi shar shar nan gzir phob ya// sa nA ga ra hur thums

gzir shar shar phob ya// de ba yu nan gzir shar shar phob ya// e dun he ka ma ya khrag snying tsa mA ra yA ra ya// 'di dag bsad pa drag po ste// nye bar gyur pa'i sbyor ba yin// drag po las stobs dgod kyi

sngags// sbyor ba kun gyi rtsa bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gso zhing bsrung pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gab pa sngon byung sbyor ba'i rgyal po las// khyad par byas pa gshig cing sbyor ba gzhom
pa dang// las dang nus pa'i stobs rnams gzir ba ni// drag po mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor bcas pas 'grub// mu khyud gsum ba ru sbal lto bar bca'// gru gsum dbus su gang dmigs mong rnams bri// phyi

rim drag po 'khrul mig bcu pa la// e nas grangs la ya yi bar du dgod// de yi phyi rim mtshon cha'i rtse mo bcu// gshig pa drag po spu gri'i 'bru bcu dgod// dug dang tsha ba khrag gis 'khrul 'khor bsku// ming

dang snying po bris la thod par gzhug mdun nas lnga ru sngags bzlas mtha' ru gnan// drag po byas pa gshig pa'i 'khor lor bshad// zug pa dbyung ba'i 'ukhrul 'khor ni// rgyu dang sbyor ba gcig tu bya// mu khyud
gsum skor dbus gru gsum// lcags mkhar drug gnyis gcig gi mtha'// rtsa ba'i drag sngags thams cad ldan// spu gri sbyor ba so sor bsdeb// phyi rim bcu gsum spu gri dgod// ngar bcas sbyor ba thod par
bca'// thun brdeg kun 'byin thun dang bsdeb// zug pa 'byin pa'i 'khor lor bshad// zhen pa bzlog pa'i 'khor lo yang// mu khyud gsum pa pho brang drag po'i gnas// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig drug gnyis

pa// rtsa ba'i sngags te yig 'bru bcu gnyis dgod// rtsibs bcu dmod pa spu gri b+h+yo zhes bzlog/ ngar bcas sbyor la thod pa 'thun 'phang bzlog dregs pa stobs kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis// zhen chags sbyor ba
mngon zhugs gcod// rno nyur spu gri 'bru bcu yis// rgyud gcig shes pa gnyis su 'byed// khyu mchog dang bcas gzer thebs na// stobs can kun kyang myos shing gzir// zhen pa bzlog pa'i 'khor lor
bshad// dug mda' g.yung ba'i 'khor lo ni// thod pa'i rgyu la steng 'og dbye// mu khyud bzhi skor gsang mdzod gzugs// sbrul dang me ri dang ldan 'go khrag dang dmigs pa'i ming gis

dgang// gling bzhi steng mar de bzhin bzhi// pho brang zlum la 'bru drug ldan// bzhi dang brgyad la rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsibs bcu spu gri gnyis sbyar la// rdo lcags zangs phur thod khung dbab// khrag bton thod pa
zor phang gnan// dug mda' gsang ba'i 'kho lor bshad// gru gsum sum sbrag 'dom tshad ldan// rtsang dang me ri gzugs bcas yaM raM ming// rtsibs bcu zla kham thod par me rir bcas/ kha sbyor 'khor lor

mu khyud gsum gyi dbus// las kyi rdo rje bcu gnyis 'khrul mig phyi// mtshon cha bcu gnyis spu gri drag pos bskor// me rlung rgya gram bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// sngags sam gdon gyis bud du bcug pa la// drag
po rnal ma btsan thabs gsum gyis dgrol// 'brub khung sa yi 'khor los drag po sreg cing myos// bar snang sngags kyis 'khor los gdug pa'i zhen chags dgrol// gsang ba thugs kyi 'khor los ma lus

las rnams 'grub// drag po byad 'grol gsang ba'i 'khor lo bshad// mu khyud bzhi ldan 'khrul 'khor pho brang zlum// phyi rim rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad rtsa ba'i sngags// bcu gnyis spu gri mtha' ma gsang lam
'gegs// rtsibs mchan ming bri stobs can gsum dang sbyar// lam srang them 'og gsum du sbyor bas gnan// drag po gsang lam dgag pa'i 'khor lor bshad// drag po srung ba'i mtha' sdud du// thams cad
gzir zhing sdud pa yi// drag po 'akrul gyi 'khor lo bca'// dur khrod rgyu dang 'khor lo'i rkyen// mar gyi phel ba bri dgod bya// rang yang drag po'i sku ru gsal// gzhan tshogs dbang bsdu de bzhin
gsal// 'khrul 'khor bang mig nyi shu brgyad// gsang mdzod mun khang dbus dang lnga// mu khyud khor yug bzhi dang bcas// dbus su gru gsum drag po'i gnas// phyi rim lcags mkhar 'bar ba'i gzho// yang
logs gnam lcags khang khyud brgyad// mtha' ma lcag mkhar bcu drug bca'// srid gsum 'chang ba'i lto na gnas// lcags mkhar rlung dri chun 'khor bcas// gsang mdzod mun khang me dang rlung// mtshon chas
spu gri thog gzer can// skyin dang las kyi myos shing sdud// de la gnas pa'i 'bru rnams ni// bzhi ni dbus kyi lcags mkhar la// 'dren pa stobs kyis 'bru bzhi gnas// phyi rim mtshon gling lcags mkhar

brgyad// rgyas dang bsdus dang snying khrag 'byin// yig 'bru brgyad de bzhi dang sbyar// rtsa ba'i drag sngags kun gyi mgo// lcags mkhar bcu drug dregs pa'i gnas// mtshon cha'i rgyal po spu gri dgod// thams cad
sreg cing stobs kyis gnon// drag tu gzir dang gdug rtsub 'byin// srog dbugs sdud cing drag por gnon// rang dam srog nas gang dmigs 'dren// nus pa 'brel zhing sbyor ba gcod// der
bzhag stobs chen spu gri'i gnas// mtshon cha nus pa stobs dpag med// gsang mdzod lnga pa dmigs pa'i ming// bsdus la kha sbyar bzhi yis gdeg/ dben gnas gsum du gzir zhing bskur// 'khor lo

stegs bzhi dril zhing spa// sbyor ba rtsom na bcas la gzir// drag po thams cad gzir la bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las rtsa ba dang spu gri'i sngags 'di phye ste bton to// e ka ya

ma ka dun dza ri rag sha ru thum/ sarba sha truM stam pa ya nan rtid rbad/ man ta guh+ya sarba du ma nan/ drid phyung ya ma ta ra tsa sa nA gA tri sarba du yaM b+h+yo phyung/ sarba sha hrun e nan yaM trid b+h+yo b+h+yo/ man tra dum ma hA rag du

raM thuM ling rbad/ sarba du raM tri ya drid phyung srog la gzir/ nan phyung/ sarba du raM yu nan gzer phyung sbur nan srog la myogs rbad/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi klu gnyan sa bdag gsum gzir zhing gzhom pa'i sbyor
ba 'di rgyas par bshad do// lto dkrugs gzir ba 'di lta ste// shog bu gru bzhi cha gnyis la// mu khyud gsum ldan gru gsum dbus// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi rim bcu bdun lto dkrugs
gzir// ru sbal lto sbyar dug myos khrag zhag bdun sngags bzlas rten la bstim// lha sgom rtsang bcas thod pa gsal// lto dkrugs gzir ba'i 'khor lo bshad// klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa yis// mdze rim

drag po'i yams dar na// snying gzer bdun gyi 'khor lo bca'// sbyor ba sna tshogs rdzas kyis byug srid pa ru sbal lto bar bri// drag po'i gnas su snying po bsdu// mthing nag dar dang thod par bca'// bsgom
bskul dong gzhug rtsang bcas sngags// dmod pa thun dbab hom shing bsreg/ zor thun mtha' tu gnan gzir bya// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'khrul 'khor mu khyud rim pa gsum// dbus su gru gsum snying po

ming// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi rim rtsa sbubs drag po bdun// snying gzer bdun pa mtshan re gnas// ru sbal lto ru kha sbyor bca'// rang gi phyag rgya bris sku dgram// rang yang phyag rgya gsal
bar sgom// gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsa sbubs na// dwangs ma bcu gnyis snying gzer bdun// phyi nang rtsa yi sbubs na gnas// snying gzer dbus na snying po gsum// de yis klu gnyan sa bdag 'joms// snying
gzer bdun pa'i 'khor lo bshad// sbyor ba bdug pa bsreg pa'i las// spogs pa med par 'joms pa 'di lta ste// dben gnas chen po'i gnyan ra ru// gar gnod sa la maN+Dal bya// dbus su gru gsum
mthing nag la/ kha khyer gsum dang ldan pa brtsigs// phyi nang chag gang dbus mdzub gang// rtsibs la kha khyer sor bzhi bya// mu khyud nang du zla kham gsum// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu

gnyis// yang logs rtsibs chen nyi shu gnyis// bzhi pa mu khyud zlum po la// ban d+ha skam po bcu gcig dgod// lnga pa me ri'i 'phreng bas bskor// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su gru gsum mthing nag

la// sa chur sbyar ba'i sbal pa bzhag/ snying khar hom shing khru gang gzugs/ kha khyer gsum dang zla kham la// klu gnyan sa bdag gzugs brnyan gzhag/ rtsibs la rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// phyi rim mtshon cha'i

rtse mo la// sreg cing gcod pa'i spu gri dgod// mu khyud bzhi pa'i ban d+ha ru// sbal ba sbrul dang nya sogs sha/ gnyis pa sha chen tsha ba gsum// bzhi ba dug gi ri lu brgya// lnga pa bya pha ka chil bu brun// drug par mi

rta khyi yi tshil// bdun par mar khu dug chu brgyad// dgu par khrag sna chang sdo bcu// bcu gcig dug rdzas sna tshogs bzhag dur khrod ras sam zhing ras la// gong bzhin bris la rdzas kyis bsku// bdun nam dgu
ru steng nas dag ba// dmod pa bzlas shing bskor ba bya// drag tu bskul gyin me spar la// gzugs la mtshon brdeg bstabs la sreg/ gdug pa'i sha sogs rim bzhin bsreg nyin mtshan thun drug sbyin sreg

bya// gdug pa rjes gcod kyi 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang bsrung ba thams cad bstan par bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// drag po gdug pa bsrung ba la// mi ldog pa yi 'khor lo bca'// rgya shog gru bzhi cha
gnyis la// dbus na mu khyud drug tu bskor// dbus su gru gsum thod pas bskor// gnyis par 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// thod pa'i 'phreng ba gong ma bzhin// gsum par 'khrul mig nyi shu la// de bzhin thod
pa'i 'phreng ba bya// bzhi pa rtsibs chen sum cu gnyis// yang logs phyi rim thod 'phreng me// yi ge dgod pa 'di lta ste// dbus su gang dmigs gzugs dang ming// gnyis par rtsa ba'i drag sngags
dgod// gsum pa khyad par drag po yi// gzir 'joms srog dbrog nyos shing gnon// bzhi pa'i rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// shi phrad gu thal drag po'i 'bru// yang gsang mchog gi drag sngags dgod// ru sbal

lto bar rdzogs par bca'// 'khrul 'khor rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan la// bdud rtsi'i 'o ma khrag gis byug kha sbyor tshon skud thod sgong gzhug lto sbyor khri yis ngar blud la// sngags pa'i steng 'og bar snang
bca'// de yis thams cad bsrung ba yin// shi phrad stobs kyi 'khor lo bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las gdug pa gzir ba'i sngags 'di bton to// sa nA ga tsa tri du me srog la

breng breng tsa la dun dun sbur nan kham shag rbad/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myags rbad/ srog la mug ti rbad/ dug phyung khram shig rbad/ tsi tra ma dbugs la thang gzer rbad/ srog la thun rbad b+h+yo/ sa nA ga du

raM/ sa nA ga u nan gzer phung srog la dun raM tsit+ta breng shag thun rbad e raM/ sa nA ga snying gzir du raM i nan drid phyung sa nA ga tsit+ta thuM ril rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan

rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer drid phyung rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la myogs rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer du raM rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer yaM bzlog rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sarba u
nan gzer phyung rbad/ de nas yang sa'i lha mos bcom ldan 'das la las kyi tshe bdag shan pa'i sbyor ba thams cad rgyas par mdzod ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par bshad do// de'i las kyi rim

pa 'di lta ste// dur khrod dben la shin tu gdug pa'i sar// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal khrag gis byug/ dbus su gru gsum rgyas sol dug chu bsku// phyi rim zla kham myos pa'i khrag gis bsku// sbrul dang thod pa me ri
ldan par bskor// mtha' ma khrag dang dug gis dmar nag dag tu bya// gdug pa'i shing la rtsang mar byas la bskor// zhing lpags keng rusabris sku dung chen dgram// dpa' bo rta nag khyi nag shel nag

snying// bam chen dbang po ban d+ha dung chen dgab// bdud rtsi dang bcas dbus su mthing nag ste// dpal bshos nag po snying gi sha khrag dang// me tog nag po la sogs byang dang lho ru dgram// dur khrod ras

sam zhing ras gru bzhi la// dur khrod gnas nas bam gyi rgyu blangs la// sme ba lnga dang tsha bas thang pa bya// ni ras su yis brgya dang skya bcad la// dbus nas thig skor zlum po bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum
zla kham bzhi dang ldan// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig lcags mkhar bzhi// mtshams bzhi gnam lcags rdo rje'i ka ba can// mtha' ma thod rlon brgyad gnyis ra bas bskor// de yi phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu drug

la// mtshams su rin chen ka ba de bzhin si ra'i mtshams// de yi phyi rim sbrul drug chun bos bskor// srid pa ru sbal khra bo'i lto na gnas pa bri// de la dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su brnag pa'i

ming rus ling ga dgod// zla kham dgra yi pha mes dur du song ba'i ming dang rus// brnag ba bya ba'i snag tsha khrag gis bri// gcig la phas kyi srungs ma grub pa bri// zla kham gcig la bsrung ba'i lha rnams bri// phyi

rim 'khrul mig bzhi po la// drag po gsad pa'i spu gri ming bcas mtshan bzhir dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la// drag po srog sdud las kyi rgyal po gnyis// khro bo rngam pa'i dgra dang bdud kyi snying
po gnyis// gshin rje nyid dang ma mo'i snying po gnyis// chags byed ma dang srin po'i snying po gnyis// shan pa btsan dang dmu yi snying po gnyis// shan pa las mkhan sgrol byed snying po
gnyis// dregs pa can dang mkha' lding snying po gnyis// srog bdag pho mos gsod pa'i snying po gnyis// rang rang lcags mkhar 'bar ba'i gnas re nas// drag tu bskul gyin shan pa dgra la rba// 'khor lo

mtshon chen drag sngags me dpal dug/ 'khrul 'khor me rlung spu gri me rlung spu gri thog chen 'dis// lus bshig rtsa bcad khrag dang bag chags skyems// nad bslang 'byung ba bsdus nas thim// shes ba rten dang
dbang po yul las 'byed// rten gcig lus la shes pa kun bsdus bstim/ kha sbyor 'khrul 'khor thod pa'i ga bur gzhug/ nyin mtshan dril gtor ming bcas spu grir sbyar// thod pa'i gser tu thun gyi spu gri
dgod// ri rgyal kha nas rbab chen 'dril ba 'am// gser gyi dgu thog rgyab bzor thun mthar// sbrul gyi gser tu gnan pa'i spu gri dgod// gser gyi sa gzhi ri rab brtan ltar bzlas// gru gsum nang du brnag
pa'i rten rnams gzhug/ mthing nag kha gcad gsad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// dur khrod gzhal yas rin chen gru bzhi la// sgo bzhi glang chen 'brug dang seng ge stag chu srin gnam lcags khro chung thog chen

gzer// lha klu tshangs pa nyi zla rus pa khrag zhing rus thod pa bla ri 'phan 'phran bcas// sbrul dang thod pa me ri brten ltar gnas// dbus na gnam lcags gru gsum spu gri'i gnas// phyi rim dug mtsho thod

mkhar gling bzhi'i dbyibs// yang logs 'ob chen bcu gnyis mtshon cha'i mkhar// mtha' ma lcags mkhar bcu drug pho nya'i gnas// dbus na klu 'bum gnyan khri sa bdag stong// lto 'phye bzhi gling ma he phyogs

skyong brgyad// nyi zla brtsegs pa gtso bo'i gdan du rdzogs// mdun gyi zla kham sa bdag klu gnyan dang// dregs pa pho mos ma he nyi zla'i gdan// thod khar dregs pa pho mo ma he nyi zla'i brtsegs// 'obs dang

lcags mkhar zhing bsnol ma he nyi zla'i gdan// sgo bzhir zhing bsnom stag dang seng ge dom// dbus su gtso bo zil gnon stobs kyi lha// dbu gsum phyag drug mthing nag zhabs bzhir bgrad// glang chen zhing

stag thod sbrul dur khrod brgyan// rigs bzhi sbrul rigs khrag 'thung bya khyung stag/ seng ge gdug pa khro chung bdud mo g.yon// gsod byed dregs pa ru sbal srog dbugs 'chang// zla kham mdun na tshe bdag mgo

dgu pa// sku mdog sngo nag gtum khro rngam la brjid// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad zhabs brgyad brkyang bskum tshul// dbu gsum steng rngam mkha' lding bya yi dbu// khyung chen rma bya dur bya klu gnyan glo snying
za// dbu gsum bar pa g.yas dkar g.yon dmar mthing// gdug pa'i sbrul dang mi ro rta ro sbrul// spyan dgu khrag 'dzag dbu skra ag tsom ser// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril rngam

pa'i dbu// zhal gsum 'og ma sha za dud 'gro'i dbu// stag dang seng ge ma he dbus na 'gying// snying dang rgyu ma zhing chung za yin rngam// spyan rtsa bsgrigs nas mche ba gtsigs shing za// dbu dang snyan cha mgur

dang lhu tshigs la// rigs bzhi sbrul dang skam rlon thod pas brgyan// phyag dgu g.yas na mtshon cha 'bar ba yi// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje kha TAM mdud// mnga' chen zhing dbyug rgya gram phur bu bsnams// g.yon pa

be con gtun shing rgyu zhags sbrul// thod pa sdigs mdzub dgra sta gzhu// sku stod glang chen dur khrod chas// sku smad stag lpags rat+ka'i chu rgyun 'bab// g.yon na bdud mo khrag gi ral pa can// sku mdog mthing

nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// zhing lpags thod pa re lde sbrul gyis brgyan// tri shul ban d+ha yab la 'khyud cing stobs// thugs kar gsod byed 'khor lo tsit+ta bsnams// dbu la bya khyung gnam lcags nyi

zla'i spyan// bya dang gcan gzan sha za 'ug pa'i tshogs// thod mkhar srog gshed phyi rim phyogs skyong bdun// lcags mkhar nang na drug khri drug stong 'khor// sgo bzhir tshe srog bla la rku// dbugs len ma dang
mdangs 'phrog bzhi yis brgyan// gong nas 'dus shing rdzogs pa'i tshul du gnas// nyi shu bdun nas gnam stong du// zhag bzhi'i bar du gsang sngags bzlas// nyin bzhi gtor la mtshan bzhi dril// bar bar

bskul zhing yul lha rbad// gshin rje bod kyin sbyugs glu blang// pho thod mo thod rgya gram dang// ru sbal gru gsum me ri bri// steng 'og drag sngags ming rus sbrul// rdzas sogs sbyor ba klu dang sbyar// bsnal ma

gsad pa'i sbyor bar bshad// las kyi tshe bdag mgo dgu yi// mchog gi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod ras sam shog bu la// sme ba lnga yi thang ba bya// ru sngal lto bar thig skor bzhi// dbus dang gru gsum
lcags mkhar bcas// yang logs rtsibs chen bcu drug bca'// phyi rim sbrul bzhis ra bas bskor// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su nri dang ming rus rbad// gnyis pa'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// snying
po srog bsdus las bsdus gnyis// bdud dang khro bo'i chags byed gsum// srin po dregs pa ma mo gshin// btsan dang mkha' lding srog bdag dmu// sgrol byed rgyal po ging gi 'bru// 'khrul mig re la gnas
par dgod phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug la// gsod cing gnon dang thun zor gyi// drag po spu gri gsum du gnas// ru sbal yan lag lto ba la// ling ga sgrub bya bcu gsum gnas// 'khor lo mtshon cha med
dpal sngags// gcod cing gnon pa'i 'khor lo yin// sbyor ba gzhan tshogs snga ma bzhin// lto dkrugs gab pa'i 'khor lo bshad// lo thog gzhom pa 'di lta ste// dur khrod ras sam shog bu gru

bzhi la// thig gsum bskor la dbus su yul gyi ming// zla kham sbyor ba gzhom pa'i 'bru// lcags mkhar bcu drug es drangs rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsibs chen nyi shu chu drul zor dang gzir// ru sbal lto bar tsha ba

dug chu khrag kha sbyar thod pa zhabs ma thun gyis bskul// dam rdzas stegs bu dar dang g.yang gzhi dag ba// bsgom bskul sngags la thod pa rta mar gzhug khrag la nyungs kar zor la khri bzhis bstim// rten
gsum dmigs la phur pas klu la gzir// sbyor pa sngags kyis spu gri bzhi ru bsdeb// dregs pa kun gyi mthu dril dbab bar bshad// de nas las kyi tshe bdag gis// bsrung zhing gzir ba 'di lta ste// thams
cad dril ba'i sbyor ba ni// 'khrul 'khor rim pa gsum du bskor// srid pa ru sbal lto bar bri// dbus su gru gsum drag po'i gnas// gang gnod dmigs pa'i yul rnams bri// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis

la// rtsa ba'i sngags te 'bru bcu gnyis// 'bru bzhi 'phos la shi sa dgod// yang logs rtsibs chen bcu bzhi la// spu gri drag po 'bru rnams dgod// las ni sna tshogs rtsa ba gcig zla kham lo thog bsrung ba'i

'bru// bcu bzhi bkod la skabs dang sbyor// khrag dang tsha ba dug chu bsku// thod par bcug la sbyor ba brtsam// zhag bdun sngags bzlas drag tu bskul// bsrung ba thams cad dril pa yi// sbyor ba rgyal po mchog
