tu bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las las sngags sbyor ba 'di phye ste bton to// e ka he dun ya ma rag sha mun tri shaM ma kring shu snying dgra bo'i srog la ni sha truM mA ra ya rbad// srog stam

pa ya nan// srog la thun myogs b+h+yo// e ka dun he rag sha ya raM dza shu kring snying mun tri tsa// dgra bo'i srog la myogs mA ra ya rbad// phroM phroM shar shar hril b+h+yo// nA ga ma'i snying gzir phroM phroM shar shar phob// e ka he

dun ya ma rag sha dza// muM tri shaM raM kring shu snying// sarba du raM u nan gzer phyung sbur nan// srog la myogs rbad// ser ba sha truM stam pa ya nA sha ya hU~M phaT// de dag sbyor ba'i rgyal po ste// thugs dam bsnyen pa rgyu la
brnag rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// dmod pa ngan sngags kyi le'u ste brgya bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang sa'i lha mos// bcom ldan 'das la// yang dag gsang ba'i gsang rgyud 'dir// gsar ba
mchog dang gzir ba dang// klu nad dkar ru bcad pa dang// sbod gtong dmad dkrugs gshig pa dang// rang gshed rang la bskor ba yi// sbyor ba rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas drag po

sngon phyung gi rtsa ba'i sbyor ba mchog gi las// yang gsang 'khrul gyi snying po bcud// gcig ru dril ba rgod kyi sngags// gsang chen gsad pa'i sbyor ba dril// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// dur khrod bde
ba'i gnas btsal la// dpa' brtul sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// dur khrod ras sam shog bu la// cha gnyis byas la bskor ba ni// thig skor rim pa bdun dang ldan// dbus su gru gsum drag po'i
gnas// phyi ru 'phrul mig bzhi dang ldan// yang log 'khrul mig lcags mkhar brgyad// bzhi par mtshon cha rtsibs bcu gnyis// lnga par thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// drug pa gdug pa sbrul gyis

brgyan// bdun pa me ri raM dang ldan// gcod byed tsit+ta'i 'khrul 'khor yin/// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// dbus su brnag pa'i ming yang bri// zla kham gsum la bsrung ba'i lha// 'khrul mig bzhi la dgod

pa ni// 'dren pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dgod// de bzhin 'khrul mig brgyad po la// khong khrag 'brel ba'i 'bru lnga dang// srog sdud 'byed pa'i 'bru gsum dgod// mtshon cha'i rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// gcod

cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// thod pa'i gseb tu pho gdon bri// sbrul gyi gseb tu mo gdon dang// gdug pa'i sa bdag klu gnyan bri// ru sbal kha bo'i lto bar bri// dug chu khrag dang tsha ba bsku// kha sbyor sngon
dmar dar gy-is gril// thod par bcug la gru gsum bzhag gsal gsum bsgoms la zhag gsum bzlas// sbyor ba thon nas mnan sngags bzlos// 'khor lo sbal pa'i lto bar gzhug de yang phag mo'i lto bar

bca'// thod pa ru sbal rgya gram bri// 'khrul mig bcu la tshas kyis gril// gdug pa'i klu la gzir la gtad// khru do brkos la thod pa gzhug sa bcag dbang chen pho brang bskyed// dbang gzugs 'o dod cha nges
gdab// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las drag po'i sngags 'di bton to// e ka ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa thum ril shag/ dgra bo'i myogs mA ra ya rbad// drag po sbyor ba med bal
mtshon// yang gsang mchog gi 'khor lo bshad// drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i rgyal po las// yang gsang mchog gi 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// sngags dang 'khor lo man ngag bsdebs pa'i las// gcig tu
dril te bca' ba 'di lta ste// nyams dga' dur khrod bde ba'i sa phyogs su// dur khrod ras sam shog bu gru bzhi la// sme ba lnga dang thal ba mdog bton la// dbus nas drangs nas thog skor lnga ru
bskor// phyogs bzhi tshangs pa'i thig gnyis rgya gram gdab// dbus su gru gsum 'khrul mig bzhi dang ni// matsams bzhi drag po'i gsang mdzod bzhi dang ldan// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi gnis
la// lcags mkhar bar khyams gshes kyi khang pa yin// de yi phyi rim mu khyud dbang sdud drag po la// stobs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba 'joms pa'i gnas// yang logs mu khyud bzhi po lum po thun

mong rten pa la// khyams khang chen po sgrub pa'i snying po rdzogs// mtha' ma'i 'khrul mig drag po bcu gnyis pa// mtshon cha'i rgyal po me rlung skyin thang gnas// myos pa stobs 'brel rno dbal kha sbyor yin// de dag

dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus dang mtshams kyi gsang mdzod gru gsum lngar// bla sems 'chags pa'i snying po ming rus bri// lcags mkhar bzhi dang phyi rim brgyad po la// rtsa ba'i drag sngags me rlung

drag sngags dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig nyi shu bzhir// thams cad gzir dang gshig pa'i spu gri dgos// de yi rim pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la// gang bsgrub bsnyen pa rbad dang gsad pa'i sngags// phyi nang
mgo bstan skabs dang sbyar la dgod// mtha' me'i 'khrul mig nyi shu la// dgug dang thun brdegs gsad dang gnon pa yi// drag po sbyar ba'i spu gri dgod// drag sngags me dbal 'khor lo mtshon// 'khor lo
mtshon chen me dpal gyis// zhing bcu ma lus gtan nas sreg 'khrul mig dgu bcu las mthar gsum// drag po khyams khang mchog gi gnas// de yis thams cad 'joms shing 'pho// 'khor lo'i lto bsdeb me

dang rlung// spu gri mtshon chen gcod dang 'bigs// bsrung dang skyob pa kun byed pa'o// ngar stobs ldan pa'i 'khor lo la// dug dang khrag bsku kha sbyor bya// gang sgrub las sngags drag po gnas// lto bsdeb drag

po'i 'khor lo bshad// stobs chen lha rnams tsit+ta la// snying po 'bru re sgra ru gnas// de la rtsa ba'i drag sngags dang// gang sgrub dbang can pho mo yi// sgrub sngags drag po'i phyi rol tu// 'od kyi tshul du gsal
bar bsgom// bsnyen pa nang du mgo bstan dang// drag po gsang sngags skabs dang sbyar// man ngag thugs kyi bsdebs su bshad// zhal gyi dmod pa bzlas pa'i tshul// e nas drangs la spu gri spang// gang
bsgrub bsnyen pa sbyar la dgug/ spyan drangs la sogs gzhung dang sbyar// rbad pa stong stong gong bzhin bsdeb// de bzhin gsas dang gnan pa la// skabs dang sbyar bas las kun byed// 'dod pa'i ming bcas
dbus su bsdeb// rno dbal spu gri kha sbyor yin// dmod pa sngags kyi sdebs su bshad//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsad pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba rtsa ba gcig tu dril ba 'di bshad do// drag
po nye ba'i sbyor ba 'di// dur khrod gnyan ra'i dben gnas su// 'brel ba gsum dang ldan pa yi// grogs dang dpa' brtul gnod pa bca'// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// gsang ba'i gsang rgyud 'phrul gyi
bcud// yang gsang mtshon cha gsad pa'i mchog nye bar gcig tu dril bsdebs pa'i// las kyi 'khrul 'khor chen po ni// zhengs ras la sogs rgyu bzhi la// thig skor gsum ldan de bzhin

bzhir// bar khyams sbrul bcas rdzogs byas la// dbus la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi dang// de bzhin phyogs mtshams brgyad du brtags// srid pa'i khyams khang lto ba na// rgya gram rlung dri sbag mar gnas// dang

por tshangs pa'i thig gnyis dang// zur bzhi de bzhin cha snyams la// dbus su gru gsum zla kham gsum// phyi rim phyogs bzhir rdo rje yi// rA bzhi rgya gram nag po la// dbus kyi snying po phyogs bzhi ru// 'khrul
mig mkhar nag rnam gsum gnas// rgya gram mtshams bzhi khrag gi mtsho// yang logs mu khyud zlum po chu// skom zhing g.yeng bas sdud cing smin// lte sbyor gab pa'i 'khor lo yin// yang logs dbus mtshams

gling brgyad du// rlung ri rdo rje rtse mo re// kha dog 'phrin las ljang khu la// snying po 'phrul mig gnyis gnyis ldan// las rnams rdzogs pa spu gri'i gnas// rlung ri gshed kyi 'khor lo yin// lto bsdebs ma yin mu

khyud spang// zur brgyad mu tig chun 'khor bcas// gsod byed drag po rngam pa yi// gab pa'i thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// byang khram snying po spu gri'i sngags// 'phrul gyi rtsa ba dril ba ni// gru gsum ming rus zla

kham lta// bsrung ba kun ldan rdzogs par bri// rgya gram bzhi yi 'khrul mig la// rtsa ba'i snying po drag sngags dgod/ khor yug rbad dang gsad pa'i sngags// gang bsgrub lo sbyar gnas mthun dgod// phyi rim rdo rje

rtse brgyad la// ming gi 'bru gsum dang por bri// gsod cing gnon dang 'phen pa yi// spu gri sa gsum rdzogs par dgod// mtsho gling bar khyams rwa dbus la// sdang dang gnod pa de bzhin bri// ming gi 'bru

gnyis srog dang sbyar// gang 'dod mtshams su de bzhin sbyar// 'bur nag gdug pa'i ha la'i mtshon// b+hi li khong 'dus khong dreg can// ya ma ka li'i karma tsa// kyo pa kaM pa gur pa sha/ yaM raM e dbus tsa ma ti/

ma ra ya yi sbyor ba'i mchog/ lto sbyor bcas la thod par gzhug/ sbyin sreg brnag pa'i 'og tu gzhug/ zhag gsum sngags bskul sbyor ba dril// ru sbal phag mos 'khrul 'khor bca'// thod pa rgya gram ru sbal
ltor// sbyor ba kun ldan klu la gtad// tshul gsum sbyor ba gong ma bzhin// sngags gyi rtsa ba dril la brdeg/ zhag gsum nyin gcig zhag gnyis// gsad dang gnan pa zor gyi dus// rig pa bde ba yang ma'i

klong// 'khrul 'khor dam pa 'di gzur bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las rtsa ba dang spu gri'i sngags 'di bton to// e dun he ka snying khrag ya ma tsa ma ra ya/ dgra bo'i srog ma ra ya myogs
rbad// sbyor ba gnyis po snga ma bzhin// yang gsang 'phrul gyi bcud bsdus pa// gsad pa la sogs sbyor ba'i mchog/ 'phrin las thugs ka'i 'khor lor bshad///// de nas yang bcom ldan

'das kyis seng ge'i khog gshig gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// byin can bde ba'i gsang gnas su// gsang ba mchog gi sbyor ba brtsam// b+hi la'i khong 'dus khong dreg can// ha la nag po tsa ma ri// be ta ta yis

'jig rten nas// ya ma rag sha'i bde klong du// sgyu ma'i phung po gnas sbyangs la// rin po che yi rgyal sa ru// thugs kyi bde ba gnyis med 'phang// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'dul khrims nyams pa'i gos

blangs la// rdo lcags zangs phye dug chu bsku// cha gnyis byas la thig gdab brtsam// zil gnan phyag rgya dbang gzugs sam// drag sngags dmod pa stong dang sbyar// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo la// nyi shu drug nas
'khrul 'khor bca'// dbus mas thog bskor bzhi ru bskor// dbus kyi gru gsum brda gnas su// sku yi gzugs brnyan ming bris la// zla kham gsum la bsrung ba'i lha// phyi rim bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i
sngags// yang logs khor yug rbod rbad gsad// bri dang phyi nang gong ma bzhin// mtha' ma'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// gsod cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// srid pa ru sbal lto na gnas// dug dang khrag gis

ngar blud la// rje'am yul srungs kyi thod par gzhug/ rtsang bcas dong du mthing nag dgab// dmigs med ngang las ye shes kyi// rol pa phyag rgya chen por 'phro// drag tu bskul zhing shugs kyis drang/ kha khyab
rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsdeb// dmod pa'i lus la spu gri bsdeb// ming rus ming byang khams la bcad// rgya mdud brtsegs pa'i lto ru mnan// yang na dkyil 'khor chen po yi// 'og tu bka' yi byin bsdus
la// rin po che yi lto ru gnan// bshags dang dge ba rgyun mi gcad// 'byung ba lnga yi mdangs bsdus la// rin po che yi rgyal sar brtan// rgyu yi snyigs ma srog bsdus la// dbus kyi 'bub gnas gzugs la
bstim// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung// nam mkha' dbyings kyi khongs su gzhug/ dmigs pa dag pa'i tshad ma gdon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi spu gri 'di bton to// gu ru

ni srog la myogs thum ril ma ra ya rbad// stam pa ya nan// bgrod pa med pa'i phyag rgyar brtan// seng ge khog pa gshig gi 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje rme 'thab kyi sbyor ba 'di
bshad do// yid mthun bde ba'i gnas rnams su// dur khrod gnas nas dpa' ba yi// zhing sogs ras dang rgyu blangs la// sbyor ba gsum dang ldan par bya// de las gcod pa'i 'khor lo bri// dbus thig skor
la lnga ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum zla kham bzhi// phyi rim 'khrul mig lcags mkhar bzhi// mtshams su zhing gi ka ba can// yang logs 'khrul mig lcags mkhar brgyad// mtshams la de bzhin
ka ba sbrul// bzhi pa 'khor yug bsrung ba'i gnas// mtha' dmigs 'khrul mig nyi shu la// gsod cing gnon pa'i spu gri gnas// dbus dang zla khams bsgrub bya'i gnas// bcu gnyis rtsa bar drag sngags
gnas// 'khor yug nang du bsnyen pa'i sngags// bar du rbad sngags gsad sngags mtha'// phyi ru mgo bstan brgya brgyas bskul// bsnyen pa khri yis bos la gzir// sngags ni me dbal 'khor lo

mtshon// 'khor lo me dbal mtshon chen gyis// zhing bcu sdig can sreg cing 'joms// 'khrul mig rtsa ba nyi shu gnyis// gtsang mdzod mun khang gnam lcags 'bar// ru sbal lto na mtshon cha me// 'od kyi gong

bus dme 'khrug byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las drag po'i spu gri 'di bton to// nri srog la dun rmugs sa ma ya myogs ma rA ya rbad// nri srog gzir stam pa ya nan// sngags
kyi 'od dang 'bar ba'i dbal// gdug pas rang gshed rang la 'bebs// mtshon cha ngar blud me la bdug khri bzhi'i sbyor ba dril la phang// thon nas rtsang bcas thod pa gnan// zil gnon phyag rgyas gzir
cing dbab// 'khor lo gnan la snga ma bzhin// rtsa ba gcig las yan lag 'byung// dam tshig mna' chu zer gsum mtha'// drag po'i sbyor ba yang yang brtsam// dme thab drag po'i 'khor lo bshad// de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stag mo kha 'thab kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// shog bu gru bzhi mdzub gang la// rme ba lnga yi thang pa bya// nir su yi thal ba yis// mtha' ma rgya dang skya bcad la// thig skor zlum po bzhi

ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum ming dang rus// zla kham srung ba'i lha dang gdon// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// mu khyud stong pa bod rbad gsad// rtsibs chen bcu bzhi spu gri gnas// myos pa'i stobs

dang dbral ba yi// drag po stobs kyi 'khrul 'khor yin// nag po'i ga'u mun pa'i gling// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las drag po'i spu gri 'di bton to// dgra bo mA ra ya rbad// mtshon cha'i
rgyal po 'khor lo can// gcod pas skam pa spu gri'i tshul// gzir ba stobs ldan bsam dpag dka'// ma lus kun 'joms sbyor ba'i mchog kha 'thab drag po'i 'khor lo bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan

'das kyis seng ge mche sbyor gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rgya shog cha gnyis gru bzhi la// smre ba lnga dang tsha ba bsku// mu khyud bzhi ldan ru sbal ltor// drag po gnas su brnag pa'i ming// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa
ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu drug spu gri'i gcod// phyi yi mu khyud sgrub pa'i sngags// bod rbad gsad pa nyis stong brgya// mu za'i khram thod sran mo'i sgrom// sbyor ba sngar bzhin gnan ba bya// de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las seng ge mche sbyor gyi spu gri 'di bton to// dgra bo'i srog la myogs mA ra ya rbad// lto gshag dbang chen pho brang bsam// seng ge mche sbyor gyi 'khor lor
bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan gyi pho nya rkang mgyogs slar bzlog pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gnyan ra gdug pa'i bde gnas su// rigs min gzhan gyis sbyor ba 'joms// gzir
bzlog drag pos gzhan dbang bskur// mu stegs can gyi lus srog dbral// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dred mo ral pa bsnyigs pa yis// zhabs mas 'khor lo'i rgyu byas la// sa dkar cung zi rus pa yis/ kha
dog phyung la 'khor lo bri// lnga ru bskor la dbus gru gsum// brnag pa'i gzugs bris spyi tshugs gzhag/ zla kham ming rus de ba bri// mu khyud sbrul gyi ra bas bskor// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i

sngags// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// srog la dug rmugs b+h+yo// srog la kham shag b+h+yo// srog la breng shag b+h+yo// srog la yam shag b+h+yo// rang sngags ming bcas bskor la bri// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug

la// gsod cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// sbyor ba thams cad snga ma bzhin// dag gig glan glen thod pa ru// sbyor ba dril la bdag dbang bsdu// sngags pa'i 'og tu gnan pa bya// pho nya bzlog pa'i 'khor lor
bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po nang 'thab kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rang sems dben pa'i gnas mchog tu// dam tshig srog gi mtshams bcad la// zhing ras pags shun khru gang la/ sbyor ba'i

rgyal po gsum sbyar la// mdog dang ldan par rgya bcad la// zhing gi srad bus thig gdab brtsam// thig bskor lnga ldan dbus drag po// phyi rim phyogs bzhir thig rkang gsum// thig mdud rgya gram 'khrul mig
bzhi// phyogs bzhi 'khrul mig bcu drug gcod// mtshams bzhir gsang mdzod drag po'i gnas// yang logs nyi shu rtsa ba'i mkhar// phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi bcu gnyis// lcags mkhar 'khrul mig brgya bcu

drug/ gsang mdzod mtshams bzhir dbus dang lnga// srid pa'i ru sbal lto na gnas// dbus dang mtshams bzhir bsgrub bya'i ming// dri ma dang ldan tshe srog sdud// phyogs bzhir 'khrul mig bcu drug la// thun
dang gsod pa'i spu gri gnas// yang logs 'khrul mig bcu drug la// gab pa'i 'bru bcu gcod dang bcas// de bzhin brgyan gyi bcu gsum la// gcod cing gnan pa'i spu gri ldan// lnga pa mtha' yi bcu bzhi
la// thun bzhi sngags kyi sbyor ba gnas// gang byed skabs dang sbyar la bzlas// dug chu myos pa bskul la bdug kha sbyar rgyus chen sngo dmar dam// sngags pa ra tsa'i thod pa ru// ru sbal rgya gram

ming rus sngags// rtsang bcas lha sgom dgod pa bzlas// thon nas zil gnon ye shes bsam// 'khor lo sbal pa phag mor gzhug/ sbyor ba dril la thig le la// ru bzhi rdo rje rgya gram gyi// tshul dang sbyar la
gnan pa bya// drag sngags nang 'thab kyi 'khor lo bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i sbyor ba de dag gcig tu dril pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// yang dag 'khor lo dam

pa 'di// shog bu rgyu la sme ba lngas// thang pa byas la kha dog dbyung// tshangs pa'i thig gnyis rgya gram gdab// ru thig gnyis te re mig skyong// thig skor mu khyud lnga dang ldan// dbus su gru gsum le tshe

brgyad// phyogs bzhir 'khrul mig gsum gsum drang// mtshams kyi gsang mdzod mun khang bzhi// gsum par las kyi rdo rje la// rgya gram sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan// bzhi pa mtshon cha bdun gnyis rtsibs// lnga

rigs bzhi ra bas bskor// 'khor lo'i dam pa 'di gzung bya// de la dgod pa'i 'bru rnams ni// dbus su gu ru'i phyag rgya sku// brjid pa'i tshul gyis skyil krung bzhag gzhan la gcer bu spyi tshugs rid// zla

kham ming rungs gsang mdzod bzhi// bsgrub bya 'chang ba spu gri'i mkhar// phyogs bzhi'i 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// 'og phyogs me rlung nam mkha'i 'bru// mjug mar bya khyung bdud mo dregs// g.yas su bdud

dang gshin rje khyung// las kyi rgyal po ma mo srin// 'bru gsum sbyor ba bcu gnyis 'bru// g.yas g.yon rnal ma de bzhin bzlog rgya gram bzhi yi snying po la// 'og phyogs srog phrog thams cad 'gugs// mjug
mar lha dang lus sreg 'byed// g.yas su gzan la dbab pa'i 'bru// g.yon gyi ra la gzir ba'i sngags// bod rbad gsang dang bsrung ba'i sngags// sgrub dang thun mong go rims sbyar// rtsibs la thams cad

gsad pa yi// yang gsang spu gri bcu gnyis mchog/ thams cad sbrul gyis bskor ba'i tshul// sbyor ba gzhan ma snga ma bzhin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las yang gsang mchog gi spu gri 'di

bton to// ya ma ta ra dun dun sarba tsit+ta breng shag ka dun rak+sha e ya srog la dun dun dza dza/ sarba tsit+ta ru thuM sbur nan/ gzer thun trig nan/ kha nan/ e ka dz+wa ri ya ma tsit+ta breng shag bra bi sha ya phaT/ ya ma tsit+ta/

dgra bo'i srog la dun rmugs thun b+h+yo yaM raM b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i srog la dun rmugs tsit+ta breng shag mA ra ya rbad/ lu ma 'khyil par rkang 'dom rer// phyogs bzhir thod pa khyung mchog dbus// ru bzhi rdo rje rgya gram
gyi// gnan pa mi shigs brtan pa'i mchog/ sbyor ba'i rgyal po dril bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis las dang nus pa thams cad bshig pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// brnag pa

stogs kyis las gshig pa// dregs pa stobs kyi lha rnams kyi// 'khrul 'khor drag po'i me rlung stobs// snying po me dpal stobs kyis 'joms// dmod pa'i mtshon cha 'di lta ste// dur khrod zhing ras shog bu

la// mu khyud rim pa bzhi dang ldan// rlung ri las kyi 'khrul 'khor la// dbus su gru gsum zla kham gsum// phyi rim lcags mkhar bang mig bzhi// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig brgyad// zhing gi ka bas matsams

brgyad 'degs// yang logs mtshon cha'i rtsibs bcu gnyis// las kyi me ri 'bar ba'i tshul// mtshon cha'i khang pa de dag la// gnas shing dgod pa 'di lta ste// dbus na brnag pa'i snying po ming// zla kham de

bzhin rdzogs par bri// lcags mkhar bzhi yi khang pa ru// srog dang las bdud bya khyung rdud// 'bru bzhi sbyor ba kun gyi mchog khang khyung lcags mkhar brgyad po la// gshin rje ma mo'i snying po gnyis// mkha'

lding dre sa btsan ma mo// ru sbal gshin rje'i snying po rdzogs// lcags mkhar bang mig re la dgod// mtshon cha'i khang pa bcu gnyis la// dug lnga'i sbyor ba gshig pa yi// drag po spu gri'i mtshon cha dgod// me lha
snying po spor ba dgod// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha me dbal sngags// sbyor ba'i rgyal po kun 'joms 'di// me rlung las kyi mtshon chas gcod// rdzas rnams kun la kha sbyar dril// dur mar bcug la re bas
gril// rtsang bcas gru gsum bskyed pa'i bstan// zhing lpags steng nas hom shing gzug lha bsgom sngags bzlas thun brab bsreg du ba'i rdzas la bdug cing brab// drag tu bskul cing yul la rbad// bdun nam

lnga ru nya stong brtsam// sbyor ba thon na 'khrul 'khor dril// tshes gcig dag dang bcu drug la// spobs pa med pa'i gnan pa bya// zhi khro phur pa gshin rje rnams// 'khor lo ru sbal thod chen gzhug dkyil 'khor
chen po'i 'og tu gnan// mkha' lding dregs pa klu rgyal rnams// 'khrul 'khor tshe bdag lto bar gzhug 'brong chen thod par ro khugs gnan// ma mo bdud mo srin mo rnams// 'khrul 'khor nyan thos thod par
gzhug bka' rten byin can 'og tu gnan// bdud dang mu stegs mgon po rnams// 'khrul 'khor g.yag ru g.yas par gzhug/ ro khang sgo srungs 'og tu gnan// rgyal po dge bsnyen dkor srungs rnams// sbyang
ku dar ma'i thod bar gzhug kyi tshang lam ka'i 'og tu gnan// btsan dang srog bdag dri bo rnams// sha ru sbyang thod gong gsum gnan// klu bdud ma bdud phug bdag rnams// bon po'i thod par lha khang
gnan// the rang chags 'gong shing ngog rnams// glang rur bcug la lam mdir gnan// sa bdag klu gnyan mdze 'dre rnams// 'khor lo phag mo'i thod par gzhug phag thod bka' rten 'og tu
gnan// bon po rigs gnyis 'dzin pa rnams// khyi thod bcug la kyi tshang gnan// sri gcan chu thod them 'og gnan// rigs 'dzin sbyor ba bdag dbang bsdu// sa gzhi'i sbyor ba gnan pa'o// bar snang ming
bcas mchod rten gnan// nam mkha'i bsam gtan mchog gi las// 'khrul 'khor me rlung skyin dang mtshan// drag po gshig pa'i las mthar sbyar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las drag po

gshig pa'i spu gri 'di bton to// sarba rtsa sbur srog nan// snying gzer breng shag yaM rbad// las kyi rgyal po kun 'joms 'di// 'khrug byed tsit+ta'i las yin pas// drag po gshig pa'i sbyor bar bshad// de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// drag po nye bar sbyor ba ru// gab pa thugs kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// rten pa shog bu grub bzhi la// cha gnyis dur khrod sme bas
byug ru sbal lto bar thig skor bzhi// bskor la dbus su gru gsum la// zla kham sbrul gyi ra bas gtams// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi// thod khar rdo rje ka ba me// phyi rim 'khrul mig lcags mkhar
brgyad// yang logs rtsa sbubs nyi shu gcig gdug pa sreg byed ye shes me// 'od kyi gong bur gnas pa 'phro// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// gru gsum dbus na snying po gsum// gang gnod ming dang bcas la

dgod// zla kham gsum la gang gnod ming// lcags mkhar brgyad dang thod mkhar bzhi// rtsa ba'i yig 'bru bcu gnyis dgod// rtsa sbubs nyi shu rtsa gcig la// snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig dgod// drag sngags

'khrul 'khor me dbal mtshon// 'khor lo mtshon chen me dbal sngags// drag po sngags dgod gdug pa'i mtshon// thog chen dril 'phreng drag po'i stobs// nam mkha'i rin chen rgya mtsho sa// mtshon cha kha sbyar

dug chu ngar// sngo dmar dang bcas phag mo'i ltor// dug khrag bskus la thod par gzhug mi rkang sgyed dbu lcags khris 'degs// gsal gsum dang ldan gsum stong bskul// nya stong me ra gyi ngo la sbyar// tha
chungs bzhi la rab tu brtag zhag gsum shin tu gnod par bca'// de nyid dong gzhug thod par gnan// mi ldog gyad dang dregs pa bsgom// thod mkhar steng du gdug pa'i rtsang// nyi shu gcig pus mchog phur

bstan// gang gnod gzugs blang snying khar brdeg/ rgyun du drag sngags brgya brgyas bsrung// yag sha b+hi la'i sbyor tshul can// snying po ngang dang shugs kyis drang// dug snga brkam chags rtsa ba gcod// ha la nag
po'i zhen chags 'brel// gdug pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags kyi rgyal po kun 'joms 'di// drag la dril zhing sgra spangs la// dgra ni gtum zhing lci bar bshad// drag po gtum chen dregs

pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig gi spu gri 'di bton to// sa nA ga snying gzer dza/ sa nA ga snying gzer dug phyung/

sa nA ga snying gzer dug tsit+ta rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer thun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer dun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer yaM rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer ri thun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la rbad/ sa nA ga snying

gzer myogs rbad/ sa nA' ga snying thum ril rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer du ra rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer nan 'drir rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer breng bshag rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer khas rbad/ sa nA ga snying

gzer thibs rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ 'am si ra la/ rang gcod sbyar ba'i rgyal po ste// snying gzer dgu yi 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dz+wa la drag po bsrung ba'i rgyal

po 'di bshad do// klu gnyan sa bdag zhugs pa yi// ya nga ba yi nad dar na// dmod pa drag po'i snying po bca'// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rgya shog rgyu la lto sbyar bri// dbus nas thig skor bzhi ru
bskor// dbus su drag po 'bub gnas bzhi// ma mo rgyal po mdze tri can// rtse yi 'bub gnas gsum la bri// sa dang nA ga dbus su bri// zla kham gang gnod ming rnams bri// phyogs bzhi rtsa ba'i 'phrul mig
ni// lcags mkhar gsum gsum rgya gram la// rtsa ba'i drag po'i lus dang ldan// mtshams kyi gsang mdzod mun khang bzhir// gdug pa gsum gyi gzugs bris la// lus srog 'phrog pa'i 'bru dgu bri// mu khyud
gsum par gdug pa'i gzugs// mtha' ma phyi yi mu khyud la// 'khrul mig rtsa sbubs bcu gcig gnas// dmigs pas bkug cing mtshams su gzir// shi khrag drag sngags bcu gcig gnas// ru sbal rtsa ba'i
'khor lo ni// yon tan 'brel sgrib sna tshogs 'byung// dug dang tsha ba rdzas bsres la/ kha sbyor bdug cing thod pa bca'// dkyil 'khor dbus su rtsang bcas gzhug/ phyag rgya zil gnon skur bsams
la// dmod pa nyin mtshan brgya brgya bzlas// 'khor lo thod pa gdug cing brab// cha lugs bzlog pa bsnol khrag brdeg/ shi phrad bcu gcig srog lus kyi// dug gsum gnad dang zhen chags 'brel// gdug

rtsub zhen chags gzir cing gcod// yid kyi dbang po 'khrul ba'i yul// rka ma chags rgyun gyis srog phrogs la// gsang mdzod mu khyud gzugs la sdud// me rlung stobs kyis khrug cing sdud// rkyen min sbyor ba'i
stobs dpag gis// srid pa'i khyams khang lto ru 'chang// mngag gnad mda' yi sbyor ba yin// mgo gcig gdong lce gnyis pa'i tshul// rgyud gcig dngas snyigs sngags kyis 'byed// yang gsang

mchog gi snying po bcud// drag po me dbal stobs dpag med// sbyor ba phag thod steng dang 'og rdo rje rgyal po'i bzlas pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs las yang gsang mchog gi sngags 'di

bton to// sa nA ga srog breng deng dun dun thuM ril nA ga dza// sa nA ga srog la breng breng dza dza thuM ril shag sa nA ga srog la dun dun thuM ril shag sa nA ga tsit+ta thuM ril shag sa nA ga rtsa li rbad thuM ril shag sa nA ga

duM ling kas thuM ril shag sa nA ga srog la hur thum ril shag sa nA ga tsit+ta la thuM ril shag sa nA ga snying gzer rbur nan thuM ril shag du me ma ma srog gzir thuM ril shag tsa ti thul gzer nan thuM ril shag ro ni
tri yaM shig nan gzir thuM ril shag drag sngags me dbal 'khor lo mtshon// 'khor lo me dpal mtshon chen gyis// sbyor ba gcod cing gdug rtsub bsreg bdag skyob gzhan bsrung bstan pa'i lus// ya ma ka
la'i dregs pa yi// ha mo gnon po'i be ga ta// 'di min sbyor bas rang 'ching yin// drag po snying gzer bcu gcig gi/ yang gsang thugs kyi 'khor lo bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin sreg drag po
sa'i 'khor los gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gsang chen sngags kyi rtsa ba ru// 'khor lo sbyin sreg lto bsdebs nas// gsod dang 'bigs la sogs pa'i las// bsrung dang skyob pa kun byed yin// thabs
rnams ldan dang mi ldan las// bya ba kun 'grub brlag par 'gyur// 'di dag bde dang smin pa'i las// gsang chen 'khrul gyi 'khor lo 'di// 'byed cing bsnyad pa'i rim pa ni// gnyan ra gdug pa'i bde

gnas su// dang po shes ldan smin byed pa'i// 'khrul 'khor rim pa 'di lta ste// rgyu la rdzas kyi thang ba bya// bar snang 'khor lo las kun byed// thig skor gsum ldan ru sbal ltor// dbus su gru gsum mu khyud
ser// zla kham dmar po gru gsum gnag phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// snying po 'khrul mig gsum ldan gnas// rtsa ba'i drag sngags kun gyi lus// ya logs rdo rje'i rwa brgyad la// de bzhin 'khrul mig
gnyis gnyis ldan// gsod cing gnon pa'i spu gri gnas// mtshams dang zla kham dbus rnams su// don gnyis bsdus la ming sogs bris// rdzas dang kha sbyar nam mkha' bzhag las kyi rgyal po'i 'khrul 'khor
yin// phung sa la sogs stegs bu la// khrag dang dug gi byi dor bya// bam gyi srad dbus lnga ru bskor// drag po zla kham sum brtsegs dbus// dmar dang dkar dang nag po la// rtsang dang thod pa de bzhin
me// mthing nag ling ga hom si shing dbus// phyi rim rgya gram phur pa ming// yang logs rtsibs la rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi rim thod 'phreng me ri mtha'// dmar dang ljang dang nag po rims// de dag

ru sbal lto bar bri// dug gi khrag gi rme ba can// sha sna tshil sna mar khu 'chang// nyungs kar nyungs nag til shangs skye// lcags rdo zangs dang ling ga ming// thun brab bskul la bstab cing bsreg drag sngags
bcu yis mtshon brdeg brtan// rgya gram rwa yi 'dab brgyad du// bsreg pa'i spu gri gzugs rnams dgod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las drag po lto sbyar gyi sngags 'di bton to// nri ti

rbad// dgra bo'i srog la dun rmugs dza// tsit+ta hur thums dz+wa la ram// dgra bo'i srog la breng shag rbad// 'khor lo thod pa ling ka gnan// snying po 'phrul gyi rtsa bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis dregs pa chen po rnams las sna tshogs la bskul ba 'di bton to// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// drag po e yi gzhal yas nas// klu 'bum gnyan khri sa bdag stong gi gdan// phyogs skyong ma hes

brdzis pa'i khri// thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan stengs na// dug lnga rkam chags 'joms pa'i lha// srog sdud tshe bdag nag po ni// gtum chen dus mtha' bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// sku mdog nag po dug
chen bsgyil ba 'dra// sku yang che la rngam chen dregs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar klu brgyad zhal du gsol// g.yon dmar gnyan khri klu 'bum gsol// dbus kyi mthing

nag rngam pa yis// sku dgrar 'ongs pa'i las ngan dang// sa bdag sde brgyad lha srin gyi// dbang po lnga dang tsit+ta gsol// phyag drug mtshon cha 'bar ba yis// zhe sdang klu gnyan sa bdag dang// dgra bgegs

mgo lus tsal bar gshog/ sku la dur khrod rgyan cha dang// klu chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas// do shal snying gi 'phreng bas brgyan// dbu la bdud dang srin po dang// btsan dang mu stegs rgyal po yi// mgo

bcad thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rgyal rigs gnyan gyi grong khyer brgyan// rje rigs mgur chu tshangs skud brgyan// bram ze rigs kyi phyag gdung bya// dmangs rigs zhabs gdub lhu tshigs brgyan// rigs

na gdol pa zhabs 'og bting// ba su rigs drug zas su za// mche ba rgyu ring rtsang phur gtams// spyan nas dug gi tsha tsha 'phro// dbu skra sma ra ba sbu las// gdug rtsub dmar nag me chen 'bar// dam nyams

dgra bo sdig can dang// gdug pa'i klu gnyan sa bdag bsreg/ gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin mngon du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba chom// lus srog dbang po rten dang phrol// g.yon
gyi phyogs nas yum cig la// bdud mo gsod byed rgyal mo ni// sku mdog mthing nag brjid pa la// dbu la sbrul nag ral pas gtibs// ral pa'i za ru re re las// gser dang mu tig rgyan

'phyang ma// gdol ba'i klu dang thod pa yis// dbu dang phyag gdub lhu tshigs brgyan// zhal nas mi ro rta ro 'brul// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu lu lu// shangs nas rlung nag tshub ma 'khyil// g.yas pas dgra bo'i

snying phyung rbad// g.yon bas rba glong snying khrag stob// drag tu bskul zhing rbad pa'i tshe// ma mo ki kang dgra la 'bebs// mo gdon 'bum sde gzir zhing 'joms// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang

yin myur du sgrol// tshe bdag thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// thugs kyi sbrul pa mngon phyung ba// gsod byed ya ma rA tsa ni// sku mdog smug nag 'jigs tshul can// rngam zhing dregs pas dgra bgegs 'dul// rna

ba'i grong khyer sbrul gyis brgyan// tshangs pa'i mgo can do shal byas// bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po yi// tsit+ta'i 'phreng bas rgyan du spras// g.yas pa 'khor lo rtsibs bcu bsnams// nyams pa kun gyi mgo lus

gshog/ g.yon pas tsit+ta bton nas bsnams// ngam zhing dregs pa'i cha byad kyis// sde brgyad kun gyi sbyor ba 'joms// bskul zhing drag tu rbad tsam na// bdud dang rgyal po don snying 'byin// btsan dang sa
bdag dbang po 'joms// dug lnga 'dul bar bskul tsam na// sa bdag klu gnyan gzir zhing sreg gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin mngon du sgrol// ya ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor

nas// thugs kyi sprul pa sngon phyung ba// dregs pa chen po rngam pa'i sku// sku mdog ljang nag brjid pa ni// 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa'i rtags// zhal gcig rngam zhing 'tshims pa ni// dregs pa can dang
gnod sbyin kun// srog dang phral nas gsol ba'i rtags// tshams dang mche ba gtsigs pa ni// klu brgyad zas su za ba'i rtags// zhal gcig skan sgra 'debs pa ni// gnyan dang sa bdag klu bdud
kun// dbang po bsdus nas gsol ba'i rtags// tshems dang mche ba'i bar bar nas// gdug pa'i sbrul dang mi ro 'brul// snyan cha mgur chu gdub sor kun// sbrul dang rin po che yis brgyan// shangs kyi rlung
sgras klu srin 'thor// dbu la rin chen 'bar bas brgyan// g.yas pa gser gyi rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa ni// sdang dgra gnod bgegs mgo lus gshog pa'i rtags// g.yon pas tsit+ta'i 'phreng ba bsnams pa
ni// dbang chen dregs pa bran du 'khol ba'i rtags// zhabs gnyis bsnol nas 'gying stabs bzhugs pa ni// klu gnyan 'bum sde gdan du bting ba'i rtags// zhal gdangs mche bar rab tu gtsigs pa
ni// dug gsum skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad pa ni// 'dod chags chen pos gdug pa 'dzin pa'i rtags// gang la bya ba dregs pa khyod shes

kyis// dmigs pa gang yin mngon du sgrol las shog/ dregs pa chen po'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// thugs kyi sprul pa mngon phyung ba// ru sbal rngam pa'i mi zan ni// chags sdang lnga yi rtsa ba gcod// 'byung

ba lnga yi 'bras bu skyems// lus srog gnyis kyi rtsa mdangs 'brel// skye ba med pa'i khams la sdud// dwangs ma bkrag gi snying po 'chang// thugs kyi gsang mdzad 'bar ba ru// bkrags mdangs bcud kyi snying
po chongs// dkon mchog dbu 'phangs dmod pa dang// rgyal ba'i bka' dam gcod pa dang// sdang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs// sku dgrar 'os pa ma lus kyang// gshed kyi gsang mdzod 'bar bar
chug/ rtag tu 'khyams pa'i gnas su 'chongs// rtsa bzhi sngags kyi stobs kyis gzir// dmod pa drag po'i mtshon chas gcod// yan lag lnga dang gsang ba las// mchod rten drug gis dgra bgegs

gnon// dgra bgegs las ngan gdug pa rnams// spu gri'i gnas nas sho ra re// tshe bdag nag po'i spyi gtsug nas// gser gyi bya khyung ga ru Da// bya khyung rgyal po dam tshig can// bya khyung rgyal po mthu po
che// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gshog rtsa yis// klu gnyan sa bdag mgo lus gshogs// ral gri 'bar ba'i gshog pa yis// gdug pa gsum gyi sbyor ba gcod// spu gri 'bar ba'i thed gshog gis// dgra bo
nyams pa'i srog dbugs phrol// ye shes 'bar ba'i gshog zer gyis// nyon mongs dug gsum rtsad nas sreg/ spu bran spu gri dpal chen gyis// nyams pa kun gyi srog rtsa gcod// spyan gnyis nyi zlar sgyil pa
yis// zhe sdang klu mtsho gting nas skems// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i sder mo yis// klu gnyan sa bdag drangs kyin gsol// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i rdo rje mchus// sa bdag klu bdud klu srin gsol// khyung gi
gshog pa brdabs pa yis// gdug pa'i gnas khang rmang nas gshig khyung chen rngam pa'i nga ro yis// klu gnyan sa bdag zil gyis gnon// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin mngon du

sgrol// yang sprul dug gi khyung chen gyi// mtshon cha 'bar ba'i gshog pa yis// gdug pa'i rkam chags gcod cing za// gdug pa 'dul ba'i las ngo long// stag dang seng ge rngam pa yis// nyams pa'i sha khrag

drod las rol// zhe sdang dug sbrul nag po yis/ kha nas me 'bar dug lnga sreg dgra bo mkhar gyi rmang nas gshig dug sbrul nag po lus srog 'brel// dregs pa can rnams dgra la b+h+yo// de nas yang bcom ldan
'das kyis dregs pa chen po'i 'khor srog gshed kyi mon pa bzhi las sna tshogs las bskul ba 'di gsungs so// yab cig tshe bdag nag po thugs kyi sbrul pa ni// shar gyi phyogs nas bla rku

ba// dug gi mon pa rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// sku stod zhing gi g.yang gzhi thod pa 'bum gyis brgyan// sku smad stags gi sham bu mu tig chun gyis brgyan// sbrul nag gdug pa sku yi rgyan du byas// snying dang thod pa'i
'phreng bas do shal dregs pas brgyan// zhal nas dug gi rlangs pa nad thun sprin ltar gtibs// shangs nas dug gi tshub mas stong khams phyags mas 'debs// snyan nas rngam pa'i 'brug sgras zhing bcu zil
gyis gnon// phyag g.yon lcags kyu zhags pa 'khrigs pa yis// gang la dmigs pa'i dgra bgegs bla yang 'gugs// phyag g.yas shel gyi rdo rjes mgo lus gshog mon pa chen po drag tu bskul tsam
na// chibs su seng ge chibs nas dgra bgegs tshe srog sdud// g.yas na gshog pa can gyi pho nya srog la lding zhing 'debs// g.yon nas gcan gzan gdug pa'i pho nya rngam zhing rol// stod nas me 'bar bla

mtsho gting nas skems// smad nas khrag 'dzag dal gyi bu yug glog dug gi mon pa sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// mon pa nag po sku yi g.yon phyogs na// dug gi mon pa bla rkun rngam pa'i gdong// sku la dar nag ber

chen sbrul gyis brgyan pa gsol// dbu la dug sbrul cod pan khrag gi za ru can// zhal nas gdug pa'isbrul dang mi ro rta ro 'brul// spyan nas dug dang khrag gi rba glong chi li li// g.yas pas snying 'byin yab kyi
sku la 'khyud// g.yon pa dug zor dug mda' dgra la 'phen// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa ni// dug gi mon pa gcer bu 'bum// dug mda' lcags gzer dgra bgegs snying la thob// spyi gtsug dug

gi bya khyung ga ru Da// rdo rje gshog pas dug gi me lce 'bar// rdo rje mchu dang sder mos klu gnyan drangs shing za// klu nad mdze shu dkar ru gcogs shing skyems// rdo rje rigs kyi sprul pa sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// lho
yi phyogs nas dgra bo'i bla 'gugs pa// lcags kyi mon pa nag po rngam pa'i gdong// sku stod lcags kyi zhun khrab thod pas brgyan pa gsol// sku smad stag sham g.yu yi dril bus brgyan pa gsol// dbu ral

nag po nam mkha'i sprin ltar gtibs// kha nas me 'bar khrag gi rgya mtsho skems// mche ba dgu ris dgra bo nang ril 'brab// spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig dgra la gzigs// g.yon pa rlung gi 'khor los dgra bo
lus srog 'byed// g.yas pas me yi 'khor los dgra bgegs rtsa rgyud sreg/ mon po nag po drag tu bskul tsam na// stags la zhon nas dgra yul phyags mas 'debs// me yi bskal pa stong zhing dgra bo'i bla
mtsho skems// zhal du sbrul dang mi ro za zhing rngam// mon pa nag po sku yi g.yon phyogs nas// mon pa nag po g.yu yi ral pa can// dgra bo bla sku yid la jag 'gyed ma// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zal
nas mi ro 'brul// sku la mthing nag sbrul gyis brgyan pa gsol// g.yas pas snying 'byin mon pa gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pas dug zor nag po sdang ba'i dgra la 'phen// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa
ni// lcags kyi mon pa nag po gsum// ri klung rgyug cing tshe bkrag sdud// lag na lcags mda' gzer chen dgra yi snying la 'debs// rngam pa'i nga ro stong gsum zil gyis gnon// gcer bu 'bum gyis dgra

bo sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po dbu yi spyi gtsug na// bya khyung rgyal po mtshon cha'i gshog pa can// rin chen cod pan me yi bskal pa gtong// zhe sdang klu mtsho gting nas skems shing 'thung// mchu dang sder mo
rin chen 'bar ba yis// klu gnyan sa bdag 'dzin cing zhal du gsol// khyung gi gshog pa brdabs nas 'od zer spros pa yis// klu nad mdze shu dkar rus gcod cing skyems// rin chen rigs kyi sprul pa sdang
ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// nub kyi phyogs nas sdang ba'i dgra 'gugs pa// bse yi mon pa gtum chen dregs pa can// sku stod bse khrab thod pas brgyan pa gsol// sku smad stag lpags sham bu pad+ma 'bum gyis

brgyan// dbu skra kham nag khrag gi gzar bu can// zhal nas khrag gi skyugs pas dgra bo khrag tu skyug/ spyan nas me 'bar dgra bo'i dug gsum sreg snyan nas stong gsum 'bru sgras zil gyis gnon// klu brgya'i
mgo bcad thod pas do shal byas// phyag g.yon sbrul zhags nag pos dgra bo'i yid nas 'gugs// phyag g.yas ral gris dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod// bse yi mon pa drag tu bskul tsam na// ban glang dmar po

zhon nas stong gsum phyags mas 'debs// khrag gi rgya mtsho rlobs cing khrag nad char ltar 'bebs// klu dang sa bdag 'bum sde zas su za// rngam pa'i nga ros stong gsum zil gyis gnan// sprul pa chen po rngam

zhing dgra bo 'dul// mon pa chen po sku yi g.yon phyogs na// mon mo tshe phrog khrag gi ral pa can// sku la rma bya'i 'jol ber gsol// pad+ma 'bum dang sbrul gyis brgyan// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zhal nas mi ro
'brul// g.yas pa sting 'byin mon pas yab la 'khyud// g.yon pas khrag mda' gzer chen dgra la 'debs// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa ni// bse yi mon pa gzer bu 'bum// khrag gi skyugs pa
dgra la spros// ral ba bse 'od me ltar 'bar// me yi bskal ba dgra la stong// khyed kyi lag pa g.yas g.yon nas// zangs mda' gzer chen dgra la 'debs// rngam pa'i nga ros stong gzugs zil gyis
gnon// gcer bu 'bum gyis dgra bgegs sgrol las shog/ mon pa chen po dbu yi spyi gtsug nas// bse yi bya khyung ral gri'i gshog pa can// zangs sder zangs mchus klu gnyan sa bdag

za// pad+ma stong gi spu bran me ltar 'bar// spyan nas khrag 'dzag klu gnyan sa bdag myos// pad+ma rigs kyi sprul pa dgra la b+h+yo// byang gi phyogs nas dgra bo'i bla 'gugs pa// mon pa rngam chen srid pa'i srog gshed

ni// ser nag mi bsrun dug gi kha rlangs 'phro// ral pa sbrul nag khrag gi zar bu can// spyan nas khrag 'dzag na bun char ltar 'bab// sku stod zhing sngags rgya gram stong gis brgyan// sku smad stag sham thod pa'i
cha ga can// bya dang gcan gzan gdug pa'i tshogs kyis bskor// phyag g.yon zhing gi zhags pas dgra bo gnas nas 'dren// g.yas pa rdo rje rgya gram dgra bgegs mgo lus gshog mon pa chen po drag tu
bskul tsam na// dred la zhon nas dgra bgegs phyags mas 'debs// kha nas me 'bar dgra yi dug gsum bsreg rngam pa'i nga ros dgra bgegs zil gyis gnon// mon pa chen po sku yi g.yon phyogs

nas// mon mo chen mo bla rkun snying la gzer 'debs ma// sbrul nag ral pa khrag gi zer bu can// sku la ljang nag ber chen thod pas brgyan pa gsol// zhal nas gdug pa'i sbrul dang mi ro rta ro 'brul// spyan
nas khrag 'dzag dug gi chu bo 'bab// snyan dang phyag zhabs sbrul nag 'bun gyis brgyan// g.yas pas snying 'byin mon pa yab la 'khyud// g.yon pas 'brong chen rwa zor dam nyams dgra la 'phen// yab yum
gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa ni// mon pa dgra bo bla dang phrol las shog mon pa ser nag gcer bu 'bum// lcags mda' gzer chen dgra la 'phen// rkang pa rgyug cing lag pa rje// tshe srog dbang po bkug cing

gsod// bla dang sprul pa phral zhing 'chang// dgra bo bla dang phrol las shog/ mon pa ser nag dbu yi spyi gtsug nas// gser gyi rgyal po bya khyung ga ru Da// rdo rje rgya gram gshog pa 'od zer 'phro// rgya gram mchu dang
sder mo lcags kyu yis// klu gnyan sa bdag drangs shing zas su za// gshog pa rgya gram las kyi rlung chen gyis// klu gnyan sa bdag klu bdud phyags mas 'debs// spyan gnyis nyi zlas sdang zhing bzlog pa

yis// klu nad mdze shu dkar ru gcogs shing skyems// khung gi rngam sgra skrom skrom drag tu bsgrags pa yis// klu gnyan sa bdag zil gyis gnon cing gzir// las kyi sbrul pa chen po sdang pa'i dgra la b+h+yo// kun
'dus rig pa'i pho brang nas// stobs chen dregs pa 'khor skyong rnams// sna tshogs las mthar sbyar ba dang// gshed kyi las gnyer bskor bar bshad// de nas sa yi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
btab pa// drag po sngags dgod dmod pa'i rgyal po yis// khyad par srung zhing bsam gtan chen po dang// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis phyag rgya chen po zil gyis gnon pa bshad pa'o// bdud kyi gsad dang dbab dang bdag bsrung dang// bcu dang srog dprog bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drag sngags bdun
du dril te bshad do// srog gcod bdud kyi sbyor ba ni// dur khrod gnan ra'i dben gnasasu// dpa' brtul sngags kyi dmod pa bca'// maN+Dal byi dor dug chu khrag gru gsum dur khrod rgya sol byug kha khyer

dmar po rtsang dang snying// rgyu rten khrag bcas ming dang gzugs// rog po'i rgyu la rten du bya// byang khram g.yas g.yon srog brag kha// dbang po lnga dang skye ru gdags// tshon skud dag bcas dbus su gzhug

mkha' lding gsum dang rgyu yi snying/// ban d+ha bdud rtsi steng du rdzas// gri lcags seng ldeng phur pa rtsang// yan lag rnam shes drod la dgab// nyungs kar dug sna khrag thun brdeg/ nag po ka li b+ha laM

bshos// gshin rje nag po'i cha lugs sgom// bka' sdod pho nya mdun na rngam// nyi shu rtsa gcig drag sngags bzlas// b+ha ling mchod mthar sbyor ba tsam// nyin mtshan pho mos phye la brdeg// rten la thun dbab

drag tu bskul// mtha' ru dus tshod drag sngags brdeg thun brab mtshon brdeg brnag pa bsgral// ling ga thod pa rgya gram gnan// pho nyas bkug la rten la bstim// rgyu de brnag pa'i khams su bya// tsha tsha dgu

lding thog ser dbab// thugs dam rgyu yis bstabs pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las drag sngags bdun pa 'di pho mo phye ste bton to// ga ro ni sha na sha rbad// tsa ro ba sho na shag

rbad// mu ga ga du na shag rbad// dzA la pho tra na shag rbad// 'dun 'bur tir na shag rbad// rag ti phug na shag rbad// wa ka sha ling na shag rbad// ma mA tsit+ta la thum rbad// ma mA rtsa thang thuM ling rbad// ma ma srog

la gzer thung rbad// ma mA dza la shag thuM rbad// ma mA srog la hur rbad// ma ma rtsa srog zer thums rbad// ma ma tsit+ta gzer thum rbad// drag sngags dmog pa'i thun phab na// dregs pa kun kyang myos shing
brgyal// brnag pa kun 'joms yul dang sprad// bstan pa'i rgyud la mtshon cha 'pho// thod pa la sogs ming dang sbyar// rgyu yi sbyor ba bdun par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags bdun pa'i

sbyor ba 'khrul 'khor 'di rgyas par bshad do// brnag pa bdud kyi 'khrul 'khor ni// dur khrod ras sam zhing ras la// rdzas kyi sbyor bas thang ba bya// phyogs mtshams mnyam la thig bdun gdab// de bzhin
dbus nas bdun du bskor// 'khrul 'khor rtse mor rdo rje'i 'gram// rtsa ba chu la ral gri'i gdung// lte ba gru gsum drag po'i gnas// 'khrul 'khor lcags mkhar lnga bcu la// dbus nas ming
rus gnag pa'i mda'// 'khrul mig pho mo drag po'i sngags// 'bru bdun mtha' nas dbus su dril// srog gcod pho mo lto bar bca'// dug dang tsha ba'i rdzas byugs la/ kha sbyar thod pa'i ga bur

bca'// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha drag sngags me// pho nya bskul zhing dbus su brnag nyin dang mtshan mo phye la bskor// mar gyi ngo la nyi shu gcig drag sngags sbyor ba gsum du brdeb// khrag dang du chus ngar blud

la// bla dang sbrul pa bkug cing bstim// thod pa bka' yi rten la gtad// drag sngags sbyor ba gong bzhin bsdab// 'pho ba med pa'i las 'di yang// srog gcod pho nya 'khor skyong ging// mtshon cha bdud kyi

'khor lor bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ya stig gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// mthing nag dbus su mon thod brnag rog gsum tsit+ta rtse mo gshag brnag pa'i ming byang shing la bri// zhing

ras drag sgags dug gis bru// tsit+ta'i phyi nang ldan parabya// thod par bcug la mthing nag dgab// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye khrag/ dug gi ngar blud thod pa thun// gshin rje'i stobs kyis lha bsgoms

la// gshin rje bdud dang mon pa rbad// bla kun drod dang sbyor la mngag bcu drug dbus gzugs stong la gdon// khri tsho bdun dang drag sngags gso// de dag tshes kyi dkar po la// ba ling dang bcas rak+ta
gsur// brnag pa'i gzugs la drag sngags mtshon// bla khugs nyams su lon na brdeg thun gyi mtshon cha rgya yis dbab// dril gtor rtags dang nams kyis blang// dur khrod rgyu ba'i sha za kun// dmod pa'i
las la rngam zhing gtod// snang snang sbyar na dmyal khams 'gro// dmod pa'i yang tig dug gis mtshon// cha yis sbyor na las rnams rdzogs// gshed bdag ka li dmod pa smin// 'bras bu rang nyams drod la

rtag/ ya dang ma yi ma ra brnag/ dug khrag 'o ma sngo sna ming// sbyor ba glang po thabs kyi rdzas// lcags phur sngags bkod dug gi ngar// drag po gzir la dbab pa'i rdzas// dur khrod rdzas ldan rgya shog la// thog
skor mu khyud zlum po lnga// dbus nas brtsams te rim par bskor// dbus su cha bsnyams thig gnyis gdab// zur thig btab pas 'khrul mig bzhi// phyi rim 'khrul mig brgyad du dbab// yang logs bcu

gnyis rtsibs dang ldan// de bzhin tha mar bcu drug rtsibs// de la gnas shong dgod pa ni// dbus su yul du ser bsrun lha// sbyor ba gzhom phyir ming rnams bri// 'khrul mig bzhi la dgod pa ni// ga sha ro ni

'byung ba bzhi// de yi phyi rim brgyad po la// tsa ra du mun rag ling dang// ma dang sha ko rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// phroM phroM shar shar da ling hril hril dz+wa ya// chu dril

khrag la bstim pa dgod// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug la// gzir zhing dbab pa'i gsang sngags te// phro shar hril b+h+yo// yaM phroM sha raM drag phob// nA ga snying gzer hril shar// kha sbyar thod pa gsum bcas

la// tha chungs dgun dpyid rtsa ba 'bum// chu dril tha chungs khri bdun sbyar// nya dang stong la rta ma gzhug lha rten klu rten rgya gram du// ston la gsum la dbab pa bri// chu dril stong gi spyi rgyug bya// bdud dang sprul
pa yul lha rbad// dang por zor dal gnyis pa thab// gsum pa gzir la las mtha' dbab// lo thog 'joms pa'i sbyor ba 'di// nag po bdud kyi 'khor lo bshad// rgyal mtshan me long rgyud las// yang
gsang mchog gi le'u ste brgya bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang gi gleng gzhi 'di bshad do// 'jam dpal thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dang po slob ma gzhug pa yi// rim pa lnga
dang ldan par bya// bkra shis nyams dga'i bde gnas su// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bcad nas// sa phyogs snums la bshol ba ru// grangs kyi tsha dam thob thob tu// gzo la bye ba 'khor la 'bum// sku

gsung thugs kyi bsnyen pa bya// khro bo'i dka' thub ldan byas la// gtor ma dang bcas mchod bstod bya// rnal 'byor nams pa tshogs kyis bskang// slob ma tshig dang tshogs kyis bshags// bkra shis dri ldan sa

sna la// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mdzes par bya// rgyan dang ldan pa'i lha rnams dgos// bum pa dung chen gling bzhi ru// bdud rtsi lnga yi chus bkang la// mthing nag ma nyams mgul pa dkri// dbugs ma chad pa'i

skra yis brgyan// nyi ma'i gdan la ma ston la// gtso bo yab yum phyag rgyar bskyed// lhag pa'i bzlas pa 'bum du bya// rin chen bum pa lha yi grangs// mnyams mdzes pas brgyan la bzhag/ lcang lo mdzes pa'i

bum pa ru// bdud rtsi zhun ma snum gyis dgang// hU~M rgyas gdab la dar gyis bcad// bcu bdun mtha' ru sing+hi dang// mtshams su brgya brgya spa ra nas// spel zhing byin rlabs brtan par bya// rig pa'i thugs kyi

snying po 'bum// bum pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa dang// dbu rgyan la sogs byin ldan bya// chu srin stag dang seng ge dom// bya rgod khyung khra 'ug pa bsnol// dregs pa'i khro chu 'bum dang bcas// de nas dbang gi stegs
bu tsam// lho phyogs gshin rje'i 'jug go'u// gru bzhi khru gang dbus su zlum// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser dang ldan// sa gzhi dmar po 'dab brgyad dkar// me tog mthing nag chu yis bkru// mtshams gcad
brda phyag gsol ba gdab// spro ba bskyed de slob ma gzhug lung bstan dam tshig sdom pa dbog bya ba sngon 'gro kun rdzogs nas// hU~M gis gshon rje'i sras su bskyes// dbang stegs 'khor lo

gdan la bzhag/ snying kha nyi zla'i rdo rje gzhug lus la bsrung ba'i phyag rgya dgod// de nas bum pa'i bya ba brtsam// khyad par bum pas bdag dbang blang// rigs kyis de bzhin slob ma la// ye shes chu yis

khrus nas dbyung// dag pa'i 'bras bu phyag rgya'i sku// rin chen 'bru lnga nyi zla'i gdan// 'bras bu gshed bzhi gtso bo'i sku// spro ba bskyed la bstan pa sbyin// sbrul dang thod 'phreng gdengs kar ldan// thabs dang
shes rab phyag rgya sbyin// sbyor ba du ma'i bcas gzhi bstan/ khams gsum bdag por dbang bskur la// dbugs dbyung gzengs bstod lung bstan bya// me tog blangs la gsang mtshan bsgrags// phyag rgya

bkrol la mna' chu blud// dam tshig bsgrags la gtags pa bya// sangs rgyas thugs kyi bcud bsdus la// khro bo brtul zhugs rdo rje sbyin// thun mong bcas pa'i las skal bsgo// thun mong bsgrub pa'i bca' bzhi
bstan// gsang ba bsgrags na snying mgo 'gas// tshogs dang sbyor ba'i longs spyod dgye// dkyil 'khor lha bcas lus la bstim// nus pa thun mong dbang du bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dur khrod

rgyan gyi dbang gi don bshad do// dur khrod gsug pa'i sa phyogs su// khro bo rtags kyi bsnyen pa brtsam// dur khrod gdug pa'i sa rnams la// yi dwags chen po bsnol ba yi// mthing nag zla kham dkyil 'khor

bri// gtor ma gsum dang rak+ta bsham// zhing chen rgyan dang keng rus 'phan// dung rnga gling bu lhu gdum gsur// rgyan dang mchod pa'i rten bshams la// dbus su ru tra pho mo'i gdan// zla kham srin po mgo

bsnol gdan// rtsibs la mu stegs zhing rkyen brtsegs// sgo dang gru chad yi dwags ro// mgo dang lhug gtum phyi khyams rkang// dbus su ma he brgyad gling gdan// thabs dang shes rab pad+mas mdzes// gzhan du

nyi ma'i gdan dang ldan// dbus su khro bo gshin rje'i sku// dbu gsum mdzes pa'i phyag drug can// ral pa che ba spyan rtsa dmar// yum dang gnyis su med par rtag/ yab yum gnyis kyi byin brlabs las// 'phro

du phro chung nyi ma'i zer// thugs kar 'od kyi gong bu gzhug/ gsang lam b+ha ga'i gnas su 'khyil// gdan la phyag rgya gsal ba'i sku// gshed bzhi phyogs skyong sgo srungs 'khor// rang rang smin nas mtshan mar
gsal// rgyan dang phyag mtshan sku mdog dmar// kun kyang 'od kyi gong bu spro// dbang stegs gru gsum mthing nag la/ ma he bsnol ba'i gzugs bris la// slob ma bdud rtsi'i khrus mas gdon// 'jug pa'i
rim pa rdzogs pa dang// dngos grub bskul bas las la 'jug/ rdzas rnams hU~M bcas byin gyis brlabs// dam bcas dam tshig lta ba srog/ phyag rgya sbyor ba nus pa bskyed// rang sems brtan
pas sangs rgyas sku// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzas las 'byung// slob ma zhal drug bcu gnyis phyag/ yum dang bcas pa'i skur bsgoms la// dbang gi gnas su stan du bzhag/ a dang bru gyi sa bon

las// dbu la thod pa'i gzhal yas khang// gdan dang bcas pa lnga bskyed la// gnam sgo dbus su nyi ma'i gdan// steng du khrag 'thung lnga yi sku// dbu la de bzhin khro bos brgyan// lce la nyi ma'i gdan stengs

su// pad+ma khrag 'thung he ru ka/ thugs kar nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// 'jam dpal rnon po mtshon gang ba// ya man ta ka sku la thim// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang du spyad// dug lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang// be con

rtags kyi phyag rgya sbyin// sku gsung thugs gsum bsrung ba'i dbang/ kha T+wAM ka yi rtse gsum sbyin// nyon mongs ye shes rang gnas dbang// shes rab chen po'i ral gri sbyin// thugs rje'i dbyings su sgrol

ba'i dbang// sbyin pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o// 'khor pa dbyings su gcod pa'i dbang// dgra sta'i phyag mtshan 'debs pa'i tshul// nyon mongs rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang// lcags kyus mtshan pa'i phyag mtshan
no// 'khor ba chos skur 'khor los grol ba'i dbang// ba dan 'khor ba ye shes lhug par gsal ba'i dbang// zhags pas 'khor ba dbyings su 'dren pa'i dbang// sti ra'i dbyug pas dug lnga gnas su
'joms pa'i dbang// sdogs mdzub gdug pa pho mo zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang// mda' gzhus 'khor ba mda' yis sgrol ba'i dbang// mdung gi 'khor ba'i ye shes gnyug mar 'bigs pa'i dbang// phyag

mtshan bcu gnyis sgrol ba'i dbang du bshad// dur khrod chas kyis 'khor ba chos nyid du// skye shi med pa'i don gyis khyab pa'i dbang du bshad// skam rlon tshar bu'i thod pa yis// sku gsung don dang ldan pa'i
dbang du bshad// rigs bzhi sbrul gyi rgyan cha yis// thogs pa med par gnyen po slob pa'i dbang du bshad// g.yang gzhis bdud dang mu stegs 'dul pa'i dbang du bshad// gti mug sel ba'i ko rlon
dang// phrag dog stag gi sham bu dag rdo rje gshog pas thabs dang shes rab rtogs// me 'od 'bar bas dug gsum gtan nas bsregs// khro bo dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang du bshad// zhing gi khog pas phyi nang
gsang ba yi// dur khrod gzhal yas mtshon pa'o dbang du bshad// ro dang sregs pa dbang can 'dul pa'i rtags// ma hes chos nyid g.yo ba med pa'i rtags// nyi zla thabs dang shes rab thig ler shar ba'i
rtags// thabs 'og gdan gyi yon tan dbang du bshad// bdag pos phyag rgya bstan pa'i dbang/ khams gsum sgrol bas dbang can bran du 'khor// nan bshad sgom pa'i dbang bskur bas// re
dogs gnyis kyis mtha' bsal nas// 'das dang ma 'das kun gyi rje// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub bstan// thogs pa med pa'i dbang du bshad// 'phrin las rnam pa'i dbang bskur bas// rtsa ba bzhi dang
las phrag brgyad// yan lag nyis brgya stong bcu drug sbyor ba gsum dang las mchog gsum// las rnams thogs pa med par bshad// dam rdzas bzhi yis dbang bskur bas// dregs pa pho mos mtshan 'dres
nas// bsad pa'i las ma myur bar bshad// thabs dang shes rab dbang bskur bas/// yab yum gnyis su med pa yi// snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku// gang 'dod dngos grub myur bar bshad// byang chub
sems kyis dbang bskur bas// 'khor ba chos skur ro mnyam nas// ye shes 'khor lo brtan par bshad// sta spyod 'brel ba'i dbang bskur bas// rig pa rang la shar bar bshad// lus sems gnyis la

dbang bskur bas// las kyi gshin rje pho mo dang// pho nya bran g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// las la nye ba'i dbang du bshad// dam tshig mna' yi snying po sbyin// thun mong phyi yi sbyor ba bstan// gcod

pa'i rdzas kyi 'khor lo bca'// thun drag mtha' ru sbyin sreg gnan// phyi dang nang gi sgrub pa brtsam// dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang du bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi dbang gi sbyor ba 'di bshad
do// shin tu dben pa'i dur khrod du// 'du 'dzi dben pa'i sa rtags la// ting 'dzin bstan pa'i lha mo dang// rig pa'i rgyal po gnyis sbyar la// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yis// lus dang yan lag bsangs
la dgram// gsum pas slob mas khrus nas gdon// bum pa gsum dang longs spyod dgram// thabs dang shes rab rdzas su bstan// yol bas gcad la slob mas drang// dang por rdzas kyi bum pa ni// bkra shis
mtshan ldan bum pa ru// bdud rtsi chu dang nyi zlas dgang// thugs kyi snying pos byin gyis brlabs// bdud rtsi chu dang bum pas bkra// mgo la gshed bzhi'i bdag po bsgom// bkra shis rdzas kyi bum par
bshad// thabs kyi bum pa bde chen sku// 'khor lo drug gi rim rgyud la// byang chub bdud rtsi lam du drangs// thugs khar lha yi 'khor lo rtags// bde chen gnas nas mchod rgyun dbab// lus dang lha yi

dkyil 'khor la// slob ma phyi yi 'jug pa brtsam// sems kyi dkyil 'khor kha phye la// 'khor lo rim gyis gso zhing rgyud// rdo rje gsang ba'i lam du drang// oM gyis bde ba'i lam du bsgyil// rdo rje slob ma'i
lus nyid la// bdud rtsi bsangs la dbang bskur bya// lce yi pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam// ge sar 'dren pa'i dza bsams la// bung ba me tog tshul du'o// nang gi rang rgyud 'khor lor bstan// ye
shes bsnyen pa'i 'khor lo brtag/ bde chen nang gi bum par bshad// phyag rgya ma yi gsar ba la// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan par brtag/ gzungs ma gtsang ma'i chus bkrus la// me tog bkram pa'i maN+Dal

du// spro ba bskyed la gsang mtshan bsgrags// b+ha ga'i dbus su 'dab brgyad bskyed// pho brang lte bar gtso bo dgod// 'dab brgyad mdzes pa'i lha mor brtag/ rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor la// 'khor lo mi rgyud rtsa
lam drang// bdag dang lha ru mnyam sbyar la// mi dmigs bde ba'i ro mnyam bsgyil// thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis// yab yum mnyes pa'i mchod rgyun 'khyil// bde ba chen po'i 'od du gnas// thabs kyi
srin lag spu gu nas// slob ma'i rtse la sems 'jog pa// nang gi bum dbang rdzogs pa yis// gzungs ma lha dang slob ma la// tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'byor ba 'bul// 'khor lo sems kyi rgyal po
brten// shes rab bum pa'i dbang du bshad// bum pa gsum gyi brda brtan pas// mchog gi sbyor ba gsum dang ldan// rgyan mtshan me long gi rgyud las// thun mong gi dbang ba'i le'u ste brgya bcu bdun
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i dbang 'di bshad do// dgon pa chen po'i dben gnas su// 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun bshams nas// slob ma dbang gzhan rdzogs pa
la// thabs mchog bde ba chen po yis// yum gyi pad+mo bde phab la// shes rab gsang mchog dam pa yis// ye shes bskyed pa'i dbang bskur bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ de la 'jug

pa'i las tsam bya// rig ma sbyang dang sems bskyed tsam// phyag rgya ma yi brda bstan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis nyi shu'i bar// lhan cig skyes dang grogs mo dang// sman mo bu mos bya ba min// sems sbyang dag la

sngags ngo shes// gsang thub bkra shis dal 'byor ldan// ut+pal ljon shing kha dog dbyibs// bde chen phyag rgya ma yi mchog/ lha yi lung bstan zhing skyed ma// sngags kyi byin brlabs byas pa ni// gshin rje sras
kyi gzungs mar bstan// lha dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// dang por bde chen rdzogs pa yi// tshul du dbang gi sbyor ba bya// sbas pa'i 'khor lo gnyis brtags la// rtsa ba'i 'dab ma brgyad gnyis
la// thabs la kA li 'bru bzhis bkang// shes rab A li 'bru gnyis bsnol// dbus kyi gsang lam chen po na// 'bru gsum sa bon sku gsung thugs// g.yas na chags pa'i 'bru gnyis rgyu// g.yon na bskyod
pa'i 'bru gnyis rkyen// rtsa gsum rtse la gcig tu gnas// thabs kyi rang rgyud 'khor lo la// sku gsung thugs kyi drag sngags so// de sems mchog gi dkyil 'khor ro// me tog ldan pa'i maN+Dal
du// rgyan dang gos bskon dris byugs la// tshogs dang sna tshogs mchod pa bya// rang rang mos pa'i lha ru bskyed// rkyen gyi sbyor bas rdo rje gsor// dben pa'i gnas su yol bas gcad// gsol ba btab la

pad+mas brtag/ b+ha ga brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas su// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// sems kyi lha ngo bstan pa dang// mna' yi snying po gsang mtshan sbyin// dbang bskur dam pa mchog la sbyar// chags pa'i glu dang

dga' ba'i gar// chags pa'i mtshan nyid 'phreng pa'i dbang// chu byung mtshan ma bkrus chu'i dbang// bag btsums skra bzung dbu rgyan dbang// pad+mar rdo bcug rdo rje'i dbang// de nyid bskyod pa dril bu'i
dbang// dam tshig dbugs phyung ming gi dbang// bltas pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs dbang// sngags sgra dril bu brtul zhugs dbang// gnyis med 'khyud pa phyag rgyar bshad/ kha sprad dbugs dbyung dam

pa'o// mnyam par gnas pa lung bstan yin// pad+ma bag 'dzums phyir mi ldog/ rgyal chen bu dang bcas pa gnyis// dus mnyam yol bas bar du gcod// dbang gi sbyor ba thon pa dang// zhing rkyang nyi ma'i khri

stengs su// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul// lha dang gzungs ma tshogs kyis mchod// snying po 'byin la lha ngo bstan// rang nyid lhag pa'i bstod pa bya// gsang ba'i 'khor lo thob pa yin// gsang ba'i dbang
gi rim par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// gsang ba'i dbang gi le'u ste brgya bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam pa nyid kyi dbang 'di bshad do// thams cad chos

sku bde ba'i dbang// chos nyid ma bcos rang bzhin gnas// sna tshogs sgyu ma lhun gyis grub// gnyis su med pa'i don bstan pas// sna tshogs chos rnams snang med stong// mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo ni// chos
sems gnyis med ye shes sku// chos dang sems ni ye nas gnyis su med// phung po mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i sku// don gyi man ngag nges pa'i lung 'dir bshad// sku dang phyag rgya yig 'bru sngags tshig

la// zhen pas rtag par 'dzin pa la// chos nyid rig pa ma skyes pa ru bshad// 'bras bu don la mi gnas 'chad par lta ba la// dkyil 'khor grangs dang sgu mdog phyag mtshan dang// rgyan cha snang la rang bzhin
med par bshad// mi gnas sku yi phyag rgya gsal bar bshad// mi g.yo gsung gi chos nyid gsal bar bshad// thugs kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs ngos gzung med// mnyam pa'i dbang thob rang sems don rtogs
yin// sangs rgyas lhun grub mnyam pa'i rgyal por bshad// dug gsum mi spang rang bzhin spyad du med// sku gsung thugs su lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang// gti mug mi gnas chos kyi sku// zhe sdang

longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'dod chags len med sprul pa'i sku// phrag dog 'gyur med rdo rje sku// nga rgyal mngon par byang chub sku// dug lnga sku lnga lhun gyis grub par bshad// tsit+ta gsang ba'i gzhal yas

nas// zla kham mthing nag gnam sgo gcig pa'i dbang// le brgan ljang khu mtshon gang 'od du 'khyil// hU~M dang ya ma nyi zla brtsegs pa la// sngags kyi 'od zer me lce nyi zer 'phro// snang srid kun bsregs 'od kyi
gong bur thim// bkrag dang gzi mdangs ye shes lnga yi sku// snang med dbu ma'i bde ba chen po yi// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rgyan du rdzogs// sangs rgyas kun pas bgres par mngon sangs
rgyas// gshin rje'i rang bzhin mi gnas chos kyi sku// mnyam pa chen po bde ba'i dbang du bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bam chen gsang ba brtul zhugs rab 'byam gyi dbang 'di bshad

do// sems nyid dben pa'i bde gnas su// rang sems mnyam pa'i rgyal po bstan// thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcu spros// dur khrod gnas nas bam chen blang// zhag gsum sngon 'gro khrus dang sbyar// tsit+ta 'od

kyi pho brang du// gtso bo dang bcas lha ru brtag/ phung po khams dang skyed mched rnams// sha za 'khor sogs rdzogs par gnas// bsgrub pa'i gzhu btsan tshogs dang sbyar// nyin gsum mtshan gsum 'byor ba

dbul// rak+ta bdud rtsi mchod rgyun bsham// bam chen dregs pa'i stobs kyis bsgral// sha khrag longs spyod mchod pa'i rdzas// slob ma stobs kyi lhar bskyed la// tsit+ta gsang ba'i lha ngo bstan// rme ba lnga yi

brtul zhugs bskur// drag po nye ba'i sngags dang sprad// yang na gsang ba'i gzungs ma la// bya ba sngon 'gro gong ma bzhin// tshogs dang mchod pa rgyun mi gcad// b+ha ga gsang ba'i pho brang du// gtso bo dang
bcas lha rnams brtag rtsa lam rgyu la bde ba dbab// phyag rgya 'jug pa'i lha ngo bstan// me tog dkar dmar sems 'dres nas// mthing nag yol bas mtshams bcad nas// slob ma brtul zhugs nod par
sgo// dpe gsum tshul gyis brtul zhugs sbyin// drag sngags dmod pa'i brtul zhugs bslab// gzhan du nyams pas gsang mu bsgrags// snying ngam sems la 'od bsdus la// dregs pa kun gyi mthu dril
nas// dbang rnams kun gyi don 'dir rdzogs// de la drag po'i sbyor ba bstan// drag sngags bstan pa'i drod nyams brtags// bam chen gsang ba'i dbang du bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// dbang
gi rtsa ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshin rje gshed kyi tshad la sogs pa lnga bshad do// gshin rje'i tshad ni don dam kun rdzob gnyis// don
dam 'gyur med dus gsum sangs rgyas sku// dpag tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// kun rdzob drag po'i yi dwags rdzu 'phrul can// mi dge bcu yis yi dwags lus su smin// gti mug mun pa'i nang nas

khong khro dregs pas ldang// gnas lugs gnyis kyi 'khor 'das tshad du bya// ngo bo las kyi skabs dang ngo bo nyid kyi sku// las kyi sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa'o// sku ni sgyu ma'i phyag rgya cir yang snang// gsung ni khro

bo rngam sgra lnga dang ldan// thugs ni sna tshogs 'phrul gyi mtshon cha bzhin// las kyi skabs kyis phye ba'i ngo bor bshad// ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku skye ba med// skye ba'i cho 'phrul snang la rang bzhin med// yon tan ye

shes mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// snying po 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang las 'chad// dper na rin po che yi phyag rgya lta bur bshad// gnas ni phyi nang gsang ba'i dur khrod nas// lho phyogs phyi yi dur khrod ma la ya// skye

med byang chub sems kyi dur khrod nas// gsang ba'i b+ha ga yangs pa'i pho brang dur khrod gnas// don dam chos kyi pho brang la// 'gyur ba med pa'i ye shes gnas par bshad// phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi rgyan stan

pa// phyi yi khro bo dregs pa'i rgyan// dur khrod chas dgu yon tan dgu dang ldan// 'jam dpal sku la mtshan dang dpe byad brgyun// byang chub sems la rnam shes du mas brgyan// b+ha ga'i pho brang pad+ma'i thig les

brgyan// chos nyid mi 'gyur don gyi phyag rgya la// ye shes rang 'byung gsal ba'i phyag rgyas brgyan// rigs 'dzin phyag rgya bgrod pa dbang gis brgyan// gshin rje grong khyer rgyan dang ldan par bshad// rgyal
mtshan me long gi rgyud las// gshin rje'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo'i dbye ba 'di bshad do// 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang
rgyud gnas pa'i 'khor lo dang// las rnams 'grub pa'i 'khor lo'o// rang rgyud gnas pa'i 'khor lo gnyis// thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo'o// ngo bo thabs kyi 'khor lo gnyis// gnyug mar gnas pa'i
'khor lo dang// dregs pa gnas pa'i 'khor lo'o// gnyug mar gnas pa'i chos sku la// log par zhen pa'i don med 'khrul// bag chags stug po'i las zad 'khor// lung gi rgyal po gdin rnams dang// sna

tshogs snang ba chos sku'i ngang// shugs snang longs spyod sprul mtha' yas// ngo bo thabs kyis 'khor lor bshad// dregs pa 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis// sna tshogs srid pa'i 'khor lo dang// lhun grub gnas pa'i
'khor lo'o// ngo bo mnyam nyid kun 'dus la// rgyu rkyen bya btsal mtha' las 'das// bde chen lhun gyis grub pa lal// rgyu rkyen du mar bzung bas 'khrul// snang stong gnyis med ye shes

la// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i blo yis 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med la// bzang ngan 'dzin rtog zhen pas 'khrul// sna tshogs sgyu ma lhun grub la// yang dag shes par 'dzin pas 'khrul// thabs rnams ye

shes rol pa las// gnyen po gzhan rten spong len 'khrul// srid pa'i 'khor lo dbye bar bshad// lhun grub gnas pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni// drag po sngags kyi rten gyi gnas// srid pa'i ru sbal lto na gnas// rtsa

bzhi dwangs ma'i ye shes la// nga bdag rten 'brel 'byung bas 'khrul// rgyu bzhi rkyen du ldang ba la// sbyor pa'i rtsol ba rang 'ching 'khrul// rtsa sbubs las kyis gcod pa la// sngon 'gro'i sbyor bas rtsom pas

'khrul// 'byung ba chos skur thim pa la// thun zor mtshon brdeg rtsol bas 'khrul// rtsa bran yon tan lhun grub la// sbyor ba gzhan dbang rten pa 'khrul// tshe srog dril bsdu sngon byas la// pho nya 'gugs 'dren
byed pas 'khyal// sku gsum snang ba ye shes la// gzhan la brten pa khams gsum 'khor// lhun grub 'khrul 'khor gyi dbye bar bshad// shes rab rang rgyud 'khor lo yang// gnas pa rang las 'char ba drug
bde chen longs spyod chos dang sprul// rjes su 'jug dang gsang ba drug bde ba chen po bcu gsum gnyis// dbus na snying po haM gnyis ldan// 'dab ma ka li'i 'bru yis dgang// spyi bo tshangs pa'i mgo la
gnas// longs sbyod brgyad gnyis lte rtsibs dbus// A li bcu drug kA bA tsi// sbubs na shes rab 'bru yis dgang// mgrin pa bskyod pa'i lam la gnas// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// brgyad dbus

dwangs ma bzhi dang 'brel// dbus nas sa bon nam mkha' hU~M// yon tan drag sngags du mas dgod// tsit+ta rin po che la rten// sprul pa rgya mdud 'khor lo ni// bcu drug bzhi yi dbus na oM// nus pa rgyu yi yig
'brus dgang// rin po che yi rdzing la brten// rdo rje gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni// bcu bzhi 'dab ma'i dbus na raM// bod pa gsum gyi yig 'brus dgang// rdo rje gsang ba'i mtshams la brten// rjes su 'jug

pa'i 'khor lo ni// drug gis bgrod pa'i sI rA ti// ra ma ya yi 'bru yis dgang// thig le rten la srog shing tshul// steng sgo 'og sgo'i sbyor ba yis// 'phel 'grib srog sbyong thabs dang ldan// shes rab sbyor ba'i
'khor lo yang// rkyen dang ldan pas 'bras bu skyed// rang gnas bsam gtan rten 'brel ni// rang rgyud gnas pa'i 'khor lo bshad// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gsum du bshad// rnal ma drag po na ga'o// rnal
ma'i 'khor lo gsum du bshad// gshin rje yab kyi 'khor lo dang// ro langs ma yi 'khor lo dang// gsang ba gshed kyi 'khor lo'o// gshin rje yab kyi 'khor lo la// dbus na rtsa yi 'khrul
mig lnga// gsang mdzod gshed kyi mun khang bzhi// bcu gnyis 'khrul mig me dbal gshed// yang logs bcu drug kha ton stobs// phyi rim nyi shu gcod dang gnon// lto sbyor dril gtor gnyis su bya// rtsa ba
gcig la yal ga stong// rno dbal mtshon cha'i rgyal po ni// stobs dang yab kyi 'khor lor bshad// ro langs 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// thun mong dang ni khyang par ro// thun mong 'khor lo bzhi ru

bshad// mkha' 'gro brtsegs pa'i 'khor lo dang// skyin thang 'phrul gyi 'khor lo dang// gdong mo snying gi 'khor lo dang// nag mo thugs kyi 'khor lor bshad// khyad par mkha' 'gro brtsegs pa la// tsit+ta
gsang ba'i 'khor lo'o// de dag ro langs nag mo yi// mi 'gyur spogs pa'i 'khor lor bshad// gshed bzhi'i 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// nus pa bsdus pa'i 'khor lo dang// rang rang gnad kyi 'khor
lo'o// nus pa gshed kyi 'khor lo bzhi// srog gshed gsang ba'i 'khor lo dang// lo thog gzhom pa'i 'khor lo dang// sde brgyad dkrug pa'i 'khor lo dang// 'bru gcig ya yi 'khor lo rnams// las kyi rgyal
po sgrub pa ste// gsang ba gshed kyi 'khor lo bshad// rang gnas 'joms pa'i 'khor lo dag/ dbye ba bcu gnyis dag tu bshad// dregs pa las la sbyor ba ni// khyab 'jug nag po'i 'khor lor
bshad// dregs chen bran du bkol ba ni// gnod sbyin nag po'i 'khor lor bshad// gnam the srog la 'bebs pa ni// sems dpa' dkar po 'khor lor bshad// gying chen gnad la dbab pa ni// gsang
ba'i gying chen 'khor lor bshad// thoms pas khram la gdab pa ni// nag po bdud kyi 'khor lor bshad// gnyen po las la mngag pa ni// za byed srin po'i 'khor lor bshad// myos pa'i khrag la dbab pa
ni// khram kha nag mo'i 'khor lor bshad// lha srin stongs su gdab pa ni// dmu bdud nag po'i 'khor lor bshad// gzhan yang gnad la dbab pa ni// rang gshed bzlog pa'i 'khor lor bshad// gnod sbyin
gnad nas mngag pa ni// bgegs kyi rgyal po'i 'khor lor bshad// slungs can stobs dang bral ba ni// sprul pa gyad kyi 'khor lor bshad// gdug pa'i mtshon cha de rnams la// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du
bshad// gang bsgrub gcig la'ang gsum du bshad// rtogs pa gnas 'gyur lha yi 'khor lo dang// sbyor ba rten 'byed rdzas kyi 'khor lo dang// dwangs snyigs 'byed pa sngags kyi 'khor lo'o// de dag gzugs
brnyan phyi yi 'khor lor bshad// de las bzlog pa'i 'khor lo gsum du bshad// bsnyen pa ye shes rang gnas 'khor lo dang// gsod byed gdug pa dgra yi 'khor lo dang// gnan pa gdug
pa thod pa'i 'khor lo'o// bsnyen pa'i 'khor lo gnas pa gnyis su bshad pa dang// bsam gtan phyag rgya lus kyi 'khor lo dang// bsam gtan tsit+ta gsang ba'i 'khor lo'o/// gdug pa dgra yi 'khor lo
gsum du bshad// gnad dgu 'joms pa'i yi ge'i 'khor lo dang// drag pos gcod pa sngags kyi 'khor lo dang// gnas bzhir gcod pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'o// gnan pa thod pa'i 'khor lo gsum du
bshad// snying po bcud la bsdus pa'i 'khor lo dang// dregs pa stobs kyis gnan pa'i 'khor lo dang// thod pa log then sbyor ba'i 'khor lo'o// man ngag gsang ba thugs kyi 'khor lo bshad// gcod pa

sngags kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// thun mong dang ni khyad par 'khor lo'o// thun mong sbyor ba'i 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// dbang sdud gtad khram thod pa'i 'khor lo dang// thun mong bsrung ba'i gzugs

brnyan 'khor lo'o// drag sngags dbang sdud sbyor ba'i 'khor lo bshad// khyad par 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su bshad// tshe bdag gab ba'i 'khor lo dang// sbyor ba dril ba'i 'khor lo'o// sbyor ba dril ba'i

'khor lo ni// mu khyud drug dang ldan pa la// thugs khar ru sbal raM yaM e// rtsa ba bzhi yi sbubs na gshed po bzhi// rtsa bran brgyad la klu chen brgyad// yang logs rtsa 'dab nyi shu bzhi// sreg cing 'joms

pa'i sbyor ba drug dang ldan// lnga pa rtsa yi 'dab ma bcu gnyis drug thugs kyi 'bru gnyis sgrub pa'i bdun dang bcu// sngags kyis bskyon te dug lnga'i 'bru dang ldan// drug pa 'dus pa'i 'dab ma bcu gnyis

la// snying gzer lnga dang gsad pa'i 'bru bdun pa// sbyor ba byed na bcu drug mtha' ru rdzogs// ru sbal snying kha lte ba gsang ba ru// me rlung skyin 'dang 'brug gnyis e dang ldan// gshed po bzhi yi lto ba
na// dwangs ma bzhi yi 'khor lo gnas// sa khams gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// 'phrul mig bdun cu rtsa dgu pa// gsod cing gnon pa'i sngags kyis dgang// rlung khams bshig pa'i 'khor lo ni// 'phrul mig
brgya dang nyi shu gnyis// gzhan gshig stobs kyis 'bru yis dgang// me khams bsregs dang snying gzer klu// 'khrul mig drug cu rtsa lnga pa// 'bru rnams sbyor ba gsum gyis dgang// chu khams 'bras bu

'joms pa ni// 'khrul mig bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la// 'bras bu rtsi thog 'joms pa yi// drag po sngags kyi 'bru yis gang// thun mong bsnyen pa la bstan nas// las kyi mtha' ru sbyor ba ni// las kyi gshin rje'i lto
na gnas// dbang sdu sngags kyi 'khor lor bshad// tshe bdag gab pa'i 'khor lo gsum du bshad// khyad par gnas pa lus kyi 'khor lo dang// sbyor ba sna tshogs gab pa'i 'khor lo dang// rtsa ba
drag po khyad par 'khor lo bshad// lus kyi 'khor lo mu khyud bdun pa la// thugs ka dag na drag po stobs chen gnyis// stobs can thugs kar srid pa'i ru sbal gnas// rtsa bzhi dwangs mar kri ka ta bzhir

bsnol// lte bzhi rgyas pa'i 'khrul mig chen po la// rgyan gyi yig 'bru bcu gsum stobs chen phyi nas 'char// bdag skyobs ltas bzlog sbyor ba gnyis dang ldan// 'khrul mig dbang drag gcod pa'i 'bru brgyad

brten// gshed bzhi'i lto na gnon sreg gshigs dang 'joms// gzhan gyi sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu par ldan// rang rgyud tshe bdag lto na gnas pa ste// khyad par srid pa'i 'khor lo dag tu bshad// gab pa'i 'khor
lo phan gnod gnyis su bshad// bsad pa'i 'khor lo gcod dang gnon pa gnyis// gsad pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud gsum dang ldan// rtsibs bdun spu gri'i rtsibs dgu rtsa ba'i sngags// gnan pa'i 'khor lo steng
la mu khyud bzhi// dbus na rgya gram phyi rim sbrul bzhi bsnol// gsum par thod pa bzhi par me ri sngags// 'og ma gru gsum bzhi la sbrul brgyad bsnol bas bsdams// de bzhin rigs bzhi'i sbrul dang me ri
raM// gsad pa drag po gab pa'i 'khor lor bshad// sbyor ba'i 'khor lo gab pa bzhi ru bshad// gdug pa 'joms pa'i 'khor lo dgang// yab yum gsang ba mkha' la gnas// 'bru brgyad lus la spu gri

gdags// snying gzer gdug pa'i 'khor lor bsad// gshig pa dug lnga'i 'khor lo ni// me rlung gsang ba rtsa la gnas// 'khrul mig rtsa ba rtsibs la mtshon// sbyor ba gshig pa'i 'khor lo sa// 'byung ba lnga yi
lo tog 'joms// phyi yi shu lo ka la gnas// rta ma dbab pa'i 'khor lo gnyis// lo tog gzhom pa'i 'khor lor bshad// tshogs brgyad 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo ni// gsang lam bgrod pa'i rtsa la gnas// ltas
ngan bcu yi 'khor lo bshad// khyad par rtsa ba'i 'khor lo gsum du bshad/// drag po sngon phyung gsod pa'i 'khor lo dang srog bzhi dril ba ser ba'i 'khor lo dang// sbyor ba sna tshogs srung pa'i 'khor
lo'o// drag pos gsad pa'i 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// pho mos lto sbyar bdud kyi 'khor lo dang// drag po sngags dgod stobs kyi 'khor lo'o// drag po stobs kyi 'khor lo thun mong khyad par gnyis// thun
mong gsad pa'i 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// ye shes 'khor lo las kyi 'khor lo gnyis// ye shes 'khor lo sbyor ba gsum du bshad// mu khyud gsum pa'i dbus na chags pa'i ru sbal mo// gru bzhi rgyas pa de
bzhin zla kham dbang// rtsibs dang 'khrul mig drag po nyi shu bzhi// srid pa'i ru sbal lto na mtshon cha gnas// yan lag lnga dang lto gnyis mjug ma nas// zhe sdang gdug pa'i sbrul brgyad stobs
kyis 'byung// rtsa ba drag po gsad pa'i 'khor lo bshad// mu khyud drug pa'i dbus na drag po bla sems 'chang// 'khrul mig bzhi dang brgyad las rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsibs chen bcu bzhi spu gri gsum gyis

gang// thod 'phreng gdug pa'i rwa ba ru sbal sto na gnas// yang gsang gsad pa mchog gi 'khor lo bshad// mu khyud lnga pa'i dbus na gru gsum ming// rim pa gnyis la bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsibs chen

nyi shu gnyis la spu gri lnga// gdug pa'i rwa ba ru sbal lto la rdzogs// drag po nye bar gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga ldan gru gsum rtsibs bzhi brgyad// sbrul dang thod rlon 'phreng ba me ri ru sbal

ltor// rgyal blon stobs bcad bsad pa'i 'khor lo bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa gru gsum rtsibs bcu gnyis// 'khor yug lto sdebs 'khrul mig rgya gram mtshon// rtsa ba spu gri'i lto na gnas// rtsa ba sbyor ba'i gsad

pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa drag po'i 'khrul mig bzhi// phyi rim rtsa bzhi rtsa 'dab bzhi dang ldan// 'khrul mig brgya dang sbrul bzhi ru sbal ltor// rnal ma bsad pa bsam gtan 'khor lor bshad// mu

khyud lnga pa gru gsum rtsibs bzhi brgyad// 'khrul mig bcu bzhi sprul bzhi bsnol mar bsdams// srid pa'i lto bar dkrug pa'i 'khor lo bshad// las kyi 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi dang ldan// gru gsum zla kham

'khrul mig spu gri bzhi// bcu drug lcags khar rtsa ba'i sngags te sbrul// ru spal lto na rnal ma'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa gru gsum zla kham gsum// 'khrul mig bcu drug de bzhin rtsibs bcu drug
ru sbal yan lag bsgrub bya bcu gsum ro// lto dkrug gsad pa drag po'i 'khor lor bshad// khyad par gsad pa'i 'khor lo bcu ru bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa ru sbal lto na gnas// gru gsum sku yi gzugs
brnyan zla kham srung pa'i lha// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa sngags 'khor yug sgrub pa'i sngags// 'khrul mig bcu drug gu ru spu gris 'joms// seng ge khog pa gshig pa'i 'khor lor bshad// 'khrul mig lnga

la thod pa sbrul gyi mtshams// lcags mkhar bzhi dang gru gsum 'khrul mig brgyad// 'khor yug de bzhin 'khrul mig nyi shu ba// rdo rje rme 'thab gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa phyogs bzhir

lcags mkhar bzhi bzhi ldan// gsang mdzod bzhi dang dbus na snying po ming// 'khrul mig nyi shu phyi dang yang logs bzhi bcur gnas// drag sngags sbyor ba lnga yis mdzes par gang// drag sngags gnam lcags
'khor lor bshad// mu khyu gsu pa gru gsum zla kham brgyad// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis mu khyud rtsibs bcu drug seng ge mche sbyar stobs kyi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa 'khrul mig bcu

gnyis ldan// phyi rim khor yug de bzhin rtsibs bcu drug stag mo ka thab gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa gru gsum ling ga ming// zla kham phyi nang sbrul gnyis rwa bas bskor// 'khor mig bcu

gnyis rgya gram rtsibs bcu drug pho nya bzlog pa gsang ba'i 'khor lo bshad// mu khyud gsum pa gru gsum zla kham dbus// rgya gram snying pos 'khrul mig gsum gsum ldan// rdo rje'i rwa brgyad 'khrul mig gnyis
gnyis ldan// ru sbal lto ru kha sbyor ming rus bsdu// dril las gsad pa dbab pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa gru gsum gsang mdzod bzhi// phyogs bzhi lcags mkhar bzhi la 'khrul mig gsum

gsum ldan// de yi phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram mdzes// rtsibs chen bcu bzhi sprul gdug rwa bas bsdams// thams cad dril te gsad pa'i 'khor lor bsad// mu khyud lnga pa tshangs thig bzhi dang ldan// 'khrul mig

bzhi brgyad drag po gsang mdzod lnga// phyi rim lcags mkhar nyi shu bzhi ru gnas// yang logs khor yug lto sbyar sgrub pa'i sngags// mtha' ma 'khrul mig nyi shu spu gri'i gnas// lto sbyar gab pa thugs kyi 'khor

lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa sa yi 'khor lor bca'// dbus su gru gsum kha khyer gsum dang ldan// zla kham phyi nang rdo rje rgya gram mdzes// de yi phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu gnyis gnas// thod pa'i 'phreng ba me ris
ru sbal lto bar bca'// drag pos gsad pa mchog gi mtha' sdud yin// drag po sngon phyung sbyor ba'i rgyal po las// sbyin sreg gdug pas gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// lto sbyar bdud kyi 'khor lo gnyis su
bshad// gsad pa mchog dang lo thog gzham pa'o// mu khyud brgyad ldan ral gri rdo rje'i chu// mtshams kyi ka bas bcad pa 'khrul mig bzhi bcu dgu// srog gcod pho mos bdud kyi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud
