lnga pa tshangs thig gnyis// zur thig gnyis ldan 'phrul mig bzhi// thig bzhi mnan pas phyi log brgyad// yang logs bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan// de bzhin mtha' mar bcu drug rtsibs// bcud kyi sbyor ba
drag po yis// lo tog 'joms pa'i 'khor lor bshad// drag po bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// gdug pa bsrung dang sbyor ba bsrung ba'o// sbyor ba kun bsrung 'khor lo bdun du bshad// byas pa
bshig dang zhen pa bzlog/ zug pa dbyung dang gsang lam 'gag/ thams cad gzir dang dug mda' dbyung// byad dgrol gsang ba'i 'khor lo'o// mu khyud bzhi pa dbus gru gsum// 'khrul mig bzhi brgyad
rtsibs bcu gnyis// rdo rje ka bzhi zhing rkyang brgyad// ru sbal lto na rdzogs par gnas// byas pa gshig pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum dbus gru gsum bzhi// rtsibs bcu khor yug b+h+yo
yis gang// zhen pa bzlog pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa ru sbal ltor// gru gsum gnam lcags rtsibs bcu gnyis// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu gsum pa// zug pa dbyung ba'i 'khor lor
bshad// mu khyud bzhi dbus zhi ba'i gnas// rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad rtsa ba'i lus// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis spu gri mtshon// gsang lam dgag pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi dbus dbang drag
gnam// lcags mkhar brgyad dang bcu drug 'obs// mtha' ma bcu drug spu gri'i gnas// thams cad gzir ba'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi ldan dbus zlum drag/ rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad rtsibs bcu

gnyis// snying po sngags bcas steng du bca'// khor yug drag sngags sbrul chud me// 'og mar bcas la kha sbyar dkrug dug mda' dbyung ba'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa sa la bri// gru gsum kha khyer

gsum dang ldan// zla kham phyi nang thod pas bskor// rtsibs chan bcu gnyis me ri 'bar// sa yi 'khor lo brnag pa'i rten// de bzhin gru gsum rgya gram yaM// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsibs bcu drug mtha' ma
gru gsum me ri raM// bar snang 'khor lo stobs dpag med// byad dgram gsang ba'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum ldan gru gsum dbus// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsibs bcu drug/ las kyi tshe bdag mgo
dgu pa'i// btsan thabs gzir ba'i 'khor lor bshad// gdug pa bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yang// gsang ba'i rgyud 'dir bdun du bshad// mu khyud gsum pa gru gsum dbus// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis bcu bzhi
phyi// gdug pa lto dkrug 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa ru sbal ltor// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa sbubs bdun// gru gsum brgyad ldan zla kham gsum// snying gzer bdun pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu

khyud drug pa ru sbal ltor// dbus su gru gsum zla kham sbrul// thod mkhar bzhi la rdo rje mtshams// rgya gram brgyad dang ra bas sbrul// rtsa sbubs nyi shu rtsa gcig me// snying gzer nyi shu'i 'khor lor bshad// mu

khyud lnga pa dbus gru gsum// 'khrul mig bzhi brgyad rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsa sbubs rgyu la snying por mtshon// rtsibs su bcu drug shi phrad sngags// snying gzer dgu pa'i 'khor lo bshad// mu khyud bzhi dbus gru
gsum bzhi// phyogs bzhir 'phrul mig gsum gsum gnas// gsang mdzod bzhi la gdug pa'i gzugs// mu khyud klu gnyan sa bdag gzugs// rtsa sbubs bcu gcig sbyor ba'i sngags// snying gzer shi phrang
'khor lor bsad// mu khyud lnga pa'i dbus gru gsum// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsibs nyi shu// thod pa dang ni me ri ldan// sbyin sreg sa yi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud de bzhin dbus gru gsum/
kha khyer gsum la gdug pa'i gdug zla kham gzugs brnyan rtsibs bci gnyis// phyi rim nyi shu bzhi yi rtsibs// yang logs khor yug thod par rdzas// mtha' ma me ri sreg pa'i 'od// drag po mtha' sdud 'khor
lor bshad// lo thog gzhom pa'i 'khor lo ni// mu khyud gsum pa rus sbal dbus// ru sbal yan lag mjug ma dang// lto gnyis dag nas 'byung ba yi// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// phyi rim
'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// srog bzhi gnad kyi snying po 'du// srog bzhi gzir ba'i 'khor lor bshad// de dag drag po'i sngags dgod kyis// 'khor lo rgyal po dbye bar bshad// sde brgyad gnad kyi 'khor lo
yang// dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// mu khyud gsum pa tshangs thig bzhi// 'khrul mig sum cu rtsa gsum pa// gsad pa drag po'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud de bzhin 'khrul mig sngags// bzhi brgyad bcu

gnyis bcu drug la// lo tog gzhom pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud de bzhin tshangs thig bzhi// le'u tshe dgu la rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi dang yang logs zur bzhi thig bsnyams pas le'u tshe nyi shu bzhi// bar du

snying po 'bru re la// gang dmigs ming dang spu gris bskor// mtha' ma spu gri 'phen pa'i babru// sde brgyad cham la dbab pa yi// drag po gnad kyi 'khor lor bshad// gdug pa'i 'khor lo bzhi ru bshad// sdig

pa lus kyi 'khor lo dang// sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo dang// klu bdud sbrul gyi 'khor lo dang// mdze nad las kyi 'khor lo'o// lus dang yan lag rwa gnyis la// sbyor ba thun mong gnan pa ni// sdig pa'i lus
kyi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gnyis dbus gru gsum ming// rtsibs bzhi'i rtsibs brgyad drag po'i 'bru// sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo bshad// mu khyud gsum la tshangs thig bzhi// 'khrul mig bzhi la gru

gsum sbrul// gsang mdzod bzhi la ru sbal bzhi// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// las kyi rdo rje'i dbus na sbrul// mtha' ma'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// sbrul gyi ra ba gru gsum sngags// 'khrul mig sum
cu rtsa bdun pa// klu bdud sbrul na'akhor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi la sbrul gyis bskor// tshangs thig bzhi dang zur thig bzhi// 'khrul mig sum cu rtsa gnyis la// drag po'i mtha' ma gdug pa'i
gzugs// mtha' ma gsang sngags dbus snying po// mdze nad las kyi 'khor lor bshad// las ni gsod dang bsrung zhing 'joms// gnan pa la sogs rtsa ba bzhi// yan lag stong dang drug cur
bshad// grangs dang dbye ba brgya dang bcu// yan lag 'khor lo rnams grangs stong// las kyis skabs kyi du mar 'gyur// thun mong bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gsum// ma rtogs rtogs par dka' ba'i
'khor lo gcig/ 'khor lo rtsa ba nyis brgya rdzogs par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// 'khor lo gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi
dbye ba 'di bshad do// yul dang shes pa spro ba gsum// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas 'gyur bas// gsang ba sngags kyi sbyor ba la// rig pa gsum du shes par bya// gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags

so// yul ni dmigs pa dang po ste// khro bo khro mo dregs pa'o// shes pa srog gi snying po la// spro ba rig pa'i rtsal sbyong ba// ngo bo kun gyi rtsa ba ni// skye ba med pa'i sems nyid do// gnas pa bdag gzhan thams

cad la// 'gyur ba yon tan 'phel 'grib byed// gsang ba bgrod pa me pa la// sngags kyi sbyor ba bstan pa ni// dbang lnga'i bgrod pa thob pa la// rig pa sngon dang phyis 'byung ba// sdebs kyi sbyor ba shes

pa'o// gsang ba srog gi snying po la// sngags ni sbyor ba'i rkyen rnams so// srog gi snying po gsum du bshad// rang bzhin gsang ba'i srog gi snying po dang// dgug pa rang dbang med par srog gi snying po

dang// nus pa spro ba srog gi snying po'o// bde gshegs 'dus pa sprul pa'i sras// khro bo rgyal po gshin rje dang// ma mo sha za mkha' 'gro bdud// srin po kem kam gnod sbyin klu// rgyal po dkor srungs srog

bdag gza'// kun gyi thugs dang sems kyi bcud// dwangs ma snying po 'bru gsum po// skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la// cho 'phrul srog gi snying po 'byung// srog gi dwangs ma 'dzin pa yin// 'byung ba snang med rang

bzhin stong// 'bru gcig snying po a zhes bshad// snying po bod pa'i dang po ni// skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ste// ya dang ma las byung ba'o// yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis dang// rang bzhin snang stong dbyer

med pas// ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa'i don// rang bzhin srog gi snying por bshad// dgug pa lha dang bsgrub bya ste// lha dang dgug pa gsum du bshad// bdag lus dmigs pa'i tsit+ta nas// rin po che yi sgo phye
la// dngas ma'i hU~M las dza 'phros pas// yab yum bcas pa'i thugs ka ru// rang rang sku gsung thugs kyi sngags bskul zhing bzlas pas slar 'dus nas// bdag gi lus ni 'od kyi tshul// gong bu 'dus pa'i

gtsi mdangs kyis// byin brlabs sprul pa'i bdag por bstan// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen par bshad// ya yis sa bon spros pa las// dregs pa pho mo'i snying kha nas// nyi zla'i gdan la 'byung ba yi// ya ma'i
snying po rang sngags bskul// bzlas pas lus dang shes rab bcas// gnas dang phral nas mngon du bkug phyag 'tshal snying po lag cha ston// dmigs pa'i las rnams mtha' ru bsgrub// las la
sbyar ba'i bsnyen par bshad// phyag rgya bstan pa'i thugs ka nas// ya dang ma las rgyu blangs la// sngon du 'gro ba'i lus nyid las// dgug pa gsum gyi yan lag btags// snying khrag 'dus nas dbang du

'gyur// rang dbang bsdu ba'i bsnyen par bshad// bsgrub bya dgug pa'i snying po gnyis// pho nya bskul gyis las sngags la// 'bru bdun a mo ka dang sbyar// bzlas pas dmigs pa'i snying kha nas// lcags kyu
zhags pas 'khrigs pa yi// dbang po rten dang bcas nas dgug/ yang na lha dang phral nas 'gugs// yang na gnas rten yul mkhar mgugs// mngag pa srog 'gugs sbyor bar bshad// khro bo thugs kyi snying

po la// bcu bzhi'i mtshams su a mu ka/ sbyar na drag tu stong bzlas pas// dmigs pa'i lha dang lus phye nas// dkar nag tsit+ta'i gnam sgo nas// 'od zer chu la chu thim ltar// dwangs snyigs hU~M dang ni nri bsdus
nas// bre la lcags ni 'dus pa'i tshul// tsit+ta'i sbubs nas 'bru gnyis bton// mtshon cha'i gnas su dbye dgug gsod// snying po dgug pa'i sbyor bar bshad// de ltar 'od dang 'od bzhi'i tshul// dgug pa

srog gi snying por bshad// bdag dang lha yi 'phro 'du yis// dman pa'i rgyu dang shes pa las// nus pa spro ba'i snying po ste// gsang ba srog gi snying por bshad// gzungs sngags don ni bzhi ru bshad// srog dang

dbang po rtog pa dang// shes pa gzung ba'i sngags rnams so// srog la dwangs ma gzhug pa dang// snyigs ma gzung ba'i sngags su bshad// 'byung ba'i dwangs ma kun bsdus nas// thig le 'dzin pa'i 'bru gcig

ni// dngas ma gzung ba'i sngags su bshad// rtsa lam khrag dang bcas pa yi// rtsa sgo sbubs nas 'bru bton nas// 'gro ba'i snying po drog bsdus te// thod pa'i bcud la sbyor ba ni// snyigs ma gzung ba'i sngags

su bshad// dug gsum bya sbrul khyi phag la// bla rtags sprul pa'i khams btags nas// 'bru bzhi sbyor bas 'dzin cing 'joms// rtog pa gzung ba'i sngags su bshad// tshogs drug dbang po 'bru drug gis// sgo
'gags shes pa mi gtong 'dzin// dbang po gzung ba'i sngags su bshad// shes pa drug gam brgyad bsdus nas// 'bru gcig don dang nam mkhar dbye// dwangs ma thig ler 'dzin pas na// shes pa gzung ba'i

sngags su bshad// gnad dgu'i sbyor ba ma shor bas// don cig tshul gyis gzungs sngags bshad// rig sngags dmod pa'am mtshon cha ste// las kyi skabs kyi du mar sbyar// sngon du 'gro ba'i dus dang tshad// lo
yi skor phyed dag tu bya// lha yi lung bstan sku mthong ngam// rang lus yan lag sgra byung na// dam rdzas tshogs dang gtor ma dgang// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ste// gang rung gcig tu ngag blo

sbyangs// dam tshig gsum dang mi 'brel bas// ldan pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bshad// las la sbyor ba'i dus dang tshad// lo phyed lus kyi dben gcad la// zhing chen ro ras stag lpags bgo myos byed rak+ta

bdud rtsi btung// sha chen dang ma dbang po bza'// dung rnga gling bu rdza rnga rngub// bam chen gsur chen rme bas mchod// bton mi bya zhing las mi gzur// phyag mi btsal zhing lung mi bstan// gzungs ma rten gyin
gzhan mi sbyar/ kha zas yul dang bdud rtsir sbyar// me dang rlung gi 'khor lo bskyod// khro bo dka' thub rdzogs par bsrung// dben gnas chen po gsum du bya// bris sku dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas// mchog

gsum tshang ba'i bde gnas su// khro gtum rngam tshig bde gnas su// khro gtum rngam tshig rang lus sbyar// 'gyur ldeg me 'bar 'chad dang khol// du ba 'phar ba rdzas dang sbyar// 'od sgra g.yo 'gul gnas dang

sbyar// ma rdzogs las rtsom don med yal// las la tshud pa'i sbyor ba ste// gshin rje'i dka' thub rdzogs par bshad// zla phyed dus kyi bsnyen pa ni// srog bdud ya ma dbang du bsdu// spyugs glu'i 'o dod cho nges
gdab// rak+ta brlab cing 'khur ba bud// dbang po bsdus shing gzugs la dbab// nus pa dbang du 'dus par bshad// gsad pa'i sngags ni gang rung sbyar// gnan pa dgu bskor spyi brdeg sbyar// skabs
skabs thun drug gshen 'debs bya// rnal mas gsad pa'i sngags su bshad// spogs pa'i sngags rnams ru zlog la// rgya log sgyur na 'gugs shing gcod// lus gcig yan lag du mas 'grub// sngags kyi

yon tan brgya dang gsum// drag sngags rtsa ba yan lag gnyis// sngags kyi rtsa ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// dbang sdud drug cu rtsa gcig dang// gab pa'i yig 'bru rtsa ba bcu// drag po bcu gnyis kun gyi sngon

'gro ba'o// dbang sdud sum cu rtsa gcig pa// spyi gshig sbyor ba'i rgyal po yin// yan lag dbang po lnga ru phye ba ni// thun mong gsad pa'i drag sngags yin// dril dang dbab pa'i yan lag drag po ni// 'bras bu
lo tog 'joms pa'i sngags// bcu bdun lus la spu gri bcu btags pa// thun mong byas pa bshig pa yin// rkang pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la// gnod byed pho mo'i snying po ste// ming dang mtshams su sbyor ba

ni// dbang sdud gab pa'i gcad bya yin// lus med yan lag dbye bar bshad// snying po 'bru re ming dang sbyar// drag po mthar thug gcad bya yin// sbyor ba kun gyi mtshams su ste// dbang bgrod sngags pa'i
yul du bshad// gsad dang gzir ba'i sbyor ba gnyis// gdug pas gzir ba'i drag sngags yin// gdug pa yi ge sum cu pa// gnan pa rdo rje lcags kyis sngags// dbang sdud sngags kyi dbye bar
bshad// bcu gsum sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// lus kyi go dang las dbang srun// ltas log srun pa'i dbye ba gnyis// spyi rgyud lus la 'byung ba yi// bcu gsum drag po'i sngags su bshad// 'bru dgus ya ma
gzir bar bshad// bcu pa de bzhin ma mo gzir// 'bru brgyad gdug pa gsum po gzir// bcu gcig dregs pa pho mo gzir// gzir bzhi'i yin lag sngags su bshad// 'bru lngas dmigs pas gnon pa'i

sngags// nyi shu gcig pa drag po'i sngags// bcu bdun skabs sbyor sreg pa'i sngags// drag po sbyor ba'i spu gri bzhi// tsit+ta gsad pa'i 'bru bcu yis// lo thog 'joms pa drag po'i sngags// 'bru brgyad lus la
gar gshig gdags// gdug pa snying gzer drag po'i las// gshed bzhi dngas ma'i rig sngags te// gab pa'i sngags kyi dbye bar bshad// spu gri bcu gnyis lus la sbyar// drag po'i sbyor ba gshig pa
yin// rtsa ba'i yig 'bru bcu gnyis la// spu gri'i sbyor ba nyi shur dbye// skabs kyi mtha' 'gyur ming dang bcas// gsad pa drag po dgod kyi sngags// bcu gnyis lus la srog bzhi gzir// lo thog 'joms pa
drag po'i sngags// spu gri bcu drug thams cad gzir ba'i sngags// spu gri bcu bzhi dug mda' 'byin// bcu pas sngags kyi gsad lam 'gogs// spu gri bco lngas zhen pa bzlog yig 'bru nyi shu byad 'grol
sngags// bcu gcig b+h+yo btags zug pa 'byin// nyi shu gcig gis sngags bdag gzir// bcu bzhis btsan thabs gzir ba'i sngags// yig 'bru bcu dgus nang stobs gshig/ sbyor ba sna tshogs spu grir
bshad// gdug pha gzir ba'i drag sngags dgu/ yig 'bru bcu dgus gdug pa gsum// lto dkrug drag pos gzir ba yin// yig 'bru bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa// gdug pa'i snying gzer bdun pa'o// yig 'bru

bdun cu rtsa lnga pa// gdug pa'i snying gzer dgu pa'o// yig 'bru bcu drug shi phrad yin// brgya dang drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'bru// snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags// khyad par yig 'bru bcu gnyis pas// klu gnyan
sa bdag gdug pa rnams// rang dbang med par srog dbrog pa'o// brgya dang yig 'bru bzhi pa yis// gdug pa'i klu gnyan sa bdag gi/ snying gzer bcu gcig shi phrad kyi// yang gsang mchog gi drag sngags

yin// yig 'bru nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// thun mong gdug pa bsreg pa'i sngags// de bzhin nyi shu bzhi pa yis// las kyi mtha' sdud khyad par gyi// drag po'i sbyor bas sreg pa'i sngags// de dag drag po mngon phyung gi
lus dang yan lag drag po'i sngags// rtsa ba gcig las 'byung bar bshad// bdud kyi drag po bzhi ru bshad// srog dang ser bas ltas ngan dang// drag pos srung ba'i gsang sngags so// yig 'bru
bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa// pho yi drag sngags bdun pa yin// ma las drangs pa'i drag sngags bdun// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu mo yi sngags// drag sngags bdun la 'bru bzhi btags// yig 'bru bdun cu rtsa bdun
pa// gsang ba yang stig drag sngags yin// de bzhin bdun cu rtsa bdun 'brus// dus tshod bdun la brdeg pa ni// mtshan mo gcig la rdzogs pa yin// de dag gsad pa'i sngags su bshad// yig 'bru nyi shu rtsa
gnyis kyis// bdud dang bdud mo pho nya bdun// rang dbang med par srog dbrog yin// yig 'bru nyi shus lus dbang srun// de bzhin nyi shus gcun cing gzir// bcu bzhi 'bru yis ltas ngan 'bebs// sbyor
ba sna tshogs sngags su bshad// yig 'bru bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// bcu gcig 'bru btags chu dril yin// 'bru bzhi gang 'dod zor gyi sngags// de bzhin 'bru drug thabs kyi sngags// 'bru drug gdug pa
gzir nas 'bebs// de dag drag sngags gdug pa yis// lo thog gzhom pa'i sngags su bshad// rang gnad 'joms pa'i rig sngags la// bsnyen pa gsad pa gnan pa zor// sngags kyi yan lag bzhi bzhi
yang// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dag tu bshad// gzhan yang ro langs dmar nag gi/ bod rbad gsang ba sngags gsum dang// rang srog dbrog dang gzir bar bshad// me chu thabs kyi sbyor ba gnyis// byin gyis

brlab dang 'phang ba'i sngags// spogs pa'i rten dang gsum du bshad// bsrung ba bcu gnyis 'bru dag dang// gnyis don sbyar ba 'grub par bshad// srog sngags sum cu rtsa brgyad 'brus// gshin rje stobs kyi

rgyal po yis/ kha chings sbyor ba bzlog par bshad// thun mong sbyor ba brgya dang bcu// byin gyis brlabs dang rtsa ba'i sngags// dbye ba gnyis kyis 'grub par bshad// gsang ba'i sbyor ba nyis brgya la// gsad

dang gso ba'i nyis rdzogs te// gsad pa mthu gzhug rtsa ba'i sngags// de'ang gnyis su bsrung ba gnyis// sngags dang rdzas la bslab pa'o// gsang ba sbyor ba sngags su bshad// mkha' 'gro spyi yi bsnyen pa

dang// nye ba'i bsnyen pa gnyis su bshad// gsad pa'i rig sngags nyi shu gcig de dag rtsa ba'i dbye bar bshad// yan lag sbyor ba'i rig pa lnga// 'bru gcig phral dang mthun par bsdeg dbang po bcu drug tshe
nas bstim// pho mos dkrug pa'i sngags su bshad// rgyal blon la sogs gdug pa rdzogs// 'bru gnyis sbyor ba las bcu drug tshe gnas bstim pa'i sngags su bshad// dbye dgug la sogs bcu gnyis
la// 'bru brgyad spu gri gdod pa'i ming// yan lag dbye ba'i sngags su bshad// bsnyen pa bsgrub pa 'phang ba gsum// skyin 'dang thig gi sngags su bshad// bsnyen dang tshu dril dbab dang
rta// gza' gdong ser ba'i sngags su bshad// bod rbad gsad dang gnan pa sngags// nag mo thun gyi sngags su bshad// bsnyen pa chu dril 'phang dang gsum// 'khor lo dkrug dang rten la gzir// gshed bzhi
ser ba'i sngags su bshad// 'bru gcig ya la 'gros gnyis ming// spu gri dang bcas sbyor ba brgyad// 'bru gcig gsad pa'i sngags su bshad// bod rbad gsad pa'i zor gnan pa// shi sa gzir dang dbye ba
lnga// lha mo srin mo'i sngags su bshad// bsnyen pa 'bru bcu gcig dang ldan// 'bru dgu brtags pa rbad pa'i sngags// nyi shu ming bcas 'bru bzhi gcod// ming bcas 'bru brgyad zor du 'phang// 'bru bzhis

gnan pa mtha' ru sbyor// snying zer dgu yi 'khor lo bca'// lha mo dme ma sring mo bzhi// sgrol gying bzhi dang lto sdebs pa// rno dbal kha sbyor sngags su bshad// yig 'bru sum cu gnyis kyis bod// bco brgyad
'bru yis yul la rbad// lnga bcu rtsa gnyis gsad pa'i 'bru// yig 'bru bcu bzhis rang srog 'phrog de dag li byin yul dang bcas// sgrol gying brgyad dang rno dbal sbyar// li byin har gyi sngags su

bshad// sum cu rtsa lngas bsnyen pa bod// nyi shus gang dmigs yul la sprad// nyi shu rtsa lnga yig 'brus gsod// yig 'bru bcu bdun srog 'phrog yin// de dag sgrol gying dmar po yi// sngags kyi dbye ba bzhi ru

bshad// nyi shu bzhi yi yig 'bru yis// ma mo rang bzhin gzir ba'i sngags// nyi shu brgyad kyis btsan thabs gzir// yig 'bru nyi shus drag po gzir// yig 'bru bco lngas dam tshig bstan// nyi shu'i yig 'bru
ma mo rnams// rang dbang med par srog 'phrog yin// rang gnas dbab pa'i sngags su bshad// yig 'bru nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis// gnod sbyin dbang du bsdu ba yin// de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa'i 'brus// gzir
zhing shi sa bstan pa yin// yig 'bru sum cus gnod sbyin kun// rang dbang med par srog 'phrog yin// de dag dregs pa'i pho gdon rnams// rang gnad sngags kyi dbye bar bshad// rgyu ni thabs te ka la
sogs// sum cu gnyis las 'byung bar bshad// rkyen ni shes rab a la sogs// yan lag rgyan du 'dren par bshad// rgyu rkyen gnyis las smon pas sngags// 'dus byas bskyed pa'i yi ge la// dam rdzas
gtor ma'i 'phro 'dus dgug brtan dang mthu bcug byin gyis brlabs// dbang bskur mthu rtas gsod cing 'joms// bsnyen pas kha g.yogs rgyun mi gcad// rgyun dang bran na las mi 'grub// grod pa g.yang
sa'i mthar lhung bas// bde ba'i rgyal pos mngon mi mthong// ngo bo yi ge'i gzugs brnyan yin// las ni rkyen dbang gzhan la rten// sbyor ba gsum gyi rgyu rkyen gtso// yan lag nyams na g.yang

sa dgod// sgrub pa rkyen gyi sngags su bshad// drag po mchog gi sngags dgod ni// rgyu dang rkyen la rag ma lus// bsnyen grub byed rtsol mthar mi lhung// re dogs rtag chad mtha' las 'das// rdzas dang gtor

ma gzhung mi btsan// 'phro 'du sbyor ba'i rkyen las 'das// khyad par gzhan la rten mo 'cha'// ngo bo chos sku'i rang bzhin lha// rnam pa sngags yig rno dpal mtshon// las ni sna tshogs sbyor ba me// nus pa dug

sbal kyin dang chu// 'gugs pa rlung la rten pa sa// 'byed pa lus la 'chang ba srog/ 'phen pa dbugs la bshig pa stobs/// srun pa lha la gcod pa sngags// ngo bo chos nyid longs spyod lha// sprul pa'i sbyor ba
bsam phrag yas// 'byung ba rang las nus pa gshed// gso ba rang lus bsrung ba 'khor// 'bras bu mi gnas chos kyi sku// drag sngags ye shes rig pa'i rtsal// rig pa'i ngang las rang bzhin 'char// rol pa
gsum gyi rtsal dang ldan// sngags dgod drag po'i rang bzhin bshad// gsang sngags gzugs sngags rig sngags gsum// rgyu rkyen bral bcas gnyis su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud
las// sngags thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo chen po la bstod pa 'di bshad do// bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje
gshed// bzhugs ni me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// gshin rje gdan du 'dings shing ma he gdan du 'dings// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol zhing// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi
bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// drag shul rngam pa'i stobs kyis gshin rje dbang du sdud// khro gtum gdug pa'i stobs kyis ma mo dbang du sdud// dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du
brdzes// me yi bskal pa gtong zhing 'jig rten yongs kyang skrag/ ya bdud khol por 'khol zhing ma bdud gcer bur 'don// stong gsum zas su za zhing phyogs bcur sprul pa 'gyed// dgra bgegs snying khrag

'thung zhing mi sha zas su za// dung chen rak+tas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// gshin rje dbang du bsdus la dgra bgegs bsgral du gsol// 'jam dpal nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rgyal mtshan

me long gi rgyud las// khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snang srid thams cad tshe srog gi bdag po las sna tshogs la bskul ba 'di skad bshad do// hU~M/
bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'khor ba'i gzhal yas nas// 'jam dpal nag po sku yi sprul pa yi// srog bdud 'jam dpal tshe bdag nag po ste// sgo med lcags mkhar bcu drug 'bar ba'i nang
shed nas// mun khang 'ob chen bcu gnyis nang shed nas// thod mkhar 'bar ba bzhi yi dbus phyogs nas// gnam lcags spu gri 'bar ba'i dbus phyogs nas// sa bdag klu gnyan bsnol ba'i gdan stengs
nas// dregs pa pho mo ma hes brdzis pa nas// thabs dang shes rab rtags kyi gdan stengs nas// sku yang rngam chen dregs pa'i cha lugs ni// nag po dug chen 'gyil ba dregs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug
zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// g.yas na nyi zla'i 'od zer 'phro// g.yon na khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug/ dbus na mun nag dug mtsho bskyil// phyag g.yas dang po 'khor lo
yis// dam nyams mgo lus tshal par gshog g.yas kyi bar pa ral gri yis// nyams pa'i srog rtsa rtsad nas gcod// tha ma gnam lcags rdo rje yis// spyi bo'i gtsug nas brgyab nas kyang// rkang pa'i mthil
du thal bar thon// phyag g.yon dang po be con gyis// nyams pa'i zhe sdang go yang gnon// bar du gtun shing dbang po 'joms// mtha' ma sdigs mdzub 'bar ba yis// nyams pa'i dug gsum rtsad nas

sreg/ sku stod glang chen ko rlon gyis// sa dgu rngam pa zil gyis gnon// sku smad stag gi sham bu yis// sha za mngag pa dbang du sdud// zhing gi g.yang gzhi thod sbrul gyis// 'jig rten dregs pa che ba tsan
'dul// tshe bdag nag po mthu bo che// srog gshed bzhi po las la bskul// bdud mo gsod byed mthu bo che// ma mo ki kang dgra la phob// thugs kyi sprul pa dregs pa can// gdug pa za byed bka' yi bdag rdo
rje bka' nyan las la bskul// tshe bdag nag po spyi gtsug nas// gser gyi bya khyung ga ru Ta// bya khyung rgyal po dam tshig can// bya khyung rgyal po mthu bo che// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i

gshog rtsal// ral gri 'bar ba'i gshog ba can// chu gri 'bar ba'i the shog la// ye shes 'bar ba'i gshog zer can// spu yi nyag ma re re las// mtshon chen spu gri'i dpal 'bar bas// nyams pa'i srog rtsa gtan nas len// gnam lcags
'bar ba'i sder mo yis// klu bdud klu srin gnas nas 'dren// gnam lcags rdo rje mchu yis ma lus 'joms// gang la bya ba khyed shes kyis// dgra bo las ngan sdig can 'di// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs la

skyon// gdug pa gnyan sreg nang du chug gshed kyi gsang mdzod bzhi ru chug/ rtag tu 'khyams ba'i gnas su khrid// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting du spos// 'byung ba gtan bzhi rngams kyis non// tshe bdag nag po
dun ting ka/ dgra bo'i snying la ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo// dregs pa las la bskul bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi tshe bdag la gshed bskul pa 'di skad bshad do// hU~M/ las kyi sprul

pa tshe bdag chen po ni// 'byung ba brtan gzhi rngams kyi 'og shed nas// dug mtsho lba tsha ting khol 'gyur// zhe sdang dug mtsho'i nang shed na// dur khrod gdug pa'i gzhal yas nas// sha za rngams pas brgyan pa'i
pho brang nas// sgo med lcags mkhar bcu drug dbus phyogs nas// 'obs chen bcu gnyis 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor na// thod mkhar 'bar ba bzhi yi dbus phyogs na// pho brang gnam lcags spu gris gtams pa

na// klu gnyan sa bdag lto 'phye bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// dregs pa pho mo ma hes brdzis pa na// thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan stengs na// lcags kyi mon pa tshe bdag mgo dgu pa// sku mdog sngo nag ro

yi dud pa 'dra// sku la glang chen dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// stag gi sham thabs thod pa'i do shal can// snyan dang mgur chu phyag zhabs sbrul gyis brgyan// zhal gsum mkha' lding bya yi mgos// gdug pa

gsum dang dgra bo'i glo snying za// zhal gsum gtum rngam khro bo'i mgos// gdug pa'i sbrul dang mo ro rta ro 'brul// gsum ni sha za rngam pa'i mgos// nyams pa'i sha khrag nang khrol za// g.yas kyi phyag dgus
bsnams pa ni// dang po 'khor los mgo lus gshog gnyis pa ral gris srog rtsa gcod// gsum pa rdo rjes dbang po 'joms// bzhi pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum gyis// dgra bo dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// lnga pa

mdung thung snying khrag 'byin// drug pa mda' chen snying gzer 'debs// bdun pa zhing chen dbyug tho 'phyar// brgyad pa rdo rje rgya gram gyis// 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzas pa'i rtags// dgu pa gnam lcags phur
pa yis// dgra bo'i srog dang rtsa la 'debs// phyag g.yon dang po be con gyis// dgra bo zhe sdang mgo yang gnon// gnyis pa gtun shing dbang po 'joms// gsum pa rgyu zhags dgra bo 'gugs// bzhi pa sbrul
zhags byad du chug/ lnga pa sdigs mdzub dug gsum sreg/ drug pa tri shul rtse gsum gyis// lus ngag yid kyi rtsa srog chod// bdun pa dgra stas mgo lus gshog brgyad pa gzhu yis gdug pa 'dul// dgu pas
tsit+ta 'byin cing za// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bdud dang mu stegs gnon// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor thabs klu gnyan sa bdag gnon// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor thabs ma he nyi zla gnon// zhabs

gnyis brkyang bskum thabs dang shes rab tshul// dbu skra ba spu dug gi rlangs pa 'phro// srog bdag nag po sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// gang la bya ba dregs pa khyed shes kyis// dam nyams gang yin lus srog myur du
phrol// g.yon na bdud mo khrag gi ral pa can// ya mtshan bud med rngam pa'i gdong// nyid kyi sku mdog mthing nag la// ral pa khrag gi zu ru can// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu lu lu// zhal nas mi

ro rta ro 'brul// sku stod zhing gi g.yang gzhi la// nyi ma 'bum gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// sku smad stag dang re ldes klubs// thod pa ma mo'i do shal la// sbrul nag 'bum gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// phyag g.yas tri shul rtse

gsum gyis// dgra bo dam nyams srog rtsa chod// g.yon pa ban d+ha khrag gis bkang// dgra bo'i khong du dug mda' skyol// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// ma mo ki kang dgra la phob// 'chi bdag chen po'i thugs
ka nas// thugs ka'i sprul pa gsod pa'i gshed// ya ma rA tsa 'jigs tshul can// smug nag bdud 'dul rngam pa'i gdong// zhal gcig phyag gnyis srog rtsa gcod// g.yas pa rdo rje gri gug gis// dgra bo'i

mgo lus sha lpags gshog tsit+ta phyung zhing zhal du gsol// g.yon pa lcags kyu zhags pa yis// dbang po lus srog drangs shing 'chang// bla dang sprul pa dkrug cing gsol// zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs shing

bgrad// tsit+ta nang khrol drangs shing za// ba spu sma ra ag tshom las// 'od zer sprul pa phyogs bcur 'phro// tshe gnas dbang po bkug cing 'chang// gsod byed chen mo dregs pa can// gang la bya ba khyed shes

kyis// dgra bo'i khong nas tsit+ta phyung// ya ma rA tsa dgra la b+h+yo// tshe bdag nag po'i spyi gtsug na// bya khyung rgyal po ga ru Ta// gser gyi lus la gnas lcags 'bar ba'i mchu// spyan gnyis nyi zlar bsgyil ba
yis// dgra bo'i bla mtsho gting nas skems// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gshog rtsa yis// dgra bo'i mgo lus tshal par gshog/ ral gri 'bar ba'i gshog pa yis// dgra bo nyams pa'i srog rtsa gcad// the gshog spu
gri me ltar 'bar// klu gnyan sa bdag rtsad nas skems// g.yas kyi sder mos klu chen brgyad kyang gnon// g.yon pas klu brgyad sa bdag gnon// gnam lcags sder mos srog gi dbang po 'dren// sku ni gtum

rngam brjid pa'i cha byad kyis// sa bdag klu gnyan lto 'phye zil gyis gnon// khyung gi gshog brdabs gdug pa'i gnas khang gshig/ gang la bya ba mkha' lding khyed shes kyis// bya khyung rgyal pos brnag pa'i lus

srog phrol// tshe bdag nag po dun ting ka/ dgra bo'i srog la ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sprul pa chen po las sna tshogs las bskul ba'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o///// de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das kyis gshed bzhi la bskul ba 'di bshad do// yab yum thugs kyi sprul pa ni// gshed po mon pa nag po bzhi// shar gyi phyogs nas sku bskyod pa// gshed po ya ma rA tsa ni// sku mdog smug nag
'bar ba la// gcer bu ral pa gyen du brdzes// g.yas pas ma tang ro yi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag na 'khor lo bskor// yum chen nag mo re ma ti// smug nag dgra 'dul mthu mo
che// g.yas pa thabs kyis yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dung chen rak+tas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// klad pa gshogs la klad khrag
'thung// lho yi phyogs nas sku bskyod pa// gshed po myos byed 'bar ba ni// sku mdog ser nag 'bar ba la// gcer bu ral pa gyen du brdzes// thod pa skam po dbu rgyan la// thod rlon mang po se ral
kha// rigs bzhi'i sbrul gyi rgyan cha can// g.yas pa ma trang ro yi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag gi 'khor lo bskor// myos byed thugs kyis dgyes bskul ma// sbal mgo khrag mig ser nag
'bar// g.yas pa thabs kyis yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dung chen rak+tas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// tsit+ta gshogs la snying khrag
'thung// nub kyi phyogs nas sku bskyod pa// gshed po ar+ya dmar po ni// sku mdog dmar nag gcer bu la// thod pa mang po'i rgyan cha can// g.yas pa gshin rje ma tang ro yi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa'i
phyag na 'khor lo bskor// yum chen srin mo mgo 'chang ma// dmar nag sbrul gyi chun 'khor can// g.yas pa thabs kyis yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung

gis// dung chen rak+tas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// mgrin pa chod la don khrag 'thung// byang gi phyogs nas sku bskyod pa// gshed po ral pa tshar dgu ni// sku mdog ljang nag 'bar ba la// gcer bu

ral pa gyen du brjod// thod pa skam po'i dbu rgyan la// thod pa rlon pa'i do shal can// g.yas pa ma trang ro yi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag na 'khor lo 'khor// g.yon na yag sha nag mo ni// ljang nag
sbrul gyi cod pan can// g.yas pa thabs kyis yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dung chen rak+tas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// dam nyams
srog rtsa rtsad nas chod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs skyong bcu'i gshed bskor ba 'di bshad do// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po dmar po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs
bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing// chibs su mgyogs byed sha ba chibs// mchong gi ral pa sil li li// spyan mig dmar po glog ltar 'gyu// phyag na mchong gi zangs grib
bsnams// g.yon pa bdud kyi zhags pa thogs// stong gsum srog la dbang sgyur ba// khyod kyi ming dang mtshan gsol ba// shar gyi btsan 'gong dmar pos bya// rgya lnga de ni ban d+ha drug zhing chen

sha dang khrag la za// khyod kyi 'phrin las dus la bab// rak+ta dmar gyi mchod pa 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la khrag nad thong// shar lho'i mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po dmigs pa

ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing// chibs su sdig byed dred mo chibs// phyag na thod 'phreng rlon pa bsnams// 'khor ni me lha 'bum gyis bskor// pho

log gtong ba'i mthu bo che// drang srong bsgral ba'i sha la za// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// dung chen rak+tas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la kho log thong// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs
byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po mig dmar ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing// chibs su smyo byed sha ba chibs// 'khor du phung sri 'bum gyis

bskor// sa bdag stong la dbang bsgyur zhing// phyag na khram byang dkar nag 'khrol// mi dur gshed kyi ral pa can// sa bdag sha dang khrag la za// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la smyo
'bog thong// lho nub mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po lcogs pa mgo dgu ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing// chibs su lkugs

pa lug la chibs// phyag na rdo rje be con bsnams// 'brum nag gtong ba'i mthu bo che// 'khor du bdud nag 'bum gyis bskor// zas su bdud kyi sha la za// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab/// sdang ba'i dgra la
'brum nag thong// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po a ba glang mgo can// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing// phyag na gcod byed
ral gri bsnams// bzhugs ni rol mtsho'i nang na bzhugs// chibs su sems can pir la chibs// lus ni sbrul nag chen po la// byol song glang gi mgo bo can// klu rnams kun la dbang bsgyur zhing// zas su

klu yi sha la za// 'khor du klu bdud stong gis bskor// mdze dang lhog pa'i sna 'dren ma// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la mdze dang lhog pa thong// nub byang
mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po ya ba ti// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing// chibs su mgyogs byed rta la chibs// yab bdud stong
la dbang sgyur zhing// nag po spyi chibs bdud kyi bu// phyag na bdud kyi khram byang thogs// 'khor ni yab bdud stong gis bskor// zas su mi sha rlon du za// gzer nad gtong ba'i mthu bo che// sha
khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sdang ba'i dgra la gzer nad thong// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po gtel pa ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing// chibs su phung dri rnga mo chibs// phyag na nad kyi rkyal pa thogs// nad do cog gi bdud gcig po// mi dur gshed kyi ral pa can// dmu bdud stong la

dbang sgyur cing// phung sri 'bum sde pho nyar 'gyed// smyo 'bog gtong ba'i mthu bo che// 'khor du ma bdud 'bum gyis bskor// zas su phung sri'i sha la za// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// khyod kyi dam tshig

dus la bab// sdang ba'i dgra la smyo 'bog thong// byang shar mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po cha sangs ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol
cing// sku mdog dkar po ral pa can// stong gsum srid pa zas su za// stong gsum srid pa skom du 'thung// na bza' dkar po nam mkha'i sprin ltar gtibs// spyan mig dmar po nam mkha'i glog ltar

'gyu// 'khor du ya bdud 'bum gyis bskor// phyag na glog gi zhags pa thogs// glang nad gtong ba'i mthu bo che// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la glang
nad thong// 'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po stag mgo nag po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing// sbrul mgo brtsegs

pa'i thod gdeng can// chibs su ba glang dmar po chibs// phyag na zhing gi zhags pa thogs// stong gsum klu la dbang sgyur zhing// zas su klu srin sha la za// mdze dang lhog pa'i sna 'dren pa// khyod kyi dam tshig
dus la bab// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la mdze dang lhog pa thong// steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po nag 'joms ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
bgrad// sku la bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing// chibs su 'brug mo ral can chibs// dbu skra kham nag sprin ltar gtibs// phyag na be con dbyug tho bsnams// zas su gza' yi sha la
za// 'khor du lha bdud 'bum gyis bskor// bal nad gtong ba'i mthu bo che// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la bal nad thong// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bdud po bcu la bskul ba 'di bshad do// 'jigs byed sprul pa'i pho nya ni// steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po mi bzad brang dkar rje// phyag na bdud kyi rta nag 'byam

pa thogs// 'phyar zhing dgra bo'i mgo la brdeg dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po ma he khro bdag rje// phyag na bdud kyi
ral gri 'byam pa thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// shar lho mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po tho yo tho nag rje// phyag na bdud kyi spu gri rnon
po thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po rngam chen thog bdag rje// phyag na dung chen dmar gyis bkang
ba thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// lho nub mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po dmu bdud ral pa rje// phyag na bdud kyi khram byang thod pas brgyan
pa thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po rag sha mi dur rje// phyag na bdud kyi sog le 'byam pa thogs// dam las
'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// nub byang mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po stong ri mgo nag rje// phyag na bdud kyi gri gug thod pa thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag
pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po nag po gsod sbyong ste// phyag na bdud kyi shan pa gri rings thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la

bab bo khram la thob// byang shar mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po rngam pa 'gro bdag rje// phyag na bdud kyi dri shul rtse gsum thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram
la thob// 'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po sa toM nag po rje// phyag na gti mug phag gi mgo bo thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// 'phrin las
kun gyi sbyor ba la// bstod bskul byas na don gnyis 'grub// rtsol pas smin pa'i las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// 'khor gyi gshin rje la gshed bsgo ba'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu lnga
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud pho mo las bsngags pa 'di bshad do// phyogs phyogs tsam gcig ya gi na// sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi ya stengs na// bdud yul nag po mthong
khyab na// bdud mkhar nag po lcags mkhar sgo dgu na// bdud ye med 'khrul gyi rgyal po bzhugs// sku la bdud gos 'od nag 'khyil ba gsol// phyag na bdud kyi zhags pa nag po
bsnams// 'dzam bu gling gi 'gro ba mi la 'debs// g.yas na bdud kyi rtsis byang chen mo bsnams// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams khram la 'debs// chibs su bdud rta ngar chen 'brug la chibs// chibs kha dgra
bo'i yul du bskyod la gshegs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog bdud po mi zad snying rkun ma// sku ni mthing nag 'jigs tshul can// sku la dar nag na bza' zhing dang sbrul gyis brgyan pa

gsol// dbu ral nag po khrag dang thod pas brgyan// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri sdig can bsnams// dgra bo phung byed srog rtsa chod las shog g.yon na ban d+ha lcang lo khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// dgra bo'i

yul du khrag mda' khrag zor 'phongs// chibs su dre rta rkang gsum thod pas brgyan pa chibs// chibs kha dam nyams dgra la bskyod las gshegs// sngags kyi sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi blon po

drang khar rngam pa rje// bdud rta nag po srog med rta ru zhon// sku la gser gyi slag pa gsol// phyag na gser gyi 'gying dkar bsnams// g.yon na bdud kyi rtsis byang bsnams// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol
las shog bdud kyi blon po tho yo mtho mtshams rje// chibs su bdud rta nag po rting dkar chibs// sku la dar nag thod pas brgyan pa gsol// g.yas pas bdud kyi ral gri kha mangs bsnams// g.yon na

bdud kyi zhags pa nag po bsnams// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi blon po snya le ngag btsan rje// chibs su bdud rta 'brong chen 'gying ba chibs// sku la mun ba'i na bza' 'ja' yis
brgyan pa gsol// phyag g.yas bdud kyi gze ma kha mangs bsnams// g.yon pa zhing gi zhags pa dgra la 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi blon po gsod sbyong rje// chibs su
bdud kyi dur bya nag po chibs// sku la zhing chen slog pa gsol// phyag g.yas zhing gi dbyug pa bsnams// g.yon pa glog gi zhags pa dgral 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi
blon po mi dur so dar rje// sku la nam mkha' 'od nag 'khyil ba gsol// chibs su lcags kyi sdig pa kha dgu chibs// phyag g.yas sprul pa'i bdud bya stag gzig rngam pa bsnams// g.yon pa yid dang rlung gi
zhags pa dgra la 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi blon po kha yal 'thom po rje// sku la lcags kyi zhun khrab gsol// chibs su lcags kyi phag par chibs// phyag g.yas lcags
mda' gzer chen bsnams// g.yon pa bdud gzhu 'od ma bsnams// dgra bo'i snying la lcags gzer 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi blon po rngam pa klu 'dul
rje// sku la chu srin slog pa sbrul gyis brgyan pa gsol// chibs su chu glang sngon por chibs// phyag g.yas lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams// g.yon pa tsit+ta'i 'phreng ba bsnams/ khong nas tsit+ta thon las

shog/ sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud mo blon zan kha che ma// sku la mthing nag go zu lu// thod chen sbrul gyis brgyan pa gsol// chibs su chu bo'i gzhung la chibs// g.yas pas snying 'byin
g.yon pas stob// bdud mtsho mer ba gting nas 'khrug yid la jag 'gyed blo snying brku// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud mo kha 'bar ral gcig ma// sku la re lde gnam phyed
gsol// chibs su cang shes bong bu chibs// g.yas pas snying 'byin g.yon pas stob/ kha nas dug gi skyugs pa 'thor// dug mtsho khol ma gting nas rlob// bla la jag 'khye snying la brkus// sngags pa'i sku
dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ rdo rje mche gtsigs lha gdon 'dul// sku la re nag rus pas brgyan pa gsol// chibs su lcags kyi sdig pa chibs// g.yas pas snying 'byin g.yon pas stob// spyan nas khrag

'dzag mchi mar 'dzag/ khrag mtsho'i 'khyil ba'i gting nas rlob/// dbugs la jag khye snying la brkus// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ gtum mo khrag 'thung dri za 'dul// sku la zhing gi g.yang gzhi
gsol// chibs su rtol mo ru rings chibs// g.yas pas snying 'byin g.yon pas stob// zhal nas khrag gi za ru 'dzag bdud mtsho smug nag gting nas rlob// khrag la jag byed snying la brkus// sngags pa'i sku

dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud mo mi zad khrag skams ma// sku la chu srin slag pa sbrul gyi brgyan pa gsol// chibs su ru sbal khra bo chibs// g.yas pas snying 'byin g.yon pas stob// spyan nas khrag 'dzag
zhal nas mi ro 'brul// klu mtsho smug nag gting nas rlob// sha za jag khye snying la brkus// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud mo rag sha srin mo 'dul// sku la dom nag g.yang gzhi

gsol// chibs su so bya rog po chibs// g.yas pas snying 'byin g.yon pas stob// mchi ma khrag dang dug tu 'dzag/ srin mtsho mer ba gting nas rlob// rus la jag khye snying la rkus// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur
du sgrol las shog/ bdud mo phung byed sa bdag 'dul// sku la dar nag gza' skar brgyan pa gsol/ kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// chibs su kye le gdong drug chibs/ kha gdengs so 'dar lag pa
brdze// g.yas nas snying 'byin g.yon nas stob// rim gyi rgya mtsho gting nas rlob// rtsa la jag khye snying la brkus// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mon
pho mo las la bskul ba 'di bshad do// mon pa nag po dred la zhon// phyag na dung gi be con bsnams// nyams pa kun gyi gzugs phung bshig g.yon pas dam nyams tsit+ta 'byin// sku la dar nag ber chen
gsol/ kha rlangs na bun sprin du gtibs// so 'dar ljags 'dril tsit+ta gsol// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon
pa nag po 'brug la zhon// sku la nam mkha'i 'od nag gza' yis brgyan pa gsol// dbu yi ral pa nam mkha'i sprin ltar gtibs// snyan nas 'brug sgra stong gsum zil gyis gnon// phyag nas thog dang skar

mda' dgra la 'phen// spyan nas dug gi ser ba drag tu 'bebs// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol bar shog/ mon pa nag po khyung

la zhon// sku la g.yang gzhi'i ber chen gsol// dbu skra stong gsum mun nag gtibs// phyag nas nyi ma'i 'od zer sdang ba'i dgra la 'gyed// bar snang rgyu zhing dam nyams yid la 'dzin// dam nyams dgra bo

sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po glog la zhon// sku la 'od kyi na bza' gsol// dbu skra sbrul nag mun ltar gtibs// zhal

nas mi ro rta ro 'brul// phyag na ral gri dgra la 'debs// g.yon pa tsit+ta 'bying cing gsol// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol bar
shog/ mon pa nag po stag la zhon// sku la dar nag ber chen gsol// dbu skra dug gi sprin du gtibs// dug gi kha rlangs bun de bun// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// dam nyams dgra bo'i mgo lus

gshog/ g.yon pas nyams pa'i tsit+ta 'byin// sha za khrag 'thung rtsa la 'jib// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol bar shog/ mon pa

nag po chu srin zhon// sku la chu srin slag pa gsol// dbu ral rgya mtsho mun ltar gtibs// sbal pa stong gi rgyan gyis brgyan// phyag na me 'bar rgya mtsho skyems// dgra bo dug gsum rtsad nas sreg/ rgya mtsho'i
gting nas ser ba 'bebs// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po sbrul la zhon// sku la zhing
gi g.yang gzhi gsol// dbu la khrag gi zar bu 'bab// spyan nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ phyag na zhing gi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa dgra bo'i tsit+ta gsol// dgra bo'i khong nas tsit+ta
'byin// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnamashes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po dom la zhon// gcer bu mi thod phyag na bsnams// sprul pa

gcer bu 'bum sde 'gyed// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// klad pa gshog la klad khrag spyos/ khong nas snying phyung snying khrag 'thung// gzugs phung gshig la bkrag mdangs 'phrol// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur

du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po khro gnyer can// dar nag ber chen sku la gsol// thod pa 'bum gyi cha ga can// sbrul nag stong gi rgyan cha klubs// ral pa dug gi phur pas brgyan// g.yon na ban d+ha khrag
gis bkang// g.yas pas thun rlob chi li li// khrag mda' bu yug dgra la 'bebs// thun gyi mon mo lag rings ma// dam nyams dgra la snying thun b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo bla rkun ma// lag na sha za'i tsit+ta

bsnams// zhabs gnyis bgrad nas lag pa brdze// gsang ba'i snying gzer dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo tshe 'phrog ma// lag na rme khrag rims nad 'phen// rims nad dgra la me ltar spros// gsang ba'i snying

gzer dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo snying rkun ma// bgaSha dug zer dgra la 'phen// dal gyi bu yug char ltar 'bebs// dgra bo myos shing rlams su 'dzud// gsang ba'i dug zor dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo
dgug sdud ma// lag na 'brong chen rwa zor bsnams// smyo 'bog lhog rgal dgra la 'bebs// dbang po 'chal dang gzer du chug/ rwa zor brnag pa'i dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo thun 'bebs ma// lag na phur
zor dug thun bsnams// mdze shu lhog pa yams su 'bebs// klu gnyan sa bdag pho nyar 'gyed// dug zor phur mda' dgra la 'phen// gsang ba'i dug zor dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo gzer 'debs

ma// lag na lcags mda' snying gzer bsnams// bsnol thog rme gri dgra la 'bebs// shan pa srog gcod pho nyar 'gyed// rme gri shan dmar dgra la thong// gsang ba'i snying zor dgra la b+h+yo// de nas yang bcom
ldan 'das kyis pho brang chen po la bshags pa 'di bshad do// 'phags pa'i rgyal po khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// chos sku byang chub sems dpas ma g.yos pa'i// yab yum sras dang 'khor bcas dgongs su
gsol// bdag cag dkyil 'khor 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// nongs pa mchis nas 'gyod pas dam du bcas// thugs rje che dgongs 'gyod pas mthu dang dngos grub gsol// ya man ta ka khro bo'i
tshogs kyi gtso// sbyor sgrol yum mchog gsang ba'i ma tshogs bdag/ gnyis med e yi gdan las dgongs su gsol// kun tu bzang po mchod pa che ba'i don ma rtogs// phyag rgya ye shes mchod

pa'i rgyud ma grol// phyi yi mchod pa yul la rtag par bzung// yab yum khyed kyi thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol// khro chen sprul pas sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// dregs pa

yab yum dngos grub rtags kyi lha// lus ngag yid kyi rtog sbyong dgongs su gsol// rang 'byung bdud rtsi rgyu rkyen rtsol bas nyams// sta na sgrol mchog mchod pa'i byin chungs shing// 'ga' na sbyor mchog mchod

pa'i gnas ma stob// sprul pa pho mo'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// sku gsung thugs kyi 'da' dka'o// ya ma rA dza gshed po tshogs kyi gtso// lha mo nag mo bdud mo tshogs kyi gtso// sgrol ging shan pa pho mo dgongs

su gsol// sha khrag dmar gyi mchod pa byin chungs pas// phyi dang nang gi bskang ba brten ma 'byongs// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa gnas ma stob// gshed pho gshed mo'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// dwangs ma'i

dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub pa'o// gshed po nag 'joms pho nya'i tshogs kyi gtso// bdud po ma zin rngam pa'i tshogs rnams dang// thar byed chen po dgu rnams dgongs su gsol// mchod rdzas rgyan rdzas phyi

rdzas rten rdzas dang// nang gi dam rdzas brten rdzas brnag pa'i rdzas// 'khor lo sbyor rdzas gsang ba'i dbang rdzas rnams// bka' dang byin nyams pho nya dbang ma 'dul// pho nya gsod byed thugs dang ci 'gal

ba// yan lag grub pa lhun gyis grub pa'o// ro langs nag mo ma mo'i tshogs kyi gtso// ro langs dmar mo srin mo'i tshogs kyi gtso// sgrol ging lce spyang rngam pa dgongs su gsol// longs spyod chung bas tshogs

kyi yan lag nyams// 'dod yon lnga yis lha mo rgyud ma grol// sngags dang ting 'dzin phyag rgya rgyud ma grol// rngam pa pho mo'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// rtsa rgyud pho brang gnas su dag pa'o// bka' nyan mon dang

mon mo'i tshogs rnams dang// sha za kye kam drug khri drug stong dang// ya ma brtan ma sgo ma dgongs su gsol// lhag ma'i gnas ri stabs dang dug lnga nyams// las kyi kha ma thus pas dngos grub rtags ma

phyin// bran dang g.yog 'khor thugs dang ci 'gal ba// snang stong sgyu ma lhun gyis grub pa'o// grol byed ging dang ke seng gnas yul brgyad// mche ba sder mo gshog pa za byed tshogs// rgyud rgyal 'phrul gyi

rigs 'dzin rnams// ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa dgongs su gsol// phyi dang nang gi mdangs rnams kyang// rang dam gdug pa rdzas rnams dbye sri nyams// phyi yi 'khor dang longs spyod ma dag pa// snang stong
sgyu ma lhun gyis grub pa'o// dngos po bdun dang bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bcas// sbyor ba du ma drag po gsum dang gcig/ dbang dang byin rlabs dngos grub don ma rtogs// rig pa'i rgyal po rig

pa gsum dang 'brel// lung gi rgyal po sbyor ba'i yan lag gtams// tshig lung ma 'dres brda yi sgo ma phye// mtshan ma skye med dbyings las shar ba'o// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// bdud pho mo las la
mngag pa dang mtshan ma dbyings su bshags pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la gdams pa'i don 'di bshad do// e ma'o chos sku byang chub

sems// e ma'o zhi ba'i rang bzhin gnas// e ma'o 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir// e ma'i khro bo rngam pa'i sku// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings nyid las// 'khor lo dag pa'i rgyun du sprul// ye shes rig pa'i phyag rgyar

gsal// mtshan dang dpe byad ngang gis rdzogs// chags sdang lnga nyid sbyor ba'i lam// yon tan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gzhi// mtshon cha'i rgyal po gdug pa'i dbal// gcod dang slar ldog lto bar 'khyam// e ma
sbyor ba du yi gzhi// rang bzhin gnyis ka'i dmigs pa 'du// nges pa'i don med skyon de dag/ yon tan du ma lhun gyis grub// dngos med dngos po dag las 'das// brjod med brjod dang bral ba'ang

min// 'jig rten 'khor ba'i khams ma yin// mya ngan 'das pa dngos dang bral// sa khams 'byung ba'i sa las dbang// mi shigs rdo rje'i sbyor ba'o// rtag chad kha dog phyag mtshan zhal// snang stong gnyis med
pa'i bde ba'i sku// sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan ldan// bdun dang lnga sogs thams cad kyis// sbyor ba du ma'i mtshon cha 'di// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs// phyung nas rdo rje'i gsang lam

brgyud// longs spyod 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang// sprul pa 'khor gyi rdzu 'phrul dang// dngas ma lhun grub gnas pa'i 'khor// lha mi dregs 'khor rdzu 'phrul can// byang sems bka' dang lung bor min// slob
dpon yul la brnyas mi brjod// sangs rgyas bka' dang mchod pa'i rgyun// 'da' bar ma yin rtag tu gnas// gnas mchog gzungs ma sems mi spang// bdag gzhan byang chub sems mi gsad// yongs su ma

sbyang tshad ma sbyor// tshogs lam don gyi lam gtor la// gsang ba'i brda dang dbang mi smra// phung po dngos med chos mi brnyas// dad ldan mi ldog phyag rgya brtag bka' la tshad ma sgras mi gzhal// dam rdzas
gzungs ma dregs pa bsten// rnal 'byor mi brtag gsang sngags bzlas// bla ma dam tshig dam rdzas lung// cung zad 'das na de yis ni// dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi bskang gso bya// dad pa'i sgo gsum sdom la
gnas// sems kyi rten pa skye med brtags// gshin rje gshed kyi dka' thub bsrungs// brtul zhugs rig pa'i rdzas la spyad// sems kyi 'khor lo rtag tu blta// gdug pa'i snying po dbang du

bsdu// las kyi rnam grangs du ma brtsam// gshin rje'i phyag rgya don dang sbyar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba'i don du bshad do// e ma'o gsang ba'i gsang bcud 'di// 'khor lo rgyal po mtshon chen
'di// rgyud rgyal me long rgyal mtshan 'di// las kyi rgyal po mtshon cha yin// khyung chen nam mkha' dbang sdud yin// seng ge rtsal bsgoms sems can zil gyis gnon// dregs pa'i rgyal pos bde ba'i
gnas la bgrod// lhun po nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho me// gsang rgyud bshad pa 'phrul gyi bka'// shes rab dbang gi rtsal mi ldan// 'khor gyi rigs dang rigs min kun// nga yi snying po bcud bsdus

pa'i// sna tshogs 'phrul gyi sbyor ba 'di// shes rab dbang gi rtsal dang sbyong// sangs rgyas bka' yi byin brlabs nas// gsang ba'i bdag pos rab tu bshad// phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba bstan// byin gyis
brlabs dang ldan pa yis// log pa'i sems 'chang 'dul byed bka'// gsang lam sbyor ba'i dag pa 'di// sangs rgyas stobs dpag med pa'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas dang// gshin rje
gshed po'i dge 'dun rnams// lha dang lha min gsang ba'i bdag ma mo myos byed khrag 'thung 'bum// mkha' 'gros smyo byed byad stems sam// bdud dang srin po sha za'i tshogs// srin mo las byed gnod
sbyin klu// mu stegs ke ka byad stems gnyan// nyi zla dbang phyug dkor srungs gza'// rgyal po sngags pa ging srog bdag stobs chen 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs// mu stegs log pa'i nus pa
'joms// kun kyang gshin rje gshed po'i 'khor// rab tu mi bsrun 'jig rten dregs// bde ba'i 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// bde ba'i snying po lam can 'di// khro bo rgyal po dregs pa 'khor// khro bo gshin

rje gshed po ni// sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs kyi bcud// bsdus nas rdo rje lam las phyung// gsang ba'i pho brang gnas su bsgyil// snying med thugs kyi snying po las// 'khor gyi khro tshogs pho mo rnams// lnga
brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// nga yi 'phrul gyi gsang rgyud 'di// ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byaid na// nga yang dam las mi yol srung// 'khor gyi dregs pa pho mo dang// dbang chen sangs rgyas chos srungs

rnams// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// skal ldan bsgrub pa'i bcud len dang// rgyud kyi snying po 'dzin pa la// de tshe gshin rje gshed po yis// dam tshig 'byung dang thugs brtse ba'o// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'khrul 'khor rgyal mtshan gyi me long gi rgyud las// yongs su btad pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyi shu bdun
pa'o//// bshad pa'i rgyud chen po gshin rje thams cad 'byung ba 'khrul 'khor rgyal mtshan sbyor ba du ma'i bcas gzhi rdzogs pa'o//// sngags dang mtshon cha bka'i bdag po gsum gyi rgyas gdab
pa'o// rgya rgya rgya/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya ma rA dza yak+she/ gu ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal khro bo gshin rje gshed rgyal po gsang ba'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal gshin

rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag ga \u0f72 sa thos pa'i dus gcig na/ chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ gdug pa ma lus rang bzhin lhun gyis sgrol ba'i/ dur khrod 'bar bas
brgyan pa'i gzhi yon tan 'bar ba'i gnas na/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po zhes bya ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi bdag nyid thams
cad 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// yum za byed pe ta li zhes bya ba'i srin mo dang thabs cig tu 'khril nas bzhugs so// gzhan yang gdug pa mi bzad pa'i 'khor// bdud 'dul ba gshin rje gdug pa can sum cu

rtsa gnyis dang/ myos byed bdun dang/ dur khrod kyi bdag po la sogs pa de dag kyang/ rang rang gi 'khor gdug pa can rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun tu til gyi gang bu lta bur bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus

nas yang rab tu g.yos te/ phyogs bcu yang rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// 'khor gyi sprul pa de dag gi nang nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba/ mthu dang stobs su ldan pa zhig stan las langs
te/ gdug pa de dag 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyA+e kyA+e 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// gshin rje gnod sbyin ma lus kyi// lha mi'i 'jig rten phung la
khang// log pa'i lam du 'khyams pa rnams// zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas// drag po khro bo spro ru gsol// ces gsol bas/ de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed pos khro bo rnam par sprul pa'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yum za byed chen mo be ta li dang dgyes pa'i rol pas thabs dang shes rab tu 'khril te/ byang chub sems dpa' sprul nas/ oM a kro te ka ya man+ta ka shri many+dzu hU~M dza/ zhes thon
pa las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jigs byed gshin rje skur gyur te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ri
rab kyang 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu 'gul lo// ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem du gyur te/ ye shes kyi sku de dag las kyang rang rang gis

sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phros te/ gdug pa'i gshin rje dang/ ma mo dang/ srin po dang/ srin mo dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ sgrol gi pho mo la sogs pa ste/ gdug pa can de dag kun skrag cing sngangs te
brgyal bar gyur te gan bub tu 'gyel te/ gdan du bting nas khrag tu skyug cing/ smre sngags 'don cing lag cha yang phrogs/ mdangs kyang rang rang la bsdus so// de nas yang 'jam dpal 'jigs byed chen

pos/ thugs rjes dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par bzhugs te// ya ma rA dza nri dza hU~M/ zhes brjod pas/ gdug pa mi bzad pa de dag thams cad slar yang rang rang gi ngo bor langs
nas/ mthu dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ rtsal byang zhing/ dpal 'jigs byed ya man ta ka la mgrin gcig tu 'di skad bsgrags so// khro rgyal 'jigs byed chen po lags// sngar byas thams cad gnong zhing
'gyod// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel bya dang// las dang bsgo ba ci mchis pa// las kyi bya ba bsgo ru gsol// bza' dang btung ba gang la bgyi// zhes dus gcig tu gsol pa dang/ 'jigs byed chen pos byang
chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas/ las kyi gshin rjer mnga' gsol lo// bras su dmar gtor gdug pa dang// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa zo// las skal sangs rgyas bstan pa srungs// zhes
bsgo'o// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gshin rje dregs pa can las la gzud pa dang/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// de nas dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos/ rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba
la snyoms bar zhugs te/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// chos rnams ye nas dag bya dang// sprul pas 'gro ba'i rgyud 'dul ba// de dag gang la gnas par bgyi'o// zhes gsol
to// ye nas rnam dag byang chub sems// phyi nang snod bcud la sogs kun// bdag dang gzhan du dbyer med de// rnam dag ngang du tshul gcig pas// chos rnams ma lus ye sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyid las

ma g.yos pas// theg pa gcig tu nges 'byung ba// bla med gsang ba sku yi rgyud// thugs rje cho 'phrul 'phrin las zab// rang bzhin cir yang mi dmigs pas// khro bo'i dngos grub cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas

kun gyi sku 'chang ba// byang chub sems kyi thig ler gsal// gnyen po cis kyang mi shig pas// thabs kyi phyag rgya sku sprul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi bdag/ byang chub ngo bo dag pa las// dpal chen gshin
rje gshed po ni// sku ni mthing nag 'bar ba la// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// dbus gsum phyag kyang rnam pa drug/ g.yas pa gsum na bsnams pa ni// gshin rje'i dbyug dang dgra sta

gri/ g.yon na rgyu zhags 'bigs pa'i mdung// dung chen dmar gyis rab tu bkang// brkyang bskum zhabs kyis gdug pa brdzis// skul dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// rdo rje rnon po ral gri 'dzin// srin mo mo ni
lcags kyu 'dzin// stang zhal de dag 'khor dang bcas// rang rang stan dang lag char gnas// sna tshogs khros pa'i bdag nyid de// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdag nyid spro// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen bdud 'dul
ba// bdud 'dul 'phrin las bshad du gsol// a la la ho/ sa ma ya hU~M/ sa ma ya stoM/ 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las// chos sku mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal
'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos/ rab tu lung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// sku yi rig pa 'dzin pa de// 'gu ru bslab bya snod dam tshig/ lung dang

ldan dang mi ldan dang// gnas dang sgyu dang rdzas la sogs// ngo bo ma lus gang yang rung// rgyud dang gnas pa bshad du gsol// gang dang gang du gar gnas par// de dang de ru bstan par 'gyur// dur khrod

dang ni lha khang dang// ri yi rtse dang chu yi 'gram// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'du ba dang// gdug pa gnas par nges par gtad// ma lus pa yi las rnams bya// lta spyod sgrub par ldan pa la// brda dang phyag rgya kun la

mkhas// nges par sdug dang dam ma gnas// dpa' la sems kyi stobs kyang che// sku dang sgrub la rab tu brtson// de dang rab tu dang bar gnas// bar du gnas pa'i dus dang ni// phur bus tshes dang gza' dus

'dzin// nyi shu bdun nam tshes gcig tu// bdud kyi nyi ma brdam pa la// gza' dang dus dang bra bzang ba/ bsnyen dang bsgrub pa'i dus su bstan// sku yi rnal 'byor dam pa des// tshogs kyi 'byor pa ldan byas

la// mchod dang bsgrub dang 'khor lo'i rdzas// sha khrag bdud rtsi snying sna dang// dur khrod rdzas dang lum bu dang// mi khrag spu bo che dang chung/ kha kha shung dang dur khrod skud// dpal dang bdud chas dgu dang
yang// de nas rab tu gnas par bya// chos kyi sku la rab gnas pa'i/ khams gsum 'khor ba ma lus pa// sgyu ma mig yor tshul du gnas// stong gsum sku ru gnas bcas pa'i// theg dman blo chung shes rab

zhan// bsgrub par bya ba ming yang med// gnyis ka rab tu sreg par snang// de na rab tu gsang bar bya// sangs rgyas bdag nyid ngo bo nyid// ye shes sang nge sa ler gnas// rtogs pa'i bla ma dam pa des// bla
med nges par bsgrub par bya// srog la mi lta rdzas mi chags// bla ma dam pa rab tu mchod// gsang thub bskal par rab tu gnas// som nyi dang ni the tsom med// sran thub gsang ba'i man ngag
la// snod ngan dag la mi sbyin cing// dam dang bka' las gnas pa yi// 'jam dpal las dang rgyud las grol// brtson 'grus che la skyo ngas med// gnas 'khor dus dang bdag nyid gnas// rigs 'dzin
dngos grub dam pa grub// so so'i las dang rgyud 'di dag/ mi g.yo rab tu brtan par 'gyur// dur khrod la sogs mang po kun// dngos med nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon 'dra// dag pas dag pas sems can
grol// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa lung rdzogs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal 'jigs byed rgyal pos/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mi 'gyur bar snang ba zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// dngos po ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i// ngo bo dag pa gang la bgyis// de las

'gro don ji ltar sprul// ces gsol pa dang// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// rang bzhin yod pa ma yin te// rang sems sna tshogs dag tu snang// sems nyid las ni gzhan med phyir// phyi nang chos su snang ba
kun// snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// dper na mkha' la 'ja' snang tshul// sems nyid ci la'ang mi rtog cing// ci la mi dmigs mi sems pa// sems nyid rang bzhin med pa de// de bzhin nyid de chos skur

gnas// de nyid ma dag ngo bo las// chu zla dang ni 'ja' ltar snang// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// kun la khyab kyang ma rtogs pa// des na 'khrul ba snying re rje// snang ba chos skur dag pa yin// rang bzhin ci

yang ma yin pas// ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'grub// stong pa nyid dang snying rje dang// sku nyid cir yang snang ba dang// gnyis med spro dang bsdu ba 'byung// zhes gsungs so// nyid kyi byang chub sems dag

las// 'byung ba rnams ni rang las sprul// spro dang bsdu ba rang rgyud smin// rgyu yi ngo bo gzhal yas khang// phyi dang nang kun gru gsum la// lcags mkhar me 'od dur khrod brgyan// dbus su ru tra pho mo

bsnol// ma he'i steng du 'dug pa yi// steng zhal yab yum 'khor lo bsgom// cho ga gsum mam lnga ru bskyed// de dag mdun nam spyan drung du// gshin rje gshed po bsgom dang bskyed// hU~M dang ya dang ma ma
las// rang rang sngags kyis bskul zhing dmigs// las kyi khro bor dbang yang bskur// ting 'dzin de la dbang thob nas// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po dang// ci 'dod las rnams gdon mi za// sems kyi dngos
po cir yang btub// des na sna tshogs cir yang sprul// gdug pa tshar gcod don du snang// dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma yang// dus dang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// sku yi phyag rgya lung du
bstan// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las// dkyil 'khor 'byung 'jug gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos/ sku gsum mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par

zhugs te/ mthu stobs kyi bdag po nyid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// thabs kyi 'gro don bya ba yi// bzhi dang bskul ba'i las ni bya// sku dang sbyor ba'i gnas skabs dang// cho 'phrul ngo bo gang las byung// sku

dang sngags dang sbyor byas nas// hU~M ni ma lus bskyed dang sdud// ha ni thams cad sdud pa ste// nga ni ma lus de la gnas// zhabs bskyed ma lus 'dus ba'i sku// sku ni sprul pa lnga yis skyed// 'go de dang yang

'tshams su sbyar// hU~M e yaM raM khaM su laM// gnyis kyi cho 'phrul lnga ru 'gyur// thams cad ma lus 'dus pa bsgoms// bruM las rang bzhin gnas par bya// las ni rang rang so sor byed// oM ni ye shes lnga dang

ldan// oM A kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha ban dza hU~M phaT/ 'bru rnams gsang sngags don dang ldan// ngo bo sa bon de la gnas// tshig tu brjod pas skur yang 'gyur// A+oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya man ta ka ban

tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ ye shes sku dang dam tshig dang/ khro bo ma lus sprul zhing 'gug/ yon tan lhun grub dam pa'i gsung// las rnams gang yang snyes bar byed// gang dag sngags 'di gang 'dzin pa// ci 'dod las

rnams grub pa bsnyems// gshin rje'i lha tshogs mang po dang// rdo rje g.yon dang srin mo'i sngags// ma ma ma dang ya 'khril bas// gdug pa'i sbyor yum pa ta li// ma ma rag sha ya ga sha hU~M dzA hU~M/ ya ma rA dza nri dzA/

ma ma ru lu ma he b+h+yo hU~M phaT/ bdud 'dul khro bo khro mo rnams// ma lus de dag rnam par spro// lha tshogs ma lus ngor bstan te// oM hriSh+ti bi kr-i ta na na hU~M phaT/ bcu bdun sngags dang nyi shu dang// rang rang sngags
dang 'bru rnams kyis// bsgom brgyud gsal bar rab tu brtags// 'jigs byed 'khor bcas thugs ka ru/ sngags kyi 'od zer skur spros kyang// spros pas stong gsum sku yis gang// bstan dang gnas dang nga
rgyal las// ma lus chos su de 'dus so// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bskyed pa gsung gis 'dul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal 'jigs byed rgyal po des// gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor bzhir 'debs zhes bya ba dang/ drang zhing bskul pa la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ ye nas dkyil 'khor dag pa la// gang nas chos sku ye shes dang// bcom ldan dpal chen
khro rgyal ni// bzhengs shig chos sku'i ngang las bzhengs// yab yum de yi ngang la gnas// chos sku ye nas 'khrul la snang// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa la// bzhengs dang spyan drangs mi 'gyur
yang// 'gro don sprul pas chos kyi sku las bzhengs// chos sku sprul pas 'gro don spyan 'dren na// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// gdug pa ma lus 'dul zhing
gshegs par bya'o// nyon mongs zhe sdang gdug pa'i gnas nas kyang// khro rgyal gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// sprul pa cir yang gnas pa las// ma lus kun tu grub par shog/ 'jam dpal gshin

rje gshed po ni// chos nyid ye nas dag pa la// khro bo 'bar ba'i sku ru byung// dur khrod 'bar ba'i rab tu brgyan// gdug pa'i sku la khro bo'i nga ro sgrogs// sku yi cha lugs sku mdog khro la nag/ yi dam rgyal po
dgongs pa bskongs mdzad pa// 'jigs byed sku la dad pas rab tu 'dud// shin tu yig 'bru khro 'dus las// mchod rdzas ma lus gsang ba yi// 'bru dbyangs sems kyis rab sprul pa// phyogs bcu thams
cad kun tu gang// nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig pas sprul// gza' gtad longs spyod bdud rtsis gang// phyogs bcu'i 'jam dpal 'khor bcas la// dug gsum gdug pas mnyes par bya// rang gi rig pa skur
ma mthong// ling ltog bdun pas 'khor ba'i g.yang sar 'khyams// thugs rje gzigs ldan khyod la rab tu mthol// dpal chen gsal zhing rab tu sbyangs// gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// khro mchog
yab yum spyan drangs la// bstan dang mi 'gyur mchod pas mchod// brnyan ma dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad la// mu khyud bar khyams ldan par bya// gshed chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs dgod// mchod pa dus bzhi
lha mos su// spro dang bsdu ba'i las su bya// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mtshams sbyor rig pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang 'jigs byed rgyal pos/ dkyil 'khor rgyun du
drangs pa dang/ dam la gnas pa zhes bya ba la snyoms bar zhugs te/ de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ mnyam nyid ngang gis sprul sku dben pa dang// ma rig dngos po don du bskyed pa dang// skal pa'i
ngo bo gang dang gang du grang// zhes gsol to// bskyed thabs cho 'phrul lnga las gshen rjer snang// gshed chen 'khor dang bcas pas bskor// drag po'i las su gdug pa ma lus 'dul// sku mdog mthing nag

chos skur ye nas dag/ dbu dang phyag zhabs cir yang sprul pa'i sku// mtshan nyid cir yang snang yang sems nyid pas// phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'phrul// sa zin dag tu mi snang bas// rnal 'byor ci 'dod
dag tu snang// dbus gsum pa la phyag drug po// spyan dgu zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs// 'bar ba'i sdang mig glog ltar 'khyug/ phyag drug 'gro drug gdug pa 'dul// zhabs drug dor thabs

brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'khor ba stong mdzad dur khrod 'bar ba'i chas// rtse gcig gdug pa 'dul phyir sku ru bzhengs// oM A kro te ka ya man ta ka ya ma rA dza sA mA ya stoM/ e h+ya hi/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ dza hU~M

baM ho/ oM sa ma ya man 'dzu shri mu tra/ ya man ta ka pan tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ ya man k+sha yA/ dzA dzA/ 'gu ya u kram dzA dzA/ sa ma yA dzA hU~M/ hri sti a na ya hU~M phaT/ khyed kyi gsung ni khro mchog ste// gdug pa thabs 'dul

ma lus gshegs su gsol// oM ya man ta ka dzA/ yA ma ra dza hU~M/ 'ag+hu ya dz+nyA na muM/ man 'dzu shri byin dz+nyA na/ ya ma dza ya nan/ mu kha le kha thun mug nan/ oM ya ma rA dzA kha thun/ ya ma rA dzA hU~M/ oM shri a kro bya tsir dza

hU~M/ haM he ro de bag dzA/ dzA hU~M baM ho dzA dzA/ oM shri man 'dzu ya man ta ka/ ka ma ru pa hU~M dzA/ gdug byed sa ma ya b+h+yo/ gdug byed rag sha haM/ a la la b+h+yo hU~M/ ya ma ra dza sa to/ me ya rbad thuM ri li li/ phyag rgya gsal

ba'i snying po 'dis// ma lus ye shes sku ru snang// rgyun du brtsal ba bcu gnyis so// las su so so'i rang bdag sngags// sngags dang phyag rgya dam pa 'dis// thams cad ma lus 'dar cing skrag/ 'jam dpal
gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos// dkyil 'khor du thams cad 'dus par mchod pa la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba'i
bdag pos gsol ba/ dkyil 'khor gdon dang mnyes dang spro// gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsang bar byos// mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes sku// khro mo ma lus sku ru
'dus// bdag nyid dpal chen gsang ba'i bdag/ 'khor dang bcas pa bsam par bya// thugs kar nyi zla kha sbyor sbyar// 'od dang bcas pa hU~M du bsgoms// rtsa ba'i sngags dang 'brus su skor// sngags kyi

'brus brdas 'bru ru 'phro/ khams gsum ma lus sku ru gang// khro bo mi bzad de dag kyang// rang rang sku dang gsung du gnas// 'od zer 'bar nas sku la bstim// 'dus shing 'phros pas sku ru snang// bskyed
dang 'dus pa ma lus bya// dam tshig ro dang tshogs la gnas// oM dang aMHhU~M dag las// 'jig rten 'khor yug dkyil 'khor du// dngos po ma lus longs spyod kyi// yaM dang raM dang baM las su// stong gsum

'bras bu byin gyis brlabs// 'dus pas gtor tshogs mchod sbyin bya/ kha kha khA hi khA hi b+han d+ha yA b+han d+ha yA/ to sha yA to sha yA/ sarba A na ya hU~M/ 'bun dzA ho/ bi ba to/ b+ha lin ta/ kha kha hU~M/ rang rang sngags
kyis sbyin dang mchod// tshogs gnyis rab tu rnam par dag/ ma lus mnyes dang dam pa bskong// rnam dag mchod pa rgya mtsho ste// nam mkha'i dbyings na gang bar bsgoms// ma lus mchod pa dam
pa 'grub// ting 'dzin nges par rgyas par bya// ma lus dag tu rab tu nges// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sku spro mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed rgyal pos/ sngon
'gro rgyun du gnas pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las gsang ba'i las rnams ni// thugs rje can gyis bshad du
gsol// dpal dang 'gu ru spun la byams// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun du gnas// gnas dang gzhan la spro ba men// cha lugs dag la rab tu bstod// bsnyen bsgrub dus la rab tu 'bad// dur khrod rdzas la
dus su 'dun// bsgrub dang 'gu ru dag la ni// las rnams ma lus rab 'byam sogs// gsang ba'i sngags dang sa ma ti// dus gsum dag tu rgyun du gnas// sku yi dam pa gsung mthun la// rgyun nam yang na
dam du gnas// dpa' brtul tshang ngam spyod pa bya// sdig mdzub phyar zhing gdug pa 'dul// dus gsum dag gis phyir yab la// rtag tu dad pas rab tu bya// de la gnas na las rnams 'grug/ snying rje byang

chub thob pa med// bsgral ba'i lung dang byang sems rtogs// sku gsum spyod lam gyi gnas na// sdom pa ma lus spyod pa yin// ma mnyam gzhung dang gso dang bskangs// las rnams kun la rab brtson na// rnal

'byor zhes kyang de ru grags// dus gsum rnam par mchod pas mchod// 'du 'dzi spang la dgon par gnas// gsang sngags sgra dang spyod pa rnams// gzhan gyis mi mthong thos mi bya// tshogs rgyu sha dang khrag la

rol// dur khrod ras ni gdug pa la// gshin rje gshed po bri zhing ldan// mchod dang ma sa zas su za// rgyun dang rtag tu gnas pa na// ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par nges// sku yi bzhin dang ngo bo ni// rtogs

dang snang dang dngos po kun// rtog pa log pa ma yin te// de nyid sku dang sku ru snang// rang nyid dag par ma rtog par// 'khrul sems ngan pa gdug pa ste// 'khor bar gnas nas thar mi srid// zhe sdang rgyu ru
byas nas su// bsad dang bsgral ba'i zhe gzhag nas// gzhi la sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i rgyud// dus dang rnam pa thams cad du// bdag nyid dpal chen gshin rje'i sku// g.yas dang g.yon ni sbyor dang

sgrol// mdun nas gshin rje'i sprul pa 'phro// thams cad khro bo'i tshogs dang rol// sprul pa ma lus tshogs su snang// gzhi ni dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas// dang po gnas bdag bya'i phyir// sku lnga 'khor lo'i
tshul du bsgom// rang rang gnas su gsal ba dang// bsgrub dang bzlas pas gsang gnas sbyin// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dam tshig spyod pa rgyun gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas
'jigs byed gdug pa des// mi bzad srin po rol pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// phyag mtshan rdo rje sku 'chang ba// gsang ba'i bdag po sku 'chang
ba// ma lus gdug pa mi bzad pa'i// srin mo gtum mo dam pa de// cho 'phrul gsum rnams bshad du gsol// ces pas/ gshin rje pho mo gdug pa kun// rang rang las dang bya ba kun// gnyis dang gsum du
bya bar gsungs// brjod med gdul bya 'di gsungs pas// 'jig rten khams rnams rab tu 'khrugs// gsang sngags don gyingo bo las// gshin rje gdug pa mi bzad pa// pho mos 'jigs rten ma lus

bskang// dbu gsum phyag ni drug pa'am// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bzhin mi sdug/ dbu dang zhabs ni khros pa'i tshul// dbu skra spyi bcings ral gri thogs// sku che yan lag rag par snang// gshin rje'i srin mo
gtum pa mo// brda ni mi phrad bzhin mi sdug/ khrag dang zhag gis mnga' bdag byed// sems can ma lus dbang du sdud// shin tu gtum pa ma mo'i tshogs// e ka nag po gtum pa dang// bdud mo dpon dang

g.yog tu bcas// gcer bu ma bgrungs bdud kyi bu// gdug pa'i zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs// lag na tri shul lcags kyu dang// thod khrag tsi ta stob pa mo// dur khrod rgyan gyis sku la brgyan// sbas pa ma bzhi

'khor dang bcas// rang rang sprul pa yang sprul bdag/ de dag sngags kyis bsnyes dang gzir// oM sA ma ya man 'dzu shri/ ya man ta ka/ ya mar dza/ rab tu khros pas 'jig rten dag/ gdug cing rtsub pa'i sgra

dang bcas// ma lus gdug pa dbang du bsdus// thams cad kun gyis yang snying phul// ma ma e ka dzA ti dzA dzA/ trag rag sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rag mo te ku ma dzA dzA/ kha kha ma hi b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya lon/ tsin

dan ma la b+h+yo dzA/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ sngags 'chang dngos grub ci 'dod pa// thabs dang shes rab 'od zer gyis// 'jam dpal yab yum 'khor dang bcas// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs

'grub// rtsa ba 'bod dang skyed ba dang// srog sngags bas dang bsgrub pa gnad// thugs dam bskul dang rang rang sngags// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le che// gsung gi cho 'phrul sgrar grags nas// g.yo sgyu med
par ma lus bdus// thugs dam chen po sa ma yA// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rtsa sngags kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos gnyis med kyi brdas bskul
nas/ dkyil 'khor dbang bskur gnas pa la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ ma lus thabs dang rol pas sprul// ngo bo mi 'gyur cir sprul pa// de dag ma lus bstan du
gsol// bsam yas dkyil 'khor bsam yas pa// rigs gsum sngags kyi ngang la bzhag/ gzhal yas dag par gdan rnams rdzogs// las dang bskul ba rang rang rgyud// rtsa sngags thugs mchog phyag rgyar
gsal// rang rang gnas su rdzogs pa dang// 'byung 'jug sku dang ngo bor snang// bskul ba ye shes brda dang tshig/ rol pas gnyis med dgyes pa'i tshul// 'phros pas 'dus nas gdan stengs gnas// rang
rang sngags kyi gdan stengs gsal// spyan drangs dgyes dang mchod bstod dang// bzlas pa rgyun du dus gsum brtags// stong gsum ma lus sprul skur spro// 'jig rten gsum po rab tu g.yos// dkyil 'khor
lnga dang bdun yang rung// rang rang 'khor bcas 'khor lor bshad// tshul du ye nas gnas par bshad// sku yi 'khor bcas de dag la// zhag grangs dus dang mtshan ma yang// rab tu rgyun du gnas pa
dang// 'jigs byed rab tu gdug pa tsam// bsgrub la mnyes pas dbang yang gnas// phan dang gnod pa'i las kun gnas// 'jam dpal rnon po rnams kyi sku// snang ni ci yang snang mod kyi// bzhi'am ngo bo

lnga bsgoms pas// gang phyir ci dang ci la gnas// nga yi dus ni gang yin pa// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// nga yi 'gro ba cis 'dul ba// shes rab zung gis dbu lnga ru// khrag 'thung lnga yi 'phreng ba

bsgoms// rdo rje rnon po'i sku dang ni// cod pan 'phreng ba rgya gram dang// ral gri bum pa bsnyen byas pa// ma lus rang gi tshig don sgrags// bsgom pa dang ni bsgrub pa dang// rang dang rgyud dang las su

byin// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur ba'i// dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma 'grub// ma lus yab yum sa ma ya stom// sa ma ya ho/ a la la ho/ ra ho haM/ ra ga ya maM/ rlung dang me dang smin pas 'grub// rol pas
ma lus rnam par spro// hU~M las rdo rje paM las pad// yab yum mkha' gsang 'bru ru bsgoms// gsang ba'i sku rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu// spro bsdu gang 'dod dmigs bsgrub// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/
bsgrub pa po la dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed rgyal pos/ 'jigs byed las kyi gdug pa tshar gcad pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje
khyod// 'jam dpal rgyud kyi gsang ba 'di// 'jigs byed sgyu 'phrul ldan pa ste// e ma gdug pa 'dul bya ba// ma lus ngo bo bstan du gsol// bsad pa'i ngo bo'i gnas bstan pa// bsad pa ma lus yang dag
'grub// snying rjes yang dag gdug pa bsad// sngon du gnas pa rdzogs byas la// de la rgyu rnams gnas pa ni// dur khrod dag dang 'bur chos gos// ru ru ra dang ka na ka/ thal chen dag dang ru ga

tsa// rme bo'i khrag dang gdug pa'i dug/ ming byang khro bo'i snag tsha bya// dur khrod ro skra blang ba dang/ kha kha rog po bshas pa'i rtsa// 'khor lo bri dang gnas par bya// rim pa gsum du bskor ba yang// dbus la mi
