'gyur gdab par bya// 'khor lo rim pa gnyis su bskor// bcu bdun sngags kyi 'phreng bas spras// 'khor lo'i rim pa de ru gdab// gdug pa za byed 'chi bdag bri// lho ru srid pa'i 'khor lo bzhugs// lho
phyogs dur khrod 'chi bdag ni// gnas nas bkug la dbyer med bstim// mchod de 'phrin las bcol bar bya// byin brlabs las ni gshed du bsgoms// lus kyi thal ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i// dbyug pa thogs
shing zhags pas 'ching// srid pa gsum du rnam par 'khrugs// bcu bdun sngags dang las sngags spel// bdun dang bdud du las rnams bskor// gdug pa myos byed thun rnams ni// rang rang dus dang
bshams la brdeg/ 'jig rten dag dang lhar sbyar ba// gdug pa de 'dul nag po la// gru gsum dag tu 'khor lo bri// dus gsum rgyun du bsgrub pa bya// bcu dang bdun gyis las kyi sngags// gdug dang

bsreg dang byug pa bya// las kyi rnam pa myur byas la// rang rig dpal gyi skur gnas pas// bsdu dang spel ba'i gsang sngags bzlas// ya dang ma dang ra dang tsa// sa do me yang gzhib dang btabs// dbus nas

mgo bo snang bar bya// ya dang yon ri lak+she ya// dang po dus su bzhi ru bshad// de ni ru sprad dus ltar bya// ya me do ru na yo da ya// dang po'i 'og ma mtha' ru bshad// yak+she ya dza ni ra ma ya// ru sbrad brgyad du ya

yis bshad// mgo la ya dang me ru mtshon// rab tu bar dag rgyan gyis brgyan// tha ma rang sngags gang 'dod gzhung// ya mar dza gshin rje gshed// 'khor lo bskor ba nyin bzhi'i las/ kha thun kha la thun du

'bud// oM ya mar dza sa to me yA b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu baM ri li li rbad nan/ oM dub nur dub nur/ tshal pa tshal pa nan/ oM snying gshogs/ me kha la mu lo rtsa thun nan/ ma ra ya nan/ oM swasti ru ru tsa gong kra ra tsa nan/

ma ra ya nan/ oM a kro te ka man 'dzu shri/ ka la ru pak+sha ya nan/ baM ril rbad ru lu hU~M dzA/ ru lu tshal pa yin no// sha ru ni nan/ ma ra ya nan/ oM zhes dang po tha ma sgrol// gtub dang bsreg pa thun du
dbab// las kyi gnas su ma lus rang// ma ra ya dang ming du spel// gdug pa'i rdzas la rab tu sngags// gnas nas dgug dang las rnams bya// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las// 'phrin las gnas kyi
le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal 'jigs byed gsang bas ting nge 'dzin rol pa zhes bya ba la gnas nas/ gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad gsol to// gshin rje rol pa de dag
rnams// 'jig rten gdug pa mi bzad 'dul// las rnams ma lus rol mdzad pa// byang chub rol pas nga la thud// chos sku nam mkha' mtshan ma la// nam mkha'i ngo bo ci yang med// snang ba 'jig rten gshin

rje'i sku// tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs gshin rje'i sku// tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs sku gsung thugs// rgyu yi sku yis 'gro don mdzad// bsgom dang gnyen po ci spyad kyang// byang chub la ni g.yos pa med// gdul bya

sna tshogs ma lus pa// ci la mos dang cis 'dul ston// a ni byang chub sems nyid las// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku sprul pa// sna tshogs 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// gsang ba'i rgyud mchog dam pa yi// sngags dang
phyag rgyas byin brlabs nas// bcom ldan gshin rje'i sku ru snang// cis 'dug ci dang gang yang rung// bsad pa la sogs smos ci dgos// 'phrin las 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// gsang ba'i rgyud mchog dam pa

'di// mi bzad de dang de rnams kyang// rang gi ngo bo de ltar dmigs// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi sras// mthu chen ma lus dbang du sdud// sku yi chos rnams ma lus pa// re'i yon tan brjod mi lang// nges
pa'i bla ma dam pa des// nges pa'i bzhi dang ngo bor gyur// khrag 'thung 'jam dpal sku la 'dud// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas par bya// yid bzhin gtsug gi nor bur 'gyur// bdag gis bsam pa brtan pa
yis// bsam pa'i ye shes blo gros ldan// mtha' rnams gnyis la mi lta zhing// nyon mongs gdug pa bral bar byed// ma lus sku dang thugs su bstan// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las sgrol
bzhi'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal yA mA rA dzAs/ thams cad la las bya ba dang// 'khor lo mi 'gyur snang ba ste// 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// lag na rdo rjer gsang ba
gyis// bdud bzhi gdug pa 'di yis choms// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos sku de// de la mi gnas rgyu 'drar byas// gnas dang slob ma rdzas rnams dang// rgyu yi ngo bo ma lus pa// rtags de nges par gzung bar
bya// rab tu rim gsum dkyil 'khor la// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu// bcu gnyis dang ni bcu drug dang// gru chad bar khyams sgo ru bcas// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum// dbus su 'jigs byed
chen po la// g.yas g.yon lus dang grib mar snang// gshin rje ma he gdan du bcas// rnam pa mchog tu rdzogs par gsal// zhal dang phyag zhabs sku mdog mthing// phyogs bzhi las kyi gshed bzhir
snang// gzugs rnams sna tshogs ci 'dul ston// rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rjer bshad// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor de// gnas nas nye bar bsgrub pa'i phyir// dbyings nas bzhengs
dang spyan drangs mchod// bstod dang mchod pa'i gnas su bya// yi ge gsungs kyi yan lag bsgrags// dbus kyi gshed po 'khor dang bcas// rang sngags yi ge sngags tshig dang// ji ltar bsgrub na las smin

'gyur// pho dang mo ru kha sbyor ba// thod pa ras dang gdug pa yi// mi bzad 'chi bdag gsang ba bri// rtsa ba bcu bdun sngags dang ldan// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las lnga yi bsnyen pa

'di'o// oM A kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha ban dza hU~M phaT/ oM ka la ru pa hU~M phaT/ oM hriSh+ti bi kri ta na na hU~M phaT/ oM sa mA ya Ar+ya man 'dzu shri mu tra ya man ta ka/ pan tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/

ya me do ru na yod ya/ ya ta yo nir ya k+she ya/ yak+she ya tsa ni ra ma ra ya/ dbus su ya dang lho ru ma// shar du k+she ni nub tu me// byang du rta zhes bri bar bya// ra dza sa to ru na yo ni/ ra ya dza ni 'bru bcu gnyis// phyi
rim dag la dgod par bya// 'khor lo bri dang btun nas bskor// thod pa la sogs rang rang rdzas// ma lus gsang ba bcu bdun bri// g.yas su grangs dang g.yon du drang// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa chen po

bya// 'khrul dang 'khor dang bsdu ba dang// dam pa'i gsang ba de dag kun// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug la// gtor dang gril dang ru khug bya// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i zhal du gdangs// rngam pa'i brda dang
tshig tu bskul// 'jig rten sgrol byed yig 'bru nyi ma'i zer// ting 'dzin grang ldan gdug pa ma lus 'byed// shes rab thabs ldan 'jigs pa'i sku ru sprul// ma lus sgrol ba'i gsung bkod 'khor lo'i
gsung// rdo rje 'jigs pa'i 'phrin las ye nas 'grub// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo dang 'byung gnas sngags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal gshin rje'i rgyal pos/ 'byung po
ma lus dgug pa dang// las kyi mtha' la gnyer gtad bya// zhes gsungs te// stobs can rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// dngos grub sbyin dang spel bya dang// 'jigs byed dpal gyi skur gnas na// bye brag dag tu

gsol bar bya// dus gsum cho 'phrul rab tu gnas// nyams su rang rang 'grub pa tsam// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka/ man dzu shri ka la ru pa sha/ mu khyud sngags dang rang gis mthu// ci phyir gdug pa'i las su

rtsam// ma lus 'dus pa'i gsang ba ste// 'byung po'i gtor ma rab tu brgyan// oM a hU~M/ dza hU~M baM ho/ ar+ya man 'dzu shri/ ya man ta ka ma ma rag sha ni b+h+yo// oM b+ha ling ta/ ba lin ti/ ti bya ni/ ta ki ni 'da'

sha khe ta 'ba' te be khra/ sa ma ye/ lo ga pa sar/ me ta li/ su tri kro ta si ha ba ri/ kha rag hU~M/ ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me do ru na yo da ye/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+she ya/ yak+she ya tsa ni ra ma ra ya/ tsa

tur sur rgya/ ya ma bo ti swAhA/ yag sha sarba bud+d+ha pre ta yag sha ya k+she khro ti/ sarba bi ta khar/ i daM b+ha ling g+hi ha na/ b+han dza ho/ si pa to/ sa ma ya/ ma tri shaM/ ma ta hU~M/ ar+ya man 'dzu shri/ ya man ta ka sarba a dz+nyA pa

ya ti/ mahA ya ma ra dza ye/ sarba dus bstan bag+sha ya bag+sha ya/ sarba karmA hU~M/ tu ru tu ru/ laM hU~M laM hU~M/ ku ru ku ru hU~M phaT/ ki ri ki ri hU~M phaT/ sarba sha truM na sha yA/ staM pa ya hU~M phaT swAhA/ phyag rgya bsgom dang rgyun du

gnas// dgongs pa ma lus thams cad mnyes// sna tshogs ma lus cig bsgo nyan// nam mkha'i ngang la skar tshogs 'byung// byung dang ma byung da ltar gyi// bu tsa rab tu dad pas snang// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i
rgyud las/ thams cad reg chod kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas dpal gshin rjes thams cad tshogs su gzhom pa dang bsgral ba la gnas te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ gdug pa ma lus sgral

sngags dang// ci phyir gzhi dang las su bstan// ma lus snang ba bsgral byas na// ci yang 'dul byed khyod la 'dud// ya ma ra dzas to me ya/ snying rtsa la khrag skyug/ rus dang rtsa la breng yak+sha te kum/ bram bram snying

kha kha khrag mug/ snying dang nang khrol la khrag rbad/ dgung la thog thog mi zad pa// khye'u chung sngon po ma yin nam// ya man ta ka gshin rje gshed// ya mar dza 'jigs byed yin// de dag la chem chem mi bzad pa//
sgeg mo ral gcig gshin rje'i yum// dpal ldan nag mo ma yin nam// ya ma ra dza gdug pa 'dul// bsgral bya ma lus khyod la gtad// zas su gtad do sho ra re// gdug pa 'di yi gshed du byos//

ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ sarba sha tun na sha tu ya/ staM pa ya/ ma ra ya/ ku ru ku ru hU~M phaT swAhA/ nga rgyal dregs pa ma lus pa// rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya// mtshan gyi gung la rab tu dgug/
nri ma ra ya/ nri ma ra du/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ tshal pa baM ril/ dum bu dum bu hU~M phaT/ rmug pa'i sems ni gang yang rung// de dang de ru 'gug par byed// rnam shes rlung gi rang bzhin de//
nam mkha'i srin bu me khyer ltar// gzugs la phab la byad du gzhug sngon du gnas pa'i sems can de// lce phog nag po'i dud pas bdug/ lha dang bral zhing bdug pas bdug/ gnas nas lnga ru phur pas gdab//

thun brdeg nyungs kar mtshon gyis gtub// sha dang rus pa 'khor lo bstab// sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes kyang// ma lus 'di yis 'joms par byed// lha dang phyag na rdo rje yang// gsang ba'i sngags 'dis 'gug par byed// u pa rde
sha ka ri ka/ zhes sku dang las mngon du phyung ngo// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gdug pa sngags kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos/ las

rnam par sbyang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// shin tu 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi// las su bya dang gdul bya'i phyir// ma lus nges don las rdzogs bya// kun tu 'jam dpal ting

'dzin bya// sna tshogs rang gi ting 'dzin 'jug/ ma lus zhi dang rgyas pa'i phyir// sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshogs ldan pas// rang gi las su bya ba dang// gnas dang dus dang bdag nyid kyis// rdzas dang bya ba rnam phye

ba// mi 'dul kha lo rnams bsgyur ba// bdag nyid gshed po'i cha lugs su// lnga dang gsum gyi rim byas la// las kyi bya ba ma lus par/ kha dog so so'i sku ru gnas// ma lus sgyu yi phyag mtshan las// ngag
gis rab tu brdams nas su// gdug pa'i myos byed rdzas rnams dang// rang gi rig pa'i 'khor lo bri// rim pa gsum du gnas pa de// dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu drug bri// bcu bdun sngags kyi 'od zer
sku// 'dog sngags rang rang ming dang spel// 'khor lo yab dang yum dang bcas// gdug pa'i las su 'di yis bya// tsa tra dang ni stobs dag dang// tsan tra ma ni ya ma khros// sngags dang ming du spel la
gzhug/ de nas stobs dag ma lus dang// bsnyen pa'i rtsa sngags 'jug ma yang// ma nor las su spel bar bya// zhi ba shan ti ku ru dang// pus ting pa shaM ku ru dang// ma ra ya dang ming du bcas// re

dang bdud dang bral ba dang// gang du ci bya dbang du bya// bsnyen bsgrub gzhung bzhin 'bad de bya// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma ni// bstan dang gnas dang las grub bya// chos dbyings ye nas khyad par gnas// gshin

rje gshed po'i sku dang yang// 'khor dang ma tshogs skar ltar 'khrugs// gang la bya ba de dang der// 'od zer rang re'i lung du spro// spyan drangs bzhugs dang bstan par bya// mi g.yo khros pa'i tshul can
de// dga' dang bstod mnyes ci rung bstan// de dag thugs dang 'khor lo ru// gang gi 'bru rnams bsam byas la// bsgrub bya mdun du bzhugs par bsam// bdag gi 'bru dang 'od zer las// sprul pa gang bya

de la 'dud// bsad dang g.yo dang lus dang phan// ci dang ci ru rab tu bsgoms// ma lus phye ba'i phyag rgya 'dus// phyi ma yang ni thog pa med// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ las rnam
bzhi'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas dpal khrag 'thung rgyal pos/ las kyi mchod pa dang mnan pa bsreg pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin// las rnams ma lus rdzogs
byas nas// stong gsung dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsal// sna tshogs me yi ting nge 'dzin// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// me thab las kyi gzhung du gnas/ kha dog rdzas ni rnam pa bzhi// dkar dang

ser dang dmar dang nag/ de dag du ma yo byad ldan// bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod las bsgo// las su bya ba rdzogs pa dang// me yi bdag po'i las rnams bya// gdug pa'i shing las me spar te// me las rgyu yi
las bya ste// gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// zhe sdang gdug pa bsgral ba'i phyir// thams cad ma lus mchod par bzhes// 'gro ba'i sa ru rdzogs byas na// rnam bzhi'i las la rab tu gnas// gsang

ba'i gsang gtor rab tu bya// bram ze tsan d+ha li dang ni// ye shes gdug pa mes su sbyar// bcu dang bdun dang rang sngags rnams// brgya rtsa brgyad du rnam par mchod// gdod nas gdug pa ma lus pa// ma lus
zhi zhing bsgral lung bstan// rdzas dang brgyad bcas ma lus dang// rang dang gnas su stobs bcas la// me lha rang bdag gzhung du sbyar// gang gi gnas su rab tu rtags// las ni ma lus gnas bcas

so// oM hriSh+ti bi kri tAn na hU~M phaT/ bar du rang dang 'dod pa yang// gang dang gang du bya ba der// de dang de ru bya bar gzhug/ shan+ti ku ru/ pusiMT pa shang ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ dza hU~M baM ho/ sarba A na ya ho/ ma d+ha la ma
he/ a gad dza ya so pA dzA dzA/ shin tu 'khrug pa ma lus pa// sngon dang da lta las kyi bzhin// bsgrib pa med pa sa ya dang// ma lus de dag rab tu 'joms// 'jam dpal rnams kyi snang bar mdzod// ma lus

bshad cing dam tshig bsgrag/ A la la ho/ sa ma ya hU~M/ 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mchod sgrol sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos/ phyi nang rgyud
du rol pa la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba pos zhus pa/ mi dmigs stong pa ye nas gnas// de yi ngo bo gang du 'gyur// zhes pas/ 'jam dpal khro bo rnams kyi sku// cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang
snang// kun tu rin po che lta bu// bsgoms pas las rnams ma lus 'grub// de las rdo rje rab 'phros 'gyur// srid pa'i rlung yang mi shor gnas// shes bya gnas med mi rtogs pa// rim pa lnga dang gzhal yas

bsam// byang chub lnga las rdo rje'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog mthing// ngo bo stobs dag rdo rje'i sku// steng zhal yab dang yum du gsal// zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod chags dang// phrag dog sku bzhi khro rgyal
bzhi// rang bzhin lus dang phyag rgya dgod// lus kyi phyag la 'khor lo bri// drag sngags bcu bdun gnas su dgod// mi g.yo brtan nas spyan drangs mchod// bstan dang 'phrin las 'phro 'du bya// bdud bzhi
'joms byed gshed po yis// bcu bdun sngags kyi ngo bo yis// mo gshed thun sngags spel byas la// gzas pa 'khor lo'i bar du gril// rtsa ba'i sngags dang thun mong dril// bdud rtsi lnga dang
tshogs kyis mchod// thugs kyi rtags las lha mos mchod// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// ba la ba yi sgra byung bas// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpar snang// 'gro don byed pas dus gsum

mchod// sangs rgyas 'phrin las sku la rdzogs ye shes sku ste sku yi mchog/ snang ba chen po sku yi rgyal// de yi gsang sngags rig sngags mchod// sa ma ya dz+nyA na/ oM wA gi shwa ri muM/ gsang ba'i don de rab 'dzin
pa// 'gro ba'i don ni ma lus byed// 'jig rten bdag po gtso bor mthong// tshogs rdzogs ma lus thams cad 'grub// gzugs rnams ma lus kun tu sprul// 'jam dpal zhi dang khro bor snang// srid pa

gsum la sbyor dang sgrol// sa bon bskyed dang rgyun sngags dang// bskul dang ma lus rang gnas brjod// dga' ba mchod dang spro bsdu bzlas// oM sa mA yA man 'dzu shri mu ta ya man ta ka/ ka ta ri badzra tig sna/

sa ma ya phaT/ sum pa ni hU~M phaT/ ya sum b+ha ni hU~M phaT/ gsang ba pos ni bzlog pa bya// rnal 'byor rtsa ba nyi shu brjod// sku mdog 'od zer sgrib pa grol// sku mchog sku ru rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas 'phrin las
ma lus byed// phyag na rdo rje yang dag 'dud// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phyi nang rol pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas dpal 'jigs byed gsang bas/ mi 'dul las kyi mtha' ru skye bya ba
gsungs so// gsang ba pos ni las kyi bskongs// ci yang yin pas bsgrub bya dang// mtha' ru mi 'dul las kyi don// bdag don ma lus rab rtags bya// des su las gzhung rab rnyed pa// stong gsum 'og gi
khams dag na// mi bzad gdug pa'i grong khyer gnas// bdag dang 'khor bcas 'khor lor gnas// ri rab lam dang brum du sbyar// 'khor lo gdug pa'i tshogs la gtad// gdug pa'i gnas dang gnod

sbyin gnas// shin tu 'du bar sba byas te// gru gsum dngos dang dbyibs su bya// de ru las kyi rgyu gnas pas// khrag tu skyug dang mdze nad 'ong// ma lus de la 'dus par bya// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas
gdab// lag pa bsnol la sor mo dgug/ rab tu phye zhing dngos su gdab// gdug pa 'dul byed rngom pa'i gzugs// srin mo mi bgrungs 'khor dang bcas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam na// sems can
las ngan gdug pa rnams// byang chub ngang du mi gnas na// rgya mtsho gting gi grong khyer dang// gshin bu rje yi lag tu gtad// 'chi bdag gdug pa'i zas su byas// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs la
bskyon// las kyi 'khor bcas ma lus kyis// las ngan gdul bya gshed dus gyis// badzra lam su truM/ sa ma ya stoM/ sa mA ya hU~M nan/ ya ma ra dza nan/ 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo dang// de yi

mda' bzhugs 'chi bdag la// ma lus las ngan gnyer gtad do// oM laM hU~M laM/ ya man ta ka/ ar+ya A tsa la/ ma mo e ka dza ti/ rag sha nag po sa ma ya las la b+h+yo/ hU~M/ ri rab lhun po hU~M dang laM// sna
tshogs rgya gram zur brgyad bya// gshin rje gshed po nag po bsam// rdo rje rgya gram 'og tu ni// gtso bo bstod la rang sngags bskul// gzas ba ri rab chen por gnan// 'khor lo gsang ba'i las sngags

bskul// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag rnams// rims kyi ri rab sa dang sbyar// brtul zhugs can gyi mnyes byas la// gdug pa'i las sngags sham bu can// tsha ba'i rdzas la sngags la brag/ chos rnams ma lus
rgyas bya'i phyir// gtum pa tshogs kyi bsam gtan gyis// yang dang yang du ltug cing gnan// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel bar 'gyur// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ man ngag gshed gtad kyi le'u ste nyi
shu pa'o//// de nas dpal 'jigs byed rgyal pos/ ma lus spogs dang las kyi mtha'// 'di la don ni brgyad kyis bstan// gsang ba po la gsang bar byos// byang chub sems dang dbang phyug la// bdag
nyid 'khor bcas bsam par bya// sa dang bka' gnyan gdug pa 'dul// gang bsgo las su byed par 'gyur// de ni mi bzad steng dag tu// gdan dang rang rigs dur khrod rdzas// dngos po rang gi mtshan nyid
bya// rgya gram las bzhi gdug pa bcing// 'jam dpal khros pas phur pa'i sku// stod ni ya man ta ka la// smad ni gdug pa'i phur par bsgoms// ya ma ra dza yab yum kyang// sku ni phur pas rab tu

gdag/ yang na bla med 'khor lo bya// de nyid byin dang ldan pa'i phyir// yab yum gnyis med rol pa las// phur pa'i sku dang ngo bor bskyed// spyan drangs las la rab tu gzud// grangs su byas la bsgrub bsnyen

bkur// khro 'phreng snying gar bskul byas la// dus gsum 'byung gnas las su bya// gdug pa mi bzad thod pa ru/ khrag dug myos byed rdzas rnams la// ma mo nag mo rbad bya ste/ khrag dang nyungs kar phur pas

gdab// oM ya man ta ka k+sham/ ar+ya A tsa le k+sham/ ma dug rtsa rtsa/ tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad/ ma dug gshams ya nan k+sham/ srog rtsa mug ti rbad/ rtsa rtsa ra rtsa rbad/ ma mo khrag la dun ting stubs/ srin po'i rus

la choM choM tshal/ gshin rje'i khram la lhan lhan thob/ nra dzi khram ri li li rbad/ rag mo shan pa mar ya dzA dzA/ mgo 'phyangs ma dzA dzA/ dun rmugs bla rtsal dzA dzA/ rtsa bo che la dun rmugs/ nang khrol rmad lnga la rtsa thun

baM/ thum ri li li baM rbad rbad nri khrag thun thun rmug/ oM mug ti rngubs ya cho cho/ ya bal hub ya bal hub/ snying gong chod chod/ rtsa thun nan/ ma thun nan/ khrag thun khong khrag la ya rbad/ ma lus
gnas pa gzir zhing sgrol// kyi ma ru ti sgra dang bkrag/ gdug pa ma lus gnod du sngags// las kyi dus su thun dbab 'phang// sku yi cho 'phrul rab tu dgyed// 'bar ba 'jigs byed gtum sgra sgrog/ 'jam
dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thun sngags kyi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed rgyal pos/ dgyes pa yongs su skong ba dang// gshin rje sku'i cha lugs ma lus rtags pa zhes bya ba la snyoms
par zhugs te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa rab tu byos// yab gcig 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mdzad lha// gshin rje'i cha lugs shin tu 'jigs par ston// gshin rje'i sku ni 'bar ba'i rgyal po ste// shin tu 'jigs

shing gtum rngam drag shul che/ khyod la bdag gi dad pas bstod cing mchod 'bul na// bdag la khyod kyi yun du grogs mdzod cig khyod kyi thugs rje breng breng rgyun ma dgum// thugs rje dad pa'i shugs kyis ma
lus gshegs// bcom ldan ya man ta ka sku yi cha lugs ni// shin tu ngo mtshar gshin rje dpal la brjid/ khro rgyal dpa' brjid 'bar bas dgra bgegs 'dul// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed ni grags pa'i

brjid dang ldan// ma mo ging la 'jam dpal dbang sgyur zhing// rtag tu lha mchog bdag la grogs mdzod cig/ srin mo sha za stong ni bran du 'khol// ging chen pho mo rnams ni bran dang g.yog tu 'khol// klu rgyal
pho mo rnams ni sku la rgyan du byas// sha za gdug byed rnams kyis chas rnams dag par bstod// dpal chen gsung gi gdug pa'i nga ro bsgrogs// 'jam dpal sku yi thugs rjes bdag la dgongs// bcom ldan

'jigs byed rgyal po'i sku stod cig khro mo yum dang chas te sku ston la// g.yas nas yum bskyed e ke dza ti ma// g.yon nas yum bskyed badzra pe ta li// yum chen cha lugs khro rgyal sku dang mthun// sku mdog

mthing nag dbu gsum gdug pa'i dbu// spyan dgu smin ma glog stong 'od du 'phro// shangs dang zhal nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag/ rno dbal mche ba dug gsum rtsa ba gcod// phyag drug mi bzad gdug pa'i phyag
mtshan bsnams// zhabs drug brkyang bskum ma he'i steng du bgrad// sku la 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// bskal pa me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs pa'i nga ro'i sgra ni
'brug stong ldir// sgrol byed gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// gtum chen dregs pa thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dbang byed bdud 'dul dur khrod chas kyis brgyan/ khro rngam gdug pas srid gsum thal
bar rlogs// gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// gdug byed mtshon cha mang po
me dpung 'bar// rab 'jigs gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab brgyan nas// dur khrod sha za'i pags rlon na bzar gsol// sder chags sha za'i tshom bus thod du bcings/
khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed hU~M sgra can// zhal nas phaT bsgrags khams gsum stong mdzad pa// zhabs drug brkyang bskum brjid pas gshin rje mnan// ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas rdo rje thog chen
'bebs// 'khor gyi ma mo mi bzad bran du 'khol// tsham rngam drag po khro bo dkan gnyis brdabs pa yis// gdug pa'i 'khor rnams 'dar lcug lcug/ tshangs pa 'khor bcas rngul thigs phyogs bcur

'phro// lha chen khyab 'jug ma hA de ba gnon// phyag na b+han d+ha rlon pa rab bsnams shing// dngos grub 'khrug cing klad khrag zhal du gsol/ khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khra bsnams shing// ma lus gdug pa dag la

stong par mdzad// gshin rje nag po ya ma ra dza khro bo 'bum gyi rje// gtan gyi lhar yang khyod la gsol 'debs na/ khyod kyi thugs rjes rgyun du dgongs par mdzod/ khyung chen sngon po mkha' la lding ba bzhin/

khyod kyi sprul pa khye chung sngon po yis// nad gtong srin mo'i tshogs rnams dbang bsdus la// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa rdul du lhogs// 'jigs byed de yi thugs dam rgyud bskul ba// e ka dza ti gsang ba

ral gcig ma// mi 'pham khro gnyer g.yu yi ral pa can// ral pa sprug pa'i skra gseb re re nas/ khro chung zhal gsum phyag drug stong khams 'gengs// sku las sprul pa'i pho nyas stong gsum gang// kun kyang mi
bzad ral gri lcags kyu can// lcags kyus drangs nas dam nyams srog rtsa gcod// bstan pa 'jig pa ma lus dbang du bsdus// rnal 'byor mi bzad bstan la gnas// rdo rje be con rab gnas te// rgya mtsho
gting du 'bru ba dang// ri rab rtse la bsnyag par bya// 'jig rten khams su g.yab cing 'khrug/ 'khor lo'i gzugs bri zor zhing 'phang// sku ni ting 'dzin zas kyi mchog/ 'gu ru bla ma rab tu
'dud// longs spyod zas dang 'du shes sgrol// bsgrub dang rtags ni phrad mi bya// ma lus gnas nas las su 'grub// 'jig rten khams ni gzhal yas la// ma he'i gdan bsam khro rgyal bskyed// bzhengs
dang spyan drangs mchod cing bstod// de nas bsnyen bsgrub nan tur bya// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thugs rje bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal khro mchog gsang bas chos
rnams lung du 'dus te/ gsang ba po la bsgrag pa/ stong gsum 'khor lo bskor byas nas// 'khor ba'i gzhi dang las kyi don// sangs rgyas rgyud la 'dus par 'byung// gsang ba'i rgyud mchog

dam pa 'di// smig sgyu lta bur ming du btags// mdo don rtogs nas rnal 'byor pas// stong pa nyid dang snying rje dang// rgyu dang gzhal yas gdan khri dang// sku nyid yongs su rdzogs pa la// phrag ni bcu gsum

gnyis dang gsum// lnga dang bdun dang gang yang rung// shes rab thabs su snang bar bshad// gnyis med skyed dang ba ga yang// gsang ba'i gnas dang 'bru ru 'phro// gsal byed sngags su rab tu sngags// ting

nge 'dzin dang sku ru rdzogs// zhe sdang nga rgyal phrag dog 'phra// gti mug dug lnga sku ru gyur/ khrag 'thung lnga yi ngo bor bshad// rgyal ba sangs rgyas ma lus dang// bde gshegs gud na med par bshad// 'gro dang

srid pa sku ru snang// sku yi 'khor lo de dang yang// 'gro ba ma lus tha mi dad// de dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang// mi 'grub mi srid gdon mi za// grangs su rdzogs na shin tu
rdzogs// sems nyid dag pa'i ngang nyid las// sprul pa sna tshogs zad mi shes// 'gro ba ma lus rang la snang// sku ru snang ba ma lus kun// las 'phro dag tu snang du zad// de bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba

med// sems can lta spyod mi mthun pas// zhi bas 'dul ba'i skal med na/ khro bo dag tu sprul pa mdzad// rnam rgyal gsang ba'i 'phrin las lung// 'phros pas thugs rjes rgyud 'di bsgrags// kun rdzob tsam du

bstan pa mtshar// gso dang bdud rtsi'i bsgrub pa sngags// srid pa'i rtse la rgyas par bya// stab nas byung na sku la brgyan// sems can las dang sbyin zhing sten// dregs pa gdul bya rtan pa'i rgyud/ khro
bya zhi ba'i ngang du bsdu// sku yi 'phrin las 'dzam gling grags// lnga brgya'i dus su 'phel bar 'gyur// ma lus 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas la// rab tu 'dus so thig le che// 'phrin las gang bsgrub gsang ba
rgya// gsang ba las kyi mthar gnas gang// rang gi bsam pa brtan por gnas// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las// gsang ba 'dus pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dpal 'jigs

byed kyi rgyal pos/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa la/ mi nub tsham rngam rgyud bshad de// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba bshad// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dam pa khyed// gsang ba'i rgyud don dam pa 'di// lnga brgya'i
dus su gnas pa'i phyir// gsung mchog yi ger snang nas kyang// tsit+ta gsang ba'i klong du chud// sku dang theg pa kun la gnas// 'jam dpal sku dang rgyud du 'dzin// de nas rab tu rtogs dam 'grub// dam
la gnas na phan du thogs// de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pas mgrin gcig tu bstod pa// nga ni e ma gshin rje gshed// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i cha lugs can// rab tu khros te 'jigs
byed pa// ma lus 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma 'jigs byed gsang ba'i gsung// stong gsum ri rab 'bum snyil skad// gdug pa 'dul byed gsung sgra can// ma lus dgra 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal
bstod// e ma byang sems rab tu gsang// rnam rtog rig pa chos nyid klong// stong gsum sprul pa khyod las sprul// thugs kyi thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod nas/ 'khor rang gi stan las langs
te/ phyag na rdo rje'i rgyud don ma lus 'di// phyi rabs don du rgyud du bcangs// skal ldan dbang phyug dag la gtad// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur bcangs// 'og min gnas su rab tu bsgrags// rgyud dang
'bras bu rab bstan pa'i// gdul bya rgyud du rab btul nas// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du spros zab mo gsang ba'i rgyud mchog ste// chos nyid rig pa'i klong nas phyung// 'khor lo bskor nas thugs su

brgyud// khros pa'i gshin rje rgyud du gnas// sna tshogs 'byung ba'i thig le che// ma hA su ka shri hU~M/ 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i rgyud gtad pa dang/ rjes su yi rangs pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi

pa'o//// 'jam dpal rol pa rnal 'byor rgyal ba'i le'u stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa la/ ting nge 'dzin gsang ba'i rgyud las phyung ba/ bdag don rnam par rol byed/ gshin rje nag po khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
chen po rdzogs so//// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen thugs kyi gsang mdzod nas// pad+ma thod 'phreng gsang ba'i thugs brgyud nas// nam mkha'i snying po thugs kyi mdzod brtol nas// dri med zla shar thugs
kyi dkyil du bstim// bud+d+ha rat+nas gsang ba'i mdzod brton nas// yon tan rgya mtsho gsang ba'i gter du bzhag// a+thi+-i/ gtad rgya/ gsang rgya/ gter rgya/ rgya rgya rgya////
rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya man 'dzu shrI ya man ta ka gu h+ya man tra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed gsang rgyud// chos dbyings rnam dag skye med las// skye ba'i tshul bstan sprul pa'i

sku// bcom ldan che ba lha yi dpal// 'jigs byed chen po bsam mi khyab// thams cad skur snang ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// las rgyud 'phrin las sngags su bstan// cho 'phrul skur bstan
bsam las 'das// 'dul stangs bsam las 'das pa'i phyir// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig dang// brgya rtsa gcig dang dbye ba'i bar// drug dang gcig tu bstan pa la// tha dad
nges pa med par bstan// lha srin bde brgyad 'dul ba'i phyir// brgyad du bstan pa nges pa dang// 'gro drug don du drug bstan dang// sku gsung thugs dang ldan phyir gsum// nges pa de bzhin
bzhag pa'o// bgegs rigs mi srun kun la las 'chol ba// gang yang 'dra na khyad par shis pa ni// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i bsam pas bya// kun bzang rnam dag mkha' klong nas// dus gsum bde
gshegs zhi khro sprul// kun gyis dbang bskur gshin rje gshed// dbu dang phyag zhabs gar 'thad par// mos pa bya ba shin tu gces// gshin rje'i rnal 'byor brtson pa yis// gang yang las la the tshom

med// de la 'di ru smos pa la// la la gzhung de yod pa yang// gang yang 'dra bar bya ba'o// 'dir smos rtsa ba'i sngags rdzas gnyis// de la the tshom mi bya'o// dam pa'i le'u gcig pa'o//// oM ya man ta ka hU~M/

kA la ru pa hU~M/ oM hriSh+ti bi Ti hU~M/ oM man 'dzu shri hU~M/ oM ya ma rA dza hU~M/ yi ge drug lnga sum cu pa// rtsa ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// de la yang dag bskyed pa'o// de yi don rtogs shes pa'o// oM oM/ oM hU~M/ oM swa/ oM oM

oM ha/ b+h+yan dzA b+h+ya hU~M phaT/ ru pa na hU~M phaT/ tah+ya nah+ya nah+ya hU~M phaT/ ya man h+ya hU~M phaT/ su to h+ya hU~M phaT/ lnga lnga rtsa lngar bstan pa yang// yang na ba te yan lag gi/ dang po dang ni de mtha' la// las su bsngags pa

de kho na'o// oM ya man ta ka dzA dzA/ kA la ru pa dzA dzA/ oM hriSh+ti bi kri dzA dzA/ oM man 'dzu shri dzA dzA/ oM ya ma rA dzA dzA/ de dag rtsa ba bgrang ba'i nges pa'o// de las lan cig te ka he// nges pa'i rtsa ba bstan pa

la// dmigs pa kho na de lan cig/ g+hu ya dz+nyan muM hU~M/ bi du ya ma dzA ya nan/ oM ma kha le kha thun mug nan/ oM ya ma kha thun rA dza hU~M/ oM shri a kro bya tsi ra dza hU~M/ hU~M ha haM he ro ta ka ya ba ka tsit+ta dzA hU~M baM ho/ yan

lag lnga yi sgo nas de bzhin du// dmigs pa bcas nas byas pa de lta'o// rnam pa kun tu de bzhin bsam pa kho na'o// gnan nam gzir ba'i mgo bstan tshogs// le'u gnyis pa zhes bya'o//// dza hU~M baM ho/ oM

a kro te ya man ta ka sa ma ya stoM/ dzA hU~M baM hA+o/ oM sa ma yA man 'dzu shri/ mu dra ya man ta ka pan tsa te ro ni hU~M dzA/ ya man k+sha ya dza dza/ 'ag+hu ya u traM dza dza/ las de gong 'og thams cad kyang// rig pa bde ba 'ba'
zhig gis// de bzhin bcol ba'i rnam pa des// bka' las de ltar snang bar khos// ya ma ra ni dzA dzA/ zhes pa de yis thams cad du// brlag mdzad ma lus de bzhin stsol// bde bar der ni nges par

rigs// mA ma ru lu ma he ma b+h+yo hU~M phaT swAhA/ de ni nges pa'i ma de yang// 'byung ba ji bzhin ltas pa des/ khams gsum pa tsam rlag par byed// de kho ma nor ngo shes pa'o// oM a kro te ya man ta ka kA la ru pa ya

man ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M phaT/ bskyed pa dag dang las sngags sbyar// de ni mi nor dam pa yis// sngags su ldan pa de ka yin// oM A hU~M pe ta li rag k+sha yag u tsu sa ma kro d+ha kro d+ha ya pe ta la

hU~M phaT/ 'jam dbyangs khro bo gsang pa yi// snying po dang ni dbyings yum gyi// ma nor ba de yin par sngags// de yang skabs kyi rim pa shes pa'o// oM man 'dzu shri ya ma ra dza ma mo e ka tsa ti dzA dzA trag rag sha

snying kha rag mo b+h+yo/ rag mo kha li baM dzA b+h+yo/ kha 'gram ma yu za 'gram ma b+h+yo/ ru dra rbad/ trag rag sha rbad/ ma ma snying rbad/ kha mun rbad/ tsit+ta rbad/ ma ra rbad/ bal phyur bal phyur/ ma ma thuM ma ma thuM/ rbad du rbad

du/ du yaM rtsi yaM ru thuM sa ma ya/ ru thums ru thums ya na rbad/ sngags dang snying po grangs mang yang// gzer sngags bdag 'ga' yis yin// de na man ngag zin par byas// de ni yang dag dam pa kha// le'u

gsum pa zhes bya'o//// de b+h+yi thums ti ta ha ha dam dam sa ma ya ya gu gu thum ya ma baM ri li li rbad rbad sod sod/ oM man 'dzu shri ya man ta ka u tsus ma kro d+ha pe ta li na ma kro ti shwa ri rag sha yak+sha dzA dzA/

snying kha rag mo b+h+yo/ rag mo snying rtsa mo b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha mo b+h+yo/ nag mo ting tang kha la rag mo b+h+yo/ dum bu ma ra ya dum bu/ tsit+ta ma ra ya dum bu/ khrag du kha kha thums thums// ma du ma rtsi ru ru yan rbad rbad/ ces

te khrag la bzlas pa de nyid do// zlos pa ye shes thun du byas// rdzas de brgyud de kun nas gsal// rmongs par mi bya khong brnag pa'o// oM sa ma ya/ ar+ya man 'dzu shri mu dra ya man ta ka ban tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ oM

sa ma ya man 'dzu shri ya man ta ka ya mar dza/ ma ma e ka dzA ti dzA dzA/ trag rag sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rag mo te ku ma dzA dzA/ kha la ma ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya log tsin dan ma la b+h+yo dzA/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/

de la 'di yi gzhung dag kyang// kun kyang gces pa yin mod kyang/ khyad par lhag pa 'ga' las med// de yang dbye gsal bya ba dka'// le'u bzhi pa zhes bya'o//// oM ya ma ra dza sa to me b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hU~M

phaT/ baM ri li li rbad nan/ oM dub nur dub nur tshal pa tshal pa nan/ oM trag shags snying go shag me kha la mu la tsa thun nan/ oM swa ti ru ru rA tsa kro kra tsar tsar nan/ ma ra ya nan/ de yang dgos pa lhag pa'i

sngags// lnga'am bzhi ru bzlas pa ni// mthun pa'i grogs su 'gro ba yin// de yang 'dir te drag po'i sngags// oM A kro te ka man 'dzu shri ka la ru pak+sha ya nan/ baM rbad ru lu hU~M dzA/ ru lu tshal ba ya ni to sha ru ni

nan/ ma ra ya nan/ oM ya nan ta ka k+shaM/ ar+ya a tsa la k+shaM/ oM ma dug rtsa rtsa tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad ma dug k+shaM/ ya ma ya man k+shaM/ srog rtsa la mug te rbad tsa rtsa ra dzA rbad/ ma e khrag la dun dun sing stub/ srin

po'i rus pa la choM choM tshal// gshin rje'i khraM la lhan lhan thob/ khram kha khraM ri li li nra dzi rbad/ oM khrag thun mug/ oM mug ya mug ti subs/ cho cho yaM/ bal hubs bal hubs/ bal yu bal yu snying

gong rtsa thun nan/ bal thun nan/ khrag thun khong khrag la ya ya/ khrag thig la phob/ snying thig la phob/ rtsa thig la phob/ srog thig la phob/ oM rag mo shan pa ma ra ya ni dza/ mgo 'phyang ma dzA dzA/ dun rmugs/ bla

rtsa la dzA dzA/ rtsa bo che la dun rmugs/ nang khrol smad lnga la rtsa baM/ thun baM thum ri li li rbad rbad/ mthun pa'i rdzas ni bsags pa gces// ma nor sngags bzlas shin tu gces// dgos pa'i mthun sprod 'tshogs pa
ni// 'bras bu chud ma gsan par gyis// a la zhes brjod ya byar gyis// dmigs pa'i dgongs pa sangs par gyis// le'u lnga pa zhes bya'o//// tha ma'i gsang sngags zhes bya ba// ya dang ma dang ra dang

dza// sa dang do dang me dang ya// ya dang me dang do dang ru// na dang yo dang da dang ya// ya dang da dang yo dang ni// ra dang ya dang k+sha dang ya// ya dang k+she dang ya dang dza// ni dang ra dang ma dang ya// rtsa ba'i yi ge 'di

rnams kyang// 'jam dbyangs dpal gyi thugs yin zer// de lta ma yin las byed pa'i// gshin rje'i ngo bo yo rtogs yin// de yi rtsa bar blta bar bya// yang na lha srin sde brgyad kyi// rtsa ba bsdus pa yin par

gzhag/ de phyir gsang sngags ngo shes bya// dbus na yang gnas yi dwags chen po yi// phyi ba bcu drug gnas pa ni// lha srin sde brgyad yum dang bcas// de la bcu drug dag tu 'dod// yang na las kyi gshin rje

brgyad du 'dod// de yi chung ma brgyad dang bcu drug 'dod// yang na ging chen brgyad dang chung mar bcas// gang ltar byas kyang dregs pa brgyad// de phyir las mkhan zhes su grags// de la dbus kyi yi dwags

chen po yi// phyogs dang mtshams su phar 'phros pas// ya nas yar bskyal ya brgyad la// 'jam dbyangs khro bos ya brgyad man na// phar la bskul zhing tshur la bsdus// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mo// dri za lha

min nam mkha' lding// mi'am ci dang lto 'phye'o// phyi ltar bltas na de ltar snang ba'o// srin po ma mo bdud dang ni// gshin rje rgyal 'gong btsan dang ni// klu srin bgegs chen 'byung po brgyad// nang ltar de

tshul grags pa yin// chos kyi rgyal po ya ba ti// glang mgo rtel pa phya sangs dang// ral pa tshar dgu dmigs pa dang// myos byed 'bar ba brgyad du bstan// badzra zhing dang badzra sa// badzra lhun po badzra sbyin pa

dang// badzra tri 'dzin badzra kun bsdus dang// badzra nyes sel badzra gnas med de// ging du grags pa de kho na// de rnams las mkhan yin par gcig/ phar la las byed gshin rje pho mo yin// bsgo ba'i las byed

du dkrug pa'o// A mu ka sbra ma ya hU~M/ mar shri kram na sha ya hU~M phaT/ a mu kaM rak+ta tsar ya hU~M mar ya shra triM na sha ya hU~M phaT/ a mu kha mur rtsa ya hU~M ma ra shI kraM na sha ya hU~M phaT/ a mu khaM ma ra ya hU~M/

mar shri k+sham/ na sha ya hU~M phaT/ las rnams ma lus byed pa yang// mgo 'khor byed dang khrag skyugs byed// yid myos byed dang gsod par byed// mgo bo 'khor te la 'ur gsad/ khrag tu skyugs te la 'ur gsad// yid myos byas te la 'ur
gsad// gsad pa yid kyis la 'ur gsad// nyin bzhis gsad pa'i las de bya// yang de 'di la bzlas par bya// oM hriSh+ti bi kri ta nan tsit+ta la rak+ta ka sbra ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM shri pri

ti man tsi ta pa tsa ha na pha rag ta tsa ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM an d+ha ne ta na bla a mo ka tsi ta ti ta ya mur rtsa pa hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma d+he d+he pa ta dum tsa ta ma ra shri ya ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ de yang bzhin ru bzlas pas nub// hU~M ya

ma ru dza ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ hU~M ya ma be she ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ hU~M yam snying ta ma ra ya phaT/ ya lha dza dzA hU~M hU~M/ las kyis gzer du sngags pa yang// de lta bu dag bzlas pa yang// de ltar 'khor lo'i sngags la gzhan pa

med// de la 'dus pa de ltar rtsa ba'i 'dus pa yin// oM man 'dzu shri ya man ta ka U tsus ma kro ta pe ta li/ oM bi kri shri rag sha dzA dz+h+ya snying kha rag mo b+h+yo/ snying rtsa rtsa ma b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ nag po bting maM ma

b+h+yo/ nag mo snying ta ra la rag mo b+h+yo/ dum bu mar dum rtsi ta ra dum bu khrag tu skyugs kha kha thun/ sa thums ma rtsi nu ru na ya rbad rbad/ de ltar pe ta nag mo la// sngags te bzlas pas brdeg pa yang// skabs dang

sbyar te bzlas par bya'o// de ltar man ngag gi shes par bya'o// oM shri man 'dzu badzra kro ta tib ta tsakra/ oM badzra swa ta hU~M hri phur bu phur bu hU~M phaT// oM badzra ki li ka li ya/ sarba ba di nan baM hU~M hU~M shri pa tsa hU~M phaT/
'jam dbyangs nag po'i bcas gzhi ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// las rnams mi 'grub gcig kyang med// 'di la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas// byang chub 'di don gnyis ka 'grub// des bstan drug rim
gsal bar snang// nag po'i sngags rnams shes par spyod// le'u drug pa zhes bya'o//// yang de 'jam dbyangs nag po yi// sngags rnams bstan pa de la ni// 'khor rnams mi srun gang yin pa// las rnams
ji ltar bya ba ni// gsal ba dag tu bstan pa yin// de la 'di yi gnas skabs su// gnas dang dus dang maN+Dal rdzas// dgongs pa bsgrub dang brdeg pa yang// mtshan ma grol dus mnan pa'o// don bcu tshang
bar byed dgos te// rgyud gzhan kun nas zhib par bstan// 'dir ni sngags rnams rgyun du gsungs// le'u bdun pa zhes bya'o//// lho phyogs gshin yul rme nag tu// 'jam dpal khros pas gshin rje
gshed// 'chi bdag bshan pa'i tshogs rnams la// zhe sdang rang 'dul drag sngags rgyud// rtsod dus bstan pa mar 'grib la// 'byung ba yin gyis gzhan du min// zhal gsum mthing nag drag po'i
sku// ro langs sras mchog yab yum bzhi// bsgom pa yin gyis gzhan du min// rtsa gsum rtsa bzhi bcu gcig dang// bcu gnyis dgu dang bdun du bstan// rgyun dang gnyis med re ti stong// 'jig rten pho mo'i
srog tu bstan// bsnyen pa dang ni nye ba'i mchog/ dam pa yin nam zer ba'i mchog/ shes pa nyams su blangs pa'i mchog/ dpal gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa/ gdug pa gtan rlag pa la 'khor rnams yi

rang ste mngon par bstod do// gsang ba sngags kyi rgyud las/ phyi ma'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so//// gnubs pad+ma dbang rgyal gyi thugs kyi brnag pa'o// ya ma
ra dza khros pa'i rgyud do////

rgya gar skad du/ ya ma tsi la daM ta kA la nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ gshin rje 'char ka nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal nag po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bstan nas/ ri rab kyi lho phyogs dur khrod chen po rab tu 'jigs pa can zhes bya ba'i nang na/ dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi mu khyud dang
bcas pa'i nang/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ bskal pa'i me ri 'bar ba'i nang na mtha' ma lcags ri khyud mos bskor ba'i nang na bzhugs te/ de yi 'khor ni gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po
dang/ mig dmar dang/ ya ba ti dang/ dud kha dang/ smigs pa dang/ tel pa dang/ ral pa tshar dgu dang/ phya sangs la sogs pa rtsis thogs kyi lha dang/ gzhan yang yab rje nag po dang/ nag po bkrag med

la sogs pa khram thogs kyi bdud dang/ yaM dmar po dang/ tshangs pa dung thor gtsug can la sogs pa'i gri thogs ging dpag tu med pa dang/ nam gru ma dang/ sha za nag mo la sogs pa khram thogs pa'i ma mo

dpag tu med pa dang/ lce kram dang kun dug ma la sogs pa dug thogs pa'i bal mo mang po dang/ zla ba dang/ mig dmar la sogs pa'i tsan gyi shod d+he thogs pa'i gza' dang btsan mang po dang/ nad rkyal dang

mtshon cha thogs pa'i shan pa mang po dang/ gzhan yang dur khrod chen po 'jigs pa can de yi nang na/ phyogs skyong ba dang/ zhing skyong ba dang/ klu dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i 'dre

gdon mang po dang/ spyang khu dang/ lce spyang dang/ khyi dang/ li 'du dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/ stag dang/ gzigs dang/ gung dang/ dbyi la sogs pa dang/ kang ka dang/ 'ug pa dang/ dur bya dang/ bya rog

dang/ bzhad dang/ wa dang/ bya chen po la sogs pa dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag pa las 'das pa rnams sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba/ rus pa 'cha' zhing rkang ldag pa/ phyogs bzhir bskor ba

byed pa/ blta zhing rgod pa/ ku co 'don zhing yang ba/ shin tu 'jigs shing skyi g.ya' ba'i gnas de lta bu na bzhugs so// de nas gshin rje chos kyi rgyal pos gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das/ lha dang bdud
gnyis ji ltar 'thab/ tha mar gang rgyal/ thabs gang gis bshis/ zhes gsol pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi rgyal po nyon cig/ bdag ri rab kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas na 'dug pa'i tshe/ bdud kyi thams cad

du yang dmag drangs te/ khyad par de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdan gyi shing la rgyab gtad nas bzhugs pa'i tshe/ bdud lha sbyin dang/ dga' rab dbang phyug dang/ stobs kyi rgyu dang/ 'dod pa'i
rgyal po dang bzhis dpon byas nas/ dmag che zhing mang ba bshams te/ phyogs bzhi nas g.yul bshams nas dmag drangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das bya ba ci ba rtsams kyang bdud des dengs su ma nyan nas/
lho phyogs kyi dur khrod na 'jam dpal nag po bzhugs pa la/ bdud 'dul bar bka' bsgo ba mdzad de/ gshin rje nag po'i bsam gtan la zhugs par sems pa la/ bdud kyi dmag phyogs bzhi nas byung
bas so ni ma gsod nas/ khyod kyis bdud kyi dmag sde dang bcas pa thul cig/ med par gyis shig/ brlag par gyis shig/ ces bsko nas/ 'jam dpal nag pos dur khrod me 'bar ba'i gnas de na/ bskal
pa'i me ri dmar nag yang me lce srid pa gsum du bsleb pa/ me lce phyogs bcu ru gsal zhing 'bar ba/ du ba bskal pa'i mtha' nas 'thul bar byas te/ bdud la 'bros sa med par byas nas/ las kyi gshin

rje 'char ka nag po'i ngan sngags 'di nyungs kar la bsngags shing btab bo// sha ri b+h+yo/ ma ri b+h+yo/ khrag ma ma b+h+yo/ tsa ri snying b+h+yo/ snying b+h+yo/ ma tri thod khrag dza/ khrag ti snying la ya/ nr-i sri chod/ mu lo chod/

sha lo chod/ sha la kying kying b+h+yo b+h+yo/ sa ma ya/ a tri kra ma ti ni ba ra na ni ba ra na rbad/ ces brjod pas/ bdud thams cad brgyal te dngangs shing bred nas shin tu 'jigs skrag nas/ shin tu nyam thag 'dar zhing bred
do// de ltar bdud kyi dmag mi thams cad kyang brgyal zhing sngangs so// sa la bub cing 'gyel lo// der bdud kyi rgyal po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ nyon cig bcom ldan 'das
bdud las rgyal ba/ sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'o// bdag 'dra ba yi sems can rnams// thugs rje'i dbang gis skyab tu gsol// ces gsol pa dang/ der bdud bzhi pos rang gis sde dang bcas pa
dbang du bsdus te btul lo// der bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan bde ba nyid las sangs rgyas so// de nas gshin rje chos kyi rgyal pos gsol ba/ gshin rje 'char ka nag po 'di yi pha dang ma ni

gang// mdzad pa'i las kha gang la bskos// zhes gsol pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi rgyal po nyon cig/ lha dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i khams na dbang che ba de dang/ klu mo u ma deb gnyis kyi

bu 'char ka nag po yin te/ de yang ji ltar yin zhe na/ dang po lha dang bdud thabs pa'i dus na/ bdud gzhan thub kyang ma trang ru tra ma thub po// der lha rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na dbang che ba na dbang phyug

chen po khyod las mthu che ba ni med na/ lha'i dpon yin pa la bdud ma trang ru tra ma thub pas/ 'di ji ltar byed byas pa las/ dbang phyug chen po zhe sdang skyes nas mchod pa chen po byas nas gsol ba btab nas/

nga klu mo dang sbyor ba byas pa yis/ bdud ma trang ru tra'i gnyen po dang gshed po byed pa cig shog cig byas nas/ klu mo la 'khrig pa byas pas/ bu lcags kyi grod pa cig skyes pas/ dbang phyug chen po 'khrig nas
gshin rje gshed po la bstan pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshon gyis brgyab pas/ mi nag po chen po mjug ma sbrul du 'dug pa cig g.yas na khram shing g.yon na zhags pa thogs pa cig byung bas thams cad

skrag go/ der smras pa/ lha dang bdud 'thab pas bdud ma trang ru tra ma thub pas/ de thul cig byas pas/ de khos btul lo// de nas skye ba rnam bzhi sems can yo khos zos nas/ thams cad skrag cing sngangs
nas thams cad phung bar byas so// de nas 'jam dpal nag pos 'di grags te 'dug snyam nas/ rten 'brel gsum dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyis mnan te bzhag pas/ khos ma longs par gyur to// de
nas thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal nag po khyod// sems can kun gyi mgon lags na// bdag ni dbang phyug chen po'i bu// ma gzir ma gnan 'di nas thong// zhes brjod nas/
bka' stsal dam las bdag mi 'da'// zhes gsol pa dang/ 'jam dpal nag pos bka' stsal pa/ dbang phyug chen po'i bu khyod// dang po bdud ni 'dul phyir sprul// bar du ma trang ru tra btul// tha mar
sems can thams cad zos// de nas mchod rten gsum gyis mnan// bka' stsal dam las mi 'da' na// sangs rgyas bstan pa gnyan po bsrungs// dam can kun gyi bsrung bzlog gyis// dam
nyams kun gyi bsad mnan gyis// zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ bdud rtsi lce la bzhag nas ming ni 'char ka nag por btags so// yang 'char ka nag pos gsol pa/ dang por bdag ni lha yi bu// yin pa'i phyir
na lha yang btul// bdag gi lus po mi yi lus// de bas mi yi bsrung bzlog bya// bdag gi rkang pa mjug ma sbrul// klu yi gnod pa thams cad bsal// dam can kun gyi srung bzlog bya// dam nyams kun gyi
bdud gcod bya// bcom ldan khyod kyi bka' 'khor gyi// zhes gsang ba'i dam bcas pas/ mdzad pa'i las bka' srung bzlog gi/ gshin rje 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang
po'o//// yang gshin rje chos kyi rgyal pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das drag po 'dul ba'i gtso bo gshin rje 'char ka nag po 'dis/ dang po bsrung na ji ltar bsrung// bar du bzlog na ji ltar bzlog/ tha
ma gsad na ji ltar gsad// ces gsol pa las/ 'jam dpal nag pos bka' stsal pa/ dang po bsrung ba'i cho ga ngas bshad par bya yi/ legs par nyon cig yid la zung zhig/ dang por yid dang 'thad pa'i
gnas su maN+Dal legs par byas la tshogs bsag/ de nas sa bzang po la las kyi gshin rje'i gzugs khru gang ba byas la/ mchod rten gsum dang ldan par gzhag/ me tog la sogs pas mchod/ srung ba'i
'khor lo byas la dbus su bris/ tha mar sngags bri/ rab gnas bya pa'i phyir kham phor gtsang mar bcug la gzhag/ skud pa dkar pos dkri/ gsol ba gdab/ sngags stong bzlas/ de nas 'khor lo la/ la
cha'am 'jim pas rgyas gdab/ gzungs skud gdags yang na ga 'ur bcug la gzhag/ sri'u gson gtor ma bcu gsum gyis mtha' bskor/ pha ma stan dkar po la gzhag/ kong bur pa ta rkyen gyi khu ba
blug/ mtha' bskor/ sngags la rak+Sha gdags/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ ser ba srung na thod par nyungs kar dang thal chen blug la sngags nyi khri lnga stong bzlas la/ bzlog dus su yi dam lha'i
bshams la gdags/ kong bu rtar bzung mtho rtsig go/ nad pa bsrung na gtor ma kong bur byas la bskor/ nad pa'i gzugs byas la ming rus bris te gtor mar bcug la gtang/ rims nad bsrung na skud pa

sna lnga bu mo gzhon pa mtshan dang ldan pas bkal te/ sngags stong bzlas shing thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la mchod pa dbul/ thams cad kong bus bskor/ chang bsrung na gu gul nya khris shu dag gsum/ ra
rog po'i rwa'i nang du blugs la/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas chang yor gzhug/ kong bus bskor/ grong khyer bsrung na mtho dang kong bus bskor/ thams cad la srung skud 'khor lo gdags/ b+ha ling btang

la 'phrin las gzhol/ ya ma 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ bsrung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// bzlog pa byed na dkyil 'khor dang ru ba bzang po la/ las kyi gshin rje khru gang ba bya/ bzlog pa'i 'khor lo

bca'/ b+ha ling btang la 'phrin las bcol/ byad gtong ba'i phyogs su kha bstan/ pha mtshan byol kha byed pa bzlog na/ kham bu dang b+ha ling phyogs su 'phang/ sngags la b+h+yo dang bzlog gdags/ seng ldeng phur bu

gdags/ mdze 'phro bzlog na stan dmar po la bzhag/ b+ha ling kong bus bskor la gtang/ zhag mang du bya/ srung skud sna lnga gdags/ shwa bud bzlog na mdze thod la 'khor lo bri/ dug dang/ khrag dang/ nyungs

kar nyungs nag la thun bya/ dong brus la chu mi 'chor bar bcug la/ steng du mchod rten brtsig/ rten 'brel bum par gzhug/ rmi lam ngan pa bzlog na sngas bzlog la nyal/ bal nag po'i nang du rmi lam du ci

byung ba bcug la gtor mar gtang/ rtswa ku sha sngas su gzhug/ kong bus bskor/ smyo 'bog bzlog na dmar gtor bcu gsum byas la/ nad pa'i skra dang sen mo gzhag/ sme khrag snying sna gzhug/ kong bus bskor/
tshon skud kyis bcings la gtums la 'phang/ yang na mal 'og gnan no// 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ bzlog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// gsad pa'i las byed na/ thod pa bkra mi shis pa'i nang du gru

gsum bsnol mar bri/ dbus su dgra bo'i ling kha gzhug/ snying khar sha ri b+h+yo gzhug/ spyi bor ma ri b+h+yo gzhug/ lte bar khrag ma ma b+h+yo gzhug/ mdoms su tsir snying gzhug/ rkang mthil du snying b+h+yo bri/ dgra'i skra

dang brun dang khams la ling kha bca'/ ming rus snying khar gzhug/ mtha' ma gru gsum la b+h+yo lnga'i sngags dgod/ gcig la ma tri nA sha yan rbad dgod/ gru gsum la mu lo yan chad nas/ ming rus spel la sngags

rnams g.yon bskor ro// thod pa sle'u nag po'i steng du gu gul gyis bdug/ lha srin sde brgyad la b+ha ling sbyin/ mA ra ya btags te/ lcags phye rdo phye zangs phye la sogs pas thun bya/ ru par gtums la 'khor lo

zla ba gzas zin pa'i nub mo/ lha srin sde brgyad la dbul lo/ khyad par du lha srin sde brgyad la las gzhol lo// tha mar sbyin sreg gi thal ba rlung la bskur ro// 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ gsad pa'i le'u ste
bzhi pa'o//// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das shan pa bzhi po ji ltar lags/ zhes zhus pas/ bka' stsal pa/ lha dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor shan pa bzhi yin te/ ban d+he dang/
bon po dang/ zhang blon dang/ mon pa nag po'o// de bzhi'i zor dang sbyar na tshangs pa chen po'ang zla ba gcig gis gdon mi za'o// gsol pa/ de bzhi'i zor dang sngags bshad du gsol/ zhes

gsol pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ ban d+he'i thod zor dang/ bon po'i rwa zor dang/ mon pa nag po'i kong zor dang/ zhang blon nag po'i mda' zor ro// de la bon po'i rwa zor bshad par bya ste/ maN+Dal gru gsum

nag po'i steng du/ g.yag ru g.yas pa'am/ g.yag rog po'i rwa yi nang du ling ga byad du bcug ste/ g.yul sprad pa'i rdo dkar po la khrag gis byugs pa dang/ mi phung shul gyi rdo ba nag po la dug gis byugs pa

dang/ mA ra ya btags pas las bya'o// de nas nam phyed na 'phang ngo// 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ bon po rwa zor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas ban d+he nag po'i thod zor bca' ba ni/ rabs chad nag

po'am/ snel dri ma'am/ mdze po'i 'am/ yang na dum bu drug pa'am/ brgyad pa'i nang du ling ga bcug la/ nyungs kar dang/ nyungs nag dang/ dug dang/ khrag thams cad la bsnyen pa bskyal la thun sgrub byas

te/ thod pa zor du 'phang ngo// gshin rje 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ ban d+he'i thod zor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// mon pa nag po'i kong zor ni/ dug sna tshogs dang khrag gis sprus la/ kong bu zur gsum

bdun byas la/ nang du dud pa dang/ tsha ba dang/ sgog skya dang/ sbang ma blugs la/ bsnyen pa mang du byas la dgra phyogs su 'phang ngo// zor yo 'phen khar rde'u dkar nag la smod pa bor ro// 'char kha nag po'i

rgyud las/ mon pa nag po'i kong zor gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// zhang blon gyi mda' zor bca' ba ni/ smyug ma tshig gsum pa'i mda' la/ bya rog 'ug pa'i srin bya gsum gyi sgro skyon la/ skyer ba'i mde'u zur

gsum pa la/ mA ra ya b+h+yo bris btsugs la/ dug dang khrag gi ngar blud la/ thun rdzas thams cad la bzlas par byas la/ thun sbu gur blugs/ 'dod pa'i shing ngam/ mchog chen gyi rtsibs ma la zhing rgyud kyi rgyud
btags te 'phags na/ dgra thams cad phung bar nges so// 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ zhang blon gyi mda' zor gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi gsang sngags bstan
du gsol/ ces zhus pas/ bka' stsal to// de rnams kyi gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ sngags ma bstan na las mi 'grub ste/ ya ma 'char ka'i rgyud las las thams cad 'grub par byed pa ni 'di yin no// sha ri

b+h+yo/ ma ri b+h+yo/ khrag ma ma b+h+yo/ rtsi ra snying b+h+yo/ snying b+h+yo/ ma k+Shi thod khrag b+h+yo/ khrag ti snying la ya/ nr-i sri chod/ mu lo chod/ sha lo chod/ sha la kying kying b+h+yo b+h+yo/ sa ma ya a ti kra ma nr-i pa ra na bzlog/ sngags 'dis

bstus pa'o zhes bya'o// oM a kro te ka b+ha ri ba ri shag phye/ du pe ta la tsikra ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ gdug can rlag byed gsang sngags te// ming ni mtha' med ces bya'o// shi ri b+h+yo sha truM ma ra ya rbad/ ma

ri b+h+yo sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ des 'dre'o// sa ma ya nr-i par na ya sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ zlog na bzlog dang b+h+yo gdags/ srung na rak+Sha gdags/ gsod na sha truM mA ra ya rbad gdags so// gshin rje 'chang ka nag po'i

rgyud las/ gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// kye bcom ldan 'das/ srung dang zlog gsad pa yi// las rnams kong bus byed pa na// kong bu'i rdzas dang kong pu'i rgyu// kong bu'i don rnams bshad

du gsol// ces pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ las thams cad kong bus byed do// kong bu'i rgyu ni g.yul sbrad pa'i sa dang/ phung shul gyi sa dang/ dur khrod kyi sa la'o// kong bu'i rdzas ni/ gshin rje'i gnyen po

nyungs kar sgang bu dang/ bdud kyi gnyen po brag nag po'i tshe dang/ rgyal pa'i gnyen po spos dang/ ma bdud kyi 'phang dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dud pa dang/ klu'i sha khrag dang/ the'u rang gi sbang ma dang/
mkha' 'gro ma'i mar me dang/ gza'i tsher ma dang/ sa bdag gi lha bshos dang/ dre bo dang nag mo'i phabs dang/ tshig ma dang/ 'gong po'i dug dang/ btsan gyi rta tshil dang/ rmu yi gnyen por rams

dang/ thams cad kyi gnyen por sha khrag go/ kong bu'i don ni ma trang ru tra brlags par byas so// phung bar byas so// kong bu 'phen pa'i dus su/ rang ber nag dang thod nag po bcings la/ g.yang gzhi gon pa

gdong khrag gis byugs la/ rang 'char kha nag po'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ gri bo lag nan gyi skra dang/ tsan b+ha li'i skra shad kyis brdam/ g.yul du bskrad pa'i skral sum sgril du byas la 'ur rdo bya/ zhing

lpags kyi mthil bya/ tshon skud kyi 'jag btags la nam phyed nyi phyed na 'phang ngo// gshin rje 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ kong zor gyi rgyu dang rdzas bstanapa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// sdig can phur bzlog byed pa yi// ban de dam nyams bsgral ba'i thabs// legs par bdag la bshad du gsol// ces gsol ba dang/ bka' stsal pa/ lnga brgya dus kyi
snyigs ma la// ban de dam nyams phur bzlog mkhan// gshin rje 'char kha nag po yis// thugs kyi 'khor lo byas 'gyur na// sdig can myur du rang gshed 'khor// de bas khyod kyis legs par nyon// ban de

nang 'gras na stegs bu gru bzhi nag po'i steng du gnas lnga'i sa brdungs la/ gshin rje 'char kha nag po'i gzugs byas la/ g.yas su khram shing g.yon zhags pa thogs pa byas la/ rabs chad thod pa gcig gi
nang du me rlung gi 'khor lo bris la gzhug/ zhabs mas gril la tshon skud kyis bcings la snying khar gzhug/ ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la sha khrag gis gtor ma gtang zhing/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig

bsnyen pa bskyal lo// de yang rang ma 'bags pa'i dri ma la gzugs byas la/ gro ga la kho yi ming rus bris la/ snying khar e nr-i bri/ dpung pa g.yas par rus bris/ g.yon par ming bri/ mdoms su bu smad kyi

ming bris la snying khar gzhug/ de tsho zhags pas bcings te rdo rjes gnan cing brdeg/ tha mar gzugs de kho'i phyogs su rkang ba yar/ mgo bo mar bcug la gnan no// 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ thugs kyi
'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshin rje 'char kha nag po dang// las kyi shan pa bzhi po yi// sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams legs par bdag la bshad du
gsol/ ces zhus pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ gshin rje 'char kha nag po ni mdog gnag la 'tsher ba/ char nag 'ong ba'i sprin ni nag la 'khrug cing drag pas/ mdog nag pa la ming btags pa ste/ 'char kha nag
po zhes bya'o// dbul dar nag po'i thod bcings pa/ sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa'i rtags su mchod rten gsum dang ldan pa/ dar nag po'i ber gsol ba/ sbrul sngon po'i mjug ma rab tu 'khril ba/ mig me ma

dag gi phung po bus pa 'dra ba/ mche ba gtsigs shing zhal gdangs pa/ shin tu khros shing rngam par bsgom/ shan pa ban de nag po smug nag khros par bsgom/ nag po ral gri can/ dar nag cod pan can/ g.yas

rdo rje g.yon dar nag 'phyar ba'o// zhang blon nag po nad rkyal dang mtshon gyi gru gu can no// bon po nag po dmar nag lcags kyi sbar shad can/ dar nag gi cod pan can no// mon pa nag po gri gug dang sbrul
zhags can no// gzhan yang de'i 'khor ni/ bdud dang/ gshin rje dang/ ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// gshin rje 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ lha bsgom pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// yang gsol
pa/ gshin rje 'char ka nag po yi// bdud kyi gdong zor nag po yis// dgra bo gsad pa bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i man ngag bdud kyi rwa zor nag po dang spags te gsad

pa ni bshad kyis nyon cig/ gang zhig mthu che ba dang 'gras na/ lus til mar gyis bskus la/ g.yag ru g.yas pa'i nang du ling kha bcug la thun gyis brabs la/ khrag sna tshogs dang/ 'tshe dang/ nyungs kar

dang/ snying sna tshogs bsres la/ nam phar phyed tshur phyed na yugs sa mos gtor na rab/ med na rang bdud chas su zhugs la bya'o// zor kha thams cad bzlog pa'i gsang sngags ni/ oM ha de mo/ ha hid d+ha ya/

pra ha ra ni hU~M phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ sa ma ya/ a tri kra ma ti/ bzlog bzlog/ a la la pra mo ha/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes bzlas te gtor ro// pha tshan byol kha byed na/ khrag dang/ nyungs kar dang/

tshes bya'o// nang pa dang sri bu 'dra'o// rmi lam ngan pa la nyungs kar dang khrag la bya'o// gshin rje 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi gdong zor nag po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// yang gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal nag po khyod 'di yi sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi las kyi sbyor ba bshad du gsol/ ces gsol pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ sbyor ba la rten bshad par bya// legs par nyon la yid la
zung// mdza' bo dbye bar 'dod gyur na// gnyis byas bar du zas bcug la// bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro yang gzugs// tshon skud yugs sa'i zhab mas bcing// er gcug mdun du bzhag nas kyang// nyungs

kar thun brab sngags 'di bzlas// oM ma hA ti sta ya/ k+Sha ma du pa swAhA/ de la rtags byung rgyab sprad de// skud pas phyin kar sgril bcings te// zhag gsum bar du sngags 'di bzlas// oM ad byi dar sad/ a mi

la byi mi la sad/ a kar byi kar sad/ de skad byas te bzlas na de ni dbye ba'i mchog tu bshad/ gshin rje 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ dbye ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan

yang bshad bya ba// gro ga'i lo ma dag la ni// bya rog khrag dang dur sol gyis// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// sgrub bya'i ming dang sngags sgrags te// gtor zan mgrin par bcing gyur te// 'char kha

nag po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ kha yang lhor bstan gtang gyur na// skad cig ma ni gcig nyid la// bya rog bzhin du sa kun 'khor// gzhan yang tsha ba'i mar bskus te// nim pa'i shing dang bya rog tshang// dur khrod

shing bsregs thal ba de// blangs te gang gi mgor blugs na// de ma tag tu skrad par 'gyur// gzhan yang dur khrod ras blangs la// dug la sogs pas sngags bris la// sre mo'i spu dang sprul lpags blangs// de

la sdong bu dag byas te// gang gi khyim du spar gyur na// des ni pha tshan 'bye bar 'gyur// de nas dgra bo'i bshang gci blangs// dgra gzugs byas la dug gis byug/ sngags bris snying khar bcug byas la// dur
khrod me sbar 'char ka nag po yi// sbyor ba ltar ldan rkang pa nas gtubs la// gong gi ming bcas bsregs 'gyur na// skad cig gis ni 'chir bar 'gyur// rengs par 'dod na g.yam pa la// ba glang dang ni

yung pa'i sa// mang dang bcas te legs bris la// lam ni rgya gram chu mdor gnan// des ni rengs par the tshom med// dug dang bul rdog phur tshi gsum bcas te// sngags 'di bzlas te btab gyur na// sngon du
skam par the tshom med// dbang du bya bar 'dod gyur na// grog khar gur gum g+hi haM la// sor bcu drug pa'i gzugs byas la// g+hi hang srin lag khrag gis ni// gro ga la ni 'khor lo bra'i// snying
khar bcug la khyim du gzhag/ 'char kha nag por bsgom byas te// me tog dmar pos dus gsum mchod// nub tu bltas te sngags bzlas na// zhag ni bdun gyi sbyor ba yis// brgya byin yang ni dbang du
'gyur// mi rnams lta bu smos ci dgos// gsh-in rje 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di yi ltas dang mtshan ma

dang// nges par gang lags bshad du gsol// ces pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ 'di yi ltas dang mtshan ma ni// phyi rtags nang rtags gnyis su bshad// phyi rtags char srin chen po dang// tshub ma sbom la gnag pa
dang// 'brug gi sgra dang thog ser rnams// nang rtags nyams dang rmi lam ste// mi nag mon dang a tsa ra// ras nag dar nag gon pa dang// mda' dang mdung rings thogs pa na// ma nor rtags su shes par
bya// g.yag rgod khyi dang lug la sogs// gcan gzan mang po 'ong ba dang// 'od dang sgra la sogs pa ni// 'bring gi rtags su shes par bya// sems can de dag thag ring zhing// ma mgu ba rnams tha ma

yin// sgrub tshe slob dpon rmi ba dang/ bya nag mang po rmi na bzang// yugs sa mdze pho rmi gyur na// dam tshig bskang zhing tshogs sog bya// ser ba rlung dang g.yul skrod na// byad kha yin par shes par bya// mi reng
bud med tshogs rnams dang// g.yul shom gyur dang mtshon cha brdung// khyir ba'i las dang me gtong dang// de bzhin srog chags gsod pa dang// gsad pa'i las la sbyar bar bya// dmag gshom g.yul ni

'gyed pa'i tshe// phas tshur drag gam go bzang na// kong bu'i nub re gtor ma gtang// sngags ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// phyogs su 'phang dang gnan pa bya// 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ drod tshad kyi le'u ste
bcu drug pa'o//// yang gsol pa/ gang zhig phyi rabs rnal 'byor pa// gal te sbyar ba rtsub mo ston// de yi ngag gnan ji ltar bgyi// zhes zhus/ bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig rnal 'byor dam can

la// sngags kyi sbyor ba byed gyur na// mi lpags la ni dug khrag gis// lcags phye dug khrag dag gis ni// ling ga bris te ngag phyung ste// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas kyang// sngags bris ming dang bcas pa

yi// spyi bor kA ya staM b+ha ya// mgrin par bA' ga staM b+ha ya// snying khar tsit+ta staM b+ha ya// che ge mo yi lus ngag yid gsum nr-i dza staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya ban d+ha yas bskor te/ byang du bcug te thod par gzhug/ thun brab
lus ngag yid gsum gyi// nus pa kun bsdus bdag la thim// gtong grogs byed pa kho rang gshed/ khyad par bsam zhing ngag rnams bcing// them pa'i 'og gam lam 'og gnan// tha ma 'khor
lo dkyil 'khor 'og tu gnan// yang nas dgra dag la gnan// steng nas ri rab rgya gram bca'// bro brdung gsol ba gdab par bya// gshin rje 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ ngag gnan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun
pa'o//// yang gsol ba/ bcom ldan drag po 'dul ba'i gtso// 'di yi dam tshig bdag la gsungs// zhes zhus pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ dam tshig nyams na don mi 'grub// de bas dam tshig bshad par

bya// bla ma dang ni dkon mchog gsum// rtag tu gus par bya ba yin/ khyad par gshin rje gshed la gus// las kyi gshin rje'i dam tshig ni// gsang sngags gsang nas sgrub ces pas// mi rung mi smra g.yel mi
bya// rdzas dang gzugs sogs bstan mi bya// 'phreng ba dang ni kha 'phro bsrung/ khyad par gtor ma bcag mi bya// 'di ni rtag tu gyur pa yi// sems can kun la byams par bya// spro bskyed yid ni dga' bar
bya// de ltar bsrungs na dngos grub ni// the tshom med par thob par 'gyur// gshin rje 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// yang gsol ba/ 'di yi 'khor lo ci

ltar bca'// zhes zhus pa las/ bka' stsal pa/ zhing gi ras la dug khrag gis// snag tshal lcags sam rkang gi snyug gus bri// rim pa lnga ldan le tshe can// dang po gru gsum dkrugs la gsad// de yi phyi rim
sngags rnams bri// rten 'brel bcu gnyis dkrugs la gsad// sha trum sngags ni dkrugs te bri// tha mar A li kA li bri// gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyud yin no// bsrung bzlog gsad gnan gang byed

kyang// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo shes par bya// dbus su mtha' 'gyur sngags dang bskul tshig go/ 'char ka nag po'i lto ba na// 'gro ba rigs drug 'phyo ba yin// de yang las kyi gshin rje des// thams cad kyang ni
sgrol bar nus// gshin rje 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ las kyi shan pa bzhi yi bsnyen bsgrub dang// gsad pa'i thabs bshad du

gsol// zhes zhus pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ las kyi shan pa bzhi po yis// gsad pa'i thabs ni bshad par bya// nyon cig gshin rje chos kyi rgyal// ban d+ha mtshan ngan nang du ra khrag blugs/ rwa sogs la ming

bris te nang du gzhug khram shing gis dkrug cing sngags 'di brjod// oM badzra tsit+ta dun dun rbad rbad/ snying khrag dun khug rbad rbad swAhA/ thuM shig khug ling rbad rbad swAhA/ dgra bo'i snying khrag dun rmugs rbad rbad
swAhA/ nyungs kar la bzlas shing dkrug par bya// ban d+ha ra sogs 'khrug cing 'tsheg/ nyi shu rtsa gcig byas gyur na// nang rtags shar gyis 'ong bar nges// de nas gsad las bya bar bshad// oM

ma hA kA la ban de nag po srog thun bi sha rbad/ dgra bo sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ ka sha ka sha/ brag tsha la shag/ ma tha sha snying go chod/ ya ya/ bra bra/ zhung zhung/ ril ril/ rbad rbad/ yaM yaM/ oM tse tse/ na na rbad rbad/

snying la ya ya rbad/ pra ti sa man tsa rmugs/ pra ti sa man tse chod/ pra ti sa man tsa khug kha la rag sha rbud rbud dA/ dum bur ka sha rbud rbud dA/ tsakra rak+sha rbud rbud dA/ tsit+ta rak+sha rbad rbad dA/ de nas gnyen po lha
chen bzhi bsgom// nag po mche gtsigs thod rlon can// ral gri dgra sta phyag na 'dzin// ro yi gdan la bzhugs pa'o// sha dang khrag gi mchod pa dbul// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum brtsegs tu// bdun tsho
bzhi'i rtsang bkram ste// mda' mdung tri shul rgyab tu dgod// dang por gru la lder so bzhag/ gnyis pa la ni kong bu'o// gsum pa thun rdzas gtor ma'o// mdun du mchod pa bsam par bya// tha ma lder so'i

phyogs su bskyal// lha chen bsnyen pa rgya mtsho mchod// oM ma hA kA la ru pa baM/ oM ma hA kA la rag sha/ oM ma hA kA la naM naM/ tri sha a b+hes b+hes/ kA la r+shu pa/ sha trUM mA ra ya rbad/ gnyen po las dang bcas pa

la// b+ha li dbul zhing 'phrin las bcol// ma ma sarba sha truM/ a mu ka ma dza me ti/ ba saM sa ma ya/ rak+sha ru ti dzi baM/ pi ya bak+Sha ni/ i daM b+ha liM/ gr-i Na gr-i Na/ khA hi khA hi/ b+huny+dza ho/ pi ba to sa ma ya a ti kra ma swAhA/

b+ha liM gtang zhing sbyin sreg bya// dang po gshin rje gshed la dbul// de nas lha chen po la// de 'og shan pa bzhi la dbul// thal ba gnan nam yang na phyar// de ltar 'khor lo gsum byas pas// tshangs pa yang
ni brlag par 'gyur// gshin rje 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las// sha nang bzhi yi bsnyen bsgrub kyi gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di yi 'khor lo ji lta bu// bri ba'i
snag tsha ji ltar lags// de dag bdag la bshad du gsol// ces zhus pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ 'khor lo bya ba'i man ngag ni// ro ras zhing ras dug khrag rdzas// gces bu lhor bltas ting 'dzin

ldan// lcags kyi smyu gus bri bar bya// rtsibs bzhi mu khyud ldan pa la// so so'i sngags dang ming byang bri/ kha sbyar tshon skud rgya gram bcing// thod pa'i nang du thun rdzas 'phang// tha mar gnan pa byas la
bzhag/ 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ shan pa bzhi'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan drag po 'dul ba'i gtso// gshin rje 'char ka nag po yi// sbyin sreg cho ga bshad du
gsol// zhes zhus pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ drag po sbyin sreg byed gyur na// gru gsum thab tu dug khrag byug/ zhing gi stan la khro sems kyis// lhor bltas rnam snang khrag gis byug/ dug dang khrag

dang ling khar bcas// bya rog 'ug pa'i sha tshil dang// wa spyang sha chen sreg par bya// tsher ma can gyi bud shing la// dug gi yam shing khrag sbyar sbag/ tha ma'ang brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bya// dang por kriSh+Na badzra ma ri

ni// bar du ma hA de bas te// tha mar 'char ka nag po'o// go rim bzhin du dbul bar bya// ming rus rnam snang bong spangs dang// tsher ma ming ru mtshan phyed na// brgya rtsa brgyad du zhag bdun bya// des ni 'chi

bar the tshom med// dbye bar 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg ni// bya rog 'ug pa rma bya dang// sbrul sha skra dang 'bras chang dang// ma he rta sha mi dang bcas// dur khrod mer bsregs 'bras bar 'gyur// dug gi shing la me

spar nas// gong rdzas khyim du bsregs gyur na// tshangs pa'ang nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi// skrod par 'dod na bya rog sha/ rnga mo'i rtug pa chang dang sbyar// dur khrod shing bcas gcer bu yis// lhor bltas ming bcas

bsregs gyur na// gnas nas skrod par the tshom med// rengs par 'dod na ba lang spu// ldong ros g+hi haM dkyil 'khor du// char kha'i ming byang las dang sbyar// gang gis ming bcas bsregs gyur na// nyi ma
bdun gyis rengs par 'gyur// nub mo rengs 'dod tsher ma dang// dug dang ke tshe khrag gis sbrus// rengs par gyur ces stong byas na// rengs 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rgyas pa til dang nas 'bras
mar// ut+pal shing la byang bltas te// las kyi rjes 'brel dug gsum bsreg/ bskul tshig bcas pas rgyas par 'gyur// zhi bar 'dod na mar sbrang rtsi// 'o ma dud par bcas pa la// 'o ma can gyi bud shing
la// dge 'dun bram ze'i me sbar la// shar du bltas te dug gsum bsreg/ las 'bras bskul tshig bcas gyur na// zhi par yang ni the tshom med// 'char ka'i mdun du sha chen dang// ba glang sha dang

bcas// gong gi ming bcas sbyin sreg stong// des ni bran bzhin the tshom med// khur mangs khyi sha mtshan phyed na// ming bcas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad// byas na nor rdzas dbang du 'du// gshin rje 'char ka nag
po'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// yang gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ gnan pa drag po bdag la shod// ces zhus pa dang/ bka' stsal pa/ las mjug gnan pa bya ba
yin// 'di yi 'khor lo ling ro dang// bcas pa gnan cing gtad 'dod na// sbal sprul lto sbyar nang du ling ga gzhug/ mar dang sbrang rtsi la sogs gzhug kham pa'i ga 'ur bcug gnas kyang// klu yi gnas su
sbas gyur na// des ni nad ngan sna tshogs 'bebs// gal te ling ro thod par gzhug/ mchod rten 'og tu sbas gyur na// yang na rgya grams dgral// sngags bkor bris te bzlas byas na// ba ru glang
rur bcug na yang// rgya gram ri'am mtsho 'gram gnan// yang na gnan pa'i 'khor lo de// la char bcug la mtsho la gnan// des kyang 'grub par the tshom med// gshin rje 'char kha nag po'i rgyud las/ gtad
cing gnan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'jam dpal nag po che// chos sku spros bral mtshan ma med// longs spyod mtshan dang dpe byad
'bar// sprul skus gdug pa 'dul byed pa// sems can kun gyi mgon po khyod// dad pas phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi// bdag cag 'khor du gtogs pa yi// thun mong ma yin 'char ka'i rgyud// 'di ni yongs
su bzung bar gyis// bstan pa yun du rgyas shing gnas// 'char ka nag po'i bstan pa 'di// thams cad bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi// gshin rje 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ bstod cing dam bca' ba'i le'u

ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa khyed rnams kyis/ rgyud 'di yongs su zung zhig/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir phyi rabs yongs su rgyas par
gyis shig/ dam nyams pa dang dam med pa la ma spel cig/ spel na de la chad pa chod cig/ yongs su chongs la thub par gyis chig/ bstan pa rgyas par gyis shig/ ces gsungs nas bzhugs so// 'khor de

dag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo// 'char ka nag po'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// gshin rje 'char ka nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can
gyis rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas rnyed pa'o// mgos la gnang//// rgya gar skad du/ ya ma man+t+ra ma ran tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje sngags bzlog gi rgyud ces bya ba/ 'jam
dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ yab 'jam dpal gshin rje yis bdud dang mu stegs thams cad brlag par bya ba'i ched du/ 'char ba nag po'i zhes
bya ba'i 'khor lo la gtad pa las/ bdud dang mu stegs thams cad brgyal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par gyur te/ de nas bran bzhin du gyur to// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de la dang po
dkyil 'khor ni// zur gsum rtse gcad brtsegs mar bya// yang na ras sam lder so bya// rten gsum la ni mchod rten gsum// pho dang mo yi che ge mo// 'phan chen la ni 'phyang du gzhug/ rtse bcad gru gsum
brtsegs mar bya// yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// yang na brgya dang rtsa brgyad bya// yang na bcu bzhi'am bdun nam gsum// de ltar byas la thun rdzas bsag/ dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis

pa'o//// de nas rdzas rnams bshad par bya// thod pa dang ni kong bur bcas// mngal khrag rme khrag gsum dang sbyar// tshe dang nyungs kar dug rdzas gsum// mar me sbang ma khrag dang bcas// mon dang bud
med skyes pa dang// lha bshos thog chen tsa la sogs// rdzas rnams rim par dgod par bya// rdzas dgod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas sngags kyi dbye ba ni// bzlog dang rbad dang gsad dang

gsum// bzlog pa sha ri b+h+yo las drang// gsang ba'i sngags ni kha bsgyur yin// rbad pa rnam dbyer b+h+yo nas grang// de la sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// oM sha ri b+h+yo ma ri b+h+yo nya ri b+h+yo khrag ma ma b+h+yo/ zhes pas de ni

bzlog par bya// gsad pa'i sngags dag bstan pa ni// sha ri b+h+yo sha truM mA ra ya phaT/ ma ri b+h+yo sha truM mA ra ya phaT/ khrag ma ma b+h+yo sha truM mA ra ya phaT/ tsir snying b+h+yo sha truM ma ra ya phaT/ snying b+h+yo sha truM ma ra ya phaT/

mak+She thod khrag dza sha truM ma ra ya phaT/ khrag ti snying la ya sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ nri tri chod sha truM ma ra ya rbad/ mu lo chod sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ sha lo chod sha truM ma ra ya rbad/ shal kyid kyi b+h+yo sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ sa ma ya a
tri kra ma ti/ ni bar na ni bar na/ bzlog bzlog sod sod rbad phaT/ ces bya'o// sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de la rbad pa 'di skad do// hU~M/ yab cig 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// zhal gcig phyag

gnyis 'jigs pa'i tshul// sku ni shin tu gnag pa la// dbu skra ral pa thor cog can/ khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan// gdug pa sbrul gyi rgyan cha can// srid pa'i 'khor lo lto na gnas// lag pa'i gar gyis

nam mkha' khengs// rkang pa'i stabs kyis sa gzhi gnon// sprul pa'i stobs kyi bar snang gang// mngag pa'i stobs kyis phyogs bzhi bkang// pho nya'i stobs kyis mtshams bzhi bkang// sku yi sprul pas lha bran
'gyed// steng gi gdon rnams bzlog tu gsol// gsung gi sprul pa sde bzhi 'gyed// bar gyi gdon rnams bzlog tu gsol// thugs kyi sprul pas klu rnams 'dul// 'og gi gdon rnams bzlog tu gsol// lha
srin sde brgyad pho nyar 'gyed// dgra bgegs rnams kyi snying nas drongs// the brang rnams kyi gdon rnams bzlog/ srid pa gsum la mdos kha sdig/ ma gshin thams cad dbang du sdus// byol zor bzlog pa'i
'jigs tshul can// g.yas pas bdud kyi sta ri yis// pho gdon thams cad bzlog tu gsol// g.yon pa lta ba'i me long bsnams// mo gdon thams cad bzlog tu gsol// nyi zla'i thod kyis brgyan pa
ni// gza' yi gdon rnams bzlog tu gsol// sbrul chun 'jigs pas brgyan byas pa// 'og gi gdon rnams bzlog tu gsol// khro gtum khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rngam pa'i stobs kyis bdud

bzhi 'dul// 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i cha byad kyis// rnal 'byor tshe srings dpal yang bskyed// byang kha'i sbyor ba bzlog tu gsol// skul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// hU~M/ 'jigs pa'i sku stod khro rgyal ni// sku ni
rab tu rngam pa la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis brjid par lta// sku mdog gnag pas bdud rnams 'dul// g.yas pa gri gug bsnams pa ni// log par 'dren pa'i snying rtsa gcod// g.yon pa snying khrag zhal du
gsol// nad khrag zhal du gsol ba'i rtags// 'phang na srid pa'i 'khor lo bsnams// srid pa'i byol kha bzlog tu gsol// spyi gtsug mchod rten nag po las// ye shes lha tshogs bzlog tu gsol// khyod kyi
lag pa g.yas pa na// mchod rten dkar po bsnams pa ni// pho bdud thams cad bzlog tu gsol// khyod kyi lag pa g.yon pa na// mchod rten dmar po bsnams pa ni// mo gdon thams cad bzlog tu
gsol// 'phan chen rab tu 'phyar bas ni// rnal 'byor tshe srings dpal yang skyed// 'khor lo rab tu 'phangs pa yis// chos kyi dbyings dang rab ldan nas// lha 'dre thams cad dbang du sdus// dbu la rin
chen 'bar ba yis// rnal 'byor dgongs pa lhun gyis grub// 'jigs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshangs pa brgya byin lha yi gdon// brjid pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// dga' bo 'jog po klu yi
gdon// gzi brjid stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gdon// 'jigs pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// za byed rngam pa srin po'i gdon// rngam pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu
gsol// gtso bo kha 'bar yi dwags gdon// bzhad pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// phag gdong 'jigs pa sha za'i gdon// gtum pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// byi na ya ka bgegs kyi
gdon// 'gying ba'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol/ khyab 'jug chen po gza' yi gdon// dregs pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// gri thogs khram thogs bdud kyi gdon// sprul pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu
gsol// 'dzin pa sdom po ging gi gdon// yang sprul stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol/ kha bzhi chen po btsan gyi gdon// 'jigs pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// tel pa phya sangs gshin rje'i gdon// sku yi
stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// ral gcig nag mo ma mo'i gdon// gsung gi stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// rol pa rkyang dgu rmu yi gdon// mgo brnyan stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// ma hA de ba lha yi
gdon// bden pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// ka la yak+she mu stegs gdon/ khros pa'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rbad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// hU~M/ 'jigs tshul rngam

pa'i cha byad can// sku ni ri rab khyon dang mnyam// spyan ni bar snang khams su gzigs// ljags ni sprul pa glog ltar 'khrug/ dbu skra thor cog zur bur 'khyil// thod pa skam rlon rgyan du byas// sbrul nag

'bar bas ral pa bcings// sku la rak+ta'i tshom bus brgyan/ khrag dang zhig gi thig le can// dbu dang phyag gnyis sprul pa'i tshe// sprul pa'i khro bos stong khams khyab// gsung gi sprul pa ha ha'i sgras// gsung
gi khro bos stong gsum gang// thugs ni mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhag/ don dam dbyings kyi lha ru gsal// de la yon tan bsam mi khyab// 'phrin las bcol ba'i don kun 'grub// sku yi rab tu rtags bstan
pa// sku yi sprul pas tshangs pa 'dul// spyan ni nyi ma'i 'od zer 'dra// nyi zla gza' skar 'dul ba'i rtags// shangs nas tshub mas stong gsum gang// dgra bgegs rlung la bskur ba'i rtags// tshems ni
gcod pa'i sta gri ste// bdud dpung thams cad gcod pa'i rtags// ljag ni 'khyug pa'i glog yin te// srid gsum rmang nas 'jig pa'i rtags// sku ni rab tu 'jigs pa'i tshul// klu phran dbang du sdud pa'i
rtags// gsung ni tshangs pa'i sgra ltar sgrogs// chos sgra phyogs bcur sgrogs pa'i rtags// thugs ni mi rtogs dang la bzhag/ byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i rtags// gsus pa rab tu 'khyil ba ni// srid
gsum lto na gnas pa'i rtags// zhabs gnyis dor stabs bgrad pa ni// bdud bzhi rab tu gnon pa'i rtags// dgra bo bzlog pa'i hU~M sgra can// bgegs kun bzlog pa'i phaT sgra can// byad kha bzlog pa'i

b+h+yo sgra can// 'byung po 'dul ba'i sgra sgrogs shing// dgra bgegs gsod pa'i sgra sgrogs pa// ma rungs pa la rgyob rgyob sgrogs// hU~M hU~M phaT phaT b+h+yo b+h+yo dang// dul dul he he sgra sgrogs pa// bzlog bsgyur byed

pa'i mthu bo che// khram kha bsgyur ba'i stobs po che// bdud kha bsgyur ba'i brjod po che// shod kha chen po da phye zhig/ rtsis kha chen po da bsgyur cig/ do nub srid pa'i khrom sna bsgyur// do nub lha 'bre'i dmag sna
bsgyur// phas kyi phur pa 'phen pa bzlog/ tshe zor nyungs zor 'phen bzlog/ gshin rje'i 'khor lo bskos ba bzlog/ bdud kyi khra la 'debs pa bzlog/ ma mo'i khrag zor 'phen pa bzlog/ klu yi byang du
bcug pa bzlog/ the'u rang tshe la rku pa bzlog/ 'gong po sril 'jog pa bzlog/ mu stegs par du byed pa bzlog/ ltas ngan brgya bcu rtsa bzhi bzlog/ mo ngan sogs sdig byed pa bzlog/ rmi lam ngan pa thams
cad bzlog/ mtshan ma rtsub pa ston pa bzlog/ lo yi skeg dang zla skaig bzlog/ zhag gi skeg dang za skeg bzlog/ ki kang gshed bzhi bab pa bzlog/ zhang zhung gtso zor 'phen pa bzlog/ sum
