ltung// phyi yi gzer chen las kyi sngags// yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi pa// sku yi snying po rdzogs par ldan// thabs kyi bzhi yi gsum pa ni// shes rab u yi yan lag 'og/ thabs kyi bzhi ba byin pa'o// thabs lnga'i
gnyis pa thabs drug gnyis// 'og spros mnga' mthar byin pa o// thabs dang thabs drug gnyis ldan a// yi ge gsum ni gong bzhin no// thabs kyi bdun dang shes rab u// thabs kyi gsum dang shes rab
i// de 'og yig gsum gong ma bzhin// thabs kyi drug dang thabs dang gsum// byin pas shes rab u 'og ldan// thabs bzhi'i dang po shes rab i// thabs kyi bdun mtha' thabs lnga'i mtha'// 'og
spras thabs kyi bzhi mtha' sbyin// shes rab a yi yan lag steng// thabs kyi bdun dang thabs drug gnyis// so sor shes rab ya dang ldan// thabs kyi bdun dang thabs drug gsum// byin pas shes rab a
dang ldan// thabs drug gsum la thabs bzhi dang// 'og tu spras pas shes rab a// thabs drug gnyis la thabs gnyis mthas// 'og spras thabs kyi gru gsum sbyin// shes rab i yi yan lag steng// thabs
kyi lnga gsum thabs drug dang// brgyad tha ltag dang ldan pa yis// 'og brgyan shes rab o ster ldan// thabs kyi gsum dang thabs drug gnyis// 'og spras thabs kyi dang gsum sbyin// shes rab a ste thabs
bzhi dang// 'og tu shes rab u yan lag/ thabs gnyis dang la thabs drug gnyis// byin pas shes rab a dang ldan// thabs kyi brgyad dang thabs drug gnyis// 'og spras thabs kyi gru gsum sbyin// shes
rab i yi yan lag ste// thabs lnga'i gsum la thabs brgyad ltag/ thabs drug dang pos 'og nas brgyan// shes rab oM yi yan lag steng// rta ma bsgrubs pa'i dus su sbyar// dbab sngags su bstan pa ni// de
bzhin de las gzhan ma ni// thabs bzhi gnyis la thabs dang gsum// byin pas shes rab i steng ldan// thabs gsum mtha' la thabs dang bzhi// byin te shes rab i steng ngo// dang po'i
grangs ni yi ge gsum// shes rab i yi yan lag steng// thabs lnga'i mtha' la thabs bzhi gsum// byin pas shes rab i dang ldan// thabs kyi mdun dang shes rab u// thabs kyi bdun dang shes rab
u// thabs kyi bzhi dang shes rab i// thabs kyi lnga gnyis thabs drug gnyis// 'og spras thabs kyi lnga mtha' sbyin// shes rab o yi yan lag steng// de 'og dgra ni yi ge gsum// shes rab i yi yan lag
steng// thabs bzhi'i gsum la thabs drug gnyis// 'og spras thabs dang gsum byin a// thabs lnga'i gsum pas thabs dang gsum// 'khrul pas 'og tu thabs drug dang// brgyan byas steng du thabs drug
gnyis// bkod de thabs bzhi'i gsum pa byin// shes rab a dang ldan pa'o// gtug pa'i sgra ni shes rab a// thabs kyis bzhi gsum shes rab kyi// u 'og bzhi gsum de nyid bzhin// thabs lnga'i gnyis
la thabs drug gnyis// 'og spras thabs lnga'i mtha' ma bzhin// shes rab o yi yan lag steng// thabs bzhi mtha' la thabs lnga'i mtha'// byin pas shes rab a dang ldan// thabs lnga'i mtha' yis bzhi yi
gnyis// phul te thabs kyi dang mtha' dang// thabs bdun mtha' sbyin yi ge bzhi// shes rab o steng gcig pu bod// thabs lnga'i gnyis 'og thabs drug dang// brgyan pas shes rab i dang ldan// dgrol ba'i
yi ge bcu yi grangs// dang gsum shes rab a dang ldan// de 'og yi ge bzhi ni thabs// gsum ni steng 'og spras pa steng// cig ni dkyus su byin pa la// shes rab o yi yan lag steng// dang po'i gsum la
drug gnyis brtseg/ thabs kyi gru gsum de la sbyin// shes rab o yi yan lag steng// de rting thabs kyi lnga mtha' la// shes rab gnyis 'og 'og nas mdzes// shes rab i yi yan lag steng// thabs kyi drug
gnyis thabs dang mtha'// byin te shes rab a dang ldan// thabs kyi bdun mtha' thabs bzhi gsum// byin pas shes rab o dang ldan// de rting thabs kyi dang po la// thabs drug dang pos 'og nas

mdzes// thabs drug gnyis pas steng brgyan a// thabs kyi dang mtha' de la sbyin// de steng yi ge gnyis brtsegs ni// dbang po mtshon byed gcad po sgra// de rting gong ma nyid shes bya// thabs kyi mnga' mtha'
shes rab o// thabs kyi gnyis dang shes rab u// thabs kyi drug gnyis shes rab u// thabs kyi lnga gnyis thabs gsum dang// byin pa shes rab a dang ldan// thabs bzhi'i gsum ni 'bum bcas
pa// shes rab oM yi yan lag steng// thabs bdun mtha' la thabs bzhi dang// 'og spras shes rab a dang ldan// thabs lnga'i dang po thabs gsum dang// gnyis su brjod pa so so
bzhi// thabs kyi drug dang thams cad kun// shes rab aM yis khyab pa'o// yi ge brgya bcu thams pa ni// nang gi rtag las bzlas bsngags te// sgrub pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya'o// 'od sta don gyi tha yin

te// bdun cu rtsa ba thabs la byung// steng 'og dkyus su bgrangs pa ni// nang gi bsgrub pa grangs kyi tho// srog snying thabs kyis steng 'og brgyan// bskyed pa'i sa bon bzhi bsnan tho// thabs bdun tha ma'i yi ge
la// thas rtag yi ge bzhis brgyan thabs// las bzhi don grub don gyi tho// phan tshun gnyis ka'i tho ru bshad// de nas las sngags mchog gi mchog/ thabs kyi drug gnyis steng du i// thabs kyi bdun dang
shes rab a// thabs kyi drug dang shes rab a// thabs kyi lnga dang thabs bzhi gnyis// thabs kyi drug gnyis so so gsum// thams cad shes rab a dang ldan// thabs kyi dang po thabs drug gnyis// gnyis
ka shes rab u mgo ldan// thabs kyi lnga mtha' shes rab e// thabs kyi mnga' mtha' thabs tha ltag/ so so'i shes rab a dang ldan// thabs kyi bzhi bzung 'phul dang bcas// shes rab o yi yan lag
steng// thabs bdun mtha' la thabs bzhi dang// 'og spras shes rab a dang ldan// shes rab dang cig bzhag pa yin// thabs kyi mnga' gsum steng du e// thabs kyi bdun dang shes rab A// thabs kyi drug
dang shes rab a// de gting shes rab dang po gnyis// so so'i bzhag la drag tu bod// thabs bzhi tha ltag shes rab a// thabs drug gnyis ni shes rab a// thabs kyi dang po shes rab u// thabs kyi bdun
dang de bzhin ni// thabs lnga'i mtha' ni shes rab e// thabs kyi bdun mtha' aM dang ldan// thabs lnga'i mtha' la thabs drug gnyis// 'og spras thabs dang gsum byin a// thabs bdun mtha' la thabs

brgyad ltag/ 'og spras shes rab a dang ldan// tha ltag shes rab as khyab pa// las sngags kun gyi mchog yin te// yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum ni// bsgrub pa'i yang snying grangs kyi tho// phan tshun gnyis shes nang

gi tho// gzhan yang phyi yi las sngags mchog/ dkrugs pa'i nang gi las kyi sngags// brgya bcu tshan pa lnga ru bgo// steng 'og bor ba bcu gsum ni// dkyus su bgrangs pa dang po'o// gnyis bco lnga gsum pa

la// steng 'og pa dang bzhin no// bzhi pa la yang bco lnga ste// lnga pa brgyad du shes par bya// phyi yi gzer chen las kyi bsngags// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa// drug cu rnam par bgo bar bya// dang po dkyus bgrangs
bzhi ru shes// de 'og de gnyis de gting yang// bzhi ru shes bya de gting lnga// tha ma thang ltag brgyad brgyad do// so sor phye la gcig btu ba// dang po bcu gsum bdun 'og gcig/ bcu gsum

'og ma'i dang 'og gnyis// yan lag byin med so sor bzhag/ drug tha brgyad kyi tha ltag gnyis// byin pa de ltar brgyad gong gi/ dang po dang 'og sdom la gzhag/ bco lnga dang po'i gsum 'og gcig/ drug tha

brgyad kyi dang gnyis bzhag/ bco lnga tha ma'i mtha' gnyis ltag/ drug pa'i mtha' brgyad gsum 'og gzung// de gting gnyis ni de bzhin no// bzhi gsum tha ma'i phyed stod gzung// bzhi tshan dang po'i phyed smad

bzung// drug tshan mtha' brgyad bzhi ltag gzung// lnga tshigs bcu gsum dang po gnyis// gong 'og bzlog pa'i gong ma la// tha ltag bco lnga'i mtha' gnyis ltag/ lus med zhabs bskyed 'og tu sbyin// de rting

dang 'og bco lnga pa'i// tha ma'i yi ge bzhi gzung bya// de 'og lnga tshigs bcu gsum pa'i// gnyis 'og bzhis te tha ma darog/ de rting de yi dang po gnyis// gong 'og bzlog la bzhag par bya'o// de gting lnga tha

brgyad tha ltag/ shes rab dang po gnam btus bzhag/ bzhi tshan dang 'og dang gnyis bzhag/ drug pa'i dang po de gting ngo// lnga yi tha ltag bco lnga pa'i// tha ma gnyis bzhag de'o gcig/ de gting de nyid gnyis

ka sbyin// bzhi tshan gsum pa'i mtha' gnyis bzhag/ lnga yi tha ltas bco lnga'i mtha'// gnyis bzhag phyi yi las sngags yin// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ni// phyi yi las sngags gcig gi tho// phan tshun gnyis ka nges
pa'i grangs// ma mthun gnyis ka skyon zug pas// mi 'grub the tshom bzhi ru 'gyur// de nas gsang ba'i sngags btub// dang po'i sku dang yi ge ste// srog snying dang po gzhug nas bzlog/ gcig por gnyis
bzung gsum bor la// bzhi bzung so sor bzhag par bya// tha ma mas yar bzlog pa las// lnga bor gnyis ni bzhag par bya// gnyis pa 'jug nas mas bzlog na// gnyis bor gsum ni bzung byas la// sngar

btus 'og tu bzhag par bya// de rting yi ge drug gzhag pa// kun gyis bod par shes par bya// de nas bskyed pa'i sa bon bzhi// tsit+ta zhes pa'i sa bon gnyis// rang rang ma nor bzhag par bya// thabs bdun
mtha' la thabs bzhi gsum// so sor bzhag pa'i 'og ma la// shes rab u yi yag lag 'og/ dam tshig yi ge gsum yang bzhag/ hriM gnyis b+h+yo gnyis bzhag pa la// dam tshig 'bru gsum snying po
bzhag/ thabs gnyis gsum pa'i yi ge gnyis// tshe gcig bcad de so sor bzhag/ gsang ba'i bsnyen pa'i snying po yin// shar lho bskyed pa'i sa bon gnyis// thabs kyi drug dang yi ge gsum// so sor bzhag
pas gsod par 'gyur// thabs kyi lnga gsum steng du ni// thabs kyi drug gnyis bzhag byas la// thabs kyi gzhi yi gsum pa sbyin// gsad pa btub pa'i snying po yin// dzaHhU~M baM ho yi ge

bzhi// phyag rgya bzhi yi snying po yin// gang zhig smos pa'i ming bcas pa// thabs kyi bdun mtha' 'og tu ni// thabs kyi bzhi dang spros byas la// thabs kyi lnga mtha' sbyin par bya// thabs kyi lnga gsum gzhag byas
la// de gting thabs kyi bzhi mtha' la// thabs kyi gsum mtha' sbyin par bya// thams cad shes rab a dang ldan// srun pa gzir ba'i snying po yin// e 'dus 'phang bdun ming po yin// sngags rnams gzhan
du gsungs pa nges// btu mi dgos pas 'dir ma gsungs// de la sogs te sngags kyi rnams// bsam mi khyab par gsungs pa kun// de yi yon tan bsam mi khyab// ma btus sngags la the tshom skyes// sngags

kyi dgra ni the tshom ste// the tshom spangs te bsgrub byas na// de tshe dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po thams cad 'joms byed 'bar ba las/ sngags btu ba'i le'u ste bcu
bdun pa'o//// de nas lha mo bya ba mos// mchod pa du mas rab mchod nas// rgyal ba'i gtso la 'di skad gsol// kye ma bcom ldan 'phrin las bdag/ dngos grub myur du bsgrub bya dang// las rnams
mtha' ru phyin 'gyur ba'i// 'phrin las rnams ni bdag la gsungs// de skad gsol pas gsan nas ni// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor bzang po bya ba ni// dbus su zla khaM khru gang

tshad// zabs su khru phyed bang rim ldan// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// bang rim gnyis ni mu khyud bzhin// bdud rtsi lnga dang rak+ta lngas// dkyil 'khor chag chag legs par byug/ dbus su rdo rje phyogs bzhi

bri// phyag mtshan dgod pa'i rim pa'o// yaM shing rta rga'i shing bu ni// cha gang sngo yi chu la sbang// bud shing ro yi shing bu la// pho brang dbyibs bzhin brtsig par bya// bdud rtsi lngas bkang ban d+ha ni// bdag nyid

mdun du bzhag par bya// me tog la sogs rnam lnga bsham// yaM shing rak+tas sna drangs la// sngo rnams dang ni 'o ma bzhag/ de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// las kyi nga rgyal ldan byas la// b+h+ruM las 'khor lo
'bar ba bskyed// de steng hri las dbang gi lha// thams cad rdzogs par bskyed par bya// de la mchod pas mnyes par bya// thugs kha'i hri las 'od byung bas// yab yum gnyis med 'od du zhu// 'od dpung las
ni hU~M du gyur// de las me lha yab yum bskyed// rgyan rnams thams cad rdzogs pa dang// thugs khar ma mo'i 'bru bzhi las// stag srin la sogs ma mo bzhi// sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal bar bskyed// bdud
rtsi'i chu yis gsang bar bya// ye shes me lha dgug pa ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi las bya yin// de la mchod pa rdzogs byas la// bstod de ma mo'i mchod pa yang// rdzogs par gong ma nyid shes
bya// mchod pa'i sngags ni rang rang gi/ ming dang bcas pa bdun bdun dbul// bstod de bcol ba'i las rnams bya// thal 'jim dmigs pa'i phyogs su 'phang// ye shes spyan drangs mchod byas
la// gshegs gsol dam tshig thugs khar bsdu// dbang steng dbab pa'i las la shis// de nas gsad pa'i rim pa ni// gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor la// mthing nag 'bar ba'i skur bsgoms la// gsad

pa'i las su sreg bya ba// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi gong ma'i tshad// dbus su gru gsum khru gang la// zabs su khru phyed bang rim la// sor bzhi pa yi tshad du gnyis// thod pa dang ni rdo rjes brgyan// nang du 'khor lo

rtsibs bzhi ni// rnam lngas sbrus pa'i 'jim pa la// khrag sna lnga dang ro bsregs sol// dug dang sbyar ba'i chu yis byug/ bud shing gdug pa'i shing bu ni// dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhin brtsig par bya// yaM shing tsher

ma can gyi shing// ring thung tshad ni mdzub gang ste// phyag gang khrag gi chu la spang// rdzas kyi kha dog nag por byug/ sha khrag sna tshogs dug sna tshogs// bsreg pa'i rdzas ni thams cad bsham// dmigs pa legs

byas ling kha de// bdag nyid rkang pa'i 'og tu gzhug/ las kyi dam tshig ldan byas la// thab khung bdud rtsi chu yis bsang// de nas srin po'i me blangs te// ra las bskyed pa'i me sbar la// me dkyil a las
gzhal yas khang// de nang dam tshig ma mo bskyed// las kyi ma mo spyan drangs la// bstim la bdud rtsi chu yis bsang// mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs pa dang// bstod de yongs su gyur pa las// me lha yab yum
rdzogs par bskyed// ye shes me lha gnas nas dgug/ gong ma'i sngags kyis las rnams bya// bstim nas mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// de yi thugs khar mchod pa'i gnas// sa bon las ni rdzogs par
bya// mchod pa'i gnas ni raM gyis so// de la mchod pa'i rim pa ni// rang rang sngags kyis dbul bar bya// de nas zhabs 'og gzugs brnyan la// gang yin bkug la der bstim la// sngags bzlas mtshon
gyis gtubs byas la// ming rus sngags sgrags byas nas ni// dum bu me yi lha la dbul// 'khor dang bcas pas gsol bar bsam// spyan drangs dam tshig gnyis phye la// mchod de bstod la gshegs su

gsol// dam tshig bdag gi thugs khar bsdu// 'di ni rlag pa'i las mchog ste// gsad pa'i las la rab tu shis// de nas zhi ste bzlog bya ba// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dkyil nyid du// dbus su cha gang khru phyed
ni// bang rim bcas pa zlum por bya// 'khor lo pad+ma lce bzhi ni// tsan dan dkar po'i chu yis byug/ yaM shing dkar la bsnyen pa yis// 'o ma can gyi shing bu dang// tsan dan dkar po'i chu la
spang// bud shing dkar po'i shing bu nyid// dkyil 'khor dbyibs bzhin brtsig par bya'o// zho dang 'o ma dkar ba'i rdzas// mchod pa'i rdzas ni thams cad bsog/ las kyi lha ni gsal byas la// thab khung

bdud rtsi chu yis bsang// gtsub shing las byung me sbar la// me dkyil paM las pad+ma bskyed// de steng rang gi lha bskyed la// mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs pa dang// 'od du me lha yab yum bskyed// thugs khar gnas
pa yongs rdzogs te// ye shes me lha 'khor bcas dgug/ bdag nyid mdun du dmigs bsam la// bdud rtsi chu yis bsang bar bya// de la mchod pa rdzogs par dbul// sngags la srungs shig ming dang
bcas// bdag nyid blo yis bslang bar bya// spyan drangs me lha 'khor bcas te// mchod pa phul la gshegs su gsol// dam tshig lha ni thugs khar bsdu// bsrung ba'i gsang sngags rgyan du bzlos// 'di ni
gcas pa'i mchog yin te// zhi ba'i tshul du bsregs byas na// bsrung ba'i las la rab tu shis// de nas rgyas par gsad bsrung ba// dkyil 'khor bzang po dkyil nyid du// dbus su gru bzhi khru gang

bya// zabs su khru phyed bang rim gnyis// thod pa rdo rjes bskor bar bya// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gur gum ser po'i chu yis byug/ yaM shing ser po'i shing bu ni// ring thung zhi ba'i tshul du bya'o// bud

shing ser po'i shing bu la// dkyil 'khor dbyibs bzhin brtsig par bya// mchod pa'i rdzas ni rims bzhin dgod// las kyi lha ni gsal byas la// thab khung dud rtsi'i chu yis bsang// rgyal po'i khyim nas me

blangs te// me sbar me dkyil b+h+ruM bsam la// de las 'khor lo gzugs su gyur// de stengs rang gi lha bskyed la// mchod pa rnams ni rdzogs par bya// bstod de 'od du me ltar gyur// thugs khar lha ni yongs su
rdzogs// de rjes ye shes me lha dgag/ bdud rtsi chu yis bsang bar bya// bstims la mchod pa yongs rdzogs bya// bdud rtsi chu yis khrus byas la// gsang sngags de yi mgul du gdags// mtha' yi 'phrin las

bcol ba ni// me lha'i rgyal po ag+ne dang// las kyi ma mo khyed rnams kyis// bdag gi 'phrin las 'di lta bu// khyed rnams yongs kyis grub par mdzod// de skad brjod la spyan drangs te// mchod cing bstod la de
gshegs bya// dam tshig bdag gi thugs khar bsdu// srung ba'i phyir na rgyas pa yin// zhes sungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po thams cad 'joms byed 'bar ba las/ 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i le'u ste bco
brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'khor rnams kyis ston pa dang/ rdo rjes bya ba mo la 'di skad ces bstod do// e ma ho bcom ldan he ru ka/ bde gshegs kun gyi che ba'i mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi

bdag nyid gtso// ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ston pa dang ni dbyer med pa'i// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa khyod// the tshom thams cad gcod la mkhas// don 'byin khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku
gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// so so rang rang gzugs kyis 'dul// don rnams thams cad 'grub byed pa// gsang ba'i yum mchog khyod la bstod// de nas rdo rje bya ba mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis rgyud 'di la ji ltar blta bar bgyi// gang ji lta bu'i don shes par bgyi// bshad cing gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje bya ba mo/ ngas bshad cing brjod pa ni gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs par rung ba ma yin
no// de bas kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du gyis shig/ nor bu rin po che lta bur bzung bar gyis shig/ de skad ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje he ru ka ni mnyam pa nyid las dmigs te cang mi gsung bar

bzhugs so// rdo rje bya ba mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs bzhugs par gyur to// 'khor ma mo rnams ni mnyam pa'i ngang du mi snang bar gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi ma mo rnams ni dam pa chos skyong ba'i bsrung mar gyur to// rgyud

kyi rgyal po chen po thams cad 'joms byed 'bar ba las// rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po thams cad 'joms byed 'bar ba zhes bya ba dngos po bstan pa rdzogs so//// bram ze
mchog sred zla bas saM skr-i ta'i skad las/ bod kyi lo tsa u nan dga' bas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//// // rgya gar skad du/ e ma man tra kra d+ha na praM kraM traM tra rA dza/ bod skad du/ drag po

sngags rgod de kho na nyid rgya sdebs rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal chen khro bo 'jigs byed 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo rngam pa'i rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po de/

yum dang gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po'i ngang la/ 'og min gyi gnas sems nyid kyi mkha' rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ lnga nyid zhi khror snang ba'i sku dang/ bcu gsum gcig tu rdzogs pa'i sku

dang/ rang sems stobs su gyur pa'i sku dang/ sna tshogs pho mor sprul pa'i sku dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po des/ chos thams cad rang rig byang chub kyi sems thig le chen po'i bdag
nyid du bsdus te/ de nyid kyi rol pa sna tshogs su snang ste/ gsang sngags kyi sgra du ma grag par mdzad do// de'i byin gyi brlabs kyis khro bo khro mo'i tshogs thams cad dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa

dang/ 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa can pho mo thams cad kyi mthu dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ stobs dang/ srog snying dang/ las dang/ nus mthu thams cad gcig tu dril te sna tshogs sdebs par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor
'dus pa de dag gis ngag mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o dpal chen khro rgyal gtso// bdag cag rnams kyi srog snying las// dpal bo chen po'i spyan sngar 'bul// bde chen thugs kyi byin stobs
kyis// nus mthu ngar dang mi gdug gcod// rim pa du mar byin pas na// rgya sdebs thugs sdebs gsang ba'i sdebs// rang rang rkyang sdebs bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// gleng gzhi dang zhus pa'i skabs

dang po'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces gsungs so// drag po sngags kyi mtshan nyid de// ngo bo byang chub sems nyid dang// lhun grub gting zab rgya cher rol// rnam pa yi ge'i bdag nyid

las// sgra dang tha snyad ming du shar// rang bzhin zhi dang khro bo dang// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'jig rten gyi// dregs pa can gyi lha yin te// nus pa mtshon cha sna tshogs la// dug gi ngar dang pa dang 'dra// las ni phan

gnod gnyis 'grub ste// de ltar sngags kyi bdag nyid la// ngo bo rang bzhin rnam pa dang// nus pa las dang don lnga'o// yi ge sngags kyi mtshan nyid las// sna tshogs spros pa'i tshig byung yang// don nyid rtsa ba

yan lag dang// 'dogs dang 'phul dang 'dren dang lnga'o// de dag 'di la 'da' mi srid// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/ i I/

u u/ e ai/ o au/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ aM a/ yi ge de dag tha snyad du// kA li sum cu rtsa bzhi la// sgra dang thabs dang lus dang rgyu// rdo rje gdags kyi yi ge'o// A li brgyad gnyis de nyid las// dbyangs dang
shes rab yan lag dang// rkyen dang pad+ma sribs zhes bya// don dang nus pa sna tshogs 'byung// lan dang yi ge dbye ba'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// de nas khro bo 'jigs byed chen po des 'di skad ces

gsungs so// drag po sngags kyi mtshan nyid la// rnam pa mang du bshad mod kyang// don ni gsum du bsdus pa yin// rtsa ba lnga yi srog snying dang// yan lag las grub snying po dang// bar du brda sbyar snying po

dang// de dag rgyas par dbye ba yang// ya tha rgyal ba zhi khro nas// ma tha the brang pho mo yi// bar gyi snying sngags thams cad la// 'di ltar yang dag shes par bya// gang yin sgrub pa'i dus de ru// gnad nas bod
cing 'gugs par byed// gnyis med rang la bcad nas kyang// mnyam nyid ngang du byed pa ste// lha yi srog snying zhes su bshad// de nas gang yin las la 'dzud// phan gnod gang yin sgrub byed
cing// tha mar don rnams grub pa ste// yan lag las grub ces su bshad// bsgrub bya'i dmigs pa rnam shes srog/ bar du gar sbyin sbyor ba ste// bar du brda sbyar snying por bshad// drag po sngags rgod
gnam thog la// rang rang stobs kyi byin brlabs ldan// ngar dang dpal bcas gang yang 'grub// gdul bya dgos pa'i don dang sbyar// de dag don gyis rgyal bshad pa// ka ni stobs chen las grub yin/ kha ni

drag po sngags bdag 'dul// ga zhes bkra shis mchog ldan bde// nga zhes dbang sdud lhun byin 'bar// tsa zhes mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul myur// tsha zhes 'joms byed sreg dang ldan// dza zhes rnam shes mthu stobs
'gugs// nya zhes gsal ba'i thig le 'dus// ta zhes dgos 'dod 'phel chen bde// tha zhes ming brda rnam shes snying// da zhes thabs ldan 'dus ba'i bcud// na zhes thabs kyis 'dul byed
'gugs// bzlog pa myur drag 'dus pa'i sgra// pa zhes ma chags shes rab thabs// pha zhes thabs rnams rtsa bar 'dus// ba zhes log rtog rgyu sgrol 'joms// ma zhes dbyings ldan yid 'dus yum// ya zhes
bskyod byed nus stobs sgrol// wa zhes kun 'dus thabs 'dren gsal// ra zhes klad byed sreg cing smin// la zhes rjes su dkar zhing 'bod// sha zhes myos byed gtum zhing byams// sa zhes brtan byed srog
bcas len// ha zhes stobs drag myur grub smin// a zhes rtsa ba'i stobs chen brtan// i zhes stobs brtan gzhan 'joms so// u zhes 'gugs 'dren 'phul zhing bstim// e zhes drag po myur sgrol
gsod// o zhes rang dbang med 'phrog sdud// ya btags gang yang mthun par bskyed// ha btags ring la drag par sgrol// 'a btags ring la 'jam par 'dus// yi ge don bshad tshad ma 'di// kun la'ang
sbyar zhing gdags zhes bshad// yi ge 'bru'i nus pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// de nas rngam chen 'bar ba des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yi ge dang bcas drag sngags la// mtshon chi rim pa mang yod

kyang// rtsa ba'i don bsdus 'di lta ste// ya dang rgyal mtshan gang 'phrad pa// 'di yi nus pa yon tan dgu// drag po byed kyang myur bar 'grub// sgrol byed gsod byed gzir dang 'joms// gang yang dgos med
rtag tu srung// rgyas par kun khyab yon tan dgu// na dang rgyal mtshan 'brel pa la// yon tan nus pa rnam pa bdun// 'gugs dang sdud dang dbang du byed// drag tu 'bod dang 'khu dbang med// stobs bskyed
ngar blud bdun dang ldan// a las 'byung ba'i stobs dang ldan// la dang glog 'gyu 'brel pa ste// rang dbang med par 'jam du 'gugs// brtan pa'i tshan che zhi bar spud// ra dang glog 'gyu
'brel pa des// drag tu 'gugs dang mthu ru sreg/ yid mi bde byed sdug bsngal myong// a dang ne ru 'brel ba ni// skye med mi 'gyur stobs chen lhun// e dang ne ru 'brel pa ni// rol pa drag pos gtum po
sgrol// u dang ne ru 'brel pa ni// rang gi gnad nas khub med 'joms// du dang ne ru 'brel pa des// thugs rje'i stobs 'dus 'gugs shig drag/ oM ni yon tan bdun ldan te// skye med 'bras bu shugs

kyis bgrod// ye shes lhun rdzogs byin stobs ldan// tshan che mi ldog 'khub med cing// mthu rtsal ring du 'byin pa yin// hU~M ni de las myur drag 'grub// e yi don du nus pa dgu// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
sems// nam mkha' lta bur gnas pa las// rol pa khro bdag chen po shar// de las mtshon cha dug ngan can// nub pa stobs chen dpag tu med// gdul bya drag po sgrol zhing 'joms// rgyu dang rkyen la mthu ma
ltos// las gang myur pu 'grub pa yin// yi ge phrad kyi skabs te bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro chen 'bar bas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bde gshegs thugs las spros pa yi// drag po

sngags rgod gnam thog 'dra// de yi don bshad 'di lta ste// ka dang ba ru 'brel pa'i don// sku dang 'phrin las sna tshogs nyid// myur du 'grub dang chags med lhun// a dang ba ru 'brel ba'i don// stong pa nyid
kyi byin brlabs las// sna tshogs spros bcas ma gos 'grub// mu dang ka ru 'brel pa'i don// gsung nyid chags bral drag po yi// las kyi mthu bstobs myur du 'byin// tsi dang ta ru 'brel ba'i don// thugs

nyid mi 'gyur snying po yis// gtum rngam 'bar ba sgrol ba yin// si dang nga ru 'brel pa des// seng ge lta bu'i byin stobs kyis// gang yang 'joms byed 'khub med sdud// bya dang tsa ru 'brel pa des// rgyal po

lta bu'i nus pa des// rngam par las byed kun grub sgrol// du dang ru zhes 'brel pa des// gshed byed lta bu'i byin rlabs kyis// rang bzhin drag pos gsod cing rlag/ hri dang ta zhes 'brel ba'i don// lcags
sdud ji bzhin srog snying las// rang dbang med par gnad 'gugs bsgrol// nri dang ta ru 'brel pa des// rgya mtsho lta bu'i rlabs snang bas// gang gi las rnams shugs kyis myur// ha dang la zhes 'brel pa
de// btsan dug lta bur gang reg pa// kun sgrol dpal dang ngar gyis 'joms// da dang la ru 'brel pa de// ral gri lta bu'i rno dbal gyis// gdul bya gang sgrol shugs kyis gcod// ma dang la ru 'brel pa
de// nyi ma lta bur 'od zer snang// yid kyi nyon mongs rang gnad sreg/ kyi dang po ru 'brel pa de// lcags kyu lta bu'i thugs rjes khros// rang dbang med par 'dren gzir gsod// ya dang ma ru
'brel pa de// dgu thog lta bu'i nus pa yis// mnan cing nus pas yul dbang 'joms// mu dang ka ru 'brel ba de// ri rab ji bzhin gzas pa'i yul// phyir mi ldog par gzir gnon myos// tsa dang kra ru

'brel ba de// 'byung ba bzhi yi nus pa bzhin// gang yang 'grub cing srog rgyun gcod// drag po rgod yig sna tshogs 'di// thugs rje ye shes rol pa yin// sngags rgod don gyi skabs te lnga pa'o//// de nas
yang bde chen gtum po 'bar bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnam par shes pa'i srog snying la// bla med 'jig rten 'das pa gsum// brda zhes bya ba ming du grags// rnam shes zhes bya srog tu
grags// dwangs ma ye shes 'bras bur grags// snyigs ma bag chags 'phen rgyur grags// 'gugs pa rang dbang med par grags// dwangs ma snyigs ma rang gsum 'dres// las la sbyar zhing snying po rgyas// de

yang chu zla lta bur gnas// brda yi snying po sprin chags tshul// 'gugs byed seng ge'i sbar khyim 'dra// 'di dang phyi ma kun gyi stobs// ma lus 'di yis byed pa'i phyir// srog gi snying po zhes su grags// shrI sham

ti oM/ he ru ka krod+ha hU~M/ badzra kri la ya ta/ ya ma ye a ya/ karma ya ma tsi sham ya/ ma ma ru lu ma/ badzra pA Ni hi/ a ti pa ta ye taM/ ka ru kroM kroM kroM/ nA ga rA dza tha/ rA tsa tsa/ rA tsa tsa tri/ tsi shaM tri tsa/ ru thum ru tra/ b+ha

sti da dun ting du me me/ trag raka sham/ tir sti ka tha/ b+hi li dzo li na du/ mun thibs pa/ rag sha rag ra/ rag mo ma maM/ shu la dza yaM/ yaM ti/ ra tsa sham ti dza/ de ba su a/ yag sha/ yaka mo k+Sha/ k+She ti k+She/ badzra sA

du tri/ ging kar hri/ g+ha na g+ha ti dun/ ra hu la pa k+ShaM/ ru staM ni/ ru tr-i ru ga du ma/ ga dun na/ sa truM maM/ be sa bas sa/ ga traM ya ga/ nA ga rA tsa/ na du ru/ nA ga ra ba ga/ nA ga ba hI nA phu/ hob shaM tri/ ro ni yi du sta sta/

pra ti sti ya sti/ ra sti ra/ u ti u/ de dag srog gi snying pos te// phan gnod las rnams kun la sbyar// A+oM dang hU~M dang phaT dang gsum// lha bsgrub ye shes gnas skabs yin// gang yin yig 'bru drag po
dang// gnyis gsum bzhi ru mnan pa yis// rim pa bzhin du stobs chen ldan// srog snying gi skabs te drug pa'o//// de nas yang khro rgyal gtum po bde gshegs kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// drag po

sngags rgod rgya sdebs dang// thugs thigs gsang sdebs rkyang pa'i sdebs// de dag bshad pa 'di lta ste// bsnyen bsgrub las kyi sngags sdebs pa// rgya yi sdebs zhes bshad pa yin// drag po sngags rgod stobs
sdebs pa// thugs kyi thigs pa'i sdebs zhes bshad// bzlog dang gsad dang dbab pa sdeb// gsang ba'i sdebs zhes de la bshad// las ka phra ru sdebs pa ni// rang rang rkyang pa'i sdebs zhes

bshad// de ltar sdebs kyi don bzhir gsungs// dang po gang yin bsnyen pa yi// sngon du sdeb dang thad kar sdeb// sngon du gang yin khugs su gzhug/ de nas gang yin bsnyen pa bya// bsnyen nas grub pa thob
par bya// de nas dbang du bsdu bar bya// de nas dam bsre dngos grub blang// de nas rang rang gnyis med gzung// de nas las la bran bzhin bkol// don drug bsnyen pa'i rgya sdebs yin// 'di drug mi ldan

sgrub byed pa// don mi 'grub cing 'khu bzlog byed// mtha' ru rang nyid rlag par 'gyur// de yi sngags sdebs rgyas bshad pa// dang po khugs su gzhug pa yang// gang yin sngags bsnyen srog snying gi/ a ni sum

brtsegs a ka dang// sa ma ya li zhes mgo bor sbyar// mjug tu mu ka ye nan dza// hri gnyis sbyar la khugs su gzhug/ de nas bsnyen pa dngos nyid kyis// mjug tu dza la dza bskyon bsnyen// srog snying de yi klad
gnon du// a dang hri dang badzra bzhag/ mjug tu u ne sid+d+hi a// de nas ka pa ya dza gnyis// sdebs pas grub pa thob par nges// mgo ru a ni gsum brtseg dang// u ni sum brtseg klad gon gtang// mjug

tu sa ma ya zhes dang// u rkyang sum brtseg ja sum brtsegs// mthang bsgyur bsdebs pas rang dbang 'du// des kyang dbang du 'dus byung na// dam tshig klad du ha ra gnyis// dza yi 'og tu ri ri bzhi// bar der

rang srog 'bru gcig sdebs// rang dbang med par dbang du nges// srog sngags rkyang pa'i mtha' rgya ru// sa ma ya badzra a mr-i ta/ u tsi ti sid+d+ha khid phrom nan/ bi dza ya hU~M a zhes sbyar// dam bsres dngos grub thob

par 'gyur// de nas srog snying klad gnon du// a ni sum brtsegs hri sti a// mtha' ru Ad+ma kro badzra/ haM zhes sbyar bas gnyis med bstim// sngon du 'gro ba'i rgya sdebs 'di// gang yin bsgrubs pa'i lha
mchog de// rang dang mnyam par mngon du 'gyur// gal te mngon du ma gyur na// rang la dam nyams grib yod pas// de dag klad du sa ma ya// sbyar zhing gshegs pa'i rgyal po gdon// 'dus byas tshogs ni ci
nus bsag/ ldan na sems kyi chos nyid bsgom// de ni the tshom med par 'gyur// dper na rkyen tshang 'bras bu 'dra// las kyi dbang mi ldan yang 'grub// de nas las la bkol ba'i thabs// rnam pa gsum dang

ldan par bshad// las mi byed cing 'khu bzlog na// srog sngags klad du dbang bsdu sbyin// mtha' bsgyur trig nan dun dun nan// de nas dbang bsdu bzhin du sbyin// so par a tri badzra btang// des ni rgyal
por 'bangs bkol bzhin// rang dbang med bcun las lag stong// las rnams byed kyang tshan chung na// srog sngags klad du hU~M sum rtseg/ de nas dbang bsdu bzhin du drug/ de 'og staM pa ya zhes

brdeb// mjug tu raka sha ka pa ye// sa la myags dang ka po ye// de nas gsang sngags gang ru sbyar// srung dbab la sogs de bzhin no// las kyang byed la tshan che yang// las de rdul zhing rno chung nang// klad

gnon e ne sum brtsegs la// de 'og u ne sum rtseg sdeb// rjes su badzra tri ta ka pa ye// de la srog sngags rtsa ba sbyar// de rjes ri gsum ti k+ShaN rbad// shag ti rbad ces spu gri'i klad// mtha' ru thuM ril mA ra

ya// rbad ces sbyar na rno bar 'gyur// tshad na ril gri bzhin du gcod// thog dang glog bzhin myur bar byed// rbad dang zor bskul skabs dag tu// klad non thum ri li li dang sbyar// mtha' bsgyur trig shag

srog khyer b+h+yo// krin myags ka pa ye sdebs pas// gang la brgyab kyang 'joms par byed// rgya sdebs skabs te bdun pa'o//// de nas yang thugs rje khros pa'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces gsungs so// sngags

kyi phra men dum dum 'brel// rin chen dbang gi 'phreng ba 'dra// dgos 'dod thams cad yid bzhin 'byung// phra men rkyang sdebs 'di lta ste// dang po rang rang nus pa can// chol bur kun la btu ba ni// zhi ba

lha yi nang nas kyang// oM dang hri a nus pa che// khro bo 'jigs byed nang nas kyang// hU~M dang kro d+ha nus pa che// rdo rje phur pa'i nang nas kyang// ta dang ki li kI la ya// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i nang nas

kyang// a kro hri ti ya ma ye// phyag na rdo rje'i nang nas kyang// badzra hril myags hri ta ya// pad+ma dbang chen nang nas kyang// tsan d+hi ra ga hri bi d+ha ya// dbyings kyi ye shes ma mo nas// ru lu hri shrI de ma kro d+hi shwa

ri// snang srid mkha' 'gro'i nang nas kyang// ma mo rdA ki badzra kha rag/ 'dod khams dbang phyug nag mo las// ma ma tra kra rag sha ma hi// lha gdon drag po'i nang nas kyang// de ba a su ra hri sha/ bdud sde 'bum

gyi nang nas kyang// ru tra b+ha ti da ra khrag/ gza' rgod drag po'i nang nas kyang// ra hu la snying khrag badzra yag sha/ btsan rigs stong gi nang nas kyang// tsa ri tra sha a be shu dza// rgyal po sde yi nang nas kyang// ma

hA rA dza tri pa tsi ta shaM/ srin po shan pa'i nang nas kyang// rag sha ru sti kha rag sha/ gnod sbyin sde yi nang nas kyang// b+ha hu ri ta k+She ging ka ra// gdug pa gsum gyi nang nas kyang// nA ga rA dza phu ta hU~M ya kha sa kha/

'jig rten sman sde'i nang nas kyang// raM ni keM ru tsit+ta hri// 'di ni drag sngags rgod chen te// gang yin las la thogs med sdebs// 'bru re dril ba sngon bzhin la// brda yi ming bcas de bzhin gzir// las la
gtang ba srog dang 'di'o// gzhan yang sngags kyi sbyor ba la// yi ge 'bru de gang mang ba// rang rang nus pa bshad bzhin 'byung// yan lag rkyang ni de ltar bshad// de la shis pa'i yi ge yang// zhi
dal tshan che shis 'dod na// a yis gsang sngags drang bar bya// chos nyid drag po sgrub 'dod na// e yis gsang sngags drang bar bya// myur grub rno myur thob 'dod na// yaM gis gsang sngags drang bar

bya'o// 'bras bu myur du sreg 'dod na// raM gyis snying po drang bar bya// yon tan kun ldan sgrub 'dod na// sum gyis bsnyen pa brang bar bya// tshan che brtan mi g.yo 'dod na// laM gi snying sngags drang bar

bya'o// 'jings chen gting 'grub bslabs 'dod na// baM gyi srog snying drang bar bya// 'di rnams gcig la gang byas kyang// 'grub par the tshom gdon mi za// gzhan yang srog snying mtha' bsgyur du// 'di dag

kun kyang brtags par bshad// gang yin bsgrub pa'i lha srin de// 'jams dang 'grungs dang tshan che bas// bkra shis 'khor la byams bde dang// dgra dang gnod byed zhi bar byed// gzhan yang byams dang ring

'dod na// shan ting a nu pra ya ste// a pa na ya swAhA sdeb// byings che stobs ldan 'khor 'dus pas// tshe ring dpal bskyed rigs brgyud 'phel// longs spyod 'khor g.yog rgyas 'dod na// puSh+tiM a su rang na rni

pa// pu tra badzra par ya a bruM sdeb// dbang chen 'bab pa'i byin stobs kyis// skye 'gro thams cad rang dbang 'du// lha srin stobs can longs spyod gzhan// bdag gi dbang du bran 'dod na// baM shaM ku ru aM g+ha

sha/ u li u li hri hri dzi// dza thuM ri li li zhes sdeb// gtum chen drag po mthu chen gyis// myur 'grub mi bgrungs rno dbal ngar// ma lus tsha ra gcod gsad 'dod na// rag sha kha rag mA ra ya// A ka bA ya thum
rbad hril sdeb// de dag bzhi yi zhabs nyid du// u ne u ne sid+d+hi a// sdebs pas las rnams de dag gis// drag po mthu chen zhi bar 'gyur// sdong cig las kyang du mar 'phel// srod med bu yang dbang du

'gyur// sprul sku nyid kyang 'chi bar nges// gzhan dag kun la smos ci dgos// gzhan yang las kyi sdebs bshad pa// rang gi tshe ni ring 'dod na// nri bruM badzra A yu She A yu dz+nyA na sid+d+ha i hU~M/ nor gyi longs spyod

'phel 'dod na// rat+na sid+d+hi spa ra ya hU~M a/ sa nad grang nad gzhom 'dod na// a sa ra na yab sa mnan// tsi li sod sa nA ga sa gsod// ra baM raM/ dus min 'chi ba bzlog 'dod na// mo ha ya staM pa ya ka maM/ ya

mi d+hus ni shaM ku ru mA ra ya bzlog hring b+h+yo/ glang thabs mi bzad nad 'joms na/ a pa sa ma ra nan bi tri gi a pa na ya traM he du spo te e ru te le d+he sar ka la le phaT/ bud med sbrum nad sbyang 'dod na// pu tra nri

sa tri phyung a shag pu tra shag pu tra tsan tsar pa ya/ gnod byed gdon rnams tsha bskrad 'dod na// tri sa ma ya shag ka pa ye ma sha staM/ bi ra tsakra phaT yaM b+h+yo/ gnod de sreg cing bzlog 'dod na// tri ri

ri dz+wa la ag ne raM raM u tsa ta ya hal thang mugs rbad/ dgra bo lha dang dbral 'dod na// ni ra de ba shag pra bi sha shag a ni tsit+ta ma ma nu kham shag bi de sha ya phaT phaT/ dgra bo byad du gzhug 'dod na// nri ra sha

druM tsa ra thuM ril rnir pra ma shu do sdom na khug u ta ya thuM ril daM/ dgra bo khrag tu skyug 'dod na// mu kha raka ta tsar ba ya nri sha ra truM sha drum snying khrag kha nas phyung si ra rbad/ dgra la ltas ngan dbab 'dod na// khu tsa

he ka pa ti rgya li ni ga ru pi pu has phob b+h+yo/ las sngags sna tshogs sdebs pa ste// gzhan ni rang rang mtshan nyid do// sngags sdebs phra men bsgyur bar bshad// rkyang sdebs phra men gyi skabs te brgyad

pa'o//// de nas dpal chen khro bo'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// ye shes dpal gyi dngos grub yal// mtshams med lnga la 'ba' zhig spyod// dam tshig bden pa
khyad du gsod// bstan pa nang rme rang gi bshig/ dam chos bden pa'i dge bcu nub// 'bras bu rdzogs chen snying po la// rigs med kun rten log chos spyod// gsang sngags 'bras bu bon du khyer// dar ba

nyid kyis nus pa'i dus// yang dag rdzogs pa'i lus bzung nas// don gyi gdeng med tshig la khyer// phyi dkar nang nag mtshams med spyod// rnam smin srog la mdzem mi byed// de lta bu yi rnam smin gyis// ma mo
mkha' 'gro gting nas 'khrugs// 'jig rten dregs pa mthu rtsal 'gran// sa yi gdug pa ma lus ldang// de ltar byung ba'i nus mthu yis// dper na me yod tsha ba bzhin// mi nad phyugs nad sna tshogs
'ong// lo nad ser ba sad sngags 'byung// rme 'khrugs yul khams rme bar 'gyur// ltas ngan mu ge'i bskal pa 'byung// sems can rang srog myur du zad// phal cher 'phral rkyen srog kyang 'chad// sa nad me
bzhin 'bar ba'i dus// de tshe zhi bas mi 'dul te// drag po sngags rgod nus pa 'byung// ngan sngags mthu stobs bsam dpag dka'// bde gshegs thugs kyi ye shes las// rol pa gdul dka' 'dul ba'i

phyir// khros chen drag po'i phyag rgyar gsal// drag po sngags rgod rno myur 'phro// mthu stobs tshad ldan rmad du byung// drag po rgod kyi 'bru sdebs pas// gang la brgyab kyang gdug med 'joms// mkhas las byung
ba'i thog babs nas// ldog mi srid de 'bab par nges// gang la brgyab kyang gdul du rlog/ gal te log na srid pa 'jig/ de bzhin sngags rgod mthu stobs 'di// gal te dkyus bzhin ma byung na// rnal
'byor gzhi zad myur du 'chi// dgra la rten drug ldan pa gces// gdon la ngos ni zin pa gces// spyi ru dam srung stobs ldan gces// 'di de bde dang smin pa'i las// ma lus 'dus pa'i rtsa ba

yin// drag po 'byung ba'i dus bstan pa'i skabs te dgu pa'o//// de nas rngam chen khro bo'i rgyal po des 'di skad ces bshad do// thugs kyi thigs pa'i sdebs 'di la// rnam pa dgu dang ldan pa yin// de yang

ji lta bu zhe na// sngags kyi so pa btang ba dang// klad gnon rgyal po'i drag sngags dang// blon po skyes bu lta bu dang// rgyab ri dmag mi lta bu dang// sra byed go cha lta bu dang// rno ba'i mtshon cha lta bu dang// de

lang ngar blud thar bya dang// mtha' ru dbang med skos 'debs dang// dpa' bo log then mnan dang dgu// 'di ni sdebs kyi ngan sngags yin// de dag don gyis ngos bzung ba// sngags kyi so pa gang zhe na// hU~M

hU~M hU~M/ u ne u ne u ne/ u u u/ e e e ya a hri/ ma e ste/ skabs kyi 'di dag 'gyur zhing sdebs// klad gnon rgyal po gang zhe na// a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka a pa ye/ hri sti kA la ru pa ka pa ye/ bi tri ta many+dzu shrI

mu ka ye/ badzra kro d+ha b+ha ga bag sto/ badzra tsa ra ma hA tsaN+Da kro d+ha ya ma ye/ skabs kyis 'gyur dang lhun grub sdeb// blon po skyes bu gang zhe na// ya tshogs bcu bdun la sogs pa// phyi nang gsang dgur sdebs

pa'am// rang rang rtsa ba'i drag sngags sam// yang na gong phra men no// de yang gang byed skabs kyis bsgyur// rgyab ri dmag mi gang zhe na// sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsi ta ye/ tri ta ye/ ha la ye/ nga la ye/

ma la ye/ kyi po ye/ hri ta ye/ mu ka ye/ tsa tra ye/ a ya ma du ru tsa shan la/ ya ma ye dun tsa mun tri shag/ e rag rde wa sha mo ha ma na a re sha/ skabs kyi dbri gzhug 'khrugs dang sdeb// a a a/ a ne a ne a

ne/ du ne du ne du ne/ li li li/ sra byed go cha lta bu 'di// 'gyur dang kun sdeb phral la sdeb// i i i/ de bzhin ka li rnams dang ni// sra byed go cha'i sngags yin te// las kyi skabs dang sbyar byas la// nus

pa can kun sdeb par bya// rno ba mtshon cha gang zhe na// rang rang drag sngags spu gri'am// pra ma ya tshogs rnam bzhi la// rang gshed dbab pa'i sngags bzhi btags// bar du bsgrub bya'i mtshams sbyor ba// de

bzhin chu rgod spu gr-i'o// ngar blud thar bya gang zhe na// mA ra ya rbad myags thum ril rbad/ raka ta thibs tsit+ta khas krin myags rbad sod/ gang rung drag sngags mtha' bsgyur sdebs// mtha' ru skos 'debs gang

zhe na// u nan u nan u nan/ stam pa ye ka pa ye/ badzra rag sha yag sha/ u u u dun dun/ hriM hriM si ha sa ru mun sa ma ye thum ril/ dpa' bo log then gang zhe na// shrI he ru ka badzra ma ha kro d+ha tsaN+Da ro Sha Na/ badzra

kro d+ha ya man+ta ka a kro hri sti rag sha badzra/ sa ma ya man+ta kI li/ thuM thuM thuM/ e e e/ rI rI rI/ dzA dzA dzA/ klad gnon rgyal po bzlog pa dang// de nyid gnas dang bzlog pa ste// 'di gsum gang rung
skabs la sdeb// nan nan nan/ rnam gsum thun gsum mtha' ru sdebs// sde brgyad dregs pa'i sngags rgod la// thun mong khyad par rnam pa gnyis// rang bzhin 'bebs pa'i skabs dag tu// rnam par shes
pa'i tshogs brgyad dang// nyon mongs drug dang gzung 'dzin gnyis// de las dregs pa brgyad langs te// dngos dang bag chags tshul gnyis kyis// 'byung ba bzhi yang dbugs kyis brgyan// lus ngag yid kyi

rtsa rnams gcod// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la// zhe sdang las grub gshin rje langs// ya las grub ste sa dang sha/ ma yi mtshon chas rtsa srog gcod// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la// nga rgyal las grub btsan du

langs// ra tri las grub dbugs kyi rtsa// myags kyi mtshon chas gcod par byed// lus kyi rnam par shes pa las// 'dod chags las grub ma mo langs// ma las grub ste khrag dang chu// ra yi mtshon chas rtsa srog

gcod// mig gi rnam par shes pa las// gti mug rang grub bdud du langs// na dun las grub me dang drod// thum gyi mtshon chas rtsa srog gcod// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las// phrag dog rang grub rgyal po

langs// tsa las grub ste dbugs dang rlung// ril gyi mtshon chas rtsa srog gcod// sna yi rnam par shes pa las// the tshom las grub srin po langs// sha shag las grub lus kyi rtsa// rbad kyis mtshon chas gcod

par byed// nyon mongs can gyi yid las kyang// 'dzin pa las grub rmu rgod langs// la tri las grub ngag gi rtsa// ya yis mtshon cha rtsa srog gcod// lce yi rnam par shes pa las// bzung ba las grub sa bdag
langs// na bun las grub yid kyi rtsa// rbad kyis mtshon chas rtsa srog gcod// dug lnga la sogs srog gzungs la// sde brgyad gshed du dbab pa yin// gzhan yang lus kyi gnad bzhi ru// 'thom pa gshed chen
bzhi dbab ste// klad pa gti mug rmongs pa'i gnas// byol song rgyal po 'thom pa'i gshed// rang gshed rang la phab pa yis// klad rtsa kun gcang myos rlams rgyal// mun khas thibs hub ling dun ru tra

khrag/ klad khrag myogs mA rA ya rbad/ mgrin pa nga rgyal dregs pa'i gnas// lha min dbang po gsod pa'i gshed// rang gshed rang la phab pa yis// mgrin rtsa ngag rgyun dbugs lam gcod// shan tri a de b+ha hri

he dun khrag/ mgrin khrag myogs mA ra ya rbad/ snying kha zhe sdang gtum pa'i gnas// mi rgod shan pa srog gi gshed// rang gshed rang la phab pa yis// dwangs ma'i rtsa dang srog rten bcad// tsan d+ha rag ma hA ha ya
ti khrag/ snying khrag mA ra ya myogs rbad/ lta ba 'dod chags zhen pa'i gnas// dmyal ba'i rgyal po gsod pa'i bdud// rang gshed rang la phab pa yis// srid pa'i rten rtsa bcad nas kyang// 'khor

ba rlung gi ka ba bsgyel// ra ga hu sti mon ta hab khrab/ lte khrag myogs mA ra ya rbad/ de dag gdod nas rang rang la// gnas pa rang grub rang gshed yin// gzhan yang srung gzir sdebs thugs thigs// gnod

sbyin dbang bsdu 'gugs pa yin// e A kar+Sha yaM dza yaM dza/ e tsa tsa a yaM tsa tsa a tri dza/ gang yin gnad nas 'gugs par byed// gnan dang bstim pa'i drag sngags ni// staM pa ya nan u nan ta a/ a nan ta

a/ ri rab 'og tu chud bzhin no// smra bar 'dod pa'i drag sngags ni// bi ta ya ha ha pra ma ka ra sa ta a/ sems la gang yod mngon du smra// sdong zla dbye bar 'dod pa na// e dza la phye a shag phye khaM shag phye pra be
she phye/ pra tsa li phaT/ sdong zla sna tshogs 'byed par nges// de nas gzir ba'i sdebs chen ni// gzir dang srod dbrog sbyor ba gcad// mtha' ru bsgral bas mig bzlog pa'o// gzir ba la yang rnam pa

bdun// gzir ba nyid dang gnan pa dang// myos dang brlams dang brgyal ba dang// sdug bsngal myong dang yid 'khrug pa'o// de nas srog dbrog drag sngags la// rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa ste// rnam shes dbrog
dang bda' dbrog dang// rang gi mthu stobs dbrog pa'o// mtha' ru la sbyor bcad pa la// rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste// las bcad pa dang sbyor ba bcad// dug gcad pa dang bsam rgyud gcad// rnam par shes
pa'i rgyun gcad pa'o// log non bsgral bas phyis mi gdon// de yang gnyen pos gzir ba dang// rang gnad drag pos gzir ba yis// tsit+ta sbur nan/ staM pa ya nan/ myags thibs ro myags nan/ u nan e

nan ri ri gzir/ trig nan big nan/ dun dun tsit+ta dun snying khrag rbad/ shag ti khas snying la thibs/ d+h+ri u u ri ri/ ha ra ha dza yaM/ hur thums dza/ sa ma ya hri sti gar+b+ha khug drongs dun dza hri/ thum ril snying la shag

rbad// ro myags u shag rbad/ rag shag tsit+ta khrag rbad/ kham shag rbad/ ma nu ha la raM rbad/ thums myags trig shag mA ra ya rbad e/ gong bzhin drag sngags bzhi brgyad kyis/ rang gi rgyud la bslang ba
dang// bag chags drag sngags mtshon cha 'di// rang las byung zhing rang las gcod// 'di shes rang gnad gzir ba yin// de ma yin na gnyen pos gzir// rang gnad gnyen po'i sdebs su bshad// gzhan
yang gzir ba'i sngags sdebs ni// dregs pa rang rang sdes 'dus pa// cig la thams cad ldog par 'gyur// de yi sngags sdebs 'di lta ste// dang po go cha yan chad sbyar// de nas kA li'i tshogs sngags
gtang// rjes su gang gnon ming dang brda// de 'og dregs pa pho mo yi// rang gi rus rigs drag sngags sbyar// de mthar srog snying 'bru te bsgrang// u nan thum ril dza sbur gzir myags shag

snying khrag rbad re bo/ 'bru re'i bar du brtem par bya// de 'og dregs pa rang rang sngags// rjes su gang yin thams cad kyi// sngags kyi rigs rnams kun kyang brtags// mtha' ru sa ma ya hri ste// mA ra ya thun
rmugs ling shag dum rbad dza/ kun gyi ming nas gton nas kyang// 'di yis gshegs ma gyis la sgrol// rang la gnod pa'i ming nas dbyung// bya nag gzan la 'du bzhin du// rang gi rigs rnams kun 'dul
te// gang yin de nyid brlag par byed// dregs pa rang sdes 'dul ba yin// thugs sdebs kyi skabs te bcu pa'o//// de nas dpal chen rgyal po des 'di skad ces gsungs so// gzhan yang drag po'i gsang

sdebs ni// rnam pa drug dang ldan pa ste// dang po 'chi med dus kyi sbyor ba bzlog/ rang gi gnod byed mtha' dag gzir// bar du mkha' 'gro gzan la dbab// sngags kyi dug mda' khong du bskyal// tha ma rang
gshed rgyud la slang// lus srog rtsa yi lam rgyud gcad// de dag sdebs thabs spyir bstan pa// gang yin srung gzir dang la bzlas// bar du rbad sngags zor thun sngags// mtha' mar gsad pa'i drag sngags

gsum// lto sdebs sum sbrel bzlas pa yin// khyad par 'di nyid sdeb pa'i thabs// sngags kyi phra lnga rdzogs mjug tu// bdag nyid gzir ba'i drag sngags bzlas// de yi rjes su u e drug/ shrI many+dzu badzra tsaN+Da ma

ha kro d+ha a kro te ka ya man+ta ka hri ti kA la rU pa badzra rag sha ma hA tri ta ya ma tri myags/ de rjes bcu bdun 'khrul 'khor la// klang gnon pho mo sku gsung thugs// ya a hri/ ma hi sti/ mon ta nag mo ar+ya raka sha

ru thum/ de rjes da la ye la sogs// yang snying rnam drug de la sbyar// rjes su sde brgyad drag sngags la// kro d+hI shA ri ya/ rag mo ma ma duM sham du man/ snying kha rag hrim shi de ma trag rag sha ru lu b+h+yo/ lha srin drag

sngags zab mos sbyar// de rjes 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ thum ri li b+h+yo/ hristi kha long nya b+h+yo/ ka ya hri trin myags b+h+yo/ bag sha thum ril srog khyer/ tsit+ta hab hab hri shag b+h+yo/ man+ta ha la tsa ma ra/ srog khyer mA ra ya b+h+yo/

hub ldi sa ma ya b+h+yo ya/ de rdzas rtsa bar sdeb pa ni// e gsum u ne drug a gsum// sku gsung thugs kyi 'bru drug dang// a kro te ka e yan+ta ka i/ many+dzu shrI ye/ badzra raka ka sha tsaN+Da e/ ma hA shrI ta e/ hri sti kA

la rU pa e/ hri s+t+ri kA la rU pa e/ yang na rnam gsum rtsa ba ru// don lnga pa ni sdeb par bya// de yi rjes su 'di yang sdeg/ ma ma sha truM sha snying ro baM thun kha rag hri shrI a/ e ka dza ti ma ma traka rag sha snying kha rag
e/ ma hi nag mo raka sha tsit+ta srog thum ril e/ ma trag srog la haM sham/ de rjes bcu bdun gsang skor sdeb// de 'og sde brgyad de bzhin sdeb// badzra trag sha ya ma kar ma ro sha na/ mon ta ka li

b+hi sha tsan d+ha/ hri sti a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ mu ka ye/ kA la rU pa ni shaM ku ru/ a mu kaM/ de rjes dregs pa sngags rgod sdeb// pra ma ya/ mur tsa ya/ rag ta tsa ra ya/ mA ra ya/ sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ tsi tra ye/ bri ta ye/

ha la ye/ ya ma hur shag snying khrag rbud/ ya ma dun ya ma snying la thibs// ya ma kha khraM srog khugs drongs/ ya ma hri ha sa mun khas thums// de rjes 'thom pa'i ngan sngags bzhi// mjug tu nri hur thums dza/

srog thum ril rtsa khrag rmugs tsit+ta breng shag mA ra ya rbad/ nri ha ra ha ra dun khram rbad sod/ mtha' ru log non drag sngags sbyar// 'di la bsdeb thabs mang yod kyang// 'di bzhin dril la brdeg pa dang// nyi ma

bzhi ru bskor ba dang// spu gris khong du gcad pa dang// ye shes las la mngag pa dang// phyi nang gsang ba dgu phyugs dang// gang rung ngan sngags 'di la sdeb// ser ba 'bebs pa'i las byed na// spyi dang khyad

par gnyis su bshad// spyi ni sngar gyi sdebs bzhin las// rang rang gang yin drag sngags kyi// 'jug tu 'byung ba chu rlung sdeb// yaM hril phroM shar du phob/ kun la sbyar bar shes par bya// khyad par 'di nyid sdeb pa

ni// spu gri'i drag sngags bsgyur byas la// sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsi ta ye/ bri ta ye/ ha la ya/ ya ma hur shag thibs phroM yam shar/ ya ma dun/ hab dud khroM yaM shar/ ya ma kha khraM kar phroM yam shar/ ya ma

hri hri sa shu ti phroM yaM shar/ chu dril dag gi gnas skabs yin// da la ye/ ma le ye/ kyi pho ye/ hri ta ye/ mu ga ye/ tsatra ye/ thibs thibs phroM hril yam shar phob/ yul 'dir u nan drag tu phob/ badzra ya ga shar hu

la si si snying khrag hril shar drag tu phob/ de ba ra tsa tri ser ba dum hril drag tu phob phob/ thug phrad tsan thabs dbab pa yin// de nyid bzlog cing srung ba ni// sa ma ya big nan ser ba thuM ril to sa ba ti sha ya/

mo ha g+ha ya ya staM pa ya/ sho sha ya/ sha truM nA sha ya hU~M phaT hU~M phaT/ drag po sngags rgod sdebs chen 'dis// gang yang 'grub par gdon mi za// sngon du dpa' bo sum 'bum gdon// de nas gsad dbab las la

sbyar// srung dang gzir la thug phrad yin// sngags kyi ka ba bzhi yang gzugs// 'di la stong tsho gnyis bzhag pa yi// sku gsung thugs dang bcu bdun pa'o// sku dang sde brgyad sdebs pa gsum// 'di yang sngags

rgod grogs su 'gyur// dam tshig sdom pa 'di ltar srung// lta ba'i don rtogs nyams snyid bsgo// yi dam phyag rgya gtan mi spang// mchod bstod 'phrin las rgyun mi bcad// 'dus byas dge rtsa ci nus bya// lung
nyid 'bogs pa'i dpon nyid la// bzhed na snying yang 'bul bar bya// dad pa skyo ngas med par bskur// dbang gi rim pa bsgrod par bya// gtam mi bya zhing lam mi gzur// phyag mi 'tshal zhing

phyag rgya bstan// 'di dag sngags rgod grogs su 'gro// khyad par gsang ba'i sdom pa ni// mar gyi brgyad dang bcu gnyis dang// tshe gcig nya dang bzhi pa la// rnal 'byor dri chus lus rnams bkru// de nas tshil

chen zhen par byug/ mi rta khyi dang mon pa yi// rak+ta'i thig le lus la gdab// thal chen dag gis de bzhin byug/ bzhi yi snying gis 'gur chu bya// dbu skra spyi gtsug sbrul gyis brgyan// sku la zhing chen g.yang
gzhi gsol// phyag g.yas dung chen dmar bkang bsnams// g.yon pa raka sha'i 'phreng ba bgrang// zhal du mi sha khyi sha mur// dur khrod gnas sam dgon pa'am// mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin 'du sar
phyin// tshil sna bcu gsum gsung btang la// mtshan phyed khor nar sngags bzlas na// dngos grub sna tshogs de las 'byung// mkha' 'gro 'jig rten dregs pa yis// bdag khur srung zhing ci bsgo nyan// drag
sngags nus pa sna tshogs 'bul// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// mthu stobs rdo rje nyid dang mnyam// brtul zhugs can la mkha' 'gro ma// nam mkha' sa 'og gnas pa kun// sbyor ba bde ba'i mchod pa
'bul// sgrib sbyong yon tan bsam mi khyab// 'khor 'dus bla med 'das pa'i 'jig rten pa// pho dang mo yi cha bzung rnams// gsang sdebs sngags rgod rgyud rgyal bstan// mi nub rgyal mtshan tshugs la
zung// rang gi snying bzhin brnag par gyis// nam zhig dar na 'jig rten phung// yon tan 'byung ba'i gter chen yin// gsang sdebs dang dam tshig gtad pa'i skabs te bcu gcig pa'o//// rdzogs
so//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ya man+ta ka e man+ta tsakra gu h+ya kra traM tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba sdebs kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal khro bo'i
rgyal po ya man+ta ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po des// 'og min gyi gnas dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang na/ 'khor gyi gtso

bor thar byed chen po brgyad/ nyid kyi yum chen mo e ka dza ti dang/ kar mo dang/ rkun mo dang/ rmongs mo dang/ thal byed mo dang/ sbos mo dang/ gtum mo dang/ sme sha can dang/ ma tshogs ma dang/ thugs kyi

sprul pa ya ma rA dza dang/ sku'i sprul pa myos byed 'bar ba dang/ gsung gi sprul pa ar+ya dmar po dang/ 'phrin las kyi sprul pa ral pa tshar dgu la sogs pa yum dang bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang sprul pa'i pho nya
dang/ yang sprul dang bcas pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag 'dzin rtogs pas mngon par
zhen// yang dag nges pa'i lam las gol// gsang ba'i don nyid ma rtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang ba mngon du spyad// rnam smin drag po'i sa bon gyis// 'jig rten dregs pa'i lus blangs pa// sde brgyad gdon
chen bco brgyad sogs// sems can yongs la gnod cing 'tshe// 'di dag thugs rjes bsgral ba dang// sangs rgyas bstan pa dar bya'i phyir// dbang bsdu dam la gdags pa dang// phan gnod las kyi 'khrul
'khor rnams// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po de cang mi gsung bar snang nas/ dregs pa can de dag gdul ba'i phyir sku dang/ gsung

dang/ thugs las gsang sngags kyi gzhi ma yi ge 'phreng ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo// a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/
i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM a/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// 'ur 'ur/ rab
tu 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// mtha' mtho na dbus dma' ba la sogs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can thams cad skrag cing sdangs
la ngo mtshar skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ e ma ho dpa' bo gshin rje gshed// thugs rje'i bdag po chen po lags bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// ma gsad dpa' bo'i bka' nyan

to// zhes phul nas rang rang gi srog gi snying po phul ba/ de ba a/ rag sha rag mo ra/ yag sha yag mo ya/ sa nA ga phu/ a su ra e/ ya ma ya/ ru tra ru/ dun ting du/ tir ti ka ta/ rA tsa ra/ rA tsa tsa/ mun mun pa/

badzra sA d+hu tsa/ haM shaM tri/ ru tri shrI/ ga du ma ga/ ma ma ru lu ma/ ru tri ni/ tri nan/ hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ ces phul nas/ de dag gis bstan pa srung bar dam bcas te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim na 'khod

do// dpal gshin rje gshed drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba'i sdebs rgyud las/ gleng gzhi gleng bslangs te sde brgyad kyis srog snying phul ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid kyi

sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs las byung ba/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi ma yi ge 'phreng ba'i don 'di gsungs so// a ni kun tu bzang mo nyid kyi mkha'/ khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med pa'i gzhi// de nyid rgyal
mtshan brgyan pas drag mo ste// ka tsa ti zhes bya ba drag po'i 'phrin las mdzad// sa yi yi ge 'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can// rta glang shing rta dmag mi go rim bzhin// ta ni sang tri ta ste lha yi
skad// mthun par sdebs pas dam can grogs su 'gyur// mi mthun sdebs na dam can gshed du 'bebs// gzas pa sgrol na glang gi yi ge can// sa yis 'joms pas 'di dag sdeb par bya// ka kha ga g+ha nga/

chu yi yi ge 'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can// rta glang shing rta dmag mi go rim bzhin// glang po'i yi ge raka sha srin po'i skad// mthun sdebs grogs dang mi mthun gshed du 'bebs// gzas pa sgrol na me yi yi ge

can// chu yis 'joms pas 'di dag sdeb par bya// tsa tsha dza dz+ha na/ me yi yi ge 'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can// rta glang shing rta dmag mi go rims bzhin// shing rta'i yi ge yaka sha gnon sbyin skad// mthun sdebs

grogs 'gyur mi mthun gshed du 'bebs// gzas pa sgrol nas yi ge can// mes 'joms pas na 'di dag sdeb par bya// Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ rlung gi yi ge 'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can// rta glang shing rta dmag mi go
rims bzhin// dmag gi yi ge nA ga klu yi skad// mthun sdebs grogs dang mi mthun gshed du 'bebs// gzas pa sgrol na chu yi yi ge can// rlung gi 'joms pas 'di dag sdeb par bya// ta tha da d+ha na/ nam
mkha'i yi ge 'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can// rta glang shing rta dmag mi go rims bzhin// mi yi yi ge a su lha min skad// nam mkha'i yi ge kun gyi grogs su 'gyur// kun kyang 'di yi grogs su 'gyur ba

yin// 'on kyang nam mkha' 'byung ba rnam bzhi po// mthun dang mi mthun sdebs pas las rnams 'grub// pa pha ba b+ha ma/ de ltar dmag gi yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga po// ka tsa Ta ta pa zhes pa lnga po 'di// g+ha dz+ha D+ha b+ha lnga

yi dgra zhes bya/ kha tsha Tha tha pha zhes pa lnga po 'di// ga dza Da da ba zhes pa 'di rnams 'joms// ga dza Da da ba zhes pa lnga po 'dis// ka tsa Ta ta pa 'di rnams 'joms par byed// g+ha dz+ha D+ha b+ha zhes pa lnga po 'dis/

kha tsha Tha tha pha rnams 'joms par byed// nga nya Na na ma zhes pa lnga po 'dis// kun gyi grogs su 'gyur ba mthun sdebs yin// de rnams dmag gi yi ge 'khrul 'khor yin pa'i yi ge 'khrul 'khor bstan pa ni/ me
dang chu dang rlung dang gting brlag bzhin// mtha' gnas ya ma gshin rje'i skad// de dag mthun dang mi mthun sdebs nas kyang// steng 'gro gnyis dang kha skong gcig la ni// dmag tshogs lag tu mtshon
cha bskur nas ni// gzas pa po rnams bsgral bar bya'o// ya wa ra la/ chu dang me dang sa yi yi ge gsum// mtha' gnas du hu na ste bdud kyi skad// de dag mthun dang mi mthun sdebs nas kyang// steng 'gro
gcig dang zhabs tog byed pa gnyis// dmag tshogs mtshon bskur gzas pa bsgral bar bya'o// sha Sha sa kun khyab nam mkha'i yi ge gnyis pa 'di// mtha' zad k+Sha ra na ste mu stegs skad// de dag

mthun dang mi mthun sdebs nas kyang// zhabs tog byed dang kun khyab thabs kyi sgra// dmag tshogs mtshon bskur bsgrub bya chan la dbab// ha k+Sha i I 'khor lo dang bcas pa ni// ta'i sde tshan dmag gi mtshon

cha yin// u U ral gri ngar dang bcas pa 'di// glang po'i sde tshan dmag gi mtshon cha yin// e ai mdung thung dpal dang ldan pa 'di// shing rta'i sde tshan dmag gi mtshon cha yin// o au dgra ngar dang bcas pa

'di// dmag gi sde tshan dmag gi mtshon cha yin// aM a mda' yi mtshon cha ngar dang bcas pa 'di// mi yi sde tshan dmag gi mtshon cha yin// aM a/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ de dag mtshon cha 'chol ba rnams// mi rnams

dngos la mtshon bya 'di dag bskur// gzhan yang drag sngags mtshon cha mthun par sdebs// a nyid skye ba med pa don dang rtags// sgra yis bskyed pas ka li gsal ba snang// A li kA li'i sgra yi 'khrul 'khor

las// 'khor 'das chos rnams 'byung ba'i gzhi ma yin// dmag gi yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga la// rta glang shing rta dmag mi nang tshan lnga// 'byung ba'i bdag nyid las rnams 'grub pa yin// de ltar 'jig rten bya yi

las rnams la// lnga la lnga lngar dbye ba shes par bya// mi yi yi ge brgyad po 'di rnams la// steng 'gro gsum po sngags kyi mgo 'dren yin// mtshon cha gcig dang zhabs thog byed pa gsum// dmag la shing rta'i

yi ge rnam gsum dang// mi yi ming dang bzhi po 'di dag ni// rting gnon yin par yang dag bshad pa'o// de dag sgra yi 'khrul 'khor sdebs pa yang// bsgrub bya'i ming gi dang po gang yin pa// bdag gi dgrar
'gyur sgrub pa po nyid 'chi// btang snyoms gyur na mi 'grub nyon mongs la// shes su gyur na lha de 'grub par 'gyur// dbyangs yig dgrar gyur bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur// gsal byed dgrar gyur nad

kyis thebs pa yin// nam mkha'i yi ge kun gyi grogs yin yang// rang rang grogs kyang 'di ltar shes par bya// sa yi grogs su chu yi yi ge btang// me yi grogs su rlung ste de grogs me// chu yi grogs su sa

yang de bzhin no// rlung gi gnyis ka ma yin chu yin la// me yi sa yin chu yi ma yin no// sa yi gnyis ka ma yin rlung zhes bya// de ltar sgra yi 'khrul 'khor sdebs 'di ni// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i dpa'
bo bzhin// nyes legs stobs chen byed pas 'di la nan tan bya'o// dpal gshin rje gshed drag sngags 'khor lo'i sdebs rgyud las/ A li kA li 'phreng ba'i sgra'i 'khrul 'khor sdebs pa'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po des srog gi gnas lugs gtan la phab pa 'di gsungs pa/ ye nas ma bcos sgro skur zhi ba'i don// 'khor 'das kun la gnas pa'i srog yin
la// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed 'das pa'i srog/ bstan pa'i snying po zhes su grags pa yin// de nyid ma rtogs khams gsum dregs pa rnams// rgyur gnas srog gi snying po ma rig pa// 'bras bur gnas pa

dregs pa'i lus sems snang// de phyir srog dang rgyan gyi yi ge 'di// kun gyi thun mong ma yin gsang ba'i srog/ yid kyi gzugs can dregs pa'i lus la yang// bag la nyal lam yang na dngos// dwangs ma lnga

'dus rtsa ba'i 'khor lo ni// snying la gnas te dwangs ma 'dus pa'i srog/ gzhan yang srog gi snying po 'di dag go/ rang rang bsnyen sngags drang zhing dam rdzas brten// bod pa srog gi snying po zhes su bshad// de

la dmag bsdus mtshon bskur las la dgye// rbad pa srog gi snying po zhes su bshad// dmag gi bsgrub bya dbang du 'dus pa na// srog dang rgyan gyi yi ge mtshon cha sdeg/ gsang ba srog gi snying po zhes bya 'o// de

dag rang gi dam can 'khol na gces// gzhan gyi rbod gtong dregs pa bsgral 'dod na// gzir byed rang gshed srog gi snying po ni// trig nan tsit+ta rbad nan zhes pa yin// dbrog bya rnam shes srog gi snying po

dang// dregs pa tsit+ta dwangs ma'i 'khor lo ni// rang rang 'bru re rnam shes tshul du gnas// 'phrog byed sbyor ba srog gi snying po ni// nur thums dza zhes lcags kyu lta bur gnas// gcod byed mtshon cha srog gi snying

po ni// mA ra ya rbad ces spu gri'i tshul du gnas// dam tshig rjes dran srog gi snying po ni// gshin rje ma mo la sogs gdon chen rnams// rang rang phul ba'i srog snying de dag yin// btags pa ming gi srog gi

snying po ni// rang rang tha snyad ming re kun la yod// de ltar srog gi snying po thams cad la// srog dang rgyan gyi yi ge sgra'i 'khrul 'khor 'di// mthun par sdebs pas dam can bran du 'khor// mi mthun sdebs
pa las rnams 'grub par yang// sgra yi 'khrul 'khor shes pas 'byung ba yin// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba sdebs kyi rgyud las/ 'jig rten dang 'das pa thams

cad kyi srog gi snying po gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags kyi sdebs gsungs pa ni/ e e e/ a kro te ka ya man+ta ka/ ya

ma ye/ kA la rU pa/ ka pa ye/ hristi a ba ye/ a a ne a ne/ u u ne u ne/ du du ne du ne/ a i u e oM yaM maH r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ du ru ye/ bya tsa ye/ sing nga ye/ hri ta ye/ bi ta ye/ tsi ta ye/ ha la ye/ mu ka ye/

u u u/ u ne/ bi tra ti/ a a nan/ ya ma ta dza/ ya ma ra ka sha/ ya ma rag a/ ya ma raka k+Sha/ pe ta li kro d+hi shwa ri/ ma ma e ka dza ti/ d+he ma kha la baM ril/ ru lu ru lu/ shrI badzra kro d+ha tsaN+Da raka sha
mon ta/ a mu kaM/ myags thum ril/ trig nan sbur nan/ e hur thums dza/ kham shag ro myags// mugs ti rbad ya/ smod pa'i drag sngags 'di dag gis// gang yang mngon du gzir bas na/ drang po sdud pa'i yi
ge gsum// mtshon cha bskyod pa'i e gsum yin// dmag gi sde tshan mtshon cha na// me yis sa yi ming can 'joms// sa yis rlung la brdeg pas na// mtshon cha bsgyur bas i gsum yin// gzhan yang de bzhin
gshegs par bya// rang bzhin khro bo gshin rje gshed// sku gsung thugs dang stong nyid kyi// ye shes stobs dang 'khub dbang med// dbang du bsdu dang dbyangs 'phreng stobs// mi srun dregs 'jigs byed pa
yi// thugs rtag gsung nyid mi 'gyur ba// snying po stobs dang sngags du gzhom// 'jigs pa'i stobs dang 'khub dbang med// rngam pa'i stobs dang gnan pa'o// gshed bzhi ro langs ral gcig ma// gshed
mo bzhi dang ma mo'i tshogs// phyogs skyong las kyi gshin rje rnams// de rnams sor gnas de yang sdeb// ming 'das spu gri gnas gzir rjes// snying po 'bru gcig e de las// srog dang rgyan gyi yi ge
sdeb// 'phrog byed gcod pa'i spu gri yang// mthun dang mi mthun sdebs nas ni// gzas pa sgral phyir dregs pa sdeb// bdag nyid srung na dregs pa gzir// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed drag

sngags 'khor lo gsang ba'i sdebs kyi rgyud las// gsang sngags sdebs drag sngags dmod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ 'byung ba sa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis rlung gi stobs

gzhom pa 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ro ras khru gang la// skyang nul legs par byas nas ni// sa yi 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya// snag tsha dug la sogs pa yis// gshin rje'i gzugs kyi snying kha ru// thig skor

gsum dang ldan par bya// dbus su le tshe dgu pa la// thig skor dang po dag la ni// re mig bcu gnyis dag tu sgo// de la yi ge dgod pa ni// le tshe lnga bcu rtsa gnyis la// gsang sngags 'di dag dgod par

bya// ya ma me tak+She/ ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni/ de dag 'khrul 'khor rtsa ba yi// thig skor gnyis pa dag la ni// rang bzhin khro bo man chad nas// las kyi gshin rje yan chad kyi// dmag tshogs sngags de
dgod par bya// thig skor gsum pa dag la ni// mtshon cha bskyod dang sngags 'di dgod/// ka tsa Ta ta pa sa/ de dag spel nas 'khor bar dgod par bya/ dbus kyi le tshe gru bzhi btson khang
bzhi// ming dang brda dang snying po spu gri dang// sa yi yi ge sdebs pa bri bar bya// de ltar thabs dang shes rab tshul du gnyis/ kha sbyar brgyangs la mthing nag gur yang phub// rdzas dang yo byad
'tshogs byas mar ngo la// nyin bzhi gsang sngags 'di dag dgod par bya/// ka tsa Ta ta pa sa/ ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ rnga che ge mo/// pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ nyi ma dang po khri 'dzab
yin// gnyis pa la sogs de ltar shes par bya// nang nub mtshan mo dmag tshogs thams cad dril// de bzhin mthun dang mi mthun 'khrul 'khor sdeb// rlung gi bdag nyid bsgrub bya rdul du rlog/ ces gsungs

so// dpal gshin rje drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba'i sdebs rgyud las/ sa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi rlung gi stobs gzhom pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ 'byung ba chu'i 'khrul 'khor
gyis ma'i stobs gzhom pa 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ro ras khru gang la// skyang nul legs par byas nas ni// chu yi 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya// sna tshogs dug la sogs pa yis// ya ma gzugs kyi snying kha

ru// thig skor gsum dang ldan par bri// dbus su le tshe dgu pa la// thig skor dang po dag la ni// re mig bcu gnyis dag tu bgo/ de la yi ge dgod pa ni// le tshe dgu dang bcu gnyis la// gsang sngags 'di

dag dgod par bya// ya ma me tak+She/ ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ de dag 'khrul 'khor rtsa ba'o// thig skor gnyis pa dag la ni// rang bzhin khro bo man chad nas// las kyi gshin rje yan chad kyi// dmag

tshogs sngags te dgod par bya// phyi rol thig skor gsum pa la// mtshon cha bskyod dang sngags 'di dgod// u u u/ kha tsha Tha tha pa sha/ de dag spel zhing 'khor bar dgod par bya// dbus kyi gru gsum le tsho

btson khang bzhir// ming dang brda dang snying po spu gri dang// chu yi snying po brdeb lnga bri bar bya// de ltar thabs dang shes rab tshul du gnyis/ kha sbyar brgyangs la mthing na gur yang dbub// rdzas dang yo byad

'tshogs la mar ngo la// nyi ma bzhi ru gsang sngags bzlas par bya// u u u/ kha tsha Tha tha pha sha/ ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ che ge mo ma ra u u u/ pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ nyi ma dang po'i khri 'dzab yin// gnyis pa la
sogs de ltar shes par bya// nang nub mtshan mo dmag tshogs thams cad dril// de bzhin mthun dang mi mthun 'khrul 'khor sdeb// me yi rang bzhin bsgrub bya rdul du rlog/ ces gsungs so// dpal gshin

rjes gshed drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba'i sde brgyud las/ chu'i 'khrul 'khor gyis me'i stobs gzhom pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ me'i 'khrul 'khor gyis sa'i stobs gzhom
pa 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ro ras khru gang la// skyang nul legs par byas nas ni// me yi 'khor lo bri bar bya// snag tsha dug la sogs pa yis// ya ma gzugs kyi snying kha ru// thig skor

gsum dang ldan par bri// dbus kyi le tshe dgu pa la// thig skor dang po dag la ni// re mig bcu gnyis dag tu bgo/ de la yi ge dgod pa ni// le tshe lnga dang bcu gnyis la// gsang sngags 'di dag dgod par

bya// ya ma me ta k+She ra tsa sa to du na yo ni ri ya tsa ni/ de dag 'khrul 'khor rtsa ba'o// thig skor gnyis pa dag la ni// dmag tshogs sngags te dgod par bya// phyi rol thig skor gsum pa la// mtshon cha bskyod dang

sngags 'di dgod// e e e/ ga dza Da da ba ra// de dag spel zhing 'khor bar dgod par bya// dbus kyi le tshe gru gsum btson khang bzhir// ming dang brda dang snying po spu gri dang// me yi snying po spel la bri bar

bya// de ltar thabs dang shes rab tshul du gnyis/ kha sbyar brgyangs la mthing nag gur yang dbub// rdzas dang yo byad 'tshogs byas mar ngo la// nyi ma bzhi ru gsang sngags bzlas pa bya// e e e ga dza Da da ba

ra/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ka che ge mo/ e e e/ pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ dang po khri 'dzab de ltar yin// gnyis pa la sogs de bzhin shes par bya// nang du dmag tshogs thams cad dril// de bzhin mthun dang mi
mthun 'khrul 'khor sdeb// sa yi bdag nyid bsgrub bya rdul du rlog/ ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba'i sdebs rgyud las/ me'i 'khrul 'khor gyis sa'i stobs gzhom

pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis chu'i stobs gzhom pa 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ro ras khru gang la// skyang nul legs par byas nas ni// rlung gi

'khrul 'khor bri bar bya// snag tsha dug la sogs pa yis// ya ma gzugs kyi snying kha ru// thig skor gsum dang ldan par bri// dbus su le tshe dgu pa la// thig skor dang po dag la ni// re mig bcu gnyis dag

tu bgo/ de la yi ge dgod pa ni// le tshe lnga dang bcu gnyis la// gsang sngags 'di dag dgod par bya// ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ de dag 'khrul 'khor rtsa ba'o// thig skor gnyis pa

dag la ni// dmag tshogs de dag dgod par bya// phyi rol thig skor gsum pa la// mtshon cha bskyod dang sngags 'di dgod// o o o/ g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha ye// de dag spel zhing 'khor bar dgod par bya// dbus kyi

gru gsum le tshe btson khang bzhir// ming dang brda dang snying po spu gri dang// rlung gi snying po spel la bri bar bya// de ltar thabs dang shes rab tshul du gnyis/ kha sbyar brgyangs la mthing nag gur yang dbub// rdzas
dang yo byad 'tshogs byas mar ngo la// nyi ma bzhi ru gsang sngags bzlas par bya// g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha ya/ ya ma rA tsa sa to me ya/ kha che ge mo pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ nyi ma dang po khri
'dzab de ltar yin// gnyis pa sogs te de bzhin shes par bya// nang nub mtshan mo dmag tshogs thams cad dril// de bzhin mthun dang mi mthun 'khrul 'khor sdeb// chu yi bdag nyid bsgrub bya rdul du
rlog/ ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba'i sdebs rgyud las/ rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyis chu yi stobs gzhom pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po

des/ nam mkha'i 'khrul 'khor nam mkha' las byung ba nyid la bskor ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ro ras khru gang la// skyang nul legs par byas nas ni// nam mkha'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya// snag tsha dug

la sogs pa yis// ya ma gzugs kyi snying kha ru// thig skor gsung dang ldan par bya// dbus su le tshe dgu pa la// thig skor dang po dag la ni// re mig bcu gnyis dag tu bkod// de la yi ge dgod pa ni// le

tshe lnga dang bcu gnyis la// gsang sngags 'di dag dgod par bya// ya ma me ta k+She/ tsa ra sa to ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni// de dag 'khrul 'khor rtsa ba'o// thig skor gnyis pa dag la ni// dmag tshogs sngags de

dgod par bya// phyi rol thig skor gsum pa la// mtshon cha bkod dang sngags 'di dgod// oM oM mri nga nya Na na ma ha/ de dag spel zhing 'khor bar bya// dbus kyi le tshe gru gsum btson khang bzhir// ming

dang brda dang snying po spu gri dang// nam mkha'i snying po gang yin spel la bri// des ltar thabs dang shes rab tshul du gnyis/ kha sbyar brgyangs la mthing nag gur gyi dbub// rdzas dang yo byad 'tshogs byas mar ngo

la// nyi ma dang po bzhi ru bzlas par bya// nga nya Na na ma ha/ ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ ha che ge mo/ aM aM aM/ pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ nyi ma dang po khri 'dzab de ltar yin// gnyis pa la sogs de bzhin shes

par bya// nang nub mtshan mo dmag tshogs thams cad dril// de bzhin mthun dang mi mthun sdebs nas ni// nam mkha'i 'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa la// 'byung ba lnga yi 'khrul 'khor bsdeb pa dang// nam mkha'
nam mkha'i 'khrul 'khor nyid la ni// gsang ba srog gi snying po ngo shes nas// rang gshed rang la dbab par bya'o// des ni bsgrub bya gang yang rdul du rlog/ ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed drag
sngags 'khor lo gsang ba sdebs rgyud las// nam mkha' 'byung ba 'khrul 'khor de nyid la bskor ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ gdon chen bco brgyad dang rang gshed rang la
dbab pa 'di gsungs so// gdon chen bco brgyad gang yang rung// 'khrul 'khor 'di ltar bri bar bya// thig skor gnyis dang ldan pa la// dbus su gru gsum nag po ste// zla kham gsum dang ldan

par bya// thig skor dang po dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldan par bya// gnyis par rang sor bzhag nas kyang// dbus su rnam shes yig 'bru la// zla gam 'phrog byed snying po bri// rtsibs bzhi rten 'brel

gzir byed la// bzhi pa gcod byed mtshon cha bri// de yi phyi rol thig skor la// rang bzhin khro bo la sogs pa'i// dmag tshogs mtshon bskur la bri// de ltar gdon chen bco brgyad la// rang rang 'khor lo bco
brgyad do// pho yi gzugs brnyan thams cad ni// ral pa spyi bor bcings nas kyang// spyan mig g.yas su bzlog pa'o// mo rnams ral pa lcang lo bcas// spyan mig g.yon du bzlog pa'o// gdug pa rnam
gsum gzugs brnyan ni// sbrul dang sbal pa la sogs yin// de dag 'khor lo drag sngags la// mthun dang mi mthun sdeb pa ni// mgo can mgo bo bcad pa dang// mgo med mgo bo dgags pa dang// sngags
kyi dug rnams dbyung ba dang// rang gshed rang la dbab pa rnams// 'byung ba sgra yi 'khrul 'khor la// mkhas pas sdebs pas las 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje drag sngags 'khor lo gsang
ba'i sdebs las// gdon chen bco brgyad rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ dregs pa bco brgyad la sogs pas gzas pa po bsgral ba'i sdebs

gsungs pa/ dregs pa bco brgyad yang rung// 'khor lo snga ma ji bzhin la// bsgrub bya gang dang 'dres pa gang// sgra yi 'khrul 'khor sdeb pa yang// 'khor lo rtsibs la khram btab la// drag sngags bzlas shing
'khor lo bskor// rang la gnas pa'i gdon de bskul// bskul ba'i gdon dang rang bzhin gdon// sdebs pas las rnams 'grub pa yin// gzhan yang drag sngags sdeb pa ni// ya ma gshin rje rlung gi
gdon// chu las byung ba'i gnyen por sdeb// de dag gdon gyis ngos bzung ba// sngags kyi so pa gang yin// oM AHhU~M/ ya a hri/ ma e ti/ o o ne o ne/ du du ne du ne/ a i u/ e o aM a: ra rI/ la lI/

so stang srog shing gzugs pa'o// klad gnon rgyal po gang zhe na// a kro te ka ya man ta ka/ ya ma ye/ kA la rU pa ka pa ye/ hri sti a pa ye/ blon po skyes bu gang zhe na// ya ma ya ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra

ya tsa ni/ skabs kyis bsgyur zhing bzlas par bya// rgyab ri dmag mi gang zhe na// ya ma rA dza/ ya ma ra ka sha a/ ya rak+Sha/ d+ha be ta li kro d+hi shwA ri/ ma ma e ka ka dza ti/ de ma kha la baM ril/ ru lu ru lu/ shrI badzra kro

d+ha/ ya ma karma/ ro sha Na kri ta/ tsaN+Da rag sha mon ta/ sra byed cho cha gang zhe na// du ru ye bya tsa ye/ sing nga ye/ hri ta ye/ b+hi ta ye/ tsi ta ye/ ha la he/ mu ka ye/ o o o ne o ne/ bi tri ta o

nan/ g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha ya/ rno dbal mtshon cha gang zhe na/ kha che ge mo/ a o o/ a mu kaM myags thum ril trig nan/ sbur ya nan/ e hur thums dza/ kham shag ro myags mugs ti rbad ya/ ngar blud thar bya gang

zhe na/ mA ra ya rbad/ o o o/ myags thums ril rbad/ o o o/ mtha' ru bkos 'debs gang zhe na// g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha ya/ o o o/ o o o/ ya ya ya/ hri hri hri/ rngubs rngubs rngubs/ yaM raM baM yaM/ dz+ha dz+ha

dz+ha/ Nan Nan Nan/ myags mugs thums rbad ya/ dpa' bo logs 'then gang zhe na// oM a kro te ka ya ma n+ta ka ha ma tha b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ chos nyid don dang mthun par bzlas// rlung gi yi ge rnam drug
kyang// grogs su 'gro ba skabs kyis sdeb// des ni gzas pa sgrol bar nges// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pa dgra la bskor ba'i le'u ste
bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ gdon thams cad gzir ba drag po rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa/ 'jig rten dug rgod sna tshogs dang// gu gul nag po sbyar ma

dang// sbrul nag sha dang mu zi dang// bud med bsnol ma'i mngal khrag dang// glang ru zhogs ma ra dug pa// re lcags spyang dug la sogs dang// mi rta phag dang bya yi tshil// dre'u spu dang rta bon po// drag po rdzas

rgod bco lnga bsregs// dud pas bdugs na gang yang 'bros// yang na bgegs kyi ling ga ni// tshad dang ldan par byas nas kyang// tsha ba gsum gyis byugs nas ni// ming dang brda dang snying po dang// drag po
rdzas rgod bdug cing gzir// ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ni// yi dam lha tshogs gsal bsgom nas// bsgrub bya'i yul de gsal ba la// drag po ngan sngags gsal bas brdeg/ 'od zer mtshon cha sna tshogs
kyis// gang la dmigs pa myos brlams byed// sbyor ba ngan pa spyod par 'gyur// de nas rtags rnams byung ba dang// byang chub sems dang ldan par bya// bdag dang bgegs sogs thams cad kun// ye
shes me yis bsregs sbyangs nas// chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang la zhi// bgegs rnams bsos la bkra shis 'gyur// dpal gshin rje gshed drag sngags 'khor lo gsang sdebs rgyud las/ rdzas dang ting

'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ rgyud gtad pa 'di gsungs so// gsang ba lag na rdo rje 'dzin// lnga brgya tha ma byung ba'i tshe// sems can nyon mongs rags
par 'gyur// de tshe bstan pa'i snying po 'di// kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas// skal ldan 'ga' yi don ched du// dar zhing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir// lnga brgya phrag ni dang po la// lho nub srin po'i
gyed yul du// sing ga la yi gnas su ni// gshin rje gshed kyi sprul pa zhig/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen bya ba 'byung// gsang sngags bstan pa dar bar byed// de la khyod kyis bstan par rigs// zhes
gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba sdebs kyi rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// drag sngags 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyas sdebs 'khrul 'khor
gyi rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ e ma ra na su pa ni tan+t+ra braM kra ta na si ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ drag po sngags rgod dmod pa drag sngags gsang ba mchog gi spyi rgyud kyi rgyal
po// bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo rngam pa'i rgyal po/ sku gsung thugs kyi
bdag nyid/ chos sku bde ba chen po'i ngang las/ 'og min gyi gnas sems nyid kyi mkha'/ rab tu 'jigs pa dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang nang gdug pa can 'dul ba'i phyir drag po gsum du khros te/ rigs

gsum khro bo'i rgyal po dang/ 'khor lnga gnyis zhi khror snang ba'i sku dang/ bcu gsum gcig tu rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ rang sems stobs su gyur pa'i sku dang/ sna tshogs pho mor sprul pa'i sku dang/ zhe sdang las la

grub pa'i sku dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas khro bo rngam chen 'bar ba des/ chos thams cad rig pa byang chub sems thig le chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bsdus te/ de nyid kyi rol pa sna tshogs su snang zhing/

sngags kyi sgra du ma grag par mdzad do// de'i byin gyis brlabs kyis khro bo khro mo'i tshigs thams cad dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa can pho mo thams cad mthu dang/ rdzu 'phrul
dang/ stobs dang/ srog snying las dang nus pa thams cad gcig tu dril te sna tshogs pa sdebs par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis ngag mthun par gsol pa/ e ma ho dpal chen khro rgyal

gtso// bdag cag rnams kyi srog snying 'di// dpa' bo chen po'i spyan snga ru// bde chen thugs kyi byin stobs kyis// nus mthu ngar dang mi mthun gcod// rim pa du mar byin rlabs nas// drag po sngags rgod
btsan thabs dbyung// phra men kyang sdebs bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// gsang ba mchog gi spyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang zhus pa'i skabs te dang po'o//// de nas rigs gsum khros pa'i rgyal po des
'di skad ces gsungs so// drag po sngags kyi don nyid ni// ngo bo byung chub sems nyid de// lhun grub gting zab rgya cher rol// rnam pa yi ge brda nyid las// sgra dang tha snyad ming du shar// rang
