bzhin zhi dang khro bo dang// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'jig rten gyi// dregs pa can gyi lha yin te// nus pa mtshon cha sna tshogs la// dug gi ngar dang ldan pa 'dra// las ni phan gnod gnyis 'grub ste// de ltar sngags

kyi mtshan nyid la// ngo bo rang bzhin rnam pa dang// nus pa las dang don lnga'o// yi ge gsang sngags mtshan nyid las// sna tshogs pa yi don byung yang// don ni rtsa ba yan lag dang// 'dogs dang 'phul dang

'dren dang lnga'o// de dag 'di las 'gyang mi srid// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/

aM aH de la yi ge tha snyad du// kA li sum cu rtsa bzhi la// sgra dang thabs dang lus dang rgyu// rdo rje dgags kyi yi ge'o// A li brgyad gnyis de nyid la// dbyangs dang shes rab de nyid dang// rkyen dang pad+ma sribs

zhes bya// don dang mthun pa sna tshogs 'byung// dmod pa ngan sngags gsang ba mchog gi spyi rgyud las/ lan dang yi ge'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyal pos

'di skad ces gsungs so// drag po sngags kyi mtshan nyid la// rnam pa du ma bshad mod kyang// don ni gsum du 'dus pa yin// rtsa ba lha yi srog snying dang// yan lag las grub snying po dang// bar du brda sbyar

snying po'o// de dag rgyas par byed pa dang// ya tha rgyal ba zhi khro nas// ma tha the brang pho mo yi// bar gyi snying sngags thams cad dang// 'di ltar yang dag shes par bya// gang yin sgrub pa'i dus de na// gnad nas
bod cing 'gugs par byed// gnyis med ngang la btsud nas kyang// mnyam pa nyid du byed pas te// lha yi srog snying zhes su bshad// de nas gang yin las la 'jug/ phan gnod gang byed sgrub byed cing// tha
mar don rnams 'grub par nges// yan lag las grub ces su bshad// bsgrub bya rnams ni dmigs pa'i srog/ bar du gar spyir sbyor bar byed// bar du mdab sbyar snying po bshad// drag po sngags rgod rnam thog
la// rang rang stobs kyis byin brlabs ldan// dar dang dpal bcas gang yang 'grub// gdul bya dgos pa'i don dang sbyar// de dag don gyi rtsis bshad pa// ka ni stobs chen las yin no// kha ni stobs chen
las bdag 'dul// ga ni bkra shis mchog ldan bde// nga zhes dbang sdud lhun byin 'bar// tsa zhes mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul myur// tsha zhes 'joms byed sreg dang ldan// dza zhes rnam shes mthu stobs
'gugs// nya zhes gsal ba'i thig le 'dus// bzlog pa myur drag 'dus pa'i sgra// ta zhes dgos 'dod 'phel che bde// tha zhes mang brda rnam shes snying// da zhes thabs ldan 'dus pa'i
bcud// na zhes thabs kyis 'du byed 'gugs// pa zhes ma chags shes rab thabs// pha zhes rnam shes rtsa ba 'dus// ba zhes log rtog rgyun du 'joms// ma zhes dbyings ldan yid dus gsum// pa zhes sgrol
byed nus stobs sgrol// wa zhes kun 'dus thabs 'dren gsal// ra zhes rlag byed sreg byed cing smin// la zhes rjes su dkar zhing 'bod// sha zhes myos byed gtum zhing byams// sa zhes brtan byed srog
bcas len// ha zhes brtan stobs myur grub smin// a zhes rtsa ba'i stobs chen bstan// o zhes stobs ldan gzhan 'joms gso// i zhes 'gugs 'dren 'phul zhing bstim// e zhes drag po myur sgrol
gsod// u zhes rang dbang med srog sdud// ya btags gang yang mthun par byed// ha btags ring la drag par sgrol// 'a btags ring la 'jam par 'dul// yi ge'i don bshad tshad ma ni// kun la sbyar zhing
gdags zhes bshad// dmod pa ngan sngags gsang ba mchog gi spyi rgyud las/ yi ge 'bru nus pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// de nas ris gsum khros pa'i rngam chen 'bar ba des 'di skad ces gsol

to// yi ge dang bcas drag sngags la// mtshon cha'i rim pa mang yod kyang// rtsa ba'i sngags bsdu 'di bshad do// oM a kro te ka ya man+ta ka ha na ma the b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ ces pa sku yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// oM hri

baM pad+ma ta krid ma hA kro d+ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ ces pa gsung yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// oM nI laM ba ra d+hA badzra pA Na hU~M phaT/ ces pa gsung yongs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// oM nI laM ba ra d+hA ra badzra pA

Ni hU~M phaT/ ces pa thugs yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// dmod pa drag sngags kyi rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang khro bo rngam chen 'bar ba des drag pos

sngags kyi sdebs 'di gsungs so// drag po rgod kyi sdebs 'di la// rnam pa drug dang ldan pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// sngags kyi so pa btang ba dang// klad gnon rgyal po'i drag sngags dang// blon po skyes

bu lta bu dang// rgyab ri dmag mi lta bu dang// go cha sra byed lta bu dang// rno ba'i mtshon cha lta bu'o// 'di ni sdebs pa'i ngan sngags yin// de dag don gyis ngos bzung ba// sngags kyi so pa gang zhe na/ e e yaM raM

baM laM dza na da du a/ klad gnon rgyal po gang zhen/ a i u e o ri li aM aH ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ blon po skyes bu gang zhe na/ a kro te ka ya man+ta ka/ dri

sna tsaN+Da kA la rU pa/ hri ti bi ta/ a ne a ne/ u ne u ne/ du ne du ne/ mu ka ye/ ka pa ye/ a pa ye/ ya ma ye/ hri ta ye/ bi ta ye/ sing nga ye/ du ru ye/ bya tsa ye/ u u u/ hri badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba/

pad+man+ta kr-ita/ ra ga hring hring hring/ badzra pA Ni tsaN+Da ma ta ni laM ra she na/ rgyab ri dmag mi gang zhe na/ lam ra tsa kro d+ha ni bi na ya/ kI li kI li ya tig sna ya/ karmarak+Sha mon ta/ go cha sra byed gang zhe na/ a mu ka gnon
byed tig nan/ snying gzir sbur nan/ rno dbal mtshon cha gang zhe na// myags thum ril/ myogs ti e hur thums dza/ thums ya rbad khaM shag raM rbad e/ srung gzir sbyor ba'i rgyal po 'di// sdebs na gnam

lcags dus kyi thog/ dmod pa ngan sngags kyi spyi rgyud las/ drag po rgod kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang khro bo rngam chen 'bar ba des/ btsan thabs srog ser gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dri ma drug la
dmigs pa'i gzugs// grog 'am yang na shing shun la// ming rus rdzogs khris gzugs la glan// gcan gzan thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ zhag sngar drag sngags bar mi gcad// e a A/ i I/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/

pa pha ba b+ha ma/ a kro ya ma ye/ a ne u ne du ne/ dgra bo nri trig nan/ myags thums ril/ e hur thums ril/ e hur thums dza/ che ge mo nr-i khaM shag rbad/ e yaM e raM/ e baM e laM/ u U/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ ya

ra la wa/ hri badzra kro d+ha ha ya gr-i ba/ pad+man+ta kri hri hri/ dgra bo sbur nan/ ro myags e hur thums dza/ che ge mo tsit+ta la nri rbad/ o o ra la ta tha da d+ha na/ sha Sha sa/ badzra pA Ni tsan d+ha ma hA/ ni lam ro sha na dgra bo u

nan/ myogs ti rngums/ e hur thums dza/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta la breng shag rbad/ baM laM/ Ta ThaDa D+ha Na/ li li/ aM aH ya ma bag sha tsi karma/ ma mar tsa badzra kI la ya/ kro d+ha rag sha/ dgra bo che ge mo i na Na/ rmugs

myags o rnir hur thums dza/ rmugs r+t+rid phyung rbad/ sgrub bya lus kyi gnad bzhi ru// 'thom pa gshed du dbab pa ste// klad pa gti mug 'thom pa'i gnas// byol song rgyal po 'thom ba'i gshed// rang gshed

rang la dbab pa'i gnad// klad rtsa kun bcad myos par byed// myogs mugs khas thibs/ hU~M ling dun du ru tra khrag/ klad khrag mA ra ya rbad/ mgrin pa nga rgyal 'dres pa'i gnas// lha mi dbang po gsod pa'i

gshed// rang gshed rang la phab pa yis// mgrin rtsa ngag rgyun dbugs lam gcad// shag tri e ne/ b+ha tri he dun khrab na tri he dun khrag/ mgrin khrag myogs mA ra ya rbad/ snying kha zhe sdang gtum pa'i gnas// mi

rgod shan pa srog gi gshed// rang gshed rang la phab pa yis// dwangs pa'i rtsa dang log 'then gcad// tsan d+ha khrag raM ha ha ya hu hu sti sta khrag/ snying khrag myags mA ra ya rbad/ lte ba 'dod chags zhen pa'i
gnas// dmyal ba'i rgyal po gsod pa'i bdud// rang gshed rang la phab pa yis// dwangs ma'i rtsa dang log 'then gcad// srid pa'i rten sa gcad nas kyang// 'khor ba rlungs kyi ka
ba bsgyel// ra ga hu ti mo ta hab khrag/ lte khrag myogs mA ra ya rbad/ de dag gdod nas rang rang la// gnas pas rang grub rang gshed yin// gnan pa dmangs ris chu mig la'o// gzhan yang lo tog 'joms

'dod na// yul lha gzir zhing sngags 'di gdags// rigs gsum spyi yi rtsa sngags kyis// mjug tu 'byung ba chu rlung sdeb// yaM baM hril phroM shar drag tu phob/ sbu gri ngan sngags bsgyur nas ni// ya ma tsaN+Da ra ga pa

ne dud phroM yaM shar/ kar phroM yam shar/ shu ti phroM yaM shar/ thug phrad btsan thabs dbab pa'o// dmod pa drag sngags kyi spyi rgyud las/ btsan thabs srog ser gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas dpal chen rngam
pa yis// shes pa g.yung gi sdebs 'di gsungs so// rang gshed 'babs pa'i skabs dag tu// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad la/ nyon mongs drug dang gzung 'dzin gnyis// de la dregs brgyad langs

te// dngos dang bag chags tshul gnyis kyis// 'byung ba bzhi dang dbugs kyi rgyun// lus ngag yid kyi rtsa rnams gcod// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa las// zhe sdang las grub gshin rje langs// ya las grub

ste sa dang sha/ ma yis mtshon chas rtsa srog gcod// yid kyi rnam par shes pa las// nga rgyal rang lus grub btsan du langs// ra tri las grub dbugs kyis rtsa// myags kyi mtshon chas gcod par byed// lus kyi
rnam par shes pa las// 'dod chags las grub ma mo langs// ma las grub ste khrag dang chu// ra yi mtshon chas rang srog gcod// mig gi rnam par shes pa las// na dun las grub bdun du me dang drod// thun

gyi mtshon chas rtsa srog gcod// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las// phrag dog rang grub rgyal po langs// rtsa las grub ste dbugs dang rlung// ral gri mtshon chas rtsa srog gcod// sna yi rnam par shes pa las// the

tshom las grub srin po langs// sha shag las grub dus kyi rtsa// rbad kyis mtshon chas gcod par byed// nyon mongs can gyi yid las kyang// 'dzin pa las grub rmu dgod langs// la he las grub kyi rtsa// ya yi

mtshon chas rtsa srog gcod// lce yi rnam par shes pa las// gzung ba las grub sa bdag langs// na mun las grub yid kyi rtsa// rbad kyis mtshon chas rtsa srog gcod// dug lnga la sogs srog gzungs la// sde

brgyad gshed du dbab pa yin// e yaM e e baM e laM/ dz+nyA na badzra kro d+ha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ ta tha da d+ha na/ ya wa ra la/ Sha sha sa ha/ a kro te ka ya man+ta ka/ ka pa ye/ ka

la rU ba mu ka ya/ hri ti a pa ye/ u ne u ne du ne/ bya tsa le/ du ru ye/ sing nga ye/ tsit+ta ye/ ha la ye/ tri sna tsan d+ha/ badzra pA Ni tsaN+Da/ ma hi ti ta/ ha ya gri ba badzra kro d+hI/ ro sha ni/ tra ti nI laM ba ra d+ha

ra/ sarba duSh+taM ya ma rA dza badzra kro d+ha ya/ u tsus ma kro d+ha/ ka li raka sha/ mon ta kI li kI la ya/ tig sna bi sha/ tsa raka sha hu ti/ b+ha hi dun ya/ ru tra raka sha baM/ a mu ka tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ tsa khrag thum ling ya
long rbad/ khrag thibs/ raM shag mA ra ya rbad/ ro myogs mugs ti mA ra ya rbad/ gnod byed kyi snying phung/ hi hur thums rbad ya/ dmod pa drag sngags mchog gi spyi rgyud las/ g.yung gi le'u ste bdun
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs gsum khros pa'i rgyal po des/ phra men rkyang sdebs 'di gsungs so// sngags kyi phra men duM duM 'brel// rin chen dbang gi 'phreng ba 'dra// dgos 'dod thams cad

yid bzhin 'byung// phra men rkyang sdebs 'di lta ste// dang po rang rang nus pa can// chol bu kun nas btu pa yin// zhi ba lha yi nang nas kyang// oM dang hri a nus pa che// khro bo 'jigs byed nang nas kyang// hU~M

dang kro d+ha nus pa che// rdo rje phur pa'i nang nas kyang// ta dang kI li kI la ya// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i nang nas kyang// a kro hri d+hi ya ma ye// phyag na rdo rje'i nang nas kyang// badzra hril myags hri ta ya// pad+ma

dbang chen nang nas kyang// tsan d+ha ra ga hri ta ya// dbyings dang ye shes nang nas kyang// ru lu hi sha ri di ma b+h+yo// snang srid ma mo'i nang nas kyang// ma mo ta kri badzra shag/ 'dod khams dbang phyug nag mo

las// ma ma trag dang rag sha'o// lha gdon drag po'i nang nas kyang// de ba a su ra hri sha/ bdud nag 'bum gyi nang nas kyang// ru tra b+ha d+hi d+ha ra khrag/ gza' rgod drag po'i nang nas kyang// ru hu snying khrag badzra

yaka/ btsan rigs stong gi nang nas kyang// ra ti khrag a bi shu tsa// rgyal po sde yi nang nas kyang// rA tsa hri ba tsha ta sham// srin po shan pa'i nang nas kyang// ra sha ha sa ti kha rag sha/ gnod sbyin sde yi nang nas

kyang// b+ha hu ri ta king king kar// gdug pa gsum gyi nang nas kyang// na khA ra tsa hu ya khas// 'jig rten sde yi nang nas kyang// raM ni keng rus tsit+ta hri// 'di dag drag po'i sngags rgod de// gang yin las
la thogs med sdeb// 'bru re dril ba sngon bzhin la// brda yi ming bcas de bzhin gzir// las la btang ba'i srog kyang 'di'o// mA ra ya yi mtha' bsgyur nas// gsang ba mchog la shes pa'o// gzhan yang

shil pa'i yi ge ni// zhi ngal tshan tshe shis 'dod na// a yi gsang sngags drang bar bya// chos nyid drag po bsgrub 'dod na// e yis srog snying drang bar bya// myur 'grub rno ba thob 'dod na// raM gyi snying po drang bar

bya// tshan che brtan mi g.yo 'dod na// yaM gyi srog snying drang bar bya// byings che gting 'grub rlag 'dod na// baM gyi snying po drang bar bya// 'di rnams las la gang byas kyang// 'grub 'gyur 'di la
gdon mi za// gzhan yang srog snying mtha' bsgyur du// 'di dag kun kyang gdags par bya// gzhan yang byams shing zhi 'dod na// shan ting kun tu gdags par bya// longs spyod 'khor g.yog rgyas 'dod

na// puN+DiM ku ru gdags par bya// thams cad dbang du 'dus 'dod na// ba shaMku ru gdags par bya// hU~M khro drag po gsad 'dod na// mA ra ya yi mtshon chas brdeg/ dmod pa ngan sngags kyi rgyud las/ rang rang
rkyang pa sdebs pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas tshangs pa chen po la sogs te lha thams cad dang/ gang ba bzang po la sogs te gnod sbyin thams cad dang/ khyab 'jug la sogs te gza' thams cad
dang/ nag po nag mo la sogs te mon thams cad dang/ lang ka mgrir bcu la sogs te srin po thams cad dang/ 'khor lha srin sde brgyad thams cad la/ rngam chen 'bar bas bka' stsal pa/ rgyud 'di ni
mthu thams cad 'dus pas/ drag po sngags rgod kyi rgyud ces bya bar zur zhig/ sku gsung thugs gcig tu dril bas/ gsang ba spyi rgyud ces bya bar zung zhig/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi srog 'dus pas/ gnod
sbyin srig gus rdar zhes bya bar zung zhig ces bka' stsal pas/ 'khor rnams dgyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs la bstod pa/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad pa// nyi

ma 'bum bas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag 'tshal mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab brjid gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// hriHrgyal ba kun gyi chos sku pad+ma'i gsung// chos rje 'od dpag med

pa rdo rje'i chos// spyan ras gzigs dbang rngam chen 'bar ba'i sku// rta mgrin rta skad 'tsher la phyag 'tshal bstod// hU~M mdzad hU~M ste tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na// bden gnyis thugs chud chos kyi sku mnyes pa// sprul pa'i
skur ston phyag na rdo rje ste// dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pa phul lo// dmod pa ngan sngags mchog gi spyi rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad ba dang bstod pa'i le'u dgu
pa'o//// dmod pa ngan sngags kyi spyi rgyud rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ e ma ra na man tra tan+t+ra pra t+yaM gir tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ drag po sngags rgod de kho na nyid phyir bzlog pa'i sngags sdebs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal chen po 'jigs byed
'bar ba khrag 'thung chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos ba'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po dang/ yum pe ta li nag mo dang/ rngam chen mo dang/ spyan gsum ma
dang/ phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i khro bo dang khro mo grangs med pa dus gsum gyis bsdus pa rnams rngam pa'i cha lugs dang ldan par lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das rigs gsum mgon po'i spyan sngar lhags par

gyur to// de nas las kyi gshin rje rnams kyis/ mgon po rigs gsum la 'di skad ces gsol to// ho mgon po che po lags// dus ngan tha ma byung dus su// nang 'gras rtsod pa byung ba dang// de tshe rtsod pa ji
ltar bzlog/ rtsod pa drag po nam zhig 'byung// zhes zhus pas/ rigs gsum mgon pos bka' stsal pa// rtsod pa 'byung dus 'di lta ste// dus ngan tha ma byung dus su// sems can tshe thung bsod nams

zad// skye bo dmod pa rtog rtog spyod// drag sngags mtshon cha sna tshogs spyod// gsang ba'i rdas la dmod pa rol// gsang bar 'os pa kun kyang 'byin// sha chen la sogs zas za zhing// g.yang gzhi'i rgyal mtshan

khur du khur// mang po tshogs rnams lha srin 'bod// smyon pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs byed// de tshe sde brgyad lha srin 'khrugs// sna tshogs yams dang nad rnams dang// rims dang bkra mi shis pa 'byung// nang 'gras
rtsod pa de dus su// de tshe slob dpon slob bu dang// mched dang rdo rje spun la sogs// 'khrug cing nyams pa chen po 'byung// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa/ nang 'gras bzlog pa bshad du gsol// bka'

stsal pa/ drag po sngags kyis bzlog pa dang// 'khor lo sbyor las bzlog pa dang// thun gyi sbyor bas gsad pa'o// zhes gsungs so// phyir bzlog drag po sngags sdebs kyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng slang gi
le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang gsungs pa/ dang po 'chi med dus kyi sbyor ba bzlog cing/ rang gi gnod byed mtha' dag gzir ba dang// bar du mkha' 'gro gzan kha dgra la spo zhing sngags kyi du mda'
khong du brdeg pa dang/ tha mar rang srog rang gis bcad pa dang/ gshed ma'i yi ge rgyud la bslang ste/ lha bzhi bdud du dbab pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de yi don rnams ji ltar lags// bdag cag rnams la

bshad par 'tshal// bka' stsal pa/ dang po rtsod pa nang 'gras tshe// gang la bya bya'i gzas pa po// 'khor lo ming byang legs bris la// rabs chad mon gyi thod pa ru// khrag dang dug gis nang byugs la// de yi
nang du dril la gzhug ming rus snying khar bri ba yang// gri dang hur thums dza mA ra ya rbad// dkar nag mtshams su legs par bri// yan lag bzhi la hU~M bzhi bri// 'doms su phaT dang mgo la
dza// lte bdag la thum ri la zhes// mi thag dug gi snag tshas bri// yugs sa dar ma'i zhabs ma'am// mi lpags ro ras gar rus gtum// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa yis// rgya gram bcings la hom khung
gzhug/ g.yam pa nag pos kha bcad la// de yi steng du mchod rten ni// nag po sor bcu gnyis pa cig/ dus dus gsang sngags drag po bzlas// gang yin sbod pa ngos gzung bya// sngags kyi bar du ming rus

dang// sbod pa'i sbyor ba gang yin gzhug/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ u ne u ne u ne/ u u u/ e e e/ ya a hri/ ma e sti/ a kro te ka ya man taka/ a pa ye/ hri sti kA la rU ba ye/ bi tri ta many+dzu ka ye/ badzra kro d+ha ba ka bag

to/ badzra tsaN+Da badzra pa Ni/ hri ha ya gr-i ba ma hA rA dza tri tra ya ma ye/ u ne u ne u ne/ hU~M dza dza/ bar du gang yin dmigs pa'i srog/ de bzhin srungs ma rnams kyang gzhug/ dus dus phur pa thod pa la// brdeg cing
gzir ba'i tshul du bya// de yis sbyor ba bzlog pa dang// gnod byed mtha' dag 'joms par 'gyur// zhes so// phyir bzlog nag po'i sngags sdebs kyi rgyud las/ 'chi med dus kyi sbyor ba bzlog cing gnod
mtha' dag gzir ba ste le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang rigs gsum mgon po chen po yis/ bar du mkha' 'gro'i gzan kha dgra la dbab cing sngags kyi dug mda' khong du brdeg pa'i sbyor ba'i gsungs

so// mkha' 'gro gzan kha dbab pa ni// dang po dgra bo'i ling kha bya// 'khor lo byas la thun gyis brdeg/ 'brub khung nang du ling bdun gzhug/ hom khung kha la nag po rtsang// nyi shu rtsa gcig gzugs par

bya// tha mar thun rdzas bsogs par bya// thun rdzas rnams ni 'di lta ste// nyungs kar mi khrag dug chus sbyar// de yi thun rdzas bsog pa ni// rdo lcags zangs kyi phye ma dang// khrag la sogs pa mang du
bsog/ thun gyi rdzas su bstan pa yin// mda' ni thun rdzas yin par gsungs// dug ni sngags kyi 'od zer de// dug mda' zhes su bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// gzas kha spo ba'i 'khor lo ni// phyi

rtsibs bcu drug mu khyud ldan// nang du rtsibs brgyad legs par bri// rtsibs la drag sngags spu gri bri// bar du ming byang legs par bri// bcu drug rtsibs la gcod pa'i sngags// legs par bris la hom khung
du// pho thod mo thod kha sbyor du// ming byang 'khor lo khog par gzhug/ hom khung bcug la rtsang gis bskor// gri lcags phur pa sor bcu gnyis// mdun du btsugs la thod par gdags// me dang 'od la sogs
pa dang// mdangs la sogs pa yong mi bstan// gsang ba'i mthun rdzas bstan pa ni// lce spyang sngon po'i thod pa yis// ming byang dag la phog par brdeg/ dus dus thod pa rten la brdeg/ gsang

sngags drag po sdebs la brdeg/ don drug bsnyen pa'i rgyas sdebs dang// phra men rkyang sdebs shes par bya// don drug bsnyen pa'i rgyas sdebs kyis// ye shes lha yi bsnyen sdebs yin// rgyab ri dmag dpung
sdebs yin pas// shin tu tshan gyi che bar 'gyur dmag mi sdebs ni sde brgyad 'khor// skyes bu sdebs kyis rno bar byed// dmod pa drug sdebs gsang bar bstan// mkha' 'gro'i gzan kha dbab pa'o// zhes

gsungs so// phyir bzlog nag po sngags sdebs kyi rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro gzas kha dgra la spo ba la sngags kyi dug mda' khong du sdeb pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang mgon po des/ tha ma rang srog
rang gis gcod pa/ gshed ma'i yi ge rgyud la blang zhing lha bzhi dud du dbab ste sngags kyi dug mda' 'khong du 'phang ba 'di gsungs so// lha bzhi bdud du dbab pa ste// klad pa dung khang gzhal yas

nas// gti mug rgyal po'i gshed dbab ste// rang gi rgyud las gshed ma bskul// mgrin pa nga rgyal gnas dag tu// dregs pa can gyis rgyud bskul gsad// snying kha zhe sdang hU~M gnas su// srog bdag shan pa'i
bdud bskul gsad// lte ba srid pa'i 'dod chags gnas// ma mo bdud bskul gsad par bya// 'phrog byed yi ge 'bru gsum gyis// yi ge nri yi mtha' ma bskor// yang snying gsang ba 'bru dgu yis// mgo

dang yan lag bzhi la bri// mA ra ya zhes nri la dgod// gshed ma'i yi ge btus la bzlas// mtshon cha sngags kyi thun du dbab// de yi man ngag bstan pa yang// phag pa nag po'i thod pa'i nang// dug dang rme

khrag dag gis byug/ ro ras dang ni mi lpags la// 'khor lo lto sbyar legs bris la// rtsibs brgyad pa la mu khyud gnyis// pho mo sngags ni so sor bri// de yi gsang sngags bstan pa yang// ya ma me ta k+She klad

khrag myogs mA ra ya dza dza/ ra tsa sa ho me/ kri na myags ka pa ye rbad/ ru na yo ni/ rbad shag srog khyer b+h+yo/ shag rbad/ ya tsa ni/ mA ra ya thums ril rbad/ sa to ru na yo te/ myags thums ril mA ra ya rbad/ ru to

sa na ya/ u ne u ne mA ra ya/ ya ra tsa na ya/ shag rbad mur ti rbad/ ya me to sa tsa/ khaM myags a mu khA mA ra ya rbad/ pho'i 'khor lo'i sngags rnams so// shag ti o te/ baM hri de dun khrag/ mgrin khrag myogs mA

ra ya rbad/ mo yi 'khor lo gcod pa'i sngags/ has thibs hub ling dun ti ta khrag rbad/ klad khrag myogs mA ra ya rbad/ tsan d+ha ru khrag ha ha ya du hu sti/ snying khrag myogs mA ra ya myogs rbad/ ma ra hu ti tan hab

khrag/ lte khrag myogs mA ra ya rbad/ e A kar+Sha ya dza ya dza/ e tsa tsa mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad/ stam+b+h+ya ya nan/ u nan u nan tang/ a mar ya nan/ bi ta ya ha ha pra ma ka ra sa da a/ pa ra ya thums dza/

i dza la phya shag/ shag khaM shag bi sha phye/ pra tsa li phaT phaT ma ra ya/ 'khor lo spu gri gzas pa bsgral ces gsungs so// phyir bzlog nag po sngags kyi rgyud las/ 'khor lo la gshed ma'i sngags bri ba'i le'u ste
bzhi pa'o//// de nas gshed ma'i yi ge rgyud la blang zhing/ rang bdud rang la dbab pa 'di gsungs so// gsang sngags drag po'i yi ge sdebs// phra men dang ni dmag dpon dang// dmag mi dang ni skyes bu

dang// de bzhin sngags rnams bsdus la bzlas// gshed ma'i yi ge 'di lta ste// che ge mo u u u ne u ne che ge mo tsit+ta sbur nan/ tri mA ra ya stam+b+ha ya nan/ tri mA ra ya stam+b+ha ya myogs thibs ro myags mA ra ya rbad

nan/ b+ha ti du na ti mA ra ya hur thums dza// u nan e nan ri ri ting ting/ mi la ni dzo ni trag nan big nan/ rag she yag mo shu la yaM tri dun dun tsit+ta dun/ snying khrag rbad/ rtsa ri tri sham/ de ba sum/ yag sha khye/

rag ti khaM/ snying la thibs/ che ge mo snying mA ra ya hril rbad/ r+t+rid u ne u ne/ ri ri ha ha ra yi/ hur thums dza/ mA ra ya/ hri sti garba/ khug drongs/ badzra sA du ging ka ra/ hur thums ril snying la rbad/ snying la mA ra
ya 'dus/ tri phril shag rbad e/ gshed ma'i yi ge btu ste/ don med bzlas na rang la gcod// dbye dang dril dang man ngag gcod// de bzhin mkhas par shes par bya// gshed mas gsad pa'i phag rgod

ste// gsang thun brdeg cing gsad pa'i las// rang gi srung ma bdud du 'bebs// zhes gsungs so// phyir bzlog nag po'i ngan sngags kyi sdebs kyi rgyud las/ gshed ma'i yi ge rgyud la bslang ba'i le'u ste lnga

pa'o//// de nas mgon po chen po des/ spu gri nag po'i sngags kyi nang 'gras kyi stobs gzhom pa 'di gsungs so// oM shrI many+dzu ba ra krod+ha/ a kro te ka ya man ta ka hristi kA la rU pa dza/ snying kha rag hri ti de ma/

trag rag sha ru lu b+h+yo/ thum ri li li b+h+yo/ hriM hriM kha la b+h+yo/ ka la krin myags b+h+yo/ hri ti a pa ye rbad/ ka la ye rbad/ du kha du sa rnir sha ku mA ra ya rbad e/ che ge mo ni sha ku ru thum ri li li khyer b+h+yo/ hriM hriM kha long b+h+yo/

tsit+ta hab shab tri shag b+h+yo/ pra ma ya rbad/ mur rtsa ya rbad rak+ta tsa ra ya rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ srog khyer mA ra ya rbad/ sing nga ye mA ra ya rbad/ du ru e mA ra ya rbad/ bya tsa ye mA ra ya rbad/ thum sa rbad/ e

ban tra sngags pa tsi ti ma ri b+h+yo/ srog khyer bzlog thum ril mA ra ya bzlog b+h+yo// spu gri nag po sngags rgod kyis// nang 'gras pa dag 'joms par 'gyur// gang la brgyab kyang thogs pa med// mi khrag skam dang
nyungs nag dang// bong nga dang ni zi ra'i thun/ brgyab na kun kyang brlag par 'gyur// ces gsungs so// phyir bzlog nag po sngags sdebs kyi rgyud las/ drag sngags spu gri nag po'i sdebs kyi le'u

ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang mgon po chen pos/ phas kyi nus pa gzhom pa 'di gsungs so// dag dag gi lpugs pa'i snying shun nam// yang na pags pa'i ro ras la// ling ga khyid gang byas pa la// phyi ba'i

khrag gis ming rus bri// lto che mgo bo che la yan lag phra// mgo dang kha la sngags 'di bri// tsi ra na/ u ne u ne u ne/ u u u/ stam+b+ha ya/ lce pa sti 'ub ri li li rbad/ stam+b+ha ya nan/ a sib ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru

ye/ sarba kha tham nA sha ya thum dza/ trig nan/ hur thums che ge mo'i ngag ling stam+b+ha ya rbad/ ces bri'o// bya rgod phur pas mgo la gdab// phyi thod bcug la brag gnyan sba// de yis kho'i ngag gi nus pa nyams/

zhes gsungs so// phyir bzlog pa'i rgyud las ngag gnan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// drag po sngags sdebs de kho na nyid phyir bzlog pa'i sngags kyi rgyud thod pa nag po zhes bya ba spu gri gcod pa'i rgyud rdzogs
